item.text: (nga ) @#/ ! /gsang sngags rgyud 'bum gyi skor bzhugs so/ /
(黃) 秘密經第四部
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+ya badzra tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba rdo rje rgyud kyi
rgyal po/ / dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa ru/ /gsang ba'i 'khor
lo mi gsung ba/ /bdag gis zab mo'i don ma rtogs/ /de phyir khyed kyis bdag la gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nyon cig lha mo spyan gzangs ring / / gsang ba'i 'khor lo shin du zab/ /rgyud rnams kun du
ma gsungs pa/ /khyod kyis ngor mdzad nga yis bshad/ /gsang ba rdo rje rgyud kyi rgyal po las gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// //
lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ /gsang ba zhes pa ji ltar lags/ /de yi 'khor lo ji ltar lags/ /de yi rdo rje
ji ltar lags/ /de yi pad ma ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba zhes pa rnam pa bzhi/ /
gsang ba'i pho brang dang po ste/ /de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur phyir/ /gnyis pa rig pa'i pho brang ste/ /bzhi pa'i don ni rig

pa'i phyir/ /gsum pa rta mgrin 'khor lo ste/ /de yi mgrin par gnas pa'i phyir/ /bzhi pa gsang ba bde skyong ste/ /sdig pa spong phyir bde skyong yin/ /de rnams don ni gsang ba ste/ /brtul zhugs byed cing gtong phod che/ /e baM

zab cing chags la dga'/ /khu ba 'dzag cing rak+ta 'bab/ /'di la ston gyis gzhan la gsang / /rdo rje pad ma zhes bya ba/ /bzhi po gnas pa'i rten yin te/ /dper na khang rten ka ba bzhin/ /rgyud kyi don ni rgyun yin no/ /gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud

kyi rgyal po las rtog pa sel ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ /re re'i dbye ba ma 'tshal bas/ /'jig rten kun rdzob nyid du ltung / /'khrig pa'i zug ngu mi bzad pas/ /bdag ni 'di nyid du ni

'gum/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gsang ba'i pho brang rim pa drug /'dab ma'i grangs ni gnyis 'gyur ro/ /rta mgrin grangs ni dgu ru shes/ /gsang ba bde skyong rim pa gnyis/ /brgyad dang lnga bcu'i grangs yin no/ /rig

pa'i pho brang 'dab ma lnga/ /rigs ni me tog lta bu'o/ /b+ha ga rab 'bring gsum yin te/ /rnal 'byor mkhas pas btsal bar bya/ /sman dang snum gyi ri lu yis/ /rnal 'byor sor mo la bskus la/ /gzhang kha nas ni phye mas bdug /gsang

ba nas kyang snum gyis bdug /de nas rnal 'byor pho 'am mos/ /rtsa de sor mos legs par btsal/ /ring thung tshad ni sor gnyis nas/ /sor brgyad par ni gar gnas pa/ /shes rab b+ha ga che chung dang / /de bzhin b+ha ga drang dro dang / /chu

rnams che zhing bde ba chung / /de la rnal 'byor mkhas pa yis/ /b+ha ga che na bde ba chung / /b+ha ga che na chung ngu bya/ /chung na de bzhin bskyed par gsungs/ /grang na de bzhin bsro bar bya/ /chu rnams che na chung bar bya/ /'di 'dra'i b+ha ga gang la

yod/ /bud med 'di la b+ha ga mnga'/ /de phyir bud med bcom ldan 'das/ /thabs kyi rdo rje phra sbom dang / /ring ba dang ni thung ba ste/ /shes rab ji bzhin thabs la'o/ /de yi gnas su gzung bar bya/ /gsang ba rdo rje rgyud kyi rgyal po las gsang

ba rtogs pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ /e ba~M rnam pa'i dbus gang du/ /bde ba'i khyad par tshol ba la/ /'di las khyad par med dam ci/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /shin du dben pa'i

gnas btsal la/ /bza' ba bcud can sna tshogs dang / /btung ba zhim po mang po dang / /gur kum la sogs dri zhim dang / /shin du 'jam pa'i stan bting la/ /rnal 'byor ma yi gnas bcu ru/ /dri zhim thig le re re bya/ /rnal 'byor pha

yi gnas lnga ru/ /de bzhin thig le lnga yang bya/ /de nas mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab/ /e las gru gsum gting ring bsam/ /de yi nang du pa~M las ni/ /pad ma 'dab ma brgyad du bsam/ /de yi dbus su 'khor lo bsam/ /'khor lo'i dbus su re mig

dgong / /de nas thabs kyi rdo rje yang / /hU~M las rdo rje rtse lnga bsam/ /oM las rdo rje mgo bor bsam/ /phaT las rdo rje bu ga bsam/ /de nas bde ba'i stan thog du/ /sbyor ba rnam pa gsum bya ste/ /yan lag thabs dang sbyor ba dngos/ /'khor lo nyi shu rtsa dgu

la/ /chags pa skye ba'i dri yis byug /bde ba skye ba'i zas zos nas/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /thabs kyis gnas dgur 'o yang bya/ /shes rab kyis kyang gnas lngar bya/ /thabs kyis shes rab pad ma la/ /'o byas pad ma rgyas su gzhug /shes

rab kyis kyang de bzhin no/ /chags pa skye ba'i rtags 'byung ste/ /de nas gcig gis gcig 'khyud nas/ /he ru ka dang phag mor bsam/ /shes rab rkang pa gnyis brkyang nas/ /thabs ni thabs ldan gyis bskyod nas/ /nang rtags phyi ru bstan pa'i phyir/ /

shes rab ma la rtags gsum 'byung / /lus 'dar 'phar ba sku yi rtags/ /mi bzod skad 'don ngag gi rtags/ /shes pa brgyal ba thugs kyi rtags/ /'di ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ /'di yis skra dkar gnyer ma spong / /nad kyi zug rngu thams

cad 'joms/ /'di ni gsang ba'i bcud kyis len/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa min/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid la gnas/ /sbyin sreg la sogs bya ba min/ /gsang ba'i rdo rje rgyud 'di ni/ /kun gyis thos par mi 'gyur te/ /glegs bam sor ni

bcu gnyis bya/ /glegs bam gsang ba'i gnas su sba/ /yongs su smin pa'i rnal 'byor ma/ /'ga' yis mthong gi gzhan la sba/ /gsang ba ston pa'i bla ma ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid pas btsun pa yin/ /gzhan yang 'dod pa'i stan thog tu/ /

gsungs pa'i sbyor thabs kun byas nas/ /lnga bcu nas bzung stong gi bar/ /rnal 'byor ma kun bde med kyang / /sbyor thabs mkhas pas bskyed byas nas/ /bcu gnyis ma dang bde ba mnyam/ /sbyor thabs mi shes rnal 'byor pas/ /rlung mkhris bad kan

kun nas skye/ /shes rab kyis kyang thabs la ste/ /sbyor thabs mkhas pa'i shes rab ma/ /thabs kyis rtag tu bsten par bya/ /sbyor thabs mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor ba/ /rnal 'byor ma yi gsang la brten/ /gsang la bsten pa ji ltar lags/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /ming sring tshul lam rje 'bangs tshul/ /pha spad tshul lam mkhan slob tshul/ /gzhan gyi mi rig ngo tsha bsrung / /dben pa'i gnas su sbyor ba bya/ /gal te ma bsten dam tshig nyams/ /tshe 'di nyid la dmyal bar ltung / /

lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ /thabs med rnal 'byor ji ltar lags/ /bde ba khyad med ji ltar lags/ /phyag rgya ma bsten ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bde ba la gnas gsang ba'i don/ /khyod kyis ngor mdzad nga

yis bshad/ /sbyor thabs mi shes rnal 'byor dang / /stan yang gcig la mi 'dug ste/ /'dod chags bsam pa yang mi bya/ /gal te de 'dra rten gyur na/ /'jig rten phal ba'i 'dod chags te/ /shi nas mnar med dmyal bar skye/ /'dod chags

spyod pa shal ma ri/ /lcags kyi sor ni bcu drug pa/ /yar la 'dzeg cing mar la 'bab/ /thabs med rnal 'byor 'dra ba 'bod/ /de phyir sbyor thabs mkhas pas bsten/ /sbyor thabs las ni bde ba skye/ /de phyir bde ba khyad par 'phags/ /bde ba khyad

med lus zungs nyams/ /rlung khris bad kan kun nas skye/ /las kyi phyag brgya rtag tu bsten/ /phyag brgya ma bsten dam tshig nyams/ /phyag brgya bsten pa'i dus su yang / /rnal 'byor ming sring brda yis mtshon/ /gang zhig mdzub mo ston pa na/ /

'ongs sam zhes ni 'dri ba yin/ /sor mo gnyis ni ston pa dang / /mthe bo drang por ston pa dang / /de bzhin srin lag drang por ston/ /rdo rje bo la zhes bya ste/ /pad ma kak+ko la zhes bya/ /de ltar ma byas dam tshig nyams/ /brda yi bye brag ma lus pa/ /sam bu Ta ru shes

par bya/ /lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje pad ma dga' ba'i gnas/ /de ru gzung ba ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /de ru gzung ba rnam pa gnyis/ /rab kyi dbugs dang shes pas gzung / /dang po btsan thabs

sbyor bas gzung / /sbyor ba rnam pa bcu ru gzung / /gcig ni sbom po khro mos gzung / /gzung ba'i rten ni rnam pa bzhi/ /man ngag can gyis shes par bya/ /gal te de ru ma zin na/ /'khor bar ltung bas rang gis su/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi ha~M la bsdu/ /

lce yis byang chub sems blangs la/ /ro ma'i 'khor lo ru ni bstim/ /de ltar ma byas dam tshig nyams/ /lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ /shes rab bskyod thabs 'ba' zhig gam/ /thabs kyi bskyod pa 'ba' zhig gam/ /rnal 'byor pha

dang rnal 'byor ma/ /bde ba khyad par med dam ci/ /bde ba'i ngo bo ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bskyod pa bud med kyis kyang bskyod/ /sbyor thabs kyang ni thabs kyis bya/ /de las bde ba khyad par 'phags/ /dper na dar

dang snal ma bzhin/ /thabs kyis snal ma'i cha tsam myong / /shes rab dar gyi sham bu tsam/ /de phyir rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud/ /rnal 'byor ma yi 'grub par gsungs/ /rgyud kyi nang na mchog yin pas/ /rab gnas sbyin sreg dbang bskur dang / /

mchod dang bzlas dang gtor ma dang / /khrus dang bsrung ba la sogs pa/ /gsang ba 'di las gzhan na med/ /'bras bu'i nang na 'di mchog ste/ /ye shes lnga yi spros dang bral/ /de nas lha mos 'khor dpag tu med pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma

rnams 'dod chags kyi the tshom yongs su zad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la kun gyis 'khyud nas gsang ba'i mchod pas bde ba chen po'i ros gang bar mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /gsang ba'i yang gsang ba gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po

'khor lo sdom pa'i rtog pa rgyu dang 'bras bu'i de kho na bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o/ /gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// // paN+Di ta rat+na badzra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur te

gtan la phab pa'o/ / rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+ya sarba ts+tshin+da tan+t+ra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba thams cad gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis g.yon gyi phyogs nas skor ba lan

gsum byas nas phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ho bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /gsang ba zhes pa ji ltar lags/ /de yi gcod pa ji ltar lags/ /rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar lags/ /de yi rgyal po'ang ji ltar

lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gsang ba zhes pa rnam pa bzhi/ /dang po bum dbang dang 'brel ba'i/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor te/ /rten dang brten par bsgom pa ni/ /snod bcud gzung 'dzin rnam rtog rnams/ /spang phyir

nga yis gsungs pa yin/ /de'i khyad par dgongs pa'i don/ /dang po stong nyid la sogs pa/ /rgyud gzhan du ni nga yis gsungs/ /rten dang brten pa'i bye brag la/ /dang po rten gyi dgongs pa yang / /thugs ka'i yi ge hU~M las ni/ /mar me gcig

las gnyis kyi tshul/ /kha dog nag po'i e 'phros pas/ /gru gsum rgya che gting ring bsam/ /gru gsum sku gsung thugs yin te/ /dug gsum 'joms pa dgongs pa'i don/ /logs ni rnam thar gsum yin te/ /lus ngag yid gsum las

byung ba'i/ /mi dge bcu 'joms dgongs pa'i don/ /chos kyi sku ni dri med kyis/ /rang bzhin gyis ni kun la khyab/ /de phyir rgya chen dgongs pa'i don/ /'phags pa nyan thos rang rgyal dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang / /chos

sku rtogs pa ma yin pas/ /gting ring ba ru dgengs pas bshad/ /de nas thugs ka'i hU~M las yang / /hU~M 'phros pa las rdo rjer gyur/ /rdo rje gur du gyur pa yang / /dang po tshe yi bar chad dang / /gnyis pa thar pa'i bar chad de/ /bgegs ni rnam pa gnyis

yin te/ /phyi yi bgegs dang nang gi bgegs/ /phyi yis tshe yi bar chad de/ /nang gi thar pa'i bar chad byed/ /bar chad rnam pa gnyis bsrung ba/ /rdo rje gur gyi dgongs pa'i don/ /ya~M las byung ba'i gong dang 'dra/ /dbyibs ni zla gam lta bu ste/ /

rnam par rtog pa spong ba dang / /mi rtog pa ni skye ba la/ /dbang du byed pas dbang gis don/ /ba dan bzhi yi dgongs pa yang / /chos rnams dus gsum gnas pa yi/ /dgongs pa yin par nga yis gsungs/ /ra~M las me yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /zur

gsum drag po'i dgongs pa yin/ /rdo rje rtse gsum sku gsum don/ /ba~M las chu yi dkyil 'khor te/ /zlum po spros pa zhi bar gsungs/ /bum pa chos sku'i yan lag bzhi/ /la~M las gser gyi sa gzhi ste/ /gru bzhi rgyas pa'i rang bzhin

te/ /rdo rje rtse lnga ye shes lnga/ /de steng ri rab rtse mo brgyad/ /rnam thar brgyad kyi dgongs pa yin/ /snod bcud rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags/ /dur khrod brgyad ni g.yas dang g.yon/ /go rims bzhin du dgod par bya/ /re re'i bye brag rnam

rtog yang / /bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya/ /gnyen po'i stobs ni yongs su rgyas/ /shing rnams rims bzhin rtag tu dgod/ /rnam rtog mi dge bcu yi don/ /'joms pa'i rtags su phyogs skyong dgod/ /'dod chags zhe sdang ma rig pa/ /

gdug pa 'joms phyir klu brgyad dgod/ /thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ /gzugs sku gnyis kyi nga rgyal gyis/ /lus dang ngag gi sems can gyis/ /don mdzad phyir ni char sprin dgod/ /nang dang gsang ba de bzhin no/ /de bzhin mthar

thug bzhi pa yang / /snyan nas rgyud pa shes par bya/ /de nas nang du gzhal yas khang / /b+h+ru~M las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad de/ /rtsibs brgyad rnam shes brgyad kyis dngos/ /yongs su gyur bas rnam snang sku/ /phyi nas bltas pas nang

du gsal/ /de bzhin nang nas phyi ru ste/ /thams cad gcig tu snang ba'i don/ /tshon chen sna lnga sku lnga'i don/ /kha dog lnga ni rigs lnga'i don/ /gru bzhi tshangs pa'i gnas bzhir gsungs/ /logs bzhi bsdu ba'i dngos po ste/ /sgo

bzhi dran pa nyer gzhag yin/ /ka ba brgyad ni rnam thar brgyad/ /gdung bzhi ye shes bzhi yi don/ /twa ra na la sogs pa kun/ /stobs la sogs pa yin par gsungs/ /de nas nang du gdan rnams ni/ /pad ma'i sa bon dbyangs las skyes/ /

'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs kyis/ /ma gos rtags su pad ma'i gdan/ /de steng nyi ma zla ba ste/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi brda/ /dang po ro ni nga bdag gam/ /rnam rtog 'joms phyir gsungs pa yin/ /yan lag bzhi

ldan gtso bo'i gdan/ /'khor la re re gdan du sbyin/ /gtso bo'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir/ /dgongs pa'i don dang bcas pa yis/ /rten gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'o/ /de nas lha rnams bskyed pa ni/ /skye ba bzhi yi tshul yin te/ /skad

cig las byung rdzus pa'i tshul/ /dper na chu gting las ni nya/ /rkyen las skyes pa drod gsher skyes/ /dper na nyi mas pad ma bzhin/ /spro zhing bsdu ba sgong skyes tshul/ /dper na rdo las zangs bzhin no/ /sbyor ba las byung mngal

skyes tshul/ /yar la sreg cing mar la gso/ /dper na spra tshil las ni gzugs/ /pho brang rnam par snang mdzad de/ /rjes su skyed ba he ru ka /dbang bskur bcom ldan mi bskyod pa/ /bstod pa rin chen 'byung ldan yin/ /mchod

pa don yod grub pa'o/ /bdud rtsi myang ba 'od dpag med/ /yan lag drug las byung ba yi/ /dngos grub 'di ni khyad par 'phags/ /de nas bzlas pa'am bsgom pa ni/ /dbang po rab 'bring tha ma ste/ /rab kyis yongs su rdzogs pa yi/ /

bsgom pa'am bzlas pa bya bar gsungs/ /'bring gis gtso bo yab yum yin/ /tha ma'i dbu ma'i spyan la 'jug /dbu ma'i spyan la brtan gyur nas/ /sum bcu rtsa bdun rdzogs par sgom/ /'bring po yis kyang de bzhin te/ /gnas

pa rtsa dang g.yo ba rlung / /bkod pa sems dang dman pa dbyibs/ /zab pa sngags dang thig le dang / /mthar thug chos dang yan lag bdun/ /'di yis bstan pa shin du zab/ /gong du gsungs pa thams cad kyang / /rnam pa bzhi ru shes par bya/ /re re

la yang bzhi bzhi ste/ /du ma'i tshul ni shin du zab/ /phyi dang nang ni sngags kyi don/ /gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor phyi yi don/ /phyi la ltos nas nang yin te/ /de nyid gsang ba gsang ba'i don/ /las su rung ba mthar phyin don/ /gzugs brnyan dkyil

'khor phyi yi don/ /nang du dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid ni/ /phung po skye mched khams rnams la/ /re re lha ru byin brlabs la/ /lnga 'am drug gam sum bcu bdun/ /g.yas g.yon steng 'og sgo la sogs/ /bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya/ /rdo rje

snying pos yang gsol pa/ /sum bcu rtsa bdun zhes bya ba'i/ /yongs su rdzogs pa ji ltar lags/ /bskyed pa zhes bya ji ltar lags/ /de yi rim pa ji ltar lags/ /gzhan yang rten gyi dkyil 'khor dang / /thun dang thun mtshams ji ltar lags/ /

lta spyod zung du ji ltar 'jug /dpa' bos bdag la bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sum bcu rtsa bdun yang dag rgyu/ /'bras bu gnyis med ye shes bskyed/ /de phyir 'bras bu sngon 'gro ba'i/ /rgyu ni gtso bor gyur ba yin/ /

he ru kar gyur gcig la yang / /rgyu rnams yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ /gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi sogs/ /bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/ /rgyu nor ba las ma yin te/ /gro las nas kyi myu gu min/ /ma tshang ba las ma yin te/ /'bru nyams pa las myu gu

med/ /rgyu med pa las ma yin te/ /nam mkha'i me tog las ni dri/ /rgyu de rkyen med pa las min/ /nags sreg me la rlung med bzhin/ /de ltar yan lag bzhi ldan pa'i/ /las dang po yis rnam rtog spang / /lha yi rnal 'byor la gnas pas/ /

bskyed pa zhes ni gsungs pa yin/ /phyi dang nang du du ma'i cha/ /de yi rim par bshad pa yin/ /rten gyi dkyil 'khor bye brag kyang / /khyams dang bla gab med pa dang / /bla gab bcas dang rnam pa gsum/ /mos pa'i dbang du gsungs pa yin/ /

'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis/ /bzhi dbye yi/ /nyin mtshan bzhi ru gsungs pa yin/ /mtshams kyang bzhi ru shes par bya/ /dbyug gu chu tshod 'pho ba dang / /thun brgyad bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /thun dang mtshams ni mnyam par gsungs/ /

mtshams kyi tshe na rnal 'byor pa/ /dbang po 'bring dang tha ma yis/ /lha rnams rdzogs par spro byas la/ /mar me gcig las gnyis kyi tshul/ /mchod pa la sogs tshul bzhin bya/ /lta ba zhes pa mnyam gzhag ste/ /rjes thob spyod pa ru ni bshad/ /

bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa las/ /rgyan drug 'chang ba'i spyod pa gnang / /gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba la/ /rgyan dang bdud rtsi'i spyod pa gnang / /rdo rje'i rigs dang rin chen rigs/ /pad ma'i rigs dang las kyi rigs/ /spyod pa gnang ba nga yis

gsungs/ /shes rab ye shes dang 'brel bas/ /gong du gsungs pa thun mong ste/ /khyad par phyag rgya'i spyod pa gnang / /lta ba mi ldan spyod pa dang / /spyod pa mi ldan lta ba gnyis/ /'di ni gsang sngags dam sri ste/ /mnar med sems can dmyal

bar skye/ /de phyir lta med spyod pa spang / /srin po khros pa'i spyod pa'o/ /spyod med lta ba'ang spang ba ste/ /dka' thub kyis ni lus gdungs shing / /phung sogs rnam snang la sogs la/ /brnyas pa rtog ge skam po yin/ /des na lta spyod zung du

'jug /glang chen bzhengs kyang mnyam par bzhengs/ /glang chen bzhugs kyang mnyam par bzhugs/ /rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa/ /bdud rtsi zhes pa ji ltar lags/ /de yi spyod pa ji ltar lags/ /de yi yon tan ji ltar 'byung / /

rgyan la sogs pa'i don rnams kun/ /gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bdud rtsi rnam pa gsum du gsungs/ /dang por phyi yi bdud rtsi bsten/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga la/ /lcags

kyu lnga ni dgod pa ste/ /brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang por 'dzag /si h+la mi bskyod lud skam blang / /bcu gnyis bcu drug dang por 'dzag /he ru ka dang rnam snang dang / /lud skam snying po blang bar bya/ /yar gyi ngo dang mar gyi ngo / /brgyad

dang bcu bzhi bcwa lnga la/ /thams cad bzang po'i dus su gsungs/ /seng ge'i gzugs ni dkar po bzang / /lus ngag sdom zhing nyes pa med/ /'di ni sha yi sgrub pa'i rten/ /glang po glang po chen po ste/ /ke ta ka yi rgyu nyid las/ /gla rtsi la sogs

'byung ba'i sha /ba lang gi wang ldan pa'i sha /rta ni rta'i rgyal po ste/ /kha dog dkar min dmar ba min/ /dbyibs dang kha dog mi 'gyur sha /mi ni skye ba bdun pa'i sha /lus ngag yid la mkhas pas brtag /bza' ba'i snod ni dum bu gcig /

de yi nang du bsgrub par bya/ /rab 'bring tha ma'i mtshan ma ni/ /'bar dang dud pa lbo ba rnams/ /mtshan ma phyi yi yin par bshad/ /gzhan skyes don ni rgas chen sel/ /skad ma phyin na dngos grub med/ /skad phyung bas ni tshangs par 'gyur/ /

nang gi bdud rtsi rang byung yin/ /dril can bu ga dgu lam nas/ /'dzag pa'i bdud rtsi rgyun chad nas/ /til gyi 'bru bzhin gang ba ste/ /a ba d+hU tIr dbugs chud pas/ /steng gi drug pa'i rgyu ba yin/ /si h+la ga pur dbus na gnas/ /'og gi

drug pa rgyu ba yin/ /'di ni gsang ba'i bdud rtsi ste/ /skra dkar gnyer ma 'chi ba spong / /spyod pa'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis/ /gang zag mchog dang las dang po/ /bskyed pa'i rims la legs gnas shing / /rigs su 'dzin pa spang ba'i phyir/ /

phyi yi drug pa'i bdud rtsi sbyin/ /las dang po la phyi nang gnyis/ /'di yi nus pa'ang du ma ste/ /skra dkar med cing rnam rtog 'joms/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi la rab tu gnas/ /lnga pa goms par gyur pa yis/ /drug pa gzung bar gsungs pa ste/ /

kun rdzob steng gi sna rtse nas/ /sor bzhi nas ni dbus su bzhugs/ /lte ba'i gnas su dbugs gnas pa/ /steng gi drug pa zin pa yin/ /'di yi nus pa'ang du ma ste/ /sred pa med cing yang ba'o/ /'dab chags rgyal po ji bzhin du/ /nam

mkhar 'phur zhing ltung ba med/ /mchog dang chad pa'i dbus gnas pa/ /'og gi drug pa yin par bshad/ /gang zag mchog la gsungs pa yin/ /'di yi nus pa'ang du ma ste/ /dril can bu ga 'gag par byed/ /rgyan gyi dang po zhe sdang

'joms/ /dur khrod chen po si h+la ling / /ru dra 'dul ba'i rim pa ste/ /bdud rtsis rnam rtog la sogs 'joms/ /phrin las bzhi ni thun mong yin/ /phyag rgyas 'dod chags rnam par dag /rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa/ /drug pa

zhes pa ji lta bu/ /gang zag mchog ni ji lta bu/ /'dod chags ji ltar rnam par dag /dpa' bos bdag la bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /g.yas g.yon steng 'og bzhi las ni/ /lnga pa nam mkha' 'byung ba yin/ /

lnga pa rang bzhin med pa ste/ /drug pa zhes ni gsungs pa yin/ /dga' ba mchog dga' lhan cig dga'/ /bral ba'i dga' ba sngon 'gro bas/ /lnga pa bde ba chen po 'byung / /bde chen rang bzhin med pa dag /'og gi sgo yi drug pa yin/ /de phyir

drug pa 'dod pas kyang / /bzhi pa sngon du song ba yis/ /lnga pa yongs su rdzogs pa bsgom/ /dper na zangs kyi dngos po la/ /gser 'gyur rtsi yi nus pa yis/ /zangs nyid gser du gyur pa ste/ /zangs las ma gtogs gser nyid dang / /

lnga pa las gzhan drug pa ni/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gsungs so/ /lo dang zla ba zla ba phyed/ /nyin zhag dus drug dus gnyis la/ /skad cig re tsam drug la 'byung / /las dang po yi spyod yul min/ /dper na chu yi snod nang du/ /bdud rtsi

thigs pa gcig gzhag pa/ /chu ru nyams su myong ba las/ /gcig shos nyams su myong ba med/ /chu la brten nas bdud rtsi yang / /nyams su myong bar byed pa ste/ /de bzhin spros bcas lnga pa la/ /rten nas spros med drug pa 'byung / /rgyud

gzhan du ni nga yis gsungs/ /mtshan ma lnga 'am ro brgyad dam/ /sa brgyad non nas mngon shes ldan/ /las kyi phyag brgya yongs su spangs/ /ye shes phyag brgya la gnas shing / /phyag rgya chen po la 'jug pa/ /'di ni gang zag mchog

yin te/ /'di yis drug pa zin par bshad/ /'dod chags zhes pa 'khor ba ste/ /rnam dag mya ngan 'das par gsungs/ /de nas gsang ba gnyis pa yang / /gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba ste/ /rten cing 'brel pa zab mo'i don/ /dang po lha yi nga

rgyal bya/ /mkha' 'gro rtsa ru shes par bya/ /dpa' bo byang chub sems su shes/ /'khor lo'i gnas ded 'khor lo dang / /de nas bsgrub bya shes par bya/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo nas/ /tshangs mdo'i bar du sor mo'i tshad/ /bcu tshan bzhi

dang brgyad yin te/ /sor gsum la ni 'khor lo re/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin yin/ /dbang gis gnas kyi 'khor lo'i gnas/ /bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/ /tshangs mdo me la gzhang kha rlung / /sor gsum sor bzhi mkhas pas brtag /

gnas gsum gsang ba'i gnas yin te/ /de bzhin gnas gsum rig pa'o/ /sor bzhi rta mgrin gnas yin te/ /sor brgyad gsang ba bde skyong gnas/ /rnal 'byor pha dang rnal 'byor ma'i/ /lus kyi rten gyi bye brag las/ /sor mo bzhi

bcu brgyad nyid las/ /brgyad ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i gnas/ /bzhi bcu la ni 'khor lo gzhan/ /bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/ /thams cad sgal tshigs dbyug gu ste/ /phyi dang nang du mkhas pas brtag /'khor lo la yang rnam pa gnyis/ /

dang por 'khor lo gnyis pa rtsa/ /rkyen dang gsang ba rang bzhin dang / /dbang dang rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs/ /rkyen la gnyis te gsang ba bzhi/ /rang bzhin bcu drug dbang ni gnyis/ /tsaN+Da li ni nyi shu bzhi/ /'khor lo bzhi ru sbas pa ste/ /

bla ma chogs nang mthong na rgyab kyis phyogs/ /man ngag gzhan du spel zhing 'phyar la dga'/ /'dod chags spyod phyir sbas pa'i rim pa nod/ /gab pa'i don la rgyab phyogs skur ba 'debs/ /gsang sngags bar gcod rnal 'byor gzhan la

gshe/ /'di ni mnar med sems dmyal chen por skye/ /sangs rgyas stong rtsa gcig rdzogs tshe yi tshad/ /'di la sbas kyi thams cad la/ /nga yis sba bar ma gsungs te/ /de phyir rgyud gzhan du ni sbas/ /rgyud 'dir nga yis rgyas par bshad/ /sum

bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas g.yon cha/ /drug bcu rtsa bzhi grangs su sbas/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis las ni zung / /bcu drug grangs su sbas pa yin/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis phyogs dang mtshams/ /brgyad kyi grangs su sbas pa'o/ /spyi gtsug 'khor lo spyi

bor sbas/ /gsang ba bde skyong lte bar sbas/ /bcu drug las ni zung 'gyur ba/ /brgyad kyi grangs su sbas pa yin/ /bcu drug las ni g.yas g.yon cha/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis grangs su sbas/ /bcu drug las ni bzhi bzhir 'gyur/ /drug

bcu rtsa bzhi'i grangs su sbas/ /mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo ru/ /ro drug la ni longs spyod pas/ /ro ma longs spyod 'khor lor sbas/ /rta mgrin 'khor lo mgrin par sbas/ /brgyad las g.yas g.yon cha gnyis cha/ /bcu drug grangs su sbas

pa yin/ /brgyad las g.yas g.yon steng 'og bzhi/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis grangs su sbas/ /brgyad las g.yas g.yon steng 'og bzhi/ /mtshams bzhi dang ni brgyad kyi cha/ /drug bcu rtsa bzhi grangs su sbas/ /tshangs mdo'i me ni me la

sbas/ /snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo ru/ /chos kun rig pas rig pa sbas/ /drug bcu rtsa bzhi las ni zung / /sum bcu rtsa gnyis grangs su sbas/ /drug bcu rtsa bzhi las ni bzhi/ /bcu drug grangs su sbas pa yin/ /drug bcu rtsa bzhi las ni

brgyad/ /brgyad kyi grangs su sbas pa'o/ /gzhang kha rlung ni rlung las sbas/ /gsang ba'i gtum mo gtum mor sbas/ /'khor lo re la 'khor lo bzhi/ /phyi ru srog gi rnam par 'khyud/ /chu dang chu bran chu bo rnams/ /sna tshogs du mar 'bab byed

kyang / /rgya mtsho chen por ro gcig 'gyur/ /lte bar rol pa bde chen sku/ /rnam par thar dang stong pa dang / /de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad ldan/ /snying ga chos kyi sku yin te/ /rnam thar la sogs de bzhin no/ /mgrin pa longs spyod de dang 'dra/ /

bde chen sprul pa'ang de bzhin no/ /mtshan rnams steng la stong pa 'og /dang po'i bde chen kha sbyor yin/ /rnam thar steng la dpe byad 'og /bde chen kha sbyor gnyis pa yin/ /gzhan ni zhal las shes par bya/ /stobs bcu rnam dag kha sbyor

bcu/ /rlung ni sgrol ma'i ngo bo ste/ /rtsa drug dbugs kyi rang bzhin gang / /me ni gos dkar rang bzhin te/ /zur rtsa gsum ni drod kyis gang / /rang bzhin gyis ni gnas pa la/ /brgyad dang lnga yi mtshan nyid la/ /brgyad la dbyangs kyi dang po brgyad/ /

lnga la kA li dang po lnga/ /rig pa'i pho brang mtha' can lnga/ /rta mgrin dbyangs yig g.yon dang g.yas/ /a gnyis mthar gzhag 'dab dgu yin/ /gsang ba'i bde skyong 'khor lo ni/ /ma ning bzhi dang a gnyis dbus/ /byang chub sum bcu rtsa bdun

yin/ /de nas rtsa yi mtshan nyid kyang / /phyi yis stong phrag bdun bcu gnyis/ /sha la gnas nas tshil bu skyed/ /nang gi brgya dang nyi shu ni/ /tshil la gnas nas rkang skyed pa'o/ /gsang ba sum bcu rtsa gnyis ni/ /rus par gnas shing ga pur skyed/ /

de kho na'i rtsa gsum ni/ /gsang bar gnas shing bde ba skyed/ /khang pa stong phrag bdun bcu gnyis/ /khang pa re la khang pa 'bum/ /khang pa der gnas srin bu'i rigs/ /stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis te/ /grangs ni 'bum du shes par bya/ /nang

dang gsang ba'i rtsa la yang / /srin bu'i rigs ni grangs su gsungs/ /de kho na'i rtsa gsum las/ /'dod chags skyed pa'i srin bu dgu/ /nyin dang mtshan mo mtshams dang gsum/ /dgu ru mkhas pas shes par bya/ /rtsa der gnas pa'i ga bur yang / /

bdud rtsi sbyor ba las byung ba/ /bdud rtsi la sogs gong du gsungs/ /ya~M las rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang / /ra~M las me'i dkyil 'khor dang / /de steng a las ka pA la/ /pa~M las pad ma 'dab brgyad bsam/ /nang du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /de ru sha

la sogs pa dgod/ /gtso bo'i steng du sor bzhi 'am/ /mtho gang tsam du bsam pa ni/ /yi ge go bzlog bsam par bya/ /sngon po dmar po dkar po ste/ /hU~M las gyur pa'i rdo rje bsam/ /de stengs yi ge oM bsam la/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng

du bsam/ /'di ni bdud rtsi'i kha sbyor ro/ /sha lnga las ni gdan lngar gyur/ /lcags kyu bdud rtsi lnga ru 'gyur/ /las kyi rlung gis me bus te/ /zla ba gtso bo la sogs zhu/ /tha mal pa yi bdud rtsi yin/ /yi ge gsum dang nyi ma zhu/ /lha yi

bdud rtsi zhes ni bya/ /'od zer gyis bkug ye shes kyi/ /bdud rtsi yin par nga yis gsungs/ /lan gsum bskor ba sku gsung thugs/ /'di ni byin brlabs rnal 'byor ro/ /de nas bdud rtsi myang dang mchod/ /mchod pa'i rnal 'byor

zhes ni gsungs/ /de nas rol pa'i rnal 'byor te/ /g.yas g.yon dgongs pa shes par bya/ /de nas zhu ba'i rnal 'byor yang / /mnyam pa'i rlung dang gtum mo'i mes/ /ye shes bzhi yi ngo bor gyur/ /cha gcig mi skyod rnam snang

ste/ /sha za'i mkha' 'khro mnyam pa nyid/ /cha gcig bya ba nan tan te/ /srin bu las kyi mkha' 'gro mchod/ /cha gcig rlung dang mkhris pa ste/ /mkhris pas bad kan la sogs pa/ /bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/ /rtsa ni ye shes mkha' 'gro

ste/ /so sor kun rtog ye shes mchod/ /cha gcig rang bzhin med pa ste/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro mchod par mdzad/ /rlung ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste/ /rtsa ni ye shes mkha' 'gro yin/ /ga pur sha za'i mkha' 'gro ste/ /

srin bu las kyi mkha' 'gro yin/ /gzhan yang rtsa la sogs pa la/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyi bye brag kun/ /go rims bzhin du shes par bya/ /sku ni las kyi mkha' 'gro ste/ /gsung ni sha za'i mkha' 'gro'o/ /thugs ni ye shes mkha' 'gro yin/ /

bde chen rdo rje mkha' 'gro'o/ /gzhan yang 'khor lo dbus nas ni/ /mkha' 'gro'i bye brag shes par bya/ /dga' ba las kyi mkha' 'gro ste/ /mchog dga' sha za'i mkha' 'gro'o/ /rang bzhin dga' ba ye shes yin/ /bde chen rdo rje mkha'

'gro'o/ /dpa' bo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni nyi ma'o/ /tsaN+Da li ni nyi shu bzhi/ /sbas pa'i 'khor lo bzhi ru nges/ /bde chen longs spyod 'khor lor bsdu/ /longs spyod chos kyi 'khor lor bsdu/ /gong du bsdu ba'i rim pa yang / /

thig le la ni thams cad 'dus/ /dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig nyid la/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer phyogs bcu du mar snang / /du ma'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor gcig tu 'dus/ /dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i gdugs/ /shing

gi 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba ji bzhin no/ /snying ga chos kyi 'khor lor bsdus nas kyang / /nyi zla'i dkyil na tsa na ka yi tshad/ /de'i dbus su thig le yungs kar tshad/ /sngags phreng ba spu'i nyag ma tsam gyis ni/ /g.yon bskor g.yas bskor

dbyangs gsal sbrul ltar 'khyil/ /de dag thig le'i rnal 'byor te/ /'di la sems ni brtan 'gyur nas/ /de nas phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom/ /zla ba kA li kA li a/ /a li nyi ma la thim nas/ /nyi ma zhabs kyu la thim bsam/ /zhabs bskyed

la sogs rim par thim/ /yan lag lnga ni ye shes lnga/ /de ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor te/ /de nas nA da phra mo la/ /sems ni rim par bsgom pa'o/ /de nas rang rig ye shes te/ /chos kun stong par ro gcig pa'o/ /gzhan yang chos kyi 'khor lo

dang / /sprul pa yi ni 'khor lo gnyis/ /'bar ba dang ni 'dzag pa'i tshul/ /bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/ /phyi yi rnam rtog rtsol ba ste/ /nang gi rnam rtog srog gi rlung / /srog rtsol gnyis 'gags dbu ma ste/ /kun rdzob steng gi sna rtse nas/ /

sor bzhi nas ni rtsa gsum gcig /dbugs dgag pa yi gnas yin pas/ /dang por de ru gzung bar bya/ /de nas sprul pa'i gnas su gzung / /yang na bgrang bar shes par bya/ /de nas gsang ba gsum pa ni/ /shes rab ye shes dang 'brel

ba'i/ /dga' ba'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'o/ /gzhang kha g.ya' zhing ba spu ldang / /dga' ba'i mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa/ /bcu gnyis rang bzhin yin par gsungs/ /byang chub sems rgyu mi rtog snyam/ /mchog dga' mi dmigs nyi shu lnga/ /

gsang ba'i nor bu yongs su gang / /lhan cig skyes dga' mi dmigs pa/ /chos kyi sku ni yin par gsungs/ /bde ba'i rgyun chad bral ba'i dga'/ /de yi mi dmigs gzugs sku gnyis/ /gzhan yang sngon du 'gro ba rnams/ /

yan lag thabs dang sbyor ba dngos/ /dgongs pa dang bcas rim pa'o/ /skar ma'i tshogs ltar du mar spros mod kyang / /nyi ma zla ba lta bur zung du 'jug /nyi ma zla ba lta bur zung 'jug kyang / /sgra gcan lta bur gnyis su med pa'o/ /

rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ /skar ma'i tshogs ni ji lta bu/ /zung du 'jug pa ji lta bu/ /gnyis su med pa ji lta bu/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /byang chub sum bcu rtsa bdun ni/ /rgyu yi khyad par spros pa'o/ /sku gsum

dang ni ye shes lnga/ /'bras bu'i khyad par spros pa yin/ /rgyu rnams bdun du bsdu ba dang / /'bras bu gsum du bsdu ba'o/ /rgyu rnams 'bras bu la thim ste/ /'bras bu gnyis su bsgom par bya/ /chos kun sems kyi ngo bo

ste/ /sems ni stong pa'i rang bzhin yin/ /thams cad stong par ro gcig pa/ /'di ni blang dor med pa'i dbyings/ /'dod chags rnam par dag bya'i phyir/ /'dod chags sku yi phyag rgya lnga/ /phyag rgya chen po ye shes gnyis/ /

dam tshig chos dang las phyag rgya/ /'di la brten pa shin tu zab/ /'di ni bde ba chen po ste/ /bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin dag /bde chen 'khor lo rnam pa gsum/ /gsang ba'i sna rtse e la gnas/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo gang ba

yin/ /rig pa la sogs de bzhin te/ /gsang ba bde skyong ba la gnas/ /rang bzhin bde chen 'khor lo ste/ /bde ba chen pos rol gang ba/ /til dang til mar ji bzhin no/ /dper na shing sna bcad pa las/ /'o ma 'dzag pa ji bzhin

no/ /bde ba chen po de nyid las/ /skra yi rtse mo brgyad stong dang / /khri dang 'bum gyis bsgom pa ste/ /dang po sprin gyi rnam pa ste/ /gnyis pa du ba lta bu'o/ /gsum pa glog gi rnam pa ste/ /bzhi pa mar me lta bu'o/ /'di dag kun gyi rim pa

yang / /sprul pa la sogs rim pa bzhin/ /sprin gyi rnam pa skye ba ni/ /a ni skye ba'i mtshan ma yin/ /mar me lta bu 'chi ba yis/ /ha~M gi mtshan mar gsungs pa yin/ /lnga pa nam mkha' lta bu ni/ /gnyis su med pa bar ma do'i/ /

mtshan ma stong par shes par bya/ /gzhan yang 'dar ba la sogs pa/ /bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/ /de nas gsang ba gsum pa yang / /shes rab ye shes 'brel ba ste/ /dga' ba bzhi'i mtshan nyid kyang / /gzhang lam g.ya' zhing

ba spu ldang / /lus 'dar dga' ba'i ngo bo yin/ /gsang ba rdo rje rtsa lam nas/ /byang chub sems rgyu bde ba snyam/ /mchog dga' yi ni ngo bo ste/ /rdo rje pad ma 'gas pa snyam/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo yin/ /bde ba'i rgyun chad bde ba snyam/ /

bral ba dga' ba'i ngo bo yin/ /'di rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang / /byang chub sems phyogs la sogs pa/ /gong du gsungs par shes par bya/ /dga' ba snang ba zhes bya ste/ /mchog dga' snang ba mched pa yin/ /rab tu dga' ba snang ba thob/ /

lhan gcig skyes pa 'od gsal ba'o/ /ye shes bzhi yi rang bzhin te/ /bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i nges pa yin/ /rags pa bzhi ni gsang bar 'joms/ /phra ba'i bdud bzhi rang bzhin gyis/ /'khor lo bzhi ru 'joms pa yin/ /

'khor lo la rten dga' ba bzhi/ /de nyid ye shes bzhi ru snang / /de phyir bdud bzhi 'joms pa yin/ /'dod chags la brten dug gsum ni/ /nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin te/ /'dod chags rnam pa bcu gnyis yin/ /gsang ba'i

bde skyong nyon mongs 'joms/ /kha dog dbyibs ni phung po'i bdud/ /rta mgrin 'khor lo phung po 'joms/ /sbal ba bzhi ni lha yi bdud/ /rig pa'i 'khor lo lha bdud 'joms/ /skye ba dang bcas 'chi ba ste/ /gsang ba skye med 'chi

bdag 'joms/ /pra ba'i bdud 'joms de dang 'dra/ /skad cig bzhi dang sde pa bzhi/ /bzang po bzhi dang bden pa bzhi/ /'byung ba bzhi dang yum bzhi dang / /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la sogs pa/ /ye shes bzhi po 'di nyid

las/ /khyad par gzhan ni mi 'byung ste/ /rnam par rtog pa'i bye brag dang / /gzhan yang mos pa'i bye brag dang / /chos tshul du ma'i bye brag gis/ /sna tshogs du mar gsungs pa yin/ /dbang gsum bgrod pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /

dge slong chen por gsungs pa ste/ /'di yi thams cad bya bar gsungs/ /rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa/ /dge slong dbang gsum ji ltar lags/ /de yi bya ba ji lta bu/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dge slong la sogs

rnam pa gsum/ /so sor thar dang byang chub sems/ /rig 'dzin nyid kyi dge slong ngo / /gcig dang bzhi dang bcu dang ldan/ /nyis brgya lnga bcu'i go rim kyis/ /bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang / /dge slong so sor thar pa yin/ /

gtong dang gtong ba chen po dang / /shin tu gtong dang rnam par gtong / /bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang / /dge slong byang chub sems dpa' yin/ /dkyil 'khor du zhugs dge ba ste/ /de la gnas pa bsnyen gnas yin/ /

bdun dang ldan phyir chen po yin/ /chen po 'di gsum bye brag kyang / /bum pa'i dbang ni dge ba ste/ /de la bsnyen pas dge bsnyen yin/ /de phyir bdun ldan chen po yin/ /gsang ba'i dbang ni dge ba ste/ /de yi tshul ldan dge tshul yin/ /

bdun dang ldan pas chen po yin/ /dge ba shes rab ye shes te/ /de nyid slong bas dge slong yin/ /bdun dang ldan pas chen po yin/ /chen po 'di gsum bye brag kyang / /phyir mi ldog pa gsum yin te/ /rnam par smin pa 'khor

lo dang / /theg pa dman par ldog pa ni/ /spong ba gsum ni go rims bzhin/ /theg pa gsum gyis nges 'byung zhing / /rig 'dzin theg pa 'bras bur gnas/ /'bras bu 'di gnas rnal 'byor pa/ /khyim pa'am rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /

cha lugs su ni gnas byas la/ /dbang bskur rab gnas la sogs bya/ /theg pa gsum gyi cha lugs kyis/ /gsang ba spyad par ma gsungs te/ /dper na rdo las zangs su 'gyur/ /zangs las gser gyi rnam par rol/ /zangs kyi dus na rdo

med do/ /gser du gyur pas rdo mi snang / /rig 'dzin nyid kyi dge slong la/ /so sor thar dang byang chub sems/ /gnyis po gnas pa nyid du ni/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gsungs so/ /de nas gsang ba bzhi pa yang / /bzhi pa'i dbang

dang 'brel ba ste/ /rtag tu g.yo ba'i sems 'di nyid/ /gzugs la sogs pa bkug nas ni/ /sgom byar lhan cig bcas pa dag /dbang du byas de bsgom par bya/ /gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa yi/ /dmigs pa thams cad rnam spangs

te/ /sems nyid bsam du med pas na/ /cir yang bsam par mi bya'o/ /sems nyid stong par bcug nas su/ /stong pa sems su rab bcug nas/ /stong dang mi stong la sogs pa'i/ /rtog pa bcom pas mkha' ltar 'gyur/ /

rten yod ma yin brten pa med/ /dpe med gnas kyang yod ma yin/ /de nyid gnas pa rdzogs pa ste/ /lhan skyes gnyis med rig pa'o/ /de nas spyod pa bka' stsal pa/ /khro tshul gar dang phyag brgya rnams/ /sgyu ma tsam du ma shes par/ /phyag rgya chen

por yang dag bsgoms/ /dur khrod rgyal po dregs pa can/ /snying rje med cing sha khrag za/ /de yi gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ /phyi nang sbas dang mthar thug gi/ /dkyil 'khor du zhugs dbang mnos nas/ /bsgom dang bzlas pa la sogs med/ /gsang

sngags bar du gcod cing gshe/ /rnal 'byor kun la skur ba 'debs/ /rdo rje spun tshig slob la 'phyar/ /rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig nyams/ /bla ma la smod rnam smin gyis/ /mnar med sems can dmyal bar skye/ /rten cing 'brel ba zab mo yi/ /

rtsa yi 'khor lo'i don ma rtogs/ /lcags gyi sor ni bcu drug pa/ /mdzeg pa ru ni nga yis bshad/ /gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par/ /sbas pa mi dmigs rnam gsum gyis/ /mthur du sems can dmyal bar skye/ /shing rta'i 'khor lo 'khor

ba ltar/ /las kyi rnam par smin pas 'khor/ /shes pas rang gi rang rig dang / /rang rig bde ba gang 'dod dang / /rang rig sgyu mar gang 'dod pa/ /rang rig shel sgong lta bu dang / /dbyings dang ye shes la sogs pa/ /lta ba'i don nyid bcad

pa'o/ /rgyud kyi don ni rnam pa gsum/ /bde chen 'khor lo rgyu yi rgyud/ /gsang ba'i sna rtse thabs kyi rgyud/ /gsang ba bde skyong 'bras bu'i rgyud/ /bum pa rgyu yi rgyud du gsungs/ /gsang ba thabs kyi rgyud yin te/ /shes rab ye shes 'bras

bu'i rgyud/ /skye ba rgyu yi rgyud du gsungs/ /'chi ba thabs kyi rgyud du gsungs/ /bar ma do ni 'bras bu'i rgyud/ /rgyud ces pa ni rgyun yin te/ /rgyal po gsang ba ston pa ste/ /gsang ba rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs/ /bum pa las dang po la gsang / /

gsang ba bum pa'i dus su gsang / /shes rab ye shes gsang bar gsang / /rang rig shes rab ye shes gsang / /gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi pa'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs ri rab kyi rdul

snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /dpal gsang ba thams cad gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// // paN Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis

bsgyur ba'o/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsakra sa~M ba ra gu h+ya A tsin+ta tan+t+ra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos

pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos la skyo bar

gyur to/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ /kye kye bcom ldan 'das he ru ka /kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos rnams kyis/ /de yi rang bzhin ji lta bu/ /gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ /slu ba'i mtha' dang mtshan mar snang / /de nyid kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos/ /sems nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /'khor ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin no/ /phyag na rdo rjes yang zhus pa/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sems nyid kyis/ /dbye ba mi mthun grangs

dag na/ /dus dang gnas pa'i tshul dang yang / /'jug pa'i dus dang thabs rnams dang / /gnas pa'i tshad dang rim ba dag /gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bag chags nyon mongs ye shes

sku/ /ris drug rtsa shing 'khril lcug gi/ /rang bzhin ngag gi lam 'das la/ /de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas ngo bo yin/ /bde gshegs kun gyi thugs kyi gsang / /de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon/ /rtag chad skye

'gag la sogs pa'i/ /mtha' spangs sems nyid rang rig cing / /gdod nas spros bral bden pa nyid/ /de don bsam gyis mi khyab nges/ /de nyid dbye ba rab 'bring mtha'/ /rnam pa gsum du shes bya ste/ /dang por rang rig bsam

mi khyab/ /rgyu dang lam rtags bsam mi khyab/ /mtha' dang nyon mongs bsam mi khyab/ /chos dang lta spyod bsam mi khyab/ /yi ge bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /mdor bstan de nyid rnam par dbye/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos/ /de nyid

chos ni bsam mi khyab/ /a ni yi ge dam pa ste/ /khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med/ /skye ba kun gyi rgyur gyur pa/ /yi ge dam pa bsam mi khyab/ /phrag byung khrus dang gtsang sbra dang / /rgyan cha gcer bu thal gos sogs/ /chang dang

bdud rtsi sha dang yang / /ma dang sring mo bu mo sogs/ /rol pa'i spyod pa bsam mi khyab/ /nga'i 'dul ba'i sems can la/ /mos pa'i mtha' la thug pa med/ /de phyir theg pa thug med pas/ /de nyid lta ba bsam mi khyab/ /rtag

chad sgro skur ltos pa'i sgra/ /de nyid mtha' gnas bsam mi khyab/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs/ /nyon mongs bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /'dar dang 'phar dang drod la sogs/ /rtags nyid bsam gyi mi khyab pa/ /lha bsgom

rlung dang rtsa sogs pa/ /lam nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /rang rig nam mkha'i sprin char tshul/ /pha rol phyin drug la sogs pa/ /rgyu nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /rgyu 'bras tha snyad kun dang bral/ /rtsol ba rdul gyis ma gos pa/ /sprin

med mkha' ltar ma bcos pa'i/ /spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid dag /rang rig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /a ni shang dang sbrul sogs kyi/ /bcu gnyis la sogs dbye ba yis/ /yi ge'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o/ /gzugs ni sdug dang mi sdug

sogs/ /bcu dgu phra rab rdul gyi bar/ /sgra la sogs pa de bzhin te/ /sgra brgyad dri gsum ro drug ste/ /reg bya bcu gcig chos de bzhin/ /gang zhig 'dus byas 'dus ma byas/ /chos kyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o/ /theg pa gsum dang

bcwa brgyad dang / /ji snyed 'du shes yod kyi bar/ /lta ba'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o/ /tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor ba'i lam/ /mthong lam bsgom lam mthar phyin lam/ /lam gyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o/ /sems rtag bdud rtags 'byung ba'i

rtags/ /rtags kyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o/ /mu stegs rang rgyal nyan thos nas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i spyod pa'i bar/ /spyod pa'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o/ /rtag dang chad dang sgro skur nas/ /'khor dang mya ngan 'das mtha' dang / /thabs dang

shes rab mtha' yi bar/ /mtha' yi dbye bas rgyas pa'o/ /'dod chags la sogs nyi khri dang / /chig stong rtsa ba nye ba dang / /zhe sdang la sogs de bzhin te/ /nyon mongs dbye ba rgyas pa'o/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang / /

'dod chags che dang sbyin pa sogs/ /rgyu yi dbye ba rgyas pa'o/ /sems dang nam mkha' ye shes dang / /sangs rgyas 'od gsal zung 'jug sogs/ /rang rig dbye ba rgyas pa'o/ /blos brtags mtshan mar snang ba dang / /sgro 'dogs pa

dang skur 'debs dang / /rim min mos pa khyad par tshol/ /rdul tsam khas len blos 'jog cing / /sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgrub byed pa/ /gang ltar bcos kyang de mtha' ste/ /gang zhig mthar lhung lta ba de/ /rang rig gzhan rig

sems ma yin/ /kun rdzob don dam gnyis ma yin/ /rang rig rtog ge skam po dang / /mtha' lhung dbu mar khas len pa/ /de ni sems nyid rang rig dang / /brjod med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /mi mthun pa yi phyogs yin te/ /de bral bsam gyis

mi khyab pa'i/ /rang rig ye shes chen po yin/ /sbyin sogs dkar po'i chos rnams dang / /rang rig spyi yi rnam pa yis/ /rang rig ye shes chen po la/ /thabs dang thabs las byung ba 'am/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa/ /rdul tsam

tha snyad yod ma yin/ /rang 'byung ye shes yin pa'i phyir/ /'dod chags la sogs skyon gyis kyang / /de la sgrib pa ma yin te/ /nam mkha' la ni sprin bzhin no/ /rang rig gzhan rig bye brag gis/ /sems can sangs rgyas gnyis su dbye/ /

rang rig sprin med nam mkha' la/ /gzhan rig rnam rtog nam mkhar mtshungs/ /sprin sogs rlung gis gtor byas te/ /sprin med mkha' 'dra snang ba nyid/ /gzhan rig rnam rtog bral ba la/ /sgrib bral sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/ /rang

rig kho na tsam du zad/ /dper na skyes bu nam mkha' lta ba la/ /sprin gyis skyes bu'i mig la bsgribs pa las/ /nam mkha' de la ma bsgribs ji bzhin no/ /grangs ni dang po gcig yin te/ /gzhan rig rang rig gyur ba las/ /dag pa

gzhan gyis rnam grol min/ /'dir ni rang rig gcig kho na/ /de nyid rig cing nges pa'o/ /kun kyang nyon mongs rnam par byang / /gzung 'dzin thabs dang shes rab ste/ /bsam gyis mi khyab gnyis pa'o/ /lus ngag sems kyi rang bzhin las/ /

rnam thar stong dang mtshan ma med/ /smon pa med dang sku gsung thugs/ /bsam gyis mi khyab gsum pa'o/ /byams dang snying rje dga' btang snyoms/ /sa chu me rlung rang bzhin las/ /bzhi yi grangs su nges pa ste/ /dga' ba la sogs de bzhin

no/ /rigs lnga yi ni sangs rgyas lnga/ /phung po lnga dang chags sdang lnga/ /bsam gyis mi khyab lnga pa'o/ /pha rol phyin drug rang bzhin las/ /yul drug dbang po drug la sogs/ /bsam gyis mi khyab drug nyid de/ /brgya sogs grangs ni

bsam mi khyab/ /gang zhig rang rig gzhan rig gnyis/ /thog ma med nas gnas pa ste/ /lus dang grib ma'i tshul du gnas/ /rang rig med par gzhan rig dag /so so skye bo'i dus na 'dod/ /'di yang rmongs chen ma rungs pa/ /gzhan

rigs ma spangs rang rig 'dod/ /'khor ba ma spangs mya ngan 'das/ /kha cig 'khor ba mya ngan 'das/ /rig pas blang dor gnyis su rtogs/ /de la sogs pa lta ba'i gdon/ /rig pa 'dzin la brgya rtsa bcu/ /theg chen mdo sde stong phrag

gsum/ /nyan thos rang rgyal brgya phrag gnyis/ /khyab 'jug drag po la sogs pa/ /lta ba'i gdon la bsam mi khyab/ /rang rig gdod nas ma skyes pa/ /stong pa ma bcos lhun gyis grub/ /bde ba chen po ros gang ba/ /khams

gsum 'khor ba kun shes na/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni 'khor ba la/ /'khor ba nyid ni mya ngan 'das/ /lta ba'i gdon dang bral ba ste/ /rang rig med cing gzhan rig med/ /don dam kun rdzob gnyis ka spangs/ /sems med nam mkha'

chos nyid med/ /'khrul pa med cing ma 'khrul med/ /theg pa med cing rim pa med/ /dman dang gya nom gnyis ka med/ /ye shes med cing bde ba med/ /mtha' bral dbu mar mi gnas pa/ /bsam mi khyab du gnas pa ste/ /'di

rtogs khong du chud pa dang / /mi 'jigs sgro skur mi rtsom pa/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo ste/ /rgyal sras kun gyi nang na mchog /rdo rje 'dzin pas byin rlob cing / /mkha' 'gro kun gyi mchod pa'i gnas/ /rigs 'dzin sa la 'jug pa ste/ /

des kyang mnyam gzhag 'bad de bslab/ /rig 'dzin sa la gnas par bya/ /rig 'dzin sa la gnas nas kyang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la 'jug /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sar gnas te/ /bcwa lnga sa yi bdag nyid las/ /sku gnyis gzhan

gyi don mdzad pa/ /gzhan gyi las dang smon lam stobs/ /de yi stobs kyis snang ba las/ /yang dag nyid la snang rgyu med/ /rim pa rnam pa gnyis yin te/ /dang po bla ma'i gdams ngag dang / /rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa'i bar/ /

rang rig spyi yi rnam pa ste/ /chos nyid yul du byas pa'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sar gyur te/ /rang rig rang gi mtshan nyid ni/ /yul dang yul can la sogs pa'i/ /rtog med mkha' ltar snang ba yis/ /khams gsum brtan dang g.yo bcas

pa'i/ /bdag nyid de nyid tshul gyis ni/ /mnyam zhag rjes thob kun spangs te/ /sgyu ma'i tshul du gang gnas pa/ /snang ba mthar phyin pa yi tshad/ /thun dang 'pho ba chu tshod dang / /dbyu gu skad cig rim pa la/ /sems kyi bying rgod la

sogs skyon/ /bral te dben par gnas pa ni/ /snang med mthar phyin tshad yin te/ /rang rig phyi yi tshad bstan to/ /snang ba med cing sgyu ma med/ /bya brtsal med cing bgrod pa med/ /rang byung lhun gyi grub pa ru/ /rtag tu mi 'gyur gang

gnas pa/ /rang rig pa'i mtshan nyid la/ /mthar phyin pa yi tshad yin no/ /'dod chags ro yis myos pa dang / /sems bskyed sdom 'dzin dbang bskur dang / /tshogs kyi 'khor lo 'dus pa'i dus/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rgyal

ba'i dus/ /khyad par can du gsungs pa'o/ /gzhan yang rtog pa'i sems dang yang / /rtog med sems dang 'dres pa yi/ /gzugs la brten pa'i mig nyid kyis/ /rtog pa'i rgyun chad sems de nyid/ /sems kyi rgyun bral rgyu de nyid/ /bsam

gyis mi khyab rgyu yi dus/ /sgra la sogs pa'i de bzhin no/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs/ /nyon mongs rjes nas rgyu ba ste/ /byams dang sbyin sogs de bzhin no/ /bzo sogs btang snyoms de bzhin te/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rgyu yi

dus/ /bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs dang / /byams dang snying rje la sogs pa'i/ /mdor na dkar po'i chos rnams dang / /bzo dang rgyu rtsal la sogs dang / /bskyed rdzogs bsgom pa'i rim pa kun/ /

skye ba gcig gam du mas ni/ /yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang / /'khor ba'i chos la gang skyo ba/ /bsam mi khyab la 'jug pa'i dus/ /bskyed dang rdzogs sogs mi gnas shing / /rdzogs pa chen por gang 'dod pa/ /de yang 'jug pa'i

dus yin te/ /bdud rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /bar ma chod par 'jug pa'i dus/ /gzung ba'i thabs ni bcwa brgyad de/ /mkha' mnyam gzhi bcas gzhi med dang / /yul drug dug gsum brten pa dang / /lhan cig skyes nyid

sgra la brten/ /sa chu me rlung sgra brten no/ /chos rnams gzod nas ma skyes pa'i/ /rang rig bsgom pa mkha' mnyam ste/ /bla ma'i sems gzung dang por gces/ /chos rnams thams cad sems yin te/ /sems ni gzod nas ma

skyes pa/ /gzhi bcas rang rig rnal 'byor ro/ /sems ni gzod nas rang rig pa/ /gzhi med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos/ /de brten sems gzung bla ma las/ /skyes bus 'bad de blang bar bya/ /de

bzhin 'dod chags zhe sdang dang / /gti mug rjes su mkhas pas gzung / /lhan cig skyes gnyis 'byung bzhi la/ /brten te skye ba med par bsgom/ /bye brag sems gzung bsam mi khyab/ /nyan thos la sogs theg chen la/ /

man ngag yod pa ma yin te/ /lta ba spyod pa sems gzung dang / /rgyu dang 'bras bu lam dang yang / /dus dang longs spyod rnal 'byor dang / /bdag don gzhan don dgongs pa dang / /ngal dub mtha' spangs tshegs chung dang / /

tshogs sog pa yi khyad par dang / /khyad par rnam pa bcwa lnga yis/ /rig 'dzin theg pa khyad par 'phags/ /kye ho bcom ldan 'jigs pa che/ /rang rig bsam mi khyab pa la/ /sbyin dang byams sogs dgongs pa ci/ /sku gnyis gzhan

don gang las byung / /bsam mi khyab la legs gnas pas/ /de nyid ci lags phyi ru ci/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sbyin dang byams pa la sogs pas/ /gzhan rig rnam rtog 'gags pa dang / /sku gnyis sems

can don mdzad pa'i/ /sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas su/ /'byung ba'i rkyen du nges pas na/ /bsam mi khyab la mi gnas kyang / /sbyin sogs 'bad de bslab par bya/ /de la bsam mi khyab pa 'byung / /sku gnyis stobs dang mi

'jigs dang / /gzungs dang ting 'dzin las rnams kun/ /sbyin la sogs pa sbyin byas nas/ /bsam mi khyab pa 'byung bar nges/ /de nyid rtogs na bsam mi khyab/ /de nyid ma rtogs 'khor ba'i chos/ /dbul pos nor bu'i byi

dor bzhin/ /bsam mi khyab la sems gzhag kyang / /bskyed rdzogs rim pas sems gnas nas/ /de ni sngon sbyangs 'phro can te/ /sems kyi yig mgo gcad pa gces/ /rang sems las su rung ba na/ /de ni phyi rtags nang du ste/ /

de nyid nang rtags phyi ru 'byung / /lus la dri med srin bu med/ /skra dkar gnyer ma sogs med pa/ /bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rtags yin no/ /'khor ba sgyu mar snang ba dang / /sprin med mkha' ltar gang snang ba/ /bsam mi khyab

pa'i rtags yin no/ /de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de kho na nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// //dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po

bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa rdzogs s+ho// // paN Di ta gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ / rgya gar skad du/ shrI khA sa ma tan tra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam

pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la

bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de dag gi nang nas mkha' spyod ma dang / sa spyod ma dang / sa 'og na spyod pa ma gsum la bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de/ gsang ba'i don 'di gsungs pa/ dad ldan snying
rjer ldan dang rtse gcig sems/ /lus ngag gus bcas gzhan la phan sems ldan/ /'jigs med brtul zhugs ldan zhing zab mo yi/ /lam la spro bar gyis la legs par nyon/ /mkha' 'gro khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /

nga yi khyod la bshad par bya/ /mkha' spyod steng sgo'i rlung yin te/ /sa spyod bar du thig le'i sgo/ /sa 'og spyod pa shu kra'i sgo/ /sgo gsum sku gsung thugs yin te/ /dang po mkha' spyod mtshan nyid kyang / /rnam pa gsum du

shes bya ste/ /bems po'i rlung dang rnam rtog rlung / /kun gyi mtshan nyid ye shes rlung / /mdor bstan de ny-id rim pas dbye/ /gnyis med rlung ni ma ning ste/ /zung 'jug thabs dang shes rab rlung / /ldang 'jug sku gsung

thugs kyi rlung / /snying dang gzhang kha mgrin pa dang / /lte ba lus kyis khyab pa ru/ /rigs lnga'i rlung ni khyab par gnas/ /rgyu ba bzhi ni 'byung ba'i rlung / /dngas snyigs 'byed pa brgyad du 'gyur/ /'di nyid rlung ni thun brgyad

de/ /thun re la ni 'pho ba gnyis/ /rlung gi 'pho ba bcu drug yin/ /'pho ba gcig la chu tshod gnyis/ /chu tshod re la dbyug gu gnyis/ /rlung gi dbyug gu drug bcu bzhi/ /de bzhin chu tshod sum bcu gnyis/ /nyi khri chig

stong drug brgya sogs/ /sems dang sems min 'dres pa'i rlung / /rags pa dang ni phra ba la/ /mkhas pas sems kyi gzhon par gzung / /rnam rtog gzung 'dzin sems kyi rta/ /gzung 'dzin gnyis 'gags dbu mar gnas/ /

de nyid ye shes rdo rje'i rlung / /dbye ba thabs dang shes rab gnyis/ /'di rnams mkha' spyod rang bzhin te/ /de dag man ngag mkhas pas brtag /yon tan skyon dang rtags rnams kyis/ /rlung gi mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /de dag kun gyi rten

nyid kyang / /gzhol ma dang ni g.yon ma dang / /'di ni gzhu yi rnam par gnas/ /bems po rlung gi lam yin te/ /dbang po mngon sum lam yin pas/ /sna yi ri rab gling bzhi la/ /nyi zla byang chub lhor rgyug gis/ /thabs dang shes rab skor

sogs la/ /'bad pas sems ni gzung bar bya/ /'di dag bems pos yang dag gnas/ /mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis/ /rin chen sems ni dri can byas/ /'di ni rnam rtog rlung yin te/ /'di nyid kyis ni lam gyur pa/ /ro ma dang ni rkyang ma'o/ /

sbrul 'khyil lta bu'i rnam pa ste/ /rnal 'byor gyi ni dmigs pa'i yul/ /gnas der rnam rtog rlung 'gag go/ /rang rig gdod nas ma skyes pa/ /'di nyid ye shes rdo rje'i rlung / /kun 'dar ma yi rtsa la brten/ /tsaN+DA li ni shing lta bu/ /rang rig

ye shes spyod yul te/ /gnas der 'bad de rang rig gzung / /mkha' spyod rlung gi rang bzhin phyir/ /'di dag rdo rje'i lam yin no/ /de nas sa spyod bshad bya ste/ /rang rig ye shes gang 'dod pas/ /tsaN+DA li yi bye brag brtag /dang por rang

bzhin tsaN+DA li/ /gnyis pa gtum mo tsaN+DA li/ /gsum pa kha sbyar tsaN+DA li/ /de bzhin gcer bu'i tsaN+DA li/ /de nyid la yang dbye ba ste/ /gcer bu gtum mo shin du gtum/ /yang dag gtum mo gzhan sbyar dang / /bye brag kun la sbyar bar bya/ /

gcer bu shin tu gcer bu dang / /shin du gcer bu gcer bu sogs/ /'di dag kun la sbyar bar bya/ /dbye na rnam pa bcu gnyis te/ /yan lag bcu tshan bzhi dang brgyad/ /sa spyod ma yi rang bzhin te/ /stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis sogs/ /

gzhan skyes kyi ni khro ma tsam/ /phra ba de las bzlog pa'o/ /brgya dang nyi shu skra yi rtse/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis skra yi rtse/ /lnga yi cha ste gtso bo gsum/ /gsum 'dus yungs kar gyi ni tshad/ /dbus dang g.yas g.yon phra sbom dang / /gnyis 'gyur

bye brag shes par bya/ /dngas ma dang ni snyigs ma'i rtsar/ /rang bzhin du ni gnas pa la/ /yi ge lta bu'i rtsa mdud kyang / /dang po'i sgra ru gang shes pa/ /sa spyod ma yi rang bzhin no/ /gnas la sogs pa gzhan nas shes/ /'di nyid nor bu

rin po che/ /'di la brten nas thams cad 'byung / /rigs 'chol gnas 'chol tshad 'chol dang / /dbyibs dang kha dog grangs la sogs/ /'chol pa las ni dngos grub min/ /de nyid bral ba'i rang bzhin ni/ /sa spyod ma yi dngos grub ste/ /

thams cad kun gyi rten yin no/ /sa 'og spyod ma'i rang bzhin te/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /byang chub sems ni rnam pa gsum/ /dang po chos nyid sems yin te/ /'di ni shes brjod yul las 'das/ /gnyis pa rang rig byang

chub sems/ /dper na rkyen gyis shel sgong bzhin/ /gsum pa bems po'i byang chub sems/ /sih+la dang ni ga pur te/ /don dam kun rdzob gnyis su gnas/ /las kyi rlung dang las kyi mes/ /g.yo ba kun rdzob byang chub sems/ /ye

shes rlung dang ye shes mes/ /g.yo ba don dam sems yin te/ /dngas snyigs las ni rim pa yin/ /dbyibs dang kha dog las kyis ni/ /sems kyi khyad par shes par bya/ /las kyi rlung gis mi g.yo zhing / /las kyi me yis mi 'dzag

par/ /kha ba lta bu'i mtshan nyid las/ /mi shigs ha~M gi dbyibs 'dra ste/ /nor bu kun da'i mdog lta bu/ /dkar la mtsher dang gzi mdangs snum/ /bde ba chen po'i skur 'byung ba/ /'di ni don dam byang chub sems/ /dmar la dngas pa'i

rang bzhin la/ /khyad par bzhi ni thun mong ste/ /'di ni shes rab byang chub sems/ /de las bzlog pa'i dman pa gnyis/ /'og sgor gnas shing srid pa skye/ /dman pa'i rkyen kyis g.yo bar byed/ /de phyir don dam kun rdzob kyis/ /

sems kyi mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /rgyu 'chol ba las dngos grub med/ /rkyen 'chol ba las de bzhin te/ /bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/ /don dam sems kyi spyod yul min/ /kun rdzob tshor ba bde ba'i yul/ /sa 'og spyod pa'i

rang bzhin te/ /rdo rje gsum bsgom mi phyed pa/ /de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /yi ge dang ni yan lag dang / /bsdus pa'i don dang spyi yi don/ /sbas pa'i don dang mthar thug don/ /sna tshogs sems las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nor bu dang ni sil

snyan bzhin/ /rtog med rten las sna tshogs 'byung / /A l-i kA l-i ma ning dang / /drug tu sbyor ba brtag par bya/ /sgra mtha'i yi ge bsam mi khyab/ /yan lag rnam pa gsum yin te/ /rgyu 'bras brda dang brda can dang / /brjod bya dang ni rjod

byed do/ /de las bzlog pa bsdus par bshad/ /theg pa gsum dang de las gzhan/ /thun mong spyi ru nges pa ste/ /bye brag rang las shes par bya/ /sbas pa dbang dang sngags su dbye/ /sngags la bzhi ste dbang la gnyis/ /chos ni spyi dang bye

brag go/ /de dag kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang / /bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/ /snod dang snod min bye brag kyang / /bla mas legs par brtag bya ste/ /de nyid yang dag rtogs gyur na/ /ston pa med cing bstan pa med/ /bsam gtan la sogs 'jig pa med/ /

sangs rgyas gzugs ni sna tshogs 'byung / /bya ba bcu gnyis la sogs pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs bskor/ /dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud/ /bya med rnal 'byor de ltag la/ /de rjes rnal 'byor nyid gsungs te/ /rnal 'byor nang pa de ltag

la/ /phyi nas rnal 'byor ma rgyud ni/ /shes rab snying po brtser gyur pa'i/ /thabs dang shes rab bsrub shing la/ /gnyis med thugs kyis bsrubs pa las/ /bdud rtsi'i ro ni nyi shu bzhi/ /nor bu rin chen rgyud ces brjod/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /

dngos grub thams cad 'di las 'byung / /ji ltar ma dkrogs 'o ma las/ /'dod pa gang yang 'byung ba min/ /de bzhin lo grangs mang po las/ /dngos grub myur du 'byung ba min/ /de phyir rin chen nyi shu bzhi/ /bdud rtsi ro 'dra seng ge'i gzugs/ /gnas

ni nyi shu bzhi nyid kyang / /sku gsung thugs kyis byin brlabs te/ /mkha' 'gro nyi shu bzhi la gtad/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas btab bo/ /dam du sba zhing dam du spel/ /rgya las 'das na dam tshig nyams/ /sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag ni/ /

sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te/ /de yi ngo bor rgyud kun brtag /sngags la gnyis te chos la gnyis/ /dbyibs kyang de bzhin shes par bya/ /re re'i bye brag dbye ba yang / /bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/ /phyi nang sbas pa mthar thug bzhi/ /

rgyud kun phyag brgya bzhi yin te/ /de nyid dbye ba mkhas pas brtag /de nyid rtogs na rgyud dang ldan/ /de las bzlog pa 'das pa'o/ /rang bzhin gyis ni tsaN Da li/ /gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/ /rtsa gsum gyis ni byin gyis brlabs/ /gnas

ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru/ /mkha' 'gro nyi shu rtsa bzhi la/ /rgyud ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi gtad/ /pu ru rab gtum gsang rdo rje/ /dza ru gtum mig gsang ba gcod/ /o ru 'od ldan bsam mi khyab/ /a ru sna rtse nam mkha' mnyam/ /go ru bstan blo nam

mkha' che/ /ra ru me'u thung sku gsung thugs/ /de ru lang ka rin chen phreng / /ma ru shing grib dam tshig che/ /ka ru e ra stobs po che/ /o ru 'jigs byed ye shes gsang / /tri ru rlung shugs ye shes phreng / /ko ru chang 'thung ye shes

'bar/ /ka ru sh+yA ma zla ba'i phreng / /la ru shin bzang rin chen 'bar/ /ka ru rta rna nyi ma'i 'khor/ /he ru kha kha ye shes rgyal/ /bre ru 'khor shugs mkha' 'gro gsang / /gr-i ru khaN+Da gsang me 'bar/ /sau ru shoN+Di gsang bdud rtsi/ /su ru

'khor lo dur khrod rgyan/ /na ru shin dpa' rdo rje rgyal/ /su ru stobs chen ye shes rgyal/ /ma ru 'khor sgyur chags pa'i rgyal/ /ku ru brtson 'grus mkha' 'gro sdom/ /de dag gtad do legs par sbos/ /nang du tsaN+DA li dag ni/ /nyi shu bzhi ni gtad

pa ste/ /dang po gsang ba gnyis pa'ang / /rang bzhin yin te de nas dbang / /rkyen ni tha mas gsungs pa ste/ /mkha' 'gro khyed kyi rang bzhin te/ /de nas dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin/ /dngos grub dam pa gang 'dod pas/ /dbang dang dam

tshig ldan byas te/ /rta dang glang po la sogs dang / /bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig /bsnyen bkur dag gis bsnyen byas te/ /bdud rtsi ro yi ra li las/ /bla ma'i zhal nas dngos grub blang / /yid la zung la dran par gyis/ /de nas

'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyur to/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// // paN Di ta gA ya d+ha ra dang / dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis

zhus shing bsgyur ba'o/ / rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA kha tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal nam mkha' chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/ /gzhan yang dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de rnams kyi nang nas byang chub

sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba lan gsum byas te/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol pa/ kye ho bcom ldan 'jigs pa che/ /bcom pa

gang lags ldan pa gang / /'jigs pa gang lags chen po gang / /bdag la khyod kyis bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bcom pa bdud bzhi bcom pa ste/ /re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste/ /bcu drug

grangs su shes par bya/ /ldan pa de yi gnyen po ste/ /dang po bum dbang bdud bzhi yang / /kha dog dbyibs la log rtog gis/ /bskyed pa'i gzung 'dzin du ma dag /phung po'i bdud du rab tu grags/ /'dod chags zhe

sdang la sogs pa/ /nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin no/ /yang dag lam ston bla ma med/ /zhe sdang ru drar skye ba yi/ /rgyu dang lam ston grogs ngan dag /lha yi bu yi bdud yin te/ /las dang nyon mongs pa yi rgyus/ /srog 'chad pa ni

'chi bdag bdud/ /bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas nas/ /lha yi bu yi bdud kyang bcom/ /log rtog du ma'i rtog pa 'gag /des na phung po'i bdud bcom mo/ /rten dang brten pa ro mnyam pas/ /nyon mongs pa yi bdud bcom mo/ /dus min

'chi dang tshe zad pas/ /'di dag 'chi bdag bdud yin te/ /tshe lo stong sogs thub pa yi/ /tshe yi 'chi bdag bdud bcom mo/ /gzhan yang bdud 'joms bye brag ni/ /phyi yi tshe yi bcud kyis len/ /grub na 'chi bdag bdud 'joms

so/ /de bzhin lus kyi phung po ste/ /longs spyod kyis ni nyon mongs 'joms/ /sems kyis lha yi bdud bcom ste/ /rten dang brten ni sgyu mar ldan/ /de nas gsang dbang bdud bzhi yang / /phyag mtshan khro tshul gar la sogs/ /phyi

ru du ma phung po'i bdud/ /rags pas yid ni nyon mongs pas/ /nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin no/ /dman pa'i lam gang ston pa yi/ /bla ma lha yi bu yi bdud/ /phyi yi tshe yi bcud kyis len/ /de nyid 'chi bdag bdud yin no/ /

gzhan yang bdud kyi bye brag ni/ /sgo gsum 'khrul par gang ston pa/ /bla ma lha yi bu yi bdud/ /sgo gsum las ni du ma'i cha/ /de nyid ma shes phung po'i bdud/ /de nyid 'bad de bsgrub byas kyang / /'bras bu mi 'byung sems

nyon mongs/ /nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin te/ /rlung sogs gnas pa'i tshul shes pas/ /lha yi bu yi bdud bcom mo/ /de nyid sgyu mar shes par bya/ /de nyid shes pas phung po dang / /nyon mongs pa yi bdud bcom mo/ /

dngos po'i mthar lhung skye bas 'chi/ /rgyu med las skye 'chi ba ste/ /rgyu rkyen ma bskyed rang bzhin gnas/ /sgyu mas 'chi bdag bdud bcom mo/ /tshe la dbang sgyur ma lta bu/ /gnyen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /shes rab ye shes

bdud bzhi yang / /rtsa dang shu kra la sogs pa'i/ /dman pa'i lam ston lha yi bdud/ /de nyid du ma phung po'i bdud/ /de sgom rang bzhin nyon mongs pas/ /nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin no/ /kha dog dbyibs ni skyes pas 'jig /

de nyid 'chi bdag bdud yin no/ /gzhan yang bdud kyi bye brag kyang / /'dod chags chen po'i lam ston pa'i/ /bla ma lha yi bu yi bdud/ /dga' ba bzhi ni du ma ste/ /rgyud la spungs pas phung po'i bdud/ /rang sems nyon mongs

nyon mongs bdud/ /'khor bar ltung bas skye ba ste/ /skye ba las byung 'chi bdag bdud/ /rnam par rtog pa skye bas so/ /'dod chags kyis ni 'chi bdag bdud/ /ma spangs sum bcu drug gnyis dang / /nges pa sum bcu rtsa drug gi/ /lam

bsten bla mas lha bdud bcom/ /dga' bzhi sgyu ma rang bzhin med/ /bde chen ror 'gyur phung po bcom/ /'bras bu rang rig ye shes sbyin/ /rang sems nyon mongs sdug bsngal bral/ /nyon mongs pa yi bdud bcom mo/ /de yis 'chi

ba dang bral bas/ /de nyid 'chi bdag bdud bcom mo/ /'og gi lam gyi bdud bzhi yi/ /dman pa'i stobs kyis zin pa ste/ /rgyal po dmangs su babs pa bzhin/ /de nyid lam gyi bdud kyis zin/ /rgyal po rgyal sa shor ba bzhin/ /

bzhi pa dang 'brel bdud bzhi ni/ /gsum pa'i snod dang ldan pa la/ /bzhi pa'i lam ston bla ma ni/ /lha yi bu yi bdud yin te/ /bdud gsum bla ma'i zhal nas shes/ /snod min gsang ba sgrogs pa dang / /mar dang kha ra la sogs pa/ /

'thungs te ma zhu dug 'gyur bzhin/ /khyad par bdud kyis zin pa ste/ /rigs ngan rgyal sa 'dzin pa 'dra/ /dbang dang gdams ngag 'brel bcas pa'i/ /bdud 'joms lam gyi stobs dang ldan/ /ye shes lnga 'am yon tan drug /ldan pa dag

tu rab tu grags/ /bla ma gcig la snod bcud gnyis/ /thob na de nyid dam pa ste/ /bla ma gcig la dbang thob nas/ /bla ma gcig la mnyan par bya/ /bla ma rnam pa gnyis su gsungs/ /phyi yi bla ma de nyid de/ /nang gi bla ma bdag po'i

lha/ /bdud dang dgra yi sde rnams kun/ /thams cad 'jigs shing skrag byed pas/ /'jigs pa zhes ni gsungs pa ste/ /dgra dang bdud kyi g.yul las rgyal/ /dmigs pa lha sogs bdun dang ldan/ /de phyir chen po zhes ni gsungs/ /

de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / thams cad rgyud la dga' zhing mgu nas rjes su yi rang bar gyur to/ /dpal nam mkha' chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// //

rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ / rgya gar skad du/ shrI kA ya bA ka tsit+ta tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje

sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis 'dod chags che/ /mchog gyur 'di la yang dag gnas/ /mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa/ /khyod kyis bdag la bshad du gsol/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ /sku ni

bum pa'i ngo bo ste/ /gsung ni gsang ba'i ngo bo 'dod/ /thugs kyang shes rab ye shes te/ /sangs rgyas spyan dang mA ma kI/ /dam tshig sgrol ma gos dkar mo/ /rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad gsol/ /rgyud kyi don la goms shing / /

smra ba'i tshig gis ma rmongs la/ /gzhan gyi rtsod pas mi rdzi yang / /dbang dang man ngag ma thob par/ /dbang bskur rab gnas sbyin sreg sogs/ /sngags spyod ngal ba don med yin/ /shi nas sems can dmyal bar skye/ /de phyir

gtso bos dbang bskur gyi/ /man ngag yang dag bshad du gsol/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ /dang por bum dbang rim pa yang / /gnas ni shin du bsngags pa btsal/ /bkra shis yid dga' shin du snum/ /bkra shis
bya rnams snyan par sgrogs/ /dpag bsam shing rgyas yod par 'dod/ /gzhan yang dur khrod shing gcig gam/ /chu ngogs dag la sogs pa ru/ /sa bdag sa yi lha mo la/ /gtor ma sbyin sreg mchod yon gyis/ /

sa bslang phyir ni mtho rnams gzugs/ /de nas dang po bsnyen pa dbul/ /bsnyen pa gsum ni rab 'bring ste/ /mtshan ma grangs dang dus su gsungs/ /re re la yang gsum gsum ste/ /mtshan ma gzugs dang 'od dang sgra/ /

grangs ni stong dang khri dang 'bum/ /dus ni bcwa lnga bcu gsum dang / /bdun du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang / /lha rnams mnyes pas bsnyen byas nas/ /lha dang slob ma rdzas rnams kun/ /lhag par gnas pa tshul bzhin bya/ /

bkra shis lo grangs ldan pa yi/ /bu mos sa yi phyogs mthun pa'i/ /ku sha btsal la mtshan ma brtag /so shing rtse mor me tog dri/ /bsrung skud la sogs mtshan ma brtag /dbang gi dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya/ /dkyil

'khor slob ma rab 'bring tha/ /ting 'dzin me tog rdul tshon rim/ /gang dang ldan pa de nyid do/ /de nas mchod rdzas rim pa dgram/ /kha~M bi ra yi sngags kyis kyang / /de la rdo rje byab par bya/ /de la ku sha la sogs pa/ /dkyil

ba'i cho ga dang bcas bya/ /gzhan yang sngon du 'gro ba'i rdzas/ /bla ma mnyes par bya ba dang / /dkyil 'khor lha rnams mchod pa'i phyir/ /rta dang glang po ma he dang / /rin chen la sogs gter rnams dang / /spos dang mar

me la sogs pa/ /brgya 'am stong ngam khri 'am 'bum/ /bla re rgyan dang ba dan sogs/ /byin brlabs tshogs bsag phyi ru dgod/ /de nas slob ma gzhug par bya/ /khrus dang yan lag dri yis byug /kye ho khyod ni ji lta

bu/ /'jig rten sprul pa las sad na/ /he ru kar grags chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor chen por khyod rol lam/ /dad pa dang bcas spro bar gyis/ /rnam rtog dang bral rdo rje sems/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa po/ /

rdo rje 'dzin pa dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen por lung bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol/ /byang chub sems ni bdag la stsol/ /pad ma las byung bdag la stsol/ /
gsang ba dgyes pa bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /legs so legs so rigs kyi bu/ /rgyal sras kun gyi nang na mchog /rnam rtog thams cad 'jig

byed pas/ /gnyis med khyod kyis blang bar bya/ /mi bskyod bcom ldan dang mtshungs pa'i/ /zil gyis mi non khyod kyis blangs/ /dam tshig spyod pa spyad pa yi/ /mchog gi de nyid blang bar bya/ /thabs dang shes rab zung du sbrel/ /nam

yang khyod kyis spang mi bya/ /tshangs spyod de bzhin bsam gtan la/ /'bad pas sems ni brtan par bya/ /chang ni rtag btung khro mi bya/ /de bzhin sha yang shes par bya/ /gzhan gyi phyag rgya bsten par bya/ /'di ni dam tshig
brgyad yin no/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro/ /thun mong sdom dang sems skyed sbyin/ /bskor ba lan gsum phyag gsum bya/ /yol bas bar du bcad nas ni/ /mig la sogs pa lnga bkab la/ /lha grangs du

yod me tog sbyin/ /kun byed chu yis gsang dag bya/ /me tog dang bcas rdo rje yang / /de yi snying la gzhag la bsgom/ /slob dpon la ni brnyas byed sogs/ /ltung ba'i nyes pa brjod par bya/ /phyi yi rdo rje 'dzin pa dbab/ /

sngon du sdig pa lan gsum dral/ /mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba dang / /rna bas sgra dang sna yis dri/ /lce yis ro dang lus kyis reg /dngos grub phrin las so so ru/ /mkhas pas brtag par shes par bya/ /

me tog dor te lha yang sbyin/ /'khor rnams gtso bo'i yan lag yin/ /gtso bo'i mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /ji ltar gso ba'i sman pa yis/ /dbang po lnga yi zug rngu 'byin/ /de bzhin sems dpa' chen po yis/ /
mi shes pa yi rab rib kun/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis yang dag gsal/ /de la gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bstan/ /dbang gi dkyil 'khor byang shar du/ /pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa ru/ /gzhag la rig pa'i dbang lnga
bskur/ /chu khams mi bskyod me long gis/ /rdo rje rigs kyi phrin las 'grub/ /dbu rgyan rin chen 'byung ldan te/ /mnyam nyid ye shes rang bzhin gyis/ /rin chen rigs kyi phrin las 'grub/ /'od dpag
med pa'i rdo rje'i dbang / /so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /pad ma rigs kyis phrin las byed/ /dril bu don yod grub pa ste/ /bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis/ /phrin las sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/ /

rigs las dras nas ming gi dbang / /rdo rje dang ni ni rdo rje sems/ /rnam snang chen po'i ngo bo ste/ /chos dbyings ye shes rang bzhin las/ /de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid 'dzin/ /mi 'jigs seng ge'i khri stengs su/ /
rigs byed slob dpon dbang sbyin bya/ /bdud bzhi 'joms pas rgyal chen bzhi/ /chos rnams mi nub rgyal mtshan gzugs/ /chos kyi sku yis kun la khyab/ /gdugs kyis steng nas dgab par bya/ /rdo rje dril

bu brtul zhugs gnyis/ /phyag rgya dam tshig gsum po yin/ /dbugs dbyung ba dang lung bstan dang / /rjes su gnang dang phyir mi ldog /brtan par byed dang rnam pa lnga/ /gzhan yang rdzas kyi bye brag rnams/ /rin chen
bdun la sogs pa kun/ /thun mong yin par nga yis gsungs/ /bum pa'i dbang gis las rnams te/ /dkyil 'khor du 'jug dang po yin/ /gnyis pa rig pa'i dbang yin te/ /brtan par byed pa gsum pa'o/ /
de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba/ /lus ni ri rab lhun po la/ /byang chub sems kyi gnas bcas nas/ /bde ba'i stan la gnas nas su/ /gsang ba'i dbang gi rten gyur pa/ /rig ma dang po btsal bar bya/ /

dang po shes pas brtag pa dang / /bdag dbang yod par blang ba dang / /nyes pa dag par sbyang ba dang / /dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya ba dang / /bar chod bgegs rnams zhi ba dang / /bsrung dang de la tshogs kyis
mchod/ /dri yi thig le du ma bya/ /g.yon na gnas pa de nyid dang / /bsrub dang bsrub bcas sbyor byas dang / /srub las bde ba'i chu rgyun gyis/ /lus kun khyab nas gsang ba ru/ /dkar la rtsa dmar lta

bur 'dzag /dkyil 'khor du 'jug gong dang 'dra/ /ro ma'i 'khor lor byA bsams la/ /lce de pad mar byin brlabs te/ /lce yi rtse mor b+h+yaHbsams la/ /sih+la ga pur 'dres pa yis/ /b+h+yaHla gzhag ste de la bstim/ /

so gnyis longs spyod mnyam sbyar la/ /dbus su mi dmigs bsgom par bya/ /gsang ba'i dbang la rnam gsum ste/ /rdo rje gtso mor byon pa dang / /sbom po khro mos sbyin pa dang / /rdo rje gre tshangs sbyin pa'o/ /shes rab ye shes

dbang la yang / /dang por shes rab brtag pa n-i/ /lus dang ngag dang yid dang gsum/ /mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya/ /de nas khyad par lnga brtags te/ /rigs dang lang tsho longs spyod dang / /rgyan dang gzugs

kyi khyad par lnga/ /phyi yi brtag pa yin par gsungs/ /sems brtan rdo rje yi ni rigs/ /khyad par yin par nga yis gsungs/ /rnam rtog chung ba rdo rje yi/ /lang tsho'i khyad par yin par gsungs/ /mi rtog pas

brgyan shes pa ste/ /rdo rje'i rgyan gyi khyad par yin/ /de nyid gsum du mi 'gyur ba/ /mi nub chos kyi rgyal mtshan te/ /rdo rje gzugs kyi khyad par yin/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid/ /de yi ro la longs spyod pa/ /rdo rje'i longs spyod

khyad par ro/ /kun 'dar ma ste thugs kyi rigs/ /rigs kyi khyad par yin pa'o/ /de nyid mda' ltar mkhreng ba ni/ /thugs kyi lang tsho'i khyad par ro/ /rtsa de dmar la gdang pa dang / /byang chub sems ni dkar
la dngas/ /gnyis su med par gsal ba'i tshul/ /dper na nor bu ke ke ru/ /dar la brgyus pa ji bzhin du/ /thugs kyi gzugs kyi khyad par ro/ /la la nA dang ra sa nA/ /a ba d+hU tIr gnyis med la/ /thugs
kyi longs spyod khyad par ro/ /dang por phyi la gnyis pa nang / /gsum pa gsang ba'i brtag pa'o/ /lus brtag pa ni sku yin te/ /ngag brtag pa ni gsung du 'gyur/ /yid brtag thugs su 'gyur ba'o/ /sgyu ma

tsam gyis dgongs pa'i don/ /kun la khyab par shes par bya/ /lus kyi drug la ngag gi bdun/ /sems kyi bdun po sgyu ma'i tshul/ /dang por smig rgyu chur 'khrul dang / /gnyis pa smig rgyu nyid yin te/ /gsum pa smig rgyu

mi snang bzhin/ /de bzhin zhal nas shes par bya/ /chu la bdun no mar la gcig /dri ni bdun te sha la gnyis/ /sgo nga bzhi ste 'o ma gsum/ /'di rnams btsal ba'i rten gyur pa/ /lo ni gsum bzhi yin par gsungs/ /bu ram gnyis

te bu ram gcig /chang ni gnyis su shes par bya/ /rgyan ni bye brag sna tshogs so/ /dgun dang de bzhin ston gyi sha /zhag gcig na ni bcud dang ldan/ /dbyar dang dpyid kyi sha rnams kyang / /drod dang ldan na bcud dang ldan/ /rang bzhin

shi ba'i sha yin te/ /'dun pa byas na dam tshig nyams/ /rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag bcas/ /gzhan yang 'bras bu la sogs sman/ /mar dang bcas pas sbyar bar bya/ /sha yang mar gyi de bzhin no/ /de bas kun gyi bcud skyed de/ /

mngar ba kun gyis ro rtsa byed/ /bcud bskyed sha ni gzhon nu zhes/ /ro rtsa sha ni bcwa lnga yin/ /bcud bskyed sha dang mar gnyis kyang / /lnga dang lnga yi cha yis bsre/ /chang ni mnyam por gsungs pa'o/ /ro rtsa ba yi sha la yang / /

'o ma sgo nga cha mnyam par/ /lnga gsum lnga gnyis gtso bor bya/ /kha ra'i chang ngam 'o ma 'am/ /sha dang mnyam por sbyin par bya/ /'di ni yan lag spros bcas so/ /de nas mtshams bcad bsnyen pa dang / /dam tshig sna tshogs

bya ba yang / /spros pa med pa'i yan lag yin/ /dbang bskur sngon du bsgom pa'i don/ /dbang thob phyir ni nga yis gsungs/ /rig ma gtad dang man ngag sbyin/ /brda rnams bya zhing 'dod pa'i rtags/ /brtag pa shin du

spros pa med/ /phyag dang zhabs la sogs pas 'khyud/ /dang po'i sbyor thabs zhes gsungs so/ /dbu rgyan mgul rgyan la sogs pa/ /sbyor thabs chen po zhes bya ste/ /langs pa cog pu gan kyal dang / /kha sbub 'phred dang

lnga yin te/ /'di rnams kun gyi dgongs pa zab/ /dgongs med spyod pa spyod byed pa/ /'di ni mnar med skye ba'i rgyu/ /tha mal pa las brgya 'gyur gyis/ /bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba'o/ /bum pa dang ni gsang ba ste/ /gsang ba las

gzhan gsum pa ste/ /de yi rnam smin brjod mi lang / /dkyil 'khor du 'jug rim pa ni/ /bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/ /yan lag bdun bsgoms sbyor ba dngos/ /khyad par rnam pa gsum las byung / /sngags dang sman ni dang po

ste/ /gnyis pa sbyor thabs yin par gsungs/ /gsum pa ting nge 'dzin yin te/ /sngags dang sman gyis kun da drang / /rked bcing tshad dang gnas pa'i tshad/ /drang ba'i tshad rnams shes par bya/ /'byung ba bzhi dang rigs

mthun pa'i/ /rkad bcing rked pa'i tshad dang mnyam/ /sor gsum sor bzhi dar ram men/ /gnas pa'i tshad ni rnam pa drug /rnam thar gsang ba'i pho brang gnas/ /skye mched rig par gnas pa'o/ /stong pa rta mgrin 'khor

lor gnas/ /khams rnams gsang ba bde skyong gnas/ /'dab la sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas/ /yang dag spong ba snying gar gnas/ /he ru kar ni ma gshegs cig /rdo rje mda' yis ma brgyab pa'o/ /drang ba'i tshad ni sor

bzhi 'byung / /dang por khrus byas gnyis pa la/ /sman dang snum dang dri dang gsum/ /sum cha sum gnyis stod smad du/ /lus la sku zhing me la bdug /rtse gsum rtsa ni shin du zab/ /ba sbru ba dang lca ba dang / /rang mnye ba

dang nye'u shing dang / /ra mo shags dang yan lag bcas/ /rdo la sogs pa lnga sbyar dang / /gzhan yang sman dang snum dang dri/ /dar la sogs pa'i nang du blugs/ /sgo gnyis nas ni tho ldos bdug /zab pa'i sngags btab

bsgom byas na/ /dang por mtshan ma shes par bya/ /chags pa'i gzi ldan sna tshogs 'byung / /tha ma'ang gsum mam bdun na 'byung / /dgongs pa'i bye brag shes gyur na/ /sngags dang dman dang khyad par ro/ /dgongs

pa mi shes 'dod chags phyir/ /sman la sogs pa btsal mi bya/ /'di yi sdig pa bsam mi khyab/ /bdug pa'i sbyor thabs shes gyur na/ /dbus kyi rtsa yi kha 'byed pa/ /sbyor thabs khyad par yin par gsungs/ /bde

chen go bzlog sbyor ba dang / /'khor lo'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang / /sku yi go bzlog sbyor ba dang / /ye shes go bzlog sbyor ba dang / /'byung ba go bzlog sbyor ba dang / /yum gyi go bzlog sbyor ba dang / /thig le go bzlog sbyor ba

dang / /bsam gtan go bzlog sbyor ba dang / /yi ge go bzlog sbyor ba dang / /stong pa go bzlog sbyor ba dang / /dbugs kyi go bzlog sbyor ba dang / /dga' ba'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang / /gtum mo'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang / /rtsa

yi go bzlog sbyor ba dang / /byang sems go bzlog sbyor ba dang / /g.yas g.yon go bzlog sbyor ba dang / /brda yi go bzlog sbyor ba dang / /rten gyi go bzlog sbyor ba rnams/ /kun mkhyen pas kyang ma gzigs pa/ /sangs

rgyas rnams kyi thugs kyi gsang / /byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi yum/ /sras rnams thun mong ma yin bskyed/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par ro/ /'di yi khyad par ma dpag par/ /zab pa'i don ni yod ma yin/ /dbang

bskur ba'i sngon du yang / /gdams ngag sbyin par gsungs pa yin/ /gdams ngag de yis dbang thob 'gyur/ /shes rab ma la brten nas su/ /bde ba'i ye shes bskyed pas na/ /shes rab ye shes dbang du gsungs/ /

sih+la ga pur shes rab ste/ /de yi bde ba ye shes yin/ /sih+la shes rab ces bya ste/ /ga pur ye shes su ni bshad/ /rtsa gsum 'dus pa shes rab ste/ /de yi thig le ye shes yin/ /la lA nA ni ye shes so/ /rA sa nA ni shes rab

ste/ /shes zhes ste/ /byang chub sems ni ye shes so/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni shes rab ste/ /dpa' bo ye shes su ni bshad/ /dga' ba gsum ni ye shes te/ /rang bzhin dga' ba shes rab yin/ /'og ni shes rab ces bya ste/ /

steng la ye shes su yang bshad/ /g.yon pa shes rab ces bya ste/ /g.yas pa ye shes su yang bshad/ /chos dbyings shes rab ces bya ste/ /ye shes bzhi ni ye shes te/ /phyag mtshan ming dang yi ge rnams/ /gzhan yang bye brag shes

par bya/ /shes rab ye shes la yang gsum/ /tshig la bslab pa'ang gnang ba yin/ /gzugs brnyan la ni bshad pa ste/ /mngon par rtogs pas bsgom pa gsungs/ /e wa~M ma yA'i rnam pa bzhi/ /e ni sa ste wa~M ni chu/ /

ma ni me ste yA ni rlung / /e ni snying rje wa~M ni byams/ /ma ni dga' ba yA btang snyoms/ /e ni spyan wa~M mA ma kI/ /ma ni gos dkar yA sgrol ma/ /e ni sbyin pa wa~M tshul khrims/ /ma ni bzod pa yA bsam gtan/ /e ni phyag rgya
