bzang po ste/ /wa~M ni dam tshig phyag rgya yin/ /ma ni chos kyi phyag rgya ste/ /yA ni shes rab phyag brgya'o/ /e ni shar te wa~M lho phyogs/ /ma ni nub phyogs yA byang phyogs/ /e ni sku yi thig le ste/ /wa~M ni gsung la ma ni

thugs/ /yA ni ye shes thig le'o/ /e ni sngon po wa~M ljang ku/ /ma ni dmar po yA ser po/ /e ni mkha' 'gro wa~M lA ma/ /ma ni dum skyes yA gzugs can/ /e ni ye shes mkha' 'gro yin/ /wa~M ni rdo rje'i mkha' 'gro

yin/ /ma ni sha za'i mkha' 'gro ste/ /yA ni las kyi mkha' 'gro'o/ /e ni 'gog pa wa~M ni lam/ /ma ni sdug bsngal yA kun 'byung / /e ni bde chen wa~M longs spyod/ /ma ni chos la yA sprul pa/ /e ni mtshan la wa~M stong

pa/ /ma ni rnam thar yA dpe byad/ /e ni rnam pa sna tshogs te/ /wa~M ni rnam par smin pa'o/ /ma ni rnam par nyed pa ste/ /yA ni rnam pa mtshan nyid bral/ /e ni chung ba wa~M 'bring po/ /ma ni lhag pa yA cher lhag /e ni

g.yas nas me rgyu ste/ /wa~M ni g.yon nas rlung rgyu'o/ /ma ni 'og nas sa rlung rgyu/ /yA ni steng nas chu rlung rgyu/ /e ni gnas brtan wa~M phal chen/ /ma ni bkur ba yA thams cad/ /e ni bsnyen pa wa~M nye bsnyen/ /ma ni

sgrub pa yA bsgrub che/ /e ni shar lho wa~M lho nub/ /ma ni nub byang ya byang shar/ /e ni rgyud la wa~M ni sngags/ /ma ni ye shes yA gsang ba/ /e ni snang ba wa~M snang mched/ /ma ni snang thob yA 'od gsal/ /e ni

bdag gi bzang po yin/ /wa~M ni dus kyi bzang po'o/ /ma ni ye shes bzang por gsungs/ /yA ni rlung gi bzang po yin/ /e ni bdag gi gnas yin te/ /wa~M ni rnal 'byor gnas su bstan/ /ma ni gzhan gyi gnas yin te/ /

yA ni rgyud kyi gnas yin no/ /e ni dga' ba wa~M mchog dga'/ /ma ni lhan cig yA dga' bral/ /e ni me long wa~M mnyam nyid/ /ma ni kun rtog yA nan tan/ /e ni chos sku wa~M longs spyod/ /ma ni sprul sku yA bde chen/ /

e ni zhi ba wa~M ni dbang / /ma ni rgyas pa yA gsod pa/ /yi ge btus pa'i sngags tshan gsum/ /oM ni sku yi 'khor lo ste/ /AHni gsung gi 'khor lo'o/ /hU~M ni thugs kyi 'khor lo yin/ /oM ni rnam snang AH

'od dpag /hU~M ni mi skyod rang bzhin no/ /oM ni phyag g.yon hU~M ni g.yas/ /AHni dbus kyi snying ga yin/ /oM ni g.yon gyi spyan yin te/ /hU~M ni g.yas pa AHdbu ma/ /oM ni srog yin hU~M rtsol ba/ /AHni gnas par

shes par bya/ /oM ni sku la hU~M ni thugs/ /AHni gsung du shes par bya/ /oM ni lus la AHni ngag /hU~M ni yid du shes par bya/ /oM ni thabs la hU~M shes rab/ /AHni gnyis su med pa'o/ /oM ni g.yon gyi la la nA/ /

hU~M ni g.yas kyi rA sa nA/ /AHni a ba d+hU tI yin/ /oM ni g.yas kyi ra sa nA/ /hU~M ni g.yon gyi la lA nA/ /AHni de bzhin dbus na gnas/ /oM ni ga pur hU~M sih+la/ /AHni dkar dmar rtsa dag yin/ /oM ni mchog dga'

hU~M khyad dga'/ /AHni rang bzhin dga' ba'i don/ /dga' ba lhan cig skyes dgar 'gyur/ /lhan cig skyes pa dga' bar 'gyur/ /rgyu la 'bras bu sbyor ba dang / /'bras bu la yang rgyu sbyor dang / /rgyu la rgyu yi

sbyor ba dang / /'bras bu la yang 'bras bur sbyor/ /rgyu 'bras gnyis su med par sbyor/ /thabs la shes rab sbyor ba dang / /shes rab la yang thabs kyis sbyor/ /thabs la thabs kyis sbyor ba dang / /shes rab shes

rab sbyor ba dag /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sbyor/ /sbyor ba 'di yi dgongs pa yang / /kun mkhyen bas kyang rtogs par dka'/ /a ni rnam snang mi bskyod pa/ /na ro rin chen 'byung ldan te/ /zla tshes 'od dpag

med pa yin/ /thig le don yod grub pa'o/ /oM ni bde gshegs lnga rang bzhin/ /zhabs skyed don yod grub pa ste/ /a ni de bzhin 'od dpag med/ /ha ni rnam par snang mdzad de/ /zla tshes rin chen 'byung ldan

yin/ /thig le mi bskyod rang bzhin no/ /zhabs bskyed sgrol ma'i rang bzhin te/ /a ni gos dkar ngo bo yin/ /ha ni rdo rje dbyings phyug ma/ /zla tshes ma mA kI rang bzhin/ /thig le spyan du shes par bya/ /

'byung ba lnga dang sku lnga dang / /'khor lo lnga dang dga' ba lnga/ /go rims bzhin du shes par bya/ /zhabs skyed bya ba nan tan yin/ /a ni mnyam nyid ye shes so/ /ha ni chos kyi dbyings yin te/ /zla tshes so
sor rtog pa'o/ /thig le me long ye shes so/ /'di dag kun gyi dgongs pa ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi gsang / /kun tu gsang zhing dpyad par dka'/ /yi ge tshul gyis rgyas btab pa'o/ /de nas

byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kyis mchod pas mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// //

paN+DI ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ / @/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI rat+na mA le tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rin chen phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal bde
ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha mos gsol pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa ru/ /rin chen phreng ba'i don ma rtogs/ /khyod kyi bdag la bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nyon cig lha mo spyan gzangs ring / /dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa ru/ /ma gsungs nga yis khyod la bshad/ /rin po che ni rnam pa gsum/ /de yi phreng ba'ang rnam pa gsum/ /dang
po snod kyi rin po che/ /gnyis pa bcud kyi rin po che/ /snod bcud gnyis dang rang bzhin bral/ /de ni rin chen gsum pa yin/ /lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ /rnam pa gsum du gsungs pa
las/ /de rnams rin chen ji ltar lags/ /de yi phreng ba ji ltar lags/ /de rnams su yi spyod yul lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dang po snod kyi rin po che/ /rnam pa lnga ru shes
par bya/ /ga ga ri ni dkar po che/ /mi bskyod pa yi byin brlabs te/ /dbyibs ni zla gam lta bu la/ /rab ni ngang pa'i sgo nga tsam/ /'di ni rin chen 'bar ba ste/ /ba dkar ra dkar lug mo yis/ /

'o ma bsku zhing sbangs pa dang / /mi bskyod pa la mchod par bya/ /de ni spyi bor gdags pa'o/ /mchod pa'i bye brag kun la bya/ /shar gyi gdon rnams thub pa dang / /gang la yod pa de la skyob/ /'bring ni

gzhan skyes sbom po tsam/ /'di ni rin chen dge ba ste/ /dngul chu rnam pa gnyis blugs la/ /rkyen gyi rdzas rnams tshang ba dang / /kha yi nang du gzhug pa ste/ /ro ma'i 'khor lo lces mnan la/ /de nas dal gyi bskyod pa dang / /
gsang ba'i rdo rje sna rtse ru/ /bde ba chen po skyes tsam na/ /ro ma'i 'khor lor dog pa mnan/ /dper na sbrul gyi sha zos pa/ /mgo bo mnan pas phyi ru 'byung / /de bzhin mnan pas byang chub sems/ /

sna rtse las kyang gyen la ldog /til dang til mar bzhin du gnas/ /khyad par bde ba gyen la skye/ /bde ba ster phyir rin po che/ /de yi du ma phreng bar bshad/ /tha ma skyes pa'i khro bo tsam/ /a ra la sogs sman lnga dang / /spyi

bo'i gtsug tu btags gyur na/ /lus kyi gnyer ma zad par byed/ /de nas yang dag gnyis pa yang / /bai dur+yA ni sngon po ste/ /rin chen 'byung ldan byin brlabs te/ /dbyibs ni sogs ka lta bu ste/ /rab kyi tshad ni glang po'i

mig /'di ni rin chen myu gu ste/ /ngang pa'i sgo nga ldong ros dang / /spang sha ma dang gsum sbyar nas/ /de gdugs rna ba g.yas su gdags/ /lho yi gdon rnams thub par gsungs/ /gang la yod pa de la skyob/ /'bring ni ngang pa'i

sgo nga tsam/ /'di ni rin chen e raN+Da/ /ga pur rak+ta dngul chu gsum/ /de yi nang blugs lce lkog tu/ /gyen thur gnyis ni sna dang 'jug /de yi byang chub sems bzung ste/ /mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du gnas/ /tha ma bye'u'i

sgong tshad tsam/ /a ru ra dang skyu ru ra/ /ba ru ra dang ldong ros rnams/ /bsres te lus la byug bskus te/ /'di ni d+han+d+ha kaspu ra/ /lus kyi srin bu 'byer bar byed/ /de nas yang dag gsum pa yang / /pad ma rak+ta dmar po ste/ /

dbyibs ni zlum po lta bu la/ /'od dpag med kyis byin brlabs te/ /rab ni dkar sha pa ni stong / /gur kum ga pur lnga sbyar la/ /de la bsku zhing byug pa bya'o/ /lte ba'i dbus su gzhag la bcing / /'di na rat+na ke ru ra/ /nub kyi

gdon rnams thub par gsungs/ /'bring ni kaR+sha ni ste/ /'di ni rat+na ka ra ste/ /mar dang sih+la sbrang ma yang / /bzo ru byas pa'i dngul chu rnams/ /de yi nang blugs lte bar mnan/ /'di yis byang chub sems gzung ste/ /chu la

chu gzhag ji bzhin no/ /tha ma kaR+sha pa ni ste/ /'bras bu gsum dang ru sta dang / /mar gyi snying po dang sbyar te/ /spyi bo'i gtsug tu sba ba dang / /'di ni rat+na de ba sar/ /skra dkar med par byed pa'o/ /de nas yang dag bzhi pa yang / /

de ni margad ljang gu ste/ /dbyibs ni gru bzhi lta bu ste/ /don yod grub par byin brlabs te/ /rab ni be con dbyug pa tsam/ /'di ni rat+na ga ga ni/ /rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag bcas/ /bskus la rna ba g.yon du gdags/ /

'di yi byang gi gdon rnams thub/ /'bring ni bya mo'i sgo nga tsam/ /ma hA de ba u ma de/ /gnyis kyi ga pur rak+ta yis/ /byugs la lte ba'i nang du gzhug / ga pur sih+la gnyis ka 'dzin/ /tha ma gzhan skyes sgo nga tsam/ /ldong ros ser po

gser dang gsum/ /man cha gcig ni byin nas ni/ /'di ni e ru na ra ste/ /srin bu mi skye bde dang ldan/ /'di ni rat+na san+da ha/ /de nas yang dag lnga pa yang / /kha dogs dbyibs ni du mar snang / /rnam par snang mdzad byin

brlabs te/ /don rnams so so du ma byed/ /lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ /ma 'ongs so so skye bo yis/ /rin chen gnas rnams gang las btsal/ /rin chen mi 'tshal ji ltar lags/ /rin po che ni ji ltar brtag /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i phyi rol na/ /rin po che yi gling yod de/ /de yi gnas nas btsal bar bya/ /gzhan yang rin chen gnas rnams ni/ /gser dngul la sogs rdo rnams kyi/ /

gnas ni kun na yod par gsungs/ /rin chen shes pa rnam pa lnga/ /dang por rgyud rnams thams cad la/ /rmongs pa med pas shes pa dang / /bla ma'i man ngag shes pas thob/ /gnyis pa rnal 'byor bcas pas shes/ /

gsum pa rgyud kyi man ngag la/ /zhugs pa'i tshong dpon chen pos shes/ /bzhi pa yon tan kun ldan pa'i/ /rgyal po chen po des shes so/ /lnga pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa dang / /rgyal po dang ni 'brel pa yi/ /gser
mgar mkhas pas rtogs par 'gyur/ /lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ /dang po'i man ngag ji ltar yin/ /gnyis pa rnal 'byor ji ltar lags/ /gsum pa rgyud ni ji ltar lags/ /bzhi pa'i yon tan thams

cad dam/ /lnga pa 'brel ba ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dang po man ngag shes pa yang / /rin chen ngo bo gcig nyid la/ /yon tan du mar shes pa ste/ /dper na rdzas kyi pha lam bzhin/ /chu la mi

'bying 'bigs la sogs/ /du ma shes pa man ngag yin/ /rnal 'byor shes pa rtse gcig ste/ /de yis thams cad shes pa yin/ /rgyud kyi don ni shes pa yi/ /tshong dpon de yis shes pa yin/ /sngags dang rgyud la sogs

pa yi/ /yon tan kun ldan rgyal po shes/ /rgyal po rnal 'byor dang 'brel ba'i/ /sa 'og gser gyi rlangs ba shes/ /gser mgar de yis shes pa'o/ /brtag pa rnam pa gnyis yin te/ /mngon sum dang ni mtshan ma

ste/ /rdo rje pha lam la sogs dang / /e ran+ta la sogs pa yi/ /mngon sum gtan la phab pa yin/ /ma hA nI la la sogs pa/ /gdon rnams thub cing lha rnams skyob/ /dam tshig nyams pa gso ba dang / /tshe rnams ring

ba la sogs so/ /dang por gdon gyi mtshan ma ni/ /mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya/ /de nas gdon gyi mtshan ma la/ /de nyid cho ga tshul bzhin bya/ /de nas chu mig gtsang ma ru/ /gtor ma btang la chu gtsang blang / /

gser dngul snod du chu blugs la/ /lha 'am klu 'am gnod sbyin sogs/ /mtshan ma gnyis kyi maN+Dal la/ /rnal 'byor pa yis gzhag par bya/ /gom pa gsum gyis gcad par bya/ /g.yon gyi maN+Dal thog tu ni/ /chu yi nang

du me long gzhag /phyi ru gtor ma cha gcig gzhag /nang du yol ba dkar pos bcad/ /de ru tshogs dang bkra shis gzhag /rnal 'byor yan lag khrus byas la/ /lha yi rnal 'byor rdzogs pa dang / /khro bos drag tu mtshams

cad la/ /sbom po khro mo lha ru bsgom/ /de yis rin chen dang po gzung / /de nas sor bzhi 'phyang du gzhug /thub bam mi thub la sogs pa/ /mkhas pas brtags shing shes par bya/ /dbyibs dang kha dog rin po che/ /
yon tan med pa ga la srid/ /dper na bu gcig skyes gyur na/ /pha med pa yang ga la srid/ /de bas mkhas pas brtag par bya/ /lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ /gser dngul la sogs ji ltar lags/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gser ni rnam pa gnyis yin te/ /rang bzhin dang ni bzor byas yin/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'chi ba bslu/ /bzor byas pa ni rnam pa gnyis/ /gser 'gyur

gser gyi rgyan yin te/ /bdar ba'i gser gyis srid lam 'gegs/ /lo dang zla ba zla ba phyed/ /mkhas pas brtags shing shes par bya/ /dngul la sogs pa'ang de bzhin te/ /mdor na snang zhing srid pa'i rdzas/ /thams cad

rin po che yin te/ /man ngag can gyis shes par bya/ /de nas bcud kyi rin po che/ /lus kyi ri rab lhun po la/ /rin chen gser gyi dbye ba yang / /thabs dang shes rab rin po che/ /shes rab rtsa yi rang bzhin te/ /thabs ni

byang chub sems yin no/ /dmar dang dngas pa shes rab ste/ /dkar dang dngas pa thabs su gsungs/ /a ba d+hU tI rin chen las/ /thig le du ma phreng ba yin/ /lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ /a ba d+hU tI ji ltar

lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /a ba d+hU tI'i rang bzhin las/ /steng du sgo lnga yang dag gnas/ /bar dang 'og tu'ang de bzhin te/ /bskyed dang rdzogs dang rang bzhin las/ /yon tan skyon gyi mtshan

nyid do/ /bde chen thig le haM yin no/ /dang AHhUM ha dang bzhi/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ru/ /sku gsung thugs dang bde ba che/ /'bar ba bzhi ru yang dag bshad/ /sku gsung thugs dang bde ba che/ /mgrin

pa ru ni 'jug pa bzhi/ /snying gar yang ni 'dzag pa bzhi/ /sprul pa ru yang de bzhin te/ /chos kyi sku ni rin chen la/ /stong pa bcu drug phreng bar bshad/ /de nas shin tu gsang ba'i don/ /pad+ma rdo rje gnyis

pa yang / /a ba d+hU tI rin po che/ /a phaT e dang waM dang bzhi/ /gsang ba'i thig le bzhi ru bshad/ /a ni me long lta bu ste/ /phaT ni bya ba nan tan yin/ /e ni so sor rtog pa ste/ /waM ni mnyam nyid ye shes so/ /rin chen

chos dbyings ye shes te/ /rnam par thar dang stong pa dang / /mtshan dang de bzhin dpe byad rnams/ /a ni 'khor lo 'byung ba bzhi/ /phaT kyi gnas su ye shes lnga/ /e yi gnas su snyoms 'jug dgu/ /waM gi gnas
su lnga bcu brgyad/ /de kho na ru shes par bya/ /k+Sha e ta sa bon bzhi/ /yon tan skyon gyi mtshan nyid kyis/ /kun la khyab cing shes par bya/ /lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ /'di yis gdon rnams ji

ltar thub/ /byang sems dgag pa ji ltar lags/ /skra dkar gnyer ma ji ltar zhi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rnam par rtog pa gdon yin te/ /mtshan dang dpe byad spong ba dang / /phung po lnga ni bdud rtsi

lnga/ /skye mched de ni lnga ru 'gyur/ /khams rnams rten gyi ngo bo ste/ /de rnams rten rtsi'i ngo bo ste/ /rnam rtog spong phyir rin po che/ /byang chub sems dgag rim pa yang / /g.yas brkyang bas ni thabs kyis

te/ /g.yon gyis shes rab rtsa mdud dgag /sa gas nam mkha' dgag par bya/ /zlum pos gsang ba'i sna rtser dgag /la la nA dang ra sa nA/ /a ba d+hU tI'i nang chud pa/ /de ni nam mkha' zlum po ste/ /dper na

sbrul gyi lce gnyis la/ /dug dang sman ni yod pa bzhin/ /gzhan yang 'dug stangs bye brag gis/ /dgag pa'i sbyor ba shes par bya/ /dgag pa srog dang rtsol ba'i rten/ /de ltar dbus su gnas pa dang / /rim
nas rim par gyen la drang / /skad cig nas bzung lo yi bar/ /skra dkar gnyer ma'i rang bzhin dgag /gang la brten pa de yi tshad/ /lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ /dbus su gnas pa ji ltar lags/ /

rim nas rim du ji ltar drang / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /thabs zhes bya ba rtag pa'i mtha'/ /shes rab zhes pa chad pa'i mtha'/ /snyoms par 'jug pa dbu ma'i don/ /g.yas kyi srog ni rtag pa'i mtha'/ /

g.yon gyi rtsol ba chad pa'i mtha'/ /de gnyis gnas pa dbu ma'i don/ /ro ma rtag pa'i byang chub sems/ /rkyang ma khrag ni chad pa'o/ /kun 'dar ma ru gang gnas pa/ /de ni dbu mar shes par bya/ /mchog gi dga' ba rtag pa'i
mtha'/ /bral ba'i dga' ba chad pa'i mtha'/ /lhan cig dga' ba dbu mar bshad/ /dang hUM ni mtha' gnyis te/ /AHyi rnam pa dbu mar gnas/ /A li kA li mtha' gnyis te/ /ma ning yi ge dbu ma yin/ /skyes pa

bud med mtha' gnyis te/ /ma ning gnyis su med par gsungs/ /'di ni sgom pa zung du 'jug /de ni gnas par dbu ma'i don/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa ru/ /'brel pa zung du 'jug par gsungs/ /bya ba'i rgyud dang rnal 'byor rgyud/ /

snang ba zung du 'jug par gsungs/ /dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pa ru/ /steng sgo'i rlung la zung du 'jug /shes rab rnal 'byor bla ma ru/ /sih+la ga pur zung du 'jug /rim nas rim du drang ba yang / /gsang ba'i 'khor lo a la ni/ /

bde ba rdzogs pa'i tshad bstan pa/ /pad+ma rdo rje 'gags pa snyam/ /de ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshad/ /de nas gsang ba'i 'khor lo nas/ /bde chen 'khor lo'i bar du drang / /dang por de ltar shes par bya/ /de ltar

sems ni brtan 'gyur na/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo nas/ /gsang ba'i sna rtse bar du drang / /lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ /bcud kyi rin chen gang na gnas/ /de ni shes pa su yis shes/ /de yi brtag pa ji ltar
lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu ga nas/ /gsang ba'i 'khor lo yan chad du/ /a ba d+hU tI tsan+dan gnas/ /la la ra sa sbrul ltar gnas/ /gzhan rnams ba thag khug par

gnas/ /'di rnams rang bzhin kun la gnas/ /rtsa dang 'khor lo 'di rnams ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por gsungs/ /phyi yi rtsa dang nang gi rtsa/ /gsang ba de bzhin mthar thug pa'i/ /man ngag yod pas shes

par gsungs/ /brtag pa rnam pa gnyis su bstan/ /dang po lus kyi brtag pa ste/ /gnyis pa ngag tu shes par bya/ /lus la spyi dang bye brag gnyis/ /sgu na rlung gi rang bzhin te/ /yan lag thung ba chu yi khams/ /yan lag rgyas

pa sa yi khams/ /smad zheng che ba me yi khams/ /sna tshogs du ma nam mkha'i khams/ /spyi ru dkar ba chu yi khams/ /dmar ba me ru shes par bya/ /ser na de bzhin sa yi khams/ /sngo na rlung du shes par bya/ /yang na rlung gi khams

yin te/ /drod rnams che na me yi khams/ /brtan na sa yi khams su gsungs/ /chu khams che na chu yi khams/ /de rnams kun ldan nam mkha'i khams/ /'jug pa bde chen sa yin te/ /ldog pa sprul pa chu ru gsungs/ /rnal 'byor

rgyud ni bye brag gis/ /sems kyi gnas su shes par bya/ /shu kra rlung la sih+la me/ /sprul dang chos su kha sbyar yin/ /gzhan yang mkhas pas shes par bya/ /de nas bye brag gsungs pa yi/ /dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan ma gsum/ /

kun la mkhas pas shes par bya/ /dang por dbyibs kyi brtag pa yang / /dpral ba'i dbyibs la rnam pa bzhi/ /gru bzhi zlum po zla gam dang / /gru gsum du yang shes par bya/ /dkar po la sogs de dang 'dra/ /rna ba nas gzung

rkang pa'i bar/ /kun la brtag cing shes par bya/ /skad ni phra dang sbom pa dang / /ring du 'don dang thung ba dang / /'dar ba la sogs bye brag rnams/ /mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya/ /rtags des brtag pa'i mtshan ma ni/ /

rnam pa gsum du shes par bya/ /'dod chags sku dang zhe sdang thugs/ /mun pa gsung du shes par bya/ /dang po 'dod chags dbye ba yang / /yar ngo mar ngo mtshams dang gsum/ /dbyibs dang kha dog skad gsum la/ /

mkhas pa 'dod pa skye ba brtag /nyin bar bzhi dang mtshan bar bzhi/ /de bzhin skad cig thang cig rnams/ /mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya/ /mig 'dzums ba spu ldang la sogs/ /dbyibs kyi 'dod pa skye ba'i rtags/ /

'dod pa'i gzugs ldan cung zhig dmar/ /sna bug dkar la sogs pa dang / /skad 'dar kha ni skam la sogs/ /'dod pa skye ba'i rtags su bshad/ /gzhan yang 'dod pa rgyas pa'i rtags/ /kha dog dbyibs la brtag par bya/ /sra

phyir 'dod pa sa yi khams/ /chu la sogs pa de bzhin no/ /gsung dang thugs la'ang shes par bya/ /lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ /'dod chags zhes pa ji ltar lags/ /de yi chen po ji ltar lags/ /zhe sdang la sogs ji

ltar lags/ /sku gsung thugs ni ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /'dod chags nyon mongs 'khor ba ste/ /gab pa'i gsang ba ma gtogs par/ /sbas pa'i gsang ba la zhen nas/ /srid pa'i sa bon mi zab

pas/ /dper na rgyud kyi mda' bzhin du/ /'bras bu mnar med dmyal bar skye/ /chen po mi rtog rang bzhin te/ /'bras bu gnyis med ye shes skyed/ /'dod chags zhes pa spang bya ste/ /de yi chen po gnyen por gsungs/ /'dod

chags zhes pa me tog ste/ /de yi chen po dri dang 'dra/ /gzhan yang bye brag shes par bya/ /zhe sdang la sogs gong dang 'dra/ /thams cad rten pa sku ru bstan/ /brjod pa dang bral gsung du bstan/ /rnam rtog bral ba thugs su shes/ /

rnam rtog chung zhing gtong phod che/ /bla ma la gus snying rje che/ /gzhan yang bye brag kun shes pa/ /'di la bstan gyi kun la gsang / /bla ma yon tan kun ldan zhing / /dbang dang man ngag 'brel shes dang / /gsang ba'i don la ma rmongs

shing / /thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas/ /chos la ser sna med pa dang / /gsal la gsong por smra ba dang / /rigs bcas kun gyis bkur ba dang / /las kyi phyag rgya 'chang ba dang / /dam tshig dang ldan bla ma ste/ /

'di la bkur gyi thams cad la/ /bsnyen cing bkur bar bya ba min/ /de nas rin chen gsum pa ni/ /gnyis med lhan cig skyes pa ste/ /rtog bral spros pa med pa yin/ /de rtogs rin chen phreng ba'o/ /lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ /

gab pa zhes pa ji ltar lags/ /de yi 'bras bu ji ltar smin/ /sbas pa zhes pa ji ltar lags/ /de yi 'bras bu ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gab pa zhes pa ye shes te/ /sum cu rtsa bdun sku

gsung thugs/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul sku gsum/ /dga' ba bzhi ru mdor bsdus pa/ /dmigs pa'i rkyen ni gsang ba'o/ /bdun dang ldan phyir chen po'o/ /sum cu rtsa bdun la sogs pa'i/ /gnyen po stobs kyis

ma zhugs par/ /sbas pa pad+ma rdo rje gnyis/ /snyoms par zhugs na 'dod pa skye/ /'di ni rkun po ma rungs pa/ /dper na ljon shing rtsa ba las/ /yal ga me tog thams cad skyes/ /nyon mongs rtsa ba 'dod chags las/ /

dug gsum la sogs thams cad de/ /sbas pa'i gsang ba 'khor ba ste/ /gab pa mya ngan 'das par gsungs/ /'khor ba mnar med dmyal ba dang / /dur khrod brgyad po dregs pa can/ /snying rje med cing sha khrag za/ /shing

rta'i 'khor lo bzhin du gnas/ /mya ngan 'das pa sku gsum ste/ /skyob pa mya ngan 'das gyur kyang / /'khor lo 'khor ba'i tshul du ni/ /tshogs kyi shugs kyi mthu yis su/ /sems can don la yang dag 'jug /chos sku
spros bral nam mkha' bzhin/ /sku gnyis sprin dang char lta bu/ /sku gnyis sems can don mdzad pa/ /sems can las dang smon lam stobs/ /de yi stobs kyi snang ba las/ /yang dag nyid la snang rgyu med/ /
sku gsum de nyid bzhi bcu'i don/ /dur khrod la sogs brda ru shes/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis chos sku'i brda/ /brgyad ni gzugs sku gnyis kyi brda/ /gzhan yang brda yi bye brag ni/ /sbom po gsang ba'i

rdo rje'i brda/ /khro mo gsang ba'i pad ma'i brda/ /sgu dang drang ba yon tan skyon/ /mdzub mo la rten mthe'u chung ni/ /nga yi gam du tshur shog yin/ /mthe bo la brten mdzub mo bar/ /khyod kyi gan du 'ong gis yin/ /

mthe bong mdzub gnyis zur gsum ni/ /b+ha ga rgyas sam dri ba yin/ /b+ha ga rgyas pa zlum por ston/ /bde ba'i gnas su 'du ba yang / /srod dam nam gung tho rangs gsum/ /mdzub tshigs dang po nas gzung nas/ /tha ma'i
bar du brda yin no/ /sku gsung thugs kyis byin brlabs kyis/ /lan gsum bar du nan tan gnad/ /gzhan yang brda yi bye brag rnams/ /rgyud rnams kun du ma gsungs pa/ /gnas ni thabs kyi 'dug stangs so/ /

nye gnas shes rab 'dug par gsungs/ /zhing ni thabs kyi bza' ba'i tshogs/ /de bzhin shes rab nye ba'i zhing / /'du ba thabs ni 'ong ba ste/ /shes rab 'ong ba nye 'du yin/ /ts+tshan+do thabs kyi stan dang rgyan/ /

shes rab de bzhin nye ts+tshan+do/ /dur khrod thabs kyi rnam rtog bral/ /de bzhin shes rab nye dur khrod/ /gzhan yang brda yi bye brag rnams/ /kha dog de bzhin dbyibs dang yang / /yan lag tshul las shes

par bya/ /de nas lha mo la sogs pas mchod pa sna tshogs pas mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /dpal rin chen phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po gsang ba ste rang bzhin gyis gsang ba rdzogs s+ho// //

rgya gar gyi mkhan po rin chen rdo rje dang / /lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /slad kyis kyang dpe phyi mo la gtugs nas bcos pa'o/ / rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA sa mA
ya tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal dam tshig chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / rnal 'byor ma grangs med pa'i nang nas byang chub
sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas/ dam tshig gi rim pa bka' stsal pa/ dam tshig dang ni mi ldan na/ /bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ /rgyu med pa yi 'bras bu bzhin/ /

tshe yi dus byas dmyal bar 'gro/ /de phyir dam tshig shin du bsrung / /sangs rgyas bla ma las thob phyir/ /thun mong ma yin bla ma yi/ /lnga bcu'i bdag nyid bsrung bar bya/ /thun mong brgyad dang bcu bzhi ste/ /de
rnams nges pa shes par bya/ /de rnams spyi yi dam tshig ste/ /bye brag dam tshig bsrung bar bya/ /phung po lnga ni rigs lnga ste/ /'byung ba lnga ni yum lnga'o/ /skye mched sems dpa' sems ma yin/ /
gzugs phung rnam par snang mdzad la/ /brjed dang brnyas pa la sogs spang / /de la mchod dang bstod sogs bya/ /don dam par ni rang rig ste/ /tshogs bsags phyir na nga yis gsungs/ /tshor ba
la sogs de dang 'dra/ /sa ni sangs rgyas spyan yin te/ /spyod lam gsum du ma yengs bya/ /gang du gsungs pa'i tshul bzhin bsrung / /chu la sogs pa de bzhin no/ /mig la sogs pa de bzhin no/ /
gzugs la sogs pa de bzhin bsrung / /dkyil 'khor du zhugs rnal 'byor pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhin du mchod/ /brnyas shing gshe ba la sogs spang / /sems can pho dang mo kun la/ /dpa'

bo dpa' mo dam tshig bsrung / /bza' ba la sogs dus su yang / /bdud rtsi sbyor bas dam tshig bsrung / /sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga rnams la/ /rang gi spyod dang gzhan spyod la/ /rjes su yi rang dam tshig yin/ /
mdor na snang zhing srid pa'i rdzas/ /dam tshig bsrung zhing mchod pa'i phyir/ /lus kyi nyes sdom sku yin te/ /ngag gi nyes sdom gsung du gsungs/ /yid kyi nyes sdom thugs su gsungs/ /oM
gyi 'od zer dkar po yis/ /'dod khams dag par gyur pa ni/ /sku yi dam tshig bsrung ba'o/ /de la mchod dang bstod sogs bya/ /bsdu ba'ang du shes par bya/ /aHni kha dog dmar po yis/ /gzugs

khams dag pa gsung dam tshig /hU~M gi kha dog nag po yis/ /gzugs med dag pa dam tshig go/ /oM ni spyi bor yang dag gnas/ /AHni de bzhin mgrin par gnas/ /hU~M ni snying gar spro dang bsdu/ /sku yi mkha'
'gro bcu gnyis su/ /'dod khams dag pa dam tshig go/ /gsung gi mkha' 'gro bcu gnyis su/ /gzugs khams dag pa dam tshig yin/ /thugs kyi mkha' 'gro bcu gnyis su/ /gzugs med dag pa dam tshig ste/ /
oM dang AHdang hU~M la bsdu/ /oM ni rgyu yi sku bcu gnyis/ /AHni lam gyi sku bcu gnyis/ /hU~M ni 'bras bu sku bcu gnyis/ /bde ba chen po'i sku gsung thugs/ /ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa'o/ /dpal ldan
chos kyi sku gsung thugs/ /ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa'o/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gsung thugs/ /ye shes gcig gyur sdom pa'o/ /sprul pa yang ni sku gsung thugs/ /ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa'o/ /

bde chen snying po ha~M nyid la/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yang / /ye shes dang ni rnam pa bzhi/ /oM dang AHdang hU~M dang yang / /yan lag bzhi bzhir thub pas gsungs/ /rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu la/ /bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad

shes par bya/ /a dang ha~M gnyis rang bzhin gyi/ /sngags kyi ngo bor shes par bya/ /sngags kyi grangs ni nyi khri stong / /drug brgya bzlas par shes par bya/ /lag pa bskyod pa rang bzhin gar/ /rkang pa rang bzhin dkyil

'khor ro/ /de ltar gnas na dam tshig go/ /gzhan yang dam tshig bye brag yang / /'jig rten tha snyad spang ba'i phyir/ /mi bskyod rnam snang la sogs dang / /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma zhes pa/ /gsang ba'i rdo rje pad ma dang / /

ji ltar rol pa'i spyod pa kun/ /tha snyad kyang ni lam la 'jug /gzhan yang gsang ba'i dam tshig ni/ /rtsa ba bzhi dang yan lag bcu/ /theg pa che la smod pa dang / /gsang ba'i don la skur 'debs dang / /rnal

'byor kun la gnod pa dang / /sems can kun la 'tshe byed pa/ /'di gsang ba ni dam tshig yin/ /sbas pa bsrung ba'i rim pa yang / /ma byin blang ba'i dam tshig ste/ /'dod pa chen po dang ldan pa'i/ /'dod chags spyod

pa'ang de dang 'dra/ /rang gi dam tshig bsrung ba'i phyir/ /brdzun du smra ba bzhi pa yin/ /ro rtsa'i sha dang bcud kyi sha /kha ba'i chang dang mngar ba'i chang / /mar la gcig ste 'o ma gnyis/ /gzhan ni gsum ste
yan lag bcu/ /'di ltar dam tshig yin par gsungs/ /bdud rtsi nyid la dus gsum du/ /bcom ldan sku gsung thugs kyi ste/ /dang por yungs kar tha ma yang / /byi la'i khams kyi tshul du bza'/ /
mtshan mo shes rab sku gsung thugs/ /nyin mo thabs kyi sku gsung thugs/ /nyi ma nub dang nyi ma shar/ /nyi ma gung ni thabs kyi dus/ /nam sros nam ni langs ba dang / /nam gyi gung ni shes rab dus/ /
dus drug mchod pa rgyun mi gcad/ /dam tshig 'di las ma nyams na/ /phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma mo rnams// /mchod dang bsrung ba la sogs byed/ /gzhan
yang gsang ba'i bye brag la/ /gsang ba sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /lus la me dang khreg mi gdon/ /srog gam zug rngu'i phyir ma gtogs/ /srog chags 'dod pa spyod mthong na/ /rang gi rnal 'byor
shor mi bya/ /dam tshig bsdu phyir dben par 'dug /las su rung na g.yon bar 'khyam/ /'di skad ces bya yan lag brgyad/ /bdag gi bcu bzhi yin par gsungs/ /thos pa'i dus gcig
lnga bcu'i don/ /bcom ldan 'das ni rtsa ba bzhi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag bcu/ /sku gsung thugs ni lus ngag yid/ /rdo rje mi phyed phyir dam tshig /btsun mo dam tshig gis brgyan mdzes/ /b+ha ga
mnyam par 'jog pas so/ /snyoms pa dus gsum mi 'gyur ba/ /bzhugs pa bde ba'i ngo bo la'o/ /rdo rje snying po la sogs pa/ /bye brag yin par nga yis gsungs/ /e ni yan lag brgyad yin
no/ /ba~M ni bcu po'i rang bzhin te/ /ma ni lnga bcu'i rang bzhin no/ /yA ni gzhan rnams yin par gsungs/ /e ni srog chags gsod pa ste/ /ba~M ni ma byin len pa'o/ /ma ni brdzun du smra
ba'o/ /ya ni 'dod chags spyod pa'o/ /e ni sku yi dam tshig ste/ /ba~M ni gsung gi dam tshig go/ /ma ni thugs kyi dam tshig go/ /yA ni bza' ba'i dam tshig go/ /dus gsum
dam tshig ma bsrungs na/ /'jig rten pa dang 'bum 'gyur ba'i/ /rnam smin che bar nga yis gsungs/ /dam tshig nyams pa'i mtshan ma ni/ /lus kyi nyes pa sna tshogs 'byung / /
ngag gi nyes pa sna tshogs smra/ /kha dog dbyibs rnams 'gyur ba dang / /lag gi rdzas rnams mi thub cing / /'bras dang shu ba la sogs 'byung / /de tshe rnal 'byor nyams pa des/ /
dam tshig nyams pa shin du bsam/ /bla ma rdo rje spun gral du/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul byas la/ /gser dngul la sogs brgya 'am stong / /rta dang glang po la sogs dang / /
bai DUr+ya dang man shel dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan brgya 'am stong / /mar me la sogs de bzhin no/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor/ /tshogs bsags pas ni nyams pa
gso/ /gal te nyams pa ma gsos na/ /nyams pa de dang rnal 'byor gzhan/ /gnas gcig dang ni chu gcig gam/ /yul dang lam gyi gnas gcig gam/ /skad cig tsam yang 'dug
mi bya/ /'dug na nyes pa bsam mi khyab/ /rab gnas sbyin sreg dbang bskur dang / /gtor ma mchod dang bzlas pa dang / /ri lu mig sman la sogs dang / /zhi rgyas la
sogs las rnams dang / /'jig rten mtshan ma brgyad dag dang / /'jig rten 'das pa'i mtshan ma bzhi/ /sangs rgyas pa yi mtshan ma gcig /gzhan yang dngos grub ma lus
pa/ /dam tshig 'di las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'bru rnams sna tshogs skye 'gyur ba/ /rin chen sa las skyes pa bzhin/ /dam pa sku gsung thugs yin te/ /de las 'das
na tshim bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar bu ni med pa'i khyim/ /shi ma thag tu stong par 'gyur/ /de bzhin dam tshig 'di med na/ /mnar med sems can dmyal bar skye/ /pi wang
gling bu sbyor kun sogs/ /rgyud dang bral na brdung mi rung / /de bzhin dam tshig med gyur na/ /sngags bzlas bsgom pa la sogs pa/ /'bras bu med par brlag par
'gyur/ /nas las nas kyi myu gu skye/ /dam tshig las ni rdo rje 'chang / /tshe 'dir thob par gsungs pa ste/ /dus ni gzhan min rtsod ldan dus/ /
bstan bya gzhan min nga yis te/ /skye ba gzhan min pha dang ma/ /man ngag gzhan min sa ma ya/ /bzhi ni yin par gsungs pa'o/ /de ltar dam tshig dang ldan pa/ /bud med 'du zhing dga' bar 'gyur/ /

mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mo ste/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan mar ston/ /nor dang bran dang g.yog 'khor dang / /rgyal po'i 'khor yul la sogs 'du/ /ngag ni snyan cing bde bar 'gyur/ /srog gcod la sogs tshig

smras kyang / /sems can skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /lus kyi sems can bsad byas kyang / /rnam smin 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sku ni thob par gsungs pa'o/ /ngag gis phra ma'i tshig smras kyang / /nyes par mi

'gyur gsung thob 'gyur/ /yid kyis mnar sems bsams byas kyang / /nyes par mi 'gyur thugs thob 'gyur/ /dam tshig ldan pa'i yon tan no/ /e ma'o rgyud ni ngo re mtshar/ /dpal dam tshig chen po'i rgyud kyi
rgyal po rdzogs pa'o// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /

rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA bA la tan+t+ra rA dza na ma/ bod skad du/ dpal stobs po che'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal sdom pa'i sny-ing po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la sogs pa dpa' bo'-i tshogs dang / lA ma la sogs pa mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dang / rnal 'byor ma dang /

ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor nas btsun mo'-i b+ha ga la snyoms par bzhugs so/ /'jig rten na ni cher grags pa/ /dgra ni chen po drug yin te/ /ji ltar nyi ma nub pa'i tshe/ /grong khyer gyi ni mi rnams kyi/ /

rta dang glang po la sogs pa/ /rdzas rnams yongs su 'phrog par byed/ /thams cad dbul por skye bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin yul drug gi ni dgras/ /shes rab nyi ma nub pa'i tshe/ /ma rig pa yi mun pa la/ /so so
skye bo thams cad kyi/ /ye shes lnga la sogs pa yi/ /rdzas rnams yongs su 'phrog par byed/ /bde ba med pa'i gnas su skye/ /dgra de yongs su gzhom pa'i phyin/ /mchod pa med cing bzlas pa med/ /gtor ma

sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor med/ /klog dang sgom pa bsam gtan med/ /g.yeng ba'i tshes dang skar ma'i tshogs/ /thams cad spangs te bde ba yi/ /bstan la bdag nyid legs 'dug ste/ /shes rab ye shes bsrub par bya/ /

sh-ing rta yi ni 'khor lo ltar/ /yul la yang dag rgyug pa'i sems/ /de dag las ni bzlog nasu/ /las kyi rlung ni chen po g.yos/ /ye shes me ni chen po 'bar/ /rnam rtog sreg ste bdud rtsi'i ros/ /til gyi 'bru bzhin
gang ba ste/ /skye ba med pa'i gnas su gzung / /de nas sems ni brtan gyur nas/ /mtshan mar snang ba 'gag par 'gyur/ /de nyid las ni bzlog nas su/ /rang sems stong par bsgom par bya/ /chos la bdag med

rtogs pa na/ /de tshe sems ni rtogs par 'gyur/ /thams cad stong par ros gang ste/ /bde ba chen po'i sku zhes brjod do/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa ste/ /'di la bsal ba ci yang med/ /bstan par bya ba ci yang
med/ /de nyid mthong bas rnam par grol/ /rigs gcig dang ni r-igs gsum dang / /rigs lnga rigs n-i brgya la sogs/ /de nyid 'di la tha dad med/ /ji ltar glang po rnyed gyur nas/ /glang po'i rjes ni
mi btsal ltar/ /sems kyi de nyid rnyed gyur na/ /rnam rtog gang yang mi btsal lo/ /ji ltar dug ni 'dod pa la/ /sman nyid dug tu sbyar te byin/ /sman las dug 'byung sbyor ba yang / /sman pa mkhas pas

sbyor ba shes/ /gzhan yang mar dang kha ra dang / /mar gyi snying po la sogs pa/ /'thungs te zhu na sman du 'gyur/ /de bzhin nga yis gsungs pa yang / /drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don/ /sgra ni ji bzhin
ji bzhin min/ /dgongs pa dang ni dgongs pa min/ /bsregs bcad bdar ba'i gser bzhin du/ /yongs su brtags nas nga yis bka'/ /blang bar bya yi mos pa 'am/ /gzhan gyis mkhas pa 'jug mi

bya/ /ji ltar skye bo blun po ste/ /dgra ru gyur pa'i skye bo yis/ /sman yin byas te dug byin na/ /sman du dmigs te dug zos na/ /zos pa'i rjes la 'chi bar 'gyur/ /thabs rnams thams cad sgyu ma shes/ /shes rab
brjod du med par gsungs/ /ji ltar rig pa mkhas pa yis/ /dug ni dug gis 'byin par byed/ /ji ltar me yi tshig pa la/ /de bzhin me yis gdung bar bya/ /ji ltar 'dod chags che ba la/ /'dod chags nyid kyis

spang bar bya/ /ji ltar zhe sdang che ba la/ /zhe sdang nyid kyis spang bar bya/ /de bzhin gti mug che ba la/ /gti mug nyid kyis spang bar bya/ /dper na rlung ni mar me 'jig pa'i rgyu/ /de nyid nags sreg me yi grogasu 'gyur/ /

de bzhin 'dod la brten pa bde ba'i yul/ /dug gis dgra rnams bcom nas gnyis med thob/ /ri lu mig sman la sogs 'di las byung / /las thams ji ltar pha rol thabs ldan pas/ /gzings la brten nas pha rol 'gro/ /

pha rol phyin nas 'dor bar byed/ /de bzhin rang rig tshol bas kyang / /bud med sgyu ma la brten te/ /rang rig ye shes thob par bya/ /rang rig ye shes thob pa dang / /bud med sgyu ma dor bar bya/ /zab mo'i dgongs pa ma

rtogs par/ /zab mo'i spyod pa spyod par byed/ /sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung / /ji ltar ri yi rtse mo nas/ /skyes bu 'ga' zhig lhung 'gyur na/ /de ni lhung ba chen por 'gyur/ /gzhan yang dar gyi srin bu yis/ /

rang la rang gis 'ching bar byed/ /mtshan mo me yi srin bu yang / /rang gis rang ni sreg par byed/ /sgyu ma tsam gyi tshul gnas shing / /mtha' bzhi las ni rnam par grol/ /spros pa thams cad nye bar zhi/ /mtshon bya mtshon byed

ma yin te/ /lta ba'i dbus na gnas pa yi/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'o/ /dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las mngon par rtogs pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // gang zhig brtag par byed pa yang / /gnas ni shin du bsngags pa ru/ /khru

do pa yi maN+Dal la/ /dang po ba yi rnam lnga yis/ /sor gcig tsam du byug par bya/ /de nas dri chen dri chu yis/ /byugs te me tog sngon po dgram/ /rgyan la sogs pas mdzes par brgyan/ /bum pa lnga ni phyogs dang

dbus/ /de nas bzlas pa khri 'am 'bum/ /bdud rtsi chu ru byin brlabs te/ /gang zhig brtag pa'i mi de la/ /dang po mtshams gcad khrus byas te/ /rlog pa nag po phyir bzlog gon/ /skra ni gyen bcings sha bcings dang / /

ber ka thogs te shar sgor gzhag /tshil chen me mar shar du gtam/ /nub tu me long dngul la sogs/ /dag pa de la sman lnga dang / /dri lngas byug ste bkru bar bya/ /de nas me long nang du yang / /gdon gyi mtshan ma brtag bya

ste/ /gtso bo'-i sngags kyi mtha' ru ni/ /gdon gyi ming dang sngags btags na/ /lha yi gdon la sogs pa kun/ /mtshan mar 'byung ba the tsom med/ /mi de rgyan ni tha dad de/ /lha la sogs mthong bye brag go/ /dus ni

'byung po'i nyi ma sogs/ /mtshan ma sna tshogs byung ba'i tshe/ /de tshe gdon ni dbang du bsdu/ /tshe dang bsod nams longs spyod dang / /mdza' bshes zug rngu la sogs pa/ /gdon la sogs pa bsal ba'i phyir/ /

dpal ldan mkha' 'gro ma la sogs/ /brtag pa'i rdzas kyi bye brag kyang / /mchod dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo sogs/ /bskor la mtshan ma brtag par bya/ /dbang bskur dus su ye shes kyang / /dbab pa de bzhin sdig la
sogs/ /mtshan ma me long dag la ni/ /brtags te gzhan yang ci 'dod pa'i/ /mtshan ma brtag la bla ma yi/ /zhal nas yang dag shes par bya/ /nad kyi zug rngu dbyung ba'i phyir/ /gso ba'i rig pa las
gsungs pa'i/ /rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa dang / /'dus pa dang ni yan lag bcas/ /gnas bzhir 'khor lor gnas pa ste/ /lus kun khrus byas gnas bzhi ru/ /sngags pas lag pas mnye bya ste/ /me long

dkyil du brtag byas na/ /rlung la sogs pa shes par nges/ /de rjes 'khor lo de nyid la/ /gso ba'i sbyor ba shes par bya/ /dug ni brtag pa'i rim pa yang / /nad grol yan lag thams cad la/ /gang du dug zhugs
mtshan ma brtag /de nas gso ba'i sbyor ba yang / /sman dang sngags dang chu sbyar te/ /mkhas pas brtags nas gso bar bya/ /dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las mtshan ma thams cad brtag pa'i le'u ste gnyis

pa'o// // gang zhig bsrung ba'i rten de yang / /gang dang ldan pa'i rim pa yis/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo brtsam par bya/ /gtso bo'i bzlas pa khri 'am 'bum/ /bsnyen pa byas te de nas yang / /gser ram dngul las

bzo byas te/ /nang du dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa 'am/ /yang na 'dab brgyad lte bar bcas/ /rdo rje ra ba la sogs bya/ /yungs kar la sogs 'bru lnga dang / /rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang / /de nang gzhag ste rab gnas

bya/ /yongs su rdzogs nas bcing bar bya/ /gzhan yang gro ga'am shing shun nam/ /dur khrod dag gi ro ras la/ /bsang dang bgegs bskrad tshul bzhin bya/ /bzlas pa gong dang 'dra ba ste/ /dkyil 'khor yongs su

rdzogs gyur na/ /sngags kyang yongs su rdzogs par bri/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yis/ /lus ngag yid la bsrung bar bya/ /yongs su ma rdzogs zur drug la/ /dpa' bo drug gi sngags bris te/ /bsrung ba'i
lus la mtshan par bsgom/ /rtsibs mtshan drug la g.yung drung gi/ /yi ge drug ni bris pa ste/ /bsrung bya'i lus la mtshan par bsgom/ /dbus su yi ge k+Sha bris te/ /bar chad thams cad bsal bar bsam/ /

cho ga yongs su rdzogs bya ste/ /bzo byas snod ni kha dog sgyur/ /legs par sbas te spyi bo 'am/ /mgrin pa de bzhin dpung pa yi/ /tshangs pa'i bu ga longs spyod mnyam/ /sor bzhi dag tu bcing bar bya/ /gzhan yang nad
pa'am rnal 'byor pa/ /ngag la srung na dang por yang / /gdon bsal bsangs te gnas gsum du/ /thig le gsum byas sngags gsum dgod/ /gzhan yang gnas ni sum bcu bdun/ /thig le byas te sngags rnams

dgod/ /de nas go cha mtshan ma yang / /tshul bzhin mthun par shes par bya/ /de nas stan nam mal cha la/ /oM AHbadzra rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M phaT/ /sgo 'am gzhan la'ang bri bar bya/ /gzhan yang lag pa g.yas pa yis/ /mthil

du gur kum dag sbyar te/ /g.yon gyi sbom mo khro mo yis/ /spyi bo dpral ba rna ba mig /sna dang kha dang mgrin pa dang / /dpung pa snying ga lte ba dang / /'og gi snod gnyis yan lag la/ /sngags dang bcas mas legs par
'tsho/ /gzhan yang skud pa sna lnga la/ /sngags dang bcas na bsrung bar 'gyur/ /dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa/ /de

nyid la ni phyag 'tshal te/ /rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo de ltar na/ /ye shes bye brag ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /ye shes kyis ni de nyid kyi/ /rtog pa rab

tu bshad par bya/ /de la ye shes kyi ni gnas/ /rnam pa lnga ru shes bya ste/ /phyi dang nang dang bsang ba dang / /rab tu gsang dang gsang ba che/ /nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /de la phyi yi ye shes ni/ /sku mdog

phyag mtshan dang 'brel ba'o/ /de ltar rtogs pa phyi'i ye shes/ /nang gi phung sogs lha ru rtogs/ /de nyid dang bral ye shes so/ /de nas gsang ba'i ye shes ni/ /rtsa dang rlung dang thig ler rtogs/ /rtog pa de

dang bral ba ni/ /gsang ba'i ye shes yin par bshad/ /dga' ba mchog dang bral ba'i dga'/ /lhan cig skyes dga' gang yin pa/ /bde bar rtog pa rnam rtog ste/ /de spong rab gsang ye shes so/ /de nas ye shes chen po bzhi/ /

dang po ro mnyam mtha' spangs pa'i/ /ye shes de nyid yod pa la/ /rnam rtog spong ste de bzhin 'jog /de nyid rang rig chen po ste/ /de nyid ye shes chen po'o/ /de ltar shes na rdor 'dzin gyi/ /sa ni nges par thob pa'o/ /
dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las ye shes brtag pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas ye shes chen po'i/ /rtag pa de nyid bshad par bya/ /dang por ro mnyam gyur pa'o/ /stong pa nyid kyi ro mnyam la/ /

sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs pa/ /phung po khams dang skye mched sogs/ /rtsa dang rlung dang thig le dang / /dga' dang mchog dga' bral ba dang / /de la sogs pa thams cad kun/ /sgyu ma tsam du shes par bya/ /de nyid
gzhan rig ces bya ste/ /rang rig sems kyi de nyid la/ /gnyis su med par bsgom pa ni/ /de nyid ye shes chen po ste/ /mthar phyin brtag pa rdzogs pa'o/ /dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las

ye shes chen po'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / rdo rje snying po la sogs pa dpa' bo dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / rnal 'byor ma dang / ma mo'i tshogs thams cad rjes su yi rang

nas phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas/ g.yon phyogs nas lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /dpal stobs po che'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// // paN Di ta gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya

ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na gu h+ya tan+t+ra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub phyogs

chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi/ /rang lus rtsa yi 'khor lo bzhi'i gtso bo/ /snying po de la yang dag phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang bzhi'i de nyid bdag la gsungs/ /nyon cig rdo rje snying po'i bdag /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lha rnams kyi/ /de

nyid dang por bshad bya ste/ /drug bcu rtsa bzhi dpe byad yin/ /sum bcu rtsa bdun byang chub phyogs/ /lnga ni ye shes lnga yin te/ /dpa' bo gcig pa chos kyi dbyings/ /phyag mtshan sku mdog gzhan nas gsungs/ /gu h+ya'i rdo

rje dril bu'i tshad/ /nas dang sor tshigs yin par 'dod/ /de nyid thabs dang shes rab yin/ /don dam nyid la dbyer med de/ /bsgom bya med de sgom pa med/ /bsgoms pas thob pa ci yang med/ /rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed du

med/ /sems kyi gzhi la sku lnga dang / /ston pa med cing bstan pa med/ /'jigs dang rnam rtog kun dang bral/ /de nyid bzhi pa'i de nyid do/ /dang po rlung gi de nyid de/ /srog rtsol gnyis ni a dang ha~M/ /a ni chos rnams

thog ma nas/ /ma skyes pa yi don yin no/ /ha~M ni gzung 'dzin gnyis kyis stong / /ldang 'jug gsum ni sku gsung thugs/ /sems kyi gzhi dang sku lnga dang / /rnam par thar dang stong pa dang / /de bzhin mtshan dang

dpe byad sogs/ /de dag rlung gi de nyid de/ /de nas thig le'i de nyid kyang / /nyi zla thabs dang shes rab ste/ /sngags kyi phreng ba mtshan dpe yin/ /thig le ye shes lnga rang bzhin/ /gnyis su med pa'i de nyid yin/ /

phra mo la sogs gzhan nas shes/ /de nas 'og gi sgo dag ni/ /de nyid yang dag bshad bya ste/ /rtsa gsum sku gsung thugs kyi ste/ /rtsa lnga ye shes lnga yin no/ /tsaN+DA li ni nyi shu bzhi/ /de nyid ye shes nyi shu bzhi/ /

chos sku'i phrin las nyi shu bzhi/ /kha sbyar thabs dang shes rab ste/ /'dzag dang 'bar ba gnyis med yin/ /'khor lo bzhi ni sku bzhi ste/ /drug ni de nyid drug yin te/ /sgrol ma rlung gi de nyid de/ /me ni gos

dkar ngo bo nyid/ /bcu drug stong pa bcu drug yin/ /bzhi ni ye shes bzhi yin no/ /rnam par thar dang stong pa dang / /de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad dang / /rig sngags snyoms 'jug phra ba dgu/ /ye shes lnga bcu la
sogs pa/ /rtsa 'dab de nyid yin par nges/ /rtsa de gnas pa'i rim pa yang / /'khor lo ba thag khug pa las/ /g.yas g.yon sbrul ltar 'khril ba ste/ /phyi yi g.yas g.yon gzhu lta bu/ /gsum pa'i dbang gi

de nyid kyang / /sih+la shes rab chos dbyings te/ /ga pur thabs kyi ye shes bzhi/ /rtsa ni 'og min gnas yin te/ /dga' ba mchog dga' byang chub phyogs/ /rang bzhin dga' ba chos sku ste/ /bral ba'i dga' ba

gzugs sku gnyis/ /bcu drug stong pa bcu drug go/ /rgyud kyi tshul du sgyu ma tsam/ /gang zhig rang rig 'dod pas kyang / /dang por ngo bo shes bya ste/ /de nas de nyid shes par bya/ /gal te de nyid mi shes na/ /zab

mo'-i lam nyid sgom byed na/ /'bras bu med c-ing brlag par nges/ /lha yi de nyid ma shes na/ /dur khrod gnas pa'i srin po 'dra/ /de bzhin dur khrod srin mo 'dra/ /spyod pa'i de nyid ma shes na/ /grong khyer gnas

pa'i smyon pa 'dra/ /khyi phag srin po rak+Sha 'dra/ /phyag mtshan de nyid ma shes na/ /brgya byin lag na mtshon thogs 'dra/ /phyag rgya'i de nyid ma shes na/ /rgyal po pang gi btsun mo 'dra/ /rlung gi de nyid ma shes na/ /brgya byin spyi

bo'i du ba 'dra/ /rtsa yi de nyid ma shes na/ /tsan dan shing gi sbrul sogs 'dra/ /lus kyi gnyer ma dag dang 'dra/ /lus kyi dri ma chu dang 'dra/ /thig le'i de nyid ma shes na/ /tsan dan shing gi 'dzer pa 'dra/ /'khor lo'i

de nyid ma shes na/ /brgya byin lag na 'khor lo 'dra/ /de bzhin srid pa'i 'khor lo 'dra/ /pad ma'i de nyid ma shes na/ /'dam bu tshal gyi pad+ma 'dra/ /stug po'i de nyid ma shes na/ /mchod rten gyi ni 'khor lo 'dra/ /kha

sbyor de nyid ma shes na/ /thal mo g.yas g.yon sbyar ba 'dra/ /gnas kyi de nyid ma shes na/ /'khor lo sgyur rgyal pho brang 'dra/ /byang sems de nyid ma shes na/ /mi gtsang sgo yi lud pa 'dra/ /sih+la'i de nyid ma shes na/ /mtshon

sogs las byung khrag dang 'dra/ /dga' ba de nyid ma shes na/ /smad 'tshong ma yi 'dod chags 'dra/ /spang bya'i de nyid ma shes na/ /grong khyer med pa'i rgyal po 'dra/ /gnyen po'i de nyid ma shes na/ /rgyal po med pa'i grong khyer

'dra/ /rang rig de nyid ma shes na/ /'dus byas nam mkha' stong pa 'dra/ /gzhan yang de nyid bcwa brgyad ni/ /bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/ /thams cad sgyu ma'i tshul dang ni/ /rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bu/ /de nyid shes na

grol bar 'gyur/ /kye ho mgon po thugs rje che/ /rang rig ye shes tshol ba la/ /rang dang gzhan gyi sde pa la/ /'di la khyad par med dam ci/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /khyad par chen po de nyid de/ /gzhan

ni khyad par dbang bzhi dang / /de yi lam gyi de nyid brtags/ /chang ba bdag dang dbang phyug dang / /phyab dang byed pa po nyid las/ /rgyu sogs rgyud las khyad par 'phags/ /gang zag bdag dang bral ba'i phyir/ /nyan

thos rang rgyal theg chen dang / /rlung sogs chos kyi bdag gis bcings/ /dman pa rnams kyi snang bas khyad/ /theg chen rang bzhin lha yis khyad/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor chen po sogs/ /de nyid kyi ni khyad par che/ /
legs par bstan gyis legs par bzung / /de nas 'khor thams cad dga' zhing yid rangs par gyur to/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// //

rnal 'byor ma tsan dra mA le dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ / @/ / rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na mA la tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje

sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kye lags gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin/ /gsang ba bla na med pa yi/ /lta ba zhes pa gang gang lags/ /spyod pa gang dang gang lags pa/ /gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /lta ba shes rab pha rol phyin/ /gdod nas spros bral lhun gyis grub/ /rang rig ye shes dbyings na gsal/ /ma rig mun pas sgribs pa med/ /shes rab snying po rtser byung ba/ /lta ba

kun gyi yang rtse yin/ /don dam rang rig ye shes la/ /blang ba med cing dor ba med/ /dman dang gya nom gnyis ka med/ /bsgom pa po med bsgom bya med/ /dmigs med gnas su snying rje dang / /dmigs med gnasu
shes rab gnyis/ /blo dang lhan cig gcig gyur pa/ /nam mkhar namakha'i rang bzhin no/ /rang rig ye shes gang 'dod pas/ /mtshan ma'i rnam rtog bsgom pa min/ /dman pa rnams la skur mi gdab/ /de nyid

la yang sgro m-i gdags/ /dang por bskal par bsgoms pa dang / /rang rig skad cig thob pa gnyis/ /brgya stong la sogs char mi phod/ /dpe dang bgrang bar mi nus te/ /dper na mtsho dang rlabs rjes bzhin/ /dngos
po sgom pa bsgom pa min/ /dngos med sgom pa sgom pa min/ /dngos dang dngos med ro mnyam na/ /ma bsgoms na yang bsgoms pa nyid/ /bsgom dang mi bsgom gnyis ka med/ /'od gsal de la sems zin na/ /
gzung 'dzin dgra yi dpung rnams 'joms/ /phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bcas pa'i/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro mchod pa'i gnas/ /rab kyis mnyam gzhag rjes thob spangs/ /'bring gis rjes thob stong par lta/ /

tha mas rjes thob sgyu mar lta/ /seng ge lta bu'i lta spyod ni/ /bzhi pa yin par nga yis gsungs/ /de nas spyod pa'i rgyal po bshad/ /spyod pa rnam pa gsum yin te/ /kun du bzang po b+hu su ku/ /a ba d+hU tI gsum yin no/ /

spyod pa'i dus dang gnas dang zas/ /gang zag dang ni dbye ba dang / /ngo bo dang ni tshad dang yang / /thabs dang dgongs pa dgos pa dang / /mkhas pas kun la sbyar bar bya/ /sangs rgyas rig dang rdo rje'i rigs/ /rin chen

rigs dang pad+ma'i rigs/ /las kyi rigs dang spyod pa lnga/ /kun du bzang po'i spyod pa yin/ /sdom pa gsum la gnas pa dang / /dkon mchog gsum ni 'dzin pa dag /sangs rgyas kyi ni mchog gi spyod/ /rdo rje dril bu

phyag rgya 'dzin/ /bla ma 'dzin pa rdo rje'i spyod/ /dam tshig yid 'ong dus bzhi ru/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rin chen spyod/ /theg pa gsum dang dam chos 'dzin/ /pad+ma gar gyi spyod pa yin/ /dam tshig thams cad ldan pa dang / /ma grol

la sogs dgrol ba ni/ /rta yi rgyal po'i spyod pa yin/ /za ba nyal ba 'chag pa gsum/ /rnal 'byor chen pos gnas bya ste/ /g.yeng bas g.yeng ba spong ba ni/ /b+hu su ku yi spyod pa'o/ /rgyan 'chang ba dang bdud rtsi myang / /phyag

rgya bsten dang rnam pa gsum/ /a ba d+hU tI'-i spyod pa ste/ /rgyan la drug ste phyag rgya lnga/ /bdud rtsi bcu ste mi gtsang bas/ /mi gtsang 'khrud pa'i spyod pa'o/ /gnas ni kha na ma tho med/ /phyi nang g.yeng med gnas yin no/ /rtog

pa 'joms pa slob pa'i dus/ /grub na rdzu 'phrul ston pa'i dus/ /thabs ni gzhan gyis mthong ba dang / /sgro dang skur pa med pa'o/ /dgongs pa gnyen po'i stobs yin te/ /rnyed dang bkur sti grags pa dang / /zug rngu'i kha

zas ma yin te/ /bla ma'i dus thabs legs bsten blang / /kha zas rnam rtog chung ba yi/ /las dang po yis bya bar gsungs/ /dbye ba gsum dang bye brag ni/ /gong du gsungs pa kho na'o/ /ngo bo rtog med sems de nyid/ /
gtsang sme 'gags dang sprul pa ston/ /'di nyid 'grub pa'i tshad yin no/ /dgongs pa la yang gnyis yod de/ /gtsang sme spang ba dgongs pa'i don/ /dgongs pa dngos la rnam pa bzhi/ /rang sems brtan g.yo

brtag pa dang / /phyag rgya khyad par tshol ba dang / /des 'dul gang zag gzhug pa dang / /mi mos skur pa dgag pa'o/ /gsang sngags rgyal po'-i lta spyod kyis/ /'khor gyi dpa' bo mkha' 'gro tshogs/ /'dus dang brgyal dang

'gyel gyur pas/ /dbugs dbyung ba yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /thams cad dran pa slar rnyed nas/ /thams cad mgrin gcig 'di skad gsol/ /dngos po ro mnyam gyur pa yi/ /lta ba 'di yang ngo mtshar che/ /g.yeng bas g.yeng

ba spang ba yi/ /spyod pa 'di yang ngo mtshar che/ /chos rnams stong par ro mnyam na/ /lta dang mi lta ga la yod/ /gtsang sme bdud rtsi ro gcig la/ /spyod dang mi spyod ga la yod/ /dbang bskur ba dang rdo rje 'dzin/ /mnyam
gzhag rjes thob ga la yod/ /thams cad sems kyi ngo bo la/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa ga la yod/ /'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa/ /'khor ba thog ma med pa nas/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrib g.yogs kyis/ /

rin chen sems ni dri can byas/ /zla ba rab rib sel byed de/ /mig gis rang gi rdul mi mthong / /sems kyis da nyid ma rtogs par/ /tha dad gzung 'dzin sna tshogs 'dzin/ /de phyir lta ba'i rgyal po bstan/ /mi shes pa

yi rab rib kyis/ /bdud rtsi'i de nyid ma shes te/ /gtsang dang mi gtsang la sogs brtags/ /de phyir spyod pa'i rgyal po bstan/ /gnas pa'i rkyen dang g.yeng ba'i rkyen/ /de phyir zung 'jug rgyal po bstan/ /rkyen dang

dbang po rab 'bring gis/ /mnyam gzhag rjes thob rgyal po bstan/ /mi shes pa yi rab rib kyis/ /'khrul pas gzung 'dzin gnyis su brtags/ /de phyir sems kyi rgyal po bstan/ /lta spyod 'di la nan tan gyis/ /de nas
thams cad dga' zhing mgu nas yi rangs te/ phyi nang gi mchod pas mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /dpal ye shes phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po lta spyod zung du 'jug pa rdzogs s+ho// //
rnal 'byor ma tsan+d+ra mA le dang / dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA nA dz+wa la tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal

po dpal kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kye ma sangs rgyas kye sangs rgyas/ /ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yi/ /rgyud ni gang lags rgyal po gang / /ye shes gang lags 'bar ba gang / /dpal ni gang lags bdag la
gsungs/ /'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa/ /dpal ni gnyis med ye shes te/ /gnyis med bde chen ro las byung / /gzung 'dzin mtha' spangs rang rig go/ sna tshogs mdud pa ye shes che/ /rang byin brlab

pa lte bar te/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gsang bar ro/ /smin mtshams kyi ni mdzod spu ltar/ /thung ngu gnas shing ring du 'gyur/ /de nyid drang dang kha dbye dang / /rgyas par bya ba gsum yod de/ /dang por drang ba'i rnam

pa yang / /'drongs pa'i tshad ni gsum yod de/ /sgo gsum yon tan gsum ldan na/ /sor bzhi phyi ru 'byung bar nges/ /'br-ing la sor gnyis tha ma la/ /sor dang nas kyi tshad kyis 'byung / /sbom phra gzhan skyes phra

mo tsam/ /dang po bya gdong nyid na gnas/ /rnam thar sor gnyis skye mched bzhi/ /stong pa bcu drug khams bcwa brgyad/ /nyi shu lte bar nyi shu lnga/ /snying kha ru ni gnas pa'o/ /sman la sogs pa kun ldang bas/ /dang
ba'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya/ /rnam snang sku rags bcing ba dang / /rgyab yol dbul dang mchod pa dbul/ /gdan khri dbul dang sku khrus dbul/ /sman mchod dbul dang me mchod dbul/ /de nas reg bya'i

mchod pa dbul/ /kun rdzob lce yi rtse mo 'am/ /khro bo mdzub mo'i rtse mo la/ /bdud rtsi ri lu legs byas te/ /mkhas pas reg bya'i mchod pa dbul/ /mngon du shes pa don mi za/ /bde ba chen po'i mchod pa
yis/ /khams gsum mchod pa gdon mi za/ /dar ram men tri sor bzhi'i tshad/ /rked par ska rags dbul bar bya/ /sprul pa'i g.yas dang g.yon gnyis su/ /ras bal la sogs rgyab yol dbul/ /shing bu rigs

dang 'thun pa yin/ /sbom bra rigs kyi bdag po tsam/ /dri med sman dang snum ldan pa'i/ /zug rngu mi skyed mchod rdzas kyis/ /bai ro tsa na'i lam du mchod/ /dri zhim chu yis khrus byas te/ /khrus kyis lus la mchod pa
dbul/ /sman dang snum gyi phye ma yis/ /sgo gnyis dag tu mchod pa dbul/ /shin du dro ba'i me dag gis/ /gtum mo'i me la mchod pa dbul/ /rked pa'i tshad mnyam ka ti ka /gdan khri bstab pa'i mchod pa

dbul/ /de yis 'drongs par gdon mi za/ /de nas rgyas par bya ba yang / /gzhan ni gong dang 'dra ba ste/ /phyi nang 'dod pa'i mtshan ma kun/ /rgyas par byed pa'i las yin te/ /rgyas pa'i sbyor ba gsum byas na/ /

dper na me tog pad+ma bzhin/ /de nas dbye ba'i rim pa yang / /gong du gsungs pa thun mong ste/ /dus gsum lce yi rtse mos kyang / /bskyed na nges par kha 'byed do/ /de nyid gsum ni me rang bzhin/ /me 'bar ba yi

rkyen gyur pa/ /rlung nyid yin par gsungs pa ste/ /rkyen des me nyid 'bar bar bshad/ /gzhan yang rkyen gyi bye brag dang / /srog rtsol rlung ni dbu mar dgag /bum pa zhabs med rlung phul nas/ /sgo dgu phyi rol

drag tu bud/ /lus kyi ngal dub cha mnyams ste/ /sbyor ba rdzogs na bde ba'i rkyen/ /bde ba las ni rdo rje 'chang / /bde ba yis ni bde ba 'grub/ /rgyu bde ba las 'bras bu bde/ /rgyu yi nang na 'di mchog la/ /
'bras bu'i nang na 'di mchog go/ de nas bde ba'i rkyen gyur pa/ /srid pa dgag dang rlung dgag pa/ /gnas nas gnas su rten gzung ste/ /g.yas brkyang bas ni ro ma dgag /dpa' bo g.yas nas mkha' 'gro
g.yon/ /g.yon brkyang bas ni rkyang ma ste/ /sa gas kun dar ma ru gzung / /de bzhin zlum pos dbu mar gzung / /de dag kun gyi bye brag kyang / /dpa' bos g.yas dang gzhan gyis g.yon/ /de bzhin kun

la sbyar bar bya/ /gzhan yang gzung ba'i bye brag kyang / /dril can bu gu dgu lam gyis/ /rlung rgyu phyi ru bus byas te/ /rkang lag drag tu bsgrims byas na/ /zin par 'di la the tsom med/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro

ma gnyis kyis/ /thun mong du ni bya bar gsungs/ /bai ro tsa na las kyi rlung / /gzhan yang lam brgyad rlung rnams dag /dang po nyid du bsdam byas na/ /zin par 'di la the tsom med/ /dbye ba bsdam pa'i man
ngag go/ byed pa spel mar song gyur na/ /mi zin pa la the tsom med/ /gnas gsum dag tu k+Sha bsams te/ /dbugs gsum pa yis yar drangs te/ /lte ba'i gyen la drangs kyang zin/ /'di ni gang zag
mchog gis yin/ /mdzes pa'i spyi bo de nyid la/ /gyen du bkan dang thur du bkan/ /drang por g.yas g.yon btsan thabs la/ /ka ti'i gzer ni btsan thabs gcig /sbom po khro mos mnan pa ste/ /bla ma'i zhal

nas ma blangs na/ /lus kyi nad bzhi kun nas skye/ /chu 'gags chu so skrangs la sogs/ /lus smad nad sna nyi shu 'byung / /gzhan yang btsan thabs bcu gnyis ni/ /bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/ /bla ma mnyes
par bya ba'i phyir/ /lus srog longs spyod thams cad kyis/ /dus gsum maN+Dal dang bcas mchod/ /lus srog btang bar phangs pa bas/ /man ngag dam pa de bas phangs/ /de bas btsan thabs legs
par sba/ /man ngag chu bo'i rgyun 'dra bas/ /de nyid rgyud du shes par bya/ /zab mo'i don ston rgyal por gsungs/ /rdo rje phag mo la sogs rnams/ /gsang ba'i gsang ba rmad byung 'di/ /khyod la

gtad do dam du sbos/ /kun la spel na dam tshig nyams/ /kye ma rgyud ky-i don 'di la/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs/ /thams cad ngo mtshar cher skyes te/ /
dga' zhing mgu nas yi rang ngo / /dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang ba las kyang gsang ba rmad du byung ba rdzogs s+ho// // sing ga la'i gling gi rnal 'byor ma

tsan+d+ra mA le dang / dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsan+d+ra mA la tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal zla ba'i phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sems

dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kye ho mgon po rdo rje can/ /sgron ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi/ /nges pa gang lags tshad gang lags/ /rang bzhin grub pa ji ltar lags/ /mgon pos bdag la bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rang bzhin grub pa sgrub 'dod pa/ /bla ma'i bka' drin legs mnos te/ /dur khrod la sogs sa phyogs su/ /bar chad gsum med yon tan ldan/ /brtags pa las dang po yi gnas/ /
gang zag mchog la brtag tu med/ /yon tan ldan pa'i sar 'dug ste/ /bla med sems gzung rnal 'byor pas/ /sgo gsum dal ba'i tshad brtag ste/ /bcing ba gsum ni nges bsgoms pas/ /skye ba gcig gis
grub par nges/ /dbugs bcing kun rdzob sna rtse yin/ /yid bcings sor bzhi nam mkha'i khams/ /sems bcings rang rig bsam mi khyab/ /rgyu rkyen las ni sna tshogs las/ /sems can mos pa sna tshogs

'byung / /de dag bcings gsum dag pa yis/ /sems can bcings las nges par grol/ /bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/ /'du shes gsum gyi cha las grol/ /thig le cha gsum phra mo ni/ /yan lag lnga ldan 'byung ba'i

rim/ /sgra dang rang rig re rer snang / /stong nyid thabs dang shes rab tshul/ /sa dang lam sogs rim pa kun/ /rang bzhin gyis gnas mkhas pas sbyar/ /de nas sgron ma'i tshad bstan te/ /tshad ni spyi dang bye brag ste/ /

brgya phrag gnyis dang bcu gnyis dang / /yi ge gsum las nges 'byung ba/ /gsang ba gcod pa'i rgyud kyi tshad/ /brgya phrag gcig dang sum bcu lnga/ /yi ge bcu dgu las byung ba/ /rin chen phreng ba'i nges pa'i

tshad/ /brgya phrag gcig dang sum bcu bzhi/ /mi 'gyur bcu gsum las byung ba/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sgron ma'o/ /brgyad bcu rtsa lngar yi ge bzhis/ /ma tshang pa las gang 'gyur ba/ /gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab

pa'o/ /brgyad bcu rtsa gnyis yi ge gcig /rin chen 'bar ba'i ldang tshad do/ /sum bcu rtsa gcig yi ge ni/ /nyi shu rtsa gnyis las byung ba/ /nam mkha' mnyam pa'i tshad yin no/ /drug bcu rtsa drug yi ge drug /

dam tshig chen po'i rgyud kyi tshad/ /drug bcu yi ge nyi shu gcig /gsang ba rdo rjer rab tu grags/ /drug bcu rtsa gnyis mi 'gyur ba/ /bcu drug stobs po che yi tshad/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gcig yi ge lnga/ /nam mkha' chen po'i

tshad yin no/ /drug bcu rtsa drug yi ge drug /ye shes 'bar ba'i ldang tshad do/ /sum bcu rtsa drug yi ge dgu/ /ye shes phreng ba'i tshad yin no/ /sum bcu rtsa bzhi nyi shu bzhi/ /mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i tshad yin no/ /

sum bcu rtsa bzhi bcu bzhi dag /me yi phreng ba'i tshad yin no/ /nyi shu rtsa gnyis bcwa brgyad dag /ye shes rgyal po'i ldan tshad do/ /bdun bcu rtsa brgyad rkang ba phyed/ /chags pa'i rgyal po'i tshad yin no/ /

tshigasu bcad pa nyi shu lnga/ /ye shes bsam pa'i ldang tshad do/ /dgu bcu go brgyad las byung ba/ /ye shes gsang ba'i tshad yin no/ /nyi shu thams pa gang yin pa/ /gsang ba rdo rje rgyal po'i tshad/ /

brgya dang nyi shu rtsa gnyis ni/ /rdo rje rgyal po ra li'i tshad/ /lnga bcu rtsa gsum yi ge bcu/ /dur khrod rgyan gyi ldang tshad do/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum yi ge ni/ /bcu drug mkha' 'gro ma sdom tshad/ /lnga bcu y-i ge bcwa lnga las/ /

byung ba gsang ba bdud rtsi'i rgyal/ /bzhi bcu yi ge nyi shu bzhi/ /nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i gzhung tshad do/ /sum bcu yi ge bcu drug las/ /byung ba zla ba'i phreng tshad do/ /de nas nges par bshad bya ste/ /gsang ba'i 'khor
lo gang ston pa/ /gsang ba'i rdo rje'i dam tshig dag /ston pa dam tshig chen por nges/ /dgra drug ston pa stobs po che/ /dbang bzhi dgag sgrub gsang ba gcod/ /rang rig de ston bsam mi khyab/ /yi ge
gsum ston rin chen 'bar/ /sgo gsum lam ston nam mkha' mnyam/ /bcom ldan la sogs the tsom med/ /ston pa nam mkha' chen po ste/ /dbang bzhi'i de nyid gang ston pa/ /ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud

du nges/ /lta spyod rmad du gang byung ba/ /ston pa ye shes phreng bar nges/ /gleng bslang rnam pa lnga yi don/ /ston pa mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud/ /he ru ka dpal gang ston pa/ /me yi phreng ba'i rgyud du grags/ /

dbang gsum don ni gang ston pa/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ra lir nges/ /snod bcud rin chen ston byed pa/ /rin chen phreng ba'i ra lir nges/ /lhan cig skyes ston ye shes bsam/ /rdo rje rnyog pa med pa'o/ /lha yi de nyid gang ston pa/ /
chags pa'i rgyal po'i ra lir nges/ /nges pa lnga ston rdo rje rgyal/ /A li dur khrod brgyad ston dur khrod brgyan/ /dam tshig sdom pa mkha' 'gro gsum/ /ston pa mkha' 'gro sdom pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor

la sogs drug ston pa/ /gsang ba bdud rtsi'i rgyal po'o/ /'khrul pa 'khrul gzhi de sad pa/ /gsum ston ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud/ /ma spangs nges ston nyi 'khor lo/ /tshad nges bsgrub gsum ston zla phreng / /
rgyud sogs lnga ston ye shes 'bar/ /de nas 'khor thams cad dga' nas rgyud thams cad kyi don la yi rang bar gyur to/ /dpal zla ba'i phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// //
rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI rat+na dz+wa la tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/
dpal rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /he he rdo rje snying po dang / /mkha' spyod ma la sogs pa dag /sgo gsum legs par bsdus nas ni/ /
ra li chen po'i dbye ba nyon/ /la las byung ba thabs kyi rgyud/ /ra las byung ba shes rab rgyud/ /i byis a las gnyis med rgyud/ /thabs ni sku ste shes rab gsungs/ /gnyis med thugs su shes par bya/ /

sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin las/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi byung ba'o/ /a la la ho e ma'o/ /thabs ni la las ji ltar byung / /ra las shes rab ji ltar byung / /a las gnyis med ji ltar byung / /sku gsung thugs su
ji ltar 'gyur/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir ji ltar dbye/ /e ma'o mgon pos bshad du gsol/ /'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa/ /a las a ba d+hU tI ste/ /'di nyid las ni gnyis med rgyud/ /'byung ba'i

gnas dang rgyu ru brtags/ /la las la la nA yi rtsa/ /de las thabs kyi rgyud byung ba'i/ /rgyu dang gnas dang ngo bor brtag /ra las ra sa nA yi rtsa/ /'di nyid las ni shes rab kyi/ /ra li 'byung ba'i rgyu dang gnas/ /
ra ni chags phyir shes rab ste/ /shes rab yi ge bcu drug brda/ /la ni nub phyir thabs yin te/ /thabs kyi yi ge bzhi bcu'i brda/ /thog ma nyid nas ma skyes pa/ /a ni gnyis med rang bzhin te/ /gnyis

med blo yi spyod yul min/ /blo dang sgra ni kun rdzob phyir/ /g.yas ni thabs yin la lA nA/ /g.yon pa shes rab ra sa nA/ /a ba d+hU tI gnyis su med/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med kyi/ /ra li'i ngo bo shes par bya/ /

'dod chags rdul la lus ni thabs/ /la la nA ni sku yin te/ /gti mug mun pa ngag dang yang / /shes rab ra sa nA ni gsung / /zhe sdang snying stobs yid yin te/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'gyur ba'o/ /sku la brgyad de gsung

la brgyad/ /thugs la brgyad de nyi shu bzhi/ /ra li nyi shu bzhi ru nges/ /gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang / /tsaN+Da li dang phyag dag dang / /mkha' 'gro 'byung po nyi shu bzhi/ /de nyid brda ru nges pa ste/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbye

bso/ /gnas dang mkha' 'gro ra li dbye/ /sku gsum du ni de nyid bsdu/ /dang por rgyud kyi nges pa dang / /rgyu mi gnas dang gnas nges pa/ /gtad ba nges dang go rim nges/ /grangs nges rigs nges bcwa lngar nges/ /mdo sde 'dul

ba mngon pa yi/ /dman pa'i rim pa dang por gsung / /dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud/ /de rjes rnal 'byor nyid yin te/ /skyes pa 'dul phyir rnal 'byor rgyud/ /phyi nas rnal 'byor ma rgyud ni/ /bud med yongasu gzung phyir

ro/ /dang po rtsa ba'i rgyud gsungs te/ /de nas bshad pa'i rgyud nyid do/ /de nas rgyud ni phyi ma'o/ /de rjes phyi ma'i phyi ma ste/ /rim pa bcu ni bskor ba ste/ /snod ngan dman pa'i rim pas gsungs/ /me tog snying po'i bcud

bzhin du/ /phyi yi phyi nas bdud rtsi yi/ /ra li'i snying po snying po rgyud/ /dang por la las sku yi rgyud/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro mas zhus nas/ /sku yi mkha' 'gro brgyad la gtad/ /de rjes ra las gsung gi rgyud/ /

gsung gi mkha' 'gro brgyad la gtad/ /phyi nas a las thugs kyi rgyud/ /thugs kyi mkha' 'gro brgyad la gtad/ /gnyis med ye shes bdud rtsi'i ro/ /lus las lus gsal mig gi lus/ /gsal ba'i phyir na sgron ma

ste/ /seng ge'i gzugs 'dra bdud rtsi'i ro/ /nyi ma'i 'od 'dra zla ba'i zer/ /'brug gi sgra 'dra rgya mtsho'i gting / /chu bo'i rgyun 'dra ri rab lhun/ /u dum 'ba' ra zhing gi rdul/ /'di la 'dod 'dod tshol ba dang / /rtog

ge pa yis dpyad du med/ /gal te rang 'dod dpyad gyur na/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro khros gyur te/ /mgo lus tshal pa rgya ru 'ges/ /de bas rang gi chung ma dang / /bu dang yul 'khor lus ngag gis/ /bla ma dam pa

mnyes bya ste/ /chu bo'i rgyun 'dra'i man ngag blang / /kye ma'o mgon po snying rje can/ /ra li'i dbye ba de ltar na/ /de yi chen po ji ltar lags/ /nang du nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi/ /nges pa slar yang bdag la gsungs/ /rdo rje

can gyis bka' stsal pa/ /ma spangs nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis/ /ra li'i 'di ni chen por nges/ /re re la yang chen po bdun/ /gang zhig 'bras bu 'dod pa la/ /rgyu nyid gtso bor gyur pa ste/ /sA lu las ni myu gu bzhin/ /

de phyir dang po rgyu mi spang / /lhan cig skyes gnyis rgyu yin te/ /rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa dang / /lhan cig lhan cig skyes pa'o/ /thun mong dang ni thun mong min/ /bla ma'i zhal nas shes bya'-i phyir/ /dpa'

bo mkha' 'gro'i zhal yin te/ /de nyid ston pa'i bka' las 'das/ /de las 'khrul pa snying re rje/ /phung sogs rtsa dang shu kra ni/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu yin te/ /log rtog 'khrul pa rgyur 'dod dang / /

ngo bo ma grub rgyur 'dod dang / /kun rdzob byang sems rgyur 'dod pa/ /'di ni rmongs pa ma rungs pa/ /phung po 'byung ba dbang po dang / /phyi yi skye mched dman po'i rgyu/ /brtags pa rgyur 'dod snying re rje/ /
nam mkha'i me tog gi dri gang / /rang bzhin gnas pa'i rtsa rlung sogs/ /khyad par lam gyi rgyu yin te/ /rang bzhin gnas pa ma shes par/ /log par rtogs pa snying rje nyams/ /don dam byang chub sems

kyis ni/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes rgyu/ /bla ma ma bsten de las 'khrul/ /kun rdzob shu kra rgyur 'dod pa/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu 'khrul pa'o/ /rkyen med rgyu yis 'bras mi 'byin/ /de phyir rkyen ni spang mi bya/ /ye shes

rlung dang ye shes me/ /lhan skyes gnyis med rkyen yin te/ /de nyid spang bar mi bya zhing / /las kyi rlung dang me nyid dang / /gzhan du'ang de nyid sbyar bar bya/ /srid pa len dang bde ba len/ /las mi spang zhing bde ba

yang / /mi spang ba ni bzhi pa'o/ /lus dang lus kyi snying po'i rtsa/ /gnas dang gnas chen mi spang ba/ /lnga ba drug pa yin par 'dod/ /de nyid phyi dang nang du shes/ /phyi ni dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/ /snang ba dang ni mun pa'i cha/ /

gang ba dang ni stong pa'i cha/ /'pho ba ma spangs brgyad pa'o/ /rgyu yi gnas dang 'bras bu'i gnas/ /de nyid mi spang shes par bya/ /rin po che yi pho brang du/ /rten n-i mi spang shu kra gzung / /gal te de ru ma zin na/ /shor ba

mi spang ro mar bstim/ /gnyen po mi spang gzugs sku gnyis/ /ma spangs pa ni bcu gnyis pa'o/ /nor bu'i rten las skyes pa yi/ /bde ba la rten dbang po yi/ /sgo bsdu ngo bo ma spangs pa'o/ /gong 'og khyad
par shes byas nas/ /sgyu mas gnyen po ma spangs pa'o/ /dga' ba mchog dga' shes byas te/ /sngon du 'gro ba ma spangs pa'o/ /'khor ba lugs las bzlog bya ste/ /gnas nas gnas su zlog byed pa/ /
gnas kyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o/ /de nyid rim par 'pho byed pa/ /bla ma'i bla ma las brgyud shes/ /'khor ba 'jug ldog bye brag ni/ /'pho ba ma spangs rnam pa gnyis/ /ye shes me ni cher 'bar bas/ /

phung po 'byung ba dbang po sogs/ /thams cad bdud rtsir gyur pa ni/ /rkyen gyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o/ /lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga dang / /brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po kun/ /bde ba'i ngo bor gang snang ba/ /ngo bo'i

khyad par ma spangs pa'o/ /de nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin med/ /gnyen po'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o/ /bzhin mdzes mig yangs phyag rgya ni/ /ldan pa phyag rgya ma spangs pa'o/ /dam tshig chos kyi phyag rgya dang / /de nas ye

shes phyag rgya che/ /phyag rgya'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o/ /chags pa'i phyag rgya las yin te/ /dam tshig chos ni ma ning gi/ /phyag rgya gnyis su shes par bya/ /ye shes phyag rgya chen po gnyis/ /grol ba'i phyag

rgya yin par 'dod/ /phyag rgya'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/ /dang por gsang ba'i 'khor lor te/ /phyi nas rang bzhin 'khor lor yin/ /'khor lo'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/ /dang por gsang ba'i gtum mo ste/ /gnyis

par rang bzhin gtum mo ni/ /gtum mo'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/ /las kyi rlung dang me gnyis ni/ /kun rdzob 'khor ba'i rkyen yin te/ /ye shes rlung dang me gnyis ni/ /don dam gnyis med rkyen yin te/ /rkyen gyi

dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/ /srid pa skyed cing 'dzag pa bde/ /kun rdzob shu kra'i las yin no/ /srid pa mi len rang rig skyes/ /don dam byang sems las yin no/ /las kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/ /sbyor thabs rtsa ni rgyas

pa dang / /kha 'byed pa yi las yin te/ /sbyor thabs bzhi la ma rmongs pa/ /'di ni ma spangs nyi shu brgyad/ /spyi mthun las las grub pa yi/ /mi drug la sogs grangs kyis bstan/ /rang rig ye shes gang 'dod pas/ /

bla ma'i dus thabs legs bsten te/ /mi spang nges pa'i gdam ngag blang / /'di nyid rdo rje 'chang gi rgyu/ /de las byung ba khyad par 'bras/ /dang por cha ste thig le dang / /tshul dang tshul can mchog gzhan mchog /'di

nyid de nyid drug yin te/ /de nyid drug ni tsaN+Da li/ /re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste/ /tsaN+Da li ni nyi shu bzhi/ /ra li nyi shu rtsa bzhir nges/ /phyi ru gnas ni nyi shu bzhi/ /spyan dang phyag rgya nyi shu bzhi/ /tsaN+DA li dang ra li yi/ /

phyi dang nang du grangs su nges/ /he he dpa' bo rdo rje 'chang / /ra li'i 'byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ /ra li'i ngo bo gang gang lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sku dang phyag mtshan rags pa kun/ /ra li'i

ngo bo dman pa'i lam/ /mkha' spyod sa spyod sa 'og spyod/ /sgo gsum la gnas khyad par gyi/ /ra li'i ngo bor gsungs pa yin/ /dga' ba bcu drug rten dang bcas/ /zab pa'i ra li'i ngo bor brtag /rang rig stong

pa thabs dang bcas/ /mthar thug ra lir shes par bya/ /a ni thog mar ma skyes pa/ /la ni nub dang skyong ba ste/ /ra ni chags dang rin po che/ /ra las 'dod chags khrag yin te/ /la las zhe sdang khu ba'o/ /a

las gti mug khu ba ste/ /sems can ra li'i rang bzhin te/ /ye shes lnga dang sa bcu sogs/ /kun la ldan pas ra lir gnas/ /sku yi ra li spyi bo yi/ /gtsug tor dag las byung ba'o/ /gsung ni ljags kyi dbang

po las/ /thugs kyi ra li thugs ka nas/ /byung ba rnam par nges pa'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /spyan rnams la ni rim bzhin byung / /sku gsung thugs kyi gnas la ste/ /spyi bo la sogs dag las byung / /

phyag gi mthil nas rim pas byung / /bla ma'i zhal nas blang bar bya/ /bye brag 'byung ba'i sgo yin te/ /he he sems can sangs rgyas kyi/ /rang bzhin sa dang lam ldan te/ /zla ba bcu sogs sa sogs ni/ /brdzus
skyes la sogs ji ltar lags/ /'on te sangs rgyas min nam c-i/ /sems can thams cad gzod ma nas/ /sangs rgyas yin par gsungs pa ste/ /rdzus skyes sgong skyes drod gsher sogs/ /sems kyi

gnas bcu sa bcu ste/ /rnam shes brgyad ni byang chub lnga/ /mkhan po sems kyi rgyal po ste/ /rang bzhin dag pa chos gos yin/ /rang bzhin gnas pa kha spu bregs/ /a dang ha~M gnyis sngags kyi don/ /thams cad
sems la gnas pa ste/ /sems med sangs rgyas ma yin te/ /ngam grog la sogs bems po yi/ /sems nyid sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir/ /sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin no/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshul dang
yang / /bag la nyal dang kun du rgyu/ /nus pa'i tshul dang mngon sum tshul/ /gzugs can gzugs med mkhas pas brtags/ /sangs rgyas sems can de bzhin no/ /de ltar sems can sangs rgyas pas/ /ra li

sems can rang bzhin phyir/ /lus la sku yi phyag rgyas gdab/ /ngag la gsung gi phyag rgyas gdab/ /sems la thugs kyi phyag rgyas gdab/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin du/ /dngos po ro mnyam gyur pa las/ /

sangs rgyas sems can ga la yod/ /dman dang gya nom ga la yod/ /'khor ba yongs su shes pa la/ /mya ngan 'das zhes de la brjod/ /thams cad 'jigs dang rnam rtog spongs/ /'di la thams cad ngo mtshar gyi/ /

legs par gtad kyis dam du sbos/ /de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te mi snang bar gyur to/ /dpal rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogas+ho// // rnal 'byor ma zla ba'i phreng ba dang
lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI sUr+ya tsakra tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal nyi ma'i 'khor

lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /a la la ho dpa' bo kye/ /ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yi/ /bskyed dang rdzogs pa chen po ste/ /ma spangs pa dang nges pa dag /mgon pos

bdag la bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dang po ma spangs bshad bya ste/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dag /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rgyu ma spangs/ /phyag mtshan nyi zla yig 'bru dag /

bla ma'i man ngag rkyen ma spangs/ /lus ngag sgo bsdams dam tshig las/ /sku gnyis 'byung ba 'bras ma spangs/ /zhe sdang ru drar skye ba'i las/ /zhe sdang rang rig bskyed pa dang / /lus kyi dri ma 'khrud pa las/ /las kyi

dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/ /pul+li ra dang dzA lan sogs/ /nang du spyi bo spyi gtsug sogs/ /gnas kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/ /shar sogs bdud kyi snying ga ru/ /zhabs gnas gnas chen ma spangs pa/ /gnas de phyi dang

nang du shes/ /gnas kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/ /gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa bzhin/ /phung sogs lha ru 'pho byed pa/ /'di ni 'pho ba ma spangs pa'o/ /rgyu yi gnas ni snying ga ste/ /'bras bu'i gnas ni phung sogs

te/ /ma spangs pa ni gnyis su shes/ /phung sogs sgyu mar 'dzin byed pa/ /'di ni rten pa ma spangs pa'o/ /gal te nang du ma zin na/ /phyi ru de nyid ngo bor bsgom/ /de nyid shor ba ma spangs pa'o/ /gnyen po ma
spangs sgyu mar bsgom/ /phung sogs la brten lha rnams la/ /sgo gsum ngo bo ma spangs pa/ /tha mal pa dang bskyed rim gnyis/ /gong 'og khyad par shes bya ste/ /sgyu mas gnyen po ma spangs pa'o/ /bdun
po rnam dag la sogs pa/ /sngon du 'gro ba ma spangs pa'o/ /phung sogs rtog pa las logs nas/ /phra ba'i gnas su gnas byed pa/ /gnas kyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o/ /lha yi rnam par 'jug pa dang / /
gong du sgyu mar bzlog pa gnyis/ /'pho ba'i khyad par ma spangs nyid/ /ye shes me ni cher 'bar te/ /phung sogs sgyu mar gang 'dzin pa/ /rten gyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o/ /mnyam gzhag rjes thob

kun 'gags ste/ /thams cad rten dang brten par snang / /ngo bo'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o/ /de nyid sgyu ma rang bzhin med/ /gnyen po'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o/ /shes rab phag mo ma spangs pa/ /phyag rgya ma spangs pa

ru 'dod/ /ma spangs gcig ni gzhan dang 'dra/ /gong 'og las kyi khyad par ro/ /zhe sdang thugs la 'dod chags gsung / /gti mug sku yi phyag rgya ste/ /phyag rgya'i dbye ba ma spangs pa/ /sku dang gsung dang

thugs 'khor lo/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo dag /'khor lo'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/ /dang po sgyu ma'i ye shes me/ /gnyis pa sgyu ma ltar snang me/ /gtum mo'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/ /phung sogs sgyu ma

las g.yo zhing / /phung sogs sgyu mas yang dag bsreg /kun rdzob rtogs pa'i rkyen yin te/ /sgyu ma ltar snang las g.yo zhing / /sgyu ma de nyid lhar bsregs pa/ /don dam gnyis med rkyen yin te/ /rkyen gyi
dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/ /'khor ba spong zhing rnam rtog bskyed/ /kun rdzob bden pa sems kyi las/ /'khor bar mi 'khor rang rig bskyed/ /don dam sems kyi las yin te/ /las kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa/ /'di

dag ma spangs nyi shu brgyad/ /bum pa'i dbang dang 'bral ba'o/ /gsang dbang bla ma'i zhal nas blang / /bzhi pa'i ma spangs nyi shu brgyad/ /rang rig lhan cig skyes pa yi/ /chos nyid ma dag bzhi pa'i rgyu/ /zhal gyi man ngag

rkyen ma spangs/ /'gro ba'i chos rnams rang rig mes/ /bsregs pa las ma spangs pa yin/ /gong 'og rim pas dbye ma spangs/ /a ba d+hU tI 'og min gnas/ /gnas dang gnas chen ma spangs pa/ /de nyid phyi dang nang

du nges/ /phyi nang dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/ /stong pa dang ni gzung 'dzin char/ /'pho ba ma spangs a dang ha~M/ /rten ma spangs te rtog pa la/ /sems 'phros de nyid rang rig bsgom/ /shor ba ma spangs par rig la/ /dbang

po'-i sgo bsdu ngo ma spangs/ /rtog bcom gnyen po ma spangs pa'o/ /rang rig spyi la sems pa las/ /sngon 'gro ma spangs ma spangs brgyad/ /bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/ /spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid la/ /

'pho ba ma spangs rang rig bsgom/ /phyag rgya ma spangs rang rig las/ /phrin las nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'byung / /las ma spangs te gzhan rnams ni/ /bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/ /dad med bla ma ma bsten dang / /bla ma dam pa ma rnyed

dang / /ma spangs ngo bo ma shes par/ /rang rig 'bras bu gang 'dod pa/ /de dag mi shes dri mas bsgribs/ /dper na sbrul gyi 'o ma bzhin/ /de nas nges pa bcwa lnga yang / /rgyu dang rkyen dang gnas dang yang / /gtad ba go rim

grangs dang rim/ /nges pa bdun ni gzhan du gsungs/ /sngags ni spros bcas spros med nges/ /rkyen ni ye shes me rlung nges/ /rgyu 'bras gnas ni a ha~M nges/ /dbang bzhi gong 'og khyad par nges/ /sun 'byin gnyen po nges pa dang / /

ngo bo nges dang dbye ba nges/ /las nges pa dang bcwa lnga ste/ /de las byung ba'i nges pa dag /bcu bdun bla ma'i zhal nas shes/ /ma spangs pa dang nges pa yi/ /mtshan nyid yongs su shes gyur na/ /'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul
pa'i gzhi/ /thams cad 'di yis spong bar byed/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /dngos grub thams cad 'di las 'byung / /gong bu chu dang gzugs su gnas/ /de bzhin gzugs las 'das pa ste/ /gnas pa

rnam pa bzhi ru yang / /rgyud ni nges pa kho na ste/ /rgyud ni dbang po'i ngo bor gnas/ /de phyir dngos grub 'dod pas kyang / /'bad pas bla ma mnyes bya ste/ /rgyud kyi ngo bo dbang rnams dang / /de yi man ngag shes par bya/ /

bla ma mnyes par ma byas shing / /dbang rnams thob par ma byas par/ /nyan pa la sogs byed pa n-i/ /'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur/ /de bas 'bad de nan tan bya/ /dpal nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po

rdzogs s+ho/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na rA dza tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal ye
shes rgyal po'-i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ / dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kye ma sangs rgyas kye sangs rgyas/ /kye ma sangs rgyas mdzad pa legs/ /gang phyir sems can thams cad kyis/ /mya ngan
'das pa thob bya'i phyir/ /dad dang brtson 'grus rdzogs byas te/ /bla ma'i rjes su 'jug par bya/ /rang rig gnyis su med pa la/ /gzhan rig gnyis su 'dzin pas 'khrul/ /gzod nas ma skyes ma grub la/ /

skye dang grub par 'dzin pas 'khrul/ /dngos po ro mnyam gyur pa la/ /dman dang gya nom 'dzin pas 'khrul/ /'khor ba yongs su shes pa nyid/ /mya ngan 'das par brjod pa la/ /sangs rgyas sems can rtog pas
