'khrul/ /rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa la/ /rgyu dang rkyen gyis skye bas 'khrul/ /brda dang tha snyad bral ba la/ /blo yi spyod yul byed pas 'khrul/ /mtha' bral dbu mar gnas pa la/ /rtag dang chad par 'dzin pas
'khrul/ /shes brjod yul las 'das pa la/ /bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pas 'khrul/ /dngos po mtshan ma la sogs pa'i/ /rnam rtogs kun gyis stong pa la/ /dngos por rjesu 'dzin pas 'khrul/ /rang nyid
gnyis su med pa la/ /bden pa gnyisu 'dzin pas 'khrul/ /gdul bya sna tshogs 'dul ba yi/ /theg pa du ma'i gong 'og la/ /sgro dang skur ba 'debs pas 'khrul/ /sems can 'khrul pa sna tshogs kyis/ /las
kyis rnam smin la sogs la/ /lta bas skur ba 'debs pas 'khrul/ /rang rig gzod nas 'od gsal la/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin par 'dod pas 'khrul/ /'khrul pa dang ni
'khrul pa'i gzhi/ /'dod chags 'dod chags chen po ste/ /'khrul gzhi 'khrul pa las 'das na/ /'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /zhe sdang zhe sdang bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin zhe
sdang bcom ldan 'das/ /gti mug gti mug chen po ste/ /de bzhin gti mug bcom ldan 'das/ /'di yis nges par grol 'gyur gyis/ /'di spangs gzhan gyis grol ba min/ /bdag po lha dang bla ma spun/ /bdag

po lhan cig rnal 'byor tsam/ /theg pa spyi bsdus de las gzhan/ /skye bo'-i bems po cha dang brgyad/ /de dag rang rig thob pa'i rgyu/ /de phyir dam tshig gtso bor bsrung / /'bras bu'i khyad par rang rig 'byung / /kye ma

mgon po kye sangs rgyas/ /'dod chags dbye ba de ltar na/ /de yi ngo bo ji ltar lags/ /zhe sdang la sogs de dang 'dra/ /rdo rje snying po snying rje che/ /legs par nyon la yid la zung / /las dang las kyi rnam smin
gyi/ /rgyu 'bras mi shes gti mug ste/ /lus sems kun nas 'khrug pa dag /zhe sdang yin te sgo gsum gyis/ /kun nas bslang ste nor bu'i mthar/ /sa bon 'byung ba 'dod chags so/ /dbang sogs ngo bo gang las

shes/ /'dod chags la sogs chen por nges/ /rang rig ngo bo gang la gnas/ /'og ma spong ba'i gnyen po ste/ /ngo bor sgyu mar gang shes dang / /dbang po'i sgo bsdus thabs yin no/ /gong ma skye ba'i rgyur
'gyur ba'i/ /phyir yang chen por gyur pa ste/ /gzhan gyi don du gyur pa dang / /de las gzhan dag mos 'gyur dang / /mang po mi mos spong ba dang / /nyon mongs spyi yis zil ma non/ /bye brag 'dod

chags zhe sdang sogs/ /zil gyis mi non 'og ma yi/ /rnam rtog gang yang mi skye dang / /nyon mongs spyi dang bye brag spong / /gnyen po yin par nges pa dang / /nyon mongs skra rtse tsam mi skye/ /gnyis ni gong

dang 'dra ba ste/ /bcu yis 'dod chags chen po dag /bcom ldan 'das su gsungs pa ste/ /zhe sdang la sogs de bzhin no/ /zab mo'-i lta spyod ma rtogs par/ /sngags spyod bzlas pa la sogs byed/ /de dag ngal

ba don med yin/ /de dag bla ma dam pa las/ /man ngag dam pa btsal bya ste/ /'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul gzhi las/ /sad par byed pa'i cho ga blang / /de'i tshe rgyud kyi don la dga' zhing rjes su yi rang bar gyur to/ /
dpal ye shes rgyal po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /

@/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra DA ki gu h+ya tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kye ho mngon rdzogs mgon po kye/ /dbang rnams dam pa

yod dam ci/ /gtso 'khor khyad par med dam ci/ /sems can dang ni sangs rgyas la/ /bye brag tha dad med dam ci/ /dam tshig che chung ji ltar mchis/ /de nyams bshags thabs yod dam ci/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi

bka' stsal pa/ /rnam rtog gzung 'dzin dgag pa dang / /rang rig ye shes blugs pa'i phyir/ /dbang rnams sgyu ma tsam du yod/ /rnal 'byor sems kyi ngo bo ru/ /dbang ni nges pa kho na ste/ /lus ngag kun nas

bzang ba la/ /de phyir sems kyi dri ma ni/ /'khrud dang gtor dang sreg pa dang / /mkhyen pa'i rten dang go 'byed pas/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung / /nam mkha' lta bur gsungs pa ste/ /dang po gnyis pa gsum pa
dag /rims kyis ma bgrod dbang mi thob/ /bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas shing / /rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod rnams la/ /thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /skas kyi rim pa lta bur gsung / /
gang zag mchog dang las dang po/ /mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa dang / /mngon par rtogs pa'i yan lag go/ /'di yis ngan 'gro srid las grol/ /dbang dang dman ngag 'brel bas so/ /de nas bzhi pa zhal gyi

dbang / /sngon du 'gro dang mi 'gro med/ /'d-i ni dbang gi rgyal po ste/ /slob dpon sems kyi rgyal po yin/ /'di ni rang rig bzhi pa'i dbang / /'di yis thams cad grol bar 'gyur/ /'di la rtag tu phyag sogs bya/ /
rdo shing 'dra 'bag la sogs pa'i/ /gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs pa dang / /ras dang tshon la sogs pa yi/ /gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs pa la/ /byin brlabs ye shes dbab byas nas/ /lha yin zer nas

mchod sogs te/ /bcos ma la sogs de ltar na/ /phung sogs ye nas sangs rgyas la/ /ci yi phyir na mchod mi byed/ /de nas gzhan yang dbye ba dag /'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul pa'i gzh-i/ /bcos ma nye bar bcos ma dang / /
'dra ba yin pa lta bu yi/ /dbang bzhis grol bar mi 'gyur te/ /log pa'i sred pas srid par 'ching / /'khrul pa'i 'khor los 'khor bar 'khor/ /de bas dngos grub 'dod pas kyang / /lha yi bu yi bdud spang

te/ /bla ma dam pa rtag tu bsten/ /yid ches rigs dang nges pa skye/ /lung gi tshad ma yin pa dang / /'og ma spangs shing gong ma thob/ /man ngag tshad ma yin pa blang / /mos pa'i rjes su 'brang byed cing / /che ba'i nga rgyal

la gnas shing / /'jig rten lta spyod dang 'dres pa'i/ /snod bcud blang bar mi bya'o/ /de nas gtso 'khor bye brag kyang / /gnas kyi khyad par dbus su ste/ /rgyan gyi khyad par thal ba'o/ /rigs kyi khyad par drug pa'i rigs/ /

de nas gtso 'khor bye brag kyang / /phyag dang zhabs sogs khyad par gyis/ /gtso bo 'khor las khyad par 'phags/ /dper na pha rol phyin drug las/ /shes rab pha rol phyin med na/ /pha rol phyin pa lnga dag gis/ /

pha rol phyin pa'i ming mi thob/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su gang gnas pa'i/ /de nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor ste/ /gang zhig dbus su mi gnas na/ /'khor rnams dkyil 'khor du mi 'gyur/ /dper na rgyal po med pa yi/ /grong

dang grong khyer ji bzhin no/ /de bzhin dam tshig bye brag kyang / /rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /yan lag dam tshig de dang 'dra/ /thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /sku gsung dam tshig de dang 'dra/ /srog gcod dam tshig nyams

gyur na/ /brdzun dang ma byin len pa dang / /'dod chags dam tshig de dang 'dra/ /lta ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /spyod pa'i dam tshig de dang 'dra/ /tshul 'chos mi dge mos pa tsam/ /dam tshig nyams pa de dang 'dra/ /

dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / /bral ba'i rin chen bdun po de dag gis/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i ming ni mi thob bzhin/ /bla ma'i zhal nas thams cad shes par bya/ /de nas sangs rgyas sems can yang / /

rdul tsam khyad par med mod kyang / /rang rig gzhan rig rkyen dag dang / /rang sems las su rung ba dang / /ma rung pa dang las kyi mtha'/ /log pa dang ni ma log pa/ /don byed nus dang mi nus pa/ /yongasu
rdzogs dang ma rdzogs pas/ /sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su snang / /tha dad par ni mi brtag ste/ /chu khams gser dang nam mkha' bzhin/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dag par 'dod/ /rang sems rang gis rtogs
pa na/ /sems can gdod nas sangs rgyas so/ /rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa/ /srog gcod la sogs dam tshig gi/ /dbye ba khyed kyis bdag la gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rang gi
lus ngag sems g.yos kyang / /gsod pa'i 'du shes ma skyes na/ /srog gcod nyams pa chung ngur nges/ /gzhan gyis gnod par tshor ba dag /nyams pa 'bring du gsungs pa yin/ /de las bzlog pa chen por

nges/ /gang zhig ma byin chung blangs kyang / /gzhan la nyon mongs cher skyes na/ /de nyid nyams pa 'bring du nges/ /cher blangs nyon mongs chung na 'bring / /chen po las ni nyon mongs cher/ /de ni chen po kho nar

nges/ /tshul 'chos ltung ba chen po ste/ /mi shes pa dang bag med dag /brjed ngas la sogs 'bring du gsungs/ /gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa yi/ /che 'bring chung ngu'i ldang tshad dag /rang dang gzhan dang gnyi

ka yis/ /rgyu rkyen dag las shes bya ste/ /ltung ba'i ngo bos zin pa dang / /phyi nang rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /spyan sngar dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs/ /tshul dang 'thun par bshad pa bya/ /dam tshig gong 'og

bye brag gis/ /bla ma'i dkyil 'khor shes par bya/ /gzhan yang bshags pa'i bye brag la/ /sbyin sreg gis ni sd-ig bsreg phyir/ /nang gi sbyin sreg chen po brtsam/ /zab pa'i me ni rgyun gzhag med/ /thabs
ky-i rgyun gzhag me yin te/ /lo bdun dang ni lo gcig dag /phyi yi rgyun gzhag chen po'i me/ /zla ba bdun dang gsum dag ni/ /'bring du gsungs te zhag bdun sogs/ /rgyun gzhag me ni chung ngur gsungs/ /
rgyas pa la sogs de bzhin te/ /rang bzhin gdod nas gnas pa yi/ /gtum mo ye shes me rang bzhin/ /'di n-i rgyun gzhag chen po'-i me/ /thog mtha' med par gnas pa'i phy-ir/ /dam tshig nyams pa'i bud
shing sogs/ /ye shes me yi bud shing yin/ /man ngag can gyis bsregs byas na/ /nyams pa'i shing sogs 'tsh-ig par nges/ /dgang gzar la sogs de bzhin te/ /rgyas pa la sogs de dang 'dra/ /

rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung / /thams cad dga' zhing mgu bar gyur/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+wa la ag+ni gu h+ya tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba me 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ / bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos
pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa'i nang na rdo rje phag mos gsol

pa/ rnal 'byor gang lags 'pho ba gang / /'chi ba gang lags shi ba gang / /ro n-i gang lags ro chen gang / /de bzhin shi ba chen po gang / /thal ba gang lags thal chen gang / /tsha tsha gang lags tsha tsha yi/ /chen po
gang lags gnas ni gang / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa/ /rnal 'byor zhes ni gsungs pa yin/ /dus min

lha ni gsod pa ste/ /dang por 'pho ba'i rtags dang yang / /dus tshod nges par shes bya ste/ /bar chad med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /'khrul 'khor bcas te khyad par gyis/ /'bras bu 'byung bar 'pho bar nges/ /

khams dang 'byung ba so sor thim/ /srog gi rtsol ba la thim ste/ /rtsol ba rnam shes la thim pa'i/ /skad cig dang po 'chi ba ste/ /rdo rje can sogs rigs bzhi dang / /rnam snang tha dad bral ba yi/ /skad cig dang
po shi ba ste/ /de nas zhag bdun bar du gzhag /lus kyi mkha' 'gro mya ngan 'das/ /de ni shi ba chen por grags/ /lus ni ta la'i mgo bo 'dra/ /'di nyid ro zhes gsungs pa ste/ /ye shes dbab dang
ye shes brtan/ /mkha' spyod sa spyod sa 'og spyod/ /spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga ru/ /dri yi thig le gsum byas te/ /sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab/ /thog mar dri zhim sna tshogs kyis/ /khrus byas
gnas ni bcu gnyis su/ /dri yi thig le bcu gnyis bya/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gros byin gyis brlab/ /gzhan yang rgyan la sogs pa kun/ /dngos su gnas pas rab tu nges/ /ri mor bris
pa 'bring po ste/ /dri yi thig le tha mar nges/ /g.yas brkyang las sogs 'dug stangs kyis/ /he ru kar grags chen por bzhengs/ /rang rig bdag po gang yin pa/ /he ru ka ru nges pa dang / /de la dus drug

mchod pas mchod/ /'di dag ro n-i chen po ste/ /'chi ba zhes ni rnam rtog ste/ /mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid par byed/ /rang bzhin bsregs pa thal ba ste/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten nas/ /chos sku gzugs

brnyan rim bzhin brtsig /yang na bum pa lta bu yi/ /gzhal yas khang pa brtseg mar brtsig /mi 'chi bcu phyed snying po dang / /tsan dan gur kum la sogs pa'i/ /dri yis byugs shing bsgo mar bya/ /tsan dan

dmar po la sogs pa'i/ /dri zhim ldan pa'i shing bu 'am/ /yang na 'bras bu yod pa yi/ /bud shing chad dang mthun pa yis/ /thab khung chen por rdzogs par brtsig /bla ma dam pa mnyes byas la/ /zhal nas yang dag shes
par bya/ /zur bzhi rgyal po chen po bzhi/ /phyogs bzhi mi 'jigs seng ge brgyad/ /ka ba bzhi dang gdung bzhir ldan/ /cho ga yongs su rdzogs pa dang / /rig pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhug pa dang / /sngar gyi

dbang thob rdzogs par bskur/ /de nas rgyun gzhag me sbar te/ /me lha la sogs gzhan dang 'dra/ /de nas rig pa de nyid kyang / /mi yi khang pa mdzes pa ru/ /rang bzhin spyan drangs bzhugs su gsol/ /me mchod

sdig pa bsreg pa yi/ /sngags dang rdzas sogs gzhan dang 'dra/ /me dang du ba rlung sogs kyis/ /mtshan ma mkhas pas brtag bya ste/ /bkra shis rtags rnams byung na legs/ /med na sdig pa bsreg par bya/ /

dung la sogs pa byung na rab/ /ma byung na yang cho ga rnams/ /rdzogs pa las byung rus pa rnams/ /'di ni bal ba chen po ste/ /de las gzhan pa thal bar gsungs/ /de nas rus pa zhag gsum ni/ /gur gum la sogs

dris gtor te/ /rus pa'i mtshan ma brtag bya ste/ /kha dog dbyibs dang dri dang ro/ /bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/ /gdon bsal khrus bya rus pa brdung / /ma nyams dum bu gcig pa la/ /dri sogs bsgos pa'i

nang du ste/ /dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa yi/ /steng du seng ge'i khri dag la/ /seng ge rgyal chen 'og gi rgyan/ /steng nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan te/ /gnas der rus pa gzhag byas la/ /me tog byas nas

zhag lnga ru/ /bsnyen pa byas te drug pa la/ /gdung byung sta gon bdun pa la/ /tsha tsha rab tu gnas par bya/ /dang por ro bsregs dus su yang / /shi ba dang po nas gzung ste/ /zhag lnga ro yi bsnyen pa ste/ /drug pa ro y-i sta gon

no/ /bdun pa dur khrod rab tu gnas/ /dang por snang ba gnyis par ro/ /gsum pa rus pa mya ngan 'das/ /mya ngan 'das pa rnam pa gsum/ /gzhan la med cing rang la med/ /dman la med cing de rjes med/ /thabs su

ma gsungs shes rab kyi/ /rtsa brgyud bshad rgyud phy-i ma dang / /phyi ma'i phyi mar ma gsungs pa'o/ /mya ngan 'das pa rnam pa gsum/ /bdud rts-i sgron ma ra l-i yi/ /rgyud du khyod la nga yis bshad/ /de nas tsha tsha'i rim pa yang / /

snang ba rgyal po la sogs la/ /mthun pa'i gtam gyis sa sogs blang / /mi snang sa bdag la sogs la/ /gtor ma me yis sa sogs blang / /de nas skud pa rnam lnga yang / /phan pa rdo rje can dang yang / /gzi brjid gar

dang rdo rje rgyal/ /srad bus sa gzung sa sbyang sogs/ /cho ga gzhan dang mthun par bya/ /dur khrod gnas su rtsa ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs par bya/ /lha grangs du yod gtor ma gtang / /sbyin sreg dag gis

zhi byas te/ /gcig gam lnga 'am bdun nam ni/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig brgya rtsa brgyad/ /ci nus par ni gdab par bya/ /dus ni mtshan mo shes pa ste/ /dang po la ni dkyil 'khor gyis/ /phyag rgya chen po rdzogs pa ste/ /

gsum pa bzhi pa gnyis pa dag /chos kyi sku yi gzugs brnyan gdab/ /bum dbang sa la gdab pa ste/ /gsang dbang sa dang chu la gdab/ /gsum pa me dang rlung la gdab/ /bzhi pa nam mkhar gsungs pa'o/ /dang po 'pho bas

ma lhung la/ /gnyis pa ro bsreg ma lhung ba'o/ /gsum pa tsha tshas ma lhung na/ /'chi ba slu ba'i dam pa ste/ /srid pa'i 'chi ba las grol nges/ /dman pa'i 'pho ba la sogs pas/ /lhung zhing 'chi ba kho nar nges/ /de bas srid las

grol 'dod pas/ /bla ma dam pa rab mnyes te/ /'pho ba la sogs gdams ngag blang / /rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung / /de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa chen po yang g.yos par gyur to/ /mchod pa sna tshogs

pa'i char yang bab bo/ /dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma dang dur khrod na gnas pa'i ro langs chen po thams cad rgyud kyi don la rjesu yi rangs bar gyur to/ /dpal gsang ba me 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// //
paN Di ta gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI a mri ta gu h+ya tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/
dpal gsang ba bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ / bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang

gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ dkyil 'khor dbye ba ji lta bu/ /sngags dang gtor ma ji lta bu/ /sbyin sreg mchod sogs
ji lta bu/ /khyod kyis bdag la bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dang po dkyil 'khor dbye ba yang / /phyi la gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor te/ /nang du lus kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /gsang bar

b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor te/ /bzhi pa rang rig byang chub sems/ /de rnams lha yi mtshan nyid kyang / /sku mdog phyag mtshan rags pa'i lam/ /khro tshul drug bcu rtsa bzhi dang / /'bar ba'i gar dgu phyag brgya drug /mtshan

nyid sgyu ma lta bu yis/ /tha mal pa yi rnam rtog spong / /lus kyi dri 'khru zhe sdang dag /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur gyur pa'o/ /'di dag phyi yi dkyil 'khor te/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su gang gyur pa/ /de nyid kyi ni dkyil

'khor te/ /rdo rje can dang phan pa dang / /de bzhin rdo rje gzi brjid dang / /pad+ma gar gy-i dbang phyug dang / /de bzhin rta bdun rdo rje sems/ /snying po yongs gzung dkyil 'khor te/ /de dag phyi yi dkyil 'khor yin/ /

de nas nang gi dkyil 'khor yang / /rnal grol steng du gdan khri rlung / /rang gi bdag po'i lha yin no/ /dang por de nyid shes bya ste/ /rags pa dang ni phra ba dang / /zung 'jug sgo gsum nyi khri dang / /chig stong drug brgya rgyu ba tsam/ /

las ni rags pa'i lam 'joms shing / /ngag g-i dri 'khru gti mug dag /sprul pa'i sku yi rgyur gyur pa/ /mkha' spyod rlung du shes par bya/ /gang zhig snang ba bsgom pa dang / /de bzhin mun pa bsgom pa dag /nyin dang

mtshan mor rab tu grags/ /gnod mdzes lta stangs dman pa ste/ /tshul de de las bzlog pa'o/ /dang por yid bcing sna rtser bya/ /de bzhin sems bcing rlung bcing yang / /nam mkha' sor bzhi de nas stong / /de nas bar du
thig le yang / /yan lag dang bcas yan lag med/ /shin tu yan lag med pa ste/ /yan lag bcas pa bcu gsum ste/ /thabs la thabs kyi sbyor ba ni/ /bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/ /ma ning 'dus pa'i sgo ru
gsungs/ /de nas 'og sgo tsaN+DA li/ /kha sbyor dang ni stug po sogs/ /rkyen dang bcas dang rang bzhin dang / /bdag sbyang ba dang gzhan sbyang dang / /gtum mo rang bzhin sbar ba dang / /gtum mo go

bzlog sbar ba dang / /gtum mo rkyen gyis sbar ba dang / /gtum mo zhar la sbar ba dang / /gtum mo bye brag sbar ba dang / /spyi bo'i gtumo sbar ba dang / /grol ba'i rang bzhin gtum mo dang / /chags pa'i rang bzhin

gtum mo ste/ /nang gi lha yi ngo bo ste/ /gsang ba'i lha yi ring ba'i rgyu/ /de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang / /dbang po gnyis sbyor kun du ru/ /de yi phyir na b+ha ga yin/ /dga' ba la sogs sgyu ma yi/ /phra ba'i
lam spong las yin te/ /sems kyi dri 'khrud 'dod chags dag /rang rig sems kyi rgyal po'-i rgyu/ /de nas bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /chos sku skye med nam mkha' bzhin/ /rang rig stong pa 'od gsal la/ /
bsgoms pas nyes pa ma yin te/ /ma bsgoms pas kyang nyes pa min/ /bsgom pa nyid kyang rtog pa ste/ /mi bsgom pa yang rtog pa nyid/ /bsgom du rdul tsam med pa la/ /yongs su skad cig med pa 'di/ /lha yi
rgyal po yin par 'dod/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mchog gyur pa/ /rang rig ye shes me bo che/ /thams cad 'di la gnas pa ste/ /dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dag /yul dang grong khyer dag tu
mi 'gro yang / /yul na 'dod pa thams cad sdud pa ltar/ /mchod dang gtor ma la sogs pa'i/ /las dang bya ba sna tshogs kun/ /sems kyi de nyid shes gyur na/ /thams cad 'di la bsdud par nges/ /las ni zab

pa'i lam spong ste/ /sgo gsum rnam dag dug gsum 'joms/ /gzugs sku gnyis ni 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhi yin te/ /spyi yi thun mong yin par gsungs/ /de nas nang gi sbyin sreg kyang / /lte ba snying ka

spyi bo mgrin/ /rigs ni nges pa'i thab khung ste/ /sku ni spyi bo gsung mgrin pa/ /snying gar thugs te yon tan dang / /phrin las gtum mo gnyis su nges/ /rlung dang rtsa dang thig le dang / /rang bzhin gnas pa'i ye shes me/ /

me lha dag pas bdag po'-i lha/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan rnam rtogs dag /sreg rdzas bsreg ste me mchod bya/ /nye bar zhi ba sbyin pa dang / /rnam rtog sreg phyir sbyin sreg ste/ /rang lus ye shes me yis ni/ /rtog pa'i
bud shing bsreg bya ba/ /'di ni sbyin sreg tshad ma ste/ /til sogs sdig par nges pa 'am/ /las kyi me nyid ye shes sam/ /bsregs pas nges par tshig gam ci/ /sreg rdzas rtog pa sreg byed me/ /dbang p+so
spyod yul ma yin te/ /de phyir las kyi me nyid la/ /til sogs bsreg pa'i las byas kyang / /nges par sdig pa tshig mi 'gyur/ /mchod pa la sogs de bzhin no/ /bstan pa tsam du nges pa ste/ /rgyud ni don
dam ma yin te/ /don dam rtogs pas bstan pa med/ /dgang gzar blugs gzar la sogs pa/ /bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/ /de nas gsang ba'i sbyin sreg kyang / /thab khung lte ba 'am sna rtse ste/ /

chags grol gnas ni nges pa dang / /rang bzhin dang ni gsang ba yi/ /gtum mo ye shes me sbar te/ /g.yas g.yon dgang gzar blugs gzar gyis/ /shu kra rtsa dang rlung sogs kyi/ /phra mo'i rtog pa'i sreg rdzas

bsreg /bde ba'i me lha mchod par bya/ /zhi rgyas las kyi rim pa dang / /bzhi pa zhal nas shes par bya/ /de nas sngags kyi dbye ba yang / /phyi yi sngags ni oM AHhU~M/ /nang du bdud rtsi'i mtshan nyid de/ /gsang
bar mchog tshad dbus na gnas/ /mthar thug mtha' bral rang rig go/ /spos sogs phyi yi mchod pa ste/ /bdud rtsi la sogs nang du'o/ /gsang bar bde ba'i ro yis mchod/ /mthar thug stong pa'i
ro yi mchod/ /'bras sogs phyi yi gtor ma sta/ /dman pa'i bgegs sogs zhi bar byed/ /a ba d+hu tI 'i ka pA lar/ /sha sogs bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gnas/ /rnam rtog bgegs chen zhi bar

byed/ /bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i ros/ /phra ba'i gdon chen zhi byas pa/ /'di ni gsang ba'i gtor mar gsungs/ /rang rig stong pa'i bdud rtsi'i ros/ /bde chen gdon ni zhi byas pa/ /'d-i ni bzhi pa'i gtor mar

nges/ /phyag 'tshal skor ba la sogs dang / /sbyang sogs bla ma'i zhal nas shes/ /gang gi phyir na sbyin sreg na/ /dngos grub dam pa ster ba dang / /rnam rtog sreg phyir sbyin sreg ste/ /shing sogs sreg
pa sbyin sreg min/ /mnyes pa'i don gyis mchod pa ste/ /spos sogs phul bas mnyes pa med/ /rang sems las su rung ba dag /mnyes pas mchod pa chen po ste/ /gdon dang gnod pa zhi ba dang / /
bar chad zhi dang dngos grub dag /'byung ba'i phyir na gtor ma ste/ /'bras sogs phyi yi gtor ma yis/ /gdon sogs zhi bar mi 'gyur te/ /rang gi sgo gsum rnam rtog dag /gdon la sogs par snang
ba ste/ /'khrul pa'i rnam rtog ma spangs par/ /gdon sogs zhi bar mi 'gyur phyir/ /sgo gsum rnam rtog 'joms pa yi/ /sems kyi gtor ma gtor ma'i mchog /gdon dang gnod pa zhi ba dang / /
dam tshig gso dang lha rnams 'go/ dngos grub thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /phy-i nang gtor mar nges pa'o/ /rgyud rnams nye bar zhi ba dang / /lus las 'byung phyir lha yin te/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor
lha ma yin/ /lus dang yan lag lha ma yin/ /kha mig la sogs lha ma yin/ /lus las ma byung g.yeng ba'i phy-ir/ /dbang po sgo gsum g.yeng ba dgag /rang gi lus la rang lus 'byung / /

sgo gsum zhi phyir lha zhes brjod/ /yid skyob phyir na sngags yin te/ /rang sems las su rung ba dang / /rnam rtog gdon rnams las skyob phyir/ /'di ni sngags kyi rgyal por gsungs/ /gzhan yang dngos grub

'dod pa yis/ /thams cad bla ma'i zhal nas blang / /rgyud 'di gtad kyis nan tan gyis/ /de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad rgyud kyi don la yi rang par gyur to/ /dpal gsang ba bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
rdzogs s+ho/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ / @/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI sh+mA shA ni a laM kA ra tan+t+ra
rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal dur khrod rgyan gyi rgyud kyi rgyal po/ /dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jigs byed che la phyag 'tshal te/ /zhabs la spyi bos legs btud nas/ /dur khrod gang lags
rgyan gang lags/ /rgyud ni gang lags rgyal po gang / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /legs so rdo rje snying po legs/ /legs par nyon la legs par zung / /dang por dur khrod bshad bya ste/ /
dur khrod spyi dang bye brag gnas/ /gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol te/ /rdo rje ra ba'i nang rol du/ /'jigs pa chen po spyi yi gnas/ /bye brag shar la sogs pa ste/ /snod kyi zhen pa bzlog pa yang / /

lcags ri nag po tshun chad de/ /rdo rje ra bas de nyid do/ /chen po khru ni nyi shu ste/ /chung ba khru gang phan chad do/ /de las gzhan pa dkyil 'khor ni/ /tshad las nges par 'das pa'o/ /rnam shes tshogs brgyad
rnam rtog brgyad/ /mi mnga'i rtags su dur khrod brgyad/ /phyogs dang phyogs bral dag tu dgod/ /tshogs brgyad yon tan brgyad ldan pa'i/ /rtagasu shing brgyad rim pas dgod/ /de bzhin gdug pa brgyad
bcom pa'i/ /rtagasu klu brgyad rim pas dgod/ /tshogs brgyad mi dge bcu bcom pa'i/ /rtags su phyogs skyong rim pas dgod/ /lus ngag gnyis kyis sems can gyi/ /don mdzad phyir ni

char sprin dgod/ /de nyid dur khrod 'jigs pa che/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med rgyu/ /rnam rtog zil gnon brgyad por bshad/ /mdzes pa'i phyir na rgyan yin no/ /de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ /dang por

dur khrod bshad par bya/ /shar du gtum drag nag po che/ /lho ru ha har dgod ser che/ /nub tu mi bzang dmar po ste/ /byang du tshang tshing ljang gu che/ /me ru g.yer ka can yin te/ /bden bral mtshams su 'bar

ba 'dzin/ /rlung mtshams dmyal sogs gnas pa ste/ /dbang ldan du ni dbyibs can du/ /b+hu tsa ri khe tsa sha ni/ /sa stengs shar gyi phyi ru dgod/ /pa ta li dang bA sa ni/ /sa 'og nub kyi phyi ru dgod/ /dur khrod 'di
rnams mtshan nyid kyang / /'bar ba tshig dang ma tshig sogs/ /keng rus thod pa la sogs dang / /ro langs 'byung po'i tshogs dang bcas/ /lce spyang sgra yis 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /shar du shi r-i sha yi

shing / /lho ru a shwad datha yi shing / /nub tu wang ge ling gi shing / /byang du tsU ta'i shing du nges/ /gong dang mtshungs pa n+ya gro d+ha/ /parka ti lcug pA thA dag /me nas dbang ldan mtshams su dgod/ /ji ltar grags pa'i
gzugs su 'dod/ /shar du dbang po gnas pa ste/ /lho ru gshin rje gnas pa'o/ /nub tu klu dbang gnas pa ste/ /byang du gnod sbyin yang dag gnas/ /shar lhor me ni gnas pa'o/ /lho nub mtshams su
srin po gnas/ /nub byang mtshams su rlung dgod de/ /byang shar mtshams su dbang ldan dgod/ /nyi zla shar la sa bdag nub/ /ji ltar grags pa'i gzugs su dgod/ /shar du nor rgyas gnas pa ste/ /

'jog po lho ste stobs rgyu nub/ /pad ma byang la pad chen me/ /hu lu hu lu srin por dgod/ /rigs ldan rlung mtshams dgod pa ste/ /dung skyong dbang ldan mtshams su'o/ /gdug pa sbrul gyi gzugs su dgod/ /
kha dog rigs kyi dbye bas dbye/ /shar du char sprin dkar por dgod/ /lho ru pu mi ti dgod do/ /nub tu 'jigs pa rnam par gnas/ /byang du a ba yang dag gnas/ /sngo nya mer ni yang dag gnas/ /g+hA
nya srin po'i mtshamasu dgod/ /rlung gi mtshams su par sha na/ /gtum po 'di brgyad char sprin brgyad/ /btsod kyi mdog 'dra gur kum mdog /nam mkha'i mdog 'dra du ba'i mdog /sprin gyi mdog 'dra
sprin gyi gzugs/ /shar la sogs pa bzhi bzhi ste/ /'di dag nang rtags phyi ru 'byung / /dang por spangs pa phun sum tshogs/ /de nas ye shes phun sum tshogs/ /rang rig don ni phun sum tshogs/ /gzhan

don phun sum tshogs pa yin/ /rtags su 'jigs pa 'di dag gnas/ /de nas nang gi dur khrod sogs/ /lpags pa rdo rje ra ba ste/ /rus pa rdo rje gur du nges/ /dpung pa nye ba'i dpung pa ste/ /brla dang de bzhin nye ba'i

brla/ /brgyad ni dur khrod brgyad du nges/ /rje ngar nye ba'i rje ngar bzhi/ /lags ngar nye ba'i lag ngar bzhi/ /brgyad ni nang gi shing brgyad do/ /tshigs dang de bzhin nye ba'i tshigs/ /steng dang 'og tu bzhi bzhi ste/ /

nang gi phyogs skyong yin par 'dod/ /mthil dang de bzhin nye ba'i mthil/ /steng 'og de bzhin klu brgyad do/ /rtse dang de bzhin nye ba'i rtse/ /brgyad ni char sprin brgyad yin te/ /bskyed rim rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags/ /

dur khrod brgyad ni nang na gnas/ /rtsa rlung ngo bo shes pa rgyas/ /de phyir nang gi shing brgyad gnas/ /rags pa'i gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir/ /nang na klu brgyad yang dag gnas/ /bdag spyod gzhan yang spyod pa'i phyir/ /

char sprin brgyad ni nang du gnas/ /de nas gsang ba'i dur khrod kyang / /sna rtser rtsa brgyad dur khrod brgyad/ /lte bar rtsa brgyad shing brgyad do/ /snying gar rtsa brgyad phyogs skyong brgyad/ /mgrin par rtsa brgyad klu brgyad

de/ /spyi bor rtsa brgyad char sprin brgyad/ /gsang bar rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags/ /dur khrod brgyad ni gsang bar gnas/ /thams cad bde bar snang ba'i phyir/ /gsang bar shing brgyad yang dag gnas/ /phra ba'i mtshan ma'i

rnam rtog gi/ /gdug pa 'joms phyir klu brgyad dgod/ /bde bas bdag spyod gzhan sbyor bas/ /de yi phyir na char sprin dgod/ /de nas bzhi pa'i dur khrod kyang / /rnam shes brgyad ni de nyid brgyad/ /dur khrod brgyad

du nges pa'o/ /dur khrod sogs brgyad de nyid shing / /lhag ma gsum dang tshor tshogs lnga/ /brgyad ni phyogs skyong brgyad du nges/ /nyon mongs drug dang de yi gnyis/ /brgyad po dag ni klu brgyad do/ /lnga dang bzhi dag

gsum dag ni/ /de dag bzhi pa'i char sprin brgyad/ /gzung 'dzin rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags/ /bzhi pa yi ni dur khrod brgyad/ /stobs sogs mkhyen pa'i yon tan rgyas/ /rtags su shing brgyad nges pa'o/ /rnam

rtog gdug pa 'dul ba yi/ /rtagasu klu brgyad nges pa'o/ /gzugs sku gnyis kyis sems can gyi/ /don mdzad rtagasu char sprin brgyad/ /phyogs skyong bla ma'i zhal nas shes/ /de dag kun gyi bye brag kyang / /bla ma'i

zhal nas shes par bya/ /rgyun chags phy-i nang rgyud ces bya/ /rgyal po khyad par 'phags pa'o/ /gzhan yang nga yis gsungs pa'-i bka'/ /gsung gc-ig nyid du gsungs gyur kyang / /du ma nyid du so sor snang / /chos

tshul du ma'i bye brag dang / /mos pa du ma'i bye brag dang / /'du shes du ma'i bye brag gis/ /theg pa'i mtha' la thug pa med/ /sems gzung yan lag bsam mi khyab/ /nga yi rjes su 'brang ba yi/ /bla ma sa rab

non pa dang / /de nyid bcu ldan mngon shes skyes/ /de gsung bcu drug mtha' yi bar/ /rig pa'i gnas lnga mkhas pas sbyang / /mkha' 'gro ma yi lung bstan pas/ /brtsams la bzhi yi mtha' yis nges/ /de lta'i man

ngag ma thob bar/ /sngags kyi lta spyod gang spyod pa/ /rang yang phung la gzhan yang phung / /mthong ba'i chos la dmyal sogs 'tshed/ /de bas dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /bla ma dam pa mnyes byas te/ /man ngag dam

pa blang bar bya/ /nges pa'i lta spyod ma rnyed bar/ /gsang ba'i lta dang spyod pa dang / /mos pa'i rjes su gang byed dang / /nyon mongs zil non la sogs dag /gsang sngags lta bur spyad pa spyod/ /'di dag rkun po ma

rungs pa/ /mthong ba'i chos la dmyal bar skye/ /dang po srid pa skye ba yang / /yar ngo mar ngo mtshams dang gsum/ /sih+la'i dang po tha ma dang / /'bras bu sred pa skye ba yi/ /dus der kun du ru byed na/ /'byung ba'i rlung

gi nang zhugs na/ /nad gzhi bsdus shing nad gzhi skyed/ /srog dang tshangs par spyod pa 'byung / /de la 'dod pa'i mtshon chas ni/ /g.yeng ba me dang gtar ka bya/ /phyi nas rigs kyi bdag pos so/ /srid par skye ba'-i

dus tshod kyang / /rgyun chad zhag gsum zhag lnga dang / /bdun dang dgu yi dus rnams spang / /de ltar rgyud mchog rgyal po'-i don/ /khyod la gtad kyis legs par zung / /de nas 'khor thams cad dga' zhing mgu ste
rjes su yi rang par gyur to/ /dpal dur khrod rgyan gyi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// // paN+Di ta gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /

@/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra rA dza ma hA tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje rgyal po chen po'-i rgyud/ dpal sdom pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i dpa' bo mkha' 'gro grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa'i dus
su phyi nang gsang ba bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon du phyogs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de/ rdo rje snying po la sogs pas gsol pa/ rdo rje gang lags
chen po gang / /rgyud ni gang lags rgyal po gang / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /don gyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhi/ /dbang bzhi'i grangs su shes par bya/ /rnam rtog 'joms phyir rdo rje ste/ /de la

rnam pa bzhi yin te/ /phyi nang gsang ba rab gsang gnyis/ /rtse gsum rtse gcig rtse lnga pa/ /rtse dgu pa ni nyid yin no/ /bcu gnyis de nyid rdo rje ste/ /rtags kyi rdo rje bzhi yin no/ /gnyis su med pa rtse gcig
pas/ /rnam rtog thams cad spangs pa yin/ /rtse gsum sku gsung thugs yin te/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum/ /'joms pa'i phy-ir na bshad pa yin/ /rtse lnga ye shes lnga yi rtags/ /me long

mnyam nyid so sor rtog /bya ba nan tan chos dbyings shes/ /nyon mongs lnga ni spangs pa ste/ /zhe sdang nga rgyal 'dod chags dang / /phrag dog gti mug 'joms par byed/ /rdo rje rtse dgu gang yin pa/ /ye shes
rtse dgu bshad pa ste/ /khams gsum sa dgu 'joms par byed/ /'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs med khams/ /nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems/ /rig 'dzin sangs rgyas ye shes che/ /

sa dgu la ni gang sgrib pa'i/ /sgrib pa sbyong bar byed pa yi/ /rdo rje rtse dgur bstan pa yin/ /rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa/ /'khor ba'i rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi/ /spong ba'i ye shes bcu gnyis yin/ /

ma rig pa las 'du byed de/ /'du byed rkyen gyis rnam par shes/ /ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug /reg dang tshor dang sred dang len/ /srid pa skye dang rga shi ste/ /de rnams spong ba'i gnyen po ste/ /chos
kyi ye shes mngon du bya/ /de las ye shes drug rang bzhin/ /de las sku gsung thugs ngo bo/ /de las skye mched drug sangs rgyas/ /de las gnyis med reg pa ni/ /de las nyams myong bde chen po/ /rang rig

de nyid sred pa ste/ /chos kun ston byed len pa ste/ /srid pa longs spyod rdzogs sku yin/ /skye ba sprul pa'i sku ru bshad/ /rga shi rgyun dang mya ngan 'das/ /'od gsal stong chen ngang du thim/ /de phyir rdo rje bcu
gnyis pa/ /rdzas kyi rdo rje bzhi yin te/ /'bigs shing rno ba zur gsum ste/ /gru bzhis rdzas rnams brdar byas pas/ /'jam zhing dang la 'joms par byed/ /pha lam zlum pos rtsub pa 'joms/ /zur

lngas thams cad ci dgar byed/ /de nas chen po'i don bshad de/ /dmyigs dang bsam pa spyod pa dang / /brtul zhugs brtson 'grus smon lam dang / /de bzhin ye shes chen po ste/ /re re la yang bdun bdun sbyar/ /

de phyir chen po zhes ni bstan/ /rgyud ni rnam pa lnga yin te/ /phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang / /rab tu gsang dang gsang ba che/ /de rnams rgyun du gnas pa la/ /rgyu yi rgyud du bstan pa yi/ /de rnams don ni ji bzhin

rtogs/ /'bras bu'i rgyud du bstan pa yin/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis med pa/ /rgyu ni gnyis su med pa yi/ /rang rig ye shes mthar thug pa/ /mthar thug bla na med pa'i rgyud/ /rgyal po la yang lnga yin te/ /phyi nang gsang

dang rab tu gsang / /shin du gsang ba chen po ste/ /de rnams don la dbang bskur dang / /de yi mi mthun phyogs 'joms phyir/ /de phyir rgyal po lnga ru bstan/ /rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa/ /bcom ldan 'das
ni ji ltar lags/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs ni ji ltar lags/ /btsun mo'i b+ha ga ji ltar lags/ /rdo rje gang lags snying po gang / /dpa' bo gang lags mkha'
'gro gang / /dpag tu med pa ji ltar lags/ /thabs gcig bzhugs pa ji ltar lags/ /phyi nang gsang ba bla med pa'i/ /mchod nas zhes pa ji ltar lags/ /mngon phyogs 'khod pa ji ltar lags/ /zhal
'dzum mdzad pa ji ltar lags/ /gzigs pa zhes pa ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nyon mongs dang ni 'chi bdag bdud/ /phung po'-i bdud dang lha yi bdud/ /bdud bzhi bcom pas
bcom pa'o/ /ldan pa yon tan drug ldan phyir/ /dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang / /dpal dang grags dang skal ba bzang / /ye shes phun sum tshogs pa la/ /drug po de ldan zhes bya ba/ /'khor ba'i
chos ni mya ngan te/ /de ltar bral phyir 'das pa'o/ /'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /'gro ba'i don mdzad de bzhin gshegs/ /thams cad dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor

bcas/ /btsun mo zhes bya chos kyi dbyings/ /de las byung phyir b+ha ga ste/ /dbyer mi phyed pas bzhugs par bshad/ /rdo rje chos rnams 'jigs pa che/ /snying po ye shes chen po ste/ /sogs pa mang po'-i don yin

yin te/ /dpa' bo zhes pa rnam pa lnga/ /phyi nang gsang ba la sogs kyi/ /rnam par rtog pa 'joms phyir yin/ /mkha' la 'gro bas mkha' 'gro ste/ /rtsa sogs la yang shes par bya/ /thams cad de las byung ba'i
phyir/ /ma zhes nga yis gsungs pa yin/ /de yi don la mi dpogs pas/ /de yi phyir na dpag tu med/ /thabs gcig bzhugs zhes bya ba 'di/ /de nyid don dang dbyer med phyir/ /gcig gi don du bshad pa'o/ /

gnyis pa ma yin de dus su/ /phyi nang ma yin mchod pa ni/ /phyi yi mchod pa bshad par bya/ /me tog bdug pa mar me dang / /dri dang lha bshos btung ba dang / /rol mo sil snyan dbyangs nyid dang / /sgeg dang rgod dang gar nyid dang / /

rta dang glang po rin chen sogs/ /de nas nang gi mchod pa ni/ /b+ha ga btsums la ku tsa btsir/ /bdud rts-i lnga dang btung ba lnga/ /byang chub sems dang ldan byas te/ /phung po khams dang skye mched rnams/ /de la sogs pas mchod par

bya/ /de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa ni/ /rtsa dang rlung dang thig le ste/ /de nyid gnyis med bde ba yis/ /rtsa dang rlung sogs thig les mchod/ /de nas rab gsang mchod pa ni/ /dang po dga' dang mchog dga' dang / /dga' bral de bzhin lhan skyes dga'/ /bde ba'i khyad par

de nyid kyis/ /rang bzhin dga' sogs thams cad mchod/ /de nas bla med mchod pas ni/ /rang rig stong par rtogs pa yis/ /'od gsal de nyid chos kyi sku/ /de nyid bla med mchod pa mchog / bcom ldan 'das kyis

de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams dga' zhing mgu nas rjes su yi rangs par gyur te/ g.yon phyogs nas bskor ba byas nas so so'-i rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar gyur to/ /dpal 'khor lo
sdom pa rdo rje rgyal po'-i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// // rnal 'byor ma tsan+d+ra mA le dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na A sha ya tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes bsam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor grangs med pa dang / ye shes gsang ba'i gnas na thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'i dus su dpa' bo ye shes mkha' 'gro zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan ye shes mnga' bdag che/ /ye shes kyi ni rang bzhin dang / /ye shes skye gnas gang dang gang / /rgyal po ji ltar lags pa
dang / /gang la dbang byed gang gis 'dul/ /de nyid bdag la bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dpa' bo ye shes mkha' 'gro nyon/ /ye shes zhes bya rnam pa lnga/ /de nyid don la shes

pa dang / /log rtog shes pas ma bsgribs phyir/ /spyi bo'i ye shes bshad pa'o/ /me long ye shes mnyam nyid dang / /so sor rtog dang bya nan tan/ /chos dbyings ye shes lnga pa'o/ /de la me long ye shes ni/ /
dper na g.ya' dag me long la/ /gzugs brnyan gsal bar snang ba bzhin/ /de bzhin sems kyi me long la/ /nyon mongs g.yas ni dag byas na/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan sgyu mar mthong / /sems kyi

me long gang yin la/ /sgyu ma tsam du snang ba de/ /tha dad mi phyed mnyam ye shes/ /mnyam nyid ye shes gang yin pa/ /kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam de ni/ /las dang mtshan nyid ma 'dres pa/ /de nyid so sor rtog ye shes/ /

de nyid nan tan sgrub byed de/ /de nyid don grub ye shes te/ /thams cad chos dbyings gzhan min te/ /de phyir chos dbyings ye shes yin/ /ye shes skye gnas gang yin pa/ /kha sbyor dbus kyi rtsa brgyad do/ /dbyings

dang ye shes gnyis med tshul/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang byang / /ye shes bzhi po skye ba'i gnas/ /de dag kun 'dus lte ba ni/ /chos dbyings ye shes skye ba'i gnas/ /me long ye shes mnyam nyid dang / /so sor rtog dang

bya ba grub/ /chos dbyings ye shes la sogs pa/ /bdag po byed pa'i phyir dang ni/ /zhe sdang dang ni nga rgyal dang / /'dod chags dang ni phrag dog dang / /de bzhin gti mug la sogs pa'i/ /nyon mongs thams cad 'joms

pa'i phyir/ /rgyal po zhes ni bstan pa yin/ /ye shes mkha' 'gros yang gsol pa/ /byang chub sems ni ji ltar lags/ /de nyid dbye ba gang lags dang / /de yi gnas dang gzung ba'i gnas/ /nges par bzlog pa'i tshul

nyid dang / /de nyid kyi ni 'bras bu dang / /rtags dang yon tan gang lags pa/ /de nyid bdag la bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /byang chub sems ni rang rig ste/ /dbye ba'i don ni gnyis su
bstan/ /de yi gnas ni rtsa yin te/ /gzung ba rig pa'i 'khor lor te/ /nges par bzlog pa'i thabs dag ni/ /go bzlog pa yi tshul yin no/ /de nyid 'bras bu gnyis med rtogs/ /rtags ni lus la khrag byung

dang / /ba spu langs dang 'dar ba dang / /kha zas dad chung lus yang dang / /skra dkar gnyer ma dengs pa dang / /le lo med dang brtson 'grus ldan/ /de la sogs pa'i rtags rnams 'grub/ /de nas yon tan bshad
pa ni/ /rkang mgyogs sa steng sa 'og gi/ /'jig rten dngos grub gang yin dang / /'jig rten las 'das thob par 'gyur/ /gnyis med byang chub sems kyi gnas/ /rang rig 'od gsal de nyid nga / /ye
shes rang bzhin gnas yin te/ /rtags ni 'od gsal de nyid do/ /'bras bu chos sku 'chang chen po'-i/ /sa ni nges par thob pa'o/ /rnal 'byor sems gzung bsgom pa brtag /lus sems tshags su bcug
nas ni/ /rang gi sems kyi de nyid la/ /de nyid dbyer med bsgom par bya/ /de yis thob med 'bras bu thob/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / ye shes mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'i
'khor thams cad rjes su yi rang nas de kho na nyid bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod de mi snang bar gyur to/ /dpal 'khor lo sdom pa ye shes bsam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// //

paN Di ta gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ / rgya gar skad/ shrI rA ga rA dza tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal chags pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal
rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'-i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/ /
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos spos dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pas mchod nas/ he he dpa' bo 'jigs pa che/ /sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin nas/ /mtshan dang dpe

byad gang dang gang / /stong dang de bzhin rnam thar dang / /brdzus skyes mngal skyes rgong skyes dang / /drod gsher gnyis gsum bzhi char ci/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /a ni dbu yi gtsug tor te/ /a

ni dbu skra g.yas su 'khyil/ /i ni dpral ba'i dbyes mnyam pa/ /I ni smin mtshams mdzod spu ste/ /u ni spyan smig mthon mthing la/ /ba yi rdzi ma lta bu'o/ /U tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste/ /ri r-I tshems

mnyam tshems thags bzang / /li lI tshems dkar ro bro mchog /e ni 'gram pa seng ge 'dra/ /ai ljags shin du srab pa ste/ /o ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan/ /au n-i dpung mgo shin du zlum/ /a~M ni bdun
mtho ba ru gsungs/ /aHni thal gong rgyas pa ste/ /'di dag bcu drug g.yas skor ro/ /de nas g.yon skor mtshams nas kyang / /a ni lpags srab mdog gser 'dra/ /A ni bzhengs bzhin ma
btud par/ /phyag gnyis pus mo sleb pa'o/ /i ni ro stod seng ge 'dra/ /i ni shin+ya gro lta bur/ /chu dang zheng ni gab pa'o/ /u ni mdzod spu g.yas su 'khyil/ /U ni spu rnams gyen du phyogs/ /ri 'doms
sba ba sbubs su nub/ /rI brla legs par zlum pa'o/ /l-i ni zhabs long tshigs mi mngon/ /l-I Ni phyag zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon/ /l-I ni phyag mthil zhabs kyi mthil/ /'jam zhing gzhon sha rgyas pa'o/ /

e ni phyag zhabs dra bas 'brel/ /ai ni sen mo ring ba ste/ /o ni phyag dang zhabs mthil la/ /'khor lo dang ni ldan pa yin/ /au n-i zhabs ni shin du gnas/ /a~M zhabs rting pa yangs pa ste/ /aHni byin pa

ri dgas ni/ /e na ya yi lta bu ste/ /spyi bo'-i mi shigs snying po ha~M/ /ston pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan/ /ka ni sen mo zangs mdog 'dra/ /kha ni sen mo mdog snum pa/ /ga ni sen mo mtho ba ste/ /g+ha ni

sor mo rnams zlum pa/ /nga ni sor mo rnams rgyas pa/ /tsa ni sor rnams byin gyis phra/ /tsha ni rtsa rnams mi mngon pa/ /dza ni rtsa mdud med pa yin/ /dz+ha ni long bu mi mngon pa/ /nya ni zhabs mi mnyam pa med/ /
Ta ni seng ge'i stabs su gshegs/ /Tha ni glang po'i stabs su gshegs/ /Da ni ngang pa'i stabs su gshegs/ /D+ha ni khyu mchog stabs su gshegs/ /Na ni g.yon phyogs ldog cing gshegs/ /ta ni mdzes

par gshegs pa ste/ /tha ni mi g.yo bar gshegs pa/ /da ni sku la 'khril bag chags/ /d+ha sku byi dor byas pa 'dra/ /na sku rim par 'tsham pa'o/ /pa ni sku gtsang pha sku 'jam/ /ba sku rnam par dag pa'o/ /

b+ha ni mtshan rdzogs ngo bo nyid/ /ma sku kho lags yangs shing bzang / /ya ni gom pa snyoms pa'o/ /ra sku shin du gzhon mdog can/ /la ni sku la 'khrul pa med/ /wa ni sku lus rgyas pa ste/ /sha ni shin du
grims pa'o/ /Sha ni yan lag thams cad mdzes/ /sa gzigs rab rib med cing dag /ha dku zlum pa nyid yin te/ /k+Sha ni sku skabs phyed pa'o/ /ya ni sku snyoms pa yin te/ /ra ni phyal phyam med pa yin/ /
la ni lte ba zab pa ste/ /wa ni lte ba g.yas su 'khyil/ /d+ha ni kun nas mdzes pa ste/ /d+ha ni kun spyod gtsang ma yin/ /'di dag thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis/ /g.yas nas bskor ba bzhi bcu
yin/ /de nas g.yon gy-is bzhi bcu ni/ /ka ni sku sme gnag bag med/ /kha ni shing bal ltar 'jam phyag /ga phyag ri mo mdangs yod pa/ /g+ha phyag ri mo zab pa dang / /nga phyag ri mo ring ba'o/ /ca

zhal ha cang mi ring ba/ /tsha zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang / /dza dz+ha ljags mnyen ljags srab pa/ /nya ni ljags dmar ngo bo ste/ /glang po'-i nga ro 'brug sgra Ta/ /Tha ni gsung snyan mnyen 'jam pa/ /

Da D+ha mche ba zlum dang rno/ /Na Ni mche dkar ta tshems mnyam/ /tha ni mche ba byin gyis phra/ /da shangs shin du tho ba dang / /d+ha shangs shin du gtsang ba'o/ /na ni spyan 'od rnam par dag /pa pha spyan bzang rdzi ma
stug /ba ni dkar nag phyed pad ma'i/ /'dab ma'i mdangs 'dra pad ma'i spyan/ /b+ha ni de bzhin smin mtshams ring / /ma ya smin mtshams smin spu mnyam/ /ra ni de bzhin smin ma snum/ /la ni phyag
ring rgyas pa'o/ /de bzhin wa ni snyan shal mnyam/ /snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams sha /dpral ba legs par 'byes pa Sha/ /sa ni dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/ /ha ni dbu dag shin du rgyas/ /dbu skra bung ba

ltar gnag k+Sha/ /dbu skra stug pa ya yin te/ /de bzhin dbu skra 'jam ba ra/ /dbu skra mi 'dzing ba ni la/ /dbu skra mi gshor ba ni wa/ /dbu skra dri zhim d+ha yin te/ /phyag la dpal gyi be'u dang ni/ /
bkra shis g.yung drung 'khyil bas brgyan/ /ldong ros lta bu d+ha yin te/ /lte ba sprul pa'i snying po a~M/ /gtso bo dpe byad brgyad bcur ldan/ /a ni phyi nang stong pa nyid/ /A ni stong pa nyid stong

pa/ /i ni chen po stong pa nyid/ /I ni don dam stong pa nyid/ /u ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid/ /U ni 'dus ma byas stong pa/ /rI ni mtha' las 'das stong pa/ /rI ni thog mtha' stong pa nyid/ /li ni dor ba
med pa stong / /l-I ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ /e ni chos rnams thams cad stong / /ai n-i rang gi mtshan nyid stong / /o ni mi dmigs stong pa nyid/ /au ni dngos po med stong nyid/ /a~M ni
ngo bo stong pa nyid/ /dngos med ngo bo stong nyid aH/ /mgrin pa longs spyod snying po oM/ /shes rab stong pa bcu drug rtsa/ /gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba/ /rnam par thar pa dang po a/ /
nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/ /phyi rol gzugs rnams la lta ba/ /rnam thar gnyis pa ka yin no/ /sdug pa rnam par thar pa'i lus/ /mngon sum byas nas rdzogs pa ni/ /de dag
rnam thar gsum pa tsa/ /gzugs kyi 'du shes las 'das pa/ /sna tshogs 'du shes yid mi byed/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas la gnas Ta/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas las 'das te/ /rnam
shes mtha' yas la gnas shing / /rnam shes mtha' yas rdzogs pa ste/ /rnam shes mtha' yas las 'das nas/ /ci yang med pa la gnas te/ /de nyid rdzogs pa pa yin no/ /ci yang med pa las
'das te/ /'du shes med min la gnas te/ /'du shes med min rdzogs pa yi/ /'du shes med min la 'das te/ /'du shes tshor ba 'gog pa'i lus/ /mngon sum byas nas rdzogs pa ni/ /rnam pa
par thar pa brgyad pa sha / /snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo hU~M/ /gtso bo rnam thar brgyad dang ldan/ /'di dag rtsa yi rnam par gnas/ /'khor lo'i rgya ni sor gsum ste/ /sems can kun la rang bzhin
gnas/ /de phyir sems can sangs rgyas yin/ /sna tshogs bsdud pa'i mtshan nyid kyang / /ring du 'byung zhing thung du gnas/ /smin mtshams kyi ni mdzod spu bzhin/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas

lte ba la/ /g.yas g.yon bu ga lnga lnga ste/ /steng 'og kha yi bar nas 'byung / /ro ma shar du mngon du phyogs/ /rkyang ma nub ste 'og gi char/ /ro mas rkyang ma la 'khyud cing / /g.yas pa'i cha ru zung 'jug
nyid/ /rkyang mas ro ma la 'khyud cing / /g.yon gyi cha ru zung 'jug nyid/ /g.yas g.yon rtse mo sku gsung thugs/ /de sgra sngags su rab tu grags/ /sngags dang rgyud dang dngos grub sogs/ /de nyid
las ni byung bas na/ /sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin no/ /skye ba bzhi yi rim pa yang / /snod bcud yab yum la thim ste/ /yab yum nyi ma zla bar 'gyur/ /snang ba'i thig le yang dag bcas/ /
'di dag nang gi mngal skyes tshul/ /A li kA li nyi zla ste/ /sems ni thig le'i ngo bor gnas/ /nang gi sgong skyes yin par 'dod/ /kA dang A las nyi zla ste/ /rang byung thig le drod gsher yin/ /

de dag skad cig rkyen med las/ /rang bzhin 'byung ba rdzus skyes so/ /rkyen med sbyor ba sgong sogs las/ /bde ba skye dang bde ba'i rgyu/ /thams cad dran pa gsang ba yi/ /mngal nas skyes pa'i tshul yin te/ /
yar la sreg dang mar la gso/ /gnas gsum nyi shu bzhir 'pho yin/ /phyi nang 'dod pa'i mtshan ma yis/ /rtsa rgyas bde ba ster ba dang / /rin po che yi pho brang du/ /sems 'dzin gsang ba'i sgong skyes

yin/ /nang gi 'dod pa'i mtshon cha yis/ /bde ba skye ba drod gsher skyes/ /gang gi rkyen gyis ma skyes par/ /gdod nas bde ba'i rgyur skyes la/ /bde ba skyes pa rdzus skyes so/ /gtum mo go bzlog rkyen gyis
sbar/ /gtum mo rkyen gyis sbar ba dang / /gtum mo go bzlog sbar ba dang / /gtum mo rang bzhin sbar ba ni/ /mngal skyes sgong skyes drod gsher skyes/ /rdzus skyes rim par sbyar bar bya/ /du ma'i gzhi
bcas gzhi bcas dang / /gzhi med shin du gzhi med de/ /mngal skyes gong skyes drod gsher skyes/ /rdzus skyes bzhi char rim par sbyar/ /rgyu dang lam ste 'bras bu kun/ /skye ba bzhi yi ngo bor gcig /
de phyir sangs rgyas sems can gnyis/ /dngos po ro mnyam gyur pa la/ /log rtog sgyu mas gnyis su 'khrul/ /rdo rje snying po snying rje che/ /nang dang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang / /nga yis bshad kyis
legs par nyon/ /sku yi dkyil 'khor spyi bor bsgom/ /gsung ni mgrin pa thugs ni snying / /yon tan lte ba phrin las n-i/ /sna rtse dag tu bsam par bya/ /'bar ba bzhi yi a la yang / /rdo rje phag
mo rab tu grags/ /ha~M ni bde mchog he ru ka /dpa' bo gcig pa yin par 'dod/ /bdun pa dang ni dgu pa dag /gsum pa hU~M las rab tu grags/ /bcu gsum pa dang bcwa lnga pa/ /bcu dgu oM las
rab tu grags/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga nyi shu dgu/ /ha~M gi ngo bor yang dag gnas/ /sum bcu bdun dang drug bcu bzhi/ /a yi dkyil 'khor yin par nges/ /rtsa ni rdo rje phag mo ste/ /g.yas g.yon
phyag la dbu ma zhal/ /dpa' bo byang chub sems yin te/ /skye mched bcu gnyis dngas ma yang / /bcu gnyis phyag tu rab tu grags/ /'byung bzhi'i dngas ma zhal bzhir nges/ /mdzes
pa'i phyir na rgyan du bshad/ /gsung mchog bla ma'i zhal nas blang / /g.yas g.yon steng 'og sgo bzhi ste/ /mdom gang mnyam pa gru bzhi yin/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni tshon rtsi lnga/ /rtsa ni thig
gi rang bzhin te/ /ka ba brgyad ni rkang brgyad do/ /so sen ba spu twa ra sogs/ /mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya/ /'di dag rang bzhin dkyil 'khor te/ /dper
na rang byung gser dang 'dra/ /'di ni bcos ma ma yin te/ /rang rig ye shes gzugs brnyan ni/ /gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bsgom pa min/ /rdul tshon la sogs bri ba min/ /spos

la sogs pas mchod pa min/ /rdo shing lha la phyag mi bya/ /rang bzhin gnas pa'i sangs rgyas la/ /rang bzhin mchod pas rtag tu mchod/ /sku ni dgun dus rang bzhin te/ /'byung ba'i sku gsum zla ba gsum/ /
gsung ni dpyid dus ngo bo ste/ /'jug pa'-i sku gsum zla ba gsum/ /thugs ni dbyar dus ngo bo ste/ /gnas pa sku gsum zla ba gsum/ /ye shes ston gyi dus yin te/ /sku gsung thugs ni zla ba gsum/ /dang

po rgyu yi sa pa yin/ /'khor lo chags pa dmar po la/ /yi ge rnams n-i dkar pos gnas/ /lam gyis sa ba rnam pa gnyis/ /ring ba dang ni nye ba'o/ /de nas 'bras bu'i sa ba yin/ /'khor lo yang dag gnas pa ste/ /

'khor lo de rnams lha rnams kyang / /sku mdog phyag mtshan kun dang bral/ /rang bzhin gsal ba dri ma med/ /shel ltar gsal ba dri ma med/ /mi mthong mthong ba'i ngo bo can/ /zab cing phra ba'i rang bzhin can/ /

phyi ru sku mdog phyag mtshan lha/ /nang gi shin du phra ba'i gzugs/ /gsang ba'i bde ba lha ru nges/ /de las bzlog pa bzhi pa'i lha/ /lus las byung phyir lha zhe 'am/ /rgyud rnams dag byed phyir na lha/ /
chags pa'i phy-ir na lha yin te/ /rgyal po shes rab rang bzhin te/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyi/ /chags pa chen po'i rgyud gsungs so/ /de nas sa chen po yang cher g.yos par gyur te/

mchod pa'i sprin gyi char chen po yang babs par gyur to/ /de nas dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyang rgyud kyi don la dga' zhing mgu ste rjes su yi rang nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /dpal chags pa'i rgyal
po'-i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// // rnal 'byor ma tsan+d+ra mA le dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI DA ki nI sa~M ba ra tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde ba chen po'-i ros

gang bas/ /thams cad stong par gyur nas kyang / /he he mgon po rdo rje 'dzin/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni ji ltar lags/ /de'i sdom pa ji ltar lags/ /dam tshig bsrung ba ji ltar lags/ /rdo rje phag mo bdag la gsungs/ /

nyon cig rdo rje phag mo nyon/ /dang po dam tshig mtshan nyid kyang / /rtsa ba dang ni yan lag bcas/ /rang gi lus ngag yid gsum dag /kun nas 'khrugs te gzhan gy-i yang / /sgo gsum kun 'khrugs chen po ste/ /
rang bzhin sgo gsum 'khrugs pa 'bring / /nyams pa 'bring du gsungs pa yin/ /rang gzhan 'khrugs pa tha ma yang / /nyams pa chung ngu yin par 'dod/ /re re la yang gsum gsum ste/ /
nyams pa che 'bring dgu ru dbye/ /rang la mnar sems ma skyes kyang / /gzhan la mnar sems skyes pa yi/ /bdag gi g.yeng bas rkyen byas pa/ /de nyid nyams pa 'bring du bshad/ /rang la mnar sems

cher skyes kyang / /gzhan la nyes pa chung bas na/ /'di yang nyams pa 'bring du bshad/ /g.yeng ba'i rkyen gyis gang nyams kyang / /'di ni ltung ba yang bar gsungs/ /rang gi dam tshig bsrungs pa yi/ /lta spyod gang la gzhan
ma mos/ /zab mo'i don la skur 'debs pa/ /ltung ba che 'bring yang bar bshad/ /rang gis ma nyes gzhan cher 'khrugs/ /'di ni nyams pa chung ngur bshad/ /re re'i dbye ba gzhan nas shes/ /de nas snod kyi

mtshan nyid kyang / /phyi yis rang gi sgo gsum dag /'khrugs pa che chung rim pas dbye/ /rang sems 'khrugs na phyi rol la/ /bsnun sogs nyams pa chen por 'gyur/ /g.yengs pas nyams pa 'bring chung ngu / /mdor

na rang bzhin dam tshig dang / /bcas te bye brag dam tshig las/ /gnyis su med par mkhas pas gsungs/ /dam tshig las ni rdo rje 'chang / /de nas mkha' 'gro mtshan nyid kyang / /mkha' 'gro rtsa ru gnas pa ste/ /phag

mo yungs kar tsam gyi tshad/ /gzhan ni lnga yi tshad tsam ste/ /gsal la rang bzhin med pa'o/ /ka nas g.yas skor ka yi bar/ /mkha' 'gro drug bcu bzhi ru nges/ /ka sogs zung rtsa mkha' 'gro ste/ /phyi nas rtsa re mkha'
'gro re/ /mkha' 'gro nas bskor mtshams kyi bar/ /sum bcu rtsa bdun mkha' 'gro ma/ /lte ba sprul par yang dag gnas/ /a sogs brgyad ni mkha' 'gro brgyad/ /de bzhin zung rtsa mkha' 'gro bzhi/ /snying ga
ru ni yang dag gnas/ /zung rtsa gsum ni mkha' 'gro re/ /gzhan rnams rtsa re mkha' 'gro re/ /bcu gnyis bcu bzhi mgrin par gnas/ /rdo rje phag mo lte bar gnas/ /gzhan ni spyi bor yang dag gnas/ /de nas
sdom pa bshad bya ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po/ /bde de sdom par yang dag bshad/ /gang zhig bde ba khyad par can/ /nges par sgom pa yin par 'dod/ /rdo rje phag mo mi 'da' bas/ /sdom pa dam

tshig tu ni bshad/ /mi phyed pas ni phyag rgyar gsungs/ /rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa/ /dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu gang lags/ /rkyen ni gang lags dus gang lags/ /tshad ni gang lags bsrung dus gang / /lus ngag dam

tshig ji ltar dbye/ /dang por nyams pa'i rgyu nyid kyang / /mi shes pa dang bag med dang / /nyon mongs ldan dang ma gus dang / /brjed ngas dran pa mi gsal ba/ /'di drug dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu/ /bla ma ma bsten grogs ngan

'grogs/ /mdor na sgo gsum g.yengs pa'i yul/ /de dag nyams pa'i rkyen du gsungs/ /gdon gyis bar chad chang gis myos/ /log lta skyes dang khengs grags 'dod/ /nyon mongs zil non bla mas skyo/ /'dod chags

chen po skyes pa dag /dam tshig nyams pa'i dus yin te/ /spyir ni rtsod ldan dus su gsungs/ /gdon sogs gzhan gyis byin brlabs tshe/ /bsrung ba'i 'du shes sngon song na/ /chen po rdzogs kyang chung ngur gsungs/ /'du shes

sngon du ma song na/ /bag med nyams pa so na gnas/ /gdon sogs rang gis ma mthong na/ /de yang nyams pa chung bar gsungs/ /'khor bas skyo dang rnam smin dran/ /bla ma dran dang 'dod pa skyes/ /bar chad bral ba

bshags pa'i dus/ /sbyor ba dngos gzhi mjug dang gsum/ /gang rdzogs tshad ni mthar phyin te/ /che 'bring dbye bas shes par bya/ /sbyor ba ltung ba chung ngu ste/ /dngos gzhi ltung ba 'bring du 'byung / /mjug rdzogs ltung ba

chen por nges/ /rgyan dang phyag rgya phyag mtshan dag /'chang ba bsten pa'i dam tshig yin/ /sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga rnams ni/ /bza' bar bya ba'i dam tshig go/ /sems can dpa' bo mkha' 'gro la/ /longs spyod mchod pa gang byed

pa/ /blta bar bya ba'i dam tshig go/ /rang gzhan sgyu mar gang shes pa/ /shes par bya ba'i dam tshig go/ /sgo gsum sku gsung thugs su bsam/ /bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig go/ /nyon mongs dug drug gzung 'dzin kun/ /rang
rig skye ba med par bsgral/ /bsgral ba'i dam tshig chen po yin/ /dam tshig don du dam tshig dag /dus drug dus gnyis lo bar du/ /brtul zhugs can gyis dam tshig bsrung / /dngos grub don du rtag tu

bsrung / /skad cig tsam yang gnang ba med/ /rang gi lus kyi nyes pa las/ /gzhan gyi lus kyi nyes 'byung ba/ /'di ni sku yi nyes par bshad/ /rang gi lus kyi nyes pa las/ /gzhan gyi ngag gi nyes 'byung ba/ /

bdag gi sku yi nyams pa ste/ /gzhan la gsung gi nyams par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang mkhas pas shes par bya/ /rang la rtsa ba'i nyes pa las/ /gzhan la yan lag nyes 'byung dang / /legs pa las ni nyes 'byung sogs/ /bla

ma'i zhal nas shes bya ste/ /'bad de dam tshig bsrung bar bya/ /dam tshig de yi don rnams la/ /'khor rnams 'jigs shing skrag gyur te/ /rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa/ /dam tshig 'di yi don rnams ni/ /zab cing rgya che rtog par

dka'/ /mgon po khyod kyis bzhes par zhu/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bdud rtsi khar zos slar la dor ba med/ /ngan skyugs phyir dor slar la za ba med/ /rang rig byang chub bdud rtsi'i ro tshor na/ /log rtog 'khrul

pa'i rgyu 'bras ga la tshol/ /de bas dam tshig kho na gtso bor gyis/ /de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyang rgyud kyi don la rjes su yi rang par gyur to/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// //
rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI DA ki nI gu h+ya dz+wa la tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal

mkha' 'gro ma gsang ba 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kye a la la ho/ kye a la la ho/ mkha' 'gro gang lags ma gang lags/ /gsang dang rgyud dang rgyal po gang / /nyon cig byang chub

sems dpa' khyod/ /mkha' 'gro bzhi ste ma ni gsum/ /gsang ba drug ste rgyud brgyad do/ /rgyal po bcu dgu dag tu bstan/ /dang po mkha' 'gro dbye ba yang / /rags pa'i rtog pa spang ba'i phyir/ /bum pa'i dbang

dang 'brel pa yi/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan dang po'o/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan spang ba'i phyir/ /gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi/ /rlung dang rtsa sogs tsaN+DA li/ /'di dag mkha' 'gro gnyis pa ste/ /dman pa rnams

la sku dang phyag /rlung dang rtsa sogs kha dog dbyibs/ /de nyid spang bar bya ba'i phyir/ /shes rab ye shes dang 'brel ba'i/ /lhan cig skyes pa dga' ba'i ro/ /'di dag gsang ba'i mkha' 'gro ste/ /mkha' 'gro 'di
rnams rim pa las/ /dman pa rnam la phra ba'i gzugs/ /lus sems tshor ba bde ba las/ /'das pa'i bde ba chen po dag /spang phyir rang rig ye shes te/ /sems kyi de nyid stong ba'i ro/ /de nyid mkha' 'gro
bzhi pa ste/ /shes brjod kun gyi yul ma yin/ /de nyid lnga la sogs pa yi/ /mkha' 'gro 'di rnams rim pa yang / /sku mdog phyag mtshan rags pa'i gnyen/ /rlung dang rtsa sogs bum dbang spong / /bde bas

rlung dang rtsa sogs spong / /rang rig stong pas bde ba spong / /gzugs sku gnyis kyis stong pa spong / /de phyir gong ma gnyan por bshad/ /rags pa phung sogs bum dbang rgyu/ /bum dbang gsang dbang rgyu yin te/ /gsang ba
gsum pa'i rgyu ru nges/ /bde ba rang rig skyed pa yi/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu nges pa ste/ /'bras bu bzhi dang mi mthun bzhi/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyis rim pa'o/ /ma ni rnam pa gsum yin te/ /'dod chags chen
pos bcom ldan 'das/ /zhe sdang chen pos bcom ldan 'das/ /gti mug chen pos bcom ldan 'das/ /nga rgyal la sogs de dang 'dra/ /thun mong ma yin sras 'byung bas/ /ma zhes gsungs pa yin
par 'dod/ /snod min gsang ba sgrogs thos pa/ /skrag pa thun mong ma yin bskyed/ /bskyed pa'i phyir na ma zhes bya/ /skye ba gcig gis sangs rgyas pas/ /sras rnams thun mong ma yin skyed/ /

de'i phyir na ma zhes bya/ /thun mong bla ma'i zhal nas shes/ /de nas gsang ba bshad bya ste/ /bdud rtsi drug dag gsang ba ste/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro/ /reg bya de bzhin chos yin te/ /rgyud ni dbang bzhi ngo bo ste/ /

brjod bya brjod byed brgyad du bshad/ /gsang ba lnga ni rgyal po lnga/ /lta ba spyod pa zung 'jug lam/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu sa la sogs/ /bcu dgu rgyal po yin par gsungs/ /kye bo dpa' bo 'jigs pa che/ /gnod sbyin gzugs

dang srin po gzugs/ /gzhan yang bdud la sogs pa'i gzugs/ /sna tshogs ston na ji ltar bgyi/ /lha 'am klu la sogs pa'i gzugs/ /sdug pa ston na ji ltar bgyi/ /gnod sbyin sgra dang srin po sgra/ /shin du 'jigs pa'i sgra grag na/ /

de la bdag gis ji ltar bgyi/ /tshangs pa'i sgra dang ngang pa'i sgra/ /sgra snyan byung na ji ltar bgyi/ /bya rgod dri dang bla rtsi dri/ /ngan skyugs la sogs dri byung na/ /de la bdag gis ji ltar bgyi/ /gur kum tsan dan ga pur sogs/ /dri zhim byung na ji ltar bgyi/ /

bdud rtsi la sogs drug bcu sogs/ /bzang po ston na ji ltar bgyi/ /ngan skyugs la sogs dman pa'i ro/ /sna tshogs ston na ji ltar bgyi/ /reg bya lcags kyi spu gri sogs/ /rtsub pa byung na ji ltar bgyi/ /dar men la sogs lus kyis

reg /'jam pa byung na ji ltar bgyi/ /'jig rten chos rnams sna tshogs dang / /'jig rten 'das pa'i chos rnams ston/ /de la bdag gis ji ltar bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gzugs ngan khong khro mi bskyed cing / /

gzugs bzang 'dod par mi bya ste/ /de la lus kyi phyag rgya bstan/ /lan byed dpa' bo mkha' 'gro yi/ /dngos grub sprul pa yin par nges/ /brtul zhugs can gyis dngos grub blang / /lan med bdud kyi bar chad de/ /bdud bsal ba

yi cho ga brtsam/ /kun la mkhas pas sbyor bar bya/ /sgra snyan 'dod pa mi bskyed cing / /'jigs pa'i sgra la khong mi khro/ /de la btang snyoms sems bya ste/ /rdo rje glu yis brtag par bya/ /de bzhin dri bzang mi chags zhing / /dri ngan kho khro

mi bya bar/ /mnyam par dmigs la brtag par bya/ /dri'i phyag rgya de la bstan/ /lan byed mkha' 'gro'i sprul pa ste/ /lan med bdud kyi sprul pa'o/ /ro bzang bza' bar mi bya zhing / /ro ngan dor bar mi bya'o/ /mnyam par gzhag

la brtag par bya/ /de la ro yi phyag rgya bstan/ /de bzhin bye brag shes par bya/ /de bzhin chos la chos phyag rgya/ /brtags te bdud rnams bsal bar bya/ /lus la byung ba'i bdud rnams kyang / /kha dog dbyibs la shes par bya/ /

dang po dngos grub blang ba yang / /mig gis gzugs la rna bas sgra/ /sna yis dri dang lce yis ro/ /lus kyis reg dang yid kyis chos/ /brtul zhugs can gyis dngos grub blang / /de nas bdud ni bsal bya ste/ /yang na stong pa'i rdzong la gnas/ /

yang na phrin las bzhi yis bsal/ /chu yis bde ba 'jam sogs pas/ /nang gi bdud ni bsal ba'o/ /bad mkhris steng sgo 'dus pa'i bar/ /rlung can mgo yi sgo ru ste/ /rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung / /de ltar byas na dngos

grub thob/ /dpal mkha' 'gro ma gsang ba 'bar ba'i rgyud kyis rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/

shrI badzra b+hai ra ba bi dA ra NA tan+t+ra rA dza/ / bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor dpag

tu med pa dang / ri rab kyi steng du bzhugs pa'i dus su byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /thugs rje che ldan bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje

gang lags 'jigs byed gang / /'joms pa gang lags rgyud gang lags/ /rgyal po gang lags bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rdo rje rnam pa gsum yin te/ /nyon mongs bdud sogs 'jigs par byed/ /

nyon mongs dgra sogs rnam par 'joms/ /rgyu yi rgyud dang 'bras bu'i rgyud/ /mthar thug rgyud ni gang yin la/ /rgyal po zhes ni bstan pa yin/ /rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa/ /re re'i bye brag ma 'tshal bas/ /de yi dbye ba

bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rdo rje rnam pa gsum yin te/ /don gyi rdo rje de nas rtags/ /rdzas kyi rdo rje dang ni gsum/ /de nas don gyi rdo rje bshad/ /gzung 'dzin rtog pas mi phyed phyir/ /don gyi rdo rje

bshad pa'o/ /dbang bzhi rdo rje re re ste/ /rdo rje bzhi ru bshad pa yin/ /rtags kyi rdo rje gsum yin te/ /rtse gsum rtse lnga rtse dgu pa/ /rtse gsum sku gsung thugs kyi rtags/ /rtse lnga ye shes lnga yi rtags/ /rtse dgu khams gsum sa dgu'i

rtags/ /don gyi rdo rje bzhi yin te/ /bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs pa/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog ni/ /'jigs dang 'joms pas rdo rje'o/ /gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi/ /rtsa dang

rlung dang thig le la/ /gzung 'dzin gnyis su gang rtog pa/ /'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje'o/ /shes rab ye shes dang 'brel pa'i/ /lhan cig skyes dga' la sogs la/ /gzung dang 'dzin par gang rtog pa/ /'jig cing 'joms pas

rdo rje yin/ /bzhi pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi/ /rang rig sems nyid stong nyid la/ /gzung 'dzin gnyis su gang rtogs pa/ /'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje'o/ /de nas rtags kyi rdo rje ni/ /rtse gsum sku gsung thugs su bshad/ /'dod

chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum/ /'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje ste/ /rtse lnga ye shes lnga yi rtags/ /nga rgyal la sogs rnam pa lnga/ /'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje'o/ /de nas rdzas kyi rdo rje ni/ /rnam pa bzhi ru bstan pa ste/ /zur

gsum rno la 'bigs pa dang / /gru bzhi dag ni gsal bar byed/ /zlum pos rdzas rnams 'joms par byed/ /zur lngas 'dod bsgrub rdzas rdo rje/ /rgyud kyi don ni rnam pa bzhi/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis ka'i rgyud/ /mthar thug rgyud ni

rgyal po ste/ /de rnams kun la dbang byed pas/ /log lta'i rgyud sogs spong bar byed/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa rnams dga' zhing mgu nas rjes su yid rangs

te/ g.yas phyogs nas lan gsum bskor nas so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar gyur to/ /dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// // paN Di ta gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong

shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI ag+ni mA le tan+t+ra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ dpal me'i phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ha ha hi hi he he kye/ /

bdag la khyed la zhu ba mchis/ /shrI ni gang lags he gang lags/ /ru ni gang lags ka gang lags/ /dbang bzhi he ru ka gang lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /shrI ni gnyis med ye shes te/ /he ni rgyu sogs rnam

par spangs/ /ru ni tshogs dang bral ba nyid/ /ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas so/ /de lta'i dpal ldan he ru ka / rtag tu lus dang sems la gnas/ /de nyid la yang rnam pa bzhi/ /dbang bzhi grangs kyis nges pa ste/ /dang po bum dbang he

ru ka / sku dang phyag mtshan snang ba'i tshe/ /rang sems las su rung ba ste/ /de tshe 'jig rten tha mal pa'i/ /rgyu drug rkyen bzhi 'bras bu bzhi/ /spangs pa'i phyir na he zhes brjod/ /las dang nyon mongs tshogs dang bral/ /de yi phyir na ru

zhes brjod/ /'jig rten tha mal rnam rtog gi/ /gzung 'dzin gang yang mi gnas pa'i/ /phyir na ka zhes gsungs pa'o/ /thabs dang shes rab zung 'jug pas/ /gzung 'dzin gnyis bgags gnyis su med/ /de yi phyir na shrI ru brjod/ /

bskyed pa'i rim pa he ru ka / phag mo la gnas tshogs dang ldan/ /zag med rgyu rkyen kun dang ldan/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi tshul/ /de nas gsang dbang he ru ka / nyi zla phyag mtshan yig 'bru'i tshogs/ /bskyed rim rgyu rkyen kun

spangs te/ /rlung sogs las su rung bas na/ /de yi phyir na he zhes brjod/ /phyi yi sbyin sreg gtor ma dang / /mchod pa dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i/ /tshogs dang bral ba'i phyir na ru/ /bskyed pa'i rdo rje phag mo dang / /dmigs

dang lta spyod gang la yang / /mi gnas phyir na ka zhes brjod/ /bskyed pa'i gzung 'dzin gnyis med ma'o/ /phyir na shrI zhes gsungs pa ste/ /rgyu rnams lam la sogs dang ldan/ /rlung sogs thabs dang shes rab tshul/ /rlung sogs sgyu

ma'i ngo bor gnas/ /rtsa rlung rang bzhin gnas la sogs/ /nang gi rgyu dang rkyen sogs ldan/ /nang gi dpal ldan he ru ka / de nas gsum pa'i he ru ka / rlung sogs rang bzhin gnas pa yi/ /rgyu spangs phyir ni he zhes brjod/ /rlung sogs

lam la brten pa yi/ /tshogs dang bral phyir ru zhes brjod/ /rlung dang rtsa dang thig le dang / /tsaN+DA li yi kha dog dang / /dbyibs la mi gnas phyir na ka / sems nyid bde bar gnas pas so/ /nang gi thabs dang shes rab med/ /de'i phyir na

shrI ru gsungs/ /mig ser nad kyis btab pa ltar/ /rang sems bde bar gnas pas so/ /sems nyid bde bar gnas pa dang / /bde ba la bsten tshogs dang ldan/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan/ /sems dang bde ba tha dad med/ /

sems dang bde ba gang gnas pa/ /mchog dang chad pa'i dbus gnas pa/ /gsum pa'i dpal ldan he ru ka / de nas bzhi pa'i he ru ka / rang rig stong par gnas pa'i tshe/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu rkyen bral/ /de yi phyir na he zhes brjod/ /

pha rol phyin drug bde ba'i lam/ /thams cad stong par ro gcig pas/ /tshogs gnyis bral phyir ru zhes brjod/ /bde ba tsam la 'ang mi gnas phyir/ /ka zhes nges par brjod pa yin/ /sems nyid rang rig stong par gnas/ /stobs

sogs phun sum tshogs pas na/ /rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa dang / /gzugs sku'i rgyu rkyen la sogs ldan/ /shrI zhes bya ba mngon par brjod/ /dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med/ /dngos por ro mnyam mtha' yas pa'i/ /sems kyi de

nyid la gnas pa/ /bzhi pa'i dpal ldan he ru ka / bdud rnams kun la tho 'tsham zhing / /lhan cig skyes pa'i dur khrod rol/ /mi gsal gsal ba'i rang bzhin med/ /snang zhing gsal la rang bzhin med/ /me long bzhin 'dra chu zla bzhin/ /

mkhas pas 'bad de 'khrul pa spang / /de ltar don ni ma rtogs par/ /kha cig sku mdog phyag mtshan la/ /he ru ka yi rnam par rtog /kha cig gzugs brnyan rnam par rtog /kha cig rang gi ngo bor 'dod/ /de bzhin rtsa dang rlung 'dod

sogs/ /de bzhin rang rig he ru ka / bla ma ma bsten brtson 'grus med/ /shes rab mi ldan bzod sogs med/ /rigs dang rig pa'i nga rgyal can/ /khe dang grags pa rnyed dang dga'/ /rgyu des log rtog sna tshogs bskyed/ /de bas

he ru kar grags pa'i/ /dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /dad ldan gus bcas pha rol phyin/ /rdzogs byas bla ma dam pa las/ /man ngag yang dag blang bar bya/ /ma mo'i tshogs kyis yang zhus pa/ /he ru ka dpal de ltar na/ /

rdo rje phag mo ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rdo rje gsum ste phag ni gnyis/ /don gyi rdo rje de nas rtags/ /tha ma rdzas kyi rdo rje ste/ /don gyi rdo rje bzhi pa ste/ /gzung 'dzin rnam par rtog pa yis/ /mi phyed

phyir na rdo rje ste/ /dbang bzhis rdo rje re re'o/ /rtags kyi rdo rje gsum yin te/ /rtse gsum rtse lnga rtse dgu ste/ /rtse gsum sku gsung thugs kyi rtags/ /rtse lnga ye shes lnga yin te/ /khams gsum sa dgu 'joms pa yi/ /rtags

su rdo rje rtse dgu'o/ /rdzas kyi rdo rje bzhi yin te/ /zlum po la sogs rnam pa bzhi/ /mi shes dri mas ches gos pa'i/ /dud 'gror skyes pa'i phag mo dang / /shes rab char byung phag mo ste/ /de nyid rnam pa bzhi ru nges/ /bum dbang

zhe sdang gti mug phag /gsang dbang rlung gi gti mug phag /gsum pa chags dga' gti mug phag /bzhi pa chos dbyings gti mug phag /'di nyid khyod la legs par gtad/ /thams cad rjes su yi rang ngo / /dpal me'i

\u0fd4\u0fd4/ /phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shrI he ru ka'i nges par 'byung ba rdzogs s+ho// ! //rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o/ /

rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra sid+ha dzA la sa~M ba ra tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje grub pa dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/

bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas rin po che'i khang bzang gi nang na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / dga' ba'i 'od dang dri ma med pa'i 'od la sogs pa dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dus su rigs sgyu ma'i dbang du mdzad de thams cad kyis lha'i phyi nang gsang ba bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod pa'i dus su byang chub sems dpa'

byams pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas gsol pa/ mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa/ /de nyid don dam gang yin pa/ /dpal dang rdo rje don dang ni/ /dra ba sdom pa rgyud kyi don/ /des

bstan don ni gang yin pa/ /de nyid bdag la bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /byams pa la sogs 'khor rnams kun/ /phyi rol don la g.yeng ba'i sems/ /nang du bsdus la rtse gcig nyon/ /dpal

ni gnyis med ye shes te/ /de nyid mchod pa'i 'os yin la/ /gnyis med bde bas mchod par bya/ /rdo rje zhes bya ye shes lnga/ /gzung 'dzin rtog pas mi phyed phyir/ /rdo rje zhes ni bstan pa yin/ /de nyid don la rtse gcig pas/ /

chos sku rdo rje 'chang chen po'i/ /sa ni nges par 'thob pa'o/ /dra ba zhes pa mang po'i don/ /kun rdzob gzhan rig tu bstan pa/ /grangs mang rgya cher bstan pa ni/ /nam mkha' dang mtshungs sdom pa'i don/ /nam mkha' dang mtshungs

rang rig ni/ /sems kyi de nyid stong pa'i ro/ /skad cig de yi rgyun nyid la/ /rgyud ces bya bar bstan pa yin/ /dpal rdo rje grub pa dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud las mtshan gyi sdom pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas gzhan yang nga

yis bshad/ /ye shes skye ba'i rgyu dang gnas/ /rkyen dang de bzhin dmigs pa'i yul/ /bye brag ming gi rnam grangs dang / /don gyi rnam grangs gang yin dang / /phan yon dang ni 'bras bu dang / /don dam de nyid chos kyi dbyings/ /de nyid

'dir ni bshad par bya/ /rgyu ni rang rig ye shes te/ /rgyu med rgyu yi rang bzhin can/ /rang rig sgyu mar byung ba ni/ /bde chen 'khor lo nas brtsams te/ /'khor lo bzhi 'am brgyad gnyis bshad/ /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/ /ye

shes skye ba'i rten yin la/ /gnas ni de dang mnyam pa'i rtsa/ /grogs ni ye shes rlung yin te/ /ye shes rlung gi bzhon pa la/ /zhon nas de nyid byung ba yin/ /grangs ni snga ma ltar shes bya/ /ngo bo thig le nyid yin te/ /thig le mdud

pa'i grangs su shes/ /de yi phan yon gang yin pa/ /gzung 'dzin rnam par rtog pa yis/ /phyin ci log tu brtags pa yi/ /rnam par rtog pa spong ba yin/ /'bras bu rdo rje 'chang chen po'i/ /sa ni nges par thob pa'o/ /dpal rdo rje

dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud las ye shes kyi rgyu dang gnas la sogs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /'khor lo rnams kyi dbye ba ni/ /bde chen 'khor lo'i 'dab ma ni/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis

grangs yin no/ /de nas longs spyod 'khor lo ni/ /'dab ma bcu drug dag du bstan/ /chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i 'dab ma ni/ /drug bcu rtsa bzhi dag yin no/ /bde chen 'khor lo sor bzhi ste/ /

longs spyod 'khor lo sor bcu drug /chos kyi 'khor lo sor bcu gnyis/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo sor bcu drug /bde chen 'khor lo'i lte ba ru/ /ha~M ni dkar po thur bltas bsam/ /longs spyod 'khor lo'i lte dbus su/ /
oM ni dmar po gyen bltas bsam/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i lte dbus su/ /hU~M ni sngon po thur bltas bsam/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i lte dbus su/ /aM ni dmar po gyen bltas bsam/ /dang po'i 'khor lo'i 'dab ma

la/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug ni/ /lugs 'byung lugs min dgod par bya/ /longs spyod 'khor lo'i 'dab ma la/ /dbyangs yig bcu drug rim bzhin dgod/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i 'dab ma la/ /la~M ma~M pa~M ta~M/ /yi ge 'di rnams

g.yon nas dgod/ /oM trA~M hrI a/ /mtshams nas g.yas su dgod par bya/ /sprul pa'i 'dab ma bzhi rtsibs la/ /gsal byed yi ge sum bcu gnyis/ /lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog tshul dgod/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rtsa

gsum ni/ /dbus nas drang por gnas pa ste/ /hU~M ni dkar po thur bltas pa/ /mar gyi rtse la thug par dgod/ /g.yas na thabs kyi rtsa gnas te/ /ka li sum bcu rtsa gnyis ni/ /thabs la lan gsum bskor byas na/ /lugs

'byung 'og du kha bltas dgod/ /g.yon na shes rab rtsa gnas la/ /ma mo dbyangs yig bcu drug ni/ /gyen la bltas pa dgod par bya/ /sgal tshigs la gnas srog la brten/ /rtsa gsum 'dus pa'i gnas der ni/ /rin chen

dang 'dra 'dud pa ni/ /dgu por gnas pa bya gdong tshul/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ /bde ba reg ster ma ni bzhugs/ /gzhan yang rkyen gyi 'khor lo gnyis/ /gru gsum gnas su yi ge ra~M/ /de ni yongs su gyur pa

las/ /me yi 'khor lo gru gsum pa/ /tshad ni sor gsum nyid yin te/ /lte bar ra~M ni dmar po bsam/ /'dab ma gsum la oM AHhU~M/ /gru gsum zur la dgod bya ba/ /rdo rje rtse gsum bsam par bya/ /rlung gi gnas su

yi ge ya~M/ /de nyid yongs su gyur pa las/ /mdog nag gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra la/ /tshad ni sor bzhi nyid yin no/ /dbus su mdab ma lnga yin te/ /lte bar yang ni nag po bsam/ /'dab ma lnga la d+ha lnga dgod/ /ba dan lnga yis

mtshan pa'o/ /rlung gis dam tshig me sbar bas/ /dam tshig me yis gtum mo bskul/ /'khor lo gsum bsregs rnyid pa tsam/ /yi ge ha~M ni bsros pa yis/ /ha~M bzhu bdud rtsi'i char yang bab/ /lte ba'i gnas su thig ler gyur/ /

rgyun du 'bar bar gyur pa yis/ /rin chen dbyibs 'dra'i nang slebs nas/ /rang bzhin dga' ba nyams myong bas/ /rang gi sems kyi snying po'i ro/ /bzhi pa'i dpal ldan he ru ka /de nyid rtogs par gyur pa yis/ /

chos sku rdo rje 'chang chen po'i/ /sa ni nges par thob pa'o/ /dpal rdo rje grub pa dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud las 'khor lo bzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /yid bzhin nor

bu dang mtshungs pa'i/ /nges don du ni nga yis gsungs/ /de yi don la khyed rnams kyis/ /rtse gcig sems kyis yid la zung / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang byams pa dang / dga' ba'i 'od dang / dri

ma med pa'i 'od la sogs pa dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor dpag tu med pa thams cad dga' zhing mgu nas rjes su yid rang nas lha'i mchod pa rnam pa du mas mchod pa ni nam mkha' la rin po che'i char dang / sgeg

pa dang / rgod pa dang / dga' ba'i mchod pa'i rnam pa dang / pa Ta ha la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang / gzhan yang lha 'i me tog dang / spos dang / mar me dang / zhal zas kyi mchod pa ro rgya pa dang / btung ba'i mchod pas

mchod de/ gzhan yang nang dang / gsang ba dang / gsang ba'i gsang ba bla na med pa'i mchod pa chen po rmad du byung bas mchod nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar gyur to/ /dpal
rdo rje grub pa dra ba sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o/ /

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA bA la dz+nyA na rA dza tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal stobs chen ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ /bcom ldan

'das de kho na nyid btsun mo'i b+ha ga la 'khor dpa' bo rdo rje la sogs pa mkha' 'gro ma dang / ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor te bzhugs pa'i dus su/ dpa' bo rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pas g.yon phyogs su bskor ba lan gsum

byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /dpa' bo rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la spyi bos gtugs te/ ha ha zhes pa gsum brjod nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ rtsa ni gang lags rlung gang lags/ /thig la gang lags grangs ni

du/ /de la sems gzung ji ltar lags/ /'khor lo ji ltar lags pa dang / /de yi grangs ni du zhig mchis/ /rtsa rnams rang bzhin ji ltar lags/ /yi ge dgod thabs ji ltar lags/ /de rnams dbus kyi lte bar ni/ /yi ge dgod pa gang

dang gang / /gtum mo sbar ba ji ltar lags/ /zla ba nyi ma ji ltar lags/ /gnas ni gang du gzung bar bgyi/ /rkyen gnyis 'khor lo ji ltar lags/ /go bzlog tshul ni ji ltar lags/ /gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi gang lags/ /de

rnams kyi ni dgongs pa dang / /de la dga' sogs ji ltar 'byung / /stong pa bcu drug ji ltar lags/ /sa yi rim pa ji ltar lags/ /de rnams kyi ni dgongs pa dang / /dgos pa'i dgongs pa ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ /nyon cig dpa' bo rdo rje khyod/ /khyod la bshad kyis legs par zung / /rtsa rnams kyi ni rang bzhin ni/ /nam mkha' gnyis med thams cad bskyed/ /der gnas rlung gi rang bzhin ni/ /g.yo ba rnam shes g.yo ba yin/ /

thig le stong nyid ngo bo ste/ /stong nyid bsam du med pa'o/ /thig le grangs ni bcu drug ste/ /rtsa dang rlung yang de bzhin no/ /de nas sems gzung bstan pa ni/ /rtsa rlung dang ni thig le la/ /gnyis med rtse gcig sems dang po/ /'khor lo'i

grangs ni bzhi yin te/ /bde chen 'khor lo longs spyod chos/ /de 'og sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste/ /de re la yang bzhi bzhi ste/ /bcu drug grangs su shes par bya/ /me rlung gnyis ni rkyen yin te/ /ro ma'i 'khor lo nyid dang ni/ /spyi gtsug

'khor lo dbang bskur gnas/ /gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi yin te/ /bde skyong 'khor lo dang po ste/ /rta mgrin longs spyod 'khor lo yin/ /rig pa'i 'khor lo gsum pa'o/ /gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi yin no/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi grangs

su bstan/ /rtsa rnams rang bzhin nga yis bshad/ /rtsa ni sa yi rang bzhin te/ /rlung dang thig le'i rang bzhin no/ /de nas yi ge dgod pa ni/ /bde chen 'khor lo sum bcu gnyis/ /gsal byed sum bcu rtsa gnyis ni/ /g.yas nas

bskor te dgod par bya/ /longs spyod 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu drug /dbyangs yig bcu drug g.yon nas dgod/ /chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad/ /yum bzhi'i sa bon g.yon nas dgod/ /thabs ni mtshams te g.yas nas
