bskor/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i 'dab ma ni/ /drug bcu rtsa bzhi gang yin la/ /gsal byed g.yas bskor dgod par bya/ /dbyangs yig gnyis ldan g.yon nas bskor/ /bde chen 'khor lo'i lte dbus su/ /ha~M ni dkar po thur bltas

bsam/ /longs spyod 'khor lo'i lte dbus su/ /oM ni dkar po gyen bltas bsam/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i lte dbus su/ /hU~M ni sngon po thur bltas bsam/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i lte dbus su/ /a ni dmar po gyen bltas

bsam/ /rkyen gyi 'khor lo gnyis yin te/ /dang po'i gnas su yi ge ya~M/ /gtum mo 'bar ba'i ya~M yin te/ /nag po yongs su gyur ba las/ /rlung 'khor mdog gnag gzhu yi dbyibs/ /dbus su d+ha lnga dgod byas nas/ /ba

dan lnga ni mdzes pa'o/ /gru gsum gnas su yi ge ra~M/ /me yi 'khor lo gru gsum dmar/ /dbus su oM AHhU~M ni dgod/ /zur la rdo rje gsum gyis mtshan/ /rkyen gyi 'khor lo de ltar yin/ /rlung gis bskyod pas dam tshig mes/ /
ye shes me ni bskul ba mkhas/ /'khor lo bzhi 'am brgyad gnyis bshad/ /bde chen ma rtogs gnyis tsam bsregs/ /bde chen ha~M ni bsros byas nas/ /zhu ba 'chi med bdud rtsi ni/ /zla ba zhu ba'i
bdud rtsi yis/ /srog gi rtsa yi nang nas 'bab/ /rgyun du 'bab par gyur pa yis/ /'chi med thigs pa gnyis yin te/ /gzung ba mdud pa'i nang du gzung / /go bzlog lugs su bzlog pa ste/ /mthar thug gnas

su gzung ba'o/ /gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi pa ni/ /gsang ba bde skyong 'khor lo ste/ /hU~M ni lte bar dgod byas nas/ /'dab ma lnga bcu brgyad kyi grangs/ /gsal byed lugs bzhin dgod par bya/ /dbyangs yig rim

gnyis dag bkod nas/ /tha ma bzung ste spangs pa'o/ /sdig pa spong phyir bde skyong ste/ /de phyir bde skyong zhes ni bshad/ /rta mgrin 'khor lo'i 'dab bzung la/ /dbyangs yig lugs dang lugs min dgod/ /lte bar u

ni dgod par bya/ /bde ba'i longs spyod myong ba'i phyir/ /rta mgrin 'khor lo ru ni bshad/ /rig pa'i 'khor lo 'dab ma lnga/ /lte bar ha~M ni dgod byas nas/ /'dab ma lnga la oM hU~M tra~M a/ /g.yas nas rims gyis dgod

par bya/ /bzhi pa'i don ni rig pa'i phyir/ /rig pa'i 'khor lo zhes ni bshad/ /gsang ba'i 'khor lo rim pa drug /lte ba 'dab bzhi 'dab ma brgyad/ /bcu drug sum bcu rtsa gnyis te/ /drug bcu rtsa bzhi bshad pa

yin/ /lte bar a ni dgod pa ste/ /e ba~M ma ya de rnams ni/ /'dab ma bzhi la g.yon nas dgod/ /'dab ma brgyad la dgod bya ba/ /sde brgyad kyi ni dang po brgyad/ /g.yon gyi rim pas dgod par bya/ /'dab ma bcu drug gang yin la/ /

ma mo bcu drug g.yon nas dgod/ /'dab ma sum bcu gnyis sogs la/ /dbyangs yig yi ge bcu drug ni/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi rim pas dgod/ /'dab ma drug bcu rtsa bzhi la/ /g.yas nas kA li lugs bzhin dgod/ /A li rim

gnyis g.yon nas dgod/ /gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i phyir/ /gsang ba'i 'khor lo zhes ni bshad/ /de nas ro ma'i 'khor lo ni/ /'dab ma gnyis la lte bar bcas/ /ma ning bzhi yi 'dab gnyis la/ /lte bar de nyid

thur la dgod/ /rin chen rtse mo bsam bya ba/ /b+h+ya ni gyen la dgod par bya/ /yi ge gnyis kyi dbus su ni/ /byang chub sems kyi bde ba'i ro/ /nyams su myong bar bya ba'i phyir/ /nyams myong ro ma'i 'khor lor bshad/ /de

nas dbang bskur 'khor lo ni/ /steng gi tshangs sgo'i 'dab ma brgyad/ /lte bar a~M ni dgod pa ste/ /da~M la~M kha~M ru~M/ g.yon nas brtsams te phyogs bzhir dgod/ /hU~M trA~M hrI a/ g.yas nas mtshams su rim par dgod/ /

byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun gyis/ /lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa dag /'khrud pa'i phyir na dbang bskur te/ /de phyir dbang bskur 'khor lor bshad/ /de nas yang ni bshad bya ba/ /mdor bsdus bsgom pa bshad par bya/ /

gong du bstan pa gang yin pa/ /sgyu ma tsam du shes par bya/ /rang rig sems las gzhan min te/ /rang gi sems kyi stong pa nyid/ /'od gsal ba yi rang bzhin du/ /ci yang mi rtog shes 'gyur na/ /ma bsgoms
na yang bsgom pa nyid/ /de ltar sems la legs par zung / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dpa' bo rdo rje la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / ma mo la sogs pa'i

'khor dpag tu med pa rjes su yi rang bar gyur te/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /dpal stobs chen ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rmad du byung ba rdzogs s+ho// //

rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ / @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsakra sa~M ba ra tan+t+ra rA dza ad+b+hu ta sh+mA sA ni a la~M ka ra nA ma/ bod skad du/
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dur khrod kyi rgyan rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so/ /de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams kyis phyi'i mchod pa dang / nang dang /

gsang ba dang / de kho na nyid kyi mchod pas mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ho bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /dpal zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags/ /'khor lo zhes pa gang la bgyi/ /sdom pa nyid kyang ji lta bu/ /

rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar lags/ /de bzhin rgyud kyi rgyal po ci/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dpal ni gnyis med ye shes te/ /'khor lo rnam pa bzhi ru brjod/ /phyi nang gsang ba de nyid do/ /dang
po phyi yis 'khor lo ni/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan lha yi sku/ /drug bcu rtsa gnyis rim pa ste/ /ye shes dam tshig sku gsung thugs/ /dkyil 'khor phyogs mtshams rim pa bzhin/ /lugs 'byung lugs las

bzlog pa ni/ /tha mal gcod pas phyi ru bshad/ /gnyis pa nang gi 'khor lo ni/ /gnas sogs sa bcu'i rim pa rnams/ /mtho ris sa stengs sa 'og dang / /'khor lo sgo la dgod pa ni/ /phyi rol spros pa gcod pa'o/ /

gsum pa gsum pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /sprul pa chos dang longs spyod dang / /de bzhin bde ba chen po ste/ /rtsa chen sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi/ /gnas su gyur pas sdug bsngal gcod/ /dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' dang / /

rnam pa'i dga' ba'i gnyen po ni/ /bde ba stong pa mi rtog gsum/ /dbyer med rtogs pas lhan skyes la/ /de kho na yi 'khor lor brjod/ /sdom pa phyi nang gsang ba nyid/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /nga rgyal

la sogs nyon mongs pa/ /gnyen pos ye shes ngang du sdom/ /bdag dang dngos por lta ba dang / /tha mal pa yi rnam rtog kyang / /dag pa lha'i 'khor lor sdom/ /gzod nas lus la grub pa yi/ /rtsa dang rlung dang byang sems

dang / /a ba d+hU tI'i nang du sdom/ /bde ba stong pa mi rtog dang / /dngos dang dngos med ye shes kyang / /dbyer med gnyug ma'i ngang du sdom/ /rgyud ces bya ba rgyun yin te/ /gnas skabs gsum gyi dri ma dang / /'jug dang zhugs

dang nges pa yis/ /rgyu dang thabs dang 'bras bu ste/ /dang po 'khor ba'i rang bzhin la/ /gnyis pa thun mong mya ngan 'das/ /rgyal po zhes pa rnam pa bzhi/ /'og ma'i yon tan ldan pa dang / /nges pa'i don la dbang byed dang / /

gnyen po ye shes che ba dang / /gnas la khyab pas rgyal po yin/ /rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa/ /dur khrod brgyad ni ji ltar lags/ /de yi dgongs pa ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /phyi nang

gsang ba de nyid kyis/ /dur khrod rnam pa bzhi ru 'gyur/ /dang po phyi yi dur khrod ni/ /rdo rje ra ba'i nang rol lam/ /yang na phyi rol grwa rnams su/ /lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa ni/ /gtum drag dang ni tshang tshing dang / /
'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i keng rus dang / /'jigs sde rnams ni shar sogs kyi/ /phyogs su g.yon nas bskor te gnas/ /ha har rgod pa dbang ldan te/ /dpal gyi nags tshal byin zer ro/ /'jigs pa'i mun pa bden

bral du/ /rlung mtshams ki li ki lir sgrogs/ /shar du ha ri pa s+ye la/ /gtum drag dkar po glang po'i gdong / /byang du byang chub shing bu la/ /g+ha ra ser po mi yi gdong / /nub du mya ngan med shing la/ /'bar 'khrugs

dmar po chu srin gdong / /lho ru tsU ti'i shing bu la/ /'jigs ste nag po ma he'i gdong / /me ru ka ran tsa na sde/ /dpal gyi nags tshal ra gdong dmar/ /bden bral ardzu'i shing bu la/ /'jigs pa'i mun pa ma he'i gdong / /rlung du

srid grub shing bu la/ /ki li sgra sgrogs ri dgas gdong / /dbang ldan n+ya gro d+ha shing la/ /ha har rgod pa ba glang gdong / /g.yas na gri gug thod pa g.yon/ /shing lo'i steng na stod phyung ngo / /shar du brgya byin dkar po

la/ /rdo rje sdigs mdzub glang po zhon/ /byang du lus ngan ser po la/ /dbyug pa 'dzin cing gter la zhon/ /nub du chu bdag dmar po ni/ /chu srin zhon nas zhags pa thogs/ /lho ru gshin rje nag po la/ /ma he zhon nas be con

thogs/ /shar lho me lha dmar ser la/ /ra la zhon nas me thab 'dzin/ /lho nub srin po smug nag la/ /ral gri thogs nas mi la zhon/ /nub byang rlung lha mdog sngon po/ /ri dgas zhon nas 'phan ni 'phyar/ /byang shar dbang

ldan dkar po ni/ /khyu mchog zhon nas rtse gsum thogs/ /thams cad rang rang rig mas 'khyud/ /nor rgyas dang ni 'jog po dang / /stobs kyis rgyu dang pad ma dag /shar nas brtsams te g.yon du dgod/ /pad ma che dang

mtha' yas dang / /rigs ldan dang ni dung skyong ni/ /g.yas kyi phyogs nas dgod pa'o/ /sgra sgrogs pa dang rmugs pa dang / /mun pa can dang kun du 'khyil/ /shar nas byang gi phyogs su dgod/ /'khrigs pa gang ba 'bab

pa dang / /drag po sprin tshogs mtshams la dgod/ /rdo rje rin chen pad ma dang / /las dang dam tshig rnal 'byor ma/ /sna tshogs 'jig rten mkha' 'gro rnams/ /shin du 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis ni/ /ro la spyod cing mkha'

la rgyu/ /gzhan yang rnal 'byor mchod rten dang / /chu dang me sogs rim pa ste/ /gza' dang par ta grub pa rnams/ /rol pa chen po'i tshul du gnas/ /'byung po'i gdon dang ro langs dang / /stag dang khyi dang ce spyang dang / /wa dang

'ug pa bya rgod dang / /phyed tshig pa dang rnam par dpyangs/ /mgo bo lus po rus rkang rnams/ /a la phe~M mig sgra sgrogs pa/ /de nas nang gi dur khrod ni/ /lus kyi skra sen spu la sogs/ /skye zhing 'jig par byed pas na/ /dur

khrod chen po lus la dgod/ /de nas gsang ba'i dur khrod ni/ /rtsa chen sum bcu rtsa gnyis nas/ /'byung 'jug gnas pa'i rlung rnams ni/ /dbugs rgyu zhes pa dur khrod do/ /rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad dang / /dngos po'i

rtog pa sna tshogs pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi dur du mchi/ /gsang ba rig pa'i ye shes khrod/ /de nas dur khrod dgos pa ni/ /rnam shes dag pas dur khrod la/ /phyogs skyong mi dge bcu po spong / /sangs rgyas brgyad kyi mtshan

ma shing / /thugs rje'i rtags su shing brgyad la/ /zhing skyong sngags kyi theg pa bsrung / /gdug pa 'joms phyir klu brgyad dgod/ /mchod rten rang sangs rgyas kyi gnas/ /rnal 'byor btul zhugs spyod pa byed/ /chu ni brjod

bya zab pa la/ /me sogs rtog pa bral ba'o/ /rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa/ /bcom ldan 'das ni ji ltar lags/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /sku dang gsung thugs ji ltar lags/ /btsun mo'i b+ha ga ji lta

bu/ /bzhugs pa'i don ni ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nyon mongs bdud dang 'chi bdag bdud/ /lha yi bu dang phung po'i bdud/ /bdud bzhi bcom pas bcom pa la/ /ldan pa yon tan drug nyid

de/ /dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang / /dpal dang grags dang skal pa bzang / /ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ni/ /drug po de la ldan zhes gsungs/ /'khor ba'i chos ni mya ngan te/ /de dang bral phyir 'das pa'o/ /

'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /'gro ba'i don mdzad de bzhin gshegs/ /thams cad dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor gnas/ /btsun mo zhes pa chos kyi dbyings/ /de la yod phyir b+ha ga ste/ /

mi phyed pas na bzhugs zhes bya/ /rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa/ /dpa' bo zhes pa gang la bgyi/ /de bzhin dpa' mo nyid kyang ci/ /de yi mchod pa ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dpa' bo la

yang rnam bzhi ste/ /bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi/ /lha yi rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis/ /tha mal pa'i rnam rtog spong / /des na phyi yi dpa' bor bshad/ /gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi/ /rtsa rlung thig le

bsgoms pa yis/ /mtshan ma'i rnam rtog 'joms pa ni/ /nang gi dpa' bor bshad pa yin/ /gsum pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi/ /dga' ba bzhi yi don bsgoms pas/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa 'joms/ /de ni gsang ba'i dpa'

bo yin/ /bzhi pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi/ /gnyis su med pa gang bsgoms pas/ /tha dad rtog pa 'joms pa'i phyir/ /de kho na yi dpa' bor bshad/ /dpa' mo la yang rnam pa bzhi/ /ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /gdod nas spros

bral lhun grub la/ /lta ba'i zhen pa spong ba ni/ /de ni phyi yi dpa' mor bshad/ /nang du rtsa dang thig le sogs/ /rang bzhin med par byed pas ma/ /gsang bar dga' ba bzhi rnams la/ /rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pas ma/ /rang rig sems kyis

ngo bo ni/ /nam mkha' lta bur gang bsgom pa/ /de kho na yi dpa' mo'o/ /mchod pa yang ni rnam pa bzhi/ /phyi nang gsang ba de kho na/ /dang po phyi yi mchod pa ni/ /me tog bdug spos mar me dang / /dri dang lha bshos btung ba dang / /rol mo sil snyan dbyangs

nyid dang / /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni/ /ro dang reg bya 'jam pa dang / /'khor lo rin chen glang po rta/ /btsun mo dmag dpon blon po rnams/ /phyi yi mchod pa thun mong ngo / /rang gi lus las byung ba yi/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang btung ba dang / /sha lnga lhag

pa'i rdzas rnams ni/ /phung po khams dang skye mched kyi/ /'khor lo rnams la mchod pa nang / /de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa ni/ /rang snang thabs kyi rig ma yis/ /skra gzung b+ha ga ku tsa btsir/ /rtsa dang rlung dang thig le sogs/ /dga' ba mchog dga'

dga' bral dang / /lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba mchod/ /rang rig stong par rtogs pa yi/ /'od gsal de nyid chos sku la/ /zhen pa rnams dang bral ba ni/ /bla na med pa'i mchod pa'o/ /rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa/ /gtor ma zhes pa gang la

bgyi/ /de yi phan yon ji ltar 'byung / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gtor ma rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs/ /phyi nang gsang ba de kho na/ /dang po phyi yi gtor ma ni/ /thun mtshams lha yi mdun nyid du/ /ra~M las me dang ya~M las

rlung / /sgyed gsum a las dum gcig pa'i/ /nang du bdud rtsi sha lnga la/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /lha rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / /mkha' 'gro dgyes par byed pa'o/ /gnyis pa nang gi gtor ma ni/ /phung po khams

dang skye mched rnams/ /lus ni lha yi 'khor lo la/ /rtsa ni ye shes mkha' 'gro ma/ /srin bu las kyi mkha' 'gro mchod/ /gsum pa gsang ba'i gtor ma ni/ /'khor lo bzhi yi ka pA lar/ /rlung dang thig le bdud rtsi la/ /

dga' ba gsum gyis byin brlabs te/ /lhan cig skyes pa mchod par bya/ /de nyid bzhi pa'i gtor ma ni/ /phyi nang dngos po'i gtor ma kun/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi pad snod du/ /don dam sems kyi gsum sngags kyis/ /bde ba

chen po'i ngang la mchod/ /phan yon dngos grub ster ba dang / /phyi nang bar chad sel ba dang / /zas kyi rtog pa choms pa dang / /khams dang skye mched rtas pa dang / /rgas sra lus kyi mdangs ldan zhing / /skra dkar gnyer ma spong ba

dang / /dngos po'i gdon las grol ba dang / /'khor ba'i pha rol son pa'o/ /lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ /sems kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu/ /de las 'khrul nas ji ltar 'khor/ /ma 'khrul don la ji ltar gzhag /
de las yon tan ji ltar 'byung / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sems las ma gtogs sangs rgyas dang / /sems las ma gtogs chos gzhan dag /sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gzigs shing / /ma gsungs

gsung bar mi 'gyur te/ /des na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sems kyi gsang 'di gsang ba'i mchog /khams gsum brtan dang g.yor bcas pa/ /snang ba myong zhing grub pa med/ /de phyir 'khor ba'i ming yang med/ /thog
mar ma skyes rang bzhin dag /glo bur sangs rgyas ming yang med/ /sangs rgyas sems can gnyis ma yin/ /kun rdzob don dam gnyis ma yin/ /rang bzhin rig pa 'od gsal sogs/ /smrar med brjod du med

pa ste/ /dper na lkugs pas ro myong 'dra/ /ras dang shel 'dra'i rang bzhin la/ /log rtog rtsi sogs rnam par 'khrul/ /khams gsum brtan dang g.yor snang zhing / /'dod pa'i byang chub sna tshogs dang / /de dag spyod pa sna

tshogs dag /de nyid g.yeng dang rnam rtog ste/ /rang gis 'khrul nas rang gis 'ching / /rang gis gsod cing rang gis za/ /rang gis ltung zhing rang sdug bsngal/ /rang rig ye nas spros bral la/ /sgra dang tha snyad 'jug na 'khrul/ /

rang rig ngang gis 'od gsal la/ /ma rig mun pas bsgribs na 'khrul/ /dngos po stong par ro mnyam la/ /blang dang dor bar byed na 'khrul/ /'dod yon ngang gis 'gag pa la/ /de dag dka' bas spong na 'khrul/ /rang rig

ye nas stong pa la/ /'dod yon lnga la brten na 'khrul/ /dman dang gya nom med pa la/ /sgro dang skur pa 'debs na 'khrul/ /gdod nas spros bral lhun grub la/ /sgom dang mi sgom byed na 'khrul/ /sangs rgyas sems can gnyis

med la/ /de dag gnyis su 'dzin na 'khrul/ /don dam kun rdzob gnyis med la/ /bden pa gnyis su 'byed na 'khrul/ /sangs rgyas 'khor ba'i chu bo rgal/ /skye 'gag gang ltar 'dod kyang 'khrul/ /stong nyid ro la mi gnas

par/ /dngos po mtshan mar gnas na 'khrul/ /sems kyi glang chen mi 'dul bar/ /g.yeng ba'i sems su 'dug na 'khrul/ /rnam rtog rlung gis bskyod pa la/ /rang rig ye shes 'dod na 'khrul/ /rang sems rang gis ma

mthong bar/ /che ba'i nga rgyal smra na 'khrul/ /rang rig nyams su ma myong bar/ /dkar po'i chos rnams spong na 'khrul/ /sangs rgyas ma 'khrul sems can 'khrul/ /rang bzhin ma 'khrul rang rig 'khrul/ /sems nyid ma 'khrul

bag chags 'khrul/ /sangs rgyas las 'khrul sems can de/ /rang rig las 'khrul gzhan rig snang / /sems nyid las 'khrul bag chags 'byung / /des na rang sems 'khrul pa dag /don du snang ba rab tu skye/ /skye ba med bzhin skye bas 'khrul/ /lcags

bsregs sa gzhi rang gi sems/ /me sogs byed pa gzhan na med/ /bkres skom sdug bsngal rang gi sems/ /zas skom bkres pa gzhan na med/ /brdeg btsog lcags bzhus rang gi sems/ /srog gcod shan pa gzhan na med/ /'gro ba thams cad

rang sems kun/ /rang gi sems su ma shes na/ /de yis sangs rgyas spangs pa yin/ /bla ma dam pa rtag tu bsten/ /theg chen zab mo'i mdo rgyud blta/ /bsgom du med pa'i don bsgoms na/ /ma bsgoms na yang bsgom pa'i mchog /de ltar gyur pa'i

mkhas pa la/ /stong par mi 'gyur gang yang med/ /de las mya ngan 'das pa 'byung / /sku dang stobs la sogs pa kun/ /nor bu'i tshul du rang bzhin 'byung / /de dag sems kyi phan yon no/ /lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ /rten gyi gang zag

rnam pa du/ /rgyud kyi rnam grangs du zhig mchis/ /gdul bya gang la rgyud rnams bshad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin pas/ /gdol pa ko lpags mkhan la sogs/ /gzugs ngan gsod pa'i don gnyer

ba/ /theg pa 'di las 'grub par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bsgom pa dang / /gtso bo yab yum bsgom pa dang / /dbu ma'i spyan la sems 'dzin pa/ /bskyed rim spros dang bcas pa'i lam/ /rigs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /lha sogs bu mo mtshan

ldan la/ /chags pas chags pa spong ba ni/ /las kyi phyag rgya chags pa'i lam/ /gnas pa rtsa dang g.yo ba rlung / /bkod pa byang sems dman ba dbyibs/ /zab pa sngags dang thig le dang / /mthar thug yan lag bdun bsgoms pa/ /chos kyi phyag rgya grol ba'i lam/ /rten

yod ma yin brten pa med/ /dmigs pa thams cad rnam bsal te/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i don bsgom pa/ /phyag rgya chen por rang byin brlab/ /de rnams gnyis su bsdu ba ste/ /gang zag mchog dang las dang po/ /las dang po la phyi nang gnyis/ /mchog la yang ni phyi nang gnyis/ /dbang

bzhi bgrod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang / /dge slong chen po gsungs pa ste/ /'di yis rgyud rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud ni rnam pa gsum/ /bshad rgyud sum bcu rtsa gnyis te/ /yan lag rgyud ni grangs las 'das/ /rtsa ba chen po phyi ma dang / /

phyi ma'i phyi mar bsdus pa yin/ /bram ze rgyal rigs rje rigs dang / /dmangs rigs gdol pa gdul don du/ /rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhir gsungs te/ /bya spyod rnal 'byor bla med do/ /lha mos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das/ /gnas gang du ni gtso bo bsgom/ /thabs ni rnam pa du zhig mchis/ /de bzhin thabs las

byung ba ci/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /ri rtse dur khrod ro steng du/ /gcer bu skra bshig lhor bltas te/ /A li kA lis lus bsrungs la/ /dpa' bo'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya/ /smin par byed pa dbang bzhi la/ /grol ba bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi lam/ /lam gnyis la ni brten nas su/ /sngags pas

byang chub bsgrub par bya/ /bum pas lus kyi dri ma 'khrud/ /gsang bas ngag gi dri ma 'khrud/ /gsum pas sems kyi dri ma ste/ /de ni kun du brtags pa la/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa/ /bkru ba'i phyir na bzhi pa bshad/ /gnas dang ldang ba nyid dang ni/ /'jug dang yongs su rdzogs pa

dang / /byin gyis brlab dang dbang bskur dang / /ting 'dzin mchod pa bskyed rim la/ /nye bar bsdu ba rdzogs pa'i rim/ /rim gnyis mnyam par gnas nas su/ /rdo rje can gyis chos 'chad do/ /stong pa mngon gyur chos sku la/ /mtshan dpe bde ba longs spyod sku/ /rol pa'i mdzad pa sprul sku la/ /sku

gsum dbyer med bde chen dang / /lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ /gang gis bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang la bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /'khor bas skyo nas sdom gsum ldan/ /thos che dang ldan mtshan nyid bzang / /dben par dkyil 'khor bris

smra bcad/ /chos gos gyon la bdud rtsi spyad/ /thun bzhir bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhen pa che ba'i rnal 'byor la/ /lta ba'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /g.yeng ba che ba'i rnal 'byor la/ /bsgom pa'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dam tshig nyams pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /spyod pa'i bar

chad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /le lo che ba'i rnal 'byor la/ /'bras bu'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ /rgyud kyi ngo bo ji lta bu/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud ces gang la bgyi/ /bshad pa'i rgyud ces gang la bgyi/ /'byung ba'i dus ni ji lta bu/ /bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin la/ /rgyud rnams kun gyi ngo bo 'dus/ /yod pa rgyu la bsgrub pa lam/ /mngon 'gyur 'bras bu'i ngo bo yin/ /thog mar gsungs pa rtsa ba'i rgyud/ /phyi nas gsungs pa bshad pa'i rgyud/ /don rnams ston pas rtsa ba la/ /gsal

bar byed pa bshad pa'i rgyud/ /bskal pa rdzogs ldan sum gnyis dang / /rtsod ldan dus bzhi'i rim pa yis/ /rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhir gsungs te/ /bya spyod rnal 'byor bla mad do/ /lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ /zab mo'i rgyud 'di gang la sba/ /ji lta bu la sbyin

par bya/ /ster na lung nod ji ltar bya/ /bka' 'di rgya yis ji ltar gdab/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /snying rje med cing khro la gdug /khengs shing chags pa tshul khrims med/ /dad med rigs ngan bla mas skyo/ /thos chung snying ring rnams la sba/ /

dpa' zhing dul la blo gros ldan/ /bzod ldan drang la g.yo sgyu med/ /dad ldan rigs bzang gtong phod che/ /thos mang dam tshig ldan la sbyin/ /dbang bzhi bgrod pa'i sngags pa yis/ /sngon du bla ma mnyes byas la/ /yar ngo mar ngo'i tshes
bcu la/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor tshogs kyis mchod/ /ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /lha mo rnams la rgyud gtad ltar/ /de bzhin gsang ba'i rgyud sde rnams/ /zung la sgrub pa ched du gyis/ /lan gsum brjod

la rgyud rnams sbyin/ /phyi rabs dus kyi snyigs ma la/ /chags sems gyong ba'i slob ma ni/ /gus pas mi zhu g.yo sgyus 'dod/ /thos nas khungs sub rang che 'byin/ /de la bstan na dam tshig nyams/ /nges par
dad nas zhu ba yi/ /gcig nas gnyis la ma spel na/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rigs rgyun 'chad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i 'khor thams

cad kyis rgyud kyi don rtogs nas rjes su yi rang ngo / /dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dur khrod kyi rgyan rmad du byung ba rdzogs s+ho// // paN+Di ta gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// //dge'o//

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ a nA bi la~M tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /rnyog med rab tu bshad par bya/ /snang

ba med cing dpe med pa/ /tshig gi yul las rnam par 'das/ /zhi zhing bdag med dag pa nyid/ /mtshan med mtshan gzhi rnam par spangs/ /ngang gi sangs rgyas 'di nyid tshul/ /mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi rnam par spangs/ /khyad par du yang mdor bsdus

pas/ /bdag gis gsal bar bshad pa yin/ /rmongs pa rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /snying rjes 'di ni bstan pa yin/ /kha cig stong par 'dod pa dang / /kha cig thig le'i gzugs can dang / /kha cig khyab 'jug tshul gyis ni/ /blo dman dag ni 'jog

par byed/ /de nyid nges par yang dag par/ /rgyu yi gnas kyi spyod yul nyid/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu ma grub na/ /bsgom pa med cing byang chub med/ /rgyu yi yid ches spangs pa 'di/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag /sgyu ma'i ye shes las byung ba/ /rnam

pa sna tshogs ston par byed/ /kha cig drag po'i rang bzhin du/ /kha cig zhi ba chen po che/ /kha cig phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gzugs/ /kha cig 'dar zhing g.yo ba dang / /glu gar de bzhin sil snyan dang / /lha yi sngags ni brjod pa ny-id/ /kha cig

sngags ni yang dag dgod/ /kha cig dkyil 'khor bri ba dang / /dbang la sogs pa brtag pa dang / /'byung dang 'byung las gyur pa'i lus/ /de ltar la sogs mtha' yas mchog /sangs rgyas la sogs rdo rje brtags/ /gang tshe sems ni

legs gnas pa/ /de bzhin nyid kyi spyod yul nyid/ /dkyil 'khor de bzhin 'gyur ba ni/ /phan 'dod rnams ni shes par bya/ /phung po la sogs tshogs rnams kyis/ /gang zhig khyad par gyis bcos pa/ /lus ngag yid gsum

bcos pa'i phyir/ /rdul tshon dkyil 'khor zhes byar gsungs/ /phung sogs gzhan sogs mthong ba'i phyir/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes byar gsungs/ /sems kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa ste/ /rang bzhin med par bsgom par bya/ /

me long lta bu gcig nyid de/ /dang po grur ni rtogs par bya/ /so sor rtog pa zhes gsungs pas/ /shar gyi grwar ni rnam par brgyan/ /bya ba nan tan khyad 'phags pa/ /byang gi grwar ni rnam par spros/ /mnyam nyid ye shes chen po ni/ /bag

chags med grwa rjes rtogs byed/ /gzhan du'ang dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa/ /grwa yi dbus ni thams cad du/ /de nyid 'di ni rab 'jug pas/ /ye shes spyod yul du ni brtag /sgo bzhir yang dag brjod pa ni/ /de bzhin dran pa bzhir byung ba/ /

de bzhin grwa bzhir gsungs pa ni/ /sbyin pa bzhi ni rnam dag pa/ /dbus su dkyil 'khor gzugs su ni/ /mi bskyod pa'i rnam par brgyan/ /zhi dang chos don brgyan pa las/ /de dag thams cad dkyil 'khor 'grub/ /dra ba dra phyed zla

ba sogs/ /dkyil 'khor du ni bris pa dang / /rta babs la sogs thams cad ni/ /ting 'dzin yan lag rta babs nyid/ /sems kyi mthar thug brjod pa ste/ /de nyid rang bzhin las ni gsungs/ /gang zhig sems kyi rab

'phel ba/ /ting 'dzin yan lag rnam par gnas/ /de nyid dra ba zhes su gsungs/ /dra ba phyed pa phyed du ste/ /dril bu do shal brtags pa ni/ /rang gi btsun mo rtogs par byed/ /sgra brnyan rnam pa lta bur ni/ /chos rnams thams

cad so sor rtogs/ /chos rnams ma skyes mthong ba'i phyir/ /de nyid rgyal mtshan phreng bar gsungs/ /bla re la stsogs gang bres pa/ /dngos po la sogs dang por nges/ /sems ni bla re zhes byar bshad/ /dam pa'i don las

gsungs pa'o/ /gos phreng de dag thams cad ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba nyid/ /gang zhig rdo rje rnam pa'i sems/ /dga' ba'i ye shes kyis ni mtshan/ /de yi 'og tu rtag tu gsungs/ /grwa yi mtshams ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje

rin chen rtogs pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje rin po che yis spras/ /zla ba nyi ma gang gsungs pa/ /thabs dang shes rab don mthong phyir/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid sems/ /ye shes 'dis ni rnam par brgyan/ /sku gsung thugs kyi

rdo rje skyes/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor du ni gsungs/ /sku gsung thugs ni nye ba'i phyir/ /rnam pa gcig tu mtshan nyid med/ /bla ma slob ma rnams gsal bar/ /rab tu 'jug pa de nyid gsungs/ /sbyin sreg yang ni bshad pa yang / /lha

rnams tshim pa nga yis brjod/ /rnam rtog med pa'i sems gang ni/ /thab khung sgra yis mtshan pa nyid/ /bye brag phyed pas me nang du/ /gzugs kyi phung sogs lnga po rnams/ /sems las byung ba'i yam shing nyid/ /thams cad kyi ni sreg

lugs bya/ /gzugs la sogs pa gang byung ba/ /yam shing zhes ni rab tu grags/ /de ltar sbyin sreg bshad nas ni/ /rab tu gnas pa brjod par bya/ /sku gsung thugs la rtag tu ni/ /gang zhig sems ni brtan gyur pa/ /de nyid

rab tu gnas par brjod/ /phung po rnams kyi dngos po ci/ /gang zhig sngags kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /de ni gsal bar brjod par bya/ /yid rnams kyis ni skad du yang / /gang zhig gsang ba bdag gis brjod/ /skye ba med cing snang

med pa/ /mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs/ /gsang ba'i don ni rtogs pa'i phyir/ /'di ni nga yis sngags su gsungs/ /sngags ni gsal bar bshad nas ni/ /lha rnams yang ni brjod par bya/ /phung po khams dang skye mched kyi/ /rang

bzhin gyi ni legs gnas gang / /yang dag byang chub thar pa nyid/ /de kun yang dag rab brtags shing / /gal te sems kyi nyer brtags gang / /lha zhes bya bar yang dag bshad/ /sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya las/ /de nyid du ni yang dag

gsungs/ /lha la gsol btab rnal 'byor ni/ /gsal bar nga yis brjod par bya/ /de nas skyil krung bcas nas ni/ /sna yi rtse mor bltas nas kyang / /rang gi rang bzhin rnal 'byor gyis/ /de nyid mthong ba gzhag par bya/ /snying ga'i

gnas su lag pa gnyis/ /'bad pas mnyam par sbyar nas su/ /mi rtog pa yi rang bzhin du/ /gang tshe sems ni rab rgyu ba/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag /de tshe de la skye bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag /

myur bar byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag /sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa'i bdag /thugs kyi rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin/ /rnal 'byor sangs rgyas thams cad 'gyur/ /nga yis gsal bar brjod pa ni/ /sku gsung

thugs kyi grub sbyin pa/ /sangs rgyas kun mchog gsang ba'i don/ /thabs dang shes rab spyod yul don/ /sems can don du snying rje che/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa/ /sna rtse'i dkyil 'khor nga yis gsungs/ /de dag thams cad dbyibs

tsam du/ /mdor bsdus thams cad ma byas so/ /res 'ga' dam tshig 'khor lo yang / /de nyid zhes bya ma gsungs so/ /rtogs pa cung zad tsam gyis ni/ /gang 'grub de ni res dga' yang / /gsung gi 'khor lor gsungs pa yin/ /rnam

rtog med par lhag mos pas/ /sgrub po dam pas bsgrub par bya/ /khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha /bshang ba dang ni gci ba nyid/ /dam tshig zhes bya rab 'bad par/ /gang zhig bdag gis tshig gsungs pa/ /de rnams kun la de bzhin

gshegs/ /de rnams tha snyad tsam gyis gnas/ /gang tshe dam tshig 'dod chags sems/ /des ni de nyid rab tu spyod/ /gang tshe sems ni chags gyur pa/ /de ni sems can yod ma yin/ /de la kun du rtog pa yi/ /khrag ni za bar

'gyur ba'o/ /khrag ni chen po zos nas ni/ /'od dpag med pa'ang bza' bar bya/ /gang zhig chos rnams las skyes pa/ /khu ba'i sgrar ni bsgrags par bya/ /de tshe ma skyes rtogs pa'i phyir/ /bza' bar yang dag gsungs pa

nyid/ /dngos po kun gyi mnyam pa nyid/ /sha chen du ni rab du dbye/ /mi dmigs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /bza' ba zhes byar mngon par brjod/ /gang zhig rab tu 'dzag pa'i sems/ /nus pa'i rjes su sbyor ba las/ /phyag rgya

las kyi sbyor ba yis/ /de yang gci ba'i sgra yis brjod/ /chos dang chos min nges pa'i sems/ /sbas pa'i char ni gnas pa 'di/ /chos rnams thams cad rab rtogs pa'o/ /bshang ba za bar yang dag brjod/ /dam tshig

nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /'di rnams thams cad gsal bar bshad/ /'di rnams don ni rtogs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur/ /dpal bde ba dam pa rtogs par byed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud

byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma dra ba sdom pa'i brtag pa rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// //ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun to ShAn ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e ba~M bA dI ma hA

shra ma NAH/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN Di ta g+ha ya d+hA ra dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI sa~M ba ra kha sa ma tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal bde mchog nam

mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung

dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba/ gsang ba chen po

de bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rdo rje snying po khyod nyon cig /srog dang lnga pa de bzhin du/ /lam dang 'bras bu nyid yin no/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das srog gang lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ /srog ni 'dzin par byed pa ste/ /sngags dang rlung dang rten nyid do/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lnga pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sangs rgyas lnga dang

'byung ba lnga/ /lnga pa yang ni gcig nyid do/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lam gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smin pa dang ni grol ba'o/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ smin pa'i

lam ni gang lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bum pa gsang ba shes rab dang / /bzhi pa'i rang bzhin ngo bo ste/ /de yi rnam pa de la gnas/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das grol ba'i lam gang lags/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /snying rje chen po las skyes pa/ /dga' ba'i shugs las rnam par grub/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med mchog /bde ba chen po lam yin no/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni gang / dga' ba ni gang / thabs ni gang / shes rab ni gang / gnyis su med pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dmigs pa med pa snying rje'i mchog /dga' ba gnyis med

bde ba che/ /thabs ni he ru ka dpal nyid/ /shes rab rdo rje rnal 'byor ma/ /gnyis su med pa zung 'jug mchog /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das he ru ka ni gang lags/ rnal 'byor ma ni gang lags/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /he ru ka ni phung po nyid/ /phung po yang ni he ru ka /khams ni rdo rje ma dpal te/ /rdo rje ma dpal khams nyid do/ /skye mched de yang de bzhin du/ /lha yi ngo bor shes par bya/ /rdo rje snying pos

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das phung po'i he ru ka gang lags/ khams kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /he ru ka dpal bdag nyid dngos/ /dri ma med pa'i kha dog can/ /rdo rje dril

bu 'dzin pa ste/ /drug gis brgyan cing dgu dang ldan/ /zla tshes sna tshogs rdo rje dang / /rigs kyi bdag pos rnam par brgyan/ /spyan gsum dag gis mdzes pa ste/ /chags pa med pa'i sham thabs can/ /shes rab rang bzhin

rnal 'byor ma/ /ban+du dmar po'i kha dog can/ /gcer bu phyag rgya lngas brgyan cing / /dag pa lnga bcu yi phreng bas mdzes/ /rdo rje pad ma'i snod snams pa/ /yab la 'khyud cing brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /gnyis med

bde ba la dgyes pa/ /chu skyes nyi ma'i dbus na 'gying / /khams nyid kyang ni lha nyid do/ /dpal bde mchog nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dum bu ste le'u dang po'o// // rdo rje snying pos

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ni gang lags/ ngo bo nyid kyis 'od gsal ba ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /brtan dang g.yo ba thams cad kun/ /shes rab rang bzhin ma nyid de/ /lnga

pa'i ngo bo 'od gsal nyid/ /ma skyes rtog pa bral ba'i sku/ /brjod du med cing bsam mi khyab/ /rtog pa med pa nam mkha'i dbus/ /gnyis med bde ba'i rnam pa can/ /gsal ba'i rang bzhin g.yo ba med/ /gnyisu med pa bde ba'i
mchog /'bras bu lam gyi rnam pa'o/ /dpal bde mchog nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dum bu ste le'u gnyis pa'o// // rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par rtog

pa rnam par dag pa ni gang lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sngags dang sbyin sreg gtor ma dang / /dbang gi rnam par dag pa dang / /maN+Dal dang ni de bzhin du/ /bum pa'i ngo bo lhar shes pa/ /sngags kyi de bzhin gnas

pa'o/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngags ni gang / sbyin sreg ni gang / gtor ma ni gang / dbang ni gang / maN+Dal ni gang / bum pa ni gang / sngags kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ sngags ni gsang sngags rgyal po ste/ oM shrI badzra he he ru ru ka~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra swA hA/ oM hrIHha ha hUM phaT/ sar+b+ba bu d+ha DA ki nI ye badzra war+N+Na nI ye hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM badzra bai ro tsa nI ye hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/

gsang sngags rgyal po 'di dag gis/ /bskal pa stong la sogs pa yi/ /sdig pa ma lus dag byed chu/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /'khor lo dag gis rnam par mdzes/ /a shwat+tha dang n+ya gro d+ha/ /dUr ba la sogs de bzhin du/ /bzhi

ba'i ngo bor yang dag shes/ /sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi lnga/ /gyen du pheM gyi sgra bsgrags pas/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun dgyes/ /dbang ni tha ma'i lam nyid do/ /bdud rtsi chu yis legs byugs nas/ /me tog dmar pos mchod pa'o/ /rin

chen snod bzangs bru~M gyis mdzes/ /dpa' bo bdud rtsi dag byed chu/ /zhal bzhi sngags kyi 'od zer gyis/ /gdug pa ma lus kun 'dul zhing / /spro dang bsdu ba'i rnam pa can/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das skye

mched kyi mkha' 'gro ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gcer bu thal ba'i mdog can te/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i yul rnams 'grim/ /lnga pa dang ni drug pa'o/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan

'das sngags ni gang / gtor ma ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM dz+wa la mu khi DA ki nI ka~M ka ni hU~M phaT/ oM pa ri nA ya ni DA ki nI hU~M phaT/ oM ma Di ra DA ki nI hU~M phaT/ oM pa ra mu khi DA ki nI hU~M phaT/

oM u lu ka ti DA ki nI hU~M phaT/ oM a ra na ma ni DA ki nI hU~M phaT/ chu skyes dag gis rnam brgyan cing / /bdud rtsi lnga yis rnam par mdzes/ /dpa' mo drug ni mnyes par 'gyur/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan

'das rnam pa'i ngo bo ni gang / /sprul pa'i ngo bo ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rnam pa'i ngo bo lha nyid de/ /sprul pa tshogs kyi bdag por bshad/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshogs

kyi bdag po ni gang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dbang gi kha dog dmar po ste/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /sprul pa 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gnas/ /brkyang bskum tshul gyis mnan pa'o/ /rdo rje snying pos

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsnyen par bya ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bsnyen par bya ba sngags nyid de/ /oM ga Na pata ye swA hA/ nag po 'bru yi ri lu la/ /bsnyen dang sgrub pa'i lhar gnas
pa/ /sngags kyi ngo bor shes par bya/ /dpal bde mchog nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las las sna tshogs kyi dum bu ste le'u gsum pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang

chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje gnod gnas la sogs pa dang / rnal 'byor ma dpag tu med pa'i 'khor de dag rjes su yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod

do/ /kha che'i mkhan po dz+nyA na badzras rang 'gyur du mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// // ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun to ShAn ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e ba~M bA dI ma hA shra ma NAH/ /ma~M ga la b+ha ba tu/

shu b+hamastu sarba dzA ga ta~M/ shu b+ha/ ma~M ga la~M b+ha ba tu/ shu b+hamastu sarba dzA ga ta~M/ shu b+ha~M/ @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ DA ki nI sarba tsit+ta a dwa ya a tsin+ta dz+nyA na badzra bA rA hi a b+hi b+ha ba tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ mkha' 'gro ma

thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes rdo rje phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ mgon po dpa' bo 'jigs byed dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis

thos pa dus gcig na/ phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'i dur khrod chen po'i gnas mchog tu gyur pa na/ bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang / gti mug 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang / nga rgyal 'joms pa'i he ru ka

dang / 'dod chags 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang / phrag dog 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang / yum sangs rgyas spyan dang / yum mA ma kI dang / yum gos dkar mo dang / yum dam tshig sgrol ma dang / yum kun du bzang mo dang / de

rnams kyi b+ha ga la lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul du bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma dur khrod kyi bdag mo dang / khros ma nag mo dang / bde chen dkar mo dang / ser mo don

grub ma dang / dmar mo sgra sgrog ma dang / sna tshogs mthar phyin ma dang / las kyi gtso mo la sogs pa'i ye shes dang / las la grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / gzhan yang badzra DA ki nI dang / rat+na DA ki nI dang / pad+ma

DA ki nI dang / karma DA ki nI dang / sa ma ya DA ki nI dang / bi Sha DA ki nI dang / sarba DA ki nI dang / lo ka DA ki nI la sogs te dur khrod brgyad kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang / dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / gzhan yang 'jig

rten pa'i mes po changs pa dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / gzhan yang rgyal po chen po bzhi po rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / phyogs skyong ba bcu dang / lha ma srin sde brgyad dang / 'khor

dpag tu med pa dang thabs gcig pa'i tshul gyis gnas so/ /yang de'i tshe na ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma dur khrod kyi bdag mo zhes bya ba rang gi stan las langs nas mgon po dpa' bo 'jigs byed he ru ka la 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /kye kye mgon po bdag la gson/ /khyed kyi 'khor du 'dus pa yi/ /skal dang ldan pa 'di rnams la/ /lam log mu stegs ma lags pa'i/ /dman pa nyan thos ma lags pa'i/ /ma smin mtshan nyid ma
lags pa'i/ /bsam gyis mi khyab chos cig zhu/ /phyogs ris med pa lta ba'i mchog /bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/ /dgag sgrub med pa spyod pa'i mchog /bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/ /bar
chod sel ba bde yi mchog /bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/ /smin par byed pa dbang gi mchog /bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/ /sangs rgyas thob byed 'bras bu'i mchog /ye shes lnga yi gzugs
brnyan te/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/ /rnam rtog sel byed rnam rgyal lnga/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis

\u0fd3\u0fd3/ /mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas mgon po des spyan phyogs mtshams kun la gzigs nas zhal rdo rje'i mgur 'dzum pa mdzad nas

bka' stsal pa ni/ e ma ho/ nyon gcig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/ /dus 'dir tshogs pa'i 'khor rnams la/ /mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud bshad kyis/ /kha sbub zhabs rdol dri ma can/ /snod skyon gsum po spang byas la/ /

rtse gcig sems kyis mnyan par gyis/ /phyogs ris med pa'i lta ba de/ /gnyug ma'i sems kyis blta bar gyis/ /dmigs gtad med pa'i sgom pa ni/ /gnyug ma'i yid kyis bsgom par bya/ /dgag sgrub med pa spyod pa'i

mchog /gnyug ma'i yid kyis spyad par bya/ /bar chod sel ba brda yi chos/ /gnyug ma'i yid kyis bsal bar bya/ /smin par byed pa dbang gi mchog /gnyug ma'i sems kyis bskur bar bya/ /tshe gcig 'bras bu sangs
rgyas de/ /gnyug ma'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya/ /ye shes lnga yi gzugs brnyan de/ /ma bcos sems kyis bsgrub par bya/ /rnam rtog sel byed rnam rgyal lnga/ /ma bcos sems kyis gcad par bya/ /mkha' 'gro
ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa las phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las ston pas zhal gyis bzhes pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas ston pas bka'

stsal pa/ /tshe gcig sangs rgyas thob 'dod pas/ /dang po gdeng chen lta ba gces/ /des na lta ba dang por bstan/ /phyogs ris med pa lta ba'i mchog /nam mkha' lta bu shes par gyis/ /thams cad 'degs pa lta ba'i

mchog /sa gzhi lta bur shes par gyis/ /thams cad bsdud pa lta ba'i mchog /'byung ba chu ltar shes par gyis/ /nyon mongs bsreg pa lta ba'i mchog /'byung ba me ltar shes par gyis/ /ngos gzung med pa lta

ba'i mchog /'byung ba rlung ltar shes par gyis/ /de nas yang ston pas gsungs pa/ 'pho 'gyur med pa lta ba'i mchog /ri bo lta bur shes par gyis/ /g.yo 'gul med pa lta ba'i mchog /rgya mtsho lta bur shes par bya/ /gsal

la ma 'dres lta ba'i mchog /'ja' tshon lta bur shes par gyis/ /gnyis su med pa lta ba'i mchog /ga bur lta bur shes par bya/ /de nas yang gsang bas tshig 'di gsungs te/ zil gyis gnon pa lta ba'i mchog /

seng ge lta bur shes par bya/ /nyam nga med pa lta ba'i mchog /glang chen lta bur shes par bya/ /stobs dang ldan pa lta ba'i mchog /rta mchog lta bur shes par bya/ /kun du rgyug pa lta ba'i mchog /stag mo lta bur shes

par bya/ /'jigs pe med pa lta ba'i mchog /dom bu lta bur shes par bya/ /de nas yang gsang ba'i tshig 'di gsungs te/ skyon gyis ma gos lta ba'i mchog /byang chub sems de dkar por snang / /dus gsum mi 'gyur

lta ba'i mchog /byang chub sems de nag por snang / /yon tan rgyas pa lta ba'i mchog /byang chub sems de ser por snang / /kun la khyab pa lta ba'i mchog /byang chub sems de dmar por snang / /phrin las rdzogs

pa lta ba'i mchog /byang chub sems de ljang khur shar/ /de nas yang gsang ba'i tshig gsungs te/ dus gsum snang ba lta ba'i mchog /rnam par snang mdzad lta bur shar/ /chos nyid don la rtag sems pas/ /rdo rje

sems dpa' lta bur shar/ /thams cad mnyam pa nyid rtogs pas/ /rin chen 'byung ldan lta bur shar/ /chos can so sor ma 'dres pas/ /snang ba mtha' yas lta bur shar/ /sna tshogs snang la ma 'dres pas/ /don

yod grub pa lta bur shar/ /zhes pa gsungs so/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum

pa'o// // de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/ /ston pa la ni 'di skad zhus/ /rtogs pa lta ba'i rjes thogs la/ /bsgom pa'i go rims ji lta bu/ /zhes zhus pas/ de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa/ /sangs rgyas thob par

'dod pa yis/ /rtogs pa'i don go bsgoms las byung / /gzhan du 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur/ /sna tshogs snang ba'i chos rnams kun/ /ye nas spros dang bral ba la/ /rtag par 'dzin pa bsgom pa'i skyon/ /phyi dang nang gi chos

nyid la/ /chad par 'dzin pa bsgom pa'i skyon/ /'o na ji ltar bsgom zhes na/ /lam med lam gol dman pa'i lam/ /'di rnams spangs te bsgom par bya/ /dang po byang chub sems bskyed de/ /smon 'jug gnyis po sngon du
gces/ /gzung ba yul med sgom pa'i mchog /chos kyi bdag med rtogs par bya/ /'dzin pa'i sems med sgom pa'i mchog /gang zag bdag med rtogs par bya/ /chos rnams gang yin mi 'gegs pas/ /thabs kyi

lam du shes par bya/ /ngo bo ci yang ma grub pas/ /shes rab lam du shes par bya/ /chos rnams rgyu med sgom pa'i mchog /stong pa nyid kyi rnam thar yin/ /'bras bu stong pa sgom pa'i mchog /mtshan med pa'i rnam thar

yin/ /rgyu 'bras dbyer med sgom pa'i mchog /smon pa med pa'i rnam thar yin/ /kun la byams pa sgom pa'i mchog /byams pa tshad med rang bzhin yin/ /kun la brtse ba sgom pa'i mchog /snying rje tshad med ngo bo nyid/ /kun

la phan pa sgom pa'i mchog /dga' ba tshad med ngo bo nyid/ /kun la khyab pa sgom pa'i mchog /btang snyoms tshad med ngo bo nyid/ /bsod nams tshogs sog sgom pa'i mchog /bzhi gsum bcu gnyis bdag nyid can/ /
lam la bsgoms pa sgom pa'i mchog /nges 'byed bzhi'i bdag nyid can/ /ye shes mthong ba sgom pa'i mchog /byang chub yan lag rnam bdun yin/ /goms par byed pa sgom pa'i lam/ /'phags lam brgyad kyi bdag

nyid can/ /goms pa mthar phyin sgom pa'i mchog /bcu pa la ni yongs su grol/ /sangs rgyas pa'i rnam thar yin/ /chags sems bral ba sgom pa'i mchog /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa yin/ /rang sems dag pa sgom pa'i

mchog /tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa yin/ /ji mi snyam pa sgom pa'i mchog /bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa yin/ /go cha sbyor ba sgom pa'i mchog /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa yin/ /g.yeng ba med pa sgom pa'i mchog /bsam

gtan pha rol phyin pa yin/ /'khor 'das shes pa sgom pa'i mchog /shes rab pha rol phyin pa yin/ /nyon mongs mi spong sgom pa'i mchog /thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa yin/ /mi mthun zil gnon sgom pa'i mchog /

stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa yin/ /ci bsams 'grub pa sgom pa'i mchog /smon lam pha rol phyin pa yin/ /ji snyed mkhyen bya sgom pa'i mchog /ye shes pha rol phyin pa yin/ /chos dbyings ye shes sgom pa'i mchog /

spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin yin/ /me long ye shes bsgom pa'i mchog /thams cad gzugs brnyan ltar shes yin/ /mnyam nyid ye shes bsgom pa'i mchog /kun la snyoms pa'i bdag nyid yin/ /kun rtog ye shes sgom

pa'i mchog /ma 'dres gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /bya grub ye shes sgom pa'i mchog /phrin las thams cad dus gcig rdzogs/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag

mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud ces bya ba las sgom pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/ /he ru ka la 'di skad gsol/ /goms par bya ba'i rjes thob la/ /spyod pa'i go rims ji ltar bgyi/ /de

nas ston pas gsang ba'i tshig 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /cung zad drod ni thob pa dang / /de tshe spyod pa spyad par bya/ /dang po gsang ba'i spyod pa bya/ /byang chub sems ni drod thob nas/ /rig pa rtul zhugs spyod par bya/ /lhan

cig skyes pa'i drod thob nas/ /ma dad zlog pa'i spyod pa bya/ /chu tshod lta bu'i drod thob nas/ /tshogs kyi spyod pa ci bder spyad/ /smyon pa lta bu'i sems thob nas/ /phyogs med rnam rgyal spyod pa bya/ /de yi dbye ba gzhan na

gsal/ /gnas dang grogs dang dus dang zas/ /le'u gzhan nas shes par bya/ /kun gyis bkur ba spyod pa'i mchog /rgyal po lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /ngo tsha shes pa spyod pa'i mchog /rje rigs lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /chags sdang

'khru ba spyod pa'i mchog /bram ze lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /srid dang bral ba spyod pa'i mchog /dmangs rigs lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /dmas sa 'dzin pa spyod pa'i mchog /gdol pa lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /

mtho sa 'dzin pa spyod pa'i mchog /seng ge lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /nyam nga med pa spyod pa'i mchog /glang chen lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /shugs dang ldan pa spyod pa'i mchog /rta mchog lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /rnam rtog gsod pa spyod

pa'i mchog /spyang ki lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /drag shul lta byed spyod pa'i mchog /dred mo lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /gza' gtad med pa spyod pa'i mchog /ri dgas lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /ngo tsha

bral ba spyod pa'i mchog /ro langs lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /ro dang 'grogs pa spyod pa'i mchog /rigs ngan lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /dur khrod gnas pa spyod pa'i mchog /lce spyang lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /bag yod rngam pa spyod pa'i

mchog /wa mo lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /de las gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /zung du 'brel ba spyod pa'i mchog /ngur ba lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /gzhan gyis mi mthong sbyod pa'i mchog /khwa ta lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /dug lnga spyod pa

spyod pa'i mchog /rma bya lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /dus tshod 'dzin pa spyod pa'i mchog /khu byug lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /nyes pas ma gos spyod pa'i mchog /bya rgod lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /rim gyis

'dzeg pa'i spyod pa'i mchog /spre'u lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /'jigs pa med pa spyod pa'i mchog /dom bu lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /mtshan mo rgyu ba spyod pa'i mchog /zhag mig can gyi spyod pa bya/ /gang la mi gnas spyod pa'i mchog /

bung ba lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /snang ba lta ba spyod pa'i mchog /'phar ba lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /de las gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /dgos 'dod 'byung ba spyod pa'i mchog /nor bu lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /sman dug gnyis med spyod pa'i

mchog /ga bur lta bur shes par bya/ /cis kyang mi tshugs spyod pa'i mchog /rdo rje lta bur shes par bya/ /mi mthun gcod pa spyod pa'i mchog /ral gri lta bur shes par bya/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /thabs dang shes

rab spyod pa'i mchog /mda' gzhu lta bur shes par bya/ /stong pa'i kha 'byed spyod pa'i mchog /shaka ti lta bur shes par bya/ /'bigs par byed pa spyod pa'i mchog /mdung thung lta bur shes par bya/ /nga bdag gsod pa spyod

pa'i mchog /sta ri lta bur shes par bya/ /gdul bya 'dren pa spyod pa'i mchog /lcags kyu lta bur shes par bya/ /dgon pa'i gnas dang dur khrod dang / /grong khyer dag tu rnal 'byor rgyu ba'i tshe/ /de 'dra'i skyes bu'i phyag rgya cher

rtogs byed/ /de nyid sems kyi khyad par mthong gyur na/ /brtul zhugs med kyang sangs rgyas sa la 'gro/ /sems nyid gnyis kyi gnad dang ma bral na/ /brtul zhugs spyad kyang sdug bsngal sna tshogs skye/ /bsam gyis mi

khyab brtul zhugs rab ldan na/ /rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ltar/ /thogs pa med pa phyag rgya chen po de/ /skye ba 'di la sangs rgyas sa la reg ces gsungs so/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su

med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las spyod pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/ /ston pa la ni 'di skad gsol/ /yang dag brda ni brda chen

po/ /kun gyis mi rtog sbas pa'i don/ /bar chad sel ba brda'i chos/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/ /de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa/ /snang ba thams cad las kyi brda/ /tshig ni ji snyed ngag gi brda/ /de la

bsam gyis mi khyab gnas/ /don gyi brda ru shes par bya/ /de nas dur khrod bdag mos yang zhus pa/ gang zag 'jug pa'i rim pa dang / /dpa' bo brtag pa'i rim pa dang / /phyag rgya mo yi brtag pa dang / /mchog dang thun mong

dngos grub dang / /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dus dag dang / /rnal 'byor phag mo rdzogs byed dang / /brda yi bye brag ji snyed pa/ /'gro mgon khyed kyis bshad du gsol/ /mgon po dpa' bos bka' stsal pa/ /thams cad kun gyi brda

chen po/ /sbas pa'i brda ni bshad bya ba/ /g.yas pa thabs kyi rang bzhin dang / /g.yon pa shes rab rang bzhin dang / /lus kyi brda rnams rdzogs par bya/ /mi rtog sgom pa ston pa la/ /lag pa g.yon pa bstan pa ni/ /sa ro zhes

ni brjod par bya/ /rkang pa grong khyer sa bgrod pas/ /spyod pa nyams myong gis 'gro ba/ /go ba'i phyir nas rkang bstan te/ /a g+hu la zhes brjod par bya/ /srin lag mkha' 'gro ma yi rtsa/ /de yi phyir na de bstan te/ /shes rab chen

por go bya'i phyir/ /b+ha ta ri zhes brjod par bya/ /lce yis zas kyi ro myong ltar/ /stong pas bde ba myong bstan phyir/ /lce bstan tsar+ya g+ha zhes brjod/ /skal bar ldan pa'i bdag nyid ni/ /yul la rig par bya ba'i phyir/ /lto ba zas

kyi snod bstan pa/ /an d+ha li zhes brjod par bya/ /lto ba zas kyi snod yin phyir/ /de bzhin snod ni bstan par bya/ /bla ma'i brgyud pa go cha'i phyir/ /pa~M ka ta zhes brjod par bya/ /sor mo lnga'i ni rgyud gcig ltar/ /lnga yi rtsa ba e

ba~M du/ /bsdus phyir sor mo lnga bstan la/ /tshan d+ho ha zhes brjod par bya/ /so'i stobs kyis zas 'dul ltar/ /e ba~M ji bzhin rtogs par byed/ /gang gis so ni bstan byas pas/ /tsa la ni zhes brjod par bya/ /byin pas

lus kyi stobs skyed ltar/ /goms pas 'bras bu skyed pa'i phyir/ /go phyin pa ni bstan byas la/ /me ga ba zhes brjod par bya/ /sa gzhi 'gro ba kun 'degs ltar/ /'bras bu dam tshig gis bsten ltar/ /sa gzhi gru bzhir bstan

byas la/ /maN Dal zhes su brjod par bya/ /sor mo lnga ni rgyu mthun phyir/ /phung lnga rigs lngar rgyas btab pas/ /g.yas pa'i sor mo lnga bstan pa/ /sba ra na zhes brjod par bya/ /mi bskyod pa dang rdo rje 'chang / /rgyas gdab gnyis

ni go bya'i phyir/ /dbugs ni la ni dbyung bar bya/ /dpal kun sham zhes brjod par bya/ /so 'cha' ba'i zhe sdang gis/ /'bras bu'i rtags ni yin pa'i phyir/ /gnyis snang gcod phyir so 'cha' bas/ /ma ta khra zhes brjod par

bya/ /sha ni srog chags thams cad las/ /'byung zhing chos rnams thams cad ni/ /sems yin phyir nas sha bstan pas/ /ra tsa na zhes brjod par bya/ /khro gnyer khros pa'i rtags yin pas/ /bya ba thams cad sdug

bsngal gyi/ /rtags yin phyir na khro gnyer bstan/ /ni ri ha zhes brjod par bya/ /bsdums pas dbye ba med pa ltar/ /'khor 'das dbyer mi phyed pa ltar/ /b+ha ga ni zhes brjod par bya/ /dpe yis mtshon pa'i don du ni/ /dri

ma kun las grol ba'i phyir/ /bsdams pa bkrol nas gre nan brjod/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtor ma yin/ /thams cad tshim par byed pa ltar/ /sna tshogs snang ba'i chos kun la/ /bde ba chen po'i ros tshim phyir/ /

gtor ma btang la hika ka brjod/ /lto ba zas kyi snod yin ltar/ /sems can sangs rgyas snod yin pas/ /don du lto ba bstan nas ni/ /ni gar ma zhes brjod par bya/ /de rnams phan yon dpag med pas/ /snying po rgyud du gsal

bar bstan/ /brda dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga po la/ /longs spyod pa ni thabs kyi mchog /byin gyis brlabs dang sa bon dang / /rang bzhin bdud rtsi la 'bad pas/ /dpag med rims kyis phan yon

'byung / /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /lnga bsdus rtse mo mnan pa ni/ /bum pa'i dbang ste lus kyi brda/ /mtheb srin e'i drang ro gcig /gsang ba'i dbang ste lus kyi brda/ /byang chub mchog gi phyag

rgya ni/ /gsum pa shes rab ye shes yin/ /skyes dang ma skyes gnyis med pas/ /bzhi pa yin ste lus kyi brda/ /de yi ngag gi brda smras pa/ /ka la sha ya bum pa'i dbang / /ya ra la wa gsang ba'i brda'o/ /e
ba~M ma ya gsum pa'i brda'o/ /e hU~M oM A bzhi pa'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las brda'i le'u ste drug

pa'o// // de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/ ston pa mtshan nyid bzhi dang ldan pa de la phyi'i mchod pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / nang gi mchod pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / gsang ba'i mchod pa'i

tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa phul nas 'di skad zhus so/ /bla med ston pa he ru ka / 'khor ba'i sems can 'dren mdzad pa/ /thugs rje che dang ldan pa khyod/ /nad pa lta bu'i sems can la/ /
chos kyi sman mchog bstan du gsol/ /long ba lta bu'i sems can la/ /chos kyi sgron me sbar du gsol/ /rgyal po lta bu'i ston pa khyod/ /kun la byams pa mdzad du gsol/ /blon po lta bu'i ston pa khyod/ /

kun la phan pa mdzad du gsol/ /zhes zhus so/ /de nas ston pa 'jigs byed he ru ka de thugs rab tu dgyes te/ sku'i sgo nas mdzes gar rnam pa gsum mdzad/ gsung gi sgo nas rdo rje'i tshig rnam pa gsum mdzad/ thugs kyi

sgo nas khyad par kyi ye shes rnam pa gsum bskyed nas/ 'khor rnams la spyan gzigs nas tshangs pa'i gsung gis rdo rje'i tshig 'di bka' stsal to/ /nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/ /'khor ba'i sems can thams cad la/ /

ma rig pa'i mun pas bsgribs/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen por ltung / /nyon mongs 'dam du bying ba yis/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri dang / /bzhi stong gi ni grangs snyed kun/ /nyon

mongs pa'i gnyen por bstan/ /dbang po rab 'bring dang sbyar nas/ /thun mong theg pa rim gyis bstan/ /mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa gsum/ /bstan pa kun gyi rtsa ba yin/ /bder gshegs thugs rje bsam mi khyab/ /

sems can rnams la de ltar bstan/ /de nas dur khrod bdag mo des yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bla med ston pa he ru ka / thun mong theg pa de ltar bstan/ /khyad par gsang sngags ji ltar lags/ /rgyud sde rnams kyi dbye

ba zhu/ /smin pa'i lam ni ji ltar lags/ /grol ba'i lam ni gang la bgyi/ /dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol/ /zhes zhus so/ /de nas ston pa he ru kas/ /nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/ /skal bar ldan pa'i gang zag

la/ /gsang sngags rgyud sde ngas bshad kyis/ /snod skyon gsum po spongs la nyon/ /bya ba gtso bor byed pa la/ /kri ma'i rgyud sde rnam lnga bstan/ /sbyor ba gtso bor byed pa la/ /gnyis pa'i rgyud sde rnam lnga bstan/ /sems

nyid gtso bor byed pa la/ /rnal 'byor rgyud sde rnam lnga bstan/ /bde stong gtso bor byed pa la/ /bla na med pa'i rgyud lnga bstan/ /yid la byed pa med rnams la/ /gong na med pa'i rgyud lnga bstan/ /de'i phyir rgyud sde rnam pa lnga/ /

gsang sngags rgyud ces bya bar grags/ /re re la yang lnga lnga ste/ /rgyud chen nyi shu rtsa lnga ni/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang dur khrod bdag mo des yang zhus pa/ rgyud kyi dbye ba de ltar na/ /smin

zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags/ /lam zhes bgyi ba gang la bgyi/ /de yi dbye ba bshad du gsol zhes zhus so/ /de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa/ /nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/ /'khor ba'i sems can thams cad la/ /de
nyid yod de smin lam med/ /des na 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur/ /lam log mu stegs byed rnams la/ /de nyid yod de smin lam med/ /des na 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur/ /dman pa nyan thos rang rgyal la/ /de

nyid yod de smin lam med/ /de phyir bskal pa grangs med du/ /dka' thub spyod pa nyon re mongs/ /ma smin mdo sder zhugs rnams la/ /de nyid yod de smin lam med/ /des na tshe gcig sangs rgyas dka'/ /zhes so/ /de nas

dur khrod bdag mo des yang zhus pa/ smin zhes bya ba gang la bgyi/ /lam zhes bya ba ji ltar lags/ /dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol/ /nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/ /smin zhes bya ba ni sang d+ha'i sgra las shes par

bya'o/ /lam zhes bya ba'i sgra ni a tha mi tha'i sgra las shes par bya/ 'jig rten pa'i lam dang sbyar ro/ /lus dang ngag dang sems dang gsum/ /ma smin smin par byed pa'i thabs/ /dbang bkur cho ga ji snyed bstan/ /dang po

bsnyen pa bya ba gces/ /grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma yi/ /bsnyen pa rnam gsum rdzogs byas nas/ /sa chog sta gon tshul bzhin bya/ /dang po sa gzhi yongs su gzung / /gnyis pa sta gon gnas pa ste/ /nub gsum

pa la 'jug par bya/ /rgyud rnams gzhan du shes par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor shar gyi sgor/ /ba'i rnam lnga'i man Dal bri/ /skal ldan slob ma der bzhag la/ /bum pa'i dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur/ /dkyil 'khor

de yi lho'i sgo ru/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi man Dal bya/ /skal ldan slob ma der bzhag la/ /gsang ba'i dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur/ /dkyil 'khor de yi nub sgo ru/ /dal gyi chos 'byung e dbyibs bri/ /skal ldan slob

ma der bzhag la/ /shes rab ye shes dbang bskur te/ /gsum pa'i dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur/ /dkyil 'khor de yi byang sgo ru/ /phrin las rnam bzhi'i man Dal bri/ /skal ldan slob ma der bzhag la/ /bzhi ba'i

dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur/ /dkyil 'khor de yi pho brang du/ /seng chen bsnol ba'i khri stengs su/ /skal ldan slob ma der bzhag la/ /rdo rje slob dpon byed pa'i dbang / /cho ga thams cad rdzogs par bskur/ /sku gsung thugs kyi

dbang gsum po/ /thog ma nyid du bskur bar bya/ /de nas dur khrod brgyad rnams kyis/ /dbang ni rnam pa brgyad po bskur/ /de nas zas rnams bdud rtsi'i dbang / /ji lta bar ni bskur bar bya/ /de nas phyag mtshan rnams kyi dbang / /go rims

bzhin du bskur bar bya/ /de nas nyan pa'i dbang rnams bskur/ /de nas bshad pa'i dbang rnams bskur/ /de nas skal ldan gang zag la/ /mnga' gsol sum bcu rtsa lnga bya/ /de nas bkra shis rdzas brgyad kyis/ /dbang rnams ma

lus rdzogs par bskur/ /de nas dbang rdzogs gang zag de/ /bder gshegs rnams kyi sras yin te/ /mkhyen rab bde gshegs rnams dang mnyam/ /mthu stobs khro rgyal rnams dang mnyam/ /tshe tshad nyi zla gnyis dang mnyam/ /dang

po las can sbyor ba yis/ /sa brgyad pa la rab tu gnas/ /dbang bskur gnang ba ma thob na/ /rig pa shes rab rtsal rdzogs kyang / /slob dpon bya ba yong mi nus/ /dbang bskur gnang ba ma mthong na/ /gzhan gyi yon tan kun 'chang

yang / /'khor lo srog shing med pa 'dra/ /dbang ma thob par las rtsom dang / /sgyid ma ma rtas khal 'gel ba/ /'di dag phung po'i rgyu yin no/ /slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing / /dbang rnams thob par ma byas na/ /nyan pa la

sogs rtsom pa ni/ /'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //

de nas dur khrod phag mo des/ /he ru ka la 'di skad zhus/ /sangs rgyas thob byed 'bras bu'i chos/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/ /dbang po rab 'bring tha ma gsum/ /gang dang gang gis grol ba lags/ /dug lnga

spyod pa'i gang zag lnga/ /gang dang gang gis 'joms par byed/ /de nas ston pas bka' stsal te/ /nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/ /dbang po rab kyi gang zag la/ /rang bzhin rnam dag phag mo bstan/ /dbang

po 'bring gi gang zag la/ /brjod pa sgra yi phag mo bstan/ /dbang po tha ma'i gang zag la/ /mtshon pa brda yi phag mo bstan/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/ /ston pa la ni tshig 'di gsol/ /rang

bzhin rnam par dag pa yi/ /rdo rje phag mo ji lta bu/ /sgra yi phag mo ji lta bu/ /dbyibs kyi phag mo ji lta bu/ /zhes pa la sogs pa zhus so/ /nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/ /rang bzhin nyid nas dag pa de/ /chos kyi sku

yi ngo bo nyid/ /skad cig drug gis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /brjod pa sgra yi phag mo de/ /longs spyod sgra yi ngo bo nyid/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku'i ngo bo nyid/ /zla drug goms pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /

'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /mtshon pa brda yi phag mo de/ /sprul pa sku yi ngo bo nyid/ /zla drug goms pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'grub 'grur 'di la the tshom med/ /ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas dur khrod bdag

mo des/ /dpa' bo che la yang zhus pa/ /gang zag rigs la lnga yod de/ /gti mug can gyi gang zag dang / /zhe sdang can gyi gang zag dang / /'dod pa gtsor byed gang zag dang / /nga rgyal can gyi gang zag dang / /phrag dog can gyi gang
zag lnga/ /de rnams gang dang gang gis grol zhes zhus so/ /de nas ston pas bka' stsal te/ /gti mug can gyi gang zag la/ /sku yi phag mo dkar mo bstan/ /gti mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms/ /'dod pa

gtsor byed skyes bu la/ /gsung gi phag mo dmar mo bstan/ /'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms/ /zhe sdang can gyi gang zag la/ /thugs kyi phag mo nag mo bstan/ /zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms/ /

nga rgyal can gyi gang zag la/ /yon tan can gyi phag mo bstan/ /nga rgyal tshul gyis nga rgyal 'joms/ /phrag dog can gyi gang zag la/ /phrin las phag mo ljang khu bstan/ /phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms/ /de nas dur khrod

bdag mo des/ /he ru ka la tshig 'di gsol/ /dug lnga shas che gang zag lnga/ /'bras bu sku lnga ji ltar thob/ /ye shes lnga ni ji ltar snang / /rigs lnga zhes ni gang la bgyi/ /khro mo lnga ni ji ltar bsgom/ /'khor lo lnga ni

ji ltar gnas/ /snying po lnga ni ji ltar bzlas/ /dam tshig lnga ni ji ltar bsrung / /nyams myong lnga ni ji ltar 'byung / /nyon mongs lnga ni ji ltar 'byung / /ye shes lnga ni ji ltar 'phel/ /grangs kyi tshad ni ji ltar bzlas/ /

mtshan ma'i rtags ni ji ltar 'byung / /dus kyi tshad ni ji ltar lags/ /las tshogs rnams ni ji ltar 'grub ces zhus so/ /de nas dpa' bo he ru kas/ thugs rab tu dgyes te brda'i tshig 'di bka' stsal to/ /nyon cig

dur khrod bdag mo khyod/ /dug lnga spyod pa'i gang zag lnga/ /'bras bu rnam pa lnga thob ste/ /kun la khyab pa chos sku dang / /theg chen spyod pa longs sku dang / /gang la gang 'dul sprul sku dang / /cis kyang mi shigs rdo rje'i sku/ /

ngo bo nyid kyi sku mchog dang / /skye ba gcig gis thob par 'gyur/ /rtogs pa'i don la goms par byed/ /tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'thob/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rgyud du bshad/ /thob bya'i ye shes rnam lnga yang / /spros bral

chos dbyings ye shes dang / /me long ye shes gzugs brnyan ltar/ /bdag gzhan gnyis med mnyam pa nyid/ /gsal la ma 'dres so sor rtog /phrin las mthar phyin bya ba grub/ /ye shes lnga ni de ltar skye/ /gzhan

nas ma yin rang nyid la'o/ /dug lnga spyod pa'i gang zag lnga/ /rigs ni rnam pa lnga thob ste/ /spros med de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ /dgos 'dod 'byung ba rin chen rigs/ /skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma'i rigs/ /sems

can don grub las kyi rigs/ /gzhan nas ma yin rang nyid la/ /dug lnga spyod pa'i gang zag de/ /ye shes khro mo lnga bsgoms nas/ /bde ba skye ba sku yin pas/ /bde chen dkar mo bsgom par bya/ /nus pa 'byung

ba gsung yin pas/ /dmar mo sgra sgrogs bsgom par bya/ /rtogs tshad 'char ba thugs yin pas/ /khros ma nag mo bsgom par bya/ /brtan par byed pa yon tan te/ /ser mo don grub bsgom par bya/ /bar chad sel ba

phrin las te/ /sna tshogs mthar phyin bsgom par bya/ /rims kyis ma yin cig car yin/ /rgya dang 'bur gyi tshul du bya/ /yig 'bru rnams kyi gnas lugs ni/ /spyi gtsug bde chen 'khor lo na/ /bde byed sku'i ge bzhi/ /

rang bzhin rtsa'i gzugs can no/ /mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo na/ /gsung mchog yi ge rnam bzhi ni/ /rang bzhin rtsa'i tshul du gnas/ /snying ka chos kyi 'khor lo na/ /thugs mchog yi ge rnam bzhi ni/ /rtsa yi dbyibs

dang 'thun par gnas/ /lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo na/ /rten byed yon tan yi ge bzhi/ /de yi rang bzhin rtsa yi dbyibs/ /phrin las yi ge rnam bzhi ni/ /zhi rgyas dbang drag yi ge bzhi/ /las dang rjes 'thun gzugs

su gnas/ /snying po lnga'i bzlas thabs ni/ /phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang / /phrin las bzhi yi tshul du bzlas/ /dam tshig lnga'i bsrung tshul ni/ /bde chen dkar mo'i dam tshig tu/ /sems can kun la byams pa bsgoms/ /

khros ma nag mo'i dam tshig tu/ /drag cing rtsub pa'i spyod pa bya/ /ser mo don grub dam tshig tu/ /dngos po kun la chags med bya/ /dmar mo sgra sgrogs dam tshig tu/ /smra zhing bud med brten par bya/ /sna tshogs

mthar phyin dam tshig tu/ /rgyud cing mchod pa'i spyod pa bya/ /mkha' 'gro spyi'i dam tshig tu/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga la/ /rtag tu longs spyod bya ba ni/ /bza' ba'i dam tshig rnam lnga ste/ /gsang sngags spyod pas bsten par

bya/ /de nas nyams dang byin brlabs ni/ /go rims skye tshul 'di lta ste/ /dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje skye/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong yin/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan ltar mthong ba/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i

nyams myong yin/ /thams cad mnyam pa nyid skye ba/ /rin chen mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong yin/ /chos rnams ma 'dres so sor gsal/ /pad ma mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong yin/ /dngos po gang la'ang thogs med pa/ /
las kyi mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong yin/ /nyon mongs lnga yi 'gyur lugs ni/ /gti mug chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur/ /zhe sdang me long ye shes 'gyur/ /nga rgyal mnyam pa nyid kyir 'gyur/ /'dod chags so sor
rtog par 'gyur/ /phrag dog bya ba nan tan 'gyur/ /de nas 'gyur ba lam du byed/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /sku yi yi ge rnam bzhi yis/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes 'phel/ /gsung gi yi ge rnam
bzhi yis/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes 'phel/ /thugs kyi yi ge rnam bzhi yis/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes 'phel/ /yon tan yi ge rnam bzhi yis/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes 'phel/ /phrin las yi ge rnam bzhi

yis/ /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes 'phel/ /A li dang ni kA li yis/ /sgra don dag gis rtogs par 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /de nas gsang ba bshad bya ste/ /grangs kyi tshad ni 'di lta ste/ /'bum phrag gcig gis bgegs
rnams skrod/ /'bum phrag gnyis kyis grong khyer skrod/ /'bum phrag gsum gyis rgyal po 'joms/ /'bum phrag bzhi pas bud med 'gugs/ /'bum phrag lnga yis phyogs rnams bsreg /'bum phrag
drug gis 'byung ba bzlog /'bum phrag bdun gyis gnas khang g.yo/ /'bum phrag brgyad kyis mngon shes 'char/ /'bum phrag dgu yis zas nor 'du/ /'bum phrag bcu yis gang 'dod 'grub/ /de nas
gsang ba bshad bya ste/ /mtshan ltas rab 'bring tha ma gsum/ /skal dang ldan pa'i gang zag la/ /ye shes khro mo rnam pa lnga/ /mngon sum dag du mthong bar 'gyur/ /dbang po rab kyi snang ba ste/ /las

'phro can gyi snang ba yin/ /skal pa 'bring gi gang zag la/ /ye shes khro mo rnam pa lnga/ /rang gi las dang gang 'thun par/ /rmyi lam dag tu mchog du gsal/ /skal ba 'bring gi mtshan ltas yin/ /skal ba dman

pa'i gang zag la/ /tshul bzhin bris pa'i thang sku ste/ /'od dang sgra dang 'dzum pa dang / /mkha' 'gro'i lung bstan 'byung ba dang / /skye ba 'di la nges par 'grub/ /sbyor ba dman pa'i gang zag la/ /bar ma dor nas

lam sna 'dren/ /mkhas spyod gnas su 'khrid par byed/ /dus kyi tshad ni rnam gsum ste/ /rab la skad cig rnam drug yin/ /'bring la zla ba drug gis grol/ /tha ma lo drug sbyar ba'o/ /phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum/ /
rnam pa gsum du shes par bya/ /las tshogs rang bzhin dbye ba ni/ /rgyas dang bsdus pa shin du rgyas/ /rnam pa gsum du shes par bya/ /bsdus pa tshar gcad rjes gzung gnyis/ /rgyas pa phrin las rnam pa

bzhi/ /shin du rgyas pa thun mong brgyad/ /de las 'phros pa nyi shu lnga/ /bde chen dkar mo'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /zhi ba'i las tshogs rnam lnga 'grub/ /ser mo don grub ting 'dzin gyis/ /rgyas pa'i las tshogs rnam

lnga 'grub/ /dmar mo sgra sgrogs ting 'dzin gyis/ /dbang gi las tshogs rnam lnga 'grub/ /khros ma nag mo'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /drag po'i las tshogs rnam lnga 'grub/ /sna tshogs mthar phyin ting 'dzin gyis/ /
phrin las bzhi yi las rnams 'grub/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las 'bras bu'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //

de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/ /ston pa mtshan nyid bzhi ldan la/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa 'di phul nas 'di skad zhus te/ skal bar ldan pa'i gang zag gis/ /bdag dang gzhan la phan gdags phyir/ /sku dang
mchod rten ji ltar bgyi/ /de yi go rims bshad du gsol/ /zhes zhus pa'o/ /de nas ston pas bka' stsal te/ /nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/ /rigs can lnga'i gang zag des/ /bdag don gzhan don byed

'dod pas/ /sku lnga gdung lnga mchod rten lnga/ /rgyu lnga sngags lnga las rim lnga/ /lnga tshan lnga ru shes par bya/ /de yi bya ba'i rim pa ni/ /de nyid gsum dang ldan par bya/ /dang po bdag gi de nyid dang / /gnyis pa rgyu
yi de nyid dang / /gsum pa 'bras bu'i de nyid do/ /dang po bdag gi de nyid ni/ /de bzhin rigs kyi gang zag de/ /dad dang brtson 'grus rab ldan pas/ /sku dang mchod rten 'debs dus su/ /'du shes gsum

dang ldan par bya/ /gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni/ /rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya/ /sa gzhi dkar zhing snum pa la/ /rin chen sna lnga la sogs pa'i/ /lnga tshan lnga ni legs sbyar te/ /lus ngag yid gsum sbyor ba
yis/ /sku dang mchod rten ci rigs gdab/ /'og min gnas nas spyan drangs la/ /rab tu gnas pa gzhung bzhin bya/ /de nas mnga' gsol na bza' gsol/ /de la mchod dang bstod pa bya/ /bzhugs su
gsol ba'i rim pa ni/ /dam chos gzhan dang 'thun par bya/ /zhi ba'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /dang po bdag gi de nyid ni/ /rin chen rigs kyi gang zag des/ /dad dang brtson 'grus rab ldan pas/ /sku
'am mchod rten 'debs dus su/ /'du shes gsum dang ldan par bya/ /gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni/ /rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya/ /sa bzhi ser la 'tsher ba la/ /gong du bstan pa ji lta bar/ /sku dang mchod
rten ci rigs gdab/ /'og min gnas nas spyan drangs nas/ /rab tu gnas pa gzhung bzhin bya/ /de la mnga' gsol na bza' gsol/ /mchod dang bstod pa bzhugs pa rnams/ /dam chos gzhan
dang 'thun par bya/ /rgyas pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /dang po bdag gi de nyid ni/ /pad ma rigs kyi gang zag de/ /dad dang brtson 'grus rab ldan pas/ /sku dang mchod rten byed dus su/ /'du shes

gsum dang ldan par bya/ /gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni/ /rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya/ /sa gzhi dmar la gdang ba la/ /lnga tshan lnga dang legs sbyar te/ /lus ngag yid gsum sbyor ba yis/ /sku dang mchod rten ci
rigs gdab/ /'og min gnas nas spyan drangs la/ /rab tu gnas pa gzhung bzhin bya/ /de la mnga' gsol na bza' gsol/ /mchod dang bstod dang gzhugs pa kun/ /dam chos gzhan dang 'thun par bya/ /

dbang gi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /dang po bdag gi de nyid ni/ /rdo rje rigs kyi gang zag de/ /dad dang brtson 'grus rab ldan pas/ /sku dang mchod rten 'debs dus su/ /'du shes gsum dang ldan par bya/ /

gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni/ /rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya/ /sa bzhi gnag cing rtsub pa la/ /khrag dang dug dang tsher ma dang / /yungs dkar yungs nag skye tshe dang / /lnga tshan lnga dang bcas pa la/ /lus ngag yid
gsum sbyor ba yis/ /sku dang mchod rten ci rigs gdab/ /'og min gnas nas spyan drangs la/ /rab tu gnas pa gzhung bzhin bya/ /de la mnga' gsol na bza' gsol/ /mchod dang bstod pa bzhugs
pa kun/ /dam chos gzhan dang 'thun par bya/ /drag po'i las rnams 'grub par byed/ /dang po bdag gi de nyid ni/ /las kyi rigs kyi gang zag de/ /dad dang brtson 'grus rab ldan pas/ /sku dang mchod rten

'debs dus su/ /'du shes gsum dang ldan par bya/ /gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni/ /rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya/ /sa bzhi ljang zhing kha dog ser/ /gong du lnga tshan lnga dang sbyar/ /de la sku dang mchod rten rnams/ /ji ltar nus
pa bzhin du gdab/ /'og min gnas nas spyan drangs la/ /rab tu gnas pa gzhung bzhin bya/ /de la mnga' gsol na bza' gsol/ /mchod dang bstod pa bzhugs pa rnams/ /dam chos gzhan dang 'thun par bya/ /drag

po'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /bstod pa lnga ni so sor bstod/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las sku dang mchod rten
gdab pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas dur khrod bdag mo des ston pa mtshan nyid bzhi ldan la phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa gsum phul nas 'di skad zhus so/ /kye kye mgon po bdag la gson/ /khams gsum

'khor ba'i sems can rnams/ /nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / /rnam rtog brgyad khri bzhi stong gis/ /dus gsum kun tu sdug bsngal bskyed/ /de yi gnyen po bshad du gsol/ /khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems
can rnams/ /rgyu ni ma rig pa yis bskyed/ /rkyen ni rnam par rtog pa ste/ /de rnams rnam rtog ji ltar bsal/ /phyogs ngan la sogs 'gro ba'i tshe/ /de yi rtog pa gcad par zhu/ /legs nyes kun gyi stangs
gcod pa'i/ /mna' dang gal gyis 'jigs pa la/ /de yi rtog pa gcad par zhu/ /nyon mongs nad kyis nyen pa la/ /de las thar pa'i thabs gcig zhu/ /bdag gzhan gnyis po rtsod dus su/ /de las rgyal
ba'i thabs gcig zhu/ /lus sems gnyis po 'bral dus der/ /de las thar pa'i thabs gcig zhu/ /de nas ston pas tshig 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyu 'bras kun du sdug bsngal ba/ /ma lus dbyer
med shes gyur na/ /sdug bsngal ma lus bde bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang thun mongs 'di lta ste/ /phyogs ngan la sogs 'gro ba'i tshe/ /phyogs las rnam par rgyal bar bya/ /nyes legs kun gyi stangs
gcod pa/ /mna' 'am gal gyis 'jigs pa la/ /mna' las rnam par rgyal bar bya/ /nad dang gdon gyis nyen pa la/ /bgegs las rnam par rgyal bar bya/ /bdag gzhan gnyis po rtsod pa la/ /ngag las

rnam par rgyal bar bya/ /lus sems gnyis po 'bral dus der/ /rlung las rnam par rgyal bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung
ba'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba rnam pa lnga'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas mgon po he ru kas 'khor rnams la de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang sngags kyi sdud pa mo rab tu dga' ste/ 'khor
rnams 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis kyang de ltar dga' mgu yi rangs te/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa phul nas/ mgon po thugs rje dang ldan pas/ /bdag dang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams dang / /'khor ba'i
sems can thams cad la/ /thugs rjes gnang ba bka' drin lags/ /zhes dga' mgu yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi
thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba rtsa ba'i rgyud bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed he ru kas gsungs pa rdzogs s+ho// // dur khrod bdag mos gsol

pa/ lha mo rnams kyi sku mdog ni/ /ji ltar shes na grol bar 'gyur/ /phag mo zhes bya gang la bya/ /yi ge'i don ni gang la bskyal/ /bskyed rdzogs ngo bo gang la bya/ /dpa' bo he ru kas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig

dur khrod phag mo khyod/ /nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa/ /dkar zhing spros bral zhi bar byed/ /ma chags skyon gyis ma gos pa/ /dmar la gdang ba sgra sgrogs yum/ /skyon med sems nyid rang dbang 'dus/ /gnyan

po gcig kyang mi 'gyur bas/ /khros ma nam mkha'i kha dog bzhin/ /mi 'gyur rang sems dbyings su grol/ /che ba ye shes lnga rgyas pa/ /ser mo skyon med don grub ma/ /ngo bo rgyal la g.yo dang bral/ /sna tshogs
skyon gyis ma gos pas/ /in dra nI la'i mthar byin ma/ /sna tshogs ngo bo gcig tu 'dus/ /rnam pa gang yang 'gyur ba med/ /chos kyi dbyings las 'gyur ba med/ /rnam rtog cis kyang ma gos pas/ /pag

ces bya ba rtog med yin/ /dbyings nyid rtog pa spros bral bas/ /mo zhes bya ba dbyings su thim/ /de la phye na rnam pa gsum/ /dam chos skye med phag mo ni/ /skye 'gag med pas chos sku yin/ /brjod pa sgra yi

phag mo ni/ /phag ni kA li thabs yin la/ /mo ni A li longs skur 'dod/ /mtshon pa dbyings kyi phag mo ni/ /stong nyid mtshon pa'i sku mdog la/ /rtog med snying rje phag gi gdong / /thabs dang shes rab phag

mo la/ /bde stong skyon bral gcer bu ni/ /rtog pa med pas sprul sku'o/ /yig 'bru gsal la mi rtog pas/ /thim pa na yang cang te'u/ /snang stong mtha' dang bral ba'o/ /bskyed rdzogs ngo bo dbyer med pas/ /

mtshon pa snang ba stong pa'i ngang / /de nyid snang ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /dbyer med gzung 'jug khas len bral/ /gcig la gcig rgyas gdab par bya/ /grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med ces gsungs so/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams

cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las rgyud phyi ma bskyed rims bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas dur khrod bdag mo des dpa' bo chen
po la 'dzum pa dang bcas nas zhus pa/ gsang sngags rnams kyi sngags ni gang / /bzlas par bya ba'i yi ge gang / /'khor lo rnam bzhi dgod pa gang zhes zhus pas/ he ru kas bka' stsal pa/ dur

khrod bdag mos gus par gyis/ /gsang sngags rnams kyi yi ge ni/ /thams cad byed pa yi ge oM/ /dgyes pa sku yi yi ge ni/ /badzra bA ra hi zhes 'byung / /nus pa 'byung ba gsung gi kro tA kA li/ /rtogs pa thugs

ni ha ri sa/ /yon tan 'byung ba a be sha ya/ /phrin las mdzad pa e ba~M ma ya/ /de las gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ /'khor lo lnga yi dbus nyid du/ /yi ge bzhi pas rgyas btab nas/ /bzlas pa phyi nang gsang
ba gsum/ /zhi ba phyi yi bzlas pa ni/ /yig 'bru rnams ni kha dog dkar/ /de las 'od zer dkar po 'phros/ /nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa kun/ /ba spu'i sgo nas bstan pa yis/ /sems can kun la phog
pas kyang / /sgrib pa thams cad dag par bsam/ /de bzhin gshegs la phog pas kyang / /mnyes pa'i mchod pa phul bas so/ /bdag la slar thim zhi ba 'grub/ /rgyas pa ser po 'phro 'du yis/ /gong bzhin
spro bsdu shes par bya/ /dmar po dbang gi 'phro 'du bya/ /drag po nag po'i 'phro 'du bya/ /sna tshogs 'phros pas phrin las bzhi'i/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa yin/ /nang dang gsang ba'i bzlas
pa yang / /gong bzhin spro bsdu shes par bya/ /dur khrod phag mos yang gsol pa/ /zad cing 'phel bar byed pa gang / /mthar thug pa'i yi ge gang / /zhes zhus so/ /dpa' bo chen pos yang gsungs pa/ /

gti mug zad byed a yin te/ /has ni zhe sdang zad par byed/ /nga rgyal zad byed ri yin te/ /ni yis 'dod chags zad par byed/ /phrag dog zad byed sa yin no/ /a ni chos dbyings ye shes 'phel/ /ha ni me long ye

shes 'phel/ /ri yis mnyam nyid ye shes 'phel/ /ni yis so sor rtog byed 'phel/ /sa yi bya grub ye shes 'phel/ /a ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gror snang / /ha ni rdo rje mkha' 'gror snang / /ri ni rin chen mkha' 'gror snang / /ni yis pad ma mkha' 'gror snang / /sa yis las

kyi mkha' 'gror snang / /as ni de bzhin rigs thob ste/ /has ni rdo rje'i rigs chen thob/ /ri ni rin chen rigs thob ste/ /ni yis pad ma'i rigs thob bo/ /sa ni las kyi rigs chen thob/ /chos sku'i mthar thug a yin te/ /

longs sku'i rnam pa yi ge ha/ /sprul pa sku ni ri yin no/ /ngo bo nyid sku'i yi ge ni/ /rdo rje'i sku ni yi ge sa zhes gsungs so/ /dur khrod bdag mos yang zhus pa/ /dbang po rab 'bring rim pa yis/ /ji ltar
shes na grol bar 'gyur/ /dpa' bo chen pos yang gsungs pa/ /dbang po rab 'bring gsum yin te/ /dbang po rab kyi gang zag la/ /skad cig drug gi gdams ngag bstan/ /ye shes skad cig dang po yis/ /
