gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gcad/ /skad cig gnyis pa'i ye shes kyis/ /'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gcad/ /skad cig gsum pa'i ye shes kyis/ /gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi rtog pa gcad/ /skad cig bzhi pa'i
ye shes kyis/ /nyams la zhen pa'i rnam rtog gcad/ /skad cig lnga pa'i ye shes kyis/ /nyams myong bde ba'i rnam rtog gcad/ /skad cig drug pa'i ye shes kyis/ /yid la byed pa'i rnam rtog gcad/ /grol

'gyur rab la the tshom med/ /dbang po 'bring po'i gang zag la/ /rlung drug man ngag bstan pa ni/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rlung goms pas/ /rang bzhin sgrib pa sel bar byed/ /thad kar 'byung ba'i rlung goms pas/ /

mtshan mo lta bu'i sgrib pa sel/ /rang las skyes pa'i rlung goms pas/ /chod pa'i sgrib pa sel bar byed/ /spong byed rlung la goms pa yis/ /sngon du rgyu ba'i sgrib pa sel/ /sbyong byed rlung la goms pa yis/ /shes

bya'i sgrib pa sel bar byed/ /rdzogs byed rlung la goms pa yis/ /sa rnams rims kyis gnon par byed/ /ye shes rnams ni dus gcig 'char/ /shes bya thams cad dus gcig chod/ /rlung drug ma yin ye shes yin/ /mun pa rnams ni bsgribs pa

yis/ /ye shes rims kyis skye ba dang / /sgrib pa rims kyis sel bar byed/ /grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /dbang po tha ma'i gang zag la/ /yul ni dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing / /lus dag pa ni dkyil 'khor yin/ /rang sems dag pa phag mo'i sku/ /ngag dag pa ni sngags

su gsungs/ /lta bsgom dag pa dngos grub yin/ /dpe don gnyis su med pa gang / /skal med dngos grub mi 'byung bas/ /lo drug bsgoms na the tshom med ces gsungs so/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo

mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las rgyud phyi ma rdzogs rim bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho// // paN Di ta gA ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas/ lo ts+tsha ba gyi jo zla ba 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra ma hA kA la kro d+ha nA tha ra ha s+ya sid+d+hi b+ha ba tan+t+ra nA ma/

bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje nag po chen po khros pa'i mgon po gsang ba dngos grub 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ de nas bcom ldan kun mkhyen pa'i/ /ye shes mngon par mkhyen pa yis/ /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor 'joms byed pa/ /

bka' yi 'khor lo bshad par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thogs pa med cing gdon mi za ba bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /kun mkhyen

bde gshegs bzhugs gyur pa/ /mya ngan 'da' bar mi mdzad cing / /de srid mtshungs med sems can don/ /rgyun mi mchad par 'gro ba kun/ /srid pa'i zhags pas 'jigs med par/ /byams pa'i thugs kyi brtson 'grus kyis/ /rtag tu sems can

don rnams mdzad/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' thug par/ /smon lam rnam par sbyong byed cing / /snying rjes don brtson sems kyis ni/ /dpa' bos srid pa sbyong bar mdzad/ /sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu bzhin/ /'di ni rgyud rnams kun du yang / /

kla glo'i skad kyis sbas pa ste/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms pa po/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam gyur pa'i/ /rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid che/ /myur du dngos grub ster byed pa/ /'phral du yang dag yid ches byed/ /bsam pa gang dang gang dag gis/ /mi

rnams sems dang 'thun par 'jug /de dang de yi gzugs sprul te/ /sna tshogs g.yogs te bde bar bzhugs/ /de phyir 'bad pa du ma yis/ /sna tshogs tshul gyis 'thun par bya/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas he ru ka /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma

tshogs can/ /rang gi lha yi rab sbyor bas/ /bdag nyid ye shes mchog 'grub 'gyur/ /'di yis rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang / /dkyil 'khor ba dang zhing skyong tshogs/ /gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod gnas/ /mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug mgon po che/ /sku

gsung thugs dang phrin las tshogs/ /ye shes yon tan rigs kyi lha/ /nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas/ /lha mo chen mo bka' 'bangs bcas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas dus kun du/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i mgon po che/ /bde ba chen po'i

rol pa yis/ /ye shes gsang ba bsam mi khyab/ /tshe 'di nyid du 'grub 'gyur zhes/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid med/ /khams gsum po ni ma lus pa/ /'gro kun sgyu ma lta bu

yin/ /brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi/ /'gro ba dmigs su med pa ste/ /mthong ba dang ni thos la sogs/ /thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'char/ /gang gis skye bo 'ching gyur pa/ /de nyid yongs shes rnam par grol/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /sa gsum bde

ba chen por bsgyur/ /nyon mongs med na ye shes med/ /nyan rang byang chub lam las ring / /phung po khams dang skye mched dang / /'byung ba bzhi la sogs pa rnams/ /thams cad gdod nas dag pa yi/ /ye shes chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/ /dngos

po du ma gsal bar snang / /ye shes med par skye mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas ye shes kyis rab bskul/ /de bas bla med rgyud 'di ru/ /'bad de dang ba bskyed par bya/ /gsang ba'i sdom pa bla na med/ /dang po bla ma'i dam tshig dag /thob pas rgyu dang

'bras bu 'byung / /sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te/ /brtan pa dag ni longs spyod yin/ /nges par brtan pa mya ngan 'da'/ /rnal 'byor gyi ni dam tshig gnas/ /brda yi sbyor ba gsang ba dang / /dbang bskur bas ni dngos grub ster/ /bla ma

de bzhin gshegs pa dang / /rgyal ba byang chub sems dpar bcas/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po bla na med/ /sngags pa gsang ba 'dir zhugs gang / /yang dag bla ma bsten par bya/ /'dir ni byang chub sems kyis ni/ /bsnyen pa nye bar bsnyen pa dang / /bsgrub pa

bsgrub pa chen po yi/ /khyad par rim pa rtags dang dus/ /las la sbyar ba shes par bya/ /ji srid las kyi sbyor ba yis/ /mgon po 'khor bcas mnyes gyur na/ /las dang dngos grub sna tshogs pa/ /myur du 'grub par the tshom med/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub

'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba mngon par byang chub pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gsung rmi lam lta bur nye bar

gsan te/ gsung rdo rje'i tshig 'di gsungs so/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa gang zhig gis/ /sgyu ma brag cha'i sgra brnyan ltar/ /yid 'ong dben pa'i gnas dag tu/ /dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa sgrub/ /bskal pa bzang po 'di la ni/ /byung ba'i mgon po ma lus pa/ /kun

gyi snying por gyur pa ni/ /gsang ba zhing skyong mgon po che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mgon po 'dis/ /bstan pa bsrung bar mdzad pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po la sogs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs

pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /gang du rdo rje'i theg pa che/ /gsang ba bsdus pa'i yang dag lam/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa srung byed pa'i/ /snying po 'bras bu lam byed pa/ /snyigs ma lnga ldan dus nyid du/ /'dren pa ye shes bstan pa

bsrung / /'di nyid gsang ba'i sgrub pa gang / /rdo rje'i theg pa 'dir bstan gsol/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ shes rab snying rje zung 'jug pa/ /ting 'dzin gang du sgom gyur pa/ /bla med dkon

mchog bstan pa ste/ /rgol ba ngan pa bzlog par mdzad/ /thub pa mchog gi bstan pa la/ /'dzin dang skyong dang srung ba gsum/ /lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa spong bar mdzad/ /sku gsum ye shes lnga ldan par/ /gsang ba gcig pu bsgrub

par bya/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba'i bde ba chen po dbyings la rab tu bzhugs pa bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka rdo rje rang rig pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lhun gyis grub pa'i

gnas gsang ba rang byung bla na med pa'i rdo rje rab tu rgyal ba'i snying po mi phyed pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i snying po ye shes kyi dngos grub sgrub cing bdud kyi g.yul las rab tu rgyal bar byed pa zhes bya

ba'i chos mi bzad pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ston par mdzad do/ /rdo rje gzhi la gnas pa'i cha/ /gter gyi bum pa kha khyer ldan/ /dus kyi rgyal po 'od gsal ba/ /chu 'dzin phyogs tsam phyed ldan nyid/ /sgra dang sgra las khyab pa ste/ /du ma ma

yin gnas pa'i yul/ /dam tshig gsang ba 'byung ba las/ /rgyal ba rin chen 'bar ba'i gtso/ /phyogs dus med par rang byung ba/ /chos 'byung pho brang dkyil 'khor du/ /rigs kyi yon tan ldan par ni/ /nam mkha'i rgya mtsho 'bras

ldan pa/ /phun sum tshogs pa lhun gyis grub/ /mi byed lhan cig skyes pa rgyal/ /pho brang gsang ba'i gzhal yas khang / /dkyil 'khor rin chen 'od 'khrug pa/ /ge sar pad ma'i dbus su ni/ /kun nas zlum por 'khor

ba ni/ /tshad med phreng bas brgyan pa ni/ /bkod pa dpag med rim par ldan/ /ri rab lhun po mchog byung ba'i/ /de nyid kun nas yongs bskor ba'i/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rnams te/ /shin du mnyam zhing mtshungs par 'khor/ /

de nyid rim pa yongs su brtan/ /bye brag mtshungs med dmar chen mtsho/ /rim pas chu gter 'o ma'i gnas/ /'byung ba bsdus pa mi lus kyi/ /phung po rus pa'i ri bo la/ /phyi nang mnyam pa'i tshad can gyi/ /
lhun gyis grub par bstan pa yin/ /de las dngos po sna tshogs kyis/ /tha dad snang ba ye shes gzugs/ /rang byung bde ba chen po nyid/ /mnyam pa med pa kun du 'byung / /dus gsum de bzhin

gshegs pa yi/ /'byung gnas snying po rdo rje'i gdan/ /rdo rje dkyil dkrung mi phyed las/ /thog mtha' med pa'i rang bzhin can/ /gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pa'i/ /'dod chags rdo rje'i skur ldan pa/ /lho

phyogs bya rkang ri dang ni/ /dpal gyi ri la mdun phyogs pa/ /d+ha na ka tha par pa ta/ /pad ma ge sar rgyas pa'i dbus/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas rtag par gnas/ /dpal ldan dga' ba'i khang pa brtsegs/ /gsang

ba sngags kyi rgya mtsho yi/ /ma lus rgyal ba bgrod pa'i yul/ /gsang ba chos kyi dbyings chen po/ /dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor du/ /kla klo'i yul gyi mi rnams dang / /lha dang lha min dri zar bcas/ /gsang

chen yongs su rdzogs pa yi/ /rang byung ye shes pho brang du/ /tshangs dbang khyab 'jug dbang phyug bdag /dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir bcug nas kyang / /skye bo chags can rab 'dul phyir/ /mchog tu gyur pa'i snying po

gsung / /phyogs bcur gnas kyi sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang / /dpa' bo rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs/ /gang gA klung gi bye snyed kyi/ /khrag khrig ri rab rdul mnyam pa/ /de
dbus seng ge'i khri bzhugs pa'i/ /thub pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la/ /rdo rje snying po sems dpa' che/ /bla gos phrag pa gcig gzar te/ /pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs/ /

thal mo sbyar te 'di don zhus/ /gsang chen khyad par 'phags pa yi/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya che/ /mi 'gyur rdo rje theg pa'i lam/ /dus dang gnas dang gang zag ste/ /spyod yul bstan pa'i khyad par

ni/ /grub dang sgrub pa phrin las tshogs/ /thabs dang stobs dang 'jug pa ste/ /rim pa mngon byed rgyur ldan pa/ /de nyid bcom ldan gsung du gsol/ /zhes gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/

bla ma sangs rgyas bstan pa la/ /dga' zhing mgu la rab dang ba'i/ /sems dpa' chen pos gsang ba'i don/ /rab tu zhus pa legs so legs/ /shin du rmad du byung ba yi/ /gdul dka' ma lus gdul don du/ /byang chub

sems kyi ye shes mdzod/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /de nas dngos grub thams cad kyi/ /grub pa rab tu ster byed pa/ /rgyal ba kun gyi snying po ste/ /gsang ba las kyi rim pa nyid/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /

bstan pa bsrung zhing bka' la gnas/ /dam tshig 'dzin pa'i zhing skyong la/ /mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug gtso/ /dpal ldan rig 'dzin thams cad la/ /mchog du gyur pa'i las sgrub pa/ /dpal ldan nag po chen
po ni/ /'dis ni lha min 'dus pa yi/ /g.yul las rgyal bar byed pa yin/ /lha srin sde brgyad ma lus pas/ /mchod pas gtso bor gyur pa yin/ /dpal ldan lha mo chen mo dang / /nag mo re ma tir gyur pas/ /
lcam dral gyur pas bstan pa bsrung / /sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba/ /phyi nang de nyid kho na'i don/ /yon tan phrin las dbang phyug tu/ /dam tshig mgon po zhing skyong ba/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i
gtso bo ste/ /gzhan yang dus gsum dbang byed pa'o/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba spyi la dgongs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba/ /'di

nyid bla med sgrub pa po/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor lhung ba yi/ /sems can du kha gzigs nas ni/ /ji lta ji ltar grol 'gyur ba/ /de dang de yi thabs ston mdzad/ /dus ni bskal pa bzang po yi/ /rdzogs ldan tha mar gyur pa yi/ /dpag med dus las 'das nas ni/ /gnyis

ldan dang ni gsum ldan las/ /rtsod ba'i dus kyi rim pa la/ /bcom ldan tshe lo brgya pa'i dus/ /de nyid bstan pa'i snyigs ma yi/ /lnga brgya pa yi dus kyi mthar/ /shin du gdug cing rtsub pa yi/ /mi srun

pa yi dus kyi tshe/ /de tshe mgon po'i bstan pa 'byung / /gang zag la yang gnyis su bshad/ /bsgral bar bya ba'i gang zag dang / /sgrol bar byed pa'i sgrub po ste/ /dang po bstan pa 'jig byed cing / /dkon mchog gsum po smod

pa dang / /bla ma la sdang bdag la smod/ /de dag la sogs bya bar bshad/ /sgrub pa po ni rnam pa gsum/ /he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor ma/ /dag cing sbyangs te ting 'dzin gsal/ /rim pa go 'phang thob pa ste/ /thun mong spyi dang bye brag tu/ /dam tshig gnas

pa'i rdo rje 'dzin/ /gnas kyi khyad par 'byung ba yang / /bsnyen pa'i dus dang bsgrub pa dang / /las la sbyar ba'i dus shes pas/ /yid 'ong dben dang dur khrod sogs/ /bsam gtan 'phel dang khyad par ro'o/ /yul dang dbang po'i spyod yul du/ /mthong

ba dang ni thos pa dang / /reg pa dang ni dran pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor ba yi snang ba dang / /ma lus dngos po gang shar ba/ /bde ba can du shes par bya/ /bstan pa kun las bsdus pa ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lam las kyang / /gsang ba 'bras

bu lam byed pa/ /rdo rje theg pa 'di nyid de/ /bstan pa 'dzin skyong srung dang gsum/ /'di ni khyad par bsrung ba yin/ /grub pa bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin dang / /nye bar bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin dang / /dpal ldan khrag 'thung ye shes
che/ /rnam dag mtshan nyid kun grub pa/ /bde ba'i bsod nams rgyun gnas pa/ /rnam dag stobs ni rgyas par byed/ /bsnyen pa'i dus su rang lha yi/ /he ru kar ni gnas pa yi/ /mdun du bka' sdod dam tshig

gi/ /mgon po phyag bzhi bsgom par bya/ /de nas thugs ka'i rang sngags las/ /'od 'phros 'khor ba'i bzlas pa las/ /khyad par du ni sgra bcas dang / /shin du dal bar bzlas pa bya/ /nye bar bsnyen pa'i dus su ni/ /

bdag nyid he ru ka lus ni/ /hU~M phyung mdun du 'od 'phros pas/ /bskyed cing mthar ni nye bar bsdu/ /sgrub pa'i dus su mgon po yi/ /rgyas 'debs spyi bor he ru ka /de nyid gsang sngags phyogs bcas pa/ /de nyid
sems dpa' sum brtseg bsam/ /gsang ba zhing skyong rgyal po che/ /cho ga gsum gyis sgrub pa'i tshul/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i bdag /thams cad bde chen gnas pa la/ /dus gsum 'khor lo
gsum du gnas/ /brtul zhugs 'dzin pas 'thob par 'gyur/ /sgrub pa chen po bla na med/ /ye shes mgon po chen po nyid/ /kha gdong la sogs lha mo brgyad/ /rim pa bzhin du yongs su bskor/ /dkyil

'khor pho brang dbus su yang / /dur khrod du ni mgon po rol/ /'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' ba/ /dam tshig spyod pa'i rang bzhin ni/ /rtag tu rang sngags sbas pa ste/ /rab tu 'bad de gsang bar bya'o/ /
phrin las khyad par gang yin pa/ /las la sbyor ba rim shes bya/ /rengs par byed dang skrod pa dang / /rmugs par byed dang brgyal du 'jug / rnam par rmongs dang lkugs par byed/ /dug gis 'dzin dang 'on
long dang / /rang sha rang gis za byed cing / /bshis ngan dug dang khrag tu skyug /'di dag dus min 'chi byed pa/ /las kyi khyad par yongs su bstan/ /char dbab pa dang sprin dral dang / /thog dang ser

ba dbab pa dang / /rang phyogs su ni bzlog cing bsrung / /byad ka bzlog dang ngag bcing dang / /nus pa gzhom dang cho 'phrul dang / /phran tshegs las kyi gsang ba'o/ /thabs ni las kyi rim pa ste/ /rten gyi gang

zag 'ga' zhig gis/ /dang por bla ma mnyes par bya/ /gnyis par dbang bzhi thob pa dang / /gsum par byin gyis brlabs nas ni/ /bka' bsgo'i rjes gnang tshul bzhin du/ /ma nor 'jug pa'i go rim shes/ /rten tshul khyad par shes

par bya/ /stobs ni chos rnams thams cad la/ /sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang / /yang dag bden pa'i stobs kyis ni/ /rang bzhin med par rtogs pas 'byung / /'jug pa thun mong ma yin pa/ /byams pa snying rje byang

chub sems/ /tshad med bzhi dang ldan pa yis/ /'gro ba'i don la sems pa po/ /mngon du byed pa nyer sgrub ste/ /dus dang grangs dang mtshan ma ste/ /dang po bar dang tha mar yang / /gtso bo dang ni 'khor rnams kyi/ /gang grub rab

'bring tha ma ru/ /rtags kyi dbye ba bstan pa yin/ /rgyu ni thogs pa med pa yi/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ /mngon sum du ni 'byung ba la/ /gang gis dgag par mi nus pa/ /de las 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/ /

snying po smin pa bzhin du 'byung / /gang du thogs med rdo rje yi/ /snying po zad pa med pa'i don/ /yang dag ye shes snang ba po/ /bla ma'i drin las thob par 'gyur/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las
gsang ba'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas dbang ldan bdud 'joms pa'i/ /sgrub pa yang dag rab tu bshad/ /gsang ba'i mgon po chen po yi/ /sbas pa'i yum dang bcas pa yi/ /gsang ba
mkha' 'gro ma bzhi dang / /lhan cig tu ni dgyes par rol/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /gdul dka' 'dul ba'i dpa' bo ni/ /zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa/ /mi thung khros pa ut+pal mdog /

mgo skyes gyen 'greng rngam pa'i sku/ /ro yi gdan la bzhugs mdzad cing / /klu brgyad rgyan gyis brgyan pa po/ /khros pas char sprin nag po ltar/ /me stag phung po lta bu yi/ /spyan gsum drag po'i lta bas

gzigs/ /glang po'i tshul can stobs ldan pa/ /rgyu ma'i do shal sbyangs pa yi/ /mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng bas klubs/ /shin du mi srun sgeg pa'i sku/ /bdud 'dul chen po lha yi lha/ /nyams ldan gzi brjid phun sum tshogs/ /

ma rig mun sel sgeg pa'i nyams/ /rmad byung chos sgrogs bzhad par ston/ /brtul zhugs spyod pa dpa' bo ste/ /gdug pa 'dul mdzad 'jigs par ston/ /log lta spong byed gtsigs pa'i nyams/ /gdug pa tshar gcod snying

rjes khros/ /ngo mtshar nyon mongs 'joms mdzad cing / /khro chags mi g.yo zhi ba'i thugs/ /g.yas kyi dang pos gri gug bsnams/ /g.yon gyi dang pos thod khrag 'dzin/ /g.yas kyi gnyis pas ral gri 'debs/ /

g.yon pas kha T+wA~M 'dzin par mdzad/ /gsung gis ha ha zhes sgrogs pa/ /log par lta ba 'joms par mdzad/ /stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can/ /sna tshogs chu skyes nyi mar bcas/ /rang byung rol pa'i stabs kyis
gnas/ /de yi mdun du gtum pa mo/ /lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /mun pa'i mdog can zhal gcig ma/ /phyag gnyis spyan gsum khro tshul can/ /gri gug thod pa bsnams par mdzad/ /yab la phyag rgya drug

gis brgyan/ /yum la lnga yis rgyas btab gnas/ /sku dang gnyis med 'khril bar bzhugs/ /me 'od phreng bas yongs su bskor/ /ye shes rgya mtsho'i 'khor srungs ma/ /shar phyogs mkha' 'gro 'phrog ma dang / /lho
phyogs glang sna ma zhes bya/ /nub kyi srin mo ral pa can/ /byang du sa yi gtsug yin no/ /gang du rgya mtsho chu ngogs dang / /nag po'i chu dang 'dra ba'i sku/ /ma rungs 'joms byed nag po che/ /

'bad pas snying rje bskyed pa nyid/ /gsad par bya ba brjod pa nyid/ /snying rje med na mi 'grub pas/ /de phyir snying rje bskyed par bya/ /mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang / /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'khrug byed pa/ /

zhe sdang rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis/ /re shig tsam du gsad par bya/ /gzas pa'i sha la rtag tu rol/ /kun du gtum pa'i shugs 'chang ba/ /yul dang yul du rol byed pas/ /shing rnams la ni gnas nas kyang / /dkyil
'khor zhing rnams skyong bar byed/ /dur khrod gnas kyis yongs su bskor/ /ma mo'i gnas sogs khyab par byed/ /klu yis mchod pa'i zhing skyong ba/ /me yi phye mas yongs su bskor/ /sgo dang mig gis khyad
par 'gyur/ /gtso bo'i sngags kyis lus can te/ /sgrub pa po yi lus la gnas/ /de dag rim par dus bstan pa/ /dam tshig ldan pa'i sngags pa yis/ /sgrub pa'i rdzas rnams khyad par las/ /'bru nag gtor ma

rab tu shis/ /sha chen gyis ni brgyan pa yi/ /tshogs rdzas pU dza gus pas dbul/ /phyi nang gsang ba khyad par las/ /bstan pa'i tshul gyis phrin las las/ /bye brag rgyun dang gnas skabs pra/ /grub dang sgrub

pas mngon du 'gyur/ /dus rnams kun du zhe sdang gis/ /rnam pa kun du gzhom mi bya/ /yul min pa la gsad bya na/ /rnal 'byor dam tshig las nyams phyir/ /grub pa nam yang yod mi srid/ /khyad par ye shes bla med pa/ /

dam tshig mgon po sgrub pa yi/ /dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i lam sbyor mdzad/ /byang chub sems kyi zla ba 'di/ /yar ngo mar ngo rab tu gnas/ /yar ngo yis ni skyed byed la/ /mar ngo la ni 'grib par

byed/ /yar ngo yi ni bcwa lnga la/ /byang chub sems kyi mkha' 'gro yang / /bde ba chen por 'du bar mdzad/ /'di ni nges pa'i don du gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor lha nyid lus nyid yin/ /gzhan du lha dang dkyil 'khor ni/ /btsal yang

rnyed par mi 'gyur zhes/ /'dren pa dpa' bos rtag tu gsungs/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba la/ /drag po kun gyi srog gyur pa/ /yon tan phrin las dbang phyug gi/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i bdag po yin/ /ston pa gnas pa'i rang bzhin

las/ /'khor lo dgug bya gnyis med bstim/ /dngas snyigs las ni rgyu 'bras dang / /gnas pa khyad par rten 'brel te/ /'khrul dang 'khrul pa ma yin pa/ /khams gsum kun la dbang byed pas/ /'jig rten las dang ye shes kyi/ /

mgon po'i khyad par mngon du 'byung / /gdags pa tha snyad khyab pa po/ /thun mong bar ni bstan pa yin/ /'di dag las dang skye bo las/ /sgrib pa thun mong lha yi cha/ /dngos dang brgyud pas lung bstan pa/ /srog dang srog ma yin pa ste/ /

rgyu dang rkyen dang bskul ba yis/ /gsang sngags bzlas pa mngon par phye/ /'di ni mngon du 'byung ba'o/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //

de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /he ru ka dpal mgon nyid kyi/ /gsang ba'i sprul pa nag po che/ /'di yi sgrub rim bshad par bya/ /gsang ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs mchog ste/ /skal ba can la sbyin par bya/ /gang du sgrub pa'i sa phyogs su/ /mi

mthun g.yeng ba spang byas nas/ /de nas nag po bsgrub par bya/ /'gro ba kun la rab bltas nas/ /tshad med byang chub sems kyi blos/ /snying rje chen po bskyed byas nas/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /lhor bltas

skra grol gcer bu yis/ /dang por skad cig tsam gyis ni/ /rang lhar bskyed pa'i snying ga ru/ /a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang / /bsil zhing 'od dang bcas pa bsam/ /de'i steng ra~M las nyi dkyil 'khor/ /
rta bdun 'od zer tsha ba dang / /me yi rang bzhin 'phro ba bsam/ /de dbus yi ge hU~M nag po/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can/ /de yi 'od kyis snang ba las/ /dpag med kha dog bzhi bcas bsam/ /
rang bzhin gnas su 'phros pa las/ /bla ma dang ni lhag pa'i lha/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bcas pa dang / /nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas/ /mdun gyi nam mkhar bzhugs pa la/ /skyabs
su 'gro dang mchod pa dbul/ /sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya/ /bzod par gsol nas gshegs su gsol/ /de rjes dngos po thams cad kun/ /ma lus stong pa nyid gzhug cing / /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+hAH

sarba d+har+m+mAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM badzra shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM yo ga shud+d+hAH sarba d+har+m+mAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ /phyi dang nang gi dngos po kun/ /gdod nas dag pa'i ngang du bsam/ /

de nyid hU~M dang bcas pa yang / /nA da tsam du gnas pa las/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang las ni/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi khyab par bya/ /de las sa bon 'di dag ni/ /'chad bzhin pa las rim pas bsam/ /ya~M las rlung

gi dkyil 'khor dang / /ra~M las me yi dkyil 'khor dang / /ba~M dkar chu yi dkyil 'khor te/ /la~M las gser gyi sa gzhi nyid/ /de steng b+h+ru~M las ri rab 'byung / /de dag phyi nang ngo bo nyid/ /de dag steng gi cha

la yang / /dbus su pa~M las pad ma ni/ /sna tshogs pad ma rgya che ba/ /lte ba ge sar bcas dbus su/ /ha las sna tshogs rdo rje ni/ /kha dog lnga dang ldan par bsam/ /de dbus ra~M las nyi ma yi/ /hU~M yig sa

bon las byung ba/ /sa gzhi ma lus rdo rjer gyur/ /steng 'og phyogs mtshams rdo rje dang / /ral gri 'khor lo mda' dang ni/ /phur bu gri gug kha T+wA~M ga /rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang ni/ /rtse gsum nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar/ /
du ma rnam par 'phros nas ni/ /shin du rgya che bsam par bya/ /bla re ra ba log dang ni/ /gur gyi rnam par mtshams bcing bya/ /me 'od 'bar ba khyab par 'gyur/ /'di dag bsrung ba'i khyad par ro/ /

b+h+ru~M las byung ba'i 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs bcu pa ni yongs su 'khor/ /de stengs ra~M las nyi dkyil 'khor/ /de yi dbus su hU~M mdzad do/ /zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste/ /rin chen klu dbang rgyan dang ldan/ /rol pas rnam par sgeg

par bsam/ /ra~M las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus/ /de stengs hU~M bcu rnam par bsam/ /de las khro bo'i rgyal po bcu/ /zhal phyir gzigs pa rnam par bsam/ /khro bo de dag re re zhing / /phyogs skyong bcu po gdan la ni/ /

bkug nas gnyis med bzhugs par bsam/ /de las gsang sngags brjod tsam gyis/ /phur bus gdab dang brdung bar bya/ /des ni bla med mchog dag 'gyur/ /khro bo de dag re re zhing / /brtan par bya phyir gsang sngags brjod/ /

oM dkar 'khor lo dang bcas pa/ /'od ldan de las spros bsdus pas/ /bcom ldan rang bzhin yangs shing khyab/ /'od du zhu nas gzhal yas khang / /rin chen sna tshogs las grub pa/ /gru bzhi sgo dang rta babs
bcas/ /rdo rje dang ni nor bu yi/ /'od zer 'khrugs pa'i rnam pa'o/ /pho brang nang ma zlum po la/ /re mig dgu pa rdo rjes bskor/ /phyi ni pad ma mu khyud bcas/ /de yi nang na e yi dbyibs/ /drag po'i
gnas su bsam par bya/ /dbus ma'i nang du pa~M las ni/ /pad ma nyi zlar bcas pa bsam/ /A li kA li 'dus pa las/ /de las nam mkha'i sa bon te/ /nam mkha' las ni hU~M byung ste/ /gnyis
med zhugs las 'od du zhu/ /de la rdo rje gri gug bsam/ /'od kyi snang bas khyab pa las/ /skad cig gis ni sku rdzogs pa/ /nag po chen po bsam par bya/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi 'jigs pa'i
gzugs/ /dpa' bo chen po rol pas bzhugs/ /yab yum gnyis su med par bsam/ /de ltar yab yum rdzogs bskyed nas/ /mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab bya ste/ /sngags brjod pas ni dgyes

pa bskyed/ /de las dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams/ /yab yum snyoms par zhugs pa las/ /yum gyi mkha' dbyings bde chen du/ /so sor cho gas bskyed byas la/ /phyi rol du ni rims kyis 'byung / /dang por gtso bo'i rgyan

dang bcas/ /rdzogs par phyung ste d+hU tI nas/ /gyen du thugs ka'i pad ma las/ /'thon te 'gro ba'i don byas la/ /slar 'dus rang la thim gyur pa/ /dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs su gnas/ /de las rim pa ji bzhin du/ /
phyung nas so so'i gdan la bzhugs/ /gtso bo'i phyogs bzhir mkha' 'gro bzhi/ /zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste/ /gar stabs ldan pa'i lha mo ni/ /g.yas brkyang ba ni rnam par 'gying / /dpa' mo bde ba'i

skur bskyed pa'o/ /mtshams bzhir thod pa bdud rtsis bkang / /sna tshogs pad 'dab la gnas pa/ /nyi ma la gnas mgon po ni/ /shar du sku yi mgon po dang / /lho ru yon tan mgon po dang / /nub du gsung gi mgon po dang / /

byang du las kyi mgon po ste/ /thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /gri gug thod pa bsnam pa'o/ /so so'i g.yon du yum re re/ /gtum mo dang ni drag mo dang / /zlog byed ma dang dpa' mo ste/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis rgyan dang bcas/ /

de yi phyi yi gru chad la/ /bde 'dzin pa dang kha T+wA~M ga /gaN DI 'dzin dang rgyal mtshan 'dzin/ /so so'i yum dang bcas pa ste/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'bar ba'o/ /de yi phyi rol sgo dang grwar/ /lha mo brgyad po gar gyis rol/ /thams cad

zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /gar stabs ldan pas bzhugs pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams rdzogs pa dang / /de nas gtso bo yab yum dag /snyoms par zhugs pas 'od du zhu/ /de nas lha mo bzhi yis ni/ /rdo rje tshad myed

dbyangs kyis bskul/ /e ba~M si ta u Da na ni bA/ dza ti d+ha ma d+ha ma/ g+ha ma ang ka ma/ d+ha d+ha sha ri d+ha ra~M/ sa ni sa sa sa ni ga ma sa sa sa/ ri ga mo bu ma te sa ri sa ra sa ri ri sa ni sha /ma hA ma a d+ha ma sa sa/ shru tra ni sA sa

sA/ sa ni sa ri ta g+ha ma a~M g+ha~M/ a ta ma ta ya/ sa sA pa pa/ ma ya a ba sa d+he na ma a i/ de ltar bskul bar gyur pa las/ /de ltar nye bar gsan nas ni/ /thugs rje'i ngang las bzhengs mdzad de/ /nag po

gsang ba'i bu dang bcas/ /shin du 'jigs shing 'bar ba'i sku/ /bdud 'dul chen po rgyan dang bcas/ /spro ba dang ni bsdu bar mdzad/ /de nyid brtan dang mnyes par mdzad/ /sku gsung thugs ni rgyas gdab cing / /ye shes gzhug dang

dbang bskur dang / /byin gyis brlabs dang mchod pa dang / /sngags kyis bsten phyed bzlas pa bya/ /bdud rtsi myang dang bstod cing bskul/ /ting 'dzin don bsam nyer bsdu bya/ /de nas ldang bar gyur pa na/ /gnyis pa lha rnams thams cad kun/ /

skad cig gis ni rdzogs bya ste/ /de yi ngang la tinge 'dzin/ /gsang ba khyad par rdzogs par bya/ /rnam rtog bag chags kyis bcings la/ /rtog pa dag pa'i thabs mchog ldan/ /rnam rtog rang bzhin yongs shes na/ /de nyid thob tu

med pa ste/ /bde ba chen po yang dag 'byung / /chags pa med pas kun du spyad/ /'di de'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor pa/ /rig ma rnams la rol byed na'ang / /de nyid shes la bcing med de/ /rnam par rol pa'i tshul mchog go/ /

dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba lha'i gnas mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /gang du sngags kyi yi ge dang / /bzang po'i sngags kyi phreng ba 'di/ /rdza rnga bcing pa

las shes bya/ /re mig bdun pa'i grangs kyis ni/ /kun nas mnyam par dgod par bya/ /mkhas pas dbyangs dang gsal byed ni/ /sde tshan rim pas phye ba nyid/ /kun nas bskor ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /rim pa bzhin du btu bar bya/ /

sde tshan drug pa'i lnga pa ni/ /ha yi 'og nas gnas pa blang / /asma sha yi bzhi pa nyid/ /wa 'og gnas pa de nyid de/ /sde tshan gnyis pa'i dang po ste/ /pa yi steng na gnas pa blang / /an tas tha yi gsum pa ste/ /ya yi

steng ma yang dag blang / /sde tshan brgyad pa'i bzhi pa ni/ /ma yi steng na gnas pa la/ /sde tshan dang po'i gnyis pa nyid/ /nya yi 'og na gnas pa sbyar/ /sde tshan dang po'i lnga pa ste/ /Da yi 'og na gnas pa sbyar/ /

sde tshan dang po'i bcwa lnga pa/ /d+ha yi steng na gnas pa yi/ /zla tshes thig les brgyan par bya/ /sde tshan dang po'i bcu bzhi pa/ /de yi 'og ma'i yi ge la/ /dbyangs kyi bcwa lnga pa yin te/ /d+ha yi 'og mas brgyan par bya/ /de nyid thog mar

sbyin bya yin/ /sde tshan drug pa'i gnyis pa nyid/ /na yi 'og na gnas pa ste/ /bzhi pa yi ni thog ma gang / /ra yi 'og ma sbyar byas te/ /thog mar 'byung ba'i drug po ste/ /'di ni yid bzhin nor bu ster/ /

tsha yi steng na gnas pa gang / /b+ha yi 'og ma rnam par blang / /Ta yi steng mas brgyan par bya/ /ha yi 'og na gnas pa dang / /wa yi 'og ma gzung bar bya/ /pa yi steng ma nyid btu bya/ /ya yi steng na gnas pa las/ /nya yi steng

mas las kun byed/ /ma yi steng gnas yi ge nyid/ /ri rI yi 'og ma sbyar byas la/ /nyis 'gyur D+ha yi steng mas brgyan/ /tsa yi steng na gnas pa la/ /i yi steng ma drung du bzhag /'di ni dngos grub 'byung ba'i gnas/ /nga yi

steng ma'i yi ge la/ /d+ha yi steng mas yang dag brgyan/ /rig byad mngon sum dang por gnas/ /ma lus ye shes skur gyur pa'o/ /Sha yi 'og na gnas pa la/ /b+ha yi 'og ma'i yi ge dang / /Na yi 'og nas rab sbyin dang / /pa yi thog

ma yang dag blang / /tha 'og Da 'og stan du sbyar/ /tsa sa bar gnas yi ge dang / /dz+ha yi steng ma bdag po ste/ /sa ya bar na gnas pa bzung / /kha dang a yi bar gnas pa/ /ta yi 'og ma nya stengs ldan/ /ma yi steng

gnas ri rAM 'og sbyar/ /thig les brgyan pa nyis 'gyur sbyar/ /tsa yi steng na gnas pa la/ /-i yi steng mas brgyan pa drung / /'di ni sbas pa'i snying po ste/ /rang srog yi ger gsang ba'o/ /da yi steng ma'i yi ge la/ /

d+ha yi steng mas brgyan par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes che/ /snying po bzlas pa'i rig pa ste/ /bkra shis pa ni thog mar sbyar/ /na yi steng mas yang dag rgyal/ /dza yi gong ma d+ha stengs sbyar/ /sa la bar gnas Da stengs sbyar/ /

thig le nA das brgyan par bya/ /na 'og d+ha stengs mgo bor sbyin/ /'di las ma stengs ri 'og ldan/ /thig le zla tshes dag gis mtshan/ /tsa yi steng na gnas pa la/ /ra yi 'og ma drung du sbyin/ /b+ha stengs gnas pa la 'og sbyar/ /nya yi

'og ma yang dag ldan/ /sha sa bar gnas nya 'og sbyar/ /'di ni gsang ba'i bzlas pa ste/ /bya ba stobs ldan nyid yin no/ /gang du mngon par phyogs pa yi/ /dpal ldan nag po chen po yi/ /gsang sngags mchog tu gyur pa 'dis/ /stong dang brgya pa

bcur 'gyur gyis/ /rigs ni dam pa'i sa la gnas/ /thob pa yul dang yul du gnas/ /pha yi 'og ma dang por blang / /ha yi 'og ma blang byas la/ /tha yi steng ma sbyin par bya/ /Da yi steng ma'i drung nyid du/ /sha yi thog mas brten par bya/ /pha yi steng ma btu

bar bya/ /la yi steng ma'i yi ge la/ /Da yi steng mas stan du sbyar/ /nya yi steng ma nyis 'gyur la/ /phyi ma nya yi 'og mas brgyan/ /e yi 'og gyur bsdus pa la/ /sha yi steng ma drung du sbyar/ /la yi 'og ma rgyan du byas/ /nya yi 'og gis sbyin par bya/ /

o yi 'og na gnas pa la/ /nya yi 'og mas brgyan par bya/ /da yi 'og mar gnas pa la/ /thig le nA da dag gis brgyan/ /da yi 'og ma'i yi ge la/ /u yi steng ma sbyin par bya/ /tsha yi steng na gnas pa gang / /b+ha yi 'og ma rnam par

blangs/ /ta yi steng mas brgyan par bya/ /d+ha yi 'og ma gnas pa dang / /wa yi 'og ma gzung bar bya/ /sa yi steng ma nyid bsdus bya/ /ya yi steng na gnas pa las/ /nya yi 'og mas de la brgyan/ /nya yi 'og ma kun gyi rten/ /sa yi steng ma blang

bar bya/ /b+ha yi steng na gnas pa la/ /la yi 'og mas brgyan par bya/ /pha yi steng ma nyid de blang / /dz+ha yi 'og ma nga steng dang / /ba yi steng na gnas pa la/ /u yi steng ma yang dag blang / /e yi 'og gnas yi ge la/ /d+ha yi steng ma

mgo bor sbyin/ /la tha bar gnas pa la yang / /Na yi steng mas brgyan par bya/ /ma stengs thig le nA das brgyan/ /dz+ha 'og gnas pa'i yi ge la/ /da stengs sa yi steng ma dang / /pha 'og ta yi 'og mas brgyan/ /dz+ha

yi gong na gnas pa dang / /ma yi steng ma sa stengs gnas/ /ya yi steng ma nyid dang ldan/ /dz+ha 'og nya yi steng ma la/ /d+ha yi steng mas mgo bor brgyan/ /Da yi 'og ma sha steng ldan/ /thig le nA das brgyan pa'o/ /Da yi steng mas tsha nyid du/ /sha yi

thog mas brten par bya/ /pha yi steng ma btu bar bya/ /la stengs gnas pa Ta stengs sbyar/ /nya yi steng du nyis 'gyur bas/ /phyi ma'i nya yi 'og mas brgyan/ /dbyangs yig dang po ka 'og can/ /sa stengs gnas pa
nyid dang yang / /u steng gnas pa yang dag bcas/ /sa steng gnas pa thig les brgyan/ /nya yi steng ma'i gnas pa la/ /ai yi 'og gnas ga 'dun gnas/ /ta yi 'og ma mgo bor sbyin/ /nga steng gnas pa Na 'og

sbyar/ /la steng gnas pa Ta 'og bcas/ /la 'og zur gnas sbyar bar bya/ /b+ha yi 'og ma'i yi ge la/ /ma steng gnas pa stan du byas/ /sha'i 'og dza yi steng mar sbyar/ /Na 'og gnas pa nyid drung ste/ /b+ha stengs

gnas pa'i 'og mas brgyan/ /sha steng drung du sbyin par bya/ /la steng sha yi thog ma la/ /phyi ma nya 'og gnas pas mdzes/ /Ta 'og sha thog thig les brgyan/ /sha thog ri rI yi 'og mas brgyan/ /ba thog la steng gnas

pa sbyar/ /de la nya 'og sbyin par bya/ /b+ha steng gnas pa la 'og ldan/ /nya 'og dag gis yang dag mdzes/ /ka ga bar gnas pa nyid la/ /nyis 'gyur du ni bsdu bar bya/ /g+ha steng gnas pa de nyid la/ /nya 'og brgyan pa nyid du bya/ /

ma yi thog ma Da 'og bcas/ /g+ha steng gnas pa nyid dang ni/ /wa 'og gnas pa Tha 'og sbyin/ /ha 'og Na yi 'og mar ldan/ /de yi nyis 'gyur shes par bya/ /kha 'og ma yi yi ge la/ /u ri bar gnas sbyar bar bya/ /ma steng pha 'og 'og tu sbyin/ /

de ni nyis 'gyur sbyar bar bya/ /tsha yi steng ma pha thog drung / /Sha yi thog ma drung du gnas/ /de ni zung du sbyar bar bya/ /ma steng gnas pa sa thog drung / /nyis 'gyur rim par shes par bya/ /sha thog gnas pa wa thog drung / /lan gnyis su ni

brjod par bya/ /ka 'og gnas pa pha stan pa/ /ba 'og stan du byas pa nyid/ /nyis 'gyur dag tu shes par bya/ /b+ha steng gnas pa Ta steng drung / /Sha yi 'og ma stan du byas/ /sha'i steng Da yi 'og mas brgyan/ /d+ha 'og i thog stan du

sbyar/ /pha yi steng ma drung du bzhag /ha yi 'og ma Na 'og ldan/ /pha thog drag por 'gyur ba'o/ /sha stengs tha yi 'og mas brgyan/ /'di nyid rim pa mngon spyod pa'i/ /ma ra ya yi thog mar sbyar/ /ma yi steng gnas

ri 'og sbyar/ /nyis 'gyur thig le nA das brgyan/ /tsa yi steng na gnas pa la/ /i yi steng ma brgyan pa drung / /b+ha thog tha thog gnas pa sbyar/ /de la nya yi 'og mas brgyan/ /ma steng gnas pa nya 'og ni/ /yang dag

stan du bya ba'o/ /'di ni dri med bde ba'i gter/ /snying po gsang sngags 'di nyid ni/ /gang du gnas pa'i sa phyogs su/ /nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas/ /ma lus zhing skyong 'khor dang bcas/ /dur khrod ro la lce spyang dang / /sha za'i

tshogs rnams 'du ba bzhin/ /nges par 'du bar byed pa ste/ /bstan pa rgya mtsho srung byed pa'o/ /dpag tshad brgyad khri'i bar du ni/ /de yi bgegs rnams ma lus pa/ /til 'bru tsam du byed par mdzad/ /snying po 'di ni

zlos byed cing / /gang du nyi ma gcig tu yang / /ma chad mngon par sems pa yi/ /he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor la/ /'jigs pa kun las srung ba dang / /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod la/ /
thogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /ji srid mtshan ma ma byung gi/ /bar du 'bad de bsgrub par bya/ /mtshan ma byung nas bla ma yi/ /man ngag bzhin du las la sbyar/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos

grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba sngags kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /yang dag ye shes bskyed pa po/ /gdug pa ma lus 'dul mdzad pa/ /gtum po de yi gsang ba'i yum/ /lha mo

bzhi dang bcas pa yi/ /gsang sngags btu ba bshad par bya/ /dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa dag la/ /thig le nA das rnam par brgyan/ /rig byed mngon sum dang por gnas/ /drug pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang / /

bdun pa yi ni dang po nyid/ /an tas+tha yi gsum pa ste/ /dang po'i gsum pa thog tu sbyin/ /lnga pa'i lnga pa gsum pas brgyan/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po la/ /an tas+tha yi gsum pas bstan/ /dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis brgyan/ /

drug pa yi ni dang po dang / /dbyangs kyi dgu pas gnas der sbyar/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /an tas tha yi gsum pa dang / /de nyid kyi ni gnyis pa dang / /lnga pa yi ni dang po la/ /dbyangs kyi bdun pas steng 'og sbyin/ /lnga pa yi ni

lnga pa la/ /dbyangs kyi gsum pa mgo bor sbyin/ /gsum pa yi ni dang po la/ /drung du lnga pa'i lnga pa sbyar/ /lnga pa'i bzhi pa dag dang sbyar/ /dang po'i dang po'i drung du ni/ /gnyis pa'i gsum pa sbyar ba dang / /mthar gnas las

kyang phyi ma yi/ /de la dbyangs kyi gsum pas brgyan/ /an tas tha yi dang po la/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa yis brgyan/ /brgyad pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ /dbyangs yig drug pa dag gis brgyan/ /thig le nA das mdzes pa'o/ /

drug pa yi ni gnyis pa nyid/ /bzhi pa yi ni thog ma sbyar/ /'di ni gsang ba'i gtum pa mo/ /drag cing shin tu cher 'jigs byed/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i rigs 'dzin gter/ /bkra shis pa ni thog mar sbyar/ /mthar

gnas pa yi bzhi pa la/ /dbyangs yig bdun pa steng 'og sbyar/ /thig le nA das mdzes pa yin/ /usma sha yi bzhi pa la/ /dbyangs yig drug pa dang sbyar ba/ /an tas+tha yi gnyis pa sbyar/ /de nyid thig les mdzes par

byas/ /gnyis pa'i dang po blang byas la/ /dbyangs kyi dgu pa blang ba nyid/ /drug pa yi ni lnga pa la/ /usma sha yi bzhi pa dang / /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /dbyangs yig bcu pa sbyar bar bya/ /bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa dang / /gnyis pa

yi ni dang po dang / /lnga pa'i dang po btu bar bya/ /drug pa yi ni lnga pa la/ /dbyangs yig bcwa lnga pa yis brgyan/ /gnyis pa'i lnga par gnas pa'o/ /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang / /lnga pa y-i ni lnga pa dang / /drug pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /

phyi ma'i yang ni bzhi pa la/ /lnga pa yi yang lnga pa la/ /dbyangs kyi gsum pas brgyan par bya/ /dang po yi ni dang po dang / /drug pa yi ni lnga pa la/ /dbyangs kyi lnga pas brgyan par bya/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gsum

pa la/ /an tas+tha yi dang po sbyar/ /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang / /bdun pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /drug pa yi ni bzhi pa sbyar/ /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /dbyangs kyi dgu pa'i yi ge la/ /lnga pa'i gsum pa gdags par bya/ /usma sha yi gsum

pa la/ /lnga pa'i dang po sbyar bar bya/ /thig le nA das yang dag brgyan/ /drug pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /an tas+tha yi dang po ste/ /yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid kyis/ /nyis 'gyur dag tu sbyar bar bya/ /usma sha yi bzhi pa la/ /dang po'i drug pa dang sbyar ba/ /

an+tas+tha yi gnyis pa sbyar/ /thig le nA das brgyan par bya/ /'di ni gsang ba'i yum dag gis/ /snying po sbas pa mchog gyur pa/ /lha mo nag mo ye shes che/ /sngags ni drag cing sdud pa'o/ /de nas ye shes lnga ldan pa'i/ /rig byed mngon sum

dang por bzhag /drug pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa la/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po nyid/ /an+tas+tha yi gsum pa ste/ /dang po'i gsum pa thog tu sbyin/ /dang po'i bcu drug pa mtha' bya/ /mthar ni hU~M phaT sbyar

bar bya/ /sde tshan gnyis pa'i dang po la/ /an+tas+tha yi gnyis pa sbyar/ /dang po'i dgu pa blang ba nyid/ /drug pa yi ni lnga pa la/ /thig le nA das brgyan pa'o/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po la/ /drung du de nyid lnga pa sbyar/ /gnyis

pa'i dang po de nyid dang / /dbyangs kyi dgu pa sbyar bar bya/ /mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa la/ /bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa sbyar/ /de la thig le nA das brgyan/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po la/ /an+tas+tha yi gsum pa dang / /bdun

pa yi ni gnyis pa sbyar/ /lnga pa'i dang po nyid la 'ang / /dbyangs kyi bdun pa steng 'og sbyar/ /bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa la/ /thig le nA das mdzes byas pa'o/ /'di dag kun gyi thog ma dang / /tha mar yang dag brten par

bya/ /'di ni DA ki bzhi dag gi/ /snying po sbas pa mchog tu gsungs/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang sngags rim par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad par

bya/ /gsang ba sngags kyi 'khor lo las/ /mthar ni hUM phaT sbyar bar bya/ /lha yi 'khor lo rgya mtsho nyid/ /lan tshwa chu rgyun 'bab pa'i ngang / /gangs kyi thigs pa bdud rtsi'i chu/ /me tog mdangs gsal snying po yi/ /ge sar ze 'brur ldan pa la/ /'dab

rgyas ye shes nyi shar bas/ /rang grol mdangs 'bar rab tu rgyas/ /rdo rje rin chen ral gri dang / /'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs dag las/ /'khor ba'i rgyun las 'od zer 'phro/ /steng 'og dag las rim pa ni/ /'khrug cing

gcod pa'i gri gug gis/ /las dang phrin las rang byung du/ /byed cing bskul ba'i las grub pa/ /phyi nang gsang ba rim bzhin du/ /dbab dang sngags pa zlog pa ste/ /rtsa ba yan lag las bzhir 'gyur/ /dang po thun mong

dgu pa ste/ /gnyis pa bye brag phye ba dang / /bskyed pa'i ye shes mi zlog pa/ /klungs su chud pa phyag rgya che/ /snying po gcig la dus gsum du/ /'gyur med de nyid dbye ba nyid/ /gcig las du ma'i ngo bo can/ /'jig rten pa dang ye

shes che/ /mi 'gyur ba dang 'gugs pa dang / /las rnams byed pa'i srog gyur pa/ /gsang sngags 'khor lo 'di dag ni/ /bye brag rnal 'byor pas shes bya/ /ma hA kA la hUM hUM phaT/ badzra ma hA kA la hUM phaT/ badzra

ka'u wa ma hA kA lA ya hUM hUM phaT/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ shrI ma hA kA lA ya/ shA sa na~M u pa hA rI smA/ e ShA pa/ ma kA laHa ya~M/ i da~M rat+na tra yA ya/ a pa kA ri smA/ ya di pra ti dz+nyA/ sma ra si

ta dA/ e da~M duSh+Ta satwa/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ma ra ma ra/ grIh+Na grIh+Na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ sar+b+ba du/ di na me ke na mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ ma hA kA li ni kro d+ha sa ki la rak+Shi NI tsaN+Da ak+ShI ye hUM phaT/

oM hrI hU~M kA li ma hA kA l-i rak+ta mA~M se na/ b+hak+Sha Ni a nu ka sa ya/ sar+b+ba li~M sta~M b+ha ya hU~M phaT/ AHma~M ra~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM ka rA li ma~M hU~M phaT/ oM kang kA la~M hrIHhU~M phaT/ oM kA la ra tri ra~M hU~M phaT/ de las dngos dang nyams su yang / /nag po chen

po'i zhal ston dang / /tha ma rmi lam lung ston pa/ /mi nag bong thung gsus 'phyang dang / /bya nag khwa ta la sogs 'ong / /de yang rab 'bring tha ma yi/ /bye brag rtags su 'char bar 'gyur/ /grangs ni bdun 'bum dag dang ni/ /mngon sum gsal ba'i

nges pa 'char/ /khri phrag bdun dang khri phrag dgu/ /stong phrag bdun gyis nye bar 'gyur/ /thabs dang shes rab bcas pa yi/ /sngags kyi stong phrag bcu dag ni/ /dus ni zla drug zhag bdun par/ /rnal 'byor smra ba bcad de bzlas/ /mi tshig

bar ma chod pa yi/ /gsang sngags phrin las nges par 'grub/ /thun mtshams mchod dang gtor ma dang / /bstod dang bcol bskul las la 'bad/ /rang nyid he ru kar gsal ba/ /ri rab steng du yum bcas bsam/ /de mdun nag po chen po nyid/ /

gsal ba bskyed tshul dbye ba yis/ /rgyan dang cha lugs rdzogs pa ni/ /mngon sum lta bur blta bar bya/ /bdag dang mdun gyi mgon po yi/ /thugs ka'i sa bon rang sngags las/ /de ltar spro bsdus ting 'dzin bsam/ /de ltar dus dang gzhan

du yang / /rten bcas dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa dang / /rten btsugs brtan byed de nyid bsnyen/ /de nas rten bcas tsam gyis ni/ /nges par de yi mdun song ba/ /mchod dang gtor ma bsham par bya/ /sha chen bsreg spos phul nas ni/ /

dmigs pa gtod par byed pa dang / /gang la bya ba'i sgrub bya de/ /dmigs pas bkug cing bstan pa dang / /gtor mar dbul zhing bka' bsgo bya/ /lha dang bral zhing nyes pa bsgo/ /de nas ma nyes nyes pa sgrag /dpang btsugs

las la bcol bskul bya/ /de yis nges par 'grub par 'gyur/ /de las khyad par phrin las ni/ /lha sbyin dang ni mchod sbyin sogs/ /bsgral ba'i zhing de gang yin pa/ /de yi zag pa'i rdzas rnams dang / /phung shul sa dang
g.yul sprad sa/ /grog mkhar sa la sogs pa rnams/ /bsdud chad sa la bong bu'i chus/ /sbrus te ling ga sta gon bya/ /de nas dben par song nas ni/ /mar ngo yi ni tshes brgyad dam/ /bcu bzhi la sogs

sgrub dus la/ /gza' skar shin du drag po la/ /de nas 'khor lo bri bar bya/ /rgyu ni ro ras shing shun dang / /zhing lpags dag la dug sna dang / /khrag dang dug gi me tog gi/ /du ba mtshan ngan thod chags la/ /mchog

phur bstod pa'i snag tshas bri/ /rgya skyegs dag gis bsres la bri/ /tshad dang ldan pa'i mu khyud ni/ /rim pa bzhi dang ldan pa la/ /nang du ling tshe dgu pa bya/ /phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga por ni/ /gru gsum nag po

sa bon bcas/ /las rnams byed pa rlung yig dang / /ma hA kA la 'bru bzhi dang / /steng non oM dang badzra ste/ /de yi phyir mi rtsibs brgyad la/ /a mu ka~M dang ba yi ni/ /yi ge bcu gsum gnyis gnyis pa/ /
g.yas skor dag tu dgod par bya/ /de yi phyi rim pad 'dab brgyad/ /sgo mtshams lha mo'i 'khor lo'i sngags/ /ming spel bcas pa dgod par bya/ /de yi nang gi gru chad bzhir/ /hU~M gnyis phaT dang bcas pa
la/ /ming spel bcug la bri bar bya/ /khyad par sbas pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /dbus su rlung gi sa bon nyid/ /phyogs bzhir mkha' 'gro ma bzhi gnas/ /phyogs bzhir sngags kyi phreng ba las/ /phyi rol rtsibs

la gcod pa'i sngags/ /'dab brgyad cha la tsaN Di ka /mtha' rten snga ma dag dang mtshungs/ /yang na rim pa gsum pa yi/ /gsang sngags ma hA kA la yi/ /phrin las khyad par dgod par bya/ /'dis ni shin du mngon

spyod myur/ /thabs dang shes rab khyad par dang / /steng 'og bar gyi dbye ba yis/ /zangs dang lcags kyi gri gug gis/ /bla dang tshe srog don snying la/ /myur du 'khor bas gcod par byed/ /sdud byed 'phrog cing len pa'i srog /bsgral

ba rdo rje rigs kyi las/ /thun mong du ni bya ba yin/ /khyad par 'khor lo dril bya ste/ /dus kyi rim pas las la sbyar/ /'di ni kun du mnan pa ste/ /las kyi gshin rje'i gnas su gtad/ /'khor lo la yang bsnyen pa dang / /

bsgrub pa go rim nor mi bya/ /'dis ni bya ba mi 'grub med/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang sngags dang 'khor lo bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dpal

ldan nag po chen po yi/ /rnal 'byor ting 'dzin la zhugs te/ /mngon par spyod pa brtsam par bya/ /khyad par dur khrod pa yi shing / /lha 'dre gtum po gnas pa las/ /ma mo'i bye brag brtags pa las/ /bcad pa
mgo mjug ma nor bar/ /gnyis bshags de nas sngags bris la/ /bsdams te zla ba mig gis ni/ /phye ba'i bdun phrag gsum pa la/ /legs par gzhan ste tshad du bya/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa la

gzugs/ /gzhan yang bsgrub bya'i gzugs dag ni/ /zur gsum tshud pa sngags dang bcas/ /ming spel bskul tshig ldan pa ni/ /grangs ni rab 'bring tha ma ste/ /ci rigs par ni bya bar gsungs/ /yang na ro sgrom
shing la yang / /byang bu byas la ling ga bri/ /gzhan du mgon po yab yum gyi/ /'khor lo legs par bris pa dang / /bsgrub bya srog gi 'khor lo ni/ /gri gug lnga pa 'khor ba dag /de dag bar du bcug pa

dang / /yang na mgon po'i 'khor lo dang / /bsgrub bya du yod ling ga rnams/ /de yi nang du dril bar bya/ /'khor lo tshon skud rnam lngas bkri/ /de yi phyi rol ku sha yi/ /rtswa yi mi gzugs byas nas kyang / /rang

mdun gru gsum nag po yi/ /nang du gzugs de gzhug par bya/ /de la lha dang dbye ba dang / /nyes pa bsgo zhing bsgrag par bya/ /de nas bdag nyid lha dang ni/ /mdun du nag po chen po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi 'jigs pa'i
gzugs/ /yum dang bcas pa bskyed pa dang / /spyan drang mchod cing bstim par bya/ /las mgon rnams dang ma mo bzhi/ /rgyal chen bzhi dang phyogs skyong bcu/ /lha srin sde brgyad ma lus dang / /gzhan

yang dur khrod sha za dang / /ma mo ro langs lce spyang dang / /stag dang dred dang bya gcan sogs/ /bya rog khwa ta la sogs pa/ /yongs su bskor cing phrin las byed/ /de nas rang dang mgon po dang / /lha mo bzhi la sogs pa yi/ /sa bon las ni

'od zer yang / /lcags kyu lta bu dpag med pas/ /bsgrub bya de dag ma lus pa/ /snying gi srog rtsa nas drangs te/ /rang dbang med par rlung gis bteg /myur du 'ongs pa mdog nyams pa/ /rid cing skra 'dzings shin tu 'dar/ /yed yed

sdang zhing skrag pa de/ /zhags pas bcings dang bsdams pa dang / /dril bu la sogs sgra yis ni/ /shin du dbang po myos gyur te/ /de yi rnam par shes pa ni/ /ming dang bcas pa'i gzugs la bstim/ /de yi dus su gsang sngags ni/ /

phrin las sngags rings mtha' ru ni/ /A kar Sha ya dzaHzhes brjod/ /mgon po nag po yab yum gyi/ /lte bar gru gsum lcags khang ni/ /btson dong mun khang gnas pa bsam/ /de las thar dus med par bya/ /de nas dong de ro

g.yam la/ /rdo rje rgya gram bris pas mnan/ /mtha' mar las sbyor dus su yang / /bsgrub bya'i them pa'am lam dag tu/ /mnan pa byas la phrin las bcol/ /gal te de nyid sbyin sreg gis/ /las sbyor bsgrub bya'i chu rjes sogs/ /dri

ma gos dang skra sogs dang / /tsha ba gsum dang dug sna dang / /khrag dang skye tshe shang tshe dang / /da d+hu ra dang re la sogs/ /sa sna gzhan dang sbyar bar bya/ /bong bu'i chu dang bsres nas ni/ /'jim pa byas la g.yog par bya/ /dug chu ro

sol dag gis ni/ /de la byug cing gnas lnga ru/ /seng ldeng lcags phur btab la gzhag /de yi lus po thams cad la/ /spra tshil gyis ni byug par bya/ /de la drag po'i shing gi ni/ /tsher ma sna tshogs btsugs la gzhag /

gru gsum e yi nang du ni/ /de gzugs phyi gan dag tu gzhag /kha nang dur khrod thal bas brdzang / /de nas dong kha bcad la gzhag /de la thun bzhar bya ba'am/ /dus drug dag tu bya ba ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis lhor bltas la/ /nyin

phyed mtshan phyed dus su bya/ /yang na dus bzhir las la sbyar/ /phyogs kyi DA ki bzhi yis ni/ /dgug gzhug bstim dang bsngags par bya/ /de nas thod pa mtshan ngan du/ /yungs kar nyungs nag la sogs pa'i/ /thun rdzas

rnams la sngags bzlas shing / /dus dus dag tu brdeg par bya/ /skabs skabs dug gi chu yis brdeg /gal te gu gul nag po dang / /sha chen dag gis bdug par bya/ /yang na 'bras bu me la ni/ /spra tshil ma zhu tsam

du bsro/ /de nas sngags kyis brdeg par bya/ /'dis ni nye bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /de ltar cho ga'i thabs 'di yis/ /dgra yi khang par bya rog dag /mang po 'ba' zhig skad 'don dang / /lus la tsha bas thegs la sogs/ /

du ma'i cho 'phrul 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dang por nang rtags gsal bar 'char/ /phyi rtags rim gyis 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las drag po'i mngon spyod bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //

de nas gdug pa 'dul don du/ /nag po chen po khros pa yi/ /bsgrub pa'i rim pa mchog gyur pa/ /gzhan yang rab tu bshad par bya/ /rje btsun he ru ka dpal dang / /nag po chen po'i lha tshogs rnams/ /nam mkhar mngon par
bltas nas ni/ /bdun po yongs su dag par bya/ /bzod par gsol la gshegs su gsol/ /de rjes stong pa'i ngang las ni/ /tshad med bzhi po bsam par bya/ /byang chub sems kyi ngang las ni/ /pad ma zla nyir
gnas pa yi/ /hU~M yig nag po bsam par bya/ /de yi 'od kyis khyab pa las/ /bsdus shing skad cig yongs gyur pa/ /dpal ldan nag po chen po ni/ /zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa/ /phyag gnyis sku mdog shi
tu nag /dbu skra kham nag gyen du brdzes/ /g.yas pa gshin rje'i lce 'dra ba'i/ /gri gug rnon po 'dzin par mdzad/ /g.yon pa thod pa khrag bkang bsnams/ /thod pas skra mtshams bcings pa dang / /yan lag

thung zhing rags pa'i gzugs/ /mche gtsigs 'jigs su rung ba ste/ /ltos 'gro brgyad dang rin chen brgyad/ /rgyu ma'i ga sha stag lpags can/ /mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng ba 'phyang / /zhal nas khrag 'dzag gad rgyangs can/ /phyag

rgya drug gis sku la spras/ /drag po'i nyams dang ldan pa ste/ /skad cig tsam gyis bskyed par bya/ /de yi thugs kar nyi ma la/ /ye shes sems dpa' gsal bar dmigs/ /ting 'dzin sems dpa' dang bcas pa/ /rten

dang rten par bcas pa bsam/ /de la 'di yi gsang sngags byung / /oM badzra ma hA kA lA ya hU~M hU~M phaT/ ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa/ /gsang sngags phreng ba bzlas par bya/ /de nas sha chen spos bsreg cing / /gzhan yang dug dang

khrag la sogs/ /bdug pa'i du bas mchod par bya/ /ma sha 'bras dang so ba dang / /'bru nag me tog byug pa dang / /sgron ma lnga dang mi 'chi lnga/ /khu ba chan dang chang la sogs/ /gtor ma nag po che la dbul/ /mchod dang

bstod pa tshul bzhin bya/ /'di yi nye bar spyad pa ni/ /bsgrub bya'i zag pa'i rdzas rnams dang / /tsha ba gsum la sogs pa la/ /gang gi ming dang bcas pa'i gzugs/ /byas te dug gis byugs nas kyang / /tsher mas bkang ste thab khung du/ /'bras phub me la

gdung la sogs/ /bya ba sna tshogs las byas na/ /skad cig gis ni brlag par byed/ /rdo rje slob dpon smod byed cing / /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig byed pa/ /dkon mchog gsum la sdang ba dang / /sems can kun la 'tshe ba rnams/ /'di dag nag po

chen pos sgrol/ /yan lag dag gi sha chod la/ /mgon po nag po'i zhal du gsol/ /yang na de yi spyi nas ni/ /til tsam du ni mdzad du gsol/ /khrag gi rgyun yang 'thung bar mdzod/ /de ltar phrin las las bcol bya/ /de nas sbyin

sreg brtsam par bya/ /phung shul g.yul sprad la sogs pa/ /dur khrod sol bas byug byas te/ /gru gsum rim pa kha sgyer ldan/ /de yi nang du drag po'i shing / /tsher ma can gyis brtsig par bya/ /mchod dang bsreg rdzas gtor ma dang / /

bsgrub bya'i ling ga sha chen dang / /yungs kar bcas pas yongs su bskor/ /sngags pas lhor bltas ting 'dzin zhugs/ /me lha bskyed cing dgug gzhug bya/ /ling ga phur btab btubs byas la/ /me sbar bsregs pas

lha la mchod/ /gsang sngags 'dod yon sgyur ldan pa/ /phrag gcig gis ni lan cig ste/ /lan grangs rol mtsho'i khyad par gyis/ /phyir mi zlog cing srog gtor byed/ /de rjes gsol gdab bcol bskul bya/ /shin du myur

bar rtags rnams 'grub/ /nag po chen po'i gsang ba'i las/ /ma grub lan gsum spobs pa dang / /sa bon 'phrog cing gcud pas 'grub/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las drag po'i sbyin sreg bstan

pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas dkyil 'khor chen po yi/ /dur khrod gnas pa'i zhing skyong dang / /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i zhing skyong bcas/ /de dag rim pa bshad par bya/ /rdo rje rigs kyi pho nya mo/ /drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i phrin
las dang / /'di nyid gsang ba'i mgon po yi/ /thabs mchog 'di ni kun du sbas/ /dpal ldan mgon po rdo rje can/ /kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ /dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs dpa' bo ni/ /

shin du 'gying zhing 'bar ba'i sku/ /ling tshe dgu pa'i dbus su ni/ /sna tshogs pad ma nyi dbus la/ /dpa' bo chen po phyed dkyil tshul/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /spyan gsum byi ru la ltar dmar/ /sku

mdog sngon po 'jigs chen po/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /phyag rgya lnga ldan gar gyis rol/ /dang pos gri gug thod pa dang / /gnyis pa ral gri kha T+wA~M ga /klu brgyad rgyan gyi phrin las can/ /de yi thugs kar

gnas pa yi/ /sa bon spro dang bsdu ba'i dngos/ /oM ma hA kA la A kaR+Sha ya ma ma pra sha ma na ya ha sa ma ya s+t+wA~M/ thams cad sdud cing dbang byed pa/ /skad cig tsam gyis bskyed par bya/ /de yi shar gyi ling tshe la/ /

drag po shin du 'jigs pa ste/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa/ /mthing nag rngam pa'i tshul du gnas/ /de yi mdun du rgan byed ma/ /g.yas su mi sdug drag mo che/ /g.yon du 'jigs ma gnas pa dang / /rgyab tu u ma rnam par rol/ /nag

po'i lho yi phyogs su ni/ /drag po chen po du ba'i mdog /zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa/ /thod phreng gis brgyan gtsig pa'i tshul/ /de yi mdun du rnam rgyal ma/ /g.yas su rnam par rgyal ba ma/ /rgyab tu mi
sdug ma gnas la/ /g.yon du gzhan gyis mi thub ma'o/ /lha gter mnyam gnas nub phyogs su/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa/ /mdog ser rgyu ma'i phreng bas dkris/ /shin du bzhad pa'i tshul du gnas/ /

de yi mdun du nag mo che/ /g.yas su drag chen drag shul can/ /rgyab tu nag sbom ma ni gnas/ /g.yon du bzang mo mche ba can/ /nag mo khyab byed byang phyogs su/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa/ /char sprin

nag po'i mdog 'dra ba/ /shin du gdangs shing ljags 'dril ba/ /de yi mdun du dbang mo ste/ /g.yas su zla ba mo zhes bya/ /rgyab tu drag tu sdang ba la/ /g.yon du rna ba 'phyang ba'o/ /gtso bo nag po chen po ni/ /
shar lho mtshams kyi gnas bzhugs pa/ /gtsigs pa can ni shel gyi mdog /stag lpags gos kyis dkris pa'o/ /mdun du lha mo 'phrog byed ma/ /g.yas su 'bar byed ma gnas la/ /de yi rgyab tu 'jib byed ma/ /

g.yon du yul skyong ma gnas so/ /gtso bor gyur pa'i sku yi ni/ /lho nub mtshams su bzhugs pa ni/ /mi sdug pa ni dUr ba'i mdog /shin du mi srun gzugs 'chang ba/ /gzig gi ko ba rlon pas dkris/ /mdun du 'jigs

byed drag mo che/ /g.yas su gzugs chen mo zhes bya/ /rgyab tu mche ba gtsigs ma ste/ /g.yon du thod can ma yin no/ /nag po chen po'i sku yi ni/ /nub byang mtshams kyi grwar bzhugs pa/ /dga' bar ldan pa pad dmar mdog /

glang po'i lpags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /de yi mdun du thod phreng 'dzin/ /g.yas su phreng ba 'dzin ma ste/ /rgyab tu tri shul 'dzin ma'o/ /g.yon du ltos 'gro bsnams pa'o/ /gtso bo nag po chen po yi/ /byang shar mtshams su gnas pa

ni/ /log sred can gyi rdza gsar mdog /spre'u'i lpags pa 'dzin pa mo/ /de yi mdun du ral gri ma/ /g.yas su dgra sta 'dzin ma ste/ /rgyab tu rdo rje mda' thogs ma/ /g.yon du rdo rje gzhu ma'o/ /khro bo'i pho nya 'di dag ni/ /zhal gcig phyag

bzhi gar gyis rol/ /dang po gri gug thod pa 'dzin/ /gnyis pas Da ma ru dang ni/ /tri shU la ni 'dzin par mdzad/ /pho nya'i rnal 'byor ma 'di dag /'di dag phal cher zhal gcig la/ /phyag gnyis gri gug thod pa can/ /nag mo

ser dang dmar ljang ste/ /phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa'o/ /dur khrod gnas su rol par mdzad/ /pho brang de yi phyi rol du/ /zhing skyong rnams kyis yongs su bskor/ /ka Ta ha re ka ta~M shing / /shan ti pa la yab yum can/ /kol+la kir ni

ro yi shing / /g+han d+ha pA la yum dang ldan/ /d+ha ra par ta pa yi shing / /a~M gi pA la yab yum sbyor/ /ko Tir d+hi ba pa d+hi shing / /dz+wA la pA la yab yum sbyor/ /b+ha ri tsar te a 'bra'i shing / /shwa ra d+ha sa gnyis med gnas/ /

o Ta dbyangs can ka na ka'i/ /ka pA la yi lha srub byed/ /sa Ta b+ha rur dzA ti'i 'bras/ /g+han stod da pa lhan cig sbyor/ /o la pu rir ha ti pa yi rna ba can/ /ha na mo ha yab yum sbyor/ /karmi ra bar rtsa ba'i sdong / /

tsan dra sa ni go Ta'i bdag /ma ri Na bar thang sgron shing / /byin pa k+She tra pA lar ldan/ /nA ga ba rar sa shing can/ /keng rus ldan pa rol par 'gyur/ /suNaDe par ri dzA lu'i shing / /pu y-i rkang pa rtag tu rol/ /

dzA la d+ha rar khang brtsegs shing / /bum pa can de bde bar rol/ /b+ha sna gu bar drag klog 'khrug /dzA Ta tri pa mnyam par gnas/ /so sa par ni tril sha'i shing / /sgra gcan sgrogs pa'i yum dang bcas/ /tsa ri Ta pa'i ka ran tsar/ /

mdzes pa shaka ti can yum ldan/ /o Ta ya par a sho ka'i/ /shin du sgra gcan gsang mor bcas/ /gzung 'dzin sa sar ka ko li/ /sred pa dpa' bo dbang phyug bcas/ /k+Shi ri ke par sa la'i shing / /lhun po 'bar ba dbang phyug bcas/ /

k+Shi ri ki sar sa la'i shing / /lhun po 'bar ba lhan cig bcas/ /b+ha yang ma 'bur 'byung po'i shing / /stobs chen 'jigs pa gnas byed pa'o/ /pu Ta nar ni d+ha du pa'i/ /a b+ha ke ba brtul zhugs 'dzin/ /rA dza g+hi har dza pa na/ /sna chen dzi li sgra

gcan no/ /khang pa can du rang byung brag /thub dka' rgyal mtshan 'dzin mar bcas/ /ma hA trA yer tsan dan shing / /sna tshogs dbang phyug dbang bskur bcas/ /'di dag k+She tra pA la ni/ /zhing skyong zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ /gri gug gcang te

g.yas pa na/ /g.yon pa thod khrag rtse gsum can/ /yum ni so so'i phyag mtshan ldan/ /skye gnas las byung sgra sgrogs mdzad/ /rtag tu sgrub pa po rnams kyis/ /lus la yang dag gnas nas ni/ /dngos grub ster byed stobs mchog byed/ /

'di dag zhing skyong thugs brtse bas/ /rtag par mtshan mo 'du bar mdzad/ /'di dag sa gsum khyab pa ste/ /sna tshogs mdog can 'bar ba'o/ /oM shAn+ti k+She pa hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA smr-i ti hU~M phaT/ oM b+ha lan pU hU~M phaT/ oM shang ka ri hU~M phaT/

oM kA lA d+hi pa hU~M phaT/ oM dza ya b+ha lan hU~M phaT/ oM be su b+ha ga hU~M phaT/ oM bar+Na sa na hU~M phaT/ oM k+She tra pA la ha hi hU~M phaT/ oM kI li kI li phem phem phaT phaT/ k+Sha~M k+Sha~M k+Sha~M k+Sha~M/ ka ha ka ha/ / pa tsa pa tsa/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/

ha hA/ Da DA ra~M k+t+ya ra~M kha~M kha~M kha~M kha~M/ ru ru ru ru/ Da~M Da~M Da~M Da~M/ ka~M ka~M ka~M kaM/ tsa~M tsa~M tsa~M tsa~M/ kra~M kra~M kra~M kra~M/ sa~M sa~M sang sang / ba~M ba~M ba~M ba~M/ ya~M ya~M ya~M ya~M/ a+yA+e b+h+ru~M b+h+ru~M b+h+ru~M b+h+ru~M/ k+Sha~M k+Sha~M k+Sha~M k+Sha~M/ kleM kliM klu~M klu~M/ kle~M kli~M klu~M klu~M/ pA~M pA~M pA~M pA~M/

swA hA/ yul ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi/ /drag po'i zhing skyong nyi shu bzhi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yi/ /sa gsum rnam par khyab nas gnas/ /'di dag gsang ba'i sngags yin te/ /gzhan du nam yang 'khrul bar 'gyur/ /oM DA ki nI/ ka kak+na ta na/ ba ba ban

d+han/ / kha kha khA hI ban+d+ha na/ sarba duSh+TA nA~M/ ha na ha na/ g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ a mu ka s+ya shA~MtiM ku ru hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'di dag grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma/ /dngos grub stsol bar the tshom med/ /'di nyid dkyil 'khor dgod pa

yis/ /sna tshogs phrin las byed pa ste/ /dur khrod brgyad kyi bdag po mchog /pho nya legs brten 'khor lo yin/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las dur khrod kyi bdag mo rnams dang / pho nya ba

khyad par ba rnams dang ma mo dang zhing skyong gi phrin las bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang nyi shu bzhi/ /gsang ba'i mgon po 'di nyid kyis/ /dkyil 'khor pho brang gnas pa'o/ /mkha'

'gro'i gsang sngags bstan par bya/ /pho nya legs skyes rnal 'byor ma/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ro yis ni/ /phye ba'i rdo rje nor bu dang / /pad ma ral gri'i rigs dang ni/ /dam tshig ye shes bde gshegs kyis/ /sna

tshogs sha za'i ma mo rnams/ /gnas skyes yul dang grong gnas pa/ /klu yis mtshon pas kun du phye/ /oM b+hai ra khi ni swA hA/ Du Di ni/ Da sha ka ra li ni dz+wA la mu khi ni/ bA yu be ga ni/ pra tsaN+Di ni/ ru dra

ak+Shi Ni / ma hA nA si ni/ a se ni ya ma ni/ kI ni/ la k+Sh+mI ni/ bi dza ya ni/ shrI dzA na ye/ shrI dzA ya ka ra Ni/ shrI badzri Ni/ ka~M kA li ni/ kA la rA tri Ni/ pra kro d+ha mu khi ni/ ka la dzi hwA ni/ ga ra li ni/ badzra b+hai ra bA kA ra ni/ d+hu ru

si ni/ ya ni ma na a~M ka ri Ni/ mri ka ra sa tis+thA ni/ rat+na mA li ni/ sU tra a k+Shi Ni/ ku su li ni/ kha t+t+ra Ni/ badzra pra b+ha ni/ badzra kA la yi ni/ sa ma pany+tsa ni/ ka ma ni b+hi/ tsi trA li ga ni/ shu ki ni/ sarba d+hi ni/ sU tra ri Ni/ g+ha

las+sa ni/ pad+mA k+Shi Ni/ dza la dza la kha Di b+ha ba b+hu d+hi ni/ shrI g+ho ra Ni/ tsan+d+ra le kha ni/ tsan+Da mu khi ni/ ha~M sa waR+mi Ni/ wA gi me shwa ra Ni/ g+hi ta ru dra ye/ ka ra Ni swa ka b+hi ru sa ni mri d+ha ni d+hi/ g+hu ri Ni/ sha Sho ni/ su shi g+h+ra~M na/ ban+du b+ha

ra Ni/ shrI mu khi ni/ baR+ka la ni/ ka li ni/ ha ri Ni thA ye/ pad mi ni/ na gra pa ak+Shi Ni/ b+hI ma la tsaN gri Ni swA hA/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha sarba yo gi ni kA me shwa ri/ sarba duSh+Ta gardza gardza gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M phaT/ tshes brgyad dang ni nya ba dang / /

nyi shu dgu dang dgu stong dang / /zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod kyi/ /las ni the tshom med 'grub pa'o/ /dbyug gu dag pa'i pho nya dang / /chu tshod kyi ni ma mo dang / /'pho ba gnod sbyin brgya phrag gnyis/ /thun ni pho nya brgya dag go/ dus

sbyor bcu gnyis gnas pa'i yul/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi de yi phyed/ /rtsa rlung yi ge khams la rgyu/ /'ching grol tshar gcod rjes 'dzin pa'o/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las phyi dang nang gi dngos po pho nya
ma'i las bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /nag po chen po gtum po ni/ /zhal gdangs mche gtsigs ljags 'dril cing / /a la la yi sgra sgrogs pa/ /rab 'jigs

bzhengs pa'i stabs kyis ni/ /gsang ba mchod byed lha mo brgyad/ /kun nas gar gyis rol pa ste/ /'di yis phrin las dbang thob byed/ /oM badzra ka wu ba ma hA kA lA yai hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM grI d+h+ra sa gA yai hU~M hU~M phaT/

oM b+ha ga byA g+hA ye hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM b+ha na su ba rA yai hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM si ma lA yai hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM b+ha na shwA nA s+yai hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM kro Na d+ha ka rA s+yai hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM u lU kA s+yai hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM ga ru Da sa gA s+yai hU~M hU~M phaT/

'di ni dpal nag po chen po 'khor lha mo brgyad dang bcas pa'i sngags so/ /mtshan phyed dus na gtor ma 'bul/ /sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi lnga/ /myos byed stobs dang bcas pas mchod/ /gsang ba sgrub pa'i mchog tu bshad/ /bsnyen

pa sngon du song ba yis/ /dben par dug dang tsha ba dang / /sa la dgra bo'i gzugs bya ste/ /gro ga 'am ni ro ras la/ /rgya skyags dug dang khrag rnams kyis/ /bya rog mo yi rus pas ni/ /gzugs bris de yi snying gar ni/ /e yi

rnam pa'i 'khor lo la/ /mA ra ya yi mtha' can gyi/ /man ngag bzhin du bri bar bya/ /de nas rkang pa nas brtsams te/ /dril la dur khrod skra yis dkri/ /sngar gyi gzugs kyi snying ga ru/ /bcug ste tshigs dang lte ba sogs/ /

dug dang bcas pa'i tsher ma gzugs/ /de nas sngags pa 'dod lha yi/ /nga rgyal chen po rab ldan pas/ /snying ga'i hU~M las 'od 'phros pas/ /lha la bka' bsgo rnam shes ni/ /man ngag can gyis dgug par bya/ /oM badzra ma hA kA la

che ge mo A kar Sha dza dzaHhU~M ba~M hos dgug pa dang / /gzhug dang bcing dang myos par bya/ /de nas tsha ba dug gis brab/ /de bzhin bdun phrag nyi shu gsum/ /zla ba gcig tu las bsgrubs la/ /drag po'i thab tu tsher ma dang / /bra ma'i me la

bsro bar bya/ /des kyang 'dud par mi byed na/ /bstan pa bde la gnas pa'i phyir/ /snying rje chen po rab bskyed de/ /gri lcags las byas mtshon gyis gtub/ /khrag dang dug dang tsha ba dang / /tsher ma ling gar bcas te bsregs/ /thal

ba bla ma'i man ngag ltar/ /mnan dang chu bor dor bar bya/ /gzhan yang mi shis thod pa la/ /dug gi myu gus gzugs bris te/ /de yi lce la ud ma ni/ /ming spel bris la thod pa gnyis/ /kha sbyar skud pa nag pos dkri/ /nag

po'i gos kyis gtums nas ni/ /mi shis sa phyogs dag tu mnan/ /bsnyen dang sgrub pas mnyes gyur na/ /'chi dang smyo bar 'gyur bar ni/ /the tshom yod pa ma yin no/ /yi dgas sam ni dgra bo gang / /gro ga la ni gzugs bris la/ /

snying gar sngags 'dis bskor bar bya/ oM badzra ma hA kA la che ge mo mA ra ya hU~M hU~M phaT/ ces pa'i sngags bris gtor mar gzhug /de nas bsgrub sngags bzlas par bya/ /de yi rjes la gtor ma dbul/ /mgon po

nag po 'khor bcas la/ /sha khrag rkang sogs bstab byas nas/ /gtor mas bsad pas bsgral bya ste/ /dmigs par bya ba myur du brlag /gzhan yang gdug pa pha rol te/ /nus pa cung zad yod gyur na/ /rang shed rang la dbab pa'i

phyir/ /ngag mnan sbyor ba 'di ltar bya/ /gro ga 'am ni ro ras la/ /khrag dang dug dang bdug pa yis/ /gzugs ni lces khengs sngags bri ba/ /stam b+ha ming spel ldan pa bskor/ /phyin ci log tu dril la bcing / /zag pa'i rdzas sogs sa

la ni/ /tsha tsha byas pa'i nang bcug la/ /bstim zhing mnan la mdun byas la/ /rnal 'byor spro bsdu phyag rgya bcing / /thun gyis brabs la bzlas pa bya/ /las bcol zhag bdun thun bzhir bya/ /de la sngar bzhin byas nas ni/ /gnod pa'i sa phyogs

dag tu mnan/ /myur du 'grub par the tshom med/ /thod pa 'am ni snod gzhan du/ /sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba de/ /thun rdzas kyis brab ling gar bcas/ /yang na drag po klu la gtad/ /gru gsum dong bcug brdzi bar bya/ /kha bcad nas ni drag po

yi/ /nges par thob par the tshom med/ /de ltar las la sbyor dus su/ /nyes pa bsgo ba'i thabs shes nas/ /srung byed nyes pa 'di ltar bsgrag /bstan pa 'jig par byed pa yi/ /dgra bo srung byed lha khyod nyon/ /gdug pa'i sems ldan dgra 'di

yis/ /dkon mchog bla ma la smod cing / /rnal 'byor la sdang sems can 'tshe/ /sgrub pa po la brnyas gyur pas/ /dpag tshad stong du ltung ba yi/ /dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong gyur pas/ /bdag gis myur du bsgral nas ni/ /gzugs kyis lha rnams

mchod pa yin/ /khyed kyis srung bar ma byed par/ /sdig can 'di ni myur du spongs/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /bstan pa bsrung ba'i bsam pa dang / /snying rje chen po ldan pa yis/ /yengs pa med par byas gyur na/ /nges par 'grub par gdon mi za/ /brgya byin

dag gi srog kyang g.yo/ /sdig can dgra bgegs smos ci dgos/ /byang chub sems dang rab ldan na/ /ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub par gyur/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las lha mo'i 'khor lo dang las bsgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum

pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba'i cho ga nyams dga' ba/ /dpal ldan lcam dral thams cad kyi/ /sgrub pa rab tu nyams dga' ni/ /mgon po kun gyi gnas 'di ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag drug pa/ /dang po gri gug thod khrag

'dzin/ /spyan gsum mthing nag rngam pa yi/ /g.yas g.yon bar mas phreng ba dang / /Da ma ru ni 'dzin cing brdung / /tha ma gnyis kyis kha T+wA~M dang / /sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'chang bar mdzad/ /klu brgyad kyis brgyan khrag 'dzag zhal/ /sa bon rang

sngags phreng ba can/ /rgyas btab pas ni byin brlabs shing / /rdo rje sems dpa' dbu brgyan pa/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi shing la brtan/ /bi nA ya ka mnan par bsam/ /oM badzra ma hA kA la k+ShiM k+She tra big+hAn bi nA ya kA nAn hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ sha chen bsregs spos

phul nas ni/ /skyo bar gyur na gsang sngags bzlas/ /de la gtor ma dbul bar bya/ /khyad par byin brlabs gyur par bya/ /phrin las thogs pa med pa 'grub/ /oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya ma hA kA lA ya hU~M phaT/ sku'i mgon po'i sngags so/ /oM ma hA

kA la gu Na hr-i da hU~M phaT/ yon tan gyi mgon po'i sngags so/ /oM badzra ma hA kA la rak+Sha ru tri ba sha ni hU~M phaT/ gsung gi mgon po'i sngags so/ /oM badzra kr-iSh+Na tsaN+Da mA ra ya ma hA kA la tsi ta la hrIHdzaH/ las kyi mgon po'i sngags so/ /oM ma hA kA li ha na

badzra hU~M phaT/ yi ge bcu pa'i gsang ba'i mgon po'i sngags so/ /oM tsaN+De shwa ri ye swA hA/ gtum pa mo'i sngags so/ /oM tsaN+Di tsa kI ye swA hA/ drag mo'i sngags so/ /oM kA li ka ye swA hA/ zlog byed ma'i sngags so/ /oM ku li she Sha rI ye swA hA/

dpa' mo'i sngags so/ /oM shrI ma hA kA la ga Na mai tri dzaH beng 'dzin ma'i sngags so/ /oM re dan ti ma hA kA li tri shU la sarba sha trU~M dzaH/ rtse gsum 'dzin pa'i sngags so/ /oM badzra ma hA kA la kro tri gaN+Di sa ya hU~M phaT/ gaN+Di 'dzin pa'i sngags so/ /oM

badzra ma hA kA la te tsi tsau ta ka ra ma rA NA~M hU~M phaT rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'i sngags so/ /gsang ba beng 'dzin mgon po yis/ /lha ma yin gyi grong khyer ni/ /sum brtsegs la sogs khang bzangs rnams/ /khro bo tsan dan beng bsnams kyis/ /

lha dmag bye ba dung phyur rnams/ /phyung nas brlag par mdzad pa yi/ /grong khyer 'bum phrag brgyad bcu 'am/ /rlag byed bdud 'dul chen po ste/ /'di nyid g.yon gnas lha mo ni/ /kun du dgyes nas gar stabs gnas/ /oM shrI ma hA kA la du beng

ni dza a mu ka'i mgo bo la ru dra hU~M b+h+yo/ oM shrI ma hA kA la trag rak+Sha~M du beng ni dzaHmun nag shig b+h+yoH /mu shi b+h+yoH/ che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ oM badzra ma hA kA la rak+Sha tri ya k+Sha/ ru dra sa ma ya/ sarba sha tru~M ru ru tsa pa lA ya/ ma ra na rbad rbad/ nri rbad pu rbad pu/

tshal pa tshal pa/ ni sha ku ru sa ma ya/ che ge mo/ gtubs gtubs dza dza/ oM ru ru ma ma b+h+yo/ ma ma sha trU~M/ tsita la pA/ mA ra ya rbud rbud/ re sha~M g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ kA lo ya~M b+ha sha ni ma hA kA la/ yak+Sha sA sa na/ a pa ka ri di na me ke na me ru ru ma ma

b+h+yaH/ tsit+ta la hriM hriM rbad/ tri ri pri tri ka hi swA hA/ ti ka pa tra hU~M/ a tra ka ti swa mo sha mo sna/ tig pug shig /ku mi ta rbad shig rbud sod/ gaN Di 'dzin pa'i khro bo che/ /ma rungs klad pa 'gems par byed/ /tsa muN De ldan rol pa ste/ /gdug pa

'dul ba'i las la shis/ /kha T+wA~M rtse gsum 'dzin pas ni/ /dgra bgegs lus ngag yid la 'debs/ /gtum po thogs 'bebs mig sgyur ma/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa skyong ba'o/ /gang du keng rus rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs

skrag byed/ /'di nyid legs ldan rgyal po che/ /rdo rje bse gdong sna tshogs gdong / /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs 'di dag gis/ /gsang sngags rim pa bstan pa'o/ /thun mong khyad par bye brag gis/ /lus kyi mtshan nyid rtags bcas pa/ /
grub pa kun tu bgrod pa'o/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor ba'i mgon po dang yum dang bcas pa'i gsang sngags dang phrin las kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //

de nas bden pa tsam gyis ni/ /grub pa stsol bar mdzad pa po/ /dngos grub 'byung gnas rim pa ni/ /yang dag nyid du bshad par bya/ /bya rog g.yang bzhis brgyan pa yi/ /nag po phyag bzhi pa yi sku/ /gsang zhing dam tshig ldan

pas bri/ /de ni sku yi rten du bshad/ /gser dngul la sogs kyis bris pa'i/ /nag po chen po'i snying po dang / /nye ba'i snying po bris pa rnams/ /gsung gi rten du 'dod pa'o/ /bya rog sogs dang rta nag snying / /khyi yi snying dang mi yi snying / /

rin chen lnga dang bcas pa rnams/ /thugs kyi rten du gzung bar bya/ /snying gi rnam pa thams cad dang / /nya sha la sogs 'bru yi chan/ /sman gyi rnam pa thams cad dang / /bsnyen pa'i gtor ma bya ba yin/ /rdzas dang rta gtor steng dang
'og /steng nas dar nag gur gyis dbub/ /sha lnga sman lnga myos byed bcas/ /rgyun du thugs dam bskul phyir mchod/ /rta nag lug nag g.yag rog la/ /mgul du snying po bris la gdags/ /de yi ngo bo legs

phul la/ /phyi yi rten du bya bar bshad/ /nag po ras sam dar la yang / /rin chen lnga dang bcas pa yis/ /nag po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ /bris pa nyin gcig gis rdzogs nas/ /bar chad med par rab gnas bya/ /gsang

rten lus la bcang ba'o/ /sna tshogs 'bru nag dpal byas pa'i/ /gtor ma mi shas brgyan pa dag /pho brang rten dang brten par bcas/ /nang gi rten du slob pa'o/ /skyes pa grir shi'i thod phreng ni/ /yon tan ldan phyir rtag tu sba/ /

mi gsod mtshon las byas pa yis/ /rdo rje gri gug hU~M bris pa/ /phrin las byed pa'i khyad par ro/ /dam tshig gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /nyams dga' dben pa'i gnas nyid tu/ /lha mo'i rten yang 'di ltar ro/ /rigs med kyi ni

thod pa la/ /gsang sngags yi ge 'di dag ni/ /bris pa tsam gyis las 'grub byed/ /bsgrub pa mi dgos nus pa 'byung / /dur khrod sol bas sngags 'di bri/ /oM shrI de wi tsa muN+Da rak+ta tsa muN+Di/ seng ka mor d+ha ke sang ha

si ta/ mu khi ka ra ha ra/ kI la kI la/ phre k+Sha ti ta sa na sa ta bru~M bru~M la la ta ya/ ka bA la ma lA d+ha ra ni hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ /thod pa'i nang du 'khor bar bi/ /phyi yi rten du bshad pa yin/ /bong bu nag mo'i thod pa

la/ /rten pa lha mo'i sku bris pa/ /nang gi rten du bshad pa yin/ /nel gri'i snying ni ma nyams pa/ /mtshon gyi rtse la bkon la gzhag /gsang ba'i rten du gzugs par bya/ /bu mo'i thod pa ja ril dang / /gri gug

dar gyis gtums pa dang / /dri bzang mtshon gyis bdug par bya/ /de kho na nyid kyi rten du bshad/ /de nas nub phyogs dag nas ni/ /gsum gyis khur nas 'ongs pa'i rdo/ /mi nag gsum gyis 'di skad brjod/ /sku gsung thugs kyi

bdag nyid can/ /rdo rje mgon po 'khor bcas pa/ /rang bzhin gnas nas sku bzhengs la/ /'dir ni bstan srung bzhugs su gsol/ /lan gsum brjod nas bzhugs par bya/ /rol mo'i sgra dang spos dud dang / /sna tshogs

rol mos bsu nas kyang / /phrin las gang 'grub rim shes bya/ /'di ni rang bzhin rten yin no/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las phyi nang gsang ba dang sku gsung thugs kyi rten gzugs pa'i le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o// //

de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /dpal ldan nag po chen po yi/ /bkA yi tshogs kyis 'khor gyur pa/ /'di ni kun du shes par bya/ /las kyi mgon po rnams dang ni/ /lha mo chen mo 'khor dang bcas/ /lha srin sde brgyad ma lus pa/ /

pho nya mngag gzhug las byed pa'o/ /gzhan yang phyogs skyong bcu dang ni/ /klu chen brgyad dang lha chen brgyad/ /gza' chen brgyad dang rgyal chen bzhi/ /rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad de/ /gnod sbyin brgyad dang 'phrog ma'i bu/ /sha za dang ni ma mo dang / /

'jig rten pa dang dam tshig gnas/ /zhing skyong ma lus 'khor dang bcas/ /'di dag las kun byed pha yi/ /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcas pas/ /grub pa rab tu stsol mdzad pa/ /lha dang lha min mi 'am ci/ /lto 'phye grul

bum srul po dang / /lus srul grib gnon skem byed sogs/ /nam mkha' lding dang dri za dang / /'byung po ma lus 'dus pa kun/ /'di dag sgrub la grogs byed cing / /mthu stobs dpung dang nus pa yis/ /bsrung zhing bar

chad nges par sel/ /sgra gcan 'dzin pa'i rA hu la/ /'di la sogs pa thams cad la/ /tshogs kyi gtor mas cher mchod na/ /dpal dang rdzu 'phrul myur du ster/ /'di dag 'khor dang bcas pa yi/ /nye dang nye ba'i mtshan ma dang / /

rtags dang cho 'phrul du ma 'byung / /sku gsung thugs kyi rtags dang ni/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i rtags gyur pa/ /dngos dang nyams snang rmyi lam dang / /sprul pa'i phrin las nges 'byung ba/ /gtso bo nyid dang 'khor rnams kyi/ /

rim pa rjes su 'brel par 'byung / /rtags byung nas ni las la bskul/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gtso bo dang 'khor du bcas pa mchod par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// //

de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dpal ldan nag po chen po yi/ /thar pa'i grong khyer nyams dga' bar/ /dbang bskur cho ga bshad par bya/ /'dis ni bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs/ /de las rgyal bar byed pa yi/ /cho ga bzang po bla na

med/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po bzhengs par bya/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dag tu/ /rgyud shes yang dag bla ma la/ /snod ldan dag pa'i slob ma yis/ /gsol ba lan gsum gdab byas la/ /maN+Dal me tog sngon 'gro yin/ /

rdo rje 'dzin pa ma lus dang / /rgyal ba mgon po ma lus dang / /dbang phyug dam pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / /dbang bskur gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /lan gsum brjod nas gnang gyur pas/ /dang po bsnyen pa brtsam par bya/ /

mtshan ma nye ba'am tshul shes nas/ /de nas sngon 'gro brtsam par bya/ /dang po bgegs rnams nyer zhi yi/ /phrin las mchod pa gtor ma yi/ /ye shes lha rnams mchod pa dang / /lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ni/ /
sdig pa bral zhing bgegs dbyung ba'i/ /sngags dang bcas pa'i yungs kar gyis/ /me sbar bsreg dang bral bar bya/ /de rjes sa phyogs gtsang ma las/ /sa brtag pa dang sbyang bar bya/ /sa blangs

nas ni bka' thob pas/ /brko zhing ro lnga bsal bar bya/ /de nas bsrung zhing bcag par bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhengs nas ni/ /rdo rje gom pa'i gar stabs kyis/ /hU~M hU~M drag po'i sgra brjod pas/ /phyogs kun

bcing bar byas nas ni/ /bgegs la bka' bsgo gtor ma sbyin/ /slob ma kun la bsrung byas la/ /rdo rje mgon po chen po yi/ /ting nge 'dzin du gnas pa la/ /gsol ba gdab pas gnang ba sbyin/ /khyad par bdud rtsi

'khyil bas bsrung / /yang dag ye shes sems dpa' che/ /'khor ba'i g.yul las rgyal byed pa/ /rgyal ba ma lus bstan skyong che/ /de nas lhag par gnas pa brtsam/ /sa 'dzin lha mo nyid mchod pas/ /bka' byin nas ni

thim par blta/ /bum pa bkra shis yang dag ldan/ /ma nyams mtshan nyid ldan pa lnga/ /kha tshar ma nyams ras zung dkri/ /snying po sman dang 'bru lnga sogs/ /spos dang rin chen dag gis dgang / /rgyun 'bab chu yis gang ba dang / /'bras

ldan shing gis kha brgyan pa'o/ /de nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo yi/ /bka' yi khro bo rnam par bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor dri yi thig le la/ /me tog bcal bkram lha rnams ni/ /bskyed cing mchod la gnyis med bstim/ /so shing dor dang ltas

brtag pa/ /bsrung skud ku sha sbyin par bya/ /de nas sems bskyed sdom gnas pas/ /dam tshig gsang ba sbyin par bya/ /khyad par lha la gsol btab nas/ /rdul tshon dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /dang por ye shes thig gdab cing / /

phyi nang dam tshig nges par gdab/ /go rims ma nor nges pa'i tshul/ /srad bu shes rab can thig gdab/ /tshon ni byin gyis brlabs nas kyang / /spra brtag rdul tshon rim par dgye/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni

mdzes pa yi/ /zlum skor pho brang le tshe dgu/ /dbus ma e dbyibs drag po nyid/ /phyi rol pad ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /lha khyams bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog /'dod yon rin chen sked bad dang / /dra phye ba ku li yi phreng / /yang na kha

bad mdzes pa'i rgyan/ /chos 'khor ri dgas gdugs dang bcas/ /thod skam pad ma'i phreng bar ldan/ /dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs su 'khor/ /rdo rje me 'od 'bar bas 'khrigs/ /dam tshig ye shes gnyis med pa'i/ /gsang sngags

nye ba sngags par gnas/ /brtan zhing mchod la gsol ba gdab/ /nye bar brgyan cing yongs su bskor/ /de nas slob dpon bdag 'jug bya/ /sbyin sreg las ni rab tu shis/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las

gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang rnam bshad bya/ /yang na le tshe dgu ldan pa'i/ /pad ma 'dab brgyad phyi rol du/ /mu khyud 'khor lo rim gsum la/ /

a dbyibs zhing skyong rim pa dgod/ /lha dang sa bon phyag mtshan ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyas mtshan/ /slob ma khrus byas rgyan btags te/ /maN+Dal me tog phyag bya zhing / /ras kyis mig ni bkab nas su/ /dang por

me tog dor bar bya/ /mtshan ma mthong bas legs par drang / /sgo bzhi nas ni nang 'jug cing / /gu gul bdug cing ting 'dzin gyis/ /nag po chen po'i lha tshogs kyang / /nges par spyan drangs bstim par bya/ /de las nges par

rtags rnams byung / /yang na so so'i mgon por bskyed/ /ye shes sems dpa' byin gyis brlab/ /bla ma dkyil 'khor gtso bcas las/ /'od 'phros rang byin brlabs par gyur/ /mthong ba dri dang bdud rtsis gtor/ /
gdong g.yogs bkrol zhing lha ngo bstan/ /de nas dbang po'i bye brag gis/ /nges par rim pas dbang bskur te/ /bstan pa 'dzin cing bstan pa skyong / /bsten pa srung bar byed pa yi/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa

'phel mdzad pa/ /sku yi mgon po 'khor bcas kyis/ /bla med dngos grub sbyin pa'i phyir/ /yang dag ye shes dbang bskur ro/ /sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang / /phrin las lha yi khyad par ro/ /me long ye shes
