dbang nyid can/ /rdo rje rigs kyi mgon po yis/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i nang du ni/ /zhe sdang dag pas dbang bskur ro/ /mnyam nyid so sor rtog pa dang / /bya ba nan tan chos kyi dbyings/ /ye shes lnga yi rigs kyi gtsang / /

nges par dbang bskur bstan par bya/ /phrin las bzhi yi dbang yang bskur/ /lha mo brgyad kyis las rnams 'grub/ /bum pa spyi bor byin pa dang / /thod pa'i bdud rtsi blugs pa yis/ /gsang ba bde chen ye shes nyid/ /

rang byung dri med dbang bskur ba'o/ /rdo rjes b+ha liM gtad pa yis/ /nus pa thogs med sbyin byed yin/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba mchog /lha dang sngags kyi zab pa'i chos/ /ting 'dzin chen po'i phyag rgya che/ /

'di ny-id dngos grub kun gyi gter/ /zab cing rgya che'i don sgrub pa/ /skal ba can la sbyin par 'os/ /he ru ka dang nag po che/ /bla ma tha dad med pa la/ /tshogs kyi 'khor los legs mchod cing / /zhabs la gtugs la

smon lam gdab/ /'di ni thob par the tshom med/ /phrin las kun du grub ster byed/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa'o// //

de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dpal ldan mgon po de nyid kyi/ /phyogs bzhi yongs su skyong ba yi/ /rgyal po chen po rnam pa bzhi/ /shar phyogs nas ni yul 'khor srung / /lho phyogs nas ni 'phags skyes po/ /nub

phyogs nas ni spyan mi bzang / /byang phyogs nas ni rnam thos sras/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa srung byed pa/ /'di nyid grub pa ster byed pa'o/ /rab tu dben zhing gtsang ba dang / /bkra shis nyams dga' sa phyogs su/ /

rnam thos sras ni bsgrub par bya/ /sa gzhi pa yi lci bas byuka /dri bzang tsan dan dkar dmar dang / /a ga ru dang du ru ka /kha che g+hi hang sna tshogs sman/ /bsreg cing tshogs pa'i sman du bya/ /maN+Dal gru bzhi mda' gang ba/ /dkyil 'khor

sgo bzhi rta babs dang / /rin chen khang pa yid 'ong ba/ /pho brang rin chen las grub pa/ /sna tshogs pad ma rin chen gling / /gter dang dpag bsam ljon shing bcas/ /ka ba stong phrag du ma yis/ /rab tu rgyas shing yongs su bskor/ /

lte ba rin chen mu khyud la/ /lha mo brgyad kyis yongs su bskor/ /bar ma lha khyams mdzes pa la/ /gnod sbyin chen po brgyad kyis bskor/ /phyi ma ra bas bskor ba la/ /klu chen brgyad kyis yongs su bskor/ /sgo bzhir gnod sbyin bzhi

bkod pa/ /dbus su rin chen seng ge'i khri/ /sna tshogs pad ma ge sar bcas/ /de dbus zla ba dar gyi gdan/ /de la sku gsung thugs kyi gnas/ /sa bon phyag mtshan sku dgod bya/ /sna tshogs mchod pas yongs bskor te/ /'bras dang gro dang 'bru

sna la/ /gtor ma shin du bzang bar bsham/ /khyad par me tog sna tshogs ni/ /na ga ge sar ku mu da/ /pun ta ke ba ba ku li/ /ba shi ka dang tsam pa ka /d+ha nu ka ri ma la ki/ /su ti ka dang uta pa la/ /pad ma man d+ha ra ba dang / /de dod pa la

sogs pa'o/ /sna tshogs chu dang bsreg spos tshogs/ /gu gul khyad par bsregs par bya/ /ka ra bu ram sbrang rtsi dang / /khur ba 'bras chan zhun mar dang / /zhal zas bye brag thams cad dang / /snang gsal mar me byug pa dang / /sgra

snyan sna tshogs mchod pa'i rdzas/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / /'phan dang bla re la sogs pa/ /sna tshogs dar gyi lda ldi dang / /de ltar bkod pa legs brgyan nas/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas kyang / /rang lhar bskyed pa'i sa bon

las/ /'od 'phros mdun gyi dkyil 'khor la/ /rab tu 'phros pas 'od du 'bar/ /de las dbus su rgyal chen ni/ /sku mdog gur gum mdog 'dra ba/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /seng ge'i khri la legs bzhugs pa'i/ /

phyag g.yas yid bzhin nor bu ste/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyal mtshan can/ /g.yon pa ne'u le'i snod can las/ /kha nas rin chen skyug par bsam/ /gnod gnas dbang po gang ba bzang / /nor bu bzang dang rta yi bdag /yang dag shes dang

'brog gnas dang / /lnga rtsen pi tsi kuN+Da li/ /sna tshogs rkyen dang phyag mtshan bcas/ /re re'ang du mas yongs bskor nas/ /shin du gsal zhing brtan par bsam/ /de nas sa bon las 'phros te/ /rang bzhin gnas

nas spyan drangs la/ /mchod cing bstod de gnyis med bstim/ /khyad par gsol ba gdab par bya/ /rgyal ba mgon po 'khor bcas pa'i/ /yid 'ong khang bzangs pho brang 'di/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i char 'bebs pa'i/ /rin chen gter

gyi dngos grub gsol/ /oM be swA hA/ oM bai shra ba NA ya swA hA/ oM dzam+b+ha lA ya swA hA/ oM pUr+N+Na b+ha drA ya swA hA/ b+ha ya hA/ oM ku be rA ya swA hA/ oM sa~M pra dza nA ya swA hA/ oM gu h+ya s+tha nA ya swA hA/ oM pAny+tsi kA ya swA hA/ oM pi tsi kuN+Da lA ya swA hA/

dang po lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste/ /gnyis pa rin chen 'bar ba nyid/ /gsum pa kun nas bstod par bya/ /de nas gtor ma dbul bar bya/ /gsol ba btab nas phrin las bcol/ /de nas ye shes gshegs su gsol/ /der gnas pa

ni bzhugs par bya/ /phyi rten nang rten khyad par ba/ /rim pa 'khor lo sngags dang bcas/ /mis mi mthong bar sbas te bcang / /khyad par rtags ni gsal bar 'byung / /nye ba'i mtshan ma nges mthong nas/ /dngos grub blang zhing

gtor ma dbul/ /sbyin sreg las kyis myur du 'grub/ /gsang sngags 'bum phrag bcu yis ni/ /'bras bu yid la 'dod kun 'grub/ /kha skong me yi mchod pa bya/ /gtor ma chen po dang bcas pa/ /lan bdun nye bar bsnyen pas 'grub/ /

'di ni lha rnams kun gyi gter/ /sgrub pa po la stsol bar mdzad/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las khyad par du 'phags pa rnam thos sras gnod sbyin chen po brgyad dang bcas pa bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// //

de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /'phags pa chen po de nyid la/ /klu chen brgyad kyis yongs bskor ba/ /rim pa 'di ni bstan par bya/ /khyad par sa bcu'i dbang phyug che/ /dpal ldan thugs rje'i bdag po nyid/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa nyid/ /

spyan gsum cung zad khro ba'i tshul/ /sku mdog dmar dang ljang khu'i mdog /rin chen 'bar ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /sku la dar ber sum rim la/ /sna tshogs cod pan rgyan gyis spras/ /phyag rgya rin chen 'bar ba bsnams/ /lha yi ba dan

mdzes pa 'phyar/ /g.yon pa mchod rten sku gdung bsnams/ /ne'u le'i rkyal ba nor skyug 'chang / /'khor du khyad par klu chen brgyad/ /sku lus mi yi rnam pa la/ /sbrul mgo bdun pa'i gdengs ka can/ /phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba nas/ /yid bzhin

nor bu legs bsnams pa/ /sems dpa'i 'dug stangs phyed dkyil can/ /thams cad gtso la 'dud par byed/ /nor rgyas pad ma nyid dang ni/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang 'jog po nyid/ /pad ma che dang hu lu che/ /dung skyong rigs ldan brgyad po nyid/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i nang dag

gi/ /pad ma la ni gnas bcas te/ /de ltar bskyed la ye shes pa/ /spyan drangs mchod la gnyis med bstim/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis rnal 'byor la/ /yid 'ong dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur/ /oM shrI badzra yak+Sha bai shra ba NA ya hU~M phaT/ oM ba ru NA ya swA hA/ oM an nA

ya swA hA/ oM tak+Sha kA ya swA hA/ oM sha~M khA pA lA ya swA hA/ oM kar ko TA ya swA hA/ oM pad mA ya swA hA/ oM ma hA pad mA ya swA hA/ oM ku li kA ya swA hA/ der ni gsang sngags bzlas pa yis/ /sngags kyi 'od zer spro bsdu bya/ /de nas klu rnams thams cad la/ /yid 'ong

gtor ma dbul bar bya/ /nA ga ge sar pus pa dang / /rgya mtsho lbu ba a ru ra/ /dzA ti ba la gur gum dang / /tsan dan dkar dmar pu shel tse/ /dbang po lag dang snying zho sha /chu srin sder mo leb rgan dang / /'gron bu dung dang mu tig dang / /nya phyis

bla gor zho sha dang / /mkhal ma zho sha rma bya'i mdongs/ /rta ru rgun 'brum mdar gsum dang / /gser gyi bye ma ras skud dang / /'o ma dang ni 'bru sna lnga/ /rin chen sna tshogs ma lus pa/ /khyad par du ni dbul bar bya/ /de nas mchod

cing bstod bya ste/ /dngos grub gang 'dod stsal bar bsam/ /de na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya/ /gsang sngags khri phrag bcu bzlas nas/ /rtags byung nas ni dngos grub blang / /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las

rgyal po rnam thos sras la klu chen po brgyad kyis bskor ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /drang srong sras mchog de nyid la/ /lha mo brgyad kyis yongs bskor ba'i/ /thabs nyid rnal 'byor pas shes

bya/ /rin chen bdun pa'i khang bzangs su/ /nor bu sna tshogs gdan bzhugs pa'i/ /'phags pa sku mdog bai DUr+ya/ /zhal gcig phyag drug spyan gsum pa/ /rin chen sna tshogs du mas spras/ /gdug pa klu yis nyer

brgyan cing / /g.yas kyi dang po rgyal mtshan 'dzin/ /g.yon gyi dang po rin chen snod/ /bar ma gnyis ni rdo rje dang / /pad ma 'bar ba bsnams pa dang / /tha mas zhags pa tho ba 'phyar/ /stag gi lpags pa'i sham

thabs can/ /dar gyi cod pan dag gis mdzes/ /skad cig gis ni bsam par bya/ /oM badzra bi ru ka /ku be ra At+ma ka /ma hA yak+Sha rA dza rat+na sid+d+hi hU~M swA hA/ gsang sngags 'di ni brjod pa yis/ /gnod sbyin mo rnams

mdun du 'gugs/ /oM tsan+d+ra kAn t+ye+e swA hA/ oM su b+ha drA yai swA hA/ oM da tA yai swA hA/ oM gu h+yA yai swA hA/ oM su dat+tA yai swA hA/ oM de byai swA hA/ oM Ar+yA yai swA hA/ oM sa ra swa t+yai swA hA/ zla 'od can ma rab bzang mo/ /
sbyin byed ma dang gsang ba ma/ /rab sbyin ma dang dpal lha mo/ /'phags ma dang ni dbyangs ldan te/ /thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /kun tu rgyal ba 'od 'phro ma/ /gdu bu dpung rgyan mgul
rgyan dang / /zhabs gdub do shal legs brgyan cing / /dar dang nor bus rnam par mdzes/ /dkar dang ser dang dUr ba'i 'od/ /gser 'od pad ma rA ga dang / /ut+pal pad ma rA ga dang / /ut+pal puN+Da rI

ka dang / /pa la sha yi mdog mtshungs pa/ /'od kyi phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i nang / /rin chen sgrom bu gter gyi snod/ /rin chen gzhong pa dung chos dang / /be tsu ra dang nor bu me/ /dpal be pan tsa li ka ste/ /g.yon pa

kun du pad ma bsnams/ /sgeg cing 'gying dang ldan par bsam/ /gtso bos lha mo brgyad po bskul/ /lha mo brgyad po thams cad kyis/ /rin chen char pa phab nas ni/ /bka' bzhin bgyid pa rnam par bsam/ /mgon po myur du bskul

ba'i tshe/ /gtso bos mi 'jigs seng ge chibs/ /thun mong gi ni las byed pa'o/ /stobs ldan glang chen rab brtan chibs/ /khyad par sgrub pa'i las rnams byed/ /g.yu 'brug sngon po chibs nas ni/ /snang srid ma lus dbang du sdud/ /

dbang du byed pa'i las rnams dang / /khyad par sbyin sreg drag po ni/ /bshad dang rngam pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /myur du las la 'gro ba yin/ /phyi nas gsang ba'i rim shes pa'i/ /stong phrag bcu yis 'grub pa ste/ /'di ni rin chen ga'u'i nang / /rin

chen 'bar ba'i 'khor lo la/ /gsang sngags yi ge'i phreng ba can/ /sa bon spro bsdus ting 'dzin bsgom/ /na mo bai shra ba Na badzra mu sa la/ mu su na sti/ tri shU la a~M ku sha /pA sha pa ra shu/ ban d+ha mud ga ra lA lang kr-i ta/ hasta s+ya/ na mo na maH

sarba de wa ta su tsi ta/ kri ta Ta s+ya/ ma hA kI la kI lA ya/ sarba gra hA/ a ka ri Sha Ni ya bi dza ya/ dza ya~M dU/ b+ha ga bAn/ na da ku be rA/ k+Shi ti sa ti tsakra ti ni/ ka la ka la/ na da ku be ra ki ri ki li/ nA da ku be ra/ k+Shi ti pa ti/ tsakra ti ni/ bi dzi ma hA

b+ha ga ba ni/ nA da ku be ra/ bi kra ta/ drang srong ka ra la/ ban d+ha na/ re'u tra/ d+hi h+ya sa/ gu h+ya/ ka na ga na ba ri bri d+ha/ bai shra ba Na/ b+ha ne b+ha ne/ b+hi ba na ba si ti/ ku ti ku ti/ ku be ra/ na da ku be ra/ na maHstu te swA hA/ 'di ni khyad par sgrub pa ste/ /

gsang sngags gnod sbyin stong sde'i tshogs/ /ma lus 'di yis skul bar byed/ /gar mkhan mchog ces bya ba yi/ /lha ni du mas yongs bskor ba'i/ /'di ni bskyed cing spyan drang ba/ /spyan drangs mchod cing bstod pa dang / /gang sgrub las la

bskul bar bya/ /'di yis rnal 'byor dgos pa sgrub/ /zhi bas nad gdon ma lus la/ /dbang gis khams gsum ma lus bsgyur/ /rgyas pas nor dang 'bru sogs 'phel/ /mngon spyod kyis ni gdug pa 'dul/ /nor bu bzang pos gter la

spyod/ /yang dag shes kyis dus gsum mthong / /gang ba bzang pos longs spyod 'phel/ /gtsug na 'khyil pas tshe dpal ster/ /'brog gnas rgyal bas dud 'gro spel/ /gnod sbyin lnga po 'di dag gis/ /sa gsum g.yo

bar byed pa ste/ /'di dag sgrub pos mchod gyur na/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i dpal rnams ster/ /rang nyid lhag pa'i lha yis ni/ /sa bon las 'phros lcags kyus ni/ /'di dag srog gi dbang po la/ /dbang byed las byed mi zlog 'gyur/ /

gnod sbyin rnams la shing thog dang / /klu rnams gtor mas kun du mchod/ /lha mo a ru ra yi 'bru/ /ma lus myur du mchod pa'o/ /gang po dang ni mdzes ma dag /khyad par mngag gzhug gyur pa'o/ /dpal mgon po chen po

dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras 'khor dang bcas pa bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ /'khor ba'i srid pa ji

srid par/ /byang chub sems kyi chos rnams ston/ /ri bo'i rtse dang nags tshal brag /rgya mtsho'i 'gram dang shing gcig sa/ /gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod de/ /gnas 'di dag tu bsam gtan bsgom/ /las kyi mgon po
'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /gru gsum pho brang la gnas pa/ /dur khrod gzhal yas 'bar ba ni/ /me dpung 'bar ba 'phro ba'i dbus/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa/ /sku mdog nag cing mche ba rno/ /yan lag thung

zhing gsus pa 'phyang / /thod pa skam po'i dbu rgyan byas/ /spyan gsum sdang mig khro tshul ston/ /bzhin bsgyur mi sdug lus can ni/ /phyag g.yas rdo rje gri gug 'phyar/ /g.yon pa dam nyams snying khrag gis/ /thod pa

bkang nas gsol bar mdzad/ /dug sbrul gdug pas lhu tshigs brgyan/ /dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes/ /mi thod rlon pa'i do shal byas/ /ro yi gdan la brdzis nas kyang / /drag po'i nga ro sgrogs pa'i gnas/ /sku

gsung thugs kyi mgon po n-i/ /gsod byed rngam byed sgrol byed che/ /bsgrub bya nges par sgrol ba'i tshe/ /sku yi mgon pos dam nyams kyi/ /lte ba'i srog rtsa gcod par byed/ /gsung gi mgon pos dam nyams kyi/ /mgrin pa nas ni khrag

rnams 'dren/ /rdo rje thugs kyi mgon po yis/ /snying gi dkar nag mtshams su yang / /bya rog mchu ni btsugs nas kyang / /srog rtsa myur du gcod par byed/ /pho nya sha za'i gdong can gyis/ /spyi gtsug nas ni rtsa la 'jib/ /

las byed ma mo tsaN Di kas/ /gsang ba'i mdoms sor dngas ma rngub/ /rtsa 'jib ma dang khrag 'thung ma/ /srog 'phrog mas ni las la sbyor/ /nyin mtshan dus las 'da' mi byed/ /'di dag gsang sngags ma yengs bzlas/ /

dus gsum dag tu ting 'dzin 'bad/ /rtsa ba'i sngags ni srog yin te/ /gsung gi dngos grub snying po yin/ /nye ba'i snying pos thugs bskul ba'o/ /ye shes sa bon mi shigs pa/ /dngas ma'i gnas par de bshad do/ /
sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las/ /rim par bzlas pas bsam gtan 'grub/ /rtags rnams nye bar ma byung na/ /'bad pas bsten cing mchod par bya/ /gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /oM ma hA kA la

gu na hri da hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA kA la trag shad dzaH ma hA kA la si ti ya ma du dzaH A li kA li mnyam ldan pa'i/ /rtsa brgyad phreng ba rab tu bsgrags/ /rim par byin brlabs ldan bya'i phyir/ /bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad du bya/ /

bgrang phreng nus par ldan pa yis/ /las ni myur bar shis pa yin/ /shel gyis zhi ba chen po 'grub/ /mu tig gis ni rgyas pa la/ /dred po'i so yis gsad pa 'grub/ /de gnyis 'gyur ba bong bu'i so/ /sdang dang skrad pa rnga mo'i so/ /

ka sogs rnam dag yum bcu drug /byis pa 'tsho byed dbang sogs la/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed rnams bsres pas/ /bzhi yis lhag pa'i pad 'bras shing / /lung tang dmar po bdun gcig drug /yang na tsan dan 'bru

dgu 'am/ /rgyu skar phyed pos grangs mnyam pas/ /lung tang nag pos rmongs byed nus/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed phyed sbyangs pas/ /ru rA k+Sha ni mngon spyod la/ /de lta'i cho ga shes pa yis/ /tshar gcad phan gdags

las rnams spyad/ /gsang sngags yi ge'i 'khor lo ni/ /mgal me bzhin du bskor bar bya/ /de ltar dus bzhir bsgrub par bya/ /des ni nye bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /des kyang grub par ma gyur na/ /rang nyid ye shes nag

po yi/ /gdug pa 'dul bar bsams nas ni/ /las byed mgon po'i srog rtsa 'phrog /de ltar bskul bas las la sbyor/ /gzas pa po de sgrol bar byed/ /gal te las la 'gyangs pa na/ /srog gi thigs pa blang ba dang / /

gsang sngags snying po go bzlog cing / /lte ba dkrugs pa'i las byas na/ /shi sa bstan par 'gyur ba ste/ /srog ni dmar len byed par 'gyur/ /ma rungs 'dul ba'i las 'di dag /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba las/ /

gzhan du byas na nyes par 'gyur/ /sbyin sreg dang ni mnan pa dang / /de bzhin zor dgye las bya ba/ /gsad pa rang gshed gnad la dbab/ /de las myur bar rtags byung tshe/ /thugs dam bskang zhing gtor ma 'bul/ /tshogs kyi

'khor lo'i mchod pa dang / /de dag rnal mar 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las las nye bar bsgrub par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /

dpal ldan lha mo 'khor dang bcas/ /nag mo mngon par 'byung ba yi/ /las kyi dngos grub cho ga bshad/ /dam tshig gsang ba'i sngags pa yis/ /brag nag rtse mo rno ba yis/ /kha lhor bltas pa'i brag phug gam/ /
gzhan yang ri bo'i zom 'am rtse/ /shing gcig dur khrod ma mo'i gnas/ /rab tu 'jigs pa'i gnas mchog tu/ /maN+Dal dang ni mchod pa dang / /gtor ma legs par bshams nas ni/ /sha chen bsregs spos

phul nas kyang / /bar chad bgegs rnams bskrad par bya/ /gru gsum khrag dang dug gis byug /dug shing tsher ma can gyis brtsig /gzhan yang ling ga byas pa la/ /mi bsad lcags kyu tri shU la/ /de yi lus la gdab
par bya/ /tshil chen mar me zur gsum pa/ /btang nas bdag nyid lhar bskyed la/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum legs gnas pa/ /ma hA kA la phyag bzhi pa/ /mdog nag khrag 'dzag me dpung dbus/ /zhal gcig spyan

gsum 'bar ba ste/ /g.yas kyi dang po chu gri dang / /'og ma tri shUl rtse gsum pa/ /g.yon gyi dang pos mda' gzhu dang / /gnyis pas mgo bo khrag 'dzag bsnams/ /dur khrod kyis brgyan sham thabs can/ /de yi
g.yas dang g.yon gnyis su/ /sha za gnyis ni gnas par bsam/ /las kun byed pa'i pho nyar bskul/ /dang po lha mo chen mo ni/ /e dbus gsang sngags las grub pa'i/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /spyan

gsum shin tu sku mdog gnag /shin du rngam zhing sgeg pa'i sku/ /g.yas kyi dang po ral gri 'chang / /'og ma shag ti 'bar ba can/ /g.yon gyi dang po thod khrag 'dzin/ /'og ma kha T+wA~M bsnams pa'o/ /ral pa kham nag gyen

du brdzes/ /mche gtsigs thod pa dug sbrul brgyan/ /glang po'i stod g.yogs stag sham dang / /re lde nag po'i sham thabs gsol/ /bong bu gwa dmar steng nas ni/ /phyed dkrung 'bar bas bzhugs pa'o/ /yang na

zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /ral gri ne'u le'i rkyal pa 'dzin/ /dam tshig bskyed la ye shes dgug /phrin las bcol bar bya ba'o/ /oM shrI ya de bI kA li kA li ma hA kA li b+h+yo hU~M/ oM ru ru ro ru be+e tiSh+Ta ba so tsa pa la a shug me

b+h+yo dza: /ma hA kA li de wI ka rA la bi kr-i ta ka rA la kri Ni/ tsaN+Da rU pi Ni hU~M hU~M phaT/ rag mo tsa ti kha rag ma hU~M b+h+ya: oM ma hA kA li de wI gr-ih+na ba li~M ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ s+phoT ya s+phoT ya/

khA hi hU~M phaT/ bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang / /skyes pa grir shi'i snying khrag gis/ /nag po chen po'i gtor mar blugs/ /ma nyams grir shi'i ba~M blangs la/ /ma hA ru dra bstims nas ni/ /mgo bo lho nub mtshams su bstan/ /

rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan/ /gan rkyal bzhag la bsgral bar bya/ /de yi sha dang khrag dang ni/ /lpags pa tshil bu rkang mar bcas/ /glad pa klad rgyas zhag dang ni/ /dbang po lnga dang don snying lnga/ /rus pa'i bye brag thams

cad kyis/ /ye shes nag po chen po dang / /dpal ldan nag mo re ma ti/ /las kyi mgon po 'khor dang bcas/ /pho nya bran g.yog dur khrod gnas/ /DA ki'i tshogs kyi thugs dam bkang / /de yi sha yi tshogs rnams kyis/ /nag po stong

gi thugs dam bskang / /de yi khrag dang chu ser gyis/ /ma mo bye ba'i thugs dam bskang / /de yi chu rgyus rus pa rkang / /sha za 'bum gyi thugs dam bkang / /mkha' 'gro lnga dang lha mo brgyad/ /de yi phrin las mgon po dang / /sha za 'khor

dang bcas la dbul/ /phung po bsgral ba'i tshogs kyis mchod/ /rnam shes bsgral ba'i ye shes bsgyur/ /mi bskyod pa yi zhing khams su/ /rgyal ba'i sras bu bskyed pa yin/ /rnal 'byor 'chi ba slu ba dang / /bar chad thams cad bzlog

par byed/ /ma rungs bsten la sdang zhing 'tshe/ /sgrub la gnod na las 'di bya/ /gzhan du byas na brlag par 'gyur/ /de yi sha la sbyin sreg bya/ /tshil ni zhun chen mar me bya/ /glad rgyas thod pa'i rnga lpags bya/ /lpags pa tshogs

kyi gdan du bya/ /bsregs pa'i rus pa tsha tsha bya/ /'dis ni mgon po 'khor bcas tshogs/ /mnyes par 'gyur zhing thugs dam bkang / /gzhan yang phran tshegs las kyi gsang ba rab tu bshad par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor ba'i lha'i

phrin las kyi rnal 'byor dang rab tu ldan pas zhi ba'i las sgrub pa la ni bil ba la sogs pa la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya'o/ /'bras ldan gyi shing gang las rgyas pa'i las sgrub na stong phrag gis bya'o/ /khI Di ra'i shing dang dmar ba'i shing

gis ni dbang gi las sgrub na khri phrag gis bya'o/ /shin tu rtsub pa'i tsher ma dang ldan pa'i shing dag gis ni mngon spyod la 'bum phrag gis bya bar shis so/ /bskrad pa la ni shing gi lo ma rlung mar byung ba'i tshe sa la ma lhung bar blangs te gzugs

brnyen bris nas yul gzhan gyi hor khra la btags te gtang bar bya'o/ /gal te bzlog par 'dod na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi thal bas gtor zhing ba ser skya'i 'o mas lus bkrus na zhi bar byed do/ /rus phye sna tshogs pa la khrag byugs te

gzugs brnyan bris la dgra bo de'i phyogs su gtor bas ni sha za chen pos 'dzin par byed do/ /yang na lce spyang gi sha la sbyin sreg byas te dur khrod du thal ba phyar nas lhag ma gzas pa po'i sgo la gtor nas btang na dur khrod kyi lce spyang

gi tshogs rab tu 'du zhing ngu la sgo la sder mos 'brad par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bu lan gsum byas na lce spyang gis za bar 'gyur ro/ /gang du thog gis shi ba'i rus pa la rab tu bsngags te ri bong gi thod par bcug ste shing rkang gcig

pa'i rtse mo la btags na thog 'bab pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na de nyid kyi gzugs byas te de nyid dang rigs 'thun pa'i rus pa rnyed na yungs kar gyis brdeg cing pha mes kyi dur khrod du grib so lhags pa dang sbas te gtor mas mnan cing dong

brus par sbas la ro bsregs pa'i g.yam pas mnan na rigs 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /grog mkhar gyis la gzugs byas la/ /de la dug dang til mar gyis byugs la 'bras phub kyi me la rab tu bsro zhing sngags brdegs na rims tsha ba

chen pos btab par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan pa la ni spra tshil gyis byugs shing tsher ma'i rigs mang po btab par byas nas dus ma yin pa'i rlung la phyar na yul gzhan du gshis ngan du 'chi bar byed do/ /mtsho nang gi nya se ba bzung ste gro ga la ling

ga bris pa de bag zan gyi gzugs dang bcas pa la rab tu bsngags te slar btang na chu grir myur du 'chi bar byed do/ /bse shing la ling ga bsregs te sgo khang du sbas na skrangs pa chen pos btab par 'gyur ro/ /gal te grog mkhar

gyi sa la gzugs byas te mchod rten rnying pa'i 'og tu 'byung po'i nyi ma la mnan nas ro g.yam gyis kha bcad na ni 'khor dang bcas pa nus pa med cing rab tu gnon par 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyi zag pa gang yin pa dang phung shul nas sa

blangs te gzugs brnyan byas la gnas kyi sar rus pa'i phur bus btab na ni 'on pa dang long ba dang yan lag nyams pa dang lkugs par 'gyur te/ klu gnas pa'i sar sbas na dbang po nyams pa nyid byed do/ /gal te sa phyogs der char mi 'bab par

gyur na ka ra bI ra'i shing btsugs la ba dmar ser gyi 'o ma gtor bar byas pas klu gnas pa'i sar song nas rang ting nge 'dzin du gnas pas bka' bsgo na char chen po 'bab par byed do/ /bal po se'u yi shing dang 'brug shing du bcas pa g.yab cing klu gzir na

char 'bab cing sprin sad par byed do/ /gal te sprin dral bar 'dod na rlung lha'i gtor ma byas la rlung gi ba dan g.yab par bya'o/ /khrag sna tshogs pa yungs kar yungs nag tu sbyar te klu gnas pa'i sar sbyin sreg tu byas nas bzlas pa'i thun bar du gtor na ser ba

mod la 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar yungs nag thal chen la rab tu bsngags nas gtor na ser ba mod la gcod par byed do/ /d+ha du ra'i shing la sbyin sreg byas na smyo bar 'gyur ro/ /nim pa'i shing gis ni rengs par byed do/ /me tog ban d+hu ri ka dang p+lak+Sha yis

dgug par 'gyur ro/ /tsan dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg byas na gang la yang gso bar byed do/ /a ru ra'i sbyin sreg gis myur du zhi bar byed do/ /ma he'i 'o mas bkrus na bcings pa thams cad grol lo/ /a ka ru'i shing dang 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i shing dang

gcig tu bsregs te mtshor dor na rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /glang po che'i rus pa la gi hang dang bcas pa'i glang sna can gyi me tog dang ser ba'i rigs kyi me tog dang bcas pa kun dga' ra bar sbyin sreg byas na 'byor ba phun sum tshogs par byed do/ /

de dag thams cad sngags dang bcas pa'i nus pa 'grub bo/ /drang srong gi rus pa ri bo'i rtser sbas te 'bru snas mchod pa byas te chu bo rgyun du 'bab pa mthong ba'i sar spyod yul du 'gyur na rigs thams cad rab tu 'phel bar byed do/ /a bra'i

'bras bu dang shing thog dzi tsin ta ka dang dza lu dang dzi ba ka rnams la snod du bkang ste gtor ma byas nas sku gzugs kyi mdun du phul na ni gnod sbyin gyis 'byor pa thams cad spel bar 'gyur ro/ /phur bus gdab cing yungs kar thal chen gyis mtshams

bcad par gyur na gnod pa thams cad las bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las sna tshogs pa'i las kyi rab tu byed pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /shin du gsang ba

bla na med/ /nag po mngon par 'byung ba yi/ /las kyi dngos grub cho ga bshad/ /dpal nag po chen po'i phyogs kyi phrin las kyi lha mo la/ shar gyi lha mo 'phrog mas 'gugs pa'i las byed do/ /lho'i lha mo glang sna mas 'ching ba'i las byed do/ /nub kyi

lha mo ral pa can gyis sdom pa'i las byed do/ /byang gi lha mo sa'i gtsug gis myos shing dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/ /lha mo bya rgod mgo bo can mas rengs pa'i las byed do/ /stag gi mgo bo can mas bskrad pa'i las byed do/ /phag rgod kyi mgo bo can

mas smyor 'jug pa'i las byed do/ /lce spyang gi gdong gis dbye ba'i las byed do/ /khyi gdong mas ni rnam par rmongs pa'i las byed do/ /khwa'i gdong gis rnam par gnon pa'i las byed do/ /'ug pa'i gdong gis ni khrag drang ba'i las

byed do/ /khyung gi gdong gis ni brgyal ba'i las byed do/ /gzhan yang grong khyer dkrug pa'i las bya bar 'dod na gro ga'am shing shun la dbyangs dang gsal byed spel zhing go bzlog tu bris la bsnol bar byas la rlung gi shugs kyis bsgrub bya gang gi

gzugs dang mi spel gyis gnas de myur du bskyod pa rlung dang me dang chu bsnol ma rnam par 'khrug par byed do/ /de nas yang kha sbyar dbye ba'i las dag gis pha rol gyi sde dag gi lus dang ngag dang sems kyi dbye bas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang

ting nge 'dzin gyis bskul nas lan bdun myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gal te klu'i dug gis gzas pa po 'dzin du 'jug par 'dod na ti tha la'i 'bru la byas pa'i dug sbrul gyi gzugs mgo gsum pa lce brkyang ba'am ci rigs su byas pa

de'i kha'i nang du gang la dmigs pa'i rdzas de ming dang bcas pas klu gnas pa'i sa phyogs su btang na sbrul gyis 'dzin pa'i las byed do/ /ma he dang rta'i 'phrul 'khor 'byung po'i nyi ma la sa ti tsa'i khu bas bris te de nyid

kyi sha khrag dang bcas pas bskul bar gyur na ni shin tu 'khrug cing 'bye bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na bi ta na ro pa la trai zhes bya ba'i cho ga'i thabs kyis bgegs chen po bsgral ba'i gzugs la brten nas cho ga phyag mtshan dag btsugs

te las su bya ba'o/ /yang na sa nag po gru gsum pa la nag po'i tshogs kha phyir bltas pa dang nang du bltas pa dag bkod de/ pha rol rgol ba'i phyogs su bskyal na ni myur du yul dang bcas pa brlag par byed do/ /

sha za chen po'i gzugs shin tu 'jigs pa kha gdangs pa nag po gri gug dang zhags pa thogs pa mdun du dmigs la phur bus btab pa dang bcas pa'i thabs kyi pha rol gyi dpung g.yos pa dang bcas pa bzlog par byed do/ /

gtor ma chen po byas te yang gtor na g.yul bshams pa las rnam par rgyal bar byed do/ /ri rab kyi gzugs la sna tshogs pa'i gzugs brnyan bkod de phrin las sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i phyag rgyas btab na g.yul chen po

las rgyal bar byed do/ /dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa'i tshul du bya ba las a sho ka'am bi Da ka'i shing la brten nas thabs dang ldan pa'i yul phyogs de yongs su rgyas pa'i gnas thob par byed do/ /rdo rje bya khyung

gi phyag rgya bcas la des klu non par byas na de nyid kha dog dkar por gyur pa'i 'jam pa'i spyod yul gyis 'dul ba la nag por bsgyur ba'i rtsub pa'i thabs kyis dkrugs pas klu'i gnas thams cad du ltas chen po drug byung

bas thams cad 'dar zhing mgo bo ardza ga'i dog pa bzhin du 'gas pa snyam byed nas myur bar 'ongs te bka' nyan cing 'dzam bu'i gling du char gyi rgyun chen pos rab tu gang bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /gang du skyes pa g.yul ngor gsad

pa'i mgal dum dang lag ngar gyi rus pa la dpal nag po chen po'i gzugs brnyen ji lta bar byas la bskyed pa dang bstims te bzlas pa bya/ dben par sbas nas gsol ba btab na gang 'dod pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/
sa kun la yang bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang 'das pa la sogs pa'i don shes pa dang / de'i mdun du khrus byas te nyal na lung ston pa'am dge mi dge gsal po ston par 'gyur ro/ /yang na dur khrod kyi ras sam
dar nag po la yang rung ste/ dam tshig dang ldan pas bris te/ mchod pa dang gtor mar ldan pas/ rab tu gnas par byas na sku byin brlabs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyang rin po che las

byas nas de'i mdun du gsol ba btab na zla ba drug gis nges par yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /yang na nag po chen po'i gsang sngags sngon du byas te shes rab yongs su 'dzin pa khri phrag gcig bzlas na thos pa'i
gzungs yongs su 'dzin pa dang blo yongs su dag pa dang mi brjed pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro/ /srung bas bsrung zhing bcings pa thams cad las yongs su grol lo/ /gang du sgrub pa po phun sum

tshogs pas sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi rten la rab tu gnas pa mtshan nyid dang ldan par byas na dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa dang bar chad thams cad las bzlog par 'gyur ba yin no/ /khyad par du yang

gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig la nges par gnas pa nyid kyis phyogs dang dus thams cad du ye shes kyi nag po chen pos rjes su skyong ba dang rgyang ring po nas kyang nges par gzigs par mdzad do/ /'jigs pa thams cad las rab tu sgrol bar

'gyur ro/ /stobs dang tshe dang dpal rab tu ster cing mi zad pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa dang nyam nga ba dang bag tsha ba med par seng ge'i stobs kyis rgyu zhing bdud kyi ris kyi phyogs ma lus pa pham zhing skrag ste mgo 'gas pa tsam du byed par 'gyur zhing rgya mtsho

chen po'i mthar thug par 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gis gtum pa dang dpa' ba dang drag po'i brtul zhugs kyis kun tu spyod la rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin mi shigs par 'gyur ba med pa'i tshul gyis khyab par

rgyu ba'o/ /gnas kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang pho nya'i mkha' 'gro ma dang 'jig rten gyi mkha' 'gro ma dang dam tshig gi mkha' 'gro ma dang sha za'i mkha' 'gro ma'i dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje rigs kyi mkha'

'gro pho nya mo drug bcu rtsa bzhis kyang phrin las thogs pa med pa 'grub par byed do/ /zhing skyong chen po dang nye ba'i zhing skyong nyi shu rtsa bzhi po dag gis kyang phrin las thogs pa med pa sgrub par byed pa'o/ /
gdul dka' ba ma lus pa 'dul zhing 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bar byed do/ /gang du rgyud 'di 'chang ba dang klog pa dang 'dzin pa dang sems pa dang de bzhin nyid du gnas pa dang / rnal 'byor
du gang gnas pa la nye bar skyob par byed do/ /nye bar dgongs pas mkhyen par 'gyur ro/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las sa gsum du sgrub pa'i dbang phyug tu bstan pa'i le'u ste
nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba mngon par 'byung ba'i gnas/ /drang srong thub pas yang dag bstan/ /nges par gsang ba 'dzin
gyur pa/ /rgyal ba yon tan 'byung ba'i gter/ /ye shes mgon po chen po dang / /las kyi mgon po du mar bcas/ /dpal ldan lha mo nag mo ni/ /'khor bcas dkyil 'khor bstan pa ste/ /skal ldan lam
'di 'dzin pa gang / /nga yis lung bstan gyur pa yin/ /gdug pa rnams ni gzung ba'i phyir/ /mkhas pas snying rje bskyed nas ni/ /cho ga kun mchog gis rab sgrub/ /
bdag nyid ji bzhin sems can de/ /de bzhin bdag de dam pa'i bdag /dpal he ru ka'i go 'phang gnas/ /'di la the tshom mi bya ste/ /sun 'byin pas ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /rnam dag rnam pa can sems
kyi rang bzhin gyis ni mya ngan 'das/ /ma rungs pa ni gang dag gis/ /skye bo bcings par gyur pa gang / /de nyid thabs dang bcas pa yis/ /srid pa'i bcing las grol bar 'gyur/ /de ltar grub
pa'i lam bsten cing / /thun mong khyad par 'grub par 'gyur/ /dus bzhi dag tu gtor ma 'bul/ /bgegs med bsod nams 'phel byed pa'o/ /'dir 'jig rten dang 'jig rten
las 'das pa'i dpal ye shes kyi mgon po lcam dral 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la gtor ma dbul bar bya ste/ sha chen po dang bcas pa'i gtor ma bshams la/ /oM ba liM ma Ni ra~M hU~M dza/ rak+Sha

ni rak+Sha ni rak+Sha mi/ kha kha khA hi gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na ba liM/ ma hA bi sha nA~M/ pra sA d+ha ya pra sA d+ha ya/ hu lu hu lu phaT/ kha kha khA hi khA hi mA ra mA ra/ sarba ta sa na sa tra~M/ wa ri ha d+hi ra pra ya ts+tshan tu swA
hA/ oM AH hU~M zhes pas mtshan phyed na gtor ma bsreg spos dang bcas pa dbul bar bya'o/ /oM hAH ka ha ka ha ma li ni mu khi ye yaM sA d+ha ya/ ma hA kA la bud+d+ha dza~M/ pra ti to si/
kA ra ya kA ra ya/ pra duSh+Tan/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ma ra ma ra/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ shI g+h+ra~M/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hu ra hu ra/ ma~M ra~M hU~M phaT/ /i diM
ba li~M gr-ih+na gr-ih+Na/ shrI sarba oM AHhU~M/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba grub
pa dang gtor ma'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o/ /dpal mgon po chen po khros pa'i mgon po gsang ba mngon par
'byung ba'i rgyud kun gyi rtsa bar gyur pa bstan pa 'dzin pa/ bstan pa skyong ba/ bstan pa bsrung nges pa/ gsang ba bdud dpung 'dul bar byed pa'o/ /dpal
mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud kun gyi snying por gyur pa gdod nas grub pa'i bla ma yin no/ /rdzogs s+ho// //
rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma hA paN+Di ta a b+ha yA ka ra gup+ta pA ta'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba mkhas pa chen po khe'u rgad 'khor lo grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o/ /
yang slad nas mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas grags pa'i spyan sngar ke bo shes rab dpal gyis kyang zhu tig bgyis pa'o/ /
@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI bud d+ha ka pA la nA ma yo gi tan tra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal sangs rgyas
thod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan dang ldan pa'i dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rnal 'byor ma rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs te/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral
ba'i gtso bo rnams dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad bcu dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis rdo rje'i tshig gis rdo rje chen po'i gnas su rgyud thams cad dang sngags yang dag par bshad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje dang pad mo'i yang dag par
sbyar bas btsun mo'i b+ha gar yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
rnal 'byor ma thams cad rmad du gyur te gcig la gcig lta zhing / e ma'o bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan dang
ldan pa'i dbus su ji ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /lha mo sems can bsod nams dman pa rnams nus pa la zhon par 'gyur ba'i thabs cung zad mchis sam/ gsungs pa/ rnal 'byor
gyi rgyud la bye ba phrag drug nyid do/ /rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud la ni bye ba phrag bcu drug nyid do/ /mdo sde
so so la ni bye ba phrag brgyad bcu'o/ /de bzhin du pha rol du phyin pa'i theg pa la ni bye ba la bsgres pa'i 'bum phrag lnga'o/ /'di dag thams cad

ni thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs so/ /sngags dang bral na ni rgyud kyi nus pa mi snang ste/ rgyud la lar ni ci nas sngags bye ba bzlas par gsungs so/ /bsod nams 'bring po rnams kyis ni sngags 'bum bzlas pas

myur bar 'grub par gsungs so/ /bsod nams che bas khri bzlas pas shin tu myur bar 'grub bo/ /de ltar rdo rje can chen po rgyud kyi bdag po'i gtso bos gsungs so/ /bsod nams chung ba'i sems can rnams kyis ni bye ba

bzlas par gsungs so/ /sems can 'bad rtsol chung ba rnams kyis ni 'bum bzlas par bdag smra'o/ /sems can sgom pa la zhen pa rnams kyis ni khri kho na bzlas par bya'o/ /sems can 'dod chags la zhugs pa rnams kyi

bzlas pa ji ltar lags/ blun po dang lkugs pa'i rigs can rnams kyi sngags kyi grangs ji ltar lags/ shin tu dmigs pa'i sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar lags/ 'di ltar phan tshun smra bas bzlas na dngos grub gzhan

du yang 'gyur ro/ /gal te dman pa'i sems kyis nyon mongs bzhin pas bzlas pa de'i tshe bskal pa skar ma lta bu bye bar yang de la dngos grub med do/ /de ltar thos nas rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal

la blta bar byed cing zur mig dang bcas pa'i chags pas bltas te/ shin tu khro bas 'jigs par byed cing snying rje'i thugs 'khrugs pas bdud kyi dpung rab tu bcom mo/ /de ltar bzhugs pa'i lha mo chen mo rgyud thams cad kyi

bdag po'i dbang phyug la de nas des gzigs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu las sngags phyung ngo / /oM bud d+he sid d+he sid d+hi/ a mri ta a ra dze bud d+ha ka pA la s+pho Ta ne pa te ya tra s+pha ya~M hU~M ho phaT/ de ltar sngags

kyi mchog gsan pas sa rim pa bdun gyi 'og tu chud pa'i klu rnams bcom par byas shing phye mar byas nas slar 'ongs te sna tshogs sde ma'i zhal du zhugs te/ pad ma'i nang nas byung nas slar thod par zhugs so/ /

sngags 'di'i mthus klu rnams zhig ste/ skrag cing rngul 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nor rgyas la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po'i klu thams cad lhags te/ stobs kyis rgyu dang / dung skyong dang / 'jog po dang / mtha' yas dang /

pad ma dang / pad ma chen po la sogs pa klu chen po rnams dang / gzhan gang yang rung ba dug las byung ba thams cad kyang lhags so/ /rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma la kha phyogs te klu thams cad kyis zhus pa/ lha mo

bka' ci stsol ci zhig bgyi zhes smra'o/ /gsungs pa gang yang sangs rgyas nyams su myong ba de ltar gyis shig /de ltar thos pa tsam gyis dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan dang ldan pa'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das kyi thod pa kha phye

ste glegs bam byung ngo / /nam mkha' la sgra byung ngo / /lha mo lha tshogs sde ma zung / /sems can kun la phan 'dogs ma/ /rgyud 'di rgyal po chen po ste/ /rnal 'byor ma yi gong na med/ /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba/ /

sems can kun la phan byed pa'o/ /de ltar thos nas sna tshogs sde mas glegs bam yang dag par bzung ste/ phyag na rdo rje la nye bar gtad do/ /phyag na rdo rjes rgyud 'di zung / /sems can kun la bde 'bab pa/ /rnal 'byor ma yi

dngos grub kun/ /'bras bu myur du ster byed pa'o/ /mnan dang spar ba ye shes che/ /gong na med pa rnyed dka' ba/ /gsang ba mchog gi nyams dga' ba/ /lus kun la ni rnam par gnas/ /nam mkha' lding dang char dbab dang / /dngul

chu bcud kyis len pa dang / /bskrad dang dbang du bya nyid dang / /rmongs dang mngon spyod nyid dang ni/ /dpung la sogs pa rengs nyid dang / /dus su zin pa bzlog pa dang / /phur bus gdab dang gsad pa dang / /rtag tu sgrub pa byed pa dang / /

sna tshogs sngags rim ji bzhin dang / /ji bzhin rnal 'byor ma bskyed dang / /dpal chen he ru ka yi ni/ /bskyed pa dang ni gnas rgyu dang / /dngos dang dngos med spros med dang / /srid par spyod cing gos med dang / /dgongs pas
bshad pa mchog chen dang / /rnal 'byor ma yi mchog chen dang / /rnal 'byor ma yi 'dus pa dang / /nus pa rnam pa mang gsungs pa/ /thos pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /gzugs brnyan dag

pa nyid dang ni/ /de bzhin brtan pa bskyod pa dang / /dur khrod 'jigs pa che bzang dang / /ro langs bsgrub la sogs pa dang / /stobs po che rnams dgug pa dang / /de bzhin 'jig rten gsum dgug dang / /rims kyis

gdung ba 'jigs chen dang / /dgra yi kha sogs bcing ba dang / /de bzhin gsad dang bslu ba dang / /mi snang byed pa mchog dang ni/ /mig sman dang ni ri lu nyid/ /bcud len ral gri nyid dang ni/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor

ba yis/ /thos pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /mi snang ba ni mchog chen dang / /sna tshogs sgyu 'phrul rnam 'phrul dang / /rang gi gzugs ni sgyur ba dang / /gzhan gyi lus la gzhugs sogs dang / /sangs rgyas bye bas

rab bsrungs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas bu mo mchog chen rnams/ /khros pa tsam gyis 'gugs byed na/ /gzhan dag smos lta ci zhig dgos/ /mig 'phrul byed pa nyid dang ni/ /dge mtshan rnam pa mang shes pa/ /'dod pa

lnga ni bsten bzhin pas/ /'di ru 'grub par gdon mi za/ /'jigs shing 'joms pa'i rtsod chen po/ /gcig gis 'bum las rgyal bar byed/ /skyes pa gcig gi 'dod chen gyis/ /bud med 'bum phrag 'dzag byed cing / /

rdo rjer byed pa rnyed dka' ba/ /gcig gis thams cad 'dod pa spyad/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /mkha' lding sbyor ba rim ji bzhin/ /rgyud kun du yang rnyed dka' ba/ /mu stegs rnams kyi yul min pa/ /rgyud

kun du yang ma gsungaso/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i gzhung ji bzhin/ /rdo rje mgon pos gsungs pa yi/ /mkha' lding shin du rmad byung ba/ /'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' ba'i/ /sbyor ba rnam pa bcwa brgyad gsungs/ /sha yi ki yi sbyor ba

dang / /rig pa 'dzin dang rgyal po 'gyed/ /rnga rdung bud med 'phrog pa dang / /shing snun zhags pas 'ching ba dang / /khu byug pad+mas 'byed pa dang / /stag byed chu blugs dung 'bud dang / /thod lo kor 'phrog skyug pa dang / /ras g.yogs thal lcag brdab

pa dang / /yig gsum bsam gtan gyis ni gtam/ /'di rnams kyis ni dgug par bya/ /mkha' lding sbyor ba bcwa brgyad po/ /'jig rten gsum na rab rnyed dka'/ /sems can rnams la phan byed pa/ /rdo rje mgon po nyid kyis gsungs/ /de nas gzhan

yang rab bshad pa/ /mchog gi ye shes ji bzhin pa/ /b+ha ga'i dbus su rnam par bzhugs/ /bde ba chen po ster byed pa/ /'di nyid du ni kun gnas kyang / /byis pa rmongs pas mi shes so/ /der ni bcud dang bcud len te/ /de nyid du ni sangs rgyas

bzhugs/ /der ni dkyil 'khor bzang po'o/ /der ni slob ma dbang bskur ba'o/ /der ni he ru ka dpa' bo/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dbang gtso'o/ /der ni nam mkha' lding 'jigs pa/ /de nyid du ni ro langs bsgrub/ /der ni dur khrod brgyad po

rnams/ /skad cig tsam gyis skyed pa'i rgyu/ /der ni sangs rgyas bdag ny-id che/ /stong phrag gsum ni rnam par bzhugs/ /der ni 'jig rten khams kun te/ /de nyid bcom ldan 'das lha mo/ /sangs rgyas la sogs skyed pa'i yu~M/ /

byang chub sems dpa' dpal chen po/ /shes rab pha rol phyin dpung gnyen/ /de nyid bsod nams kun ster ma/ /de nyid thar pa ster byed na/ /phyag rgya chen po grags chen po/ /dngos grub kun ni 'dod byed ma/ /ma dang

tsha mo sring mo dang / /bu mo bud med rab brten ma/ /shes rab mnyes shing 'jigs byed ma/ /'gro drug bde sdug bag chags bcas/ /'khor ba mya ngan 'das nyid dang / /bdag nyid chen po de nyid de/ /rnam rtog kun du rtog

pa nyid/ /de bzhin 'char dang nub pa dang / /nyin mtshan mal stan bza' ba dang / /nges pa'i brtul zhugs rtsis dang grangs/ /rnam par mi rtog yang dag rtog /dman dang mchog dang bar ma dang / /gzhan dang gang dang de dang ni/ /

de nyid bdag nyid chen po gcig /sems can kun la bde ba 'bab/ /de ltar thos nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / 'dod can ma la sogs pa ri rab kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi rnal
'byor ma rnams dga' ba'i spyan gdangs nas sna tshogs sde ma la yang dang yang du btud de/ 'di ltar gsol to/ /e ma'o/ /sna tshogs sde ma rnal 'byor ma/ /sems can kun la bde 'bab ma/ /glegs bam don

dang ldan gang zhig /de kun sangs rgyas byin brlabs bshad/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje'i phyag gnyis glang po che'i lag pa ltar rab tu brkyang ste glegs bam yang dag par blangs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs

kyis phyag rgya chen po'i rdo rje'i gnas su don dang bcas pa'i gzhung zhu bar gyur to/ /phyag na rdo rje'i snying ga nas byung ste/ sna tshogs sde ma'i thugs su ngal sos so/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen

pos rnal 'byor ma chen mo la 'di ltar gsol to/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa gang zhig lags/ /las kyi tshogs rnams ji ltar 'grub/ /sngon du bsnyen pa gang zhig lags/ /mkha' lding 'grub pa'i nges pa gang / /dngul chu bcud

len sna tshogs pa/ /dngos grub ster byed gang zhig lags/ /spar dang mnan pa gang gsungs dang / /dus dang bya ba'i nges bcas dang / /dngos grub thob dus gang zhig lags/ /sangs rgyas ji lta bu ru brjod/ /de bzhin thod pa ji lta bu/ /sbyor dang ldan

pa'i ji lta bu/ /sna tshogs sde ma'ang ji lta bu/ /theg pa chen po ji lta bu/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rnam nges ci/ /gsungs pa/ rgyud 'dir sngon du bsnyen pa med/ /de bzhin yul dang dus tshes dang / /gza' dang rgyu skar sbyor med pa/ /blo dang

ldan pas rtag tu bsten/ /dus dang bya ba'i nges mi bya/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /thos pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje zhes su gsungs/ /thod pa gru gsum yang dag 'byung / /sbyor ba gsang bar gnas

pa'i rtsa/ /de yi sna tshogs ngo mtshar byed/ /sde ni bde chen ye shes so/ /'di nyid theg pa chen po ste/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rtsa las byung / /de ni rmad byung che mchog ste/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba nyid/ /de nyid he ru ka dpa' bo/ /

'khor ba'i 'jigs las sgrol byed pa/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba 'bab/ /rnal 'byor chen mo sna tshogs bde/ /dpa' dbang bdag mo dbang phyug ma/ /de yi thod pa'i dkyil

'khor la/ /sngags dang rgyud ni rnam par gnas/ /de yi ye shes bzang po ni/ /lhan cig skyes pa dag las 'byung / /de ni rig pa'i dbang lnga dang / /sangs rgyas bdun gyi mtshan can te/ /sna tshogs sbyor dang tshe 'phel dang / /

dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa ni/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'grub par 'dir ni gdon mi za/ /man ngag lam las gang shes pa/ /bla ma'i drin las shes par bya/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud chen po rnal 'byor ma
rnams kyi gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin du gsang ba zhes bya ba las dngos grub thams cad dang ye shes gtan la dbab pa dang / thod pa kha phye ba las glegs bam byung ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// //
de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /sngags le'u ji bzhin gsungs pa ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma mo 'byung po rnams/ /sngags gang gis ni 'grub 'gyur ba/ /de ni bdag gis rab bshad kyis/ /khyod
kyis dad pa brtan pas nyon/ /oM bud d+ha ka pA li ni ta Ta s+pho Ta ya sar+b+ba shu b+ha pra dA yi ni hU~M phaT/ spos dbul ba'i sngags so/ /oM bud d+ha ka pA li ni ma Ta ma Ta a swA hA/ me tog dbul

ba'i sngags so/ /oM ma hA ka pA la badzri ba ra ba ta Ta sta Ta ya sta Ta ya ma na ma Ta hU~M he swA hA/ dri 'bul ba'i sngags so/ /oM bud d+ha ka pA li ni/ grih+Na grih+Na/ grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya ba ra ba ra ta Ta ta Ta/ sta Ta ya sta Ta

ya ma Ta hU~M hU~M hU~M swA hA/ mar me dbul ba'i sngags so/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya kha kha hU~M/ lha bshos dbul ba'i sngags so/ /oM ma hA ka pA li badzra d+har+m+ma d+har+m+ma me ge ba re

pra ba re ba ra ba ra ka ra ka ra ta Ta ta Ta ha he swA hA/ gos dbul ba'i sngags so/ /oM hA~M haiM hauM haiM hoM hA~M hA/ go cha'i sngags so/ /oM bud d+ha ka pA li ni a kha~M kroM aH A hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM ma hA ka pA la badzri Ni

gats+tsha gats+tsha uta tiSh+Tha uta tiSh+Tha dza dza dza ha dza~M dza~M dza~M/ trai lokya bi Ta pa Ni hU~M phaT/ gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/ /oM ma hA ka pA la badzre tsi tre su tsi tre a lAm ba ne phrin yA/ sar+b+ba b+hU ta na mA ra Na kI la ya sar+b+ba duSh+TAn uts+tsA Ta ya sar+b+ba bi g+hA n+bi trA ba ya

b+ha ga ba ti yak+Sha rak+Sha sa pi shA tsA na sho Sha ya ta Ta ya sap+ta pA tA la ga tA na/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i sngags so/ /'bras sA lu blangs te 'o mas bkrus la

bu mo gzhon nu mas de shin du zhib par btags la/ de yang shes rab can gyis gzugs brnyan byas te/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi gzhung bzhin cang te'u dang / kha T+wA~M ga dang / ral gri dang / thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /de nas ro

bsregs pa'i sol ba phye mar byas la rdo rje gtsug gis mnye bar bya'o/ /de nas des gzugs brnyan la byug par bya'o/ /me tog dkar pos mchod pa byas te/ sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas he ru ka'i rnam pa'i

sbyor bas sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /oM ma hA badzra he ru ka badzre/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hA dz+nyA na po Ta Ne/ shI g+h+ra~M sA da ya sta~M b+ha ya kI la ya hU~M phaT/ sngags 'dis chu la lan bdun du mngon

par bzlas te/ gzugs brnyan de bkru bar bya'o/ /chu des rang gi gdong bkrus na mi snang bar byed de/ lha rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka'o/ /nags kyi nang du stag gis kyang mi mthong ngo / /gzhan dag gis kyang de

mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /srog chags 'bum gyi nang du song na ngo mtshar sna tshogs byed do/ /gang gis kyang mi mthong ngo / /lha'i bu mo 'phrog cing lha rnams kyis kyang mi mthong ngo / /'o mas gdong bkrus pa tsam gyis

ni mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gzugs brnyan de'i snying gar 'ba' bo las phug ste/ dur khrod kyi me la 'ba' bo la dang tshangs pa rdo rjes rab tu sbar la/ de'i thal ba yang dag par blangs te/ kham phor du gzhag par bya'o/ /

yang na pad ma'i snod du'o/ /sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bzlas par bya'o/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni trA~M hU~M/ oM badzra bi li si nI hrIHhU~M/ oM kA mi nI kha~M hU~M/ oM pA tA la ba sI nA AHhU~M/ oM tsi

traHse nA sa ma yA d+hiSh+Tha ya hrIHhU~M/ sngags 'di dag ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang shin tu rnyed par dka'o/ /thal ba de dang rdo rje gtsug gis lus byug par byas na ji srid du lus la mtshon chas phog pa de srid du mi

tshugs so/ /slar zhing dgra thams cad kyi mgo bo 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /gang sdang ba la bltas na de long bar 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig sdang ba'i sems 'dzin pa na de smyo bar 'gyur ro/ /thal ba de nyid dang mar khu

bzang pos mig byugs na dpag tshad stong mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang ci yang rung ba'i sa'i 'og na gnas pa'i gter dpag tshad stong gi 'og tu son pa'i dngul dang gser dang / rin po che gang na yod pa de thams cad
la srin lag gis sdigs mdzub byas pa tsam gyis thams cad mdun du lhags te gsol ba 'debs so/ /kyai sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pa gter long la sems can gyi don gyis shig /des gter

blangs na gang 'dod pa de byed de/ thal ba des byed do/ /thal ba de dang go ro tsa na lhan cig bsnos te/ mdzub mos mnyes pas dpung gi tshogs langs pa mdzub mo bskor ba tsam gyis 'bum phrag stong gi dpung rnams

kha phub tu lhung bar 'gyur ro/ /gang 'dod pa de byed do/ /bkrus pa tsam gyis langs par 'di the tshom med do/ /thal ba de dang zha nye'i phye ma dang bsnos te gcig tu byas la/ /rdo rje'i gtsug rjes su byin te

khab len gyi lcags kyi phye ma bsre zhing gser gyi phye ma yang cung zad bsre bar bya'o/ /rdo rje'i chu'i khu ba dang lhan cig tu bsnos te zangs ma'i snod du nyi ma bdun gyi bar du gzhag go/ /de nas mkhris pa chen po mnyes te rta'i khrag dang lhan

cig tu bsnos la yang snod de nyid du nyi ma gsum gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas bton te lcags kyi snod du gzhag par bya'o/ /zangs ma'i snod du bzhag pa de me'i nang du bcug na gser dang dngul du 'gyur bar som nyi med do/ /srang gcig kyang

srang stong gi rin thang du 'gyur te rin po che dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /gser de ma sha gcig dang dngul srang gcig bsres te me la bzhu na srang sum brgya'i rin thang gi tshad du 'gyur bar 'di la the tshom med do/ /'di lta bu'i sbyor ba ni sangs rgyas

rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' grags pa chen po snying rje dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid chen po stobs che ba de rnams kyang sbyin par mi nus so/ /'di yi sbyor ba rnyed dka' ba/ /sangs

rgyas thod pa'i rgyud du gsungs/ /rgyud gzhan rnams su sbas pa yin/ /'dus sogs rnal 'byor rgyud du ni/ /sbyor ba rnam pa ma gsungs pa/ /gang tshe sngon du bsnyen de'i tshe/ /de yi sbyor bas ci zhig bya/ /bsod nams dman

pa'i sems can gang / /mtshams med lnga ni byed pa yang / /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'di lta'i sbyor ba 'grub par 'gyur/ /dngos po de yis blo chen rnams/ /sems can don la gcig tu brtson/ /srang

gcig gis ni bsres bya'i rin/ /sbyor ba kun tu rnyed par dka'o/ /sbyor ba glegs bam la ma bris/ /bla ma'i drin las shes par bya/ /bla mas dngos grub bla mas thar/ /bla ma ston pa rnam kun pa/ /des na slob ma blo chen
gyis/ /'bad pas bla ma mnyes par bya/ /thal ba de nyid kyis lus blta ba'i don du bu mo'i mgo la blugs te rdo rje gtsug gis bu mo bkru'o/ /yang thal bas thig le byas la/ tshangs pas rdo rjes maN Dal
gru bzhi byas te/ de'i dbus su bu mo bzhag par bya'o/ /bdug spos lngas bdugs shing sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs na bu mo la 'bab par 'gyur te/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar

byung ba ston to/ /bu don gyis 'bras bu la sngags 'di lan bdun du mngon par bsngag so/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni de hi/ de hI da dA pa ya da dA pa ya he he b+ha ga ba ti shI g+h+ra~M khaD+ga~M da ra hi bud+d+ha ka pA la badzra s+ya ya dz+nya ma la~M g+ha ya hU~M sta~M hrI phaT

a phaT/ yungs kar bsnun pa tsam gyis ni/ /bu mo grags chen ma ni rgod/ /de yi kha nas ral gri bdun/ /'byung ba la ni the tshom med/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas skad cig ma de nyid la 'grub par 'dir som nyi

med do/ /de ltar ral gri gcig grub pas bye ba brgya stong gi rig 'dzin grub pas bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /'di lta bu'i sbyor ba ni 'jig rten gsum na yang rnyed par dka'o/ /bu mo bkrus pa tsam gyis rnal mar 'gyur

ro/ /de'i thal ba lcags gsum gyis bkris te ri lu byas nas khar bcug pa tsam gyis ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab can gyis sum bcu pa yang bskor ro/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mi gzigs so/ /

ri lu lag par blangs pas dngos po gang dang gang la reg pa tsam gyis de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /thal ba'i sbyor ba 'di dag ni/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang rnyed par dka'/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA la dzaHhU~M kha~M ra~M a/ 'jig rten gsum/

bsgrub pa'i sngags so/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni hrIHhU~M/ dgra rlag pa'i sngags so/ /oM ma hA ka pA la badzri kha kha khA hi khA hi sarba duSh+Tan g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sar+b+ba sha tru~M oM hi trA~M hU~M phaT/ bskrad pa'i sngags so/ /sangs rgyas

thod pa'i rgyud chen po/ rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin du gsang ba zhes bya ba las thal ba'i sbyor ba dang las sna tshogs gtan la dbab pa dang / sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis
pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes sna tshogs sde ma la btud de 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sems can don la gcig brtson pa/ /legs so bcom ldan 'das lha mo/ /'di

lta'i rab tu sbyor zhes pa/ /rgyud gzhan dag tu ma gsungs shing / /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab sbas pa/ /de ni 'bad de gsal bar mdzod/ /lha mo chen mo khyod kyis gsungs/ /lha yi le'u ni ji lta bu/ /sangs rgyas

thod pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i/ /rgyud du lha rnams du zhig gsungs/ /de ru gzugs ni ji lta bu/ /gus pa yis ni nyan par 'tshal/ /gsungs pa/ ra~M las nyi ma bsam par bya/ /nyi ma'i steng du hU~M byung ba'i/ /rdo rje nag

po bsreg pa'i bdag /rdo rje de nyid 'od zer gyis/ /ra ba dra bas mtshams bcing ngo / /de bzhin rdo rje nag gyur pa'i/ /rdo rje'i sa gzhi bsam par bya/ /rdo rje'i sa gzhi'i dbus chud par/ /e yi rnam pa bdag nyid che/ /

gru gsum khams gsum bdag nyid can/ /yi ge la~M gyur sa yi ni/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi rab ser po'o/ /de yi dbus nas sa bon ni/ /yi ge oM ste chos bdag nyid/ /oM las byung ba'i 'khor lo ni/ /rtsa rnams kun

gyi rang bzhin can/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rnam par bzhugs/ /rtsa ni bcu drug bcu la rgyan dang / /sprul pa drug bcu rtsa bzhi 'dab/ /des na rtsa brgya nyi shu'o/ /rdo rje sku yi bdag nyid che/ /shes rab can gyis de ltar bsam/ /de yi dbus

gnas sa bon ni/ /lba~M dkar yi ge las byung ba/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum po'o/ /rtsa rnams thams cad chu yi ni/ /dkyil 'khor la ni thim par 'gyur/ /slar yang bsam par bya ba ni/ /ra~M dmar las byung me dkyil

'khor/ /gru gsum 'bar ba'i bdag nyid can/ /rab tu 'bar bzhin pa yi ni/ /rtsa ba'i 'khor lo yang dag blta/ /de nas bsam par bya ba ni/ /ya~M gyur rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni/ /zla ba phyed pa'i rnam 'dra sngo/ /
rtsa rnams rab tu g.yo ba'i gzugs/ /thim gyur 'khor lo'i rig par gsungs/ /de dag thams cad thim 'gyur ba/ /de yi dbus gnas rnal 'byor pa/ /de ltar shes par byed gang zhig /sangs rgyas thod pa'i

rnal 'byor pas/ /de nas zla ba bsam par bya/ /zla ba'i steng du nyi ma'o/ /de yi dbus chud sa bon ni/ /hU~M dang a yi rang bzhin no/ /yi ge ka yis ha brgyan te/ /ka ni ha la thim par 'gyur/ /mi phyed pa yi ha dang

hU~M/ /gnyi ga'i bdag nyid can blta'o/ /ha ni mi shigs shes rab kyi/ /bdag nyid dang ni thig le dag /gnyi ga gcig tu gyur pa ni/ /yi ge hU~M gi mchog blta'o/ /hU~M las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams/ /de yis bde ba

che bskul te/ /ba mo lta bu'i ri bong can/ /nyi mar lhan cig zhu gyur cing / /dkyil 'khor gnyi ga gcig gyur pa/ /nyi ma'i mchog tu blta bar bya/ /yang ni hU~M byung 'od zer dang / /rtsa ba'i 'khor lo thams cad la/ /reg

ma thag pa'i mod la ni/ /rtsa ba'i 'khor lo las 'bab 'gyur/ /zhu ba de yis sa bon bkru/ /hU~M gyur pa las rdo rje ste/ /dbus su de nyid kyis byin brlabs/ /sa bon rdo rje las byung ba/ /dpa' bo khrag 'thung mdog

sngon po/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /gtso bo hU~M zhes 'don pa ste/ /skyil dkrung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas/ /gnyi ga'ang khro ba'i bdag nyid can/ /stag gi lpags pa'i na bza' mnabs/ /mgo bo rlon pa'i 'phreng ba

'chang / /bsregs su mchod phyir thogs pa yi/ /shin du bzhad pas 'jigs che ba'i/ /gtso bo snying rje'i bdag nyid blta/ /dpung rgyan mgul do 'khor gdub dang / /gcer bu rus pa'i ska rags 'chang / /g.yer kar bcas pa'i

rkang gdub can/ /ma lus bdud rnams 'joms par byed/ /ral pa'i cod pan yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas rnam pa lnga yis brgyan/ /zla ba phyed pa 'dzin pa'i lha/ /dbu la sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan/ /'khor lo

rna cha gdu bu dang / /phyag rgya rnam pa lnga yis mtshan/ /thal ba'i rdul can 'jigs par byed/ /thod pa gti mug gis brgyan pa'i/ /dpa' bo 'khor ba sgrol byed pa/ /byang chub sa bon rang bzhin no/ /gtso chen de yi shes rab ma/ /

sna tshogs sde ma rnal 'byor ma/ /gcer bu mgo bo'i phreng ba spangs/ /rgyan med mchod phyir thogs med ma/ /bde ba kun gyi gzugs can ma/ /phyag gnyis skra ni grol ba'o/ /he ru ka la 'khyud gnas ma/ /de ltar pha rol phyin

lha mo/ /kha dog dmar po rnam gsal ma/ /zhal ni shin du rnam 'gyur ba/ /cung zad mche ba gtsigs 'jigs ma/ /g.yas na cang te'u gri gug ste/ /g.yon na kha T+wA~M thod pa'o/ /rang gi lus skyes 'od zer gyis/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo

bskul bar bya/ /de yis bskul ba tsam gyis ni/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin las/ /'dzag 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /'dzag pa de las rnal 'byor ma/ /brgyad po bu mo rnams kyi mchog /mchod pa sna tshogs

'dzin pa yis/ /mgon po he ru ka mchod do/ /rdo rje mgon po'i shar gnas pa/ /rdo rje mche ba ma yis ni/ /thod pa khrag gis bkang gzung ste/ /gzi brjid chen po gsol bar mdzad/ /rdo rje pho nya bdag nyid che/ /dbang ldan du ni cang

te'u brdung / /rdo rje gdong ma dri snod dang / /me yi phyogs su rnam par gnas/ /rdo rje can ma grags chen mo/ /mchod yon snod bcas bden bral na/ /rdo rje gtsigs ma lho yi ni/ /phyogs na rnga bo che 'dzin gsungs/ /rlung du rdo rje

lte ba ma/ /ri bong can gyi snod 'dzin no/ /nub du rdo rje 'jigs ma ni/ /lce spyang phyag na 'dzin par gsungs/ /byang du 'dod chags rdo rje ma/ /lha mo'i chags pas gtso bo mchod/ /de ltar he ru ka bsams nas/ /rnal 'byor

ma ni brgyad kyis mchod/ /sna tshogs zas dang sna tshogs skom/ /sna tshogs rol mo mchog gsungs dang / /dri zhim lnga dang me tog spos/ /'di dag gis ni gtso bo mchod/ /mchod yon zhal bsil de bzhin khrus/ /glu yi

mchog ni rnam mang pos/ /mgon po khrag 'thung bdag nyid che/ /'di dag gis ni mchod par bya/ /dpa' bo rdzogs par mthong nas ni/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo las ni 'dzag /'dzag pa de las rnal 'byor ma/ /rnam mang brtse ba cher

ldan pa/ /bder gshegs kun gyis byin brlabs ma/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /sna tshogs pa yi na bza' mnabs/ /gzugs ni lang tsho gzhon pas brgyan/ /lo ni bcu dang gnyis lon pa/ /phyag g.yas byang
chub sems bkang ba'i/ /bum pa a mra'i lcug bcas bsnams/ /zhal ni rab bzhad dang ba yis/ /he ru ka ni rgyal gyur cig /rgyal gyur cig ces 'di ltar smra/ /mgon pos mdun du bltas nas ni/ /dbang bskur

mchog ste gsol ba gdab/ /brtse dang ldan pa'i grags chen mo/ /'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba bdag /dbang bskur ba yis bdag bsgral phyir/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor mas khrus shig /dper na bu tsha med pa'i khyim/ /shi ba tsam

gyis stong pa nyid/ /de bzhin dbang dang bral na ni/ /ye shes kun gyis stong pa nyid/ /dper na pid bang sbyor kun tshogs/ /rgyud dang bral na brdung mi rung / /de bzhin dbang dang bral na ni/ /sngags dang bsam gtan

'grub mi 'gyur/ /rmongs pa gang zhig dbang med par/ /bdag ni dbang bskur zhes smra ba/ /ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar/ /slob mar bcas te dmyal bar 'gro/ /de ltar shes bya rnal 'byor mas/ /slar yang

bdag la dbang bskur cig /yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal te/ /thal mo sbyar nas gsol ba gdab/ /gal te dbang bskur med na ni/ /he ru ka yi bdag gyur cing / /de nas rnal 'byor ma de rnams/ /rgyal gyur rgyal
gyur zhes smra zhing / /bcom ldan dbang bskur khrus gsol lo/ /phyi nang gsang bar bcas pa yi/ /dbang tsam gyis ni nam mkha' yi/ /khams nas rnga yi sgra grag cing / /me tog tsan dan char 'bab 'gyur/ /

de nas rnal 'byor ma de rnams/ /rtsa ba'i 'khor lo la ni thim/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin du gsang ba zhes bya ba las lha bskyed pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste gsum

pa'o// // de nor la pa'i rnams phyag na rdo rje la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ci yi phyir na bdag cag rnams/ /'od zer gyis ni 'tshal te mchis/ /bcom ldan bdag la bshad du gsol/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bdag

po chen pos rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /nor rgyas la sogs bdag nyid che/ /klu rnams ci phyir dgug pa lags/ /rnal 'byor chen po bdag la gsungs/ /de nas sna tshogs sde ma'i snying gi 'od

zer gyis klu thams cad kyi snying ka dang spyi bo'i mthar thug par zhugs te/ tshim par byas nas slar log go/ /de nas klu de rnams thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha mo bka' ni ci zhig gsol/ /

kyai lags ji lta bu zhig bgyi/ /gsungs pa/ mu stegs la sogs mkha' lding sngags/ /ye shes las byung ji lta bu/ /dus su zin pa ji ltar yin/ /ji ltar dug ni skye bar 'gyur/ /sbrul gyis zin pa tsam gyis ni/ /slar

yang sems can 'chi 'gyur zhing / /zhus pa/ khyab 'jug dbang phyug sogs lha dang / /tshangs pa tshangs pa mdun na 'don/ /de rnams la ni 'chi 'pho mchis/ /dug gi nyes pas gnod par 'gyur/ /de ltar dus su

zin ces smra/ /sbrul gyi dus su zin ces smra/ /sbrul gyi dug ni sel ba med/ /de bzhin sbrul la dug ni yod/ /sbrul zin 'tsho'am mi 'tsho ba/ /bde byed la sogs rdzu 'phrul che'i/ /lha de rnams ni de ltar smra/ /ston

pa stong nyid nges gsung ba/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang bas gsungs/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa la/ /sbrul gyi dug ni ji ltar yod/ /gang gis 'dzin cing gang zhig 'dzin/ /dus dang dus min ji ltar 'gyur/ /

ji ltar spyod cing ji ltar bsdu/ /gang phyir 'dzin cing gang du 'dzin/ /sems can dug zin mi 'chi ba/ /stong nyid smra ba'i nges pa yin/ /'dod chags gti mug stong pa nyid/ /grags chen yul ni stong pa nyid/ /yul gyi

rang bzhin dri ma med/ /dri ma dang bral ji ltar dug /sbrul gyis kyang ni ci zhig byed/ /tha mal pa yi yul ni sbrul/ /yul gyi nyes pa dug nyid do/ /lha rnams yul rnams kyis ni bsgribs/ /thams cad dus su zin pa

yin/ /yul gyi nyes pa sbyangs pa nyid/ /ston pa longs spyod gos mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /'dod kun nye bar longs spyod bya/ /ri skegs sbyor ba rnyed dka' dang / /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ldan pas/ /

'dir ni klu rnams thams cad blags/ /de phyir rab nges lha mo kyai/ /dus zin the tshom med pa ru/ /blo med mu stegs can de smra/ /'di ltar smras te klu rnams kyis/ /sna tshogs sde la phyag 'tshal te/ /rang rang gi ni gnas su dong / /

de nas bcom ldan 'das mas yul gyi nyes pa spong ba'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ stong dang stong min mtha' dag bcas/ /sgyu ma rmi lam lta bur gcig /'jig rten mtha' dag brdzun gyis

bcings/ /kyai lags bshes mo 'di ltar ltos/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen pos bcom ldan 'das ma'i zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ri skegs sbyor ba rnyed dka' ba/ /
lha mo yis ni bshad du gsol/ /sems can don la gcig tu 'bad/ /de ru bdag la ltad mo mchis/ /gsungs pa/ /dkyil 'khor med par sbyin mi bya/ /slob ma bsdu bar mi bya'o/ /gtso bos ji ltar

gsungs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor las ni smra bar bya/ /mtho lnga pa yi sa bzung ste/ /khor yug du ni gru bzhi'o/ /de yi phyed kyi zlum po la/ /brgyad las 'dam skyes 'dab ma brgyad/ / oM hU~M hrIHhU~M kha~M hU~M

a hU~M tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya a d+hiSh+Tha yed/ sa sbyang ba'i sngags so/ /badzra he ru ka badzra sa ma ya hri sar+b+ba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu tra pra ban dza ha hU~M ru lu ru lu b+h+yo hU~M hUM phaT/ sa sbyang ba'i dus su gtor ma gtang ba'i sngags so/ /

oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Tha na i dam sU tra tiSh+Tha mA tsa la he he bud d+ha ka pA la badzra he ru ka hU~M hU~M Tha Tha/ sngags 'dis lan bdun du srad bu la mngon par bsngags par bya'o/ /thig skud kyi sngags so/ /gru bzhi pa la

sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /kha khyer snam bu spangs pa la/ /ba dan rnam pa brgyad kyis brgyan/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdul tshon gzhan dang 'dres med pa'i/ /rdul tshon dmar

por rdzogs par bya/ /de ru bum pa bzhi po rnams/ /grwa dang grwa ru rnam par bzhag /bum par mtshan ma bri bya ba/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M ga /gri gug dang ni cang te'u dang / /cang te'u gnas su rdo rje bri/ /rdo rje'i
steng du 'dam skyes te/ /de ltar bum par bri byas nas/ /chu yis yongs su dgang bar bya/ /bum pa la ni ras kyis brgyan/ /rin chen rnam pa lnga gzhug cing / /bum par kun nas 'bru lnga dang / /a

mra'i lcug mas dgab par bya/ /de nas 'o ma'i snod bzhag ste/ /rdo rje slob dpon blo chen gyis/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor dang ldan/ /pad ma'i steng du nyi ma ste/ /nyi ma'i steng du hU~M yig bsam/ /

hU~M gyur pa las rdo rje ni/ /sngon po hU~M gi bdag nyid skyes/ /hU~M dang rdo rje gyur dpa' bo/ /he ru ka ni bdag nyid che/ /sku mdog sngon po phyag bzhi pa/ /gtso bo chen po zhal gcig pa/ /g.yas na gri gug thod pa ste/ /

g.yon na kha T+wA~M rdo rje'o/ /sku la mi yi rus pas brgyan/ /klu rnams skrag par byed pa po/ /skyil dkrung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs/ /gcer bu 'jigs byed rang bzhin te/ /zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/ /

dbu skra ser zhing gyen du 'bar/ /thod pas spyi bo brgyan byas pa/ /sa 'og bdun ni 'khrug par byed/ /dpa' bo de ltar bsam par bya/ /phyis ni phyogs kyi 'dab ma la/ /oM dang hU~M dang kha~M dang swa/ /yi ge yongs su gyur

pa las/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rnam pa bzhi/ /sna tshogs sde ma 'dod can ma/ /sa 'og gnas ma rab bzang ma/ /lha mo de dag mdog sngon mo/ /grags chen zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bzhugs/ /

g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /g.yas na gri gug thod pa 'dzin/ /g.yon na kha T+wA~M cang te'u/ /rus rgyan lha mo kun 'jigs ma/ /zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/ /stag gi lpags pa'i na bza' mnabs/ /

skra ni ser po gyen du 'bar/ /thod pa'i phreng bas spyi bor brgyan/ /de rnams mgo rgyus phreng ba can/ /lha mo'i 'od zer spros gyur pas/ /klu rnams skrag par mdzad pa mo/ /phyogs kyi 'dab bzhugs cher bzhad ma'o/ /blo ldan

mtshams kyi 'dab bzang la/ /nyi ma bzhi la hU~M yig bzhi/ /hU~M yig so sor gyur pa las/ /chang 'tshong ma dang 'byung po ma/ /bzhin bzang nam mkhar 'gro ma ste/ /mtshams kyi 'dab mar gnas lha mo/ /kha dog ser mo
grags chen mo/ /thams cad na bza' ser mo mnabs/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnas/ /zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma/ /klu brgyad brgyan byas lha mo ni/ /g.yas na gri gug cang te'u 'dzin/ /g.yon

na kha T+wA~M thod pa'o/ /sku las 'od zer ser po 'phro/ /shin du sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan/ /cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /thams cad gar byed skra ser ma/ /klu rnams skrag par skyed byed ma/ /mtshams kyi cha ru
rnam par gnas/ /de nas bsam par bya ba ni/ /slob dpon he ru kas rang gi lus las skyes pa'i 'od kyis phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang dag par reg par byas nas slar
log ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang dag par reg pa'i 'od zer las lha mo'i tshogs yang dag par spros pas he ru ka dang rnal 'byor brgyad lhan cig tu bkrus so/ /bkrus pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs

pa rnams cod pan du gyur to/ /dkyil 'khor rdzogs par mthong nas ni/ /slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis/ /phyis ni gtor ma btang bar bya/ /khyad par du ni 'o ma'o/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ldan pa'i/ /shes rab can

gyis chang btung zhing / /mar me bzhi ni dbul bar bya/ /'bras bu bzhi yang dbul bya zhing / /de nas slob ma blo chen gyis/ /ras zung gsum ni dbul bar bya/ /der ni gdan yang bstab par bya/ /slob dpon bdag nyid

chen po yis/ /de ru rnal 'byor ma mchod do/ /blo gros chen po thugs dgyes pas/ /sna tshogs zas dang sna tshogs skom/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshim bya/ /mgu bar sems pa'i yid kyis ni/ /'khor lo khyad par
che bya ste/ /phyis ni slob dpon brtse chen bdag /phyi rol sa ru byung nas ni/ /bde ba yi ni gdan bzhugs te/ /slob mas maN Dal gsum byas la/ /zhabs la spyis gtugs 'di skad gsol/ /ston pa
bcom ldan bla ma kyai/ /sems can don la gcig brtson pa/ /nam mkha' lding bzang sbyor ba dang / sha ri ka yi sbyor ba 'tshal/ /dus su zin pa bzlog pa yin/ /sems can don ni bzang po 'tshal/ /sangs

rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /ston pa chen pos de dag gsungs/ /bdag gi the tshom bzlog pa dang / /sems can don ni mthar thug bgyi/ /brtan pa dang ni rgyu ba dang / /yan lag skyes dang bcos ma yi/ /dug rnams

dug med par bgyi zhing / /sems can thams cad 'tsho bgyi ba/ /bla ma chen po de dag gsungs/ /de nas slob dpon brtse ba yis/ /byin gyis brlab pa'i thugs kyis ni/ /khrag 'thung go 'phang gnas pa yi/ /slob ma la ni so shing

sbyin/ /so shing sngags ni sbyin par bya/ /oM hU~M he b+ha ga ba ti mu kha~M pa ri shud d+ha~M ku ru swA hA/ lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas la/ /so brud nas ni kha bshal te/ /slob ma lhag par gnas par bya/ /rang gi lag pa byug bya zhing / /

me tog gis kyang dkri bar bya/ /mgrin pa lag par zla ba bsam/ /zla ba'i zer gyis phyogs bcu yi/ /sangs rgyas spyan drangs gdon mi za/ /sangs rgyas tshogs kun zla bar blta/ /grags chen thams cad rab zhugs shing / /zla ba zhu

bar gdon mi za/ /slob dpon bsgoms pa'i nus pa yis/ /slob ma'i mgo ru lag bzhag ste/ /lhag par gnas pa'i gsang sngags bzlas/ /oM sar+b+ba bud+d+ha a tra a mu ka s+ya kA ya ma d+hiSh+Tha na/ yan du mA tsa la mA tsa la

tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ha ra ha ra/ bi d+ha ra bi d+ha ra/ d+ha ra tra ba tra ba b+ho b+ha ga wAn ta sar+b+ba bud+d+ha ka pA li badzra s+ya ka ta~M ma la ya shI g+h+ra~M ku ru ku ru hU~M hU~M ha ha/ sngags 'dis lan bdun du bzlas pas lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /sangs

rgyas de dag thams cad kyis de'i lus la yang dag par byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /lhag par gnas pa tsam gyis rdzu 'phrul chen po'i klu rnams skrag cing dug gi bum pa yang 'dor ro/ /nor rgyas la sogs pa'i klu
stobs po che rnams dpyod par 'gyur ro/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i/ /lhag par gnas pa tsam gyis ni/ /'di lta'i sdug bsngal thob 'gyur na/ /mkha' lding rtogs pa'i sems can gyis/ /

bdag ni ji ltar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de ma thag tu slob dpon gyis/ /dkyil 'khor nang du me tog ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dbul bar bya/ /sna tshogs spos dang lha bshos dbul/ /dung chos zangs chos snod dag ni/ /
man ji'i steng du gzhag par bya'o/ /mchod yon gyis ni don ched du/ /bum pa rnams la lhag gnas bya/ /khrag 'thung go 'phang gnas pa yis/ /rnal 'byor ma brgyad bskor ba yi/ /khrag 'thung rnam
par spyan drangs te/ /dkyil 'khor ji bzhin yang dag ldan/ /mdog dang mtshan mar ldan pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams sa bon gyi/ /'od zer gyis ni rnam par bsam/ /bdag nyid chen po grags chen po/ /bum

pa ru ni zhugs tsam gyis/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor zhu bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa'i sems dang ni/ /slob dpon gyis ni 'di ltar blta/ /de nas zangs ma'i snod du chu blugs shing dung phor chus bkang ste/

man ja'i steng du gzhag par bya'o/ /yang phyir byung nas slob ma'i don du bdag nyid kyis ras kyis mig dgab par bya'o/ /ras gsum gon par gyur pa'i slob ma phyis dkyil 'khor gyi sgor bzhag la chus gtor te sngags

bzla'o/ /a b+hi Shiny+tsan+tu mA~M sarba yo gi ni ma ku to a tra a tiSh+Tha yan+tu a tsan+tu hU~M swA hA/ cod pan byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/ /de nas slob dpon gyis kyai khyod su zhes smra'o/ /slob mas bdag ni rgyal

ba'i sras zhes smra'o/ /de'i rjes su dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su me tog lan gsum du gtor la/ mig ras bsal te/ dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o/ /oM he ru ka badzra puSh+pa ya~M pra tIts+tsha hU~M/ dbus su'o/ /oM

tsi tra se nA puSh+pa ya~M pra tIts+tsha hU~M/ shar du'o/ /oM kA mi nI puSh+pa ya~M pra tIts+tsha hU~M/ lho'i'o/ /oM pa tA la bA si ni puSh+pa ya~M pra tIts+tsha hU~M/ nub du'o/ /oM su b+ha dre puSh+pa ya~M pra tIts+tsha hU~M/ byang du'o/ /oM shoN+Di ni puSh+pa

ya~M pra tIts+tsha hU~M/ mer ro/ /oM bud+d+hI ni puSh+pa pra tIts+tsha hU~M/ bden bral du'o/ /oM tsa tu ra b+ha dra puSh+pa pra tIts+tsha hU~M/ rlung ngo / /oM A kA sha b+ha si ni puSh+pa pra tIts+tsha hU~M/ dbang ldan du'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i sku mdog

ji lta ba dang / mtshan ma la sogs pa de bzhin du slob ma la bstan par bya'o/ /yang dung phor blangs te chu btung bar bya'o/ /de 'thungs pa tsam gyis klu thams cad skrag cing skyo bas dug skyugs par 'gyur ro/ /brtan pa dang g.yo

ba'i dug gang yin pa dang / gzhan yang sbyar ba dang / nye bar sbyar ba'i dug gang yin pa dang / mda' dug dang / byug pa'i dug dang / dgra rnams kyis gang sbyar ba dang / bud med rnams kyis gang sbyar ba'i dug de

rnams nye bar 'pho bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te klu yis zin pa yang / /de ru de ni nges par 'gro/ /gzhan yang sbrul gyi dug kyang rung / /chu ni 'thungs pa tsam gyis kyang / /de dag thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de yi
phyir na dug gi chu/ /'di ru btung bar the tshom med/ /de nas slob ma dri bar bya/ /'dir ni sha li kar byed cing / /mkha' lding shes pa'i slob dpon 'gyur/ /bsam pa rnam par dag shes nas/ /phyis
ni bkas gnang sbyin par bya/ /stong ngam brgya ru gsol ba gdab/ /de nas sngags kyi man ngag sbyin/ /ji srid sbrul gyis zin dus dang / /ji srid mkha' lding rigs yod par/ /de srid de dang de
las kyang / /ji srid dus su zin med par/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /de srid 'bad rtsol bya ba min/ /dus zin 'chi ba'ang shes bya ste/ /nam mkha' lding gi bya ba bya/ /dus su
zin no zhes smra ba/ /de srid rnal 'byor che 'di yis/ /de ru las ni brtsam par bya/ /bdag nyid he ru kar gyur cing / /rnal 'byor ma brgyad yang dag ldan/ /blo ldan sngon gsungs gsang sngags kyis/ /
phyis ni gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /der rjes dkyil 'khor byas nas ni/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i gsang sngags kyis/ /gnas dgu ru ni mchod par bya/ /mkhas pa yis ni mchod byas rjes/ /mnyam par
bzhag pas las rnams brtsam/ /gang du rdzu 'phrul che klu yang / /de ru sems bzang 'od zer spro/ /klu rnams kyi ni snying skams pas/ /ci zhig bgyi'o zhes ni smra/ /gsungs pa/ lha mo sna tshogs sde ma

yis/ /sangs rgyas thod par sngon du gsungs/ /kye kye grags pa che ba'i klu/ /song ste 'dir dus zin gyur pa'i/ /dus zin 'dzin pa bzung ba med/ /dug med sbrul yang med pa'o/ /gang phyir dogs pas rmongs gyur pa/ /

de phyir skye bo rnams 'chir 'gyur/ /de nas 'od zer slar log ste/ /snying ga ru ni thim par 'gyur/ /yang ni sems ni mnyam bzhag pa'i/ /slob dpon gyis ni ngo mtshar bstan/ /de nas sa la ma lhung ba'i lci ba blangs te

'dab chags ri skegs gnyis bya zhing snod dkar po byas te/ ro bsregs pa'i sol ba la gzhag par bya'o/ /ro bsregs pa'i sol ba las snag tsha byas te/ sems can gyi don rig pas dben par sngags bri bar bya'o/ /

oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni hri taT+Tha ba ya b+ho sha li ka na a na ya nA bud+d+ha ka pA la badzra s+ya A dz+nyA ma la~M g+ha ya hU~M hU~M sa ran+tu sar+b+ba da DI ka pha ti ka tse te/ man+d+h+ya g+hi di sar+b+ba dzi i na su nan+ti ba ya ga re re kar ko Ta ka pra b+hi ta ya nA ga

rA dza na spu tan+ti murda na re re sa spya/ a ba sa spya ma tsa la ha ma bu la ha dza i tsa la ha bu la ha re re b+ha ru kri pra b+hi ta ya nA ga rA dza na u ha pu Ta Ta mu d+hi pra na dza i zhes pa ni sha li ka'i snying po'i sngags so/ /de nas blo chen
rnal 'byor pas/ /sems ni shin du mnyam bzhag pas/ /yongs rdzogs sha li ka byas la/ /pho dang mo ru brtag par bya/ /snag tsha yis ni bri bar bya/ /mig gi sngon du mi gzhag cing / /sha li ka bzang

phyogs blta/ /de nas lcug ma sngags kyis bsngags/ /oM ha~M ha la khyab 'jug gi sa bon no/ /oM ba~M tshangs pa'i sa bon no/ /oM sa~M zhes pa ni zhi byed kyi sa bon no/ /oM ha ha ha ha ha ha ha~M/ mngag pa'i sngags so/ /'di lta bu yi

sngags kyi mchog /stong gsum na yang rnyed par dka'/ /lan bdun bsngags pa tsam gyis ni/ /'gro bar 'dir ni the tshom med/ /klu rnams skrag par byed pa yi/ /mkha' lding nyams dga' song nas ni/ /klu yi gnas su zhugs de'i tshe/ /

mkha' lding bye ba'i stobs dang ldan/ /rings nas kyang ni gshog rlung gis/ /stobs po che yi klu rnams skrag /mtho ris mi yul sa 'og dang / /gang yang gzhan na gnas pa dang / /gzhan yang rung ste de thams cad/ /skrag nas ci bgyi zhes ni

smra/ /klu gang gis zin pa de gal te yang shi na/ bdag nyid chen po sha li ka mthong ma thag long bar 'gyur ro/ /klu dang sbrul de dag gis sha li ka la 'di skad gsol to/ /kyai sha li ka gzhan du gsung bar ma mdzad cig /de ltar thos nas

sha li ka mgu ba'i sems kyis dug gis zin pa'i mdun du sbrul long ba khyer te 'jog go/ /de nas slob dpon gyis bltas te/ sa'i gong bu blangs la sha li ka mngag pa'i sngags kyis sbrul long ba la bsnun na/ /skad cig de nyid la

de'i mig 'bye bar 'dir som nyi med do/ /dus su zin pa 'gyel te shi ba sbrul gyis mthong nas de'i lus la 'gro ba dang 'ong bar byed pas dus su zin pa dug med par 'gyur zhing / dga' ba'i sems kyis ldang ngo / /zin pa langs

pa tsam nyid na sha li kas sbrul bzung ste mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /skad cig ma de nyid la slob dpon gyis stong pa nyid kyi ye shes sgom par bya'o/ /stong pa dri med kun rang bzhin/ /chos rnams stong pa'i rang bzhin kyai/ /gang gis 'dzin cing

gang zhig 'dzin/ /mtha' dag sgyu ma'i rang bzhin kyai/ /dngos po ma lus pa mtha' dag dang dug kyang stong pa nyid du sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud las gsungs te/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi mthar thug par ji srid du lus ma zhig pa de

srid du slob dpon gyis yang dag par brtsam par bya'o/ /de ltar slob ma la rjes su gnang ba byin nas phyis lung bstan par bya'o/ /des lan brgya'am stong du gsol ba btab nas/ dug 'joms pa'i sngags bstan par bya'o/ / oM

bud+d+ha ka pA li ni a hU~M/ dug bza' ba'i sngags so/ /de nas gzhan yang don du gnyer ba'i sems can de rnams thams cad la dkyil 'khor bstan te/ dung phor gyi chu 'thungs pa des na dug med par 'gyur te/ sbrul gyis ma 'dzin

no/ /gal te 'dzin na de'i tshe klu 'chi bar 'dir the tshom med do/ /de ltar slob ma sha li ka'i sbyor ba la mngon par brtson pa la bkas gnang ba byin te/ grong gang du gnas pa der dug gis 'dzin pa med do/ /gal te yod na de'i tshe klu 'chi

bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar thos nas slob ma rdo rje'i sbyor ba dang / ldan pa'i sems kyis gang ci yang rung ba'i yon der dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas phyi rol gyi sar byung ste gtor ma btang bar bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi

sngags kyis gshegs su gsol te/ oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni hr-I u taSh+Tha gats+tsha hU~M gats+tsha hU~M phaT/ dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /chu yi sbyor ba bla med pa/ /gang gis byin pa tsam gyis

ni/ /dug gis zin pa 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /nyi ma bdun na 'chi ba dang / /gzhan yang dug gis nyams pa rnams/ /chu ni byin pa tsam gyis ni/ /'di ru 'tsho bar the tshom med/ /sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor byas nas ni/ /gnas dgu
rnams su mchod par bya/ /dung phor chu yis bkang byas pa/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag par bya/ /de nas brtse ba chen po yi/ /bdag nyid rnal 'byor pa yis ni/ /rang gi lag pa g.yon pa la/ /zla ba yi ni
khyad par bsam/ /bcu drug cha las yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /dri med dge ba'i lus can te/ /de'i dbus sa bon mi shigs dge/ kha dog dkar po'i lus can no/ /lag des snod kyi kha bcad de/ /de nas gsang sngags

bzla bar bya/ /oM sar+b+ba bi Sha ha ra ha ra hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ sngags 'dis lan bdun gyi bar du mngon par bsngags te/ mi shigs pa dang lhan cig zla ba zhu bar gyur nas chu'i nang du thim ste/ chu dang zla ba gcig tu

'dres pas shin du dkar por 'gyur ro/ /gal te dug gis zin pa ma shi na de'i che chu blud do/ /yang na shi ba yin na mgo nas rkang pa'i mthar thug par lan gsum gsum du chu rgyun mi chad par blugs na langs par 'dir the tshom

med do/ /de nas chu blud na rnal mar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las sha li ka'i sbyor ba dang / chu'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //

de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /shin du rnyed dka'i bcud len le'u/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mchog /rnal 'byor ma yi gong na med/ /gzhon nu ma dang sha ri ka /grub ma byis pa can ma dang / /de bzhin

thod bzangs can ma'o/ /'di dag sman ni chen po lnga/ /sangs rgyas las kyang rnyed par dka'/ /'di dag zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /bskal pa bye bar de 'tsho'o/ /gzhon nu ma ni zla drug tu/ /de bzhin sha ri ka zla

gsum/ /grub ma zla ba gcig tu'o/ /byis can ma ni zla phyed gnyis/ /thod pa can yang zla bar te/ /tshe 'phel ba yi mchog yin no/ /bya rog ma ni bya rog gzugs/ /glang po ma ni ngang pa'i gzugs/ /drod ma drod kyi
gzugs can te/ /sngo bsangs dkar mo sngon mo'i mig /kha sbyar sbyor ba'i dus su ni/ /mig las byung ba'i rdzas gang yin/ /sman de'i ming ni gzhon nu ma/ /'di ru bstan par som nye med/ /de yi pad ma las
byung rdzas/ /rtsa yi nang na rnam par gnas/ /ge sar sbas pa'i spyod yul te/ /sman ni sha ri ka ru gsungs/ /me tog ldan pa'i bu mo gang / /kha dog nag mos rab mdzes ma/ /gang du thabs shes gnyis 'dus

pa/ /de yi kha sbyor sbyor las byung / /sman de'i ming ni grub mar bshad/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bud med rab mdzes ma nyams dang / /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /mi phyed nye bar spyad pa yi/ /
