de las dang por byung ba'i rdzas/ /sman de byis pa can no zhes/ /bdag nyid chen po'i lha mos gsungs/ /lhan gcig skyes dag byung ba'i rdzas/ /mchog chen mar khu dag dang ni/ /bsre 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom

med/ /sman de'i ming ni thod can mo'o/ /zla ba nyi ma'i sbyor ba yis/ /bya bar 'dir ni the tshom med/ /zla bas zla bar nyi mas nyir/ /de lus skra dkar gnyer ma zhi/ /ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar/ /de yi tshe ni

rgyas par 'gyur/ /sman 'di grub pa tsam gyis ni/ /dag pa'i lus su 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dngos po gang dang gang yang rung / /lcags dang zangs ma'i snod dag la/ /dngul ni byugs pa tsam gyis ni/ /dngul dang

gser du 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /dgongs bshad shin du rnyed dka' ba/ /rgyud gzhan du ni rab sbas pa/ /'bad pas de 'dir rab gsal bya/ /dri chu ye shes rdo rje ste/ /dri chen rdo rje bzang po

nyid/ /khrag ni mar me rdo rje yin/ /khu ba rdo rje'i thabs byung nyid/ /sha ni chos kyi rdo rje yin/ /de lnga rnal 'byor ma yi mchog /gang gi dam tshig rnyed dka' ba'i/ /thabs 'dir bdag gis bshad par bya/ /ba lang

sha ni 'bar ba ste/ /khyi yi sha la spro bar gsungs/ /rta yi sha la bza' bar bshad/ /glang po'i sha la zhu bar gsungs/ /sha chen la ni bzang por bshad/ /de lnga rnal 'byor mchog tu gsungs/ /rnal 'byor rnal

'byor ma ldan par/ /gal te gcig tu byed nus pa/ /de tshe rnam rtog de thams cad/ /'jig 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /zan la bsod nams zhes bya ste/ /tshod ma la ni sdig pa nyid/ /ro la shin tu rnyed dka'

gsungs/ /byis pa la ni 'gal ba nyid/ /g.yung mo la ni bzang mor gsungs/ /rus pa'i phreng la rdzas zhes bya/ /skyes bu la ni rdo rjer gsungs/ /bud med la ni snod bzang nyid/ /dbang po gnyis kyi rab sbyor la/ /gzi

brjid phreng chen de bshad do/ /rab chags shin tu mthong ba nyid/ /'khyud pa la ni chos zhes brjod/ /'dri ba la ni mar me'o/ /shin du 'dri la me zhes bya/ /'gro ba la ni phreng can ma/ /'ong la shin tu phreng can ma/ /myur ba la ni byug

ces bya/ /dpa' ba la ni bzang de brjod/ /pad ma rtse 'jo phreng can ma/ /sngags kyis mtshan ma rab nges zhe'o/ /ljag la lce 'og ces bya ste/ /so la bza' ba sna la bde/ /mig la rol rtsed mu tig rna/ /gsang ba'i yul la

rnyed dka' zhe'o/ /'di dag bshad do lag chen po/ /'jig rten gsum na rab rnyed dka'/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /med par phan tshun smra mi bya/ /'on kyang bshad chen de nyid 'di/ /gcig la gcig gis smra bar

bya/ /rgyud rnams thams cad du sbas pa/ /rgyud 'di ru ni gsal bar byas/ /nye 'dun grong mtha' lhan cig zhe'o/ /'dus pa phyi rol zhes su gsungs/ /nye ba'i 'dus pa nang de bzhin/ /gnas la 'bras bu zhes su gsungs/ /

nye ba'i gnas la shing nyid do/ /grong mtha' la ni sa bon gsungs/ /nye ba'i grong mtha' myu gu'o/ /tshogs pa la ni sdong bur gsungs/ /gcig pu la ni 'dab ma ste/ /stong pa la ni rtsa bzhi'o/ /de ltar dgongs pas bshad pa ni/ /

bde gshegs rnams kyis mi mkhyen no/ /spyan ma la sogs rnal 'byor ma/ /rnams kyi khong du mi chud cing / /byang chub sems dpa'i yul min zhing / /bla ma gus pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /spros pa thams cad spangs nas

ni/ /rdzas la chags par mi bya'o/ /shin du stong sgom rnal 'byor pa/ /'dod chags zhe sdang phrag dog med/ /gti mug dang ni nga rgyal spangs/ /nyon mongs thams cad rnam par spangs/ /za 'thung de bzhin glu len

na/ /shin du spros pa spangs bar bya/ /bde bas dga' ba nyid dang ni/ /shes rab thabs kyis bdag nyid gsungs/ /bla med de nyid zla phyed kyis/ /'grub par the tshom med pa'o/ /kyai lags grogs mo 'gro kun

gang / /mtha' dag dri ma med pa yi/ /blta dang bral la skye bo ltos/ /gsog gsob rang bzhin brdzun bslu ba/ /pad rtsa'i grib ma lta bur ltos/ /dbang po lnga ni sgyu 'dra zhing / /lnga phung dag pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /

rnal 'byor 'di ni bsgoms pas 'grub/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin du gsang ba zhes bya ba las sman bzang po dang / dgongs pa bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //
de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa mchog gsang bar/ /thabs dang shes rab sgrub pa yis/ /gang gis slob ma dbang bskur ba/ /shes rab pad ma'i nang dbus su/ /dpag tshad bye ba'i dkyil
'khor la/ /gsum rtsegs dag pa'i bdag nyid lus/ /'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus gnas par/ /mkhas pas slob ma bzang dbang bskur/ /gal te byang chub bla med 'dod/ /

phyi yi dkyil 'khor bya ba min/ /lha rnams bshig pa tsam gyis ni/ /sdig pa chen po skye bar 'gyur/ /des na rdul tshon tsam gyis ni/ /de bzhin lha rnams dag mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang / /de bzhin
pad ma ral gri nyid/ /byas nas slar yang 'jig byed pa/ /skyes bu tha shal dmyal bar 'gro/ /gang gis sangs rgyas spyan drangs shing / /gang gis gshegs su gsol ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' byon
pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa rnams/ /gang na'ang byon pa ma yin no/ /dri ma med cing dag pa'i lus/ /gang gis spyan drangs gshegs su gsol/ /de nyid kyis na brtag med par/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa rnams phyag bya/ /lo bcu gnyis pa'i bu mo ni/ /tshul khrims ma nyams chags chung ba'i/ /thos dang ldan zhing grags chen mo/ /nad med snying rje dang ldan ma/ /sems can don la gcig nan tan/ /

dgod cing pad ma'i spyan dang ldan/ /zla ba'i cha 'dra gdong mdzes ma/ /mu cor mi smra brtan zhing dul/ /des na slob ma blo chen po/ /shin du dad pa'i sems dang ldan/ /'dod med dbang po dul ba dang / /chags dang chags bral

rnam par spangs/ /sems can don la shin tu sbyor/ /gti mug zhe sdang phrag dog spangs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /de rnams la ni de nyid bshad/ /gsang ba phyi yi lnga dang ni/ /bdun dang bcu bzhir bshad pa

dang / /gnyi ga gcig tu 'dus pa'o/ /gsang ba'i de nyid bshad par bya/ /slob ma legs dang ldan pa dang / /brtse ldan sems gzhan med pa yis/ /gser ni 'bum phrag bcu drug dang / /sa gzhi yul 'khor ldan pa

dang / /glang po bud med dam pa dang / /ral gri 'khor lo rta dang ni/ /yongs 'dren skyes bu rin chen rnams/ /sbyor dang ldan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /der ni bla ma dbul bar bya/ /shin tu dri med sems kyis ni/ /de nas 'dir

ni gsol ba gdab/ /'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba bdag /dpung gnyen khyod kyis bsgral du gsol/ /bdag ni rtsol chung skal dman zhing / /sangs rgyas chos ni rnam par spangs/ /kye kye ston pa bla ma che/ /mgon
po khyod kyis brtse bar mdzod/ /de ltar gsol 'debs tshig gsan nas/ /de ru bla ma mi gsungs bzhugs/ /man ngag 'di yi cha dag ni/ /glegs bam rnams las spyod yul min/ /dkyil 'khor gang la gang gis

brgyan/ /mtshan ma'i don gzhan gar bkod kye/ /su yis sangs rgyas spyan drangs kye/ /'gro ba brdzun 'dra'i som nyir lhung / /mtha' dag stong pa gos med kye/ /chu nang zla ba ci 'dra ba/ /de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor pad dbus

gnas/ /kye lags rnal 'byor ma tshogs ltos/ /der ni he ru ka gcig dang / /thams cad skyed par byed pa yin/ /'gro kun rmi lam bslu bas na/ /gti mug las ni bskyed pa ltos/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal
'byor ma'i gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin du gsang ba las dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri ba dang / slob ma dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /ri dang

phug dang tshang tshing ngam/ /yang na dur khrod dag na ni/ /gdod nas grub pa'i gnas su 'am/ /'on te rgya mtsho'i 'gram dag tu/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor bla med bri/ /rdul tshon sngon po ni ro sregs pa'i sol ba las bya'o/ /rdul

mtshon dmar po ni dur khrod kyi so phag las bya'o/ /rdul tshon ljang khu ni nim pa'i mdab ma las bya'o/ /rdul tshon dkar po ni mi'i rus pa'i phye ma las bya'o/ /rdul tshon ser po ni yung ba'i phye ma las bya'o/ /de ltar

rdul tshon lnga rnams kyis/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /pho brang rigs gsum zlum po la/ /rdo rje gsum gyis yongs su bskor/ /phyi rol gru bzhi lham pa yi/ /sgo bzhir rta babs rnams kyis brgyan/ /ba dan

rnam pa bzhi yis brgyan/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras/ /phyi rol kha khyer dag pa dang / /rin chen pha gur yang dag ldan/ /pad ma nyi shu nyi shu lnga'i/ /gdan rnams kyis ni shin tu mdzes/ /de yi dbus chud sa bon ni/ /yig ge hU~M gi

rang bzhin sngo/ /skad cig tsam gyis he ru ka /sku mdog sngon po grags chen po/ /g.yas na cang te'u gri gug ste/ /g.yon na kha T+wA~M thod pa'o/ /dkyil dkrung phyed pas 'jigs chen po/ /zhal gyis mche ba

cung zad gtsigs/ /ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan cing / /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/ /dbu la sna tshogs rdo rje mnan/ /zla ba phyed pa 'dzin pa'i lha/ /sku la thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs/ /dpa' bo phyag
bzhi phyag mtshan 'chang / /shin du hU~M sgrogs 'jigs byed pa/ /gar gyi stabs kyis rnam par bzhugs/ /mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng ba can/ /mchod phyir thod pa 'chang ba po/ /thod pa gti mug rnam dag pa/ /

phreng ba brgyud pas brgyan pa'i lha/ /mgul do dang ni 'khor lo dang / /rkang rdub dang ni dpung brgyan dang / /gdub bu sked pa'i ska rags dang / /dpa' bo rna cha mchog gis brgyan/ /'di 'dra'i gzugs can gtso

bo ni/ /hU~M zhes zlos par byed pa'o/ /de las byung ba'i rnal 'byor ma/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid rnams/ /sku mdog sngon mo grags chen mo/ /shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis
thod pa 'chang / /so so yi ni ming ji bzhin/ /de rnams ming ni rab tu bshad/ phreng bzangs ma/ 'dod can ma/ 'jigs ma/ thub dka' ma/ dge ba'i ska rags can ma/ gzugs can ma/ rnam rgyal ma/
'byung gnas ma/ thod can ma/ mtsho chen ma/ byed ma/ gsod ma/ sgrol ma/ 'jigs ma/ mthong ma/ mi pham ma/ dge ma/ 'dzur byed ma/ dus mtshan ma/ grags chen ma/ mdzes sdug ma/
nor 'dzin ma/ skal bzang ma/ grags mthong ma'o/ /'di lta bu'i dkyil 'khor mchog /kha dog rnam pa lnga yis brgyan/ /de'i dbus gnas lha mo ni/ /he ru ka la bde ster ma/ /dkyil dkrung
phyed pa'i gar byed ma/ /mi yi rus pa'i phreng bas brgyan/ /lha mo 'od zer dpag dka' zhing / /skra ser gyen du 'bar ba ste/ /hU~M gi bdag nyid las skyes 'jigs/ /zhal nas khrag ni mthor byed

ma/ /dkar mo nag mo ljang khu ma/ /thams cad khu ba ldan gyur ma/ /lha'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid gsungs/ /bdag nyid he ru ka gzugs la/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'-i lha mos mchod/ /

thod pa bdud rtsi lngas bkang ba/ /he ru ka yis btung bar bya/ /de yis 'thungs pa tsam gyis ni/ /'gro ba'i bla ma bdag nyid che/ /gtso bo las gzhan tha dad gzugs/ /rnal 'byor ma kun de dang 'dra/ /de ltar

he ru ka mgon pos/ /rnal 'byor ma kun spyad par bya/ /thams cad spyad pas zhu gyur te/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par gnas/ /de ni zhu bar mthong nas ni/ /shin tu srid pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /sgo yi rnal 'byor ma

yis bskul/ /ci ste 'jig rten snyan mnan na/ /ci phyir khyod ni mi dgyes gyur/ /gal te khyod bdag tshig gsan na/ /mi dgyes gyur pa mtha' dag thong / /srid 'jigs skye bo kun lhung bas/ /stong pa'i thugs ni ma

mdzad par/ /nyid kyi dgongs pa kun bsgrubs kye/ /rnal 'byor ma yi grogs po bzhengs/ /gal te spyod gtso tshig gsan na/ /'bras bu yal bar ma dor cig /khyod mi snang na 'gro ba yi/ /skye bo mtha' dag gdung

bas non/ /log pa'i nga rgyal ma mdzad par/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin spangs nas ni/ /khyod kyis dngos med kun thong la/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs la spyod/ /rnal 'byor ma ni bzhi po yis/ /'di lta bu yi glu yis
bskul/ /sngon bzhin mdog dang mtshan sogs ldan/ /kun nas rnal 'byor ma rnams bskor/ /'jigs pa 'khor ba sgrol byed pa'i/ /dpa' bo chen po 'di bzhengs so/ /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i

rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin du gsang ba las/ dkyil 'khor dang he ru ka bskyed pa dang bsgom pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas yang dag rab bshad bya/ /sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor

mchog bzang po/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod de/ /sbyin sregs rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs/ /shing gi sbyin sreg mi bya zhing / /'bras dang 'bru rnams kyis kyang min/ /blo ldan

gal te zhi 'dod na/ /me tog gis ni sbyin sreg bya/ /me tog lnga po mchog chen dang / /'o mar yang dag ldan pas bya/ /gal te zhi ba'i sbyin sreg 'dod/ /zhi ba'i gzugs sogs ldan pa yis/ /zhi ba'i thab khung gru bzhi pa/ /

zab dang rgyar ni mtho gang ba/ /kha la rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /dkar po rtse mo 'dus pa bri/ /rdo rje rtse gsum sngon po ni/ /zhi ba hU~M bdag 'khor bar ni/ /de yi dbus su 'khor lo la/ /gru gsum pa yi yi ges brgyan/ /e ba~M ma ya mchog

chen gyi/ /lte ba ru ni bskyed par gsungs/ /rtse gsum 'jigs pa'i rdo rjes bskor/ /rdo rje'i nang du pad ma ste/ /pad ma'i dbus su nyi ma bsam/ /nyi ma'i dbus su yi ge hU~M/ /kha dog dmar po'i 'od chen po/ /mtshams dang

mtshams su rdo rje ni/ /rtse dgu ser po bri bar bya/ /bdag nyid he ru kar blta ste/ /phyis ni sbyin sreg yang dag brtsam/ /shes rab can gyis me yi lha/ /sngags 'di yis ni spyan drang ngo / /oM sar+b+ba de ba hu ta pra d+he ni a~M bi kal su

da ha da ha ne da ha da ha dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ ya tri kun+ne a d+hiSh+Tha ya/ a d+hiSh+Tha ya/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ki li ki li/ ha he ho ha~M hraHhriHhU~M swA hA/ me lha spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /

shes rab can sngags lan bdun bzlas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs shing / /mdog dkar du ba dang bral ba'i/ /me lha rgyal dbang byon nas kyang / /thab khung gi ni dbus su bzhug /de nas blo ldan sbyin sreg bya/ /de ru

sol ba bzhug bya ba/ /a shwat+tha dang n+ya gro dang / /u dum ba ra ra ka ti/ pa la sha ste shing lnga las/ sol byas du med 'bar ba'i me/ blo ldan thab khung dbus su gzhug /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /pad ma brgya ni

rtsa brgyad dang / /de bzhin ut+pa la nyid dang / /ku mu da dmar dri zhim 'dra/ /ka ra bi ra gzhan nyis 'gyur/ /byas te bsregs pas zhi bar gsungs/ /sbyin bdag mdun na 'dug pa la/ /de tshe du ba dbab par bya/ /mkhas

pas gsang sngags 'di bton zhing / /pad ma mar sbags sreg par bya/ /oM pad+ma ra dze ag+ni pra Ni ya a mu ka s+ya shAn+ti~M ku ru swA hA/ mkhas pa yis ni sngags bzlas te/ /ut+pal 'o mas sbyin bsreg bya/ /oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA

ta ya te dzo rA dza bi na ya shAn+ti~M ku ru swA hA/ mkhas pa bde gshegs kun bdag gis/ /gur gum ku mu da sngags bsreg /oM su puSh+pe su ka ra tsa le dz+wa la nI ye shAn+ti~M ku ru swA hA/ gsang sngags rgyal po 'di

yis ni/ /dri zhim tsan dan sbyin bsreg bya/ /oM d+ha me ma hA me rA dze da ha da ha sarba bi g+hA shAn+ti~M ku ru swA hA/ ka ra bI ra dri zhim mar/ /mkhas pas sngags rgyal bzlas te bsreg /oM kA li su kA li ka rA la rA tri sar+b+ba pA pa~M da ha da ha shAn+ti~M ku ru

swA hA/ me tog re re re re la/ /gsang sngags rgyal po lan re bzla/ /zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg bla med pa/ /'jig rten gsum na rnyed par dka'/ /me ni 'o mas zhi bar bya/ /de nas gzhan yang rgyas pa yi/ /sbyin sreg khyad par bshad par bya/ /

rgyas la thab khung zlum po ste/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba/ /zabs dang rgyar ni mtho gsum ste/ /kha dog ser por rnam par bsam/ /de dbus rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ /sngo bri de steng pad 'dab brgyad/ /bdag nyid he ru ka rnam pa/ /khro ba'i

sems kyi bdag nyid kyis/ /shing bsreg pa yi sbyin bsreg bya/ /gal te rgyas pa mchog 'dod na/ /a ma kan tha pa la dang / /arga bil ba du du ra/ /shing du rnyed dka'i shing lnga las/ /sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam du/ /

slob dpon gyis ni gzung bar bya/ /ma gas ma skams ma bcad cing / /bu ga can gyi shing spang ngo / /de yi dbus su sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bsam/ /re re la ni brgya rtsa brgyad/ /bgrangs

te de nas sbyin bsreg bya/ /bdag nyid he ru ka yi tshul/ /sku mdog nag po 'od chen pos/ /mar dang yam shing thams cad ni/ /sngags bsregs 'dir ni the tshom med/ oM ga ga ni ga ga na bi lo ka ne hU~M phaT/ te dzo rA dza puSh+Ta~M

ku ru swA hA/ shing rnams kun gyis sngags 'di yis/ /re re bzhin du sbyin bsreg bya/ /phyis ni ser po'i chus zhi bya/ /'di lta'i rgyas pa'i sbyin bsreg ni/ /'jig rten gsum na rnyed par dka'/ /rgyud gzhan rnams su

sbas pa ni/ /rgyud 'di ru ni gsal bar byas/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /dbang du bya ba'i sbyin bsreg mchog /thab khung gru gsum dmar po la/ /zabs dang rgyar ni sor mo brgyad/ /de dbus pad ma 'dab brgyad dmar/ /

zla ba dmar la sogs pas brgyan/ /grwa grwa ru ni rdo rje dmar/ /bdag nyid he ru kar bsam pa/ /dmar po ltar snang chags pa'i bdag /rdo rje dmar po thod pa bsnams/ /yongs su gang ba'i khrag nyid kyis/ /khams gsum

pa la rjes su chags/ /a sho ka yi yam shing dang / /go ro tsa nar ldan pa ni/ /blo ldan brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs te/ /shin du mnyam gzhag sngags ni gdon/ /oM a sho ki ni su ra ke a nu rA ga ya tre lokya ba sha~M ka rI trai lo kyaM bA

shA mA nA yA hrI swA hA/ nyin bdun sbyin bsreg byas tsam gyis/ /khams gsum dbang du 'gyur ba yin/ /chu ni dmar por me zhi bya/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /mngon spyod dang ni bsad pa mchog /zla ba phyed

pa'i cha 'dra'i thab/ /zabs dang rgyar ni khru gang tshad/ /'jigs chen mdog ni ljang khu'o/ /grwa grwa ru ni rdo rje bri/ /dbus kyi sa gzhi stong pa ru/ /blo ldan sha lngas sbyin bsreg bya/ /gsod pa yi ni sbyin bsreg
mchog /mngon spyod gsod pa ru ni gsungs/ /dgra kun bsnun cing zlog par byed/ /dgra bo mthur du kha bltas shing / /kha nas khrag ni skyug pa nyid/ /sha yi dbus su bsam par bya/ /seng ldeng sol

bas me bya ste/ /med na 'ba' 'bo la nyid kyi/ /'ba' 'bo tsher mas sha phug ste/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du sngags kyis bsreg /oM mA ra ya mA ra ya kI la ya kI la ya sar+b+ba sha tru~M nA sha ya hU~M phaT/ bdag nyid he ru kar
gyur cing / /sku mdog sngon po thugs 'khrugs pas/ /dgra rnams thams cad brlag par ni/ /skad cig de la the tshom med/ /pheng mdzad 'jigs shing 'jigs par byed/ /ha ha zhes mdzad 'jigs par mdzad/ /

gdug pa thams cad gsod par ni/ /sbyin bsreg tsam gyis the tshom med/ /'di lta'i bsad pa'i sbyin bsreg dang / /mngon spyod kyang ni rnyed dka' ba/ /rnal 'byor lha mos rtogs min na/ /sngags skyes phal lta smos ci

dgos/ /de phyir sangs rgyas thod pa yi/ /rnal 'byor nga rgyal dang bral bas/ /shin du mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems/ /lha rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka'/ /ljang khu'i chu yis me zhi bya/ /gang gis bsregs shing gang zhig bsregs/ /

gang gi zhing gang zhi ba/ /gang gis rnam rtog kun bcom pa/ /de yis sems ni mgu bar byed/ /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin du gsang ba las sbyin bsreg gi cho ga'i

le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /spyod le'u shin du rnyed dka' ba/ /bud med shin du mchog gyur dang / /rnal 'byor gang gis spyod kun byed/ /dngos grub brgyad dang yang dag ldan/ /de nas spyod pa yang dag brtsam/ /

sems can dngos grub gang gang 'dod/ /de de'i dngos grub rtag tu ster/ /lag pas thod pa gzung byas te/ /gcer bu skra grol gyur pa yi/ /brtul zhugs can gyis spyod pas 'khyam/ /gang dang gang tshe de tshe der/ /rtag tu spyod pa

thams cad bya/ /rgyan rnams kun las rnam grol zhing / /nam mkha' dang mtshungs gyur pa yi/ /shes rab can gyis khyim khyim du/ /slongs mo bya bar the tshom med/ /yid dang 'thun pa kun blangs na/ /bsam gtan gnas

su the tshom med/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis bsams nas ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi slongs mo blang / /chos la gzhol ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /thod pa'i steng du gzhag pa yi/ /rdzas ni de nas bza' bar bya/ /rdzas ni zos ma thag

tu yang / /khyim khyim thal phung shing drung dang / /gang du gang tshe der de'i tshe/ /gang gis dga' ba'i sems de yis/ /blo gros chen po gnyid log 'phreng / /'di lta'i spyod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya chen po ngas par thob/ /

de ltar yang rgyud las gsungs pa/ /gang du ji ltar der de ltar/ /gang gis de yis sangs rgyas te/ /rang gi rnam rtog dag gis nyams/ /mtha' dag rang bzhin rnam par dag /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud

bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin du gsang ba las spyod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /gcig tu sems can don rab nges/ /gser du nges par byed pa'i le'u/ /slob dpon la ni rab dang

bas/ /mu tig dang ni nya phyis dang / /dngul chu dang ni byi ru yis/ /gang gis sems can nor ldan 'gyur/ /'di ni phyi yi sman min te/ /shun lpags lo ma ma yin zhing / /dngul chu bcud len ma yin te/ /mu zi lhang tsher ma yin

zhing / /lcags dang zha nyi zangs ma yin/ /lcags gzhan dag ni ma yin te/ /grub pa'i sman gyi mchog yin no/ /'di lta bu yi tshig thos nas/ /phyag na rdo rje stobs po ches/ /zhabs kyi rdul gyi cha btud nas/ /

sems dpa' gcig tu dad brten pas/ /lha mo legs so zhes ni smra/ /sman gyi mchog ni gang yin zhing / /dngos grub kyang ni ji lta bu/ /gus pa yis ni nyan par 'tshal/ /lha mo chen mo khyod kyis gsungs/ /grub pa'i

sman gyi mchog gang lags/ /gang gis sems can nor ldan 'gyur/ /tshe 'phel ba la brtson pa gang / /sngon bsnyen ltos pa med pa yis/ /sman chen grags pas 'grub pa gang / /gang gis rdzas rnams mang por 'gyur/ /

mo sham bu dang ldan 'gyur gang / /yang dang yang du mi 'chi zhing / /shi nas yang dag 'tshor 'gyur ba/ /lha mo chen mo khyod kyis gsungs/ /bka' stsal pa/ khyim 'di nyid du gnas pa yi/ /sman chen po yis 'grub pa
ste/ /de yang snod bzang mchog la 'grub/ /byis pa rmongs pas mi shes so/ /bdag don gcig pu la 'bab cing / /kye ma gcig tu dka' 'bad pas/ /ji ltar sems can don 'grub 'gyur/ /snod bzang la
ni gnas pa'i bcud/ /ze'u 'bru gsang ba'i spyod yul te/ /ro bcud rtsa yi nang gnas pa'i/ /sman chen ro bcud ma ru brjod/ /gang gis lcags ni gser 'gyur ba/ /gcig gis kyang ni grangs med 'gyur/ /

'di lta bu yi sman chen mchog /ro bcud ma ni de bzhin gnas/ /rab 'byor cho ga sngon 'gro bas/ /sman gyi mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /der ni yang dag sbyor ba bshad/ /dad pa brten pa yis ni nyon/ /me tog ldan pa'i

bud med gang / /gzhon nu kha dog nag po ste/ /rgyud 'di thos pa dang ldan zhing / /ngo tsha med cing ltos med ma/ /'dod pa chung zhing sems can brtse/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bsten cing / /rtag tu rab sbas btsog

med ma/ /'di lta'i bud med rab blangs te/ /sman chen mchog ni yang dag brtsam/ /skyes bu shin tu chags che zhing / /myur du byang chub sems 'bab pa/ /gang yin de la dngos grub med/ /'di lta bu yi sman chen po/ /

sangs rgyas kyis kyang rab rnyed dka'/ /shin du brtan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /blo ldan bud med de rnams bstan/ /de ltar yang zhes gsungs pa/ rab tu brtan pa gtso bo'i gnas/ /zhes ni sgrub pa po rnams smra/ /de phyir

brten pa'i sems kyis ni/ /snod bzang 'bras bu bskul bar bya/ /der ni me tog ldan bud med/ /gser gyi sbyor ba rnyed dka' brtsam/ /grub pa'i bcud kyis byugs pa yi/ /zla ba rang gi snying khar bsam/ /sngon
du ri yi rgyal pos brgyan/ /der ni yi ge hrIHsa bon/ /sems can don la gcig du 'bad/ /blo ldan dgos pa yang dag brtsam/ /zangs ma'i dngos po srang gcig bcas/ /zlum po snod bzang la bcug ste/ /g.yon
pa bskum pa'i g.yas zur gzhag /med na lcags kyang bya ba yin/ /brtan pa'i sbyor ba'i sems kyis ni/ /de nas blo ldan las rnams brtsam/ /ri rab zla ba sa bon rgyal/ /zhu 'gyur the tshom med pa yin/ /

snod bzang der ni ngal bsos pas/ /'bo ba'i sbyor bas 'dzag pa nyid/ /bzang pos myur du rab blangs te/ /mkhas pa yis ni byug par bya/ /rdog po byugs pa tsam gyis ni/ /me yi nang du gzhug bya zhing / /de nas shes

rab can bltas na/ /gser du 'gyur ba the tshom med/ /de yi ma sha gcig gis ni/ /srang brgya ru ni 'gyur ba yin/ /de ltar gser gyi sbyor ba mchog /'jig rten gsum na'ang rnyed par dka'/ /gal te sman chen tshad min na/ /de tshe

sangs rgyas tshad ma yin/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po 'dir/ /dngos po gang dang gang gsungs pa/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de dag thams cad bden par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'di tshad min smra ba'i/ /blo gros chen po thos

ldan pa/ /ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar/ /de dag thams cad dmyal bar 'gro/ /sman 'di tsam gyis ma grub na/ /chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / /bla med rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/ /de dag thams cad brdzun par 'gyur/ /

mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang / /sems can sangs rgyas chos la 'tshe/ /sman gyis mchog ni 'grub 'gyur ba/ /skad cig de la the tshom med/ /sems can don la gcig tu 'bad/ /sgom ldan 'grub pa lta ci smos/ /

sman mchog gser dang dngul du 'gyur/ /ji srid sangs rgyas ye shes yod/ /mi ni bskal pa bye bar 'tsho/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /mo sham rnams kyi bu med pa/ /yang dag sbyor bas bkrus tsam gyis/ /
skad cig de la bu ldan 'gyur/ /sngon gyi gtso bos ji skad gsungs/ /khrus kyi cho ga rab tu bshad/ /kha dog lnga yi rdul tshon nam/ /yang na rdul tshon dkar po yis/ /dpag dka' skrag par byed pa yi/ /

dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya/ /der ni bum pa lto che ba/ /zlum po bzhi ni gzhag par bya/ /shes rab can gyis chu yis dgang / /ras kyis kyang ni dkri bar bya/ /rang gi khrag gis mtshan ma bri/ /bud med mo
sham de yi ni/ /khams kyi gtso bo blangs nas ni/ /mkhas pas bum pa'i kha la byug /de nas khrag 'thung go 'phang la/ /gnas pa bsgom pa'i mchog ldan pas/ /nag po dmar mo 'jigs chen po/ /

rdo rje hU~M las yang dag byung / /'jigs pa'i me ltar 'jigs byed pa/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /bla ma 'jigs pa'i gar byed cing / /mkhas pas hU~M ni sgrogs bzhin pa/ /blo ldan bum pa'i nang du bsam/ /de nas

ral gri 'dzin pa yi/ /skyes pa bzhi po grags chen po/ /khro bo gzhan gyi sems dang ldan/ /'jigs chen skyes bu de rnams kyis/ /ral gris nam mkhar bsnun cing gsod/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba dang / /'di lta bu yi

sbyor ldan pas/ /de bzhin du ni bud med bkru/ /skad cig de la bkrus tsam gyis/ /bud med bu dang ldan par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin du gsang ba las sman
chen po khyad par can dang / mo sham gyi khrus kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /mkha' lding sbyor las byung ba'i le'u/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i cho ga yis/ /

mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /blo ldan he ru ka dang ni/ /kun nas rnal 'byor ma brgyad bskyed/ /mtshan ma phyag sogs sngon gsungs bzhin/ /kha dog dkar po 'ba' zhig nyid/ /phyogs kyi rnal 'byor ma dkar

zhing / /mtshams kyi dmar po nyid yin no/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i cho ga yis/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab/ /bum pa rnam pa bzhi po la/ /sngon gsungs phyag mtshan bri bar bya/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i

sbyor ba yis/ /phyis ni slob ma rjes su gzung / /sngon gyi cho gas gsol btab ste/ /sbyin dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang / /de nas dkyil 'khor mchod par bya/ /slar yang gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /slob ma rjes su

gzung bar bya/ /sa stengs na ni dus zin la/ /cung zad gso bar mi nus te/ /nam mkha' lding can gyis btang zhing / /dus su zin ces smra ba ni/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /blo ldan de nas las brtsam mo/ /bdag nyid he ru kar

gyur cing / /kun nas rnal 'byor ma brgyad de/ /de kun sku ni dkar po ru/ /cho ga bzhin du sbyar bar bya/ /'bras btags rang bzhin blangs nas ni/ /rig pa 'dzin pa gnyis bya'o/ /shin du mnyam par gzhag pa yis/ /de yi lag

par ral gri sbyin/ /de yi snying kar sngags bzhugs pa/ /'dab ma gang dang gang de la/ /mar khu che byas snag tsha dang / /mkhas pas sngags ni bri bar bya/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA le ni hrIH oM ka pA la ni badzri Ni a/ bi d+h+wan sa ya sar+b+ba nA ga na

u da pa ya d+ya d+ha ra ni/ bi b+ha ba ya ka la da sha na/ b+ho b+ho b+ha ga ba ti/ bud+ha ka pA la ni/ sar+b+bA na Na k+Sha ya~M ka rI ha ha ha swA hA/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags so/ /de ltar yongs su rdzogs nas ni/ /'dab ma snying khar gzhug par bya/ /gsang

sngags 'di dang lcug ma yis/ /lan bdun bar du spyan drang ngo / /oM bud+d+ha ka pA la ni g+ha Ta g+ha Ta/ g+ha Da g+ha Da hri hri haHhaH he heHha~M/ lan bdun bsngags pa tsam gyis ni/ /rig pa 'dzin pa rnam pa gnyis/ /bar snang du ni lding

'gyur te/ /gcig ni dum bu dum bu ru/ /sa la ltung ba ru ni 'gyur/ /dus zin 'dir langs the tshom med/ /gzhan yang sbyor ba rnyed dka' gang / /pad stegs la sogs bcwa lnga po/ /glegs bam la ni bri ma byas/ /bla ma'i

drin las shes par bya/ /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin du gsang ba las rig pa 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba'i man ngag nges pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas phyag na rdo rjes

rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma la yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rnal 'byor ma yi gtsor gyur pa/ /shes rab chen po'i lha mo legs/ /khyod kyis gsungs pa'i sbyor ba gang / /'jig rten na'ang
rnyed par dka'/ /bdag gis rgyud kun mthong mod kyi/ /sbyor ba 'di dag rnyed par dka'/ /rgyud 'dir khyod kyis gang gsungs pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis ma bshad do/ /e ma'o sems can don la brtson/ /

e ma'o sangs rgyas kun skyed ma/ /e ma'o phyag rgya che la brtson/ /sngags rnams kun gyi rab 'byor ma/ /shin du rnyed dka' gang yin des/ /rnal 'byor pa gang ngo mtshar ba/ /sna tshogs byed 'gyur lha mo gsungs/ /dang po'i le'u

gang gang gsungs/ /sbyor de lha mos bdag la shod/ /'di lta bu yi tshig gsan nas/ /rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs sde/ /bzhad cing shin du bzhad pa yis/ /lha rnams thams cad skrag pa dang / /bdud sde thams cad 'bros pa

dang / /bgegs rnams thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ /e ma'o bzhad pa'i nges pa yis/ /rgyal ba'i mchog kun ngo mtshar ro/ /gsungs pa/ rgyal mtshan 'phyang ba blang byas la/ /de yi sha yang blang bya zhing / /de yi skad

cha'i rus pa ni/ /blangs nas thab khung du ni bya/ /de yi thod pa'i rjes bzung ste/ /rgyus pa sdong bur byas te gzhag /de yi mar khus dgang bya zhing / /thab khung gru gsum steng du gzhag /gzhan yang dud pa 'bebs pa dang / /

ji srid dud pa chags kyi bar/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /gsang sngags 'di ni bzlas par bya/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni b+ha ra b+ha ra/ d+ha d+ha ra/ d+ha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra pa ya d+ha ra pa ya/ sho Sha ya/ sho Sha ya/ ta pa ya ta pa

ya/ trA~M trA~M ma~M sa~M ra d+hA~M ku ru ku ru b+ho b+ha ga ba te bud+d+ha ka pA la s+ya dz+nyA ma la~M g+ha ya shI g+h+ra~M ka dza la pa ta~M/ pa ta ya pa ta ya/ trA~M trA~M a hU~M stam b+ha ya b+ha ba/ ba ti hUM phaT/ 'di ltar sngags kyi rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten gsum

yang skems par byed/ /'byung po ro langs mkha' 'gro ma/ /srin po sha za la sogs dang / /gzhan yang rung ste bgegs de rnams/ /thos pa tsam gyis 'bros par 'gyur/ /ji srid dud pa ma babs pa/ /de srid sngags ni bzla

bar bya/ /dud pa babs ma thag tu ni/ /lag pa gnyi gas bzung bar bya/ /de nas blo chen rnal 'byor pas/ /rol rtsed phreng ba btung bar bya/ /bu mo lo ni bcu drug ma/ /lang tsho'i gzugs la brtse ba can/ /'di ni rnal

'byor pa yis spyad/ /gcig tu sems can don 'bad pa/ /gcer bu skra grol gyur pa yi/ /mkhas pas he ha'i sngags bton te/ /rol rtsed phreng ma btung bar bya/ /de yi rjes la rtse 'jo brtsam/ /shin du bzhad gyur phed

mdzad pa'i/ /brtse ba chen po'i lag g.yon du/ /dud chen mchog ni gzhag par bya/ /sbyor ba la ni mkhas pa yis/ /phyis ni bags kyis bya ba bya/ /pad ma las byung rdzas gang zhig /de nyid kyis ni dud pa mnye/ /ming

med mthe bos me tog sbyin/ /ril bu brgya dang rtsa brgyad bya/ /ril bu re re re re la/ /gsang sngags brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzla/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni trA~M hrIHhU~M phaT/ 'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' zhing / /rgyud rnams kun du rnyed
dka' ba/ /rnal 'byor mas kyang rnyed dka' ba'i/ /sngags 'di yis ni dud pa bsgrub/ /srin lag gi ni sor mo yis/ /mig la dud pa byugs tsam gyis/ /stong gsum rdul phran lta bu yi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad

mthong bar 'gyur/ /dpag tshad 'bum phrag brgyad bcu yi/ /steng dang 'og ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /lag pa g.yon pas mnyes tsam gyis/ /skad cig de la rnal mar 'gyur/ /mdzub mos byugs pa tsam gyis ni/ /rgyu dang

mi rgyu mthong 'gyur te/ /'byung po yi dgas sha za dang / /gzhan yang grub pa rnams dang ni/ /dpag tshad bye ba stong phrag gi/ steng dang 'og ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /lag pa g.yon pas mnyes tsam gyis/ /rnal mar 'gyur

bar the tshom med/ /gung mos byugs pa tsam gyis ni/ /shin du ngo mtshar byed 'gyur te/ /pheg brdabs bdun gyi sgra tshad du/ /nag po 'bar byed rtse mo yis/ /sprin rnams thams cad 'thor bar 'gyur/ /'di lta'i dud pa
rnyed par dka'/ /lag pa g.yon pas mnyes tsam gyis/ /skad cig de la mi ru 'gyur/ /mthe bong gis ni dud pa yi/ /bdag nyid chen po byugs tsam gyis/ /gzugs brnyen mtshan ma ri dang shing / /gzhan

dag gang yang rung ba rnams/ /khro bo'i lta bas bltas tsam gyis/ /dum bu stong du 'gyur ba yin/ /g.yon pas mnyes pa tsam gyis ni/ /rnal mar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /mthe'u chung gis ni mig byugs na/ /skad

cig de la mi snang 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzigs mi 'gyur/ /skad cig sum bcu gsum du 'khor/ /mdzod dang bud med rdzas nyid dang / /dngos po gang dang gang 'dod pa/ /dud pa'i bdag nyid chen po yis/ /skad
cig de la 'phrog par 'gyur/ /'di lta bu yi dud mchog gi/ sbyor ba sna tshogs legs par bshad/ /de ni mig la byugs tsam gyis/ /rang gi gzugs ni bsgyur bar byed/ /dud pa 'di ni byugs tsam gyis/ /rig

pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur/ /bya rog 'ug pa bya rgod dang / /sbrul dang khyi dang lce spyang dang / /stag dang gung dang byi la dang / /sbrang bu glang po bong bu ru/ /de ltar dud pa chen po yis/ /sna tshogs pa yi las byed pa'o/ /kun

la las kun yod mod kyi/ /sbyor ba 'ba' shig rnyed par dka'/ /sbyor ba glegs bam la ma bris/ /bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad de/ /sbyor ba shin du rnyed dka' ba/ /sngags dang

rus pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rtag tu sna tshogs las byed do/ /glang po'i rus pas bsad pa'i sbyor ba bya'o/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI hrIHhU~M/ rta yi rus pas bskrad pa rnyed par dka' ba bya'o/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI kha~M hrIH

hU~M phaT/ ba lang gi rus pas dgra'i snying kar phur bu gdab par bya'o/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI trA~M hrIH khyi'i rus pas rengs pa chen po bya bar gsungs so/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI AHhU~M phaT/ rus pa chen pos ni

dgug par bya'o/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA la nI hrI bau ShaT/ bong bu'i rus pas rmongs par bya'o/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI bru~M hU~M/ 'ug pa'i rus pas dbang du bya'o/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI trA~M hrIHHhU~M/ bya rgod kyi rus pas dbye

bar bya'o/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI hAHphaT hU~M/ bong bu'i rus pas rengs par bya'o/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI badzri lce spyang gi rus pas g.yul las rgyal bar byed do/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI b+ha ga ba ti d+ha ra d+ha ra ha he ho

ha ha/ ma he'i rus pas dga' zhing rtse bas lo bcu gnyis su nyin dang mtshan du de'i byang chub sems mi ltung ngo / /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI ra ma ra ma kri Ta kri Ta ha ha/ sbrul gyi rus pas shing rtsad nas 'don no/ /oM bud+d+ha ka

pA li nI ta Ta ta Ta/ tra ta ya tra ta ya/ ma ta s+pho Ta ya spo Ta ya ud+pa Ta ya hU~M phaT/ stag gi rus pas ri 'degs par byed do/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ ma Ta ma Ta tra Ta ya tra Ta ya/ g+ha TA pa ya g+ha TA pa ya/ s+pho Ta

s+pho Ta mo Ta mo Ta ya sa~M kra ma ya hrIH hU~M tra~M phaT/ lcags kyus ni nags stug po stong par byed do/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI badzre nA sha ya mA ra ya g+hu Ta g+hu Ti ni sar+b+ba bi na ya ti na hri ye ya~M ta Da ya b+hi trA pa ya tsa ma~M tsa ma~M/ b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ma
ya/ b+ho b+ha ga ba ti a~M a~M taT hU~M phaT/ sems gcig dri med me long bzhin/ /gang bsams de yang gzugs brnyan dang / /rmyi lam lta bur shes mod kyi/ /'on kyang rnam par rtog pas bzung / /sangs

rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa'i gsang ba'i yang shin du gsang ba las sngags sna tshogs kyi rab tu sbyor ba'i le'u ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /rnam

dag le'u rab rnyed dka'/ /ne ne mo dang tsha mo dang / /ma dang bu mo chung ma nyid/ /gal te phyag rgya che 'dod na/ /shes rab can gyis 'di dag spyad/ /g.yung mo dang ni gar mkhan ma/ /khrus mkhan ma dang gtum mo yi/ /bu mo

ko ba byed par gsungs/ /blo dang ldan pas 'di dag spyad/ /de lnga rnal 'byor ma yi mchog /de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /ma dag pa yi sems sbyang phyir/ /mig ni sring mor gyur pa ste/ /rna ba tsha mo nyid yin

no/ /sna ni ma ru 'gyur ba ste/ /lce ni bu mo nyid yin no/ /yid ni chung mar 'gyur ba ste/ /lnga po de rnams mchog lha mo/ /phyag rgya chen po rab ster ma'o/ /gti mug gar mkhan ma ru 'gyur/ /zhe sdang g.yung mo nyid yin no/ /

'dod chags khrus mkhan ma yin te/ /nga rgyal gtum mo nyid yin no/ /phrag dog ko ba byed ma'o/ /lnga po de rnams bud med mchog /gzugs las gti mug skye ba ste/ /sgra las zhe sdang skye ba yin/ /dri la longs spyad

pas 'dod chags/ /ro las nga rgyal nyid yin te/ /reg bya las ni phrag dog skye/ /sems kyi dag pa nyid yin no/ /de phyir rnal 'byor blo chen gyis/ /shin du sbyor ba'i sems kyis ni/ /skyes 'dir dngos grub ma thob kyang / /

skye gzhan srid par dngos grub 'thob/ /ji ltar dngos po med par bsgom/ /ji ltar dngos po bsgom par bya/ /dngos po sgom bya ji ltar 'gyur/ /sring mo'i gzugs ni ji ltar yin/ /dkar mo ljang khu sngon mo'i mdog /'di

lta'i gzugs dang ldan par ni/ /dag pa'i sems kyis blta mi bya/ /tsha mos ji ltar sgra thos pa'i/ /sgra grag pa ni rnam gsum nyid/ /'di lta'i sbyor dang ldan par ni/ /dag pa'i sems kyis mnyan mi bya/ /rab sbas skyed ma

gang yin des/ /dri ni rnam pa gsum bltas pa/ /lta min yid dang ldan pa la/ /ji ltar 'dod chags skye bar 'gyur/ /lce dang lhan cig longs spyod rdzas/ /ro drug myangs ba ci 'dra ba/ /myangs bas longs spyod ldan pa yi/ /

myangs pa'i gzugs ni ji lta bu/ /yid kyis longs spyod dga' bde nyid/ /yid kyis gnyi ga spyad pas bde/ /der ni rtag pa yod ma yin/ /dngos po las ni dngos med yod/ /dngos med la yang dngos po nyid/ /dngos

dang dngos med gnyi ga stong / /'di dag sems kyi dag pa nyid/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /phyi yi lus ni sbyang phyar ro/ /lta dang ldan pa snying rje ste/ /'khyud pa byams par 'gyur ba'o/ /drud pa'i sbyor ba'i bdag nyid ni/ /

dga' ba yan lag ma yi mchog /gnyi ga 'dus las gang 'dzag pa/ /de ni bdag gis btang snyoms gsungs/ /de ltar dngos po'i sbyor ldan pa/ /ji ltar 'dod chags kyis 'ching 'gyur/ /mthong ba las ni 'dod chags skye/ /
'khyud las 'bras bu cung zad tsam/ /drud pa las ni dga' ba skye/ /kun gyi mtha' mar dga' bral lo/ /de ltar dga' dang dga' bral 'bras/ /khams gsum pa las skye bar 'gyur/ /rab dga' sems kyi

sbyor ba yis/ /dngos po gsum gyis 'ching mi 'gyur/ /bza' dang btung ba gang ci'ang rung / /bde ba 'bab pa'i kha zas rnams/ /de kun bshang dang gci sogs su/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu brtag /gang ci rung

ba'i dga' rtse 'jo/ /'khyud pa dang ni 'o byed dang / /nyed dang 'tshir ba nyid kyis ni/ /phyag rgya chen po'ang mthong bar 'gyur/ /'di lta'i bsgom dang ldan pas ni/ /'di ru 'grub par the tshom med/ /rnal 'byor ma lngas sangs rgyas

kyi/ /dpal dang phyag rgya cher ster byed/ /rnal 'byor pa yis de mchod na/ /'dod pa rnams kyis gos mi 'gyur/ /phrag dog la sogs kyis sbags kyang / /de la nyes pas gnod pa med/ /rnal 'byor pa yi mchog de nyid/ /

srid pa'i nyes pas gos mi 'gyur/ /ji srid khams ni phyi mi gsor/ /sangs rgyas sku srid sdig dang bral/ /byang chub sems ni 'dzag med pa/ /gang tshe phun sum tshogs pa'i shing / /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal
'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin du gsang ba las sems rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /sna tshogs sde mas bsngags pa'i le'u/ /de ltar

phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / ri rab kyi rdul phra rab snyed dang mtshungs pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams spyan drangs shing mgu ba'i sems kyis sna tshogs sde ma la btud de bstod pa/ /e ma

'o bcom ldan 'das lha mo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad skyed byed ma/ /dpal dang grags pa che zhing 'jigs/ /sems can kun la phan mdzad ma/ /lha mo snying rje che ldan ma/ /phyag rgya chen po blo chen ma/ /don chen 'bras bu ston

mdzad ma/ /sangs rgyas thod pa yi ni rgyud/ /rdo rje 'chang gis sbas pa dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma gsungs shing / /byang chub sems dpa'i yul min pa/ /gsung gcig gis ni gsal mdzad de/ /de ni lha mo khyod kyis gsungs/ /

e ma'o snod chen lha mo khyod/ /rnal 'byor ma kun bsdus byas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs kun yul min pa/ /rnyed dka' dngos grub gang yin pa/ /de ni lha mos gsal bar mdzod/ /gsungs pa/ rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad nyon/ /

byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / /'dod chags bral dang bdag chen nyon/ /sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa nyon/ /klu dang lhar bcas mi rnams nyon/ /rgyud rgyal 'di ni bklags tsam gyis/ /bsod nams gang yin de kun

gyi/ /bsod nams rjes rang yongs su bsngo/ /phyag rgya chen po'i don du ni/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rnam pa dbul/ /sngags don zab mo rnams dang ni/ /sbyor ba shin du rnyed dka' ba/ /gang zhig gsal byas bdag bzod mdzod/ /shin

du sbas pa'i yul de yang / /sems can don du gsal byas pas/ /rgyal ba'i mchog rnams bdag bzod mdzod/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa stobs po che/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /sangs

rgyas thod sbyor bzang po bzla/ /oM hrIHbud+d+ha hU~M ka pA li nI AH 'jug pa la oM/ 'byung ba la hrIH gnas pa la bud+d+ha/ bde ba la hU~M/ nub pa la ka pA li nI/ ldang ba la AH'o/ /de ltar bzlas pa rab rnyed dka'/ /sangs

rgyas thod pa'i sbyor chud bzla/ /de ltar yid kyi bzlas ldan pas/ /dngos grub 'thob par the tshom med/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI AHhrIHheHhU~M phaT/ snying po'i sngags so/ /bud+d+ha ka pA li nI badzri ni ho hU~M/ a dur la k+She hU~M phaT/ nye ba'i snying

po'i sngags so/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /dbang dus cho ga ji bzhin du/ /slob ma dad brtan gang zhig gis/ /shes rab ma la gsol ba gdab/ /dri zhim pa yi dngos po yis/ /maN Dal rnam pa lnga byas te/ /sangs rgyas kun

gyis brgyan byas pa/ /lha mo che la gsol ba gdab/ /zhal du bza' ba'i rdzas mchog bstab/ /rdzas de rnams ni gsol ba dang / /yid ni tshim zhing thugs dgyes so/ /lha mo dgyes par mthong nas ni/ /tshig 'di dag gis smra bar byed/ /

rnam par rtog pa mang po yis/ /g.yogs pa'i bag chags rab ldan pa/ /'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba bdag /mdzes ma khyod kyis skyob par mdzod/ /grags chen snying rje ldan pa yi/ /lha mo de ni zhi bar mdzod/ /der ni rgyan rnams

thams cad dang / /lhab lhub rgyan rnams dbul bar bya/ /dad pa brtan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /de nas bdag nyid dbul bar bya/ /sna tshogs zas dang sna tshogs btung / /de yi mdun du dbul bar bya/ /gang gis shes rab ma mnyes pa/ /

sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ni mchod/ /'di nyid la ni sangs rgyas bzhugs/ /gzhan yang dngos grub gtso bo dang / /snying rje ldan pa gzhan gang zhig /mkha' 'gro ma kun 'di la bzhugs/ /gang du dbang po 'gags gyur pa/ /

bdag rtog rang bzhin nyams pa ste/ /kye de lhan cig skyes dgar 'gyur/ /bla ma'i zhal sngar gsal bar zhus/ /gang zhig 'char dus tshe na dbang po dang / /yul mnyam nub gyur de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi snying

sbas su sad pa/ /phyis ni mngon dga' rgyal ba'i mdzes sku gcig /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin du gsang ba las sngags kyi bzlas pa dang / shes rab ma la gsol
ba gdab pa dang / rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o/ /'di gsungs nas sna tshogs sde ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma thams cad dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems

dpa' rnams rang rang gi gnas na 'dug ste/ ci'ang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma chen mos gsungs pa mchog tu gsang ba rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha

ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /ye d+ha rmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun to ShAn ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e ba~M bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA mA yA tan tra rA dza

nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal sgyu 'phrul chen po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo bsgyur/ /ye shes lnga dang sku gsum nyid/ /

'gro ba skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji snyed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /kun tu rtog pa'i 'ching gcod cing / /'jig rten bya bar rab 'jug pa/ /de snyed rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas de las rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma gsang ba'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyi

mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud bshad par bya ste/ gang zhig gis ni kun khyab pa/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu tshangs sgo nga / /lha mo thams cad skyed byed cing / /tshangs la sogs pa'i bdag nyid che/ /de rnams kyi ni gsang chen 'di/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo dbang

phyug che/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo drag chen mo/ /'byung ba yang dag bsdud mdzad ma/ /gang gis 'di kun la khyab pa/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum/ /des ni de nas 'di bsdus nas/ /'jig rten gsum po yang spro'o/ /gsang ba pa rnams 'di yi ni/ /

sgyu ma'i bdag nyid ces rnam grags/ /'jig rten gsum sgrub rig ma ste/ /'dod pa thams cad rab ster ba/ /gang zhig rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /sgrub pa'i dbang phyug rig pa nyid/ /lha dang nor bdag dri za dang / /gnod sbyin lha min mi dang bcas/ /

rig pa 'dzin dang gang yang rung / /mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che/ /srin po dang ni sha za rnams/ /sgrub po rnams la 'grub par 'gyur/ /dbang du 'du 'gyur 'byung po rnams/ /chu las skyes dang thang las skyes/ /chos rnams rang bzhin 'od

gsal ba/ /gdod nas dag cing rnyog pa med/ /thabs brjod pa yis de las ni/ /rang byung ye shes lnga ldan 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams sbyor ba'i ma/ /khams gsum po ni ma lus kun/ /ma lus lus pa med grub cing / /sgyu ma

kun gyis rnam rol pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kun las phrogs nas su/ /lha mchog lha skyes bu mo spyod/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug byed rig pa/ /de bzhin du ni mig 'phrul byed/ /rmongs pa dang ni rengs pa dang / /bskrad dang bsad pa

la sogs pa/ /dbang dang dgug pa la sogs dang / /nam mkhar 'gro ba nyid kyang ngo / /gzhan gyi grong sogs bya ba dang / /mi snang ba dang gang yang rung / /zhe 'gras pa dang rmugs pa dang / /de bzhin sa 'og 'gro ba'o/ /rig 'dzin

'khor los sgyur nyid 'gyur/ /'chi ba med cing rgas pa med/ /rnal 'byor sgyu ma'i rig pa 'di/ /'di yis na ba med par 'gyur/ /sngags kyi yi ge'i gzugs kyis su/ /rnal 'byor pas ni rnam rol byed/ /bklags pa dang ni

bsams pa yis/ /bsgom pa dang ni ting 'dzin rnams/ /klags pas byed pa'i rig pa ste/ /rig pa'i dngos grub byed par 'gyur/ /brtul zhugs med cing dka' thub med/ /dka' spyod basmyung ba sdom med par/ /rtag tu
shes rab thabs sogs kyis/ /rtag tu dga' dang bde bas 'grub/ /lte ba'i dbus nas dpa' bo ste/ /ge sar gsang ba'i spyod yul la/ /sems dang sems med sems kyi gzugs/ /ye shes shes bya'i rang bzhin bdag /

de ni bdag gis bshad bya ste/ /zab mo sangs rgyas bstan pa'o/ /A li kA li mnyam byas te/ /ri mo de la sbyar bar bya/ /ri mo steng du 'bar ba yi/ /'og tu 'bab par byed pa'o/ /khu ba'i tshul gyis 'bab pa ste/ /bdud rtsi'i

thigs pa'i gzugs las so/ /gang gang dbang po'i lam nas ni/ /de de'i rang bzhin skye bar 'gyur/ /mchog tu phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'bab/ /dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub dang / /

ril bu chen po'i bsgrub pa yang / /sgyu 'phrul chen po'i rab sbyor ba'i/ /sdom pa'i sbyor ba byed par 'gyur/ /mchod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang bcas/ /sgrub pa'i dbang po shes bya ba/ /dngos grub shin tu rtag pa'o/ /

gang zhig shes pa'i dngos grub kyis/ /lha yi gnas su myur bar 'gyur/ /de ni bdag gis bshad bya ste/ /lha mo bden par nga smra'o/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo khyod la ngas/ /'jig rten gsum 'grub de bshad bya/ /rnal 'byor chen mo rnams kyi ni/ /

bzang po'i yi ge'i phreng ba rnams/ /gang zhig bsams pa tsam gyis ni/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu 'grub 'gyur ba'o/ /'dod pas kun la nyer spyod pa/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin bsten byas na/ /rnal 'byor pa chen rtag rol te/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams

'grub/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs su ni/ /rnal 'byor bdag nyid ston par byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dpal/ /dngos grub chen po ster bar 'gyur/ /bcud len rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /rtag tu sems can don byed pa'o/ /

khu ba dgug dang chang dang ni/ /gong bu chen po dgug pa nyid/ /sha chen po ni bkug nas su/ /rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig spyod/ /tshe ring brtson 'grus chen po dang / /gzi brjid che zhing stobs chen 'gyur/ /lha yi mig dang rdzu 'phrul ldan/ /

nyin re zla ba thung ba'o/ /de yi tshe ni 'phel 'gyur te/ /bskal pa chen po'i bar du gnas/ /blta bas mi ngoms lus dang ni/ /cho 'phrul dag ni ston par byed/ /yid la bsams ma thag tu ni/ /rang gi gzugs ni yongs brjes shing / /

bklags pas 'grub pa'i don yod pa/ /rig ma'i dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul che/ /rig pa 'jig rten gsum po na/ /nga yi rig dang mnyam pa med/ /rgyud rnams kun gyi lung 'di ni/ /mdzes ma khyod la bshad pa yin/ /rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug

ma'i rig ma chen mo las dngos grub kyi mtshan ma bstan pa ste le'u dang po'o// // de nas de las rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen mo rnams kyi sbyor ba'i dngos grub kyi 'bras bu rab tu ster ba'i gsang ba'i yi ge bzang po bshad par bya ste/

gang zhig bsams pa tsam gyis ni/ /rnal 'byor ma mchog ster 'gyur ba/ /dang po'i yi ge'i sbyor ba yis/ /rtag du dbugs ni btang bar bya/ /brgyad pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan/ /u dang thig ler bcas pa yis/ /rnal 'byor pa yi

dbugs rngub byed/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam spangs pa'o/ /de la brtul zhugs ma bshad de/ /phreng ba sngags dang gzung ba dang / /sbyin bsreg gi ni las rnams kyang / /gcig nas gcig tu ldog par 'gyur/ /sngags dang dbyibs dang

chos bdag nyid/ /sbyor ba rnam gsum zhes bya ste/ /ye shes rnam pa gsum gyis ni/ /srid pa'i nyes pas gos mi 'gyur/ /de ltar rgyun du rnal 'byor pa/ /rtag tu goms pa nyid kyis ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'ang / /

zla ba gcig gis de 'grub 'gyur/ /dbang po'i mdog dang yang dag ldan/ /dang po'i yi ge bsgom bya ste/ /rang gi rig pa rab sbyar na/ /des 'di mod la 'gugs par 'gyur/ /yi ge gnyis pa dang ldan pa/ /bsam zhing rnam par bsgom

byas na/ /sa gsum po ni ma lus pa/ /de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /tshangs dang khyab 'jug dbang po dang / /de bzhin dbang po 'dod dbang phyug /ye shes yi ges bskul byas na/ /de dag chung mar bcas te 'gugs/ /yi ge a dang

yang dag ldan/ /sku gsung thugs la legs gnas pa/ /sbyor ba rnam gsum bsgom byas na/ /gong bu 'gugs pa'i mchog yin no/ /yi ge khe dang yang dag ldan/ /sku mdog dmar po zhal bzhi pa/ /lag na thod pa chags pa'i

bdag /khu ba 'gugs pa'i mchog yin no/ /yi ge rtsi dang ldan pa yis/ /kha dog ser po kun tu 'od/ /rta yi zhal gyi tshul byas na/ /chang 'gugs pa yi dam pa yin/ /yi ge ra dang yang dag ldan/ /kha dog dmar po 'od chen po/ /

phyag bzhi pa dang zhal bzhi pa/ /lce spyang tshul du legs gnas pa/ /khro ba'i sems kyis bsgom byas na/ /khrag 'gugs pa yi dam pa'o/ /yi ge drug dang yang dag ldan/ /gnas drug du ni nges sbyar bya/ /rnal 'byor

mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams 'grub/ /mig gnyis dang ni rna ba dang / /de bzhin sna dang yid nyid dag /seng ge rnal 'byor phyag rgya yi/ /rnal 'byor pa yi bcing bar bya/ /srog dang rtsol ba bsdams nas su/ /

bsgoms na skad cig de la 'bar/ /'og min srid pa'i mthar thug par/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten bdun/ /thams cad kyis ni de bsgoms kyang / /de ni rtog pa ma yin no/ /gal te thams cad rab rtogs na/ /'gro ba'i rol pa

rnam par 'jig /de phyir ye shes 'di gsang zhing / /mi gsal yi ge med pa'o/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi mkhyen/ /rnal 'byor gnyid dang yang dag ldan/ /gong bur song ba'i yid de yis/ /gzugs gcig tu ni sgom

par byed/ /sgo dgu las ni gang byung ba/ /rdzas kyi bdag nyid rnam bsgom la/ /rang bzhin med pa'i blo ldan pa'i/ /rnam par mi rtog pa'i bza'/ /mthe bong dang ni srin lag gis/ /kha ru yid bzhin nor bu ni/ /bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin

las byung ba'i/ /rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug ma'i rig pa chen mo las sbyor ba gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dam tshig sgrub pa'i dam pa ste/ /

rdzas gzhan tshogs ni bza' bya ba/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'bras ster ba'o/ /gang zhig zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /'byung po'i mi rnams 'grub 'gyur ba/ /brtan pa dang ni myur 'gro nyid/ /de bzhin du ni ba lang khyi/ /chen por yang dag ldan

pa ni/ /de bzhin ye shes bdud rtsi lnga/ /tshes grangs bcu bzhi brgyad la ni/ /lhan cig bsgos te sbyar byas nas/ /nyi ma bdun du lce spyang gi/ /dbus su gzhag la de nas gton/ /lnga po dag las yungs dkar gyis/ /'bras bu'i

tshad tsam ri lu bya/ /de ni rgyud 'dir gsungs mod kyi/ /tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi'i bar dag tu/ /nyi ma bdun du lhan cig min bsgos sbyar nas lce spyang dbus su legs bzhag la/ /de las gton te lnga po dag las ni/ /dngos grub 'bras

bu'i tshad tsam ril bu bya/ /'bras bu chen po rab tu rtogs pas na/ /de ni rgyud 'dir gsungs kyi kun tu sbas/ /'bras bu chen po sangs rgyas kyis/ /thams cad du ni sbas pa'o/ /de nas sgrub thabs 'byung ba'o/ /yid kyi pad ma

bsam bya ba/ /kha dog dmar po kun 'od la/ /lha mo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nyer brgyan pa'o/ /shar du ud+pa la sngo 'od mdog /lho ru ser po lta bu'o/ /nub tu dkar dang dmar ba'i 'od/ /

byang du ma rgad 'od yin no/ /'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrigs pa dang / /zhal bzhi phyag bzhi spyan gsum mdzes/ /shar phyogs kyi lha mo ni spyan gsum pa phyag g.yon na kha T+wA~M ga dang dril bu/ g.yas na rdo rje dang / thod pa bsnams

pa bsam mo/ /lho phyogs kyi lha mo'i phyag na mdung rtse gsum pa dang / rin po che dang / ba dan dang / lce spyang bsnams pa'o/ /nub phyogs kyi lha mo'i phyag na gzhu dang / mda' dang / sna tshogs pad ma dang / thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /byang phyogs

kyi lha mo'i phyag na ral gri dang / zhags pa dang / rnge'u chung dang / thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /de yis dbus su bsam par bya/ /thod pa nyid dang kha T+wA~M ga /de bzhin gzhu dang mda' nyid do/ /dang po'i

sngags dang yang dag ldan/ /bsgoms na skad cig de la 'bar/ /de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgrubs na/ /rdzas kyi dngos grub rab tu ster/ /rnal 'byor ma yi grub sbyor bas/ /'phral du yid ches yang dag 'jug /thams cad

kyis ni mi mthong zhing / /stong phrag gcig tu snang bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun las phrogs pa dang / /lha'i bu mo mchog la spyod/ /gang gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas rnams/ /nyid kyi rdo rje'i gnas bzhugs pa/ /lag tu skyu ru

ra bzhag bzhin/ /rdo rje'i mig gis mthong bar 'gyur/ /gang gA'i bye snyed zhing dag kyang / /sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid dang / /dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid gnas/ /sems kyi gar las byung ba mkhyen/ /yi ge go

bzlog sbyor ba yis/ /sngags ni de ru rnam bsgom bya/ /rdo rje chu dang yang dag ldan/ /ril bu re re bza' bar bya/ /yi ge brgyad kyi mtha' ldan pa/ /U dang thig ler bcas pa ni/ /mtha' ru yang dag sbyar byas la/ /sngags ni kun du brjod bya

ste/ /gu h+ya bak+Sha a b+hak+She hU~M zhes bya'o/ /rnal 'byor ma kun sbyor ba yis/ /dang po'i yi ge yang dag ldan/ /gal te rdo rje can gyis grub 'dod na/ /lan bdun mngon sngags rnal 'byor pa yis bza'/ /yi ge gsum mtha' zhes bya ste/ /

brgyad kyi mtha' mar legs gnas pa/ /u dang thig ler yang dag ldan/ /yi ge mchog tu gyur pa'i gnas/ /yi ge dang po sbyor ba yis/ /hrI zhes bya ba yang dag sbyar/ /yi ge rnams kyi mthar sbyor la/ /sa bon lngas ni rab dgang bya/ /yi ge yis

ni rnam bsgoms te/ /pad ma rab tu rgyas par bya/ /ci ste rdo rje can 'grub 'dod/ /de lta'i sbyor ba kun shes bya/ /de nas 'dir rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis dgongs pa dpal rdo rje'i glus srid pa shin tu sgrub pa blangs pa/ kye grogs po

rdo rjes pad ma kha 'byed sad mdzad ma/ /a la la ho/ bde ba chen po gar gyis rab tu mnyes mdzod cig /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor pad ma'i kha ni rab phye ba bde ba chen po gar gyis rab tu mnyes par mdzod/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la/ /de nas 'dir glu

blangs tsam gyis/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams gar/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskul/ /de ltar rtag tu gus ldan pas/ /sbyor ba'i dngos grub 'gyur ba yin/ /dus bzhir rab tu sbyor ba yis/ /'grub par 'gyur ba bsgom pa'i mchog /

rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing / /spos dang me tog rnams kyis brgyan/ /ji ltar sku gsum mchog ster ba'i/ /dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur/ /dpag tshad brgya'i khyon tsam du/ /'di ni rab tu snang bar byed/ /

dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas/ /sgo dgu las ni byung ba'i rdzas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub gnas zhi ba'i/ /de nyid bla na med pa 'grub/ /'dir tshigs bcad du 'gyur ba ni/ /gzugs rnams de bzhin phyag rgya mtshan ma dang / /rdzas rnams dang ni bsam

gtan rnam sgom pa'i/ /cho ga'i thabs ni sna tshogs bstan pa dang / /lha mo yid 'dod rnams ni gsungs pa'o/ gang gi khyim du rgyud 'di gnas pa dang / rgyun tu 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / rnam par bsgom pa de la nad rnams 'byung bar mi

'gyur zhing / rgas pa dang / bgegs mi 'byung la/ 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/ rgyun tu thams cad du rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyis bgegs bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma chen mo rnams kyi dgongs pa mchog tu

gsang ba gsang ba chen po nye bar spyod pa dang bcas pa'i sgrub thabs te le'u gsum pa'o/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na pa ra dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba chen po 'gos lhas btsas

kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra a ra li ma hA tan tra rA dzA nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje a ra li zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang /

de bzhin gshegs pas gsol ba btab par rig cing byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang mkhyen nas bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /chu yis gdong ni bkrus nas ni/ /

sman ni za bar byas nas su/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /he ru ka ni rab bsgrub bya/ /rang gi snying gar re pha ni/ /bsreg pa'i bskal pa ltar 'bar bsgom/ /de byung rdo rje nyi ma ni/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas yang dag
khyab/ /de yi steng du hU~M nyid de/ /bskal pa'i me ni lta bu nyid/ /de ni rdo rjer yang bsams nas/ /rdo rje las byung he ru ka /bgegs ni chen po mnan nas ni/ /sku la thal bas byugs pa

dang / /phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /'jigs pa'ang ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /in+d+ra nI la'i 'od lta bu/ /dbu skra ser po stobs po che/ /gar dgu'i ro dang ldan par ni/ /rol pa'i gar gyis gar mdzad cing / /

ri rab ri rgyal mthon po yang / /sa yi 'og tu yang dag mnan/ /byag tu rdo rje rnam bsgoms nas/ /g.yon pas skyes pa'i thod pa ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /sha lnga yang dag ldan par bsgom/ /

kun da dang ni zla ba dang / /chu skyes do shal lta bur ni/ /kha T+wA~M ga yis phrag pa brgyan/ /rdo rje a ra li las lha'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad dang / dbang po la sogs pa rdo rje nam mkha' la gnas pa thams cad dang / glang po che'i rna ba la sogs pa zhing skyong ba thams cad dang / kun dar la sogs pa'i yi dgas thams cad dang /

de dag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi chos nyan pa'i sbyor ba des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje a ra li chen po la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das gtor ma'i sngags ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ /bde gshegs kun gyi ston pa yis/ /gtor ma'i las ni rab tu phye/ /phyag rgya yang ni khyad par du/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa'o/ /rdo rje thal mo gyen phye nas/ /oM dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo hU~M phaT swA hA/
'di nyid sngags ni chen po nyid/ /de bzhin du ni gtor ma'i sngags/ /las ni thams cad pa yi sngags/ /yin pa nyid du the tshom med/ /rdo rje a ra li las gtor ma'i bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ming yang dag par rab tu phye ba/ gdong ring na ni mtho ba dang / /de bzhin dpag bsam shing nyid dang / /tshangs par spyod pa mang ba nyid/ /dam tshig 'dir ni dngos grub byin/ /glang po

rta bong glang rnga mo/ /khyi las byung ba'i mar me dang / /mar me chen po bsregs nas ni/ /tshangs spyod 'dzin pa mchod par bya/ /de nas sdom pa bka' stsal pa/ /khyod kyis srog chags bsad bar bya/ /brdzun

gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya/ /khyod kyis ma byin par yang long / /gzhan gyi bud med bsten par gyis/ /ma dang sring mo nyid dang yang / /bu mo sring mo'i bu mo ni/ /thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis/ /rnal
'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod/ /de nas dbang ni bka' stsal pa/ phyag rgya ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis/ /de la dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /dbang bskur de'i phyi nas ni/ /de nyid 'di
ni rab tu dbye/ /de nyid bde ba chen po ste/ /thams cad lus la rnam par gnas/ /'di nyid ye shes chen po ste/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can/ /de nas sbyin bsreg bka' stsal pa/ /
khru gang tsam pa'i tshad dang ni/ /khru phyed sa la brko bar bya/ /rdul mtshon dkar po ldan par ni/ /rnam par mkhas pas thab khung bya/ /gsungs pa'i sngags kyis nges par ni/ /de ni sha sogs
sbyin bsregs bya/ /mi ni lha yi spyan nyid de/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ /

ka pa brgyad dang yang dag ldan/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /dur khrod sol ba so phag dang / /ldong ros phye ma nyid dang yang / /ljang khu yi yang phye ma nyid/ /dkyil 'khor la ni mkhas pas bsngags/ /

dbus su gsum la rdo rje bri/ /shar gyi sgo ru mgo chen po/ /lho ru rdo rje dril bu nyid/ /de bzhin nub du dgra sta ste/ /byang du gri gug dge ba nyid/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor du ni bri/ /chos don 'dod dang thar pa la/ /dkyil 'khor
'di ni rab tu dbye/ /dkyil 'khor bzhengs par byas nas ni/ /der ni slob ma gzhug par bya/ /ras kyis gdong ni bcings nas ni/ /bkrol nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya/ /rdo rje a ra li las las thams
cad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // mngon par shes pa bka' stsal pa/ /lha yi mig dang rna ba dang / /de bzhin gzhan sems shes pa nyid/ /sngon gyi gnas rjes dran pa dang / /de bzhin rdzu 'phrul
mngon shes nyid/ /he ru ka yi dbyibs bsgoms na/ /yo gi mngon shes lnga ru 'gyur/ /shin du goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /he ru kar ni ngang gis 'gyur/ /bsam gtan las ni nus skyes nas/ /yid n-i brtan nam

g.yo 'am ci/ /rang gi sems ni bskul ba'i phyir/ /glu ni sna tshogs lan pa dang / /de bzhin gar ni sna tshogs nyid/ /sna tshogs rim gro byed pa dang / /lus la rgyan ni sna tshogs dang / /de bzhin sna tshogs dga' ba

yi/ /gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni/ /ro dang reg bya yang dag brtsam/ /de nas las rgyas bka' stsal pa/ /re'u mig brgyad ni bris nas ni/ /rgyud kyi sngags ni rgyas par bya/ /las kyi dbye ba'i rab dbye bas/ /de

bzhin zhi rgyas la sogs kyis/ /oM ni dbang ldan la ni mer/ /de bzhin bden bral nyid du la/ /rlung gi mtshams su hU~M nyid de/ /shar du dza ni rnam par gnas/ /lho ru dza yi rnam pa nyid/ /nub tu b+h+yo yi rnam pa ste/ /byang du

phaT kyi rnam pa yis/ /dbus su swA hA rnam par gnas/ /ngos gsum du ni bsgrub bya'i ming / /rdo rje ar li las spyod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas 'khor lo bri ba bka' stsal pa/ che ge mo 'di sod cig /che ge

mo 'di dbang du mdzod cig /che ge mo rengs par mdzod cig /che ge mo rmongs par mdzod cig /che ge mo ma lus par gyis shig /che ge mo lkugs par mdzod cig /che ge mo khug cig /che ge mo skrod cig /che ge mo la sdang bar

mdzod cig /che ge mo chings shig /che ge mo ma ning du mdzod cig /che ge mo sgur por mdzod cig /ces sngags kyi rkang pa 'di rnams kyi ngos gnyis su bris te/ gro ga'i 'dab mar gur gum gyis 'dri bar bya zhing / 'di dpung pa'i

rtsa bar gdags par bya'o/ /dgug pa la ni zla mtshan zags pa'i ras la rgya skyegs kyi khu bas bri bar bya'o/ /bsad pa la sogs pa'i las la dur khrod kyi sol ba dang / tsi tra ka'i khu ba dang / yungs mar dang / dug dang / ske tshe dang /

lan tshwa dang / tsha ba gsum dang / ka na ka'i khu ba dang / rus pa'i smyu gus so/ /dgug pa la ni skyu ru ra'i tsher mas so/ /rmongs pa la ni d+ha ru ka'i shing gis so/ /rengs pa la ni pa Ta'i smyu gus so/ /ma lus pa la ni bo de tse'i shing gi

smyu gus bri bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i mchod pa bka' stsal pa/ bas mtha' dang ni dben pa dang / /bdag gi khyim gyi nang du yang / /lo ni bcu gsum de bzhin du/ /lo ni bcu drug bu mo dang / /nyi shu rtsa lnga ma mchod bya/ /

ba dang de bzhin ma he dang / /spre'u mo dang khyi mo dang / /bong mo de bzhin rnga mo dang / /sha ba dang ni ra ma nyid/ /phag dang ba man las byung ba/ /gzhan yang he ru ka mchod na/ /'grub pa nyid du the tshom med/ /nya dang zla ba 'pho ba

yi/ /tshes ni mu stegs can gyis brtags/ /dri ma gzhig par bya ba'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor pas ni myang bar bya/ /srog chags rnams ni gsad mi bya/ /brdzun gyi tshig ni smra mi bya/ /ma byin par ni blang mi bya/ /pha rol bud

med bsten mi bya/ /nyin bar nyal zhing mtshan mo langs/ /shin du mnyam par bzhag pas 'dug /sha chen dang ni rus pa dang / /khrag ni chen po btung ba dang / /khu chen yang dag bza' ba dang / /de bzhin rnam snang chen po nyid/ /

bram ze mo dang g.yung mo nyid/ /gar ma de bzhin btso blag ma/ /thod can ma dang ko lpags mkhan/ /gdol pa de bzhin phyag dar ma/ /rtswa 'tshong ma dang shan ma nyid/ /de bzhin kla klo la sogs dang / /smig

mkhan dang ni chang 'tshong ma/ /gzhan yang zla mtshan 'dzag pa nyid/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / /sring mo las byung bu mo nyid/ /gzhan gyi bu mo spang mi bya/ /rje'u rigs mngon dga' mi bya ste/ /bgrod bya'i bu mo rtag spangs nas/ /

bgrod min mkhas pas bsten par bya/ /rdo rje a ra li las 'khrul 'khor dang / las kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas dam tshig gi bag dbab pa bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos skal ba ngan pa la/ /bag ni

dbab par mi bya zhing / /de bzhin gcer bu thod dum dang / /ral pa can ni thams cad la/ /dam tshig bag ni dbab mi bya/ /snying rje yis ni bdag nyid can/ /gal te yin na bza' bar bya/ /grub kyang lta ba dman pa ni/ /sems can

don byed skyes pa nyid/ /skal ba ngan pa zhes byar brjod/ /bram ze dam tshig rnam par sdang / /de nas slob ma'i dam tshig bka' stsal pa/ dul byed blo dang ldan pa dang / /bzod ldan dal ba mi bslu ba/ /bla mar gus shing snying rje ldan/ /

rgyud ni 'dir ni rab tu bsngags/ /de nas slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bka' stsal pa/ sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes/ /snying rje ldan zhing bstan bcos mkhas/ /de nyid bcu ni yongs su shes/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las la mkhas/ /de

nas thun tshod bzhi byin gyis brlab pa bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar bsgom pa'i sbyor ba des/ /dang po thun tshod byin gyis brlab/ /des ni ci srid nyi phyed na/ /nyi ma phyed na thun gsum pa/ /dus dang bral nas nam phyed na/ /thun tshod byin brlabs

rab tu grags/ /thun tshod byin brlabs rnal 'byor gyis/ /bdag gi rnal 'byor ldan pas 'grub/ /de nas bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /phrag dog dang ni ser sna nyid/ /bcom

ldan he ru ka la med/ /yod na rnam par dag pa nyid/ /de nas dam tshig bsgrub pa bka' stsal pa/ bgegs dang btsugs pa'i shing la'am/ /ljon shing btags shing 'phyang ba dang / /g.yul du mtshon gyis bsnun pa nyid/ /bdag nyid

rnal 'byor ldan pas bsgrub/ /de nas nang du mdzad pa bka' stsal pa/ btung ba rin po che yi chu/ /gang zhig bza' de don yod nyid/ /khrus ni dpag med rdo rje yis/ /dril sogs rim pa rnam snang mdzad/ /dam tshig chos kyi de bzhin spyad/ /

btso ni gang zag mnyam pas ni/ /dam tshig ro ni 'di yis ni/ /gang zhig glu yi rang bzhin nyid/ /mkha' 'gro thams cad btsun mo ste/ /bu ni 'jam dpal la sogs pa/ /khro bo yi ni bsnyen bkur ba/ /bdag nyid he ru ka ru 'gyur/ /brjod

pa bzlas pa yang dag bshad/ /yan lag nyed sogs phyag rgya ste/ /lha yi rnal 'byor dmigs nas ni/ /gang zhig thams cad du ni gnas/ /mang du brjod pa ci zhig bya/ /gang zhig 'jig rten bya gnas pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas

thob phyir/ /rnam par bzlog pas bya ba nyid/ /ri dgas shor sogs bya ba ni/ /'jig rten du ni mi shes pas/ /mchog tu rab tu bsngags 'gyur ba/ /rnam dag dag pa dam pa ni/ /de nyid thob pas rab tu spyod/ /de nas sdom pa bka' stsal pa/ /

rdo rje dril bu gzung bya zhing / /bdud rtsi mkhas pas bza' bar bya/ /rang gi phyag rgya rtag bsten cing / /spyod pa 'da' ba nyid mi bya/ /de nas lha'i mchod pa bka' stsal pa/ chu klung tshal gyi gnas su ni/ /bdag nyid lha ni

mchod par bya/ /bdag gi sngags ni brjod par bya/ /me tog la sogs byin gyis brlab/ /rdo rje a ra li las las sna tshogs bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms kyi lhung bzed bka'

stsal pa/ mkhas pas phru ba chag par ni/ /rig bzhi ru ni slongs mos rgyu/ /chu bo'i 'gram du bza' bya zhing / /gtsang sbra nyid ni rab tu dbye/ /byi la'i rkang pa tsam gyi ni/ /kham ni blo dang ldan pas blang / /phye

btab bza' bar mi bya zhing / /mi ster ba la rtag tu blangs/ /g.yas su rab mos skye bo ni/ /g.yon nas bskor ba ru ni bya/ /nges pa med par khyim du gnas/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /rdo rje shing

gi stongs byas dang / /de bzhin dril bu shing gi bdag /he ru ka ni rab grub phyir/ /bzung nas rtag tu rgyu bar bya/ /de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin mo'i bsgrub pa bka' stsal pa/ ser skya'i khru ma blangs nas ni/ /

sngags ni 'di ni bzla bar bya/ /bsrung bar byas shing bskams byas nas/ /de la gu gul bsre bar bya/ /mkhas pas gnod sbyin mo sngon du/ /des ni bdug pa sbyin par bya/ /shin du mdzes shing gos mdzes pa/ /

bris skur gnas pa legs grub phyir/ /'di nyid kyi ni cho ga yis/ /gnod sbyin mo ni dgug par bya/ /bris sku nyid ni gnod sbyin mo/ /snga bar byin nas 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de yi rgyan rnams thams cad ni/ /gang

zhig cung zad rgyan rnams kun/ /snga ba ru ni blang bar bya/ /gal te 'dod na mtshan mo la/ /me tog gis ni mchod par bya/ /de nas rdo rje ro langs kyi bsgrub pa bka' stsal pa/ ma chad rma med gang ba ni/ /
legs par brtul zhugs can gyis bkru/ /mar khu chen pos byug pa dang / /bdug pa chen pos bdug par bya/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i shar phyogs su/ /mar khu chen po'i mar me dbul/ /nga yi khyod
la ci gsungs pa'i/ /de la dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya/ /yungs kar ro la brdeg bya zhing / /sgra ni ri bor yang dag brjod/ /de la mkhas pas 'jigs mi bya/ /oM dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo hU~M brjod

par bya'o/ /des ni ci zhig sbyin zhas smra/ /sgrub pos de la blang bar bya/ /rkang byug dang ni mig sman nyid/ /ral gri dang ni sa 'og dang / /ril bu mkha' la spyod pa nyid/ /thams cad sbyin par the tshom med/ /

de nas tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ gong gi bsam gtan byas nas ni/ /de la sngags ni bzla bar bya/ /rang gis he ru ka yi ni/ /rnal 'byor gyis ni bdag nyid du/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur/ /

gtsang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs dang / /zhi zhing dge ba'i gnas su ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bza' bar bya/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du/ /dpal ldan he ru ka yi ni/ /a ra li zhes bya ba'i mtshan/ /za ba na
ni gtam smra bya/ /ri yi rgyal po'i mgor gnas pa/ /tshogs kyis dag pa'i sems kyis bskor/ /de yang tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /'grub 'gyur gang phyir 'di nyid du/ /mchod pas grub par shes
mi 'gyur/ /de yi btsun mo bsrung ba ni/ /gshin rje mthar byed du ni 'gyur/ /shes rab mthar byed dpung gi mgon/ /pad ma mthar byed sku bsrung bdag /de yi bgegs kyi mthar byed ni/ /
dmag dpon du ni brjod pa yin/ /'dod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ /de yi gshed ma'i bdag po nyid/ /dpal ldan dbyig pa sngon po ni/ /sgo srung ba yi bdag po nyid/ /thams cad la ni dbang byed
pa/ /zhar ba mi g.yo mgon po nyid/ /yi ge pa yi bdag po ni/ /de bzhin du ni stobs po che/ /rdo rje a ra li las dngos grub bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //
de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa thams cad gtam 'di thos nas srid pa'i sbyor ba kun du bcad cing rnam par dag par gyur pa dang / /sdig pa zad cing nyon mongs
pa bsregs par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rdo rje a ra li brtson che/ /sna tshogs e ma rmad byung ba/ /gang zhig bdag cag nyon mongs khebs/ /gang

zhig bdag cag grub 'gyur ba/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams rkang gnyis kyi mchog dam pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi rol pa ston par byed do/ /la lar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mdzad/ /kha cig tu ni dka'

thub spyod/ /lha las babs pa'i sprul pa dang / /de bzhin khab nas 'byung ba dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /kha cig tu ni rab byung byed/ /'dul bar ston par byed pa dang / /mngon pa'i sems ni lhag pa'i sems/ /

la lar sngags kyi bdag nyid 'chang / /kha cig pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ /kha cig bye brag smra ba'i lam/ /kha cig tu ni mdo sde pa/ /kha cig tu ni rnam shes nyid/ /kha cig tu ni dbu ma nyid/ /la lar dmyal ba chen por 'gro/ /la lar
sems can rjes su skyong / /sems can 'dul ba la bltas nas/ /snying rje'i bsam pas rol par bya/ /rdo rje a ra li las phan yon gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /

gang yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis las rnam par 'byed pa bstan par bya'o/ /gang zhig rgyud gang du dam tshig byed pa des ni 'jig rten gsum po kun gyis bstod par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig rgyud de yis gang gi tshe byed

pa de ni srid par mdzes par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig glu yis mchod byed na/ /des ni rtag tu sgra snyan 'gyur/ /gang phyir gang zhig mar me 'bul/ /de ni mig dang ldan par 'gyur/ /gang zhig gar gyis mchod byed

pa/ /de ni rig 'dzin chen por 'gyur/ /gang zhig phyag 'tshal byed pa ni/ /de la skye bo phyag 'tshal 'gyur/ /gang zhig dri zhim 'bul ba ni/ /lus ni dri zhim ldan par 'gyur/ /gang zhig phreng ba bzang 'bul

ba/ /de ni gser gyi phreng ldan 'gyur/ /gang zhig gos ni 'bul ba ni/ /des ni lha yi gos rnyed 'gyur/ /gang zhig mtshan tsam 'don pa dang / /dad pa tsam yang rab byed pa/ /lhag par mos pa rab tu byed/ /gang zhig skye bo mchod byed

pa/ /de rnams thams cad rnam dag pa'i/ /srid pa'i longs spyod rab tu bzang / /rdo rje a ra li las yon tan rjes su bsngags pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas yang gang zhig de ltar rnam par dag pa'i sbyin pa byin pas

de rkang gnyis kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dga' bas the tshom skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te nye bar 'dug ste zhus pa/ ji lta bu yi rnal 'byor bgyi/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sbyin pa mtha' gsum yongs dag pa/ /he ru ka ni bsgom par bya/ /sbyin pa yang ni he ru ka / gang la sbyin pa'ang de lta bu/ /sbyin pa 'di ni rab tu bsngags/ /sbyin pa 'di ni dpe tsam ste/ /tshul khrims la

sogs 'di ltar spyad/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje a ra li las de skad ces gsungs so/ /rdo rje a ra li las rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o/ /rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po kA ya

sta pa ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ r-i Shi a ra li tan ta rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ r-i Shi a ra li'i rgyud kyi rgyal
po zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri gi rnam pa'i e ba~M sdom pa la bzhugs so/ /gnyis med gnyis
kyi rnal 'byor gyi/ /a ra li dang ri gir brtags/ /ri gi rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso/ /de la a ra lis zhus pa/ /gnas kyi rnam pa du zhig lags/ /nye gnas rnam pa du ru 'gyur/ /de la zhing

gi rnam pa du/ /nye zhing rnam pa du ru gsungs/ /ts+tshan+do rnam pa du ru brjod/ /nye ba'i ts+tshan+do rnam pa du/ /de la 'du ba gang zhig lags/ /de bzhin nye ba'i 'du ba ci/ /de la dur khrod rnam pa du/ /nye ba'i dur khrod ji ltar lags/ /

de la lha mo ri gi che/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor cher gnas pas/ /a ra li dang bder go bar/ /sa bcu rnams ni rab tu phye/ /gnas ni shar gyi lus 'phags so/ /de bzhin du ni ba glang spyod/ /gnas ni byang gi sgra

mi snyan/ /gnas ni de bzhin 'dzam bu gling / /gling bzhir lha mo bzhi dang ni/ /ri rab spyi bor ri gi bzhugs/ /a ra li dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /gnyis kyis mnyam sbyor gnyis med las/ /si si 'dod pa'i lcug ma dang / /bde

chen de bzhin sdom pa ma/ /ljang khu ser mo btsod mdog dang / /dmar mo ru ni yongs su grags/ /zhal gcig ma ni phyag gnyis dang / /g.yas na chu dri 'dzin ma ste/ /g.yon na rnal 'byor lhung bzed nyid/ /gcer bu mgo skyes

grol ba'o/ /a ra li yi sku mdog gnag /spyan gsum phyag drug a ra li/ /ri gi sngon mo spyan gsum ma/ /phyag gnyis zhags pa lcags kyu 'phyar/ /rdo rje ra li'i phyag gnyis kyis/ /ri gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen

'khyud/ /g.yas kyi phyag gnyis dag tu ni/ /rdo rje dang ni cang te'u brtags/ /gzhan dag tu ni dgra sta dang / /thod par mgo bo 'dzin pa nyid/ /gnas ni sems dang nye ba'i gnas/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung / /'dir

yang lha mo rnam pa bzhi/ /kha dog dbye ba gong ma bzhin/ /mi bzad rnon po sgyu ma che/ /mthon po gsung gi 'khor lo la'o/ /shar sgo de bzhin du ni zhing / /nye ba'i zhing ni lho ru 'gyur/ /ts+tshan+do ha ni nub kyi sgo/ /nye ba'i ts+tshan+do

ha ni byang / /wa dang ma he nyid dang ni/ /rta mgrin glang po'i rgyal mtshan nyid/ /'di rnams sgo dang sgo ru ni/ /kha dog dbye ba gong ma bzhin/ /gsung gi 'khor lo'i mtshams rnams ni/ /'du ba nye ba'i 'du ba nyid/ /sku yi

'khor lo'i mtshams su ni/ /dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod nyid/ /sku gsung 'khor lo'i mtshams su ni/ /dmyal ba dag ni rtag tu bri/ /sku la grang ba'i dngos po bzhi/ /gsung la de bzhin tsha ba bzhi/ /ri gi a ra li'i sbyor ba ste le'u

dang po'o// // lha mo ri gi snying rje che/ /a ra li ni nyid kyis zhus/ /ji ltar 'khor lo'i mtshams brgyad du/ /dmyal ba brgyad ni rnam par bsgom/ /ri gis bka' stsal pa/ ji snyed pa yi sems can gyi bsdu bas bsdus pa sgo nga las skyes pa dang /

mngal las skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / brdzus te skyes pa dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs med pa can nam/ 'du shes can dang / 'du shes med pa can de thams cad a ra li dmyal bar 'tshed par 'gyur ro/ /de rnams

gdon pa'i blos e ba~M rnam par bzhugs par bya'o/ /stong pa nyid ni bsgoms nas ni/ /hU~M ni snying kar bsgom par bya/ /hU~M las sna tshogs rigs bdag yin/ /rdo rje las ni a ra li/ /'byung ba nyid du 'gyur ba nyid/ /mang du brjod pas ci zhig bya/ /e

ba~M rnam pa ches gsang bar/ /sangs rgyas rin chen gab tser ni/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du ni 'gyur/ /oM a ra li ri gi phe~M phe~M phe~M b+h+yo swA hA/ char dbab pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /sa yi bdag po blangs nas ni/ /nor rgyas bu ni mkhas

pas bya/ /thod pa sbyar mar bzhag nas ni/ /ba yi 'o mas dgang bar bya/ /de yi sbyor bas bkang nas ni/ /nges par srad bu nag pos dkri/ /chu yi 'gram du rang song ste/ /ri gi a ra li sbyor bas/ /sngags pas sngags ni khri bzlas

na/ /klu ni 'khrugs pas char ba 'bebs/ /rmi lam gyi las bshad par bya ste/ /rnal 'byor bdag gi mal 'og tu/ /da ru ra yi khu ba dang / /dur khrod sol ba bsres pa dang / /'ug pa'i sgro rtsa'i smyu gu yis/ /ro dkris dmar po'i
gos la ni/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni rang gis bri/ /de la rnal 'byor ma 'dug nas/ /a ra li ni khri ru bzlas/ /oM a ra li ri gi phe~M/ a mu ka~M ke/ ma me da~M swap+na~M daR+sha ya b+h+yo/ swA hA/
khrag dgug pa bshad par bya ste/ rna tshol brtag par byas nas ni/ /gong bu mdun du dgod par bya/ /ri gi a ra li'i sbyor bas/ /dbugs kyi gong bu dgug par bya/ /khab kyi phyag rgya

mchu byas nas/ /dang po lce yi byed pa pos/ /ji ltar tsha ba'i gong bu bzhin/ /shes rab can gyis sbrang chen dgug /khab gyi phyag rgya gnyis pa ni/ /mgrin skras dal gyis yongs su gzir/ /'jug pa'i las yang dag par rab tu shad

par bya ste/ ji ltar sbyor ba'i gzugs bltas nas/ /bdag nyid ri gi yi gzugs su/ /ri gi a ra li'i sbyor bas/ /mgo ni 'og tu rnam par bsgom/ /oM badzra a ra li phaT ya to ta ya phe~M phe~M swA hA/ rengs par byed pa bshad par bya

ste/ dgra bo nyid kyi lce la ni/ /bu ram gong bu bsgom par bya/ /oM ri gi g+huT+Ta g+huT+Ta sha hU~M phaT/ dgra bo'i dri mas gzugs brnyan bya/ /de yi skra yis dkri bar bya/ /tsha ba gsum gyis kha bkang nas/ /gzugs brnyan kha ru bzhag par

bya/ /oM a ra lis ma me a mu ka~M ka~M ka~M sa ra ya phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ dbang du bya ba la/ bdag gi g.yon pa'i mig tu ni/ /e ba~M rnam par bsgom par bya/ /de yi g.yas pa'i mig tu ni/ /rdo rje 'phro ba'i rnam pa bsgom/ /de dag 'dus

pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /ri gi a ra lis sbyor bas/ /mdzes ma dbang du byed par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bsrung bar bya ba dang / /gnas ni sbyang ba nyid dang yang / /ye shes 'khor lo gzhugs pa dang / /thugs sogs byin gyis brlab pa dang / /yan

lag dgod par bya ba dang / /de bzhin lha yi dbang bskur dang / /lha mo rnams kyi sngags 'byung ba/ /a ra lis ni rtag tu bya/ /oM dang AHhU~M byin gyis brlab/ /de nyid gsum ni rigs gsum 'byung / /byin brlabs las ni 'grub par

'gyur/ /las rnams thams cad rab sbyin dge/ /snying dbus rang gi sa bon gyi/ /lcags kyus a ra li phyung nas/ /ye shes 'khor lo dgug par bya/ /bkug nas dam por bcing bar bya/ /dri D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to

me b+ha ba/ sarbA sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsa e h+ye hi b+ha ga ban ti raM swA hA/ spyi bo snying dang de bzhin mgrin/ /lte ba gsang ba'i gnas su ni/ /zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis/ /dam po la sogs bcing bar bya/ /ha ha hi hi de bzhin du/ /hu hu ho ho de

bzhin te/ /lus kyi gnas ni brgyad rnams su/ /yan lag dgod par bya ba nyid/ /spyi bo mchan khung lte ba dang / /kha dang de bzhin mig gnyis dang / /rkang 'thil gsang ba nyid du ni/ /yan lag dgod par rab tu grags/ /sngags ni rim

pa yis ni mtshon/ /lag pa ba spu'i khung pu nas/ /ri gi'i 'od zer spro bar bya/ /lcags kyu'i phyag rgya rab sbyor ba'i/ /yang ni phyis ni bsdu bar bya/ /ri gi hU~M sa~M ka~M ma~M sa~M nyid/ /thugs kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags/ /g+ha~M tA~M ma~M yu~M zhes

bya ba/ /gsung gi 'khor lor grags pa'o/ /dza~M ma~M hA~M ka~M a~M nyid ni/ /sku yi 'khor lor rab tu grags/ /ri gi sngags kyi gdon pa ni/ /rim pa yis ni mtshon par bya/ /rang gi snying las 'od zer byung / /lcags kyu'i phyag

rgyar rab sbyor bas/ /phyogs bcur rnam par bzhugs pa yi/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des bkug nas/ /cho gas 'dod pas mchod nas ni/ /dbang ni blo dang ldan pas blang / /oM sarba ta thA ga ta DA ki n+yA nu ga ta ma

hA a b+hi She kA nu d+ha nu zhes/ bdud rtsi lngas gang bum pa ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin gyi/ /des ni lha rnams dbang bskur bya/ /lha yi dbang las bde ba nyid/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta DA ki n+yA b+hi Shi ka badzra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko

ha~M/ gru gsum me yi sa bon gyis/ /snang byed rnam par bsgom par byed/ /snying gar hU~M las rigs bdag nyid/ /de nyid kyi ni de ru 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje las byung kun/ /rdo rje gur dang ra ba nyid/ /ri gi a ra li gnas su/ /bdag

nyid rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /dmyal ba brgyad ni thod pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'bar ma gsum gnas pa'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdoms/ /'khor lo g.yas su bskor ba yin/ /zhabs g.yon brkyang pa'i a ra li/ /sems kyis
