'jigs byed mnan nas ni/ /ri gi shing la mngon zhon pa/ /zhabs la zhabs kyis bskor ba bya/ /rnal 'byor ma kun thod par gnas/ /gar gyi rkang pas phyogs su gnas/ /tsha dang grang ba'i rab dbye bas/ /mtshams su thod pa

brgyad po yin/ /las thams cad rab tu bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // ri gi a ra lis zhus pa/ /brda yi rnam pa du zhig lags/ /de la lha mo ri gi chos/ /brda ni yang dag rab tu phye/ /brda

ni chen po ts+tsho ma bcu/ /bdag nyid sngon du byed pa nyid/ /gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /sgrub po dngos grub thob 'dod na/ /gnas ni dpral ba'i rgyab tu 'dod/ /ngos ni nye ba'i gnas nyid do/ /pus mo ts+tshan+dor 'gro bar 'gyur/ /dpral

bar nye ba'i ts+tshan+do nyid/ /lag pa g.yas pa 'du ba nyid/ /g.yon pa nye ba'i 'du ba nyid/ /rna ba g.yas pa dur khrod gnas/ /g.yon pa nye ba'i dur khrod do/ /snying ni zhing du yang dag 'gyur/ /lhag ma nye ba'i zhing nyid dang / /tshong rdal nyams

dga' tshong 'dus dang / /ma mo'i khyim du rtag tu blta/ /brda yi rnam par shes par bya/ /rang gi mtshan ma rang gis ston/ /ril bu mig sman la sogs pa/ /mchog ni rab tu smin par 'gyur/ /a ra li yis lha mor zhus/ /ye

shes dam pa ji ltar lags/ /gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /sgrub po dngos grub thob 'gyur ba/ /'bras phyir byang chub thob 'gyur ba'i/ /ting 'dzin lha mo ri gi ste/ /mchog tu bde ba chen po nyid/ /srub dang srub byed las byung ba/ /

kun mkhyen ye shes yang ngas 'byung / /sems pa thams cad yongs su spangs/ /dbang po thams cad bzlog par bya/ /dgon pa dben pa'i gnas su ni/ /gnyis gnyis thams cad rnam par spangs/ /mig dag steng du bzlog

nas ni/ /smin ma'i dbus su sems byas na/ /mi zad mun pa'i gzugs su ni/ /sgrub po dang po mthong bar 'gyur/ /phyis ni rna ba g.yon par bcug /dal gyis dal gyis 'gul bar 'gyur/ /yan lag can gyi bde ba gang / /de

bzhin phyag rgya chen po bde/ /phyi yi phyag rgya ngang gis 'jig /de yis ye shes kyang ni 'jig /bde ba chen po rtogs pa'i phyir/ /de yi ye shes phyag rgya pa/ /'di nyid ye shes chen po nyid/ /rang gis rig pa'i rang bzhin can/ /

gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji lta bar/ /gzhan du brjod par mi nus so/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor 'di/ /sems can gsol 'debs sems kyis ni/ /sems can kun la snying rje yis/ 'di ni rnal 'byor gtso bo nyid/ /'di la gom

pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /nam mkha' mnyam pa'i sems kyis ni/ /snying rje mthu chen rnal 'byor pas/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /dang por mun pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /gnyis pa dkar dang du ba 'thul/ /gsum pa me

khyer rnam pa ltar/ /bzhi pa ya ba'i me tog bzhin/ /lnga pa sprin med ye shes ni/ /rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs/ /sprin med nam mkha' lta bu ni/ /de yod thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu/ /rtag tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /

rtse gcig sems kyis ri gir 'gyur/ /ye shes bdud rtsi rtag 'thungs pas/ /bkres pas zil gyis mi non cing / /skom pa yis kyang zil mi non/ /rga dang na bas gzir mi 'gyur/ /'di yi thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /ri gi thams cad

rig par 'gyur/ /de nas rnal 'byor pa chen po/ /a ra li ni nyid kyis ni/ dam du 'khyud par 'o mdzad pas/ /ri gi la ni gus pas zhus/ /e ba~M ma ya ci zhig bshad/ /e yi rnam pas sa ru bshad/ /ba~M gi rnam pa de bzhin chu/ /ma ni me

zhes bya bar brjod/ /ya yi rnam pa rlung du gsungs/ /ri gi sdom pa ci zhig bshad/ /ri gis bka' stsal pa/ ri gi mkha' 'gro mar ni gsung / /sdom pa dam par gyur pa 'di/ /ri gi e ba~M sdom pa ni/ /e ba~M rnam pa rna bar gnas/ /ri gi sna

yi rtse mor ni/ /rtag tu ri gi bzhugs pa yi/ /ye shes dam pa 'di nyid ni/ /kun mkhyen ye shes de yi bdag /'byung ba chen po bzhi gtan la dbab pa dang brda'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas rnal 'byor chen po yis/ /a

ra li ni nyid kyis ni/ /rang bzhin mdzes pa nyid la zhus/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa'i/ /khrag ni ji ltar dgug par bgyi/ /bka' pa/ nus la sogs pas mdun du ni/ /ya ba'i me tog gzhag nas ni/ /rang gi khrag ni dgug par bya/ /

ri gi nyon cig goms pa yi/ /nas ni nyi shu kha smad 'byung / /phyi nas khrag ni dgug par byed/ /lha ni dral ba bshad par bya/ /spyi bor 'bar ba bsam par bya/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab nas ni/ /der ni sngags ni bzlas par bya/ /

oM he ru ka pa ta~M phi pa tA ya/ /ri gi a ra li'i sbyor bas/ /lha la phyag byas 'gag par 'gyur/ /A li kA li yan lag mnyam/ /'di dag gnyis dbus rang sa bon/ /rang gi sa bon nyid kyis ni/ /rang gi phyag rgya rnams yin te/ /phyag rgya las

ni lha rnams 'byung a/ /oM shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/ lcags kyu phyag rgya lag gnyis kyis/ /mthe chung phan tshun lcags kyu'i tshul/ /dbu ma yi ni sor mo gnyis/ /mthe bong rgan pos gzir bar bya/ /sdigs mdzub

gnyis kyi zhags pa nyid/ /rdo rje ral gri zhags chen po/ /chos kyi ye shes gang zhig gzhan/ /ri gi nyid du rab tu grags/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yis ni/ /si si la sogs rab tu grags/ /mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi yin te/ /mi bzar

la sogs rab tu grags/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yis ni/ /wa la sogs pa rab tu grags/ /phyag drug 'gro ba drug tu gsungs/ /spyan gsum srid pa gsum du brjod/ /'jigs byed bdag gi sems nyid de/ /zhabs kyi rtsa bar bsgyel

ba nyid/ /dga' ba la sogs sa bcu ni/ /gnas sogs yang dag rab tu grags/ /pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya drug /thod pa nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor nyid/ /e ba~M ma ya'i dbus gnas pa'o/ /bdag nyid kyis ni de ltar bsam/ /'chol

ba kun gyi mtshan nyid kyis/ /thams cad rgyud du yang dag gnas/ /gri gug ma rig gcod pa nyid/ /thod pa nyid ni snying rje che/ /ri gi a ra li yi sgra/ /cang te'u hU~M he'i sngags bzlas pas/ /dgra sta chos kyi 'byung gnas brjod/ /rdo

rje rdo rjer rab tu grags/ /mgo bor nyon mongs pa yi bdud/ /thod pa nam mkha' dag pa nyid/ /lcags kyu ri gi ze 'bru ste/ /de bzhin zhags pa dag pa nyid/ /ngang gi dag pa bsdus nas ni/ /lus ni mchod rten dag pa ste/ /skyil dkrung

gdan du shes par bya/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi snying por gsungs/ /gnyer ma gsum brtag lte ba nyid/ /lto ba yang ni gzugs su 'gyur/ /mgrin pa yang ni mgrin par brjod/ /kha khyer mgo bor shes par bya/ /spyi bo gdugs kyi phreng

bar brjod/ /mig gnyis zla ba nyi ma nyid/ /'phan ni mgo las skyes pa yin/ /rus pa bde bar gshegs pa'i gdung / /de phyir rang byin rlob par 'gyur/ /de phyir sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan lus/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu

mchod/ /rang gi ngo bo sangs rgyas su bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // rgyal po chen po zas gtsang 'di/ /a ra lis ni yang dag phye/ /de la ri gi sgyu ma che/ /'gro ba thams cad shes rab dag /don grub rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /lha

mo sa 'tsho phyag rgya'o/ /sgra gcan bzang po'i bde ba che/ /sgyu ma'i gzugs kyi spros pa las/ /sgyu ma chen po sa 'tsho nyid/ /rdo rje sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul bas/ /don grub lhan cig skyes dga' nyid/ /sras ni bcom ldan rdo rje rdo

can/ /yab ni rdo rje 'chang grar brags/ /yum ni sgyu ma chen mo yin/ /de nyid phyag rgyar rab tu grags/ /mthe bong rgan po rdo rje yin/ /lte ba chos kyi 'byung gnas gsungs/ /sgyu ma chen po'i rnam 'phrul bas/ /don grub nyid ni gzi brjid

can/ /ngo bos 'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid/ /lha mo ri gi nga tshig nyon/ /las la spyod pa rab brtags pas/ /lus can rnams ni rtag tu gdungs/ /dga' ba yang ni shi shir gsungs/ /mchog tu dga' ba 'dod pa ma/ /dga' bral dga'

ba bde chen ma/ /lhan cig skyes dga' sdom pa ma/ /mi bzang ma ni yo ru gsungs/ /rnon mo yang ni 'khyud mo nyid/ /sgyu ma skyed la sgyu ma che/ /mthe bo mchu ni 'jig pa nyid/ /dga' ba'i rtsod pa wa nyid de/ /sbrang rtsi btung bas ma he nyid/ /

rtog pa yis ni rta mgrin te/ /'o byed glang po'i rgyal mtshan no/ /rdo rje ra li 'dod chen can/ /'dod pa ma ni ri gir brjod/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis/ /'gro ba thams cad rnam par khyab/ /si si rnam pas dmyal ba bzhi/ /

de bzhin ha yi rnam pa bzhi/ /'khor bar ji ltar spyad pa ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa mi 'gal lo/ /rdo rje a ra li nyid ni/ /khu bar yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ /ri gi bde ba chen por gsungs/ /ri gi a ra li sbyor bas/ /rdo rje sgyu ma zhes

byar brjod/ /bud med sgyu ma'i spros pa yis/ /'gro ba thams cad rnam par rmongs/ /bud med sgyu ma sangs rgyas nyid/ /sgyu ma thams cad spel bar byed/ /snying po'i sngags ni/ oM a rA lI b+h+yo b+h+yo ha ha ha ha/ si si si si mi gsal bar

bzlas so/ /gnyis kyi nye ba'i snying po ni/ /ha ha ha/ las rgyas pa la sngags gang ni/ /de yi sngags su rab tu bsngags/ /snying po yi ni sngags yin no/ /nye ba'i sngags kyis bskul ba yin/ /bsgom pa bde chen myang ba ste/ /de bzhin

dam tshig mchod pa nyid/ /thams cad kyi ni dam tshig la/ /mi las skyes pa rab tu bsngags/ /klu gzir gnyis 'thung dam tshig ste/ /rmi lam rta ni rab tu bsngags/ /bsad la ma he dam tshig go/ /dbang la khyi ni rab tu bsngags/ /

khrag dgug pa la dam tshig ste/ /'jug pa de bzhin rnga mo nyid/ /rengs pa la ni ne 'u'i sha / kha na ma tho med rnyed pa/ /gal te bsad par byas na ni/ /de tshe rnal 'byor pas ni 'grub/ /sems can bskyab sems rnal 'byor

pa/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /dkyil 'khor khru ni bzhi pa bya/ /sgo khyud sor ni gnyis su gsungs/ /logs la yang ni sor gnyis yang / /sgo khyud kyi ni kha khyer la/ /sor ni bcu gnyis dag tu gsungs/ /lha yi

snam bu sor gnyis te/ /rta babs sor ni bcu drug nyid/ /sgo las sor mo gnyis kyis ni/ /rdo rje phreng ba de bzhin bya/ /dkyil 'khor snying po zlum po ste/ /phyogs bzhi kha dog bzhi dang ldan/ /kha dog lnga yi rdul tshon nyid/ /srad bu lnga zhes

bya bar brjod/ /gser dang yang na dngul nyid dang / /mu tig dang ni byi ru dang / /mu men yang dag bsres nas ni/ /rin chen lnga ni shin du gzhug /lha yi grangs kyi bum pa nyid/ /rnam rgyal bum pa ches che ba/ /bum pa dkri ba nyid du ni/ /

sgrub pa po ni dam pas bya/ /dang por sa ni yongs dag bya/ /gnyis par thig sogs gdab pa dang / /lnga pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba dang / /de bzhin lnga par sbyin sreg nyid/ /'jig rten skyong ba dbang po dang / /lha mo khyod ni dbang du 'gyur/ /dkyil

'khor 'di ni bzhengs par bgyi/ /'od srungs ma yis bgegs med mdzod/ /ji ltar bdag nyid nags de bzhin/ /rtag pa nyid du gtor ma sbyin/ /mtshan mo thun gcig gnas pa ni/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor mnyes par bya/ /

gtor ma'i sngags ni/ oM sharga ti ka sa ne nA kA ro mu kha~M sarbA d+harmA Na~M ad+yA nut+pa~Mn twAta/ sa ni yongs su gzung dus su/ /bgegs ni skrod par byed pa'i sngags/ /oM a na sa ta na na Ta stiSh+Tha ya ma bA ru na ku be ra ka swA tsA s+tha Ne

Shu tiSh+Ta d+ha~M rak+Sha~M ku ru ta me bi ra tra~M/ cho ga'i mtshan nyid dang nges pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o/ /ri gi a ra li'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po kA yastA pa gA ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang / bod

kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e ba~M bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsa tu

R+pI tha ma hA yo gi nI tan tra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gdan bzhi pa zhes bya ba/ thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor

ma yi dra ba sdom/ /ye shes stong pa can dbang phyug /gnas gtsang ma na bzhugs nas su/ /thams cad mkhyen pas 'di skad gsungs/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan can dang / mi sdug pa dang 'phyang ba dang / mgrin pa gsum pa can dang /

ri rab dang ri rab gtsug tor dang / pad ma can dang / pad+ma yangs pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad bcu'i nang nas phyag na rdo rje la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu 'dir phyag

na rdo rje stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ lag pa thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gsang ba sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid rnams/ /

ye shes dbang la nyan par 'tshal/ /sa dang nam mkha' ji ltar lags/ /chu dang me ni ji lta bu/ /'byung dang 'jug pa'i dbugs dag gis/ /bsam gtan ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ /yul 'khor skyong ba dang po'i lha/ /dkyil

'khor dag ni ji ltar lags/ /ye shes rnams shes lus kyi ni/ /las la sogs pa ji ltar sbyor/ /'khor ba las sgrol mtshan nyid kyi/ /de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /dbugs kyi las la sogs thams cad/ /ye shes can gyi

las su sbyar/ /nyi khri dang ni chig stong dang / /drug brgya ru ni brtsi bar bya/ /chu tshod drug bcu'i dbugs rnams kyis/ /nyin mtshan du ni grags pa yin/ /'byung dang 'jug pa'i dbugs rnams ni/ /'byung ba'i grangs kyis

brtsi bar bya/ /blo dang ldan pas dbugs gnyis ni/ /'jug pa 'byung la thim par bya/ /de bzhin sa ni bcu gnyis la/ /phyi rol mtshan ma bzhag bya ste/ /tshes grangs mtshan ma ji bzhin du/ /re mig bcu gnyis rnams su

gzhag /go rims bcu gnyis rab brtson pas/ /shar nas dpyid zla 'bring sogs gzhag /ro hi ta dang mo hi ta/ /de bzhin b+ha drA br-i Sha b+ha/ /kur ma ma kar raN+Da dang / /mi kir de bzhin bi tri ka /byA ku swapa na kA ma nA/ /
ka ma sa dang bcu dang gnyis/ /'di dag shar sogs re mig la/ /go rims bzhin du dgod par bya/ /ro hi ta la btsas pa'i bu/ /skal ba bzang la de bzhin phyug /gdug pa'i sems la nad bu can/ /rtag tu mtha'

'khob gtso bo ste/ /'khrig pa la ni rtag tu dga'/ /thams cad du ni snyan par smra/ /ro hi ta la lha mchod cing / /de bzhin tshe lo bdun bcu thub/ /ro hi ta la nor btang na/ /mdza' bo thams cad ldog par 'gyur/ /

ro hi ta la lus rmas na/ /dpal dang kun tu phrad par 'gyur/ /ro hi ta la gnas brten na/ /grogs dang nor gyis rgyas par 'gyur/ /ro hi ta la mgron zhugs na/ /bsam pa thams cad mngon par 'grub/ /bag ma blang dang me yi las/ /

zhi ba'i las ni sbyar bar bya/ /mo hi ta'i don sbyor ba/ /bgrang ba nyid kyis shes par bya/ /mo hi ta la btsas pa'i bu/ /tshe ni drug bcu rtsa lngar grags/ /mang du za zhing sems chung la/ /'khrig pa la ni rtag tu dga'/ /rtag tu

gdug cing ca cor ldan/ /mi snyan pa dag smra la dga'/ /khro la nga rgyal snying stobs med/ /sdig pa byed cing ngang tshul ngan/ /'khyal pa dang ni tshig rtsub smra/ /mtshon gyis nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /yang na tshe lo brgyad bcu ni/ /rtsa

bzhi dag tu rab tu grags/ /rung ba'i sa ni spong byed cing / /mi rung ba la brtson par 'gyur/ /lus kyi yan lag rmas na ni/ /'chi bdag dang ni phrad par 'gyur/ /gal te cung zad nor gtong na/ /btang ba slar ni mi ldog go/ b+ha drA la ni

skyes pa'i bu/ /kha zas bzang po za ba dang / /bzang po'i las ni byed 'gyur zhing / /lo brgya ru ni 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /dbul la chos ni spyod pa dang / /bden par smra zhing snyan par brjod/ /chung ma gcig gis tshim pa'i lus/ /

bzang por smra ba'i gtso bor 'gyur/ /bzo rnams kun dang dus tshod rig /rtag tu rang gi gnyen dang mdza'/ /chad pa gcod pa'i rigs can te/ /de bzhin lus ni chu ru 'chi/ /bri Sha b+ha la skyes pa'i bu/ /brtson

'grus ldan zhing dgra la dpa'/ /sgeg dang nor gyis phyug pa ste/ /chung ma mang du len par 'gyur/ /rtag tu gnyen ni mang ba ste/ /pha'i srog ni 'joms par byed/ /so nam tshong gis 'tsho byed cing / /tshe ni drug bcur 'tsho
bar 'gyur/ /snyom las mu cor smra ba dang / /gdug cing las dang ngang tshul ngam/ /mtshon gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am/ /yang na srog chags gdug pas so/ /kurma la ni btsas pa'i bu/ /rtag tu sems khral

can du gnas/ /chung gis khro zhing chung gis mgu/ /mang du smra zhing gnyen la byams/ /drag du smra zhing lhag par khro/ /phyug cing thams cad gtong la dga'/ /bu dang chung ma 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu rang gi yul

na gtso/ /zhing gi las la sogs pas 'tsho/ /mdze yi nad kyis 'dzin par 'gyur/ /tshe lo brgyad bcu lon pa na/ /de bzhin rang gi yul du 'chi/ /ma ka ra la btsas pa'i bu/ /tshe ni dgu bcu rtsa drug ste/ /tshul khrims
phun tshogs bsod nams ldan/ /'dul ba dang ni spyod pa srung / /nor ldan gzugs bzang phun sum tshogs/ /skal pa bzang zhing grags pas mdzes/ /bzo dang sgyu rtsal kun la mkhas/ /chung ma gcig ni shin tu

gsal/ /rtag tu sems ni lhod pa ste/ /dul ba dang ni bsrung ba ste/ /gnyen gyi nang na gcig pu gtso/ /kun la snyan sogs smra ba dang / /de bzhin g.yul ngor 'chi bar 'gyur/ /tshe lo lnga bcu rtsa lnga dang / /yang na

drug bcu 'am sum bcu'o/ /raN+Da la ni btsas pa'i bu/ /rtag du sdig pa'i blo can te/ /sems can rnams la 'khyal par smra/ /rtag tu dbul zhing kha gsag smra/ /dus kun du ni nad bu can/ /rgyal pos chad pa gcod

pa'i bdag /'khrig pa la ni rtag tu dga'/ /gzhan dag la ni yid mi rton/ /zol dang bzo sogs kun rig pa/ /bud med rnams la skal pa bzang / /tshe lo lnga bcu rtsa lnga 'am/ /yang na drug bcu 'am sum bcur nges/ /

mi ki ri la btsas pa'i bu/ /chos shes rang gi rigs kyang mtho/ /lugs kyi bstan bcos phun sum tshogs/ /bzo dang rig pa sna tshogs ldan/ /tshig rtsub smra la drag pa ste/ /shin du khro zhing 'jigs su rung / /nor nyung

gzugs ni bzang ba ste/ /bya ba thams cad myur bar 'grub/ /de yi lus ni rang nyid kyis/ /chu ru mchongs te 'chi bar 'gyur/ /tshe lo brgyad bcu rtsa brgyad na/ /yang na rgyal po'i khrims kyis gsod/ /bi tri ka

la btsas pa'i bu/ /skyes ma thag du ma ni 'chi/ /pha yang lo ni brgyad na 'chi/ /de bzhin rang gi khyim na gtso/ /khro la rdzas ni nyung bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa la sogs blun dang ldan/ /las dang sems khral chung ba ste/ /dpung rnams kyi

ni gtso bo nyid/ /tshe lo brgya dang rtsa brgyad na/ /rang gi khyim du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gnyen rnams kun dang mdza' ba ste/ /sdug phongs rnams la rtse bar ldan/ /byA ku la ni btsas pa'i bu/ /blo chung ngan par smra ba dang / /shes

rab bzhan cing nad bu can/ /rtag tu grogs po ngan dang 'grogs/ /rang gi gnyen byams skal pa bzang / /sdug phongs rnams la rjes su brtse/ /nor dang ba lang shin tu phyug /khyim dang chung ma gsum la sogs/ /

skad cig khro zhing nga rgyal ldan/ /dgra yis gzir bas 'jigs par 'gyur/ /pha dang ma ni tshe yang ring / /de bzhin tshe lo bdun bcu thub/ /tshong gi las kyis 'tsho bar byed/ /lan gcig tshong gi rgyu yis 'chi/ /
sbyor ba brtsams pa'i mtshan ma la/ /ye shes can gyis bgrang bar bya/ /swapa na la ni btsas pa'i bu/ /dpa' rtul pha rol gnon pa yis/ /dgra rnams thams cad bsreg par byed/ /mgon med rnams kyi rtsa lag

ste/ /dus rnams kun tu dbul ba dang / /sdig pa'i las la nan tan byed/ /bdag nyid seng ger sems pa dang / /tshig rtsub smra la thams cad rig /dus kun du ni nad med cing / /rtag tu longs spyod rnyed par 'gyur/ /

gzhan la brten pas 'tsho ba dang / /bud med kun la gnod cing spyod/ /tshe lo lnga bcu tham pa ru/ /de ni nges par 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /dgra yi mtshon gyis brgyab nas su/ /'chi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /kA ma nA la

btsas pa'i bu/ /tshe ni drug bcu rtsa brgyad 'tsho/ /nor dang 'bru dang grong dang ni/ /phyugs dang rta sogs bzhon par ldan/ /bden par smra zhing chos kyang shes/ /sems can kun la phan par byed/ /rig pa dang ni
snyan par smra/ /bstan bcos thams cad shin tu rgyas/ /sems can kun la skal pa bzang / /rang gi yul du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sbyor ba'i mtshan ma bstan pa rnams/ /ngas bstan pa la the tshom med/ /ro

hi ta ni lha la mchod/ /mo hi ta ni nor la brkam/ /b+ha drA kha zas bzang po za/ /phr-i Sha b+ha la mang du khro/ /kurma la ni gzhan du sems/ /ma ka ra la 'brel par smra/ /raN+Da la ni sdig sems can/ /mi ki ra ni 'khrig

la brten/ /bi tri ka ni gnyid log cing / /byA ku li ni bla rdol lo/ /swapa na la ni rang nyid sems/ /kA ma glu dang klog 'don byed/ /ro hi ta la zhi ba'i las/ /de bzhin bri Sha rgyas pa ste/ /ma ka ra ni dbang dang 'byor/ /

b+ha drA la ni mngon spyod bya/ /mo hi ta yis bskrad pa ste/ /kur ma la ni bcing ba'i las/ /raN Das dbye bar shes par bya/ /byA ku la ni sman sbyar bya/ /ra yi khyu mchog grub pa ste/ /bdud rtsi sbyor bas skye

mi 'gyur/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhag nas/ /snga dro mkhas pas brtsi bar bya/ /ro hi ta la nor byin na/ /rdzu 'phrul dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/ /mo hi ta la nor bsdus na/ /gzhan gyis dgag par mi nus so/ /b+ha

drA la ni khyim brtsams na/ /dpal dang yang dag 'phrad par 'gyur/ /bri Sha lha'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /sngags ni kun tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /kuR+ma'i sbyor bas bag ma blang / /thams cad du ni 'bral mi 'gyur/ /ma ka ra la zhing btab

na/ /gdon mi za bar 'bru rnams 'phel/ /raN+Da bud med 'grod byas na/ /shi bar gyur kyang mi gtong ngo / /mi ki ra la tshong byas na/ /gtam pa de ltar len par snang / /rtag tu brtan par gzhag bya ba'i/ /las tshogs

bi tri ka las bzung / /byA ku li las 'gron zhugs na/ /'tshe ba med par gnas su phyin/ /swapa nas thams cad kun tu ni/ /nges par rtag tu mngon par 'ong / /kA ma la ni nor btang na/ /btang ba slar la ldog

mi 'gyur/ /ro hi ta la nor rgyas bu/ /mo hi ta ni 'jog po yin/ /stobs kyis rgyu ba b+ha drA'i gnas/ /de bzhin pad ma br-i Sha b+ha/ /kurma pad ma chen po ste/ /ma ka ra ni dung skyong ngo / /raN+Da dung skyong chen po ste/ /mi ki ra ni rigs

ldan no/ /bi tri mgo brgya pa yin te/ /byA ku la ni 'khyil ltung yin/ /swapa na 'jigs pa zhes bya ste/ /kA ma dus kyis 'chi bar 'dod/ /'di dag dus sbyor rim pa bzhin/ /bye brag tu ni shes par bya/ /rwa'i khyu mchog

grub pa ste/ /bdud rtsi'i sbyor bas skye mi 'gyur/ /gang gi mche bas mngon zin na/ /'chi bdag dang ni phrad 'gyur ba'o/ /dug bsdu ba yi sbyor ba dag /gzhan la dug ni sbyar bar bya/ /dus kyi mtshan ma ji bzhin du/ /

go rims rim pa bzhin du bya/ /dpyid zla 'bring sogs rims bzhin du/ /nyi ma byang du 'gro ba'i tshe/ /ji lta'i dus bzhin mtshan ma ni/ /rim gyis rim gyis sbyar bar bya/ /nyin mo'i chu tshod so sor ni/ /mkhas
pas bcu gnyis bzhi bsgyur bya/ /mtshan mo drug dang bcu gsum bsgyur/ /chu tshod mkhas pas brtsam par bya/ /re mig dag ni gnyis pa la/ /dus la mkhas pas dus tshod bya/ /nyin mo drug dang bcu gnyis

bsgyur/ /chu tshod kyi ni mtshan mar bya/ /bzhi dang bcu gsum bsgyur ba ni/ /mtshan mo chu tshod du ni brtag /bdag dang bcu gnyis bsgyur ba dag /nyin mo ru ni brtag par bya/ /gnyis dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba/ /
mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni brtag /chu tshod sum bcu tham pa ni/ /dbus kyi bi shu gnyis par sbyar/ /gnyis mtha' bcu ni gsum po dag /nyin mo chu tshod shes pa ste/ /brgyad dang bcu ni gnyis po dag /de

yi mtshan mo'i mtshan mar bya/ /bzhi dang bcu gsum mtshan ma ni/ /nyin mo yi ni chu tshod de/ /drug dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/ /mtshan mo'i chu tshod mtshan ma bya/ /drug dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba/ /nyin

mo yi ni shes bya ste/ /bzhi dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/ /mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni grags/ /byang du bgrod pa bshad nas ni/ /de bzhin gzhan gyi dus shes bya/ /bzhi dang gsum bsgyur chu tshod ni/ /nyin mo yir

ni bshad pa yin/ /drug dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/ /mtshan mo yi ni mtshon par bya/ /gnyis dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba/ /de bzhin nyin mo'i chu tshod yin/ /brgyad dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/ /chu tshod mtshan

gyir rab tu grags/ /bcu ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba dag /bi shu nyin mo'i chu tshod de/ /de bzhin mtshan gyi chu tshod kyang / /bcu ni gsum du bsgyur bar bya/ /de bzhin nyid shu bar ma gnyis/ /brgyad dang bcu ni

gnyis bsgyur ba/ /nyin mo yi ni bsam par bya/ /gnyis dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba/ /mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni brtag /drug dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/ /nyin mo'i chu tshod rim pa yin/ /bzhi dang bcu ni

gsum bsgyur ba/ /de bzhin mtshan mo'i chu tshod do/ /sum brgya lnga bcu rtsa gnyis kyi/ /chu tshod kyis ni dus rnams 'da'/ /chu tshod drug bcu'i grangs kyis ni/ /nyin mtshan phrugs gcig du ni sbyar/ /
zla ba'i go rim ji bzhin du/ /rim pa de bzhin mtshan ma bya/ /chu tshod dbugs sogs rdzogs pa dang / /bi shu ma gtogs rim 'phel bri/ /las dang las min bye brag bzhin/ /dbugs kyi rim
gyis bzung bar bya/ /kha dang ra sogs dus tshigs dang / /bgrod pa gnyis kyis mtshon par bya/ /gnyis po dag ni bcus bsgyur ba/ /de bzhin lo yi chu tshod do/ /de yi mtshan ma ldan pa yis/ /nyin mtshan
gyi ni dbugs su brtsi/ /ngag gi dbang phyug kun bzung nas/ /dbyangs kyi mtshan mar mngon par gzhag /ma ning gnyis ni spangs nas su/ /sa yi dbang phyug kun tu gzhag /a yi rim pa la bab na/ /

dpal dang mngon par mnyam 'grogs shing / /nor rnyed pa ni snang ba ste/ /skal pa bzang por gdon mi za/ /A yi re mig la bab na/ /rims dang nad kyis gzir ba dang / /'jigs shing skrag par snang 'gyur ba/ /
a zhes bya bar nges pa ston/ /yi ge i la bab gyur na/ /rgyal po'i dpal ni ster 'gyur te/ /kun nas nor ni rnyed pa dang / /gang zhig bsam pa des 'grub 'gyur/ /yi ge I la bab gyur na/ /zla ba drug na

'chi ba dang / /de bzhin dgras ni gzir ba dang / /me yis 'jigs pa shes par bya/ /yi ge i la bab gyur na/ /dpal dang grogs mo rnyed pa dang / /nor dang 'bru ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /dpal rnams kyang ni rnyed

par 'gyur/ /U la gal te bab gyur na/ /de ni dgra yis 'tshe bar 'gyur/ /bran gza' dang ni gnyen mtshan rnams/ /'jigs shing skrag par snang bar 'gyur/ /yi ge e la bab gyur na/ /'phral du skye bo skal can

'gyur/ /skye ba bud med dag gi ni/ /mchod pa'i gnas ni thob par 'gyur/ /ai yi mtshan ma la lhung na/ /dgra dang rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / /lus can rkun pos gzir 'gyur zhing / /nad dang rims kyis thebs par 'gyur/ /

o yi mtshan ma la bab na/ /gnas kyi dbang po 'gyur ba dang / /nor dang 'bru ni rnyed 'gyur zhing / /yid 'ong rig pa de bzhin no/ /au yi mtshan ma la bab na/ /'thab mo dang ni dgras 'tshe zhing / /gnas las nyams dang

brdeg 'tshog dang / /byas pa chud ni zos par 'gyur/ /yi ge a~M la bab gyur na/ /bran bzang dag ni rnyed 'gyur zhing / /bu dang rig pa rnyed 'gyur te/ /de bzhin grogs po rnyed par 'gyur/ /ji ltar sngon gyi a zhes pa/ /

de bzhin tha ma'ang gzung bar bya/ /drug 'gyur du ni gzhag nas su/ /lnga pa de ni sum 'gyur bya/ /sum brgya drug bcu bsres nas ni/ /sa bzhin du ni bcad nas su/ /yi ge lhag ma bzung byas te/ /dge dang mi

dge mtshon par bya/ /yang na ri mo kyag kyog bri/ /dpangs kyi dang po la sogs bgrang / /yang na me tog gtor nas ni/ /de bzhin sa ni mtshon par bya/ /snga dro ro hi ta dus su/ /bden pa thams cad blta bar bya/ /rnal 'byor

bstan bcos rab tu bsngags/ /bdag gi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba ste dang po'o// // ye shes de ni bye brag dag /bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /lus kyi mtshan ma ji lta bu/ /de nyid gang la

brten par bgyi/ /lus kyi mtshan ma ston pa rnams/ /nyon cig rdo rje rgyal po che/ /lus kyi mtshan ma mngon bstan gyis/ /gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /'chi ba'i dus la bab par gnas/ /dbugs ni rnam par rgod tsam

gyis/ /lus can zla ba drug gis 'chi/ /'jigs pa cung zad mthong min par/ /'gram pa'i mtshams ni bye 'gyur na/ /de tshe dus la bab par 'gyur/ /dbugs ni chad cing chad gyur pa/ /snga dro ro hi ta dus su/ /mtshan ma dag

ni brtag par bya/ /sna yi bar ni chad gyur na/ /nyi ma bdun na gdon mi za/ /mig gi chu ni chad gyur na/ /de bzhin nyi ma lnga yis 'chi/ /'gram pa'i logs kyi mtshan ma yis/ /zhag gcig las ni mi 'tsho'o/ /rna ba'i chol
bzangs ltebs pa yis/ /chu tshod lnga na gdon mi za/ /'dir ni lce yi thig nag gis/ /lus can zhag gnyis 'chi bar 'gyur/ /steng 'og so ni 'thams pa na/ /zhag gsum 'chi bdag phrad par 'gyur/ /mgrin pa'i

logs kyi phyi rol rtsas/ /zla ba phyed na gdon mi za/ /brang gi dra ba zhom gyur na/ /zla phyed sman pas gsor mi rung / /sen mo khrag ni med pa yis/ /lus can nyi ma brgyad na 'chi/ /'chi ba'i mtshan ma brgyad bcas pa/ /

'chi ba'i dus bab mtshon par bya/ /sna yi bar sha chad pa la/ /ye shes sa bon gyis gzir bya/ /mig gi chu ni chad pa la/ /rdo rje ma yi sa bon gzung / /mkhur tshos logs kyi mtshan ma la/ /drag mo'i sa bon

gzir bar bya/ /rna ba'i chol zangs zhum pa la/ /ro langs ma yi sa bon dgod/ /lce yi thig nag 'di la ni/ /gtum mo'i sa bon bsam par bya/ /so dang so ni 'thams pa la/ /seng ge ma yi sa bon brdeg /mgrin pa'i logs

kyi phyi rol rtsa/ /stag mo'i sa bon brdeg par bya/ /brang gi dra ba zhom pa la/ /lce spyang sa bon gzung bar bya/ /lag pa'i sen khrag med pa la/ /'ug pa ma yi sa bon gzung / /'chi ltas yan lag mtshan ma ni/ /sa

bon de dag dgod pas bsrung / /phyi nas ye shes 'khor lo ni/ /bri ba'i cho gas rnam shes bsrung / /ma bsregs kham phor gnyis bzung la/ /gur gum ro tsa na yis ni/ /'og gi cha ni re mig dgu/ /de bzhin steng la

bcu gnyis bya/ /dbus su ming ni bris nas su/ /sa bon gyis ni mngon par bskor/ /phyag 'tshal dbyangs kyi dang po ste/ /bsrung ba'i tshig ni sngon du bya/ /sangs rgyas lnga sogs ldan pa yi/ /sa bon mtha' ru gnas pa ste/ /

bsreg byed yi ge de yi mtha'/ /steng sogs myu khyud dbyangs yig dgod/ /kha ba gnyis 'gyur sa bon dang / /lha mo rdo rje ma zhes bya/ /sangs rgyas lnga yin sa bon ldan/ /thams cad phyag 'tshal sreg byed mtha'/ /dbyug pa

'jig rten dbang phyug mgon/ /gya gyu phyag na rdo rje yin/ /de bzhin lus ni 'jam pa'i mchog /mgo dang dpung pa byams pa ste/ /steng du 'bar ba ma yig ste/ /'khor ba thams cad sgrol byed pa'o/ /de la shar gyi phyogs

gnas pa/ /lha mo rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /byang du drag mo zhes bya ba'i/ /sa bon nyid ni sbyar bar bya/ /nub kyi phyogs su gnas pa ni/ /ro langs ma yi sa bon sbyar/ /lho yi phyogs su gang gnas pa/ /gtum mo'i sa bon

rdzogs par bstan/ /sa bon mngon du bstan pa bzhin/ /dbang ldan du ni seng ge ma/ /me mtshams stag mo dgod bya ste/ /bden bral du ni lce spyang ma/ /rlung du hU~M byed 'ug pa mo/ /mtshams na gnas pa'i sa bon ni/ /bzhi
po'i drug po'i dngos su ni/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams ji bzhin du/ /de bzhin sa bon dgod par bya/ /steng gi gnas ni bcu gnyis la/ /dbyangs kyi sa bon gzhag par bya/ /phyag 'tshal bsreg pa
mtha' dang bcas/ /phyogs su ma ning gzhag par bya/ /'bar ma 'jib ma zhes bya dang / /de bzhin 'phrog byed mkha' 'gro ma/ /phyag 'tshal sreg pa mthar gnas pa/ /ji lta'i gnas bzhin gzhag par bya/ /shar
phyogs mkha' 'gro ma yi gnas/ /byang du gnas pa 'bar ma ste/ /nub tu 'jib mar yang dag gsungs/ /lho ru 'phrog byed dgod par bya/ /dbus su ming ni bri bya ste/ /'og tu ji bzhin steng de bzhin/ /gnyi
ga kha ni sbyar nas su/ /skud pa dmar pos dkri bar bya/ /kun nas mnyam pa'i gnas su ni/ /tsan dan dmar pos byug gnas su/ /sna tshogs me tog bdug pa dang / /drir bcas nyer spyod gtor ma byin/ /dbus

su 'khrul 'khor gzhag nas ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma lngas bskor bar bya/ /bdag nyid rdo rje can sbyor bas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag ces brjod/ /rdo rje lag ni lag rtse rung / /rdo rje bsams nas reg byas la/ /dbus

su bstan pa'i sa bon ni/ /brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya/ /tshe rabs snga ma'i sdig la sogs/ /lha la sogs la bsgo bar bya/ /yan lag thams cad gzir ba dang / /'chi ba'i dus bab 'byung mi 'gyur/ /'tshe med nad
ni thams cad dang / /nad pa glor gzhag sbyar na ni/ /dus rnams kun tu nad mi 'byung / /lus can tshe ni zad pa yang / /zla ba drug tu gnas par 'gyur/ /gnas gzhan du ni bzhag nas su/ /rtag tu mchod

la brtson bar bya/ /rdo rje rgyal ldan sbyor ba yis/ /rnam shes gang du'ang 'gro mi 'gyur/ /gzhan yang bdag gi dbugs dag ni/ /der ni rab tu brtag par bya/ /dbugs kyi gnas ni mtshungs pa na/ /thams cad

grub par gsungs pa yin/ /g.yas la g.yas su gnas pa dang / /blo ldan g.yon la g.yon du gnas/ /der gnas na ni smra byed pa/ /thams cad 'grub pa nyid du 'gyur/ /dbugs dang 'dri ba mi mthun pa/ /dngos grub ring

ba mtshon par bya/ /skad cig srog gi rab sbyor ba/ /sbyor ba gnyis ni shes bya ste/ /skad cig la ni bya ba kun/ /rgyas par 'gyur bar rab tu grags/ /srog la bya ba gang byas pa/ /grub pa ring bar the tshom med/ /mche ba la sogs

bsams nas dug /der ni gso ba dag tu bya/ /sbyor sogs sngar gyi mtshan nyid can/ /thams cad rig pas klu la bsgo/ /sbyor ba bzhi la sogs btab pa/ /'chi bar 'gyur ba the tshom med/ /dug bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /
gzhan ma thams cad gso bar bya/ /sos btab lus la kun rig pas/ /sa bon gyis ni dgod par dgod/ /yi ge brgyad kyi sngags dag ni/ /yan lag brgyad po rnams su dgod/ /kha dog dkar po bsams pa yi/ /

sa bon rnams kyis yid dug dbrog /dkyil 'khor dbus su gnas pa yis/ /ye shes kyis ni rnam shes bcing / /yan lag bsgyur ba'i sbyor byas nas/ /de 'og phyi rol brtsam par bya/ /chu dang 'o ma bsres pa yis/ /

sa snod yongs su dgang bar bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa'i/ /dbus su pad+ma bsam par bya/ /gdugs dkar po yis brgyan pa yi/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma de bsgom/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil dkrung

bcas/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /kha T+wA~M ga dang thod pa dang / /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' klubs/ /klu brgyad kyi ni mgo bo bsnams/ /pad+ma yi ni gdan la mnan/ /shar du nor rgyas bu bsam bya/ /de bzhin

byang du 'jog po'o/ /nub du stobs kyis rgyu ba ste/ /lho ru pad+ma blta bar bya/ /dbang ldan du ni pad ma che/ /me mtshams su ni dung bskyong ngo / /bden bral rigs ldan zhes bya ba/ /rlung mtshams 'khyil pa ltung ba'o/ /klu brgyad

po ni bsams nas su/ /mgo bo rnams ni mnan par bsgom/ /rdzas rnams kun gyis mchod nas su/ /me tog spos sogs gtor ma sbyin/ /bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor ni/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ru bsam/ /rma bya sgro

yi chun po yis/ /chu yi sbyor bas drang bar bya/ /kun nas rkang par drangs nas su/ /rkang pa nas ni chur thim bya/ /oM hrI TaT+Ta N+Ta ra hU~M phaT swA hA/ rdo rje sems dpar mngon sbyor bas/ /'bum phrag la sogs bsnyen pa bya/ /oM bA

su ki ri hrI TaT+TaN+Ta ra hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM tak+Sha ka hrI Ta T+TaN+Ta ra swA hA/ oM kar+k+ko Ta ka hrI TaT+TaN+Ta ra swA hA/ oM pad+ma hrI Ta T+Ta N+Ta ra swA hA/ oM ma hA pad+ma hrI TaT+TaN+Ta ra swA hA/ oM sha~M kha pA la hrI TaT+TaN+Ta ra swA hA/ oM b+h+yo ku li kA ya la~M

hrI TaT+TaN+Ta ra swA hA/ oM hu lun+da ke hrI TaT+TaN+Ta ra swA hA/ oM hrI TaT+TaN+Ta ra hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT a mu ka s+ya nir bi sha~M ku ru hU~M phaT swA hA/ zhes brjod cing / 'o ma'i dbus su drangs pa yis/ /'phral du 'o ma

nag por 'gyur/ /yungs kar me tog dkar po dang / /tsan dan dag gis bsres pa yis/ /'chi bas zin pa'i snying ka ru/ /gsang sngags zlos shing brdeg par bya/ /snying ni 'phar ma thag tu yang / /ye shes bsdams te gzung
bar bya/ /rnam shes bsdams pa tsam gyis kyang / /de bzhin dbugs ni g.yo bar 'gyur/ /dbugs ni rnam par g.yos pa yis/ /bdag gi dbugs kyis gzir bar bya/ /dbugs kyis gzir ma thag tu yang / /rkang lag

la sogs 'dar bar 'gyur/ /yan lag thams cad 'dar ba na/ /bdag nyid dbyangs ni blang bar bya/ /hU~M gi glu ni blangs nas su/ /se gol gsum gyis bslang bar bya/ /'chi bas zin pa bslang nas ni/ /de yi yan lag

bsrung bar bya/ /bsdus nas klu'i gnas su ni/ /'o ma de ni dbo bar bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpar mngon sprul la/ /'bum phrag gsum ni bzlas pa yis/ /sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs

bya/ /de nas sgrub pos dug bsdus na/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /kha dang thig le gnyis dag dang / /steng dang mgrin pa sna rtse dang / /snying ga lte ba gsang ba dang / /rkang pa'i mthe bo dag tu ni/ /zin pa gso bar mi bya ste/ /

'chi ba nyid kyi rgyu ru gsungs/ /nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje che/ /char pa dbab pa'i cho ga mchog /chu 'gram dang ni nye ba yi/ /sa phyogs nyams ni dga' ba ru/ /bla re dag ni bres nas su/ /dar dpyangs sna tshogs dpyangs pa ru/ /

kha dog sna lngar btsos pa yi/ /tshon gyi las ni brtsa bar bya/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /klu brgyad kyis ni rnam par klubs/ /mgo bo gnyis ni bsgor bcas te/ /mjug ma gnyis kyis grwa ru mdud/ /shar du rgyal ba bzang

po ste/ dpal dang dga' bo byang du'o/ /nub tu char 'bebs sdug pa ste/ /brtan dang drag po lho ru'o/ /klu brgyad kyi ni ra ba ste/ /phyogs la sogs par rigs brgyad dgod/ /nor rgyas bu ni shar du ste/ /'jog po byang du dgod

par bya/ /nub kyi phyogs su stobs kyis rgyu/ /lho yi phyogs su pad+ma ste/ /dbang ldan du ni pad+ma che/ /me mtshams dung skyong dgod par bya/ /bden bral du ni rigs ldan te/ /rlung mtshams 'khyil ba ltung ba'o/ /sprin gyi

dbang phyug rgyal po brgyad/ /phyogs brgyad nas ni dgug par bya/ /sgra sgrogs rmugs pa de bzhin du/ /drag po 'khyil pa sdug po dang / /gtum po char 'bebs rab gang ba/ /brgyad po rgyal po zhes bya'o/ /shar la sogs

pa'i phyogs dgod pa/ /ji bzhin phyogs kyi mdog tu bsam/ /dbus su rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /pad+ma'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs/ /kha T+wA~M ga dang rnal 'byor snod/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /sku mdog
dkar po shin tu 'bar/ /shin du mdzes pa'i na bza' bsnams/ /pad+ma sbrul gyis skor nas su/ /sbrul ni gdan du sbyar bar bya/ /mchod pa rgya chen bshams nas ni/ /'o ma la sogs snod brgyad bzhag /me tog
bdug sogs dri dang ni/ /mar me sna tshogs rig pas mchod/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro bdag bsgom pa'i/ /ye shes can gyi rnal 'byor pa'i/ /oM b+hur+b+hu ba swA hA/ nye bar spyod pa'i sngags so/ /oM bA su ki

hU~M swA hA/ oM tak+Sha ka hU~M swA hA/ oM karko Ta hU~M swA hA/ oM pad+ma hU~M swA hA/ oM ma hA pad+ma hU~M swA hA/ oM sha~M kha pA la hU~M swA hA/ oM ku li sha pA la hU~M swA hA/ oM hu lun+d+ha hU~M swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po brgyad

kyi sngags so/ /oM g+hi li g+hi li/ baR+Sha baR+Sha pa ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ho ho ho/ Tha Tha Tha swA hA/ sprin gyi rgyal po brgyad kyi sngags so/ /lag pa kun du bskor nasu/ /phyogs brgyad du ni bstan par bya/ /sprin gyi rgyal po brgyad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /

g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs nasu/ /mthe'u chung dang mthe bong brgyad/ /g.yas pa sbrul mgo gdengs nas su/ /mthe bong steng du gung mor sbyar/ /klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /oM badzra DA ki nI/ baR+Sha baR+Sha pa ya hU~M phu

swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum phrag ni/ /gsum du byas nas bzlas pa bya/ /rnal 'byor can gyi las 'di rnams/ /char 'bebs pa yi cho ga mchog /gzhan yang dge dang sdig pa yi/ /pho nya'i mtshan

ma bshad par bya/ /mig yon mgo dkar sgur po dang / /'jigs pa'i gos dang dbyug pa thogs/ /bud med rnams dang 'grogs te 'ong / /ngu zhing skra ni lhug pa sogs/ /gcer bu nam gyi smra ba dang / /sbyor bzhis 'chi ba ston pa yin/ /

pho nya ji bzhin bdag nyid la/ /brtags nas rnam pa gnyis su bya/ /de tshe sngags pa 'grogs 'dod na/ /grub pa nyams par the tshom med/ /bdag gi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba las rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o// //

rnal 'byor brtson pa'i khyad par dag /bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /gang gis sngags rnams 'tshal bar bgyi/ /ye shes gzung ba ji ltar lags/ /nyon cig rdo rje de kho na/ /de bzhin lha yi bdag nyid do/ /dang

por stong nyid bsgoms pa yis/ /lus can dri ma bkru bar bya/ /dang po gzugs ni stong sogs bya/ /ji srid bcwa brgyad nyid yin te/ /gzugs khams zhes bya stong pa ste/ /de nyid du ni sgra yang bya/ /dri khams zhes bya stong pa ste/ /de

nyid du ni ro yang bya/ /reg bya'i khams ni stong pa ste/ /de nyid du ni gzugs kyang bya/ /mig gi bdag nyid stong pa la/ /dbus na rnam shes ji ltar yod/ /nyan pa'i bdag nyid stong pa la/ /dbus na rnam shes ji ltar yod/ /mnom

pa'i bdag nyid stong pa la/ /dbus na rnam shes ji ltar yod/ /lce yi bdag nyid stong pa la/ /dbus na rnam shes ji ltar yod/ /lus kyi bdag nyid stong pa la/ /dbus na rnam shes ji ltar yod/ /yid kyi rang bzhin stong

pa la/ /dbus na ji ltar brtag par bya/ /yid ni nam mkha' thim nas su/ /thams cad stong par bsam par bya/ /gling dang ri rab la sogs pa/ /steng dang 'og dang bar gyi ni/ /khams gsum stong par bsgoms pa yis/ /
thams cad zad pa nyid du bya/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kun gyi/ /gzugs la sogs pa zad par bsgom/ /bdag gi dngos po zad bya ste/ /dngos po 'dris par dmigs par bya/ /sbyor ba mnyam par kun
bsams te/ /rnal 'byor pa ni mkhas pa yis/ /mnyam nyid stong par bsams nas su/ /de yi dbus su bltas nas kyang / /de la mtshan ma brtag par bya/ /mar me'i 'od kyis zhi ba ste/ /ser po dngul gyis rgyas
par 'gyur/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba ni/ /chags pa la sogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /mthar ni du ba gnag mthong na/ /mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags/ /rlung gi mdog ltar 'khrugs pa yis/ /de yi mod la

bskrad par 'gyur/ /zla ba dkar po'i 'od zer ltar/ /thams cad du ni dkar mthong nas/ /rnal 'byor grub par shes par bya/ /blo ldan 'gro ba'i yang dag gnas/ /de 'og rnal 'byor las byung ba'i/ /myu gu la sogs
mngon par bsam/ /gang zhig stong shes bsgom pa yi/ /myur du sems dpa' grol bar 'gyur/ /ye shes kyis ni shes bya blta/ /shes byas 'gro ba brtag par bya/ /pha dang ma ni bsad bya ste/ /bram ze
gtsang ma gnyis bzung nas/ /rgyal po yul 'khor bcas bcom na/ /mi de dag par 'gyur zhes bya/ /bdag gi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba gsum pa'o// // nyon cig rdo rje ji
bzhin lam/ /gnyis spangs gnyis su med pa ste/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor rab 'jigs pas/ /chu yi dgra ni dam pas gang / /dbus su bying ba'i lus can rnams/ /sgrol ba'i mtshan nyid ces byar brjod/ /
mtshon byas mtshan nyid mtshon pa po/ /rnam shes kyis ni ye shes te/ /ye shes kyis ni shes bya blta/ /shes byas 'gro ba brtag par bya/ /'gro ba brtags pa'i sems kyis ni/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin
mngon par 'gro/ /zhags pas glang chen myos bcings ltar/ /'khor ba'i zhags pas gnod rmongs pas/ /rnal 'byor pa ni stong phrag gcig /tshe rabs snga ma'i 'gro bar 'gro/ /sngon du mtshan nyid bstan
pa bzhin/ /mnyam nyid stong par bsams nasu/ /stong pa'i zhing la sogs lus la/ /blo dang ldan pas sa bon gdab/ /dper na gdol pa'i khang pa mer bsregs pa/ /lha'i byin gyis brlabs par rab tu brjod/ /
rigs can dge dang mkhas pa kun du gnas/ /de bzhin ting nge 'dzin gyis kun bshig nas/ /sa bon dgod pas rab tu dgod par bya/ /steng du me yi sa bon brtag /sa yi sa bon rnam pa gnyis/ /mig gnyis

su ni sbyar bar bya/ /stong sogs rlung gi sa bon ni/ /sna dang rna ba dag la bsam/ /bdud rtsi'i chu yi sa bon ni/ /lce yi dbang po dbang phyug gtso/ /gang gis brtsegs pa rim bzhin gzung / /gnas bzhi ru ni

sbyar bar bya/ /mgrin par gti mug sa bon te/ /de bzhin dpung par nyon mongs so/ /snying ga'i phyogs su g.yo ba ste/ /lte ba'i rtsa bar phyugs yin no/ /yan lag brgyad du sa bon ni/ /brgyad po bkod pas bsrung
bar bya/ /ye shes mkha' 'gror bdag byas te/ /lus ni sa bon ldan par bya/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ /pad+ma yi ni stan la bzhugs/ /gdugs ni dkar pos steng du g.yogs/ /btso ma'i
gser ltar 'bar ba'i 'od/ /zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste/ /sems dpa'i skyil dkrung yang dag bzhugs/ /steng du rdo rje dbu rgyan can/ /dar gyi thod ni mdzes par bcings/ /spyan gsum khro zhing

bzhad pa ste/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/ /ral gri dgra sta rdo rje dang / /g.yon pa'i bsdigs mdzub nyid dang ni/ /shak+ti kha T+wA~M bsgreng ba ni/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya mngon par bsnams/ /sangs

rgyas sprin ni 'phros pa yis/ /sems can rnams kyi don mdzad brtson/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba ru/ /dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya/ /yid kyi ye shes rnam shes dag /shel dang 'dra bar bsam par bya/ /

A li kA li rab sbyor bas/ /de yi sa bon gzung byas te/ /smin par thigs pa'i gnas dag tu/ /ye shes can gyi sa bon bsgom/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan pa yi/ /yi ge'i sa bon bzlas par bya/ /rlung dang me yi

bdun don la/ /rdo rje me yi sa bon bskul/ /sgra dang thig les yang dag mnan/ /char pa'i rgyun zhes bya ba brjod/ /thog mar bla ma'i yi ge gzhag /bsreg byed yi ge mthar bzlas bya/ /ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yi/ /
blo gros can gyis sum 'bum bzla/ /bzlas dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /de yis bsam pa thams cad 'grub/ /las brgyad la sogs dngos grub rnams/ /sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya/ /de 'og las rnams

brtsam byas na/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /rmongs par bya ba'i bye brag ni/ /nyon cig rdo rje de kho na/ /bcings pa rnams kyi bye brag dag /sngon du rdo rje'i tshig brjod la/ /sde tshan dang po'i dang po bzung / /de bzhin

sde tshan bzhi pa yi/ /yi ge dang po bzung nas ni/ /nyis 'gyur re pha steng du gzhag /de bzhin i dang re phar sbyar/ /gang zhig sde tshan gnyis pa yi/ /yi ge gnyis pa thig le can/ /lcags kyu yis ni gzir bar bya/ /

bzhi pa yi ni gsum par bcas/ /lan gnyis su ni bzlas par bya/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan pa dang / /sngon du phyag 'tshal yi ge ste/ /yi ge drug po mtha' ru sbyar/ /sa bon 'di bzlas rnal 'byor pas/ /dngos po

thams cad bcing bar 'gyur/ /lag gnyis sor mo bsnol nas ni/ /de nyid bza' ba lta bur sbyar/ /khro bo dang ni dbu ma brkyang / /gnyis ka phan tshun drud par bya/ /'di ni chen po'i phyag rgya ste/ /'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng

ba 'khrug dgra yi mgrin pa la sogs pa/ /dngos po thams cad yid kyis rol/ /de nas chu la sogs pa kun/ /rab tu bcing ba bshad par bya/ /gang yang sde tshan tha ma ni/ /yi ge gsum pa gzung bar bya/ /de bzhin

sde tshan gsum pa yi/ /yi ge gsum pa nyid dang ni/ /de yi sa bon gsum pa la/ /steng du e zhes bya bar sbyar/ /sde tshan lnga pa'i dang po la/ /lcags kyu yis ni gzir bar bya/ /gsum pa chu yi sa bon dang / /tsheg drag

yi ge dbus byas te/ /mtha' ma rdo rje can dang sbyar/ /re pha glon lcags kyu can/ /mtha' ni drag po'i yi ge dang / /dang por phyag 'tshal gzhag par bya/ /bcing ba yi ni sngags su grags/ /lag gnyis thal mo sbyar

nas su/ /srin lag gnyis ni phan tshun dkri/ /khro bo gnyis kyis mnan par bya/ /mthe bo gnyis ni dbus su sbyar/ /de nyid du ni mthe chung sbyar/ /rgo ma kha yi phyag rgya 'di/ /'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng ba can/ /phyogs bcu'i

gnas su 'bar ba yis/ /sprin gyi lha tshogs bsreg par byed/ /char pa bcing la sogs dus su/ /phyag rgya 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /sgrub pos 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pas/ /sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya/ /bdag gi gdan
zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o// // lha yi gzugs ni ji lta bu/ /bcom ldan 'das las nyan par 'tshal/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg la sogs dang / /gtor ma ldan pa ji ltar lags/ /gzugs sogs

bsam pa rtse gcig pa/ /nyon cig rdo rje de kho na/ /sngags dang phyag rgya sbyin sreg gi/ /bzlas dang bsam gtan bsgom pa rnams/ /sngon du me yi las sogs la/ /blo ldan bzlas pa shes par bya/ /sa ni sbyangs ma

thag tu yang / /stegs bu'i mtshan nyid 'bad de bya/ /sor brgyad lhag ni yan chad du/ /khru gang tsam nas brtsams nas su/ /ji snyed khru stong bar du gzung / /brgyad pa dgra ni 'joms pa ste/ /de bzhin bcu
pas rgyas par 'gyur/ /bcu gnyis pas ni dbang du sdud/ /bcu bzhis de bzhin zhi ba nyid/ /mtheb sor bcu drug tshad kyis ni/ /rigs rnams mngon par 'phel bar byed/ /mtheb sor bcwa brgyad gnas kyis
ni/ /ba lang rigs sogs mngon par 'phel/ /thab khung sor ni nyi shu pas/ /grong khyer dang ni yul 'khor zhi/ /rgyar ni cha gsum bgos pa las/ /cha gnyis su ni brko bar bya/ /brkos pa yi ni brgyad cha

yis/ /khung bu yi ni kha khyer bya/ /kha khyer gyi ni phyed pa yis/ /phyi rol gyi ni mu khyud bya/ /mu khyud cha brgyad ldan pa la/ /pad+ma'i 'dab de cha brgyad bya/ /pad+ma yi ni phyi rol du/ /sor gcig pa yi ra ba bya/ /thab

khung nang du rdo rje rnams/ /pad+ma'i nang du gzhag par bya/ /mngon spyod la ni gru gsum ste/ /zhi ba la ni gru bzhi'o/ /kun nas zlum po dbang du sdud/ /rgyas pa la yang de bzhin no/ /bskrad la zla ba phyed pa ste/ /dgug
dang bcing la zur brgyad pa'o/ /rim gyis rim gyis sbyar bar bya/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang sogs rnams/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi mtshan ma rnams/ /ji bzhin phyogs su dgod par bya/ /kha khyer gyi ni
gnas bzhi ru/ /sangs rgyas mtshan mas brgyan par bya/ /zla phyed rdo rjes shin tu mdzes/ /grwa dang grwa ru rnam par gzhag /ji bzhin stan gyi gnas su yang / /mtheb sor bcu gnyis dag dang ni/ /dpangs

su khru phyed ldan pa yi/ /ti se'i gangs ni mdzes par bzhag /'dab ma brgyad kyi gnas rnams su/ /lha mo rnams ni rim bzhin dgod/ /rnal 'byor pa yis de yi tshad/ /khyad par du ni sbyar bar bya/ /oM hi li

hi li ka li be twa li hU~M phaT/ nye bar spyod pa'i sngags so/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro bsgom pa yis/ /rang gi lus ni bsrung bar bya/ /bdag gi yan lag brgyad po ru/ /thams cad bkod pas bsrung bya ste/ /lce la

chu ni nyid dang ni/ /nam mkha' rna ba sna dag la/ /sa ni mig tu sbyar bar bya/ /de bzhin me ni tshangs pa la/ /mgrin par rmongs pa'i dad dpon te/ /g.yo ba snying la gnas pa'o/ /nyon mongs thong ka kun tu'o/ /lte

ba'i rtsa bar phyugs yin no/ /yan lag brgyad kyis bsrung ba 'di/ /lha rnams su ni shes byas la/ /ba dan gsum gyi phyag rgya yis/ /yan lag brgyad du gtugs te bsrung / /ye shes mkha' 'gro'i bdag nyid du/ /bdag

nyid lus ni sprul byas te/ /kuN+da zla ba ltar dkar zhing / /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs/ /sems dpa'i skyil dkrung phyag gnyis pa/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' mnabs/ /phyag na kha T+wA~M rdo rje ste/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba

kun tu gsal/ /rang gi lus ni mnyam bzhag pas/ /dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya/ /de nas sa ni sbyang bya ste/ /oM ha na ha na kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te/ /rdo rjer bsgoms nas sa la bsnun/ /

sa sbyangs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /lag gnyis khu tshur kha sbyar te/ /gung mo gnyis brkyang kun tu bstan/ /phyag rgya 'di ni dag byed pa'o/ /oM shrI swA hA/ mar sbyang ba'i sngags so/ /oM a swA hA/ rdzas bkru ba'i

sngags so/ /oM dzriM swA hA/ 'bru sbyang ba'i sngags so/ /oM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zas mchog la sogs pa'i rdzas sbyang ba'i sngags so/ /oM a swA hA/ yam shing sbyang ba'i sngags so/ /me dbus pad+ma bsams nas su/ /me

yi lha ni dgug par bya/ /g.yon pa khu tshur bcings nas su/ /khro bo dang ni dbu ma brkyang / /dbu ma'i tshigs ni gsum pa la/ /khro bo bsams te btsugs pas dgug /oM A gats+tsha A gats+tsha ag+ne dzaHswA hA/
pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ru/ /thab khung dbus su bsgom par bya/ /bgrang phreng spyi blugs bu ram mdog /ral pa'i thor tshugs ser skyar ldan/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' klubs/ /'od zer me ltar kun
tu 'bar/ /me yi dbus su bsgom par bya/ /der ni ji ltar 'byor ba dang / /dngos po lnga yis mchod nas su/ /me dbus me lha'i lce la ni/ /kun nas sreg blugs gsum gsum bya/ /lag gnyis thal mo sbyar
nas su/ /pad+ma'i tshul du cung zad dbye/ /dbu ma kun tu brkyang bar bya/ /oM dzu hu dzu hu a g+he swA hA/ me'i snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /de nas 'bad pas se gol gsum/ /gtogs pas 'bar bar
thim par bsgom/ /me yi gnas su kun rig pas/ /de nas sbyang ba brtsam par bya/ /oM hUM Ta Ti hU~M phaT/ rdo rjer bcas pa'i lag pa yis/ /me tog yungs kar chu yis ni/ /phyogs kun du ni gtor nas

su/ /mi yi nang du blugs par bya/ /sbyang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /oM badzra prA kA ra hU~M phaT/ lag g.yon thal mo phar bstan te/ /g.yas pa tshur bstan rgyab sbyar nas/ /dbang ldan phyogs sogs bskor bar bya/ /

ra ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis ni brkyang nas su/ /phan tshun rtse mo reg par bya/ /oM dzru~M swA hA/ rdo rje dra ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcas nas su/ /mthe bong 'og tu brkyang bar bya/ /

oM bru~M swA hA/ phur bu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa'i/ /me dbus pad+ma bsams nas su/ /gdugs dkar po yis g.yogs pa yi/ /rdo rje dbus su bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje rtse mo
lnga pa ste/ /kha dog dmar sogs bsam par bya/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba las/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje'i gzugs su bskyed nas su/ /rang gi dbugs las byung ba'i/ /sbyor

ba'i gdan la byung ba yis/ /las kyi mdog tu bsgom par bya/ /phyag gnyis kha T+wA~M rdo rje bsnams/ /thams cad rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /rdo rje'i gzugs ni bskyed nas su/ /rang gi dbugs las byung ba yi/ /
bdag gi lus ni gang yin la/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro bstim par bya/ /me yi dbus su kun rig pas/ /sna tshogs dngos po mchod par bya/ /oM ThaHThaHThaHswA hA/ dgang blugs kyi sngags so/ /g.yas su dbyug

pa bsam par bya/ /de bzhin g.yon du snod ni sbyang / /oM hUM swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba dang / /oM pra tIts+tsha su gan+d+ha hU~M swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni dri'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /

brkyang ba de nyid kyi mthe bong dang khro bo sbyar ba dang / /oM puSh+pa mA le hU~M swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni me tog gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /khu tshur de nyid las mthe bong brkyang ba dang / oM tIk+Sh+Na dI pe hU~M swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni mar

me'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /me tog gi phyag rgya de nyid las dbu ma bsgreng ba dang / /oM d+hu pe shA ri hU~M swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni bdug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis ka brkyang ste mthe bong dang / gung mo bskyod pa

dang / oM ku ru ku ru ma hA ba li hU~M swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni gtor ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /me yi kha yi nang du ni/ /lan re bzlas shing lan re bzhin/ /dbus su gong bu bsreg par bya/ /bdun las lhag ma kun bzung nas/ /
dbus su gong bu ran par ni/ /gong ma'i tshul gyis gnas pa ni/ /'bad de rdzogs pa'i mtha' ru ni/ /lhag ma dag ni bsreg par bya/ /bsreg pa zin nas lha rnams ni/ /bdag gi lus la thim par bsgom/ /dgang

blugs kun la rdzogs pa ru/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas rdzogs par bya/ /snod ni mar gyis bkang nas su/ /me yi dbus su blugs nas kyang / /drangs nas dbugs ni stongs 'gyur te/ /rang gi lus la thim par bya/ /de nas

rang gi lus nyid du/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /dbus su me yi lha nyid ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsams nas kyang / /lhag ma lan gsum bsregs nas su/ /mchod de gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /bkra shis dbyangs

ni blangs nas su/ /der ni phyag rgya sbyar bar bya/ /sbyin sreg las kyis phye ba gzhan/ /mdor bsdus rgyas pa min par bshad/ /sA lu 'bras dang so ba dang / /til dkar po dang yungs kar dang / /nas dang dur

ba'i sa bon bcas/ /mar dang 'o mar bsres nas su/ /sbrang rtsi bsres pa'i 'o thug ni/ /khyad par du ni bsreg par bya/ /'o ma can gyi shing lnga las/ /sor mo bcu bzhir ldan pa'i tshad/ /zhi ba'i dUs la bab pa na/ /

bsreg pa'i cho ga'i mchog yin no/ /til nag po dang ma sha dang / /sa lu dmar po'i zan dang ni/ /dri dang gur kum 'o ma ni/ /mar dang sbrang rtsir bsres pa dang / /mar dang ldan pa'i 'o thug dag /khyad par du ni bsreg

par bya/ /'o ma can gyi shing lnga las/ /yam shing sor bcu'i tshad dang bcas/ /gal te rgyas pa'i las 'dod na/ /sgrub pos khyad par bsreg par bya/ /til ni dmar dang gnag pa dang / /nA ga ge sar pri yang ku/ /

de bzhin skye tshe 'u su dang / /sbrang rtsi dang ni mar sar sbyar/ /thang shing dang ni n+ya gro dang / /klu shing dang ni ba sha ka / yam shing sor mo bcu gnyis pa/ /chags pa'i las la mchog yin no/ /til nag po dang ma sha

dang / /ba la ta ka nag chen 'bras/ /tsha ba'i mar nag khrag dang ni/ /bsres pa yis ni byugs pa dang / /lung tang shing dang sgur po'i shing / /ba lo ta ka ku li'i shing / /yam shing sor brgyad pa yi tshad/ /mngon spyod las la rab

tu grags/ /yungs kar mon sran gre'u dang se'u/ /lam gyi rdul dang bsres pa dag /khrag dang khra ba'i mar nag gis/ /de ni bsgo bar rab tu grags/ /gser shing dang ni ba sha ka'i/ /yam shing der ni bzung nas ni/ /

de nyid las la bsreg bya ba/ /bskrad pa dag la rab tu grags/ /nya dang sha la sogs pa'i rdzas/ /bag phye 'bru rnams thams cad dag /khrag dang sbrang rtsis bsgos pa dang / /bya rog gi ni sgro dag dang / /bya rog tshang

gi shing phu dang / /so shing 'chos nas bor ba ste/ /'di dag bcing ba'i las rnams la/ /brtson dang ldan pas sbyor ba bya/ /de nas gzhan yang khyad par du/ /sbyin sreg mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /zho dang mar dang

sbrang rtsi yis/ /bsgos pa yi shri ba la ni/ /byang chub shing gi yam shing la/ /lnga rgya ru ni bsreg par bya/ /de yi dbus su mnyam gzhag nas/ /smon lam btab ste khrus byas na/ /rgyal srid nyams pa'ang myur du ni/ /

sa gsum rgyal po dbang du 'gyur/ /mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas/ /lo ta'i yam shing me la ni/ /brgya phrag brgya ru mngon bsregs na/ /shin tu myur bar dpal ldan 'gyur/ /bya ba gang dang gang bsams pa/ /
de de thams cad 'dir 'grub 'gyur/ /de nas yongs gzung slob ma yi/ /mtshan nyid dag ni bshad par bya/ /yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /dul zhing sbyong ba zhi ba dang / /chos gsum la ni mngon
bar ngang / /theg pa che la rtag tu dga'/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes/ /bzo dang rgyu rtsal thams cad mkhas/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba mngon par dga'/ /thos dang klog sogs gus dang bcas/ /dus

rnams kun tu bla mar gus/ /sbyin sogs dge ba'i las la brtson/ /'dod la dga' ba ma yin zhing / /longs spyod la ni brten pa min/ /khro dang nga rgyal med pa dang / /ngang tshul ngan min tshig rtsub min/ /sems can kun

la smod pa dang / /lha dang bla ma de bzhin te/ /gdug sems can dang ngang tshul can/ /rtag tu sdig pa'i blo dang ldan/ /'khyal pa dang ni tshig rtsub smra/ /'di lta bu dag spang bar bya/ /gzhan gyi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las
rim par phye ba dang po'o// // chu yi sbyin sreg ji lta bu/ /lha las gzigs mo nyan par 'tshal/ /chu yi sbyin sreg la sogs pa'i/ /mtshan nyid dag ni ji ltar lags/ /chu sogs yang dag mtshan

nyid rnams/ /nyon cig rdo rje de kho na/ /bla re dag ni bres nas su/ /sna tshogs gos rnams rab tu dpyangs/ /shin tu yangs shing gru bzhi par/ /kun du dri yis byug par bya/ /dbus su chu yi snod sogs la/ /dri ni dkar

pos byugs nas su/ /chu dang 'o mar bsres pa yis/ /snod ni mdzes par dag par bya/ /bum pa dag ni brgyad po yang / /phyogs brgyad dag tu gzhag par bya/ /dri yi chu yis rab tu dgang / /kha ni shing lo sar
pas brgyan/ /bdag nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro ru/ /skad cig gis ni bskyed nas su/ /me tog bdug spos dri sogs pa'i/ /dngos pos bdag nyid mchod byas pa'i/ /de 'og phyi rol gzhag pa yis/ /chu yi las

rnams sbyar bar bya/ /lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su/ /pad+ma'i tshul du cung zad dbye/ /oM ka ma le b+he swA hA/ pad+ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa'i/ /pad+ma chu yi nang bkod la/ /gdugs
dkar po yis g.yogs pa yi/ /sa bon dbus su bsgom par bya/ /rang gi dbugs las byung ba yi/ /sa bon las ni gzugs su bskyed/ /sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung phyag gnyis ldan/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis
rnam par klubs/ /phyag gnyis rdo rje dbyug pa bsnams/ /kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes/ /bzhad cing khro la sgeg dang bcas/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/ /dam tshig phyag rgyar rab tu grags/ /oM

sa ma ye tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/ dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /shar gyi bum pa rdo rje ma/ /byang du drag mo zhes bya ba/ /nub tu ro langs ma yin te/ /lho phyogs su ni gtum mo gnas/ /seng ge zhes bya dbang ldan du/ /

de bzhin me mtshams stag mo 'o/ /bden bral na ni lce spyang mo/ /hU~M byed 'ug pa rlung gi phyogs/ /so so so sor mtshan ma dang / /dam tshig phyag rgyar bstan par bya/ /rang gi gzugs kyi sku mdog ldan/ /sngags dang phyag rgya
bstan pa'o/ /me tog bdug spos dri la sogs/ /mkhas pa y-is ni mchod par bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ /g.yon pa snying gar gzhag nas su/ /g.yas pas steng nas dbub par bya/ /rtsa ba'i phyag

rgyar rab tu grags/ /oM dzru~M hU~M swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /kun+da la sogs me tog dkar/ /rtse mor dUr ba btsugs nas su/ /lha mo'i dbu steng rdo rje yi/ /cod pan la ni gtor bar bya/ /gsang sngags

lan re bzlas nas su/ /lan re'-i sbyor bas dbul bar bya/ /lan grangs khri yi las kyis ni/ /thams cad rig cing tshe 'phel 'gyur/ /ka ra bi ra'i me tog dmar/ /dUr ba dang ni ldan pa yi/ /las ni khri phrag

byas pa yis/ /khyim rnams zhi bar rab tu grags/ /nA ga puSh+pa'i yam shing gi/ 'o mar sbags te dbul bar bya/ /las 'di khri phrag byas pa yis/ /grong ni zhi bar byed par 'gyur/ /pad+ma yi ni yam shing rnams/ /

khri phrag du ni bzlas nas su/ /las rnams kun la sbyar byas na/ /yul phyogs zhi bar byed par 'gyur/ /pri ya~M ku dang bil ba dang / /de bzhin ut+pal ku mu ta/ /rgyal po'i las la sogs sbyar nas/ /pha rol yul 'khor
'joms par 'gyur/ /sngags pas rtag tu skyor chu gtor/ /bye brag tu ni rgyas par 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o// // 'khor ba'i pha rol sgrol mtshan nyid/ /
nyon cig rdo rje rgyal chen po/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol/ /dag dang ma dag rab tu spangs/ /dngos po gnyis ni rab spangs pas/ /gnyis med chos zhes bya ba ste/ /gzugs stong thog mar mthar
thug dang / /dbu ma mnyam par gnas pa'o/ /dag dang ma dag dbu ma ni/ /'ba' zhig gis ni mnyam par blta/ /bsten dang bsten med dbu ma yi/ /mnyam nyid ye shes las byung ba/ /lus ni mnyam par gnas
pa ste/ /ngag kyang mnyam par gnas nas su/ /mnyam nyid ye shes las byung bas/ /mnyam pa'i lta bas blta bar bya/ /mnyam pa'i lta ba ji lta bu/ /bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /gnyis med chos zhes
bgyi ba yi/ /bdag nyid ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ /gnyis med ye shes mtshan nyid ni/ /ji bzhin de nyid rdo rjes nyon/ /dngos po gnyis ni rab spangs la/ /ye shes can gyis gnyis med chos/ /rnal 'byor kun

gyi thog ma ru/ /dag pa rnam gsum brjod par bya/ /oM swA b+hA ba shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+har+m+mAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM badzra shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+har+m+mA badzra shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM yo ga shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+har+m+mA yo ga shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ bla med nyid du bya ba'i

phyir/ /thal mo sbyar nas de dag brjod/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs kyi/ /gnas dag tu ni brten nas su/ /bla re dag ni bre bar bya/ /sna tshogs gos ni dpyangs nas su/ /ba dan rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar bya/ /
g.yer kha dra bas mdzes byas la/ /gnas bcu dag ni kun tu yang / /de bzhin dri yi dkyil 'khor bya/ /skad cig rnal 'byor tshul gyis ni/ /rang gi lus ni bsam par bya/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro
bzung nas ni/ /bdag nyid mchod pas mnyes par bya/ /lag pa gan rkyal bzhag nas su/ /der ni rdo rje brtag par bya/ /gnas lnga dag tu bstim par bya/ /sa 'og tu ni sbyang bar bya/ /phyag 'tshal 'joms

pa'i mtha' ldan pa'i/ /hU~M zhes bya ba sbyar bar bya/ /lhun po'i steng du bsam bya ba/ /kha dog bzhi sogs ldan pa yi/ /gser las byung ba'i grong khyer ni/ /rin chen bdun la sogs pas spras/ /g.yer ka'i

dra ba'i phreng ba can/ /mnyam zhing ji ltar 'dod pas dbyangs/ /phyag rgya kun gyi thog mar ni/ /dam tshig phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcing la/ /g.yon pa snying gar bzhag nas su/ /g.yas pa

mchan khung gzhug par bya/ /dam tshig phyag rgya shes par bya/ /phyag 'tshal bsreg pa'i mtha' ldan pa'i/ /ji ltar rdo rje dngos sa bon/ /sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni/ /de bzhin dam tshig bstan par
bya/ /seng ge'i gdan ni rnam pa lnga/ /gnas ldan dag tu sbyar bar bya/ /nyi ma'i gdan ni bsams nas su/ /gdugs dkar po yis brgyan par bya/ /rang gi dbugs las byung ba yi/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro dbus
su bsam/ /zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste/ /sems dpa' yi ni skyil dkrung can/ /skra grol bas ni g.yogs pa ste/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis mdzes par bya/ /kha dog sngon mo drag chen mo/ /sbrul gyis rgyan

gyis rnam par klubs/ /bzhad dang khro dang sgeg pa yi/ /zhal gsum po ni spyan gsum po/ /ha har bzhad cing gtsigs pa ste/ /na bza' dmar pos shin tu mdzes/ /kha T+wA~M gyen du bsgreng ba dang / /gnyis pa na ni dgra

sta nyid/ /gsum pa na ni rdo rje thogs/ /g.yon pas dril bu sgra sgrogs shing / /gnyis pa na ni snod nyid de/ /gsum pas de bzhin ral gri 'phyar/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba ru/ /dbus su mkhas pas bsgom
par bya/ /ye shes kyi ni shar phyogs su/ /bdag gi chu las byung ba ste/ /kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes/ /skra grol ba ni rnam par klubs/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung bcas/ /rgyan rnams kun

gyis brgyan pa ste/ /phyag na kha T+wA~M rnal 'byor snod/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bzas klubs/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsgom bya/ /ye shes kyi ni byang gi char/ /bdag gi me las byung
ba yi/ /kha dog ser po shin tu mdzes/ /sems dpa' yi ni skyil dkrung can/ /skra grol bas ni shin tu brgyan/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /sku la na bza' mdzes pa bsnams/ /phyag gnyis

kha T+wA~M rnal 'byor snod/ /mkha' 'gro drag mo zhes bya bsgom/ /ye shes kyi ni nub phyogs char/ /bdag gi rlung las byung ba yi/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil dkrung can/ /kha dog dmar po kun tu 'ong / /kha

T+wA~M rnal 'byor snod bsnams shing / /skra grol bas ni mdzes pa ste/ /lus kun sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /mkha' 'gro ro langs ma bsgoM

bya/ /ye shes kyi ni lho yi char/ /sa yi ye shes las byung ba/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil dkrung can/ /kha dog sngon po shin tu mdzes/ /kha T+wA~M rnal 'byor snod bsnams shing / /rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs
pa ste/ /skra grol bas ni shin tu mdzes/ /ha har rgod pas 'jigs par mdzad/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /mkha' 'gro gtum mo zhes byar bsgom/ /bdag dngos lnga las byung ba yi/ /mkha' 'gro ma

ni lnga zhes bya/ /lnga po lnga ru bsgom par bya/ /gzugs sogs shin tu mdzes pa yin/ /dbang ldan gyi ni phyogs kyi char/ /seng ge'i gdong ni bsam par bya/ /kha dog dkar zhing ser ba ste/ /glang po yi ni
stan la bzhugs/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bsdigs mdzub can/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yis/ /'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya/ /me mtshams stag mo zhes
bya ba/ /rin chen bdun gyi stan la bzhugs/ /phyag gnyis kha dog dkar zhing sngo/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/ /lag na lcags kyus brgyan pa ste/ /g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /'od
zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya/ /bden bral lha mo lce spyang mo/ /ha hA bzhad pas 'jigs par mdzad/ /ma he yi ni gdan la bzhugs/ /mdog ni dmar zhing sngo ba ste/ /
sku la na bza' mdzes pa gsol/ /phyag gnyis lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /bsdigs mdzub kyis ni shin tu mdzes/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /'bar ba'i

lus can bsgom par bya/ /rlung mtshams lha mo 'ug pa mo/ /kha dog ser zhing dmar ba ste/ /klu yi stan la yang dag bzhugs/ /rgyan du'ang de nyid sbyar bar bya/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil dkrung can/ /bsdigs mdzub
lcags kyu zhags pa bsnams/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya/ /dbus kyi mkha' 'gro ma brgyad kyi/ /phyi rol dag ni rnam bzhi la/ /shar du mkha' 'gro rgyal dbang mo/ /

phyag gnyis kha dog dkar po ste/ /yi dgas kyi ni stan la bzhugs/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis klubs pa ste/ /shin tu drag cing skra grol bas/ /'od zer sna tshogs yang dag 'bar/ /lag gnyis kha ru bcug nas ni/ /

ha hAr bzhad pas shin tu 'bar/ /byang na 'bar ma rgyal dbang mo/ /kha dog ser mo shin tu 'bar/ /spyi bo'i steng du lag pa gnyis/ /thal sbyar mar me lta bu 'bar/ /drag mo'i gzugs can tshig pa ste/ /shin tu mdzes
pa'i na bzas brgyan/ /yi dgas kyi ni stan la bzhugs/ /'od zer mo ltar 'bar ba bsgom/ /nub kyi lha mo 'jib byed ma/ /kha dog dmar mo 'jigs byed can/ /yi dgas kyi ni stan la bzhugs/ /rab tu mdzes

pa'i go bgos shing / /yi dgas stan la kun tu mnan/ /lag tu skud pa dmar khyer zhing / /thal mo sbyar te khrag 'thung ma/ /drag mo me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od/ /lha mo 'jib byed rab tu grags/ /ngag 'phrog ma
ni lho phyogs su/ /kha dog nag mo mnyam pa'i 'od/ /yi dgas stan la gnas pa yi/ /skra ni gyen du 'bar brgyan pa'i/ /rab tu mdzes pa'i dmar po'i gos/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi/ /bsdigs
mdzub gtun shing lag na thogs/ /rnam par rmongs pa'i sems can sgrol/ /drag mo me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od/ /thams cad kun nas mkhas pas bsgom/ /de dag gi ni gzugs mdun du/ /dam tshig dag ni bstan

par bya/ /rlung dang me yi bdun don la/ /rdo rje ma yi sa bon dbye/ /sgra dang thig le yang dag mnan/ /char pa'i rgyun zhes bya bar brjod/ /phyag 'tshal dang po sreg byed mtha'/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro'i sa bon yin/ /

dbyangs thog dang po'i sa bon ni/ /phyag 'tshal dang po sreg byed mtha'/ /shar phyogs rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i/ /sa bon du ni rab tu grags/ /dbyangs yig yi ge gnyis pa ni/ /phyag 'tshal sreg byed sbyar
bar bya/ /'di ni byang gi phyogs gnas pa/ /mkha' 'gro drag mo'i sa bon yin/ /sa bon dag ni 'di nyid la/ /dbyug pa glo ru gzhag par bya/ /phyag 'tshal dang po sreg byed mtha'/ /nub phyogs ro langs ma

yi yin/ /sa bon dag ni 'di nyid la/ /steng du thig le sbyin par bya/ /phyag 'tshal sreg pa mthar sbyar ba/ /lho phyogs gtum pa mo yi yin/ /ma ning sa bon dang po ni/ /phyag 'tshal sreg byed mtha' dang sbyar/ /dbang

ldan lha mo seng ge ma'i/ /sa bon du ni rab tu grags/ /ma ning sa bon gnyis pa ni/ /phyag 'tshal sreg byed mtha' dang sbyar/ /me mtshams lha mo stag mo yi/ /de kho na nyid sa bon bshad/ /de bzhin ma ning sa bon gsuM/ /

phyag 'tshal sreg byed mtha' dang spel/ /bden bral lha mo lce spyang ma/ /khyad par gyi ni sa bon yin/ /ma ning yi ge bzhi pa la/ /phyag 'tshal sreg byed mtha' dang sbyar/ /rlung mtshams hU~M byed 'ug pa mo'i/ /sa

bon du ni rab tu sbyar/ /sde tshan dag ni lnga pa yi/ /yi ge dag ni gnyis pa bzung / /sa bon rtsa bar sgra dang sbyar/ /phyag 'tshal thog mar sreg byed mtha'/ /shar gyi mkha' 'gro rgyal dbang mo'i/ /sa bon du ni shes

par bya/ /sde tshan dag ni lnga pa yi/ /de bzhin yi ge gnyis pa gzung / /e dang thig ler sbyar bar bya/ /phyag 'tshal thog ma sreg byed mtha'/ /byang phyogs lha mo 'bar byed ma'i/ /sa bon yi ge sbyar bar bya/ /sde

tshan dag ni lnga pa yi/ /yi ge gnyis pa bzung bar bya/ /o dang re pha thig ler bya/ /phyag 'tshal thog mar sreg byed mthar/ /nub phyogs lha mo 'jig byed ma'i/ /khyad par gyi ni sa bon yin/ /sde tshan dag ni lnga pa yi/ /

yi ge gnyis pa bzung nas su/ /re pha'i yi ge lcags kyu sbyar/ /phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' sbyar ba/ /lhor gnas lha mo 'phrog byed ma'i/ /sa bon du ni rab tu grags/ /khu tshur gnyis ni bcings nas su/ /dbu ma

gnyis ni brkyang nas kyang / /rtse mo phan tshun sprad nas ni/ /ye shes lha mor bstan par bya/ /lag gnyis phan tshun sbyar nas su/ /dbu ma dag ni mthe bong sprad/ /cung zad cig ni bskyed par bya/ /shar phyogs rdo rje

ma la bstan/ /khu tshur rnam par bcing nas su/ /mthe bong gnyis ni brkyang byas la/ /byang gi phyogs nas brtsams nas su/ /rgya 'di drag mo la yang bstan/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bcings nas su/ /mthe chung gnyis ni brkyang bar

byas/ /lho phyogs su ni bshad pa ste/ /de ni phyag rgya bzhi pa'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /khro bo gnyis ni brkyang nas su/ /rtse mo sprad de gnas pa ni/ /mtshams bzhi yi ni phyag rgya yin/ /lag gnyis

thal mo khar bcug nas/ /phu zhes bya ba sbyar bar bya/ /shar phyogs mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgya yin/ /lag gnyis thal mo kha sbyar nas/ /spyi bo ru ni gzhag par bya/ /byang du gnas pa'i 'bar ma la/ /phyag rgya 'di

ni bstan par bya/ /phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar nas su/ /kha ru gzhag ste hU~M zhes bya/ /nub phyogs lha mo 'jib byed ma'i/ /phyag rgya ru ni sbyar bar bya/ /lag gnyis kun tu bskor byas nas/ /sor mo rnams kyi rtse

mor sbyar/ /gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag nas kyang / /lho phyogs 'phrog byed ma la bstan/ /phyag 'tshal dang ni sreg pa yi/ /dbus su hU~M zhes bya ba sbyar/ /lag pa kun tu brkyang la sogs/ /dri sngags phyag rgyar

rig par bya/ /bdud rtsi ro dang thig ler bcas/ /phyag 'tshal dang ni sreg pa mtha'/ /dri yi phyag rgya brkyang nas su/ /khro bo dang ni mthe bong sbyar/ /sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni/ /thams cad rig pas thams cad

dbul/ /sde tshan dang po'i dang po ni/ /phyag 'tshal thog ma sreg byed mtha'/ /phyag rgya de nyid sbyar nas su/ /dbu ma'i sor mo bsgreng bar bya/ /bdug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /lha rnams thams cad mchod par

bya/ /dgu mtha' yi ni sa bon gzung / /phyag 'tshal dang ni sreg byed mtha'/ /khu tshur bcings nas mthe bong bsgreng / /mar me'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /lha rnams thams cad mchod par bya/ /sde tshan dang po'i

gsum pa gzung / /sgra dang thig ler sbyar ba dang / /phyag 'tshal dang ni sreg byed mtha'/ /gtor ma'i phyag rgya dang ni sbyar/ /lag pa gnyis ni sbyar nas su/ /mthe bong gung mo sbyar bya ba/ /thams cad du ni skad

cig bskyod/ /gtor ma'i sngags ni snga mar sbyar/ /gnyis med gtor ma snga ma bzhin/ /de nyid 'di yi mchod par bya/ /sngon du rdzas ni rnam pa lnga/ /sna tshogs pa yi lcags kyu dang / /dri dang me tog bdug pa sogs/ /

sngags dang phyag rgya phul nas kyang / /phyi nas mchod pa nyi shu yis/ /mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/ /hU~M zhes pa yi glu blangs nas/ /rnal 'byor ma lus mnyes par bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ /

rked pa'i mtshams su gzhag nas ni/ /yan lag gsum du hU~M gis bskyod/ /pi wang tshul du bsgreng ba dang / /gling bu'i tshul du 'bud pa dang / /zangs dung tshul du 'bud pa dang / /cang te'i tshul gyis brdung ba dang / /

dkrol ba'i tshul gyis dkrol ba dang / /pa Ta ha ltar brdung ba dang / /gar gyi tshul gyis bskyod pa dang / /bsil g.yab tshul gyis g.yob pa dang / /rgyal mtshan tshul gyis bsgreng ba dang / /bla re'i tshul du bres pa dang / /ba

dan tshul du 'phyar ba dang / /gdugs kyi tshul du dbub pa dang / /rdza rnga'i tshul du rdung ba dang / /rnga zlum tshul du brdung ba dang / /'dzum pa'i tshul du bzhad pa dang / /khro ba'i tshul du khro ba dang / /sgeg pa'i tshul du sgeg pa dang / /

'gying ba'i tshul gyis rol pa dang / /mda' 'dren nu mar mkhyud pa dang / /rdo rje gsor zhing phyag 'tshal pa'i/ /phyag 'tshal tshul du 'dud pa ste/ /rnal 'byor ma brgyad de nyid kyi/ /dngos po kun gyis mchod par bya/ /de nyid

dbyangs su blangs nas su/ /hU~M zhes bya ba bdag gis sprul/ /hU~M gis glu ni blang bar bya/ /rdo rje dga' ba'i mthu dang spyan gyis gzigs/ /yi ge'i dngos por rang bzhin stong par rol/ /dngos dang dngos med las grol dbu

ma mkhyen/ /mi 'gyur dgra bcom lhag ma sems pa'o/ /gnyis sprod gnyis 'khyud chu yi bya ba can/ /gnyis med chos skyes thar pa'ang brnyes pa'o/ /bde bas 'khor mnan thar pa'ang btang ba'o/ /thams cad dngos

kyis rnal 'byor ma rnams rol/ /rnal 'byor ma lnga sangs rgyas de nyid mkhyen/ /gzugs mang sgyu mas sems can smin mdzad pa/ /rdo rje kun rtogs chos kyi rmongs pa gcod/ /rnal 'byor ma rmongs snying chos
tshogs la 'dud/ /rnal 'byor ma yi chos grol nges pa'i gtso la 'dud/ /sems can grol mdzad rnal 'byor bdag la bstod phyag 'tshal/ /thams cad bdag skyes gcig dngos de la bstod phyag 'tshal/ /

'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rmongs pa gcod pa bstod phyag 'tshal/ /de nyid gcig la rtag tu bdag 'dud bstod phyag 'tshal/ /zhes bya bas khyad par du bstod cing / glu dang bstod pas nye bar mchod par bya'o/ /bar bar

du hU~M gi sgra dang dril bu bsgrags la smon lam rnam pa gsum gdab par bya'o/ /rdo rje thal mo dam bcings nas/ /snying ga'i phyogs su btsir bar bya/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+har+m+mAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/

oM badzra shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+har+m+mA badzra shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM yo ga shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+har+m+mA yo ga shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ g.yas pa pad+ma bsams nas su/ /g.yon pa rdo rje bsgrengs nas kyang / /pad+ma'i bskor bas bskor nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen po bstan

par bya/ /oM ha ho hrIHswA hA/ phyag rgya chen po byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /rnal 'byor can gyis mtshungs pa ru/ /lha rnams thams cad bsam par bya/ /'jig rten pa sogs ye shes can/ /phyi yi dkyil

'khor brtag par bya/ /so sor dri yis mchod pa dang / /so sor me tog gtor ba dang / /so sor bdug pas bdug pa sogs/ /so sor sbyor bar dbul bar bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni bsres nas su/ /nya phyis la sogs dbul bar bya/ /

ha zhes bya bas kha dog dbrog /ho zhes bya bas dri gzhom ste/ /hrI zhes bya bas nus pa gzhom/ /go rim de ltar mngon par brjod/ /rnam gsum lan gsum brjod nas su/ /lha gsum du ni bsam par bya/ /pad+ma'i dbang

phyug gzugs mdzes gser gyi mdog /dri chu'i ngo bo shin tu rnam snang mdzad/ /myang ba rdo rje'i dbang phyug phyag rdo rje/ /lha gsum dbang phyug tu ni bsgom par bya/ /g.yon pa zla ba'i lag pa yi/ /zla ba'i dbus su

bdud rtsi yi/ /yi ge kun rig gug bskyed bcas/ /mthe bong sor mo sa nyid de/ /srin lag dag ni ri rab bo/ /bsrubs pa'i stobs kyis bdud rtsi yi/ /chu ni rnam gsum shes par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad la/ /

mthe bong thor 'thung so sor dbul/ /de 'og rang gi dngos po yis/ /bdag nyid la ni bsam bya ba/ /rgyas pa lnga yi mchod rten ni/ /rnam pa gsum gyis bkru bar bya/ /lce rtse thig le steng du yang / /blo dang ldan pas gnas
gsum mchod/ /ltos shig shin tu mdzes pa'i chos/ /'di la rtog pa yong min thong / /bram ze khyi dang rdol pa gsum/ /rang bzhin cig pas lhan cig bza'/ /rnal 'byor pho mo'i 'khor lo la/ /tshigs bcad

'di yis sbyin par bya/ /pad+ma'i bskor ba mngon 'gro bas/ /sems ni shel ltar bsams nas su/ /g.yas pa pad+ma'i gdan la ni/ /rdo rje rtse gsum bsgreng bar bya/ /'dod chags dri ma dang bral ba'i/ /rin thang med

las legs 'ongs chos/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa/ /de kho na nyid bdag phyag 'tshal/ /tshigs bcad 'di yis blang byas te/ /sbyor ba'i dngos grub don du ni/ /kun spyod de nyid ji bzhin du/ /rnal 'byor pa

yis kun tu sbyar/ /ji ltar bde bas kun zhes brjod/ /dmar po yi ni rdzas rnams kyis/ /maN+Dal gru gsum gsum du bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ /rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/ /mthe chung gnyis ni

bsgreng nas su/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya/ /g.yas pa cung zad bskum nas su/ /sbyar bas phyag rnams spyan drang ngo / /oM ku ru ku ru sa ma ya a d+hi pa ti hU~M dzaHswA hA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /me tog

dmar po bdug pa dang / /dri dang mar me la sogs dbul/ /rgyas pa'i gtor ma'i snod la ni/ /nye ba'i longs spyod gtor mar ldan/ /sha rlon dang ni nya la sogs/ /bza' ba'i rdzas rnams thams cad la/ /bdud rtsi lnga

dang bcas par dgod/ /g.yon gyi cha ru snod gzhag la/ /g.yas su khro bo bstan par bya/ /oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang / /ri bo dang ni ri sul dang / /grong dang bzhi mdo zhing dang ni/ /khyad par du ni khang stong dang / /

gdol pa snod dang thang dang ni/ /khyad par du ni chu la gnas/ /nag po drag po drag chen po/ /lha sbyin mnyam du bsten pa dang / /nag po gtsigs dang mi sdug dang / /rga las 'das dang log 'dren rnams/ /rgan byed ma dang

drag mo dang / /mi sdug ma dang U ma dang / /rgyal ma rnam par rgyal ma dang / /mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ /nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo/ /nag sbom ma dang rnal 'byor ma/ /dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo/ /drag tu sdang dang 'phyang ba mo/ /

'phrog byed ma dang mar me ma/ /'jib byed grong gnas rnal 'byor ma/ /drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo/ /mche ba gtsigs dang thod chen ma/ /thod phreng can dang kha T+wA~M ma/ /sbrul chen ral gri dgra sta can/ /rdo

rje de bzhin gzhu can ma/ /lha yi dbang phyug ma rnams ni/ /de bzhin chen mo mkha' 'gro lnga/ /las kun rjes su sgrub byed ma/ /sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal chen mo/ /de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa'i sku chen te/ /rdul med rnal 'byor 'byin pa mo/ /rdo rje dbang mo'i bka' 'di yis/ /thams cad kun nas 'dir spyon cig /oM kak+ka T+d+han/ bab+ban+d+ha na/ khakh+khA da na/ sar+b+ba duSh+TaM ha na ha na g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya a
mu ka s+ya shAn+ti~M ku ru hU~M hU~M phaT dza swA hA/ bdud rtsi yis ni kha bkang nas/ /las kyi go 'phang mngon par bsam/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma bsgoms te/ /las rnams thams cad rjes su 'grub/ /rdo

rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/ /oM tiSh+Tha hU~M b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha dzaHphaT swA hA/ ji bzhin las sbyor sngags sbyar nas/ /gtor ma'i las la sogs pa sbyar/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang

dgug pa dang / /gsad bskrad dbye dang bcing ba la/ /phyi rol gtor ma de nyid kyis/ /gtor ma'i las la sogs pas sgrub/ /de nas mchod pa'i khyad par las/ /rung dang mi rung rnam par spang / /lcags kyu la sogs rnam

pa lnga/ /de nyid lnga ru bya ba ste/ /lcags kyu che la dgod pa ni/ /ye shes lhar ni 'dod pa ste/ /rdo rje lcags kyur mi bskyod pa/ /gnas kyi lcags kyur rin chen dbang / /rgyal po'i lcags kyur don yod grub/ /g.yo

ba'i lcags kyur 'od dpag med/ /lcags kyu lnga la sogs pa la/ /de nyid thams cad sbyar bar bya/ /gang zhig 'dod pas lha kun dang / /rnal 'byor ma kun tshim par bya/ /'dod la dga' ba ma yin zhing / /longs
spyod phyir ni bsten mi bya/ /rang 'dod thams cad de nyid de/ /mchod pa'i las la sogs pa bya/ /de yi dbus su dpa' bo rnams/ /A li kA li sbyar bar bya/ /A li kA li rab sbyor gyis/ /lha rnams thams cad

tshim par bya/ /de yi dbus nas byung ba yi/ /bdud rtse'i ro kun myang bar bya/ /rdzas rnams kun gyi lhag ma dag /phyi yi dkyil 'khor du ni brtag /hU~M zhes bya ba'i glu yis ni/ /bkra shis sgra yis dgang bar bya/ /
lus can don phyir shes rab gsol btab pa/ /kun mkhyud la sogs gnyis kyis gnyis sprod cing / /sgyu ma lta bur sbyor bas shin tu brgyan/ /srid pa las sgrol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang 'dod bkra shis

sgra dang ni/ /hU~M hU~M brjod cing dril bu gsil/ /rdo rje thal mo bcings nas ni/ /snying ga'i gnas su rab gzhag la/ /ma lus sems can kun gyi phyir/ /smon lam dag ni gdab par bya/ /sems can thams cad nad med cing / /

sems can thams cad bde gyur cig /gang gi lam nas 'gro ba yis/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang 'phrad par shog /ma rgal ba rnams sgral ba dang / /ma grol ba rnams bdag gis sgrol/ /da lta nyid du rjes brtse bas/ /rnal 'byor bstan
bcos gnas la dgod/ /rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings nas/ /g.yon pa'i snying gar bzhag par bya/ /g.yas pa sa la brkyang nas ni/ /de yi 'og tu gshegs su gsol/ /oM At+ma tiSh+Tha hU~M swA hA/ de nas

rang gi dbugs kyis ni/ /bdag gi lus la bstim par bya/ /skad cig tshul gyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /bdag gi dngos po mchod par bya/ /oM sar+b+ba duSh+Ta~M grih+Na gats+tsha hU~M phaT/ se gol gsum ni gtogs pa yis/ /phyi
rol lha rnams gshegs su gsol/ /gzhan gyi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba gsum pa'o// // bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par dang / /gang gis lcags kyu lnga po brlabs/ /dngos dang dngos med
rnam par rtog /gnyis med gnyis su med pa'i chos/ /gnyis kyi rtog pa ji ltar spang / /A li kA li ji ltar lags/ /rnal 'byor bstan bcos tshul rnams ni/ /phyi rol phyag rgya'i sems ni ci/ /bcom ldan 'das

la nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dang po rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu/ /lnga yi bdag nyid rab tu 'jug /reg na dro ba med yin te/ /du ba ltar snang rlung yin no/ /sla ba'i rang bzhin chu

zhes bya/ /gzugs su snang ba sa yin no/ /ye shes byin brlabs rdo rje'o/ /lha lnga ru ni bsgom par bya/ /ma lus chu yi dbyibs dang ni/ /zad par bya ba me nyid dang / /de bzhin rtag tu rlung dang ni/ /ngang pa mtshungs

don sa dbang po/ /ye shes kyi ni yi ge lnga/ /sgra dang thig ler sbyar bar bya/ /de yi dbus su zla ba yi/ /dbus su bdud rtse'i yi ge'o/ /lnga po lnga ru brjod par bya/ /dngos dang dngos med las grol ba'i/ /rdo rje chu ni sbyangs pa

yis/ /des ni gti mug bsrings pa yin/ /phyi rol bdud rtsi rdzas bzang po/ /me yis btsos nas sbyangs pa ltar/ /lha sogs me yis btsos nas ni/ /lhag ma bshang dang gci ba yin/ /me yis btsos nas sbyang me yi/ /dbus

su sbyin sreg rtag tu dbul/ /rdo rje chu yi sa bon ni/ /sa bon babs pas bzlas nas kyang / /de yi dbus su nyi ma la/ /dur khrod yi ge bsams nas sreg /dngos dang dngos med las grol bas/ /de phyir rmongs las ring du 'gyur/ /

pad+ma'i dbang phyug gzugs mdzes shin tu sdug /dri chu'i ngo bo shin tu rnam snang mdzad/ /myang ba rdo rje dbang phyug phyag rdo rje/ /lha gsum rnam gsum du ni shes par bya/ /ha zhes pa yis kha dog dbrog /ho zhes pa yis dri

gzhom ste/ /hrIHzhes bya bas nus pa gzhom/ /go rim de ltar mngon par brjod/ /bdud rtsi chu zhes bya ba ste/ /lha ni rnam pa gsum du grags/ /dngos dang dngos med las grol bas/ /de phyir rmongs pa ring du spong / /A li bung
