ba zhes brjod de/ /bung ba rdo rje 'jigs byed yin/ /A li nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings ni rang bzhin te/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu gsang blo can/ /lus ni ma lus bskyed pa'o/ /bcu dang brgyad kyi rtsa rnams nas/ /dbang

po kun gyi bdud rtsi rnams/ /de yi dbus nas drangs nas su/ /A li'i dbus su thim par 'gyur/ /'jigs byed rdo rje sgra yis te/ /sbyor ba'i rdzas rnams skye ba yin/ /rlung dang me yi bdun don la/ /rdo rje ma yi sa bon sbyar/ /sgra dang

thig les yang dag mnan// char ba'i rgyun zhes bya bar brjod// dbyangs yig dang po mchog sa bon// de yi dbus su zung bar bya/ / dngos dad dngos med las grol ba/ / de phyir rmongs las ring du 'gyur// kA li me tog kun du
pa'i zhes bar yig po sa de dbus gzung bya/ /dang med grol de ring li tog tu

mnan/ /rdo rje can gyi lus me tog /'khor ba thams cad bskyed pa ste/ /sa dang kun gyi ma zhes bya/ /ye shes chu yi rgya mtsho 'dir/ /de bzhin shes rab chu srin nya/ /gnyis med 'dam gyi dbus su ni/ /thabs kyi myu gu de bzhin

te/ /ban+du ka ltar kha phye ba'i/ /sbrang rtsi bdud rtsi yi ger gnas/ /kA li bdud rtsi de nyid ni/ /me tog chu yi de bzhin bskor/ /yi ge gnyis 'gyur thig le dang / /rtsa bar sgra ni yang dag sbyar/ /yi ge'i sa bon de nyid ni/ /lha rnams

kyi ni rigs kyi yum/ /zla ba'i dbus su bsam par bya/ /bdud rtsi'i sa bon bsgoms pa yis/ /dngos dang dngos med las grol ba/ /de phyir rmongs pa kun tu spong / /A li bung ba zhes byar brjod/ /kA li de bzhin gshegs ma

yin/ /lus gnyis po las skyes pa dag /bdud rtsi yi ni cho ga mchog /sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i/ /yi ge gsum pa gzung bya ba/ /dbyug pa phyi mo rdo rje can/ /lu gu rgyud kyis dkri bar bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi de

nyid kyis/ /lus can bdag nyid dkru bar bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par dang / /gang gis shes 'gyur 'chi mi 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i sgo ni mthong 'gyur zhing / /dag pa'i lus ni skyon med par/ /bdud rtsi sbyor ba kun

shes pas/ /rang dgar bdud rtsi myang bar bya/ /bza' ba lnga yi bye brag gi/ /de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjer nyon/ /gang zhig shes nas zos pa yis/ /myur du 'gro ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /blo chen dang ni ngag dang ni/ /rigs

la 'gran dang reg 'gro dang / /lcags kyu chen po rnal 'byor pas/ /shel dang 'dra bas longs spyad bya/ /rnam shes sa bon bzlas nas ni/ /de yi sa bon gzung bar bya/ /shel gyi sems kyis longs spyod na/ /
rnal 'byor rmongs pa gcod par 'gyur/ /dag pa'i sems kyis bza' bar bya/ /bgegs kyi lcags kyu gcig yin te/ /de yi yan lag la sbyar ba/ /hU~M zhes bya ba'i sa bon gyis/ /lcags kyu ru ni

sbyar bar bya/ /gnas kyi bdag po'i lcags kyu ni/ /gri zhes bya ba'i sa bon nyid/ /rab tu sbyang nas bsams nas su/ /rnam par rtog pa ring du spang / /rta yi lcags kyu'i dbus gnas pa/ /thams cad rig pas dgod

bya ba/ /rnal 'byor pa yis dzri~M zhes pa/ /dag pa'i shel ltar bsam par bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu byin brlabs pas/ /rdo rje'i lus su brjod pa ste/ /sri zhes bya ba bkod de bza'/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams sdig 'byang ngo / /

bcu bzhi pa dang bcwa lnga dang / /khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la/ /dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /rab tu 'bad de gtor ma sbyin/ /sgrub pos rnal 'byor bstan bcos la/ /rtag tu mchod pa'i las byas

na/ /spyod dang grol ba gang 'dod dang / /las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'gro na yang / /myur du dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/ /mdza' bo sdug cing yid 'ong bar/ /mthong ba tsam gyis

'grub par 'gyur/ /dbul po nor gyis phongs pa yang / /khyim ni 'byor zhing rgyas par 'gyur/ /'chi ba'i tshe na rnal 'byor pa/ /bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ /dri zhim dang ni sbyar ba yi/ /rdzas bcu po dag ldan
pa la/ /yi ge bcu yi sngags dag ni/ /phyag 'tshal bsreg pa'i mtha' dang ldan/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas te/ /mkha' 'gro gtor ma'i byin brlabs la/ /sgrub pos 'di yi du bas bdug /'gro ba thams

cad rmongs par 'gyur/ /gur gum dang ni sbyar ba yi/ /rdzas bcud phan tshun ldan pa yi/ /rnal 'byor pa yis thig le bya/ /skyes bu 'gro la skal bzangs 'gyur/ /tsan dan dang ni sbyar ba yi/ /rdzas bcud dag
ni ldan pa yi/ /yan lag dag ni byugs nas su/ /reg na shi yang mi gtong ngo / /dbang po lag dang sbyar ba yi/ /rdzas bcu dag dang ldan pa ru/ /bza' dang btung bar sbyin byas na/ /dbang med dbang du
'du bar 'gyur/ /sngags ni lan 'bum bzlas nas kyang / /mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin brlabs nas/ /de dag las su sbyar bar bya/ /ngas bstan pa la the tshom med/ /gnyis med ded dpon gnas su ni/ /
thig le byas na go char 'gyur/ /de nyid theg pa'i snying po 'dir/ /'khor ba las ni rgyal bar 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi 'od dang skal bzangs ma/ /sems can rnams la sdug par lta/ /bde sdug dag ni 'phrog
byed ma/ /de bzhin sgeg pa'i nyams kyis mdzes/ /thun mong nga rgyal bdag 'dzin ma/ /mi brtson ma dang brtson sems can/ /skal bzang lha kun rmongs byed ma/ /kun nas 'joms pa nyid dang ni/ /

blo ngan srid pa'i ngo bo 'joms/ /lha mo byams ma nyid dang ni/ /yid 'ong bdud rtsi ldan grags ma/ /yon tan ldan pa'i lha mo nyid/ /lha mo 'di dag las kyis ni/ /spyod dang grol ba'i 'dod pa stsol/ /de
ltar yon tan ldan lha mo/ /mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/ /pho nya'i las kyi bya ba yis/ /grub pa'i rnal 'byor don gyi phyir/ /rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i sgrub thabs ni/ /bcom ldan 'das las nyan
par 'tshal/ /pho nya'i las su sbyar ba yis/ /de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /las rnams kun gyi snying po bas/ /rab tu 'bad de pho nya bsgrub/ /shing gcig gi ni drung dag tu/ /cho ga bzhin du 'bum du
bzlas/ /khru gang bzhi char bcas pa yi/ /thang ga la ni bri bya ste/ /mtheb sor bcu gnyis tshad du ni/ /kha dog ser po shin tu mdzes/ /phyag gnyis mgo bor thal sbyar ba'i/ /'od zer me 'bar lha mo

bri/ /sgrub po'i mdun du bkram nas su/ /'bad de mchod pa'i cho ga brtsam/ /dri dang me tog dmar po dang / /sha skam gyis ni bdug par bya/ /sha dang nya sha tsong la sogs/ /nye bar spyad pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ /

rdzas lnga dag ni dngos po lnga/ /mchod nas de bzhin 'bum du bzlas/ /dang po la ni sgra 'byung ste/ /gnyis pa la ni nya dri bsnam/ /gsum par shing ni 'gul 'gyur te/ /bzhi pa la ni mdun du gnas/ /de yi sngags ni

brjod nas kyang / /dam tshig phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /oM dI pe shwa ri hU~M phuH lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su/ /spyi bor bzhag ste brjod par bya/ /dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis bkang ba yi/ /dam
tshig chu ni sbyin par bya/ /'bad de dam tshig byin nas ni/ /lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas su/ /rnal 'byor ma dang gnyis med pas/ /byin gyis rlobs la bdag bsgrubs shig /de nas rang gi gzugs bzung nas/ /

bza' dang btung sogs ston mo dang / /gser la sogs pa ci yang rung / /bka' bzhin myur du ster bar 'gyur/ /thun phyed du ni lhan cig spyad/ /'khrig la sred pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /gal te grub par ma gyur na/ /de tshe

drag mo'i sa bon bzla/ /sa bon gnyis ni gzir tsam gyis/ /'bar phyed ma yi spyi bo 'gems/ /sems can don 'bad sgrub pa pos/ /'bar ba chung mar bsgrub par bya/ /grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma gzhan gyi/ /de nyid ji
bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /thang ga khru gnyis dman pa la/ /mchod dang gtor ma byin brlabs te/ /de 'og gzugs ni bri bar bya/ /dkar zhing dmar la shin tu mdzes/ /phyag gnyis rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs/ /
shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/ /phyag na sdigs mdzub lcags kyu bsnams/ /skra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan/ /'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gsal/ /mig g.yon ha har bzhad pa bri/ /dur khrod kyi ni sa

phyogs su/ /sgrub pa po yis bris sku dgram/ /kun tu khrag gis byugs nas ni/ /me tog dmar la sogs pas mchod/ /me tog dri dang bdug pa dang / /sha dang nya sha tsong la sogs/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis bgang ba

yi/ /nye bar spyod pa'i gtor sbyin cing / /rnal 'byor bsgom pas bzlas nas ni/ /'bum gyis dngos grub skye bar 'gyur/ /lag gnyis thal mo bcings nas su/ /kha ru bcug nas brgad par bya/ /oM DA ki nI hU~M phru~M phuH

sgrub pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /dang po sa ni g.yo 'gyur te/ /gnyis pa mdun du gad rgyangs sgrogs/ /gsum pa mdun du snang gyur nas/ /bzhi pa la ni bka' lung nod/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi/ /dam
tshig 'bad de byin nas ni/ /g.yog mo ru ni sgrub pa yis/ /ci 'dod bka' ni bsgo bar bya/ /dgra rnams bsad cing gtse ba dang / /yan lag gzir ba gang 'dod pa'i/ /las la sogs pa thams cad ni/ /g.yog
mo'i las kyis bsgrub par bya/ /gal te 'bum gyis gdon za na/ /rdo rje ma yi sa bon gyis/ /sngon du bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /mkhas pas gzir bar byas te bzla/ /ra dag gi ni lpags pa la/ /'bad de thang

ka brkyang bar bya/ /'jib byed ma de bri ru gzhug /kha dog dmar po shin tu mdzes/ /lus la rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /mdzes pa'i gos ni gyon pa bri/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang / /g.yas su dgra sta dgod par bya/ /

lam gyi bzhi mdo yid 'ong bar/ /mkhas pa yi ni bsgrub bya ste/ /lci ba yis ni byug byas la/ /me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya/ /me tog bdug pa mar me sogs/ /'byung po kun gyi gtor ma sbyin/ /khrag dang nya dang sha

dang tsong / /bza' ba dag dang sna tshogs dang / /bdud rtsi lnga yis dgang ba sbyin/ /'bad de gnas pas 'bum gcig bzla/ /oM tsu ShI ni A kaR+Sha ya phuHphaT/ lag gnyis mnyam par byas nas ni/ /snyim pa'i tshul

gyis bar bskyod bya/ /snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas pas/ /'jib byed ma ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /dang po khyi ni ngur ba'i sgra/ /gnyis pa la ni gsal bar dgod/ /gsum pa la ni
mtshon thogs nas/ /bsdigs pa'i phyir ni 'ong bar byed/ /bzhi par mdun du gnas nas ni/ /bdag gis ci bgyi bka' stsol smra/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyis/ /dam tshig dag ni byin nas su/ /sems

can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /dbul po bdag gis khyod bsgrubs so/ /de nas nyi ma re re bzhin/ /gser srang phyed phyed ster bar 'gyur/ /gal te 'bum gyis ma grub na/ /ro langs snying pos gzir te bzla/ /sa

bon 'di yis gzir tsam gyis/ /'jib byed ma yi mgo 'gems so/ /chu 'gram gyi ni sa phyogs su/ /kam po tsi ni bsgrub par bya/ /ba lang la sogs ko ba ni/ /brkyang ste 'phrog byed bri ru gzhug /lus ni sbrul
gyis brgyan pa ste/ /kha dog sngon po 'bar ba'i 'od/ /skra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan/ /gos dmar bgos shing phyag gnyis mdzes/ /ral gri dang ni zhags pa thogs/ /ha har bzhad cing rnam gtsigs pa/ /

khrag gis maN Dal byugs nas ni/ /dri dang me tog bdug pas bdug /rgyas pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /sha dang nya dang tsong la sogs/ /nye bar spyod pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi/ /sngon

bzhin lha yi gtor ma sbyin/ /rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom zhing bzlas/ /'bum gcig gi ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /dang po chu ni g.yo bar 'gyur/ /gnyis pa la ni char chen 'bebs/ /mdun du rdo rje'i sgra 'byin cing / /

gsum par thog ni 'bab 'gyur te/ /bzhi pa la ni mdun du gnas/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi/ /dam tshig de nas 'bad de sbyin/ /oM kra~M kru~M phra~M phruHphaT/ lag gnyis khu tshur bcings nas su/ /de yi

sngags ni brjod par bya/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /mdun na thal mo sbyar bas ni/ /ci zhig bgyi zhes brjod par 'gyur/ /ti se gangs kyi rtse ru ni/ /rtse phyir khyod kyis nga khrid la/ /slar yang 'dir

ni 'ong ba dang / /rgyal po'i bu mo'am gzhan yang rung / /nga 'dod pa de khrid de shog /gser dang dngul dang zangs la sogs/ /bza' dang btung dang bgo ba ni/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin khyer te 'ong / /lha mi'i chung ma gang yang
rung / /ti se gangs kyi rtse ru ni/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin khrid par byed/ /bstan pa'i las kyis ma grub na/ /las gzhan gyis ni bsgrub par bya/ /bdag nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro ma/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms

nas su/ /de yi rkang pa g.yon pa yis/ /mnan te lnga brgya bzlas nas ni/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /gal te des ma 'grub na/ /dpa' bo'i dbusu bgug nas ni/ /dum bur dum bur gtub par bya/ /kri zhes

bya dang gsod pa mtha'/ /hU~M gi sa bon bsgoms pa yis/ /thams cad du ni bza' bar bsam/ /des ni bsgrub bya'i rnal 'byor ma/ /thams cad kyi ni dbang phyug ma'ang / /gal te ma 'grub 'chi bar 'gyur/ /bstan pa'i

las kyis ma 'grub na/ /b+ha la ta ka nag po'i shing / /me 'bar ba yi dbus su ni/ /khrag dang bcas pa'i yungs kar ni/ /nyi ma phyed na hU~M zhes ni/ /brjod cing brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs na/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'chi

'gyur ba'am/ /cho nges 'debs shing 'ongs nas su/ /nges par las rnams sgrub byed par/ /ngas bstan pa la the tshom med/ /khro bo sngon po mdzes pa ste/ /khyod ni dam tshig yid du 'ong / /nor bu rin chen gces bcings

pa'i/ /dbyug pa phyag na bsnams pa ste/ /bdag ni 'khor ba las bsgral phyir/ /dpa' bos gnang gis gtang du gsol/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs dbus su/ /bzang po sgo 'di phye ste thong / /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor

ma gsang che/ /gsang dang gsang bas shes bya ba/ /ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni/ /bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni/ /de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /g.yas kyi cha ru rnal

'byor pa/ /g.yon du rnal 'byor ma nyid de/ /sor mo khar ni 'jug byed pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan ma'o/ /thal mo spyi bor 'jog byed pa/ /g+ho g+hu/ 'bar byed ma yi mtshan ma yi/ /gu g+hu/ mthe bo 'tshir

bar byed pa yi/ /'jib byed ma yi mtshan ma'o/ /mu g+hu/ lag pa rna bar brdebs pa ni/ /blo ldan 'phrog byed rtags yin no/ /lu g+hu/ sna rtser skyor mo brdabs pa ni/ /thugs bde mi bde 'dri ba yin/ /Da~MSh+Ta/ sha ba'i

mgo ltar stod byed pa/ /rnal 'byor byed pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /gan+d+ho de/ gang zhig smin ma dbus reg pa/ /nga yi snying sdug grogs po'o/ /ag+ne da ha/ so yis lce ni 'tshir byed pa/ /lus nang gtor ma bza'

zhes pa'o/ /b+hak+Sha so/ lag pa skra la 'ju byed pa/ /khyod kyi khyim du ngas phyin pa'o/ /dwe ra ti/ lag pa snying gar dag byed na/ /da ni nga yi yid 'ong ba'o/ /ru tsa Ta ba ta/ sna rtser khu tshur 'chang ba ni/ /med do zhes

ni ston pa'o/ /shU n+ya tA/ lag pa brkyang ste ltor brdebs na/ /phun sum ldan par yod zhes pa'o/ /bip+d+ha ka si Da/ lte ba ru ni nyed byed na/ /kha zas bza' bar 'dod pa'o/ /tsaN+Da lika / mdzub mo mdun du ston byed na/ /

zhe gnag gtum la drag pa yin/ /nI la daN+Da pa ta/ smin ma la ni reg byed na/ /'dir 'dod pa ni nga la ston/ /a na~M gA yud+d+ha/ /lce ni 'dral bar byed pa dag /da ltar 'chi zhes bya ba'o/ /dur+k+ka ti/ kun tu
blta bar byed pa ni/ /tshes grangs shes par 'dod pa'o/ /tA ra ga NaH /tshes gcig nas ni brtsams nas su/ /mthe bos ri mo bri bar bya/ /nyi tshod yi ge la sogs pa/ /sngar bstan bzhin du mdun du reg /

gi ri te/ steng du blta bar byed pa ni/ /nyin phyed dga' bar rol pa'o/ /sa ma ts+tsha yA/ 'dzum dang bcas pas blta byed cing / /lag pa lag pas bzung nas su/ /rgya mtsho lta bur ston byed pa/ /nor bzangs byin

zhes bya ba'o/ /jIM N+Na bta/ lag gnyis khu tshur 'chang byed na/ /sa l+ya bad/ mthe bong gis ni srin lag la/ /reg pa 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /so ma/ mthe bong khro bo bza' la sogs/ /sur+ya bad/ rnal 'byor pha dang

rnam 'byor ma rnams kyi/ dga' ba la rol pa'i ngag gi phyag rgya dang brda'i mtshan nyid do/ /gzhan gyi gdan zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o// // mtshon cha'i mtshan nyid gzhan dag ni/ /bcom ldan

'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /de nyid bzhi po ji lta bu/ /shes nas ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi/ /'khor ba las sgrol mtshan nyid ni/ /yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /dang po de nyid rdo rje ni/ /dril bu yang ni gnyis pa'o/ /

bgrang ba'i phreng ba gsum pa ste/ /ye shes mtshan nyid bzhi pa'o/ /de nyid bzhi yi rba rlabs kyis/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin pha rol sgrol/ /dbus kyi lha ni rnam snang mdzad/ /thams cad thog mar mi bskyod pa/ /

lho yi rtse mor rin chen 'byung / /nub tu snang ba mtha' yas dgod/ /byang gi phyogs su don yod grub/ /rtse mo lnga ni lha rnams so/ /pad+ma byang chub yan lag brgyad/ /ji bzhin sa ru bzhag par bya/ /phyag na pad+ma
byams pa dang / /nam mkha' dang ni kun tu bzang / /gnod sbyin bdag dang gzhan gyi dpal/ /sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / /lha ni brgyad po 'di dag nyid/ /shar la sogs par ji bzhin bsam/ /dbus kyi

bcu gsum sgo nga ru/ /ye shes lha ni thim par bya/ /pad+ma brgyad la lha mo brgyad/ /ji bzhin gnas su sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin du/ /zhags pa lcags sgrog sgrol ma ste/ /de ltar lha mo bzhi po

dag /de bzhin phyogs bzhir rol pa yin/ /mtshams kyi cha ni rnam pa bzhir/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsam bya ba/ /skul byed rin chen sgrol ma dang / /rdo rje lcags sgrog ming can de/ /gzhan gyis mi thub zhes bya

ste/ /mtshams kyi 'bad ma kun la dgod/ /rtse mo lnga ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /snga ma ji bzhin bsam par bya/ /shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /byang du drag mo zhes bya ste/ /nub du de bzhin ro langs ma/ /lho yi phyogs
su gtum ma gnas/ /dbus su ye shes mkha' 'gro ma/ /rdo rje de kho na yi lha/ /mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya/ /cha gsum gsal bar gzung ba la/ /ska rags kyis ni shin tu brgyan/ /ud+pa la ku mu da
ltar mdzes/ /rin chen pad+ma yang dag gnas/ /phyogs la sogs pa brgyad dang ni/ /dbu ma'i sangs rgyas nyid dang dgu/ /rtse mo dgu yi lha nyid de/ /lha dgu yis ni byin gyis brlabs/ /chu srin
las ni byung ba ni/ /rtse mo 'od zer zla bar gnas/ /rtse mo dgu pa zhes bya ba/ /ye shes rdo rje 'gro ba sgrol/ /rdo rje de nyid gang yin pas/ /bdag nyid rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsam/ /rdo rje'i snying

po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /rdo rje yi ni sems su bya/ /rdo rje dag pas brtan byas nas/ /chos rnams rdo rje las gzhan med/ /thams cad rdo rje de nyid yin/ /rdo rje las kyi snying po'o/ /rdo rje 'pho ba sbyor ba'i bdag /

rdo rje 'khor ba sgrol bar byed/ /rdo rje 'gug pa sbyor ba'i bdag /rdo rje bcings pa'i sbyor bar ldan/ /bdun pa de bzhin nyon mongs ldan/ /rnam shes bcas pa'i sgron ma ni/ /ye shes rdo rjes bcom nasu/ /

phyogs kun du ni snang bar byed/ /rdo rje'i sgrub pa la sogs kun/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid blta bar bya/ /chos kyi 'ching ba rdo rje ste/ /thar pa mchog 'bad rdo rje'o/ /rdo rje pad+ma bzung nas ni/ /de nyid thams cad bsgrub

par bya/ /rdo rje pad mor zhugs pa ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /dril bu yi ni mtshan nyid rnams/ /nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /shes rab sgra yi de nyid ni/ /thos pas srid pa las sgrol ba'i/ /nam mkha'i
khams kyi mthas gtugs par/ /byang chub snying por rnam par gnas/ /thams cad rig pas phyogs kun tu/ /gnas pa'i 'jig rten khams mthar thug /phyogs brgyad ces ni bya ba rnams/ /lha mo brgyad du rab tu

grags/ /yi ge brgyad kyi sa bon ni/ /phyogs brgyad du ni dgod par bya/ /shar du lha mo sgrol ma ste/ /byang gi phyogs su gos dkar mo/ /nub kyi phyogs su mA ma kI/ /lho'i phyogs su sangs rgyas spyan/ /mdog bzang dbyangs snyan

mdzes pa dang / /bzhi pa rdo rje phreng ba mo/ /dbus su nam mkha'i rang bzhin la/ /gzugs kun rdzogs shing shin tu mdzes/ /pad+ma rgyas la yang dag 'byung / /gzugs med gnas kyi phyogs su ni/ /shes rab bdud
rtsi bum pa 'dra/ /shes rab bdud rtsi gnas dag la/ /de yi dbus kyi stan dag la/ /shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo/ /gzugs mdzes yon tan rnams kyi gnas/ /steng gi pad+ma rdo rje rnams/ /snga ma bzhin
du bsam par bya/ /dbus kyi ye shes dbyug pa ste/ /thams cad spro dang sdud pa po'o/ /A li kA li'i rab sbyor gyis/ /phyogs brgyad du ni bskyod par bya/ /A li kA li'i rab sbyor bas/ /'khor ba thams
cad gcod pa ste/ /rdo rje dril bu'i thabs yin te/ /thabs kyis rdo rje'i dbus gnas so/ /g.yas par nyi ma bsams nas su/ /g.yon pa ru ni zla ba dgod/ /lag pa gnyis ni brkyang nas su/ /pad+ma'i rnam

pa lag du bskor/ /lus rnams la ni thabs dang sbyar/ /rang 'dod lha rnams bsam par bya/ /rdo rje gsor bas sgrol ba ste/ /'khor ba sgrol ba yang dag byung / /hU~M zhes bya ba'i glu yis ni/ /sangs rgyas thams
cad rjes chags bya/ /rdo rje gsor bas mdzes pa yis/ /sems can thams cad mdzes par bya/ /rnam thar chos su bya ba ste/ /rdo rje shin tu snying po mchog /oM badzra gaN+Te ho hU~M/

oM badzra d+har+m+mA ra Ni ta pra ra Ni ta~M sar+b+ba bud+d+ha bra tsA li ta pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nA dA swa b+hA be badzra d+har hri da ya a ba san+to Sha Ni/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ho ho ho/ a a a swA hA/ shes rab thabs kyi gzugs brnyan gyis/ /shes rab thabs kyis

dkrol bar bya/ /shes rab thabs kyi chos kyis ni/ /'gro ba rnams kyis rtags bya 'am/ /mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi/ /sems can don phyir dkrol bar bya/ /rdo rje de kho na yis bzung / /chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /sems can don byed rnal

'byor pas/ /shes rab thabs su lta bar bya/ /de nyid med pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /glang chen dril bu'i sgra dang mtshungs/ rnal 'byor de nyid dman pa yi/ /dngos grub ring bar shes par bya/ /de nas gsang dang phra ba yi/ /rdo rje'i mtshan nyid gzung

ba ste/ /yang dag cho ga gang gis ni/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub sgrub byed pa/ /dbu ma'i tshig ni bskor ba la/ /gsang ba'i rdo rje cha gsum bya/ /de nyid kyi ni cha gcig gis/ /phra ba'i rdo rje rab tu brtag /spyi gtsug lag pa la sogs pa/ /rtag

tu dag byed khu tshur bcang / /slob dpon rdo rje brtul zhugs 'dzin/ /'dod don thams cad sgrub pa'i mchog /bgrang phreng la sogs gzung ba ni/ /yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /yang dag cho ga gang gis ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir

ni the tshom med/ /shel dang nya phyis mu tig dang / /gzhan yang nor bu dkar po sogs/ /zhi sogs las la khyab par gyi/ /bgrang phreng gi ni khyad nyid ni/ /gser dang dngul dang zangs ma dang / /pad ma sa bon khyad par du/ /rgyas pa yi ni

bgrang phreng ste/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis bgrang bar bya/ /gur gum la sogs dri zhim pa'i/ /dri rnams kun gyi khyad par las/ /ril bur byas te dmar por btsos/ /dbang du sdud par rab tu grags/ /ru drAk+Sha dang lung tang dang / /mi yi

rus pa de bzhin te/ /drag po'i las la sbyar bar bya/ /mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang drag la/ /po ti tse ni las kun byed/ /sngags sgrub pa la lnga bcu ste/ /dbang la de yi phyed du bya/ /zhi la brgya phrag

gcig yin te/ /rgyas pa la ni brgyad lhag pa'o/ /mngon spyod la ni drug bcu'o/ /las kyi bye brag gis ni sbyar/ /las kyi bye brag ji bzhin du/ /bgrang phreng dag ni brtag par bya/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams brgyad dang ni/ /dbu ma nyid

dang sangs rgyas dgu/ /lha dgu yi ni skud pa la/ /lha dgus byin gyis brlab par bya/ /gzugs rdzogs shin tu mdzes pa dang / /gtsang zhing dad ldan snyan par smra/ /de yis bkal ba'i bgrang phreng gis/ /grol ba'i dngos grub skye

bar 'gyur/ /skud pa rnams ni sangs rgyas tshul/ /ril bu rnams ni dgra bcom yin/ /'og ma mchod rten du ni bstan/ /steng ma chos kyi dbyings yin no/ /mchod rten chos kyi dbang po'o/ /lag par nyi ma bsams nas su/ /dbyangs kyi dang

po yi ge ni/ /lag pa yi ni dbus dag tu/ /dmar po la ni dmar po bsgom/ /g.yon pa zla ba'i dbus su ni/ /bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsam bya ba/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya/ /g.yas pa'i sor mo rdo rjer

sam/ /g.yon pa pad ma'i 'dab mar bsgom/ /rdo rje pad ma sbyor ba yis/ /kha sbyor dbus su phreng bzhag la/ /de nyid thams cad bsgoms pa yis/ /bgrang phreng byin gyis brlab par bya/ /sor mo dag gi bye brag gis/ /de nas sngags

pas bzlas pa bya/ /rdo rje ma dngos g.yon pa ste/ /g.yas pa rdo rje'i ngo bo'o/ /dkar po dud pa dung dang ni/ /pad ma g.yas kyi sor mo ste/ /gi wang dri gsum 'jigs pa dang / /sa gdugs g.yon par dgod pa dang / /ye shes rnam shes

mthe bong gnyis/ /lag la sogs pa'i las can ma/ /zhi ba la ni khro bos bgrang / /rgyas pa la ni gung mo ste/ /srin lag la ni dbang du bstan/ /tha mas mngon par spyod pa ste/ /mthe bong rdo rje lcags kyu ni/ /lha nyid dgug pa'i

bsam pa yin/ /mnyam par gzhag ste bzlas bsgoms na/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /de nyid med pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /de nyid med pa'i sngags bzlas dang / /de nyid med pa'i rdo rje dril/ /phyag rgya de nyid med 'byung ba/ /

rnal 'byor pa yis grub pa med/ /rnal 'byor de nyid dmigs na ni/ /de nyid thams cad kun bya'o/ /yi ge'i rgyu las byung ba'i dngos/ /sngags kyi snying po mdzes pa ste/ /rang bzhin med pa'i grangs bzlas na/ /rnal 'byor ma

yi snying po 'grub/ /bram ze rgyal rigs dmang rigs gcig /rnal 'byor ma yi dra ba 'grub/ /oM pa de pa de ma hA pa de dz+nyA na sarba bud+ha ma hA b+hA be/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ho ho ho/ AHswA hA/ sngags 'di yis ni sbyang byas na/ /bgrang phreng

gi ni lha rnams 'grub/ /las rnams thams cad 'grub 'gyur te/ /mi gsal ba ni ring bar 'gyur/ /ye shes de dag bye brag dag /yang dag rdo rje chen pos nyon/ /ye shes bye brag ring du gnas/ /thun mong ye shes

brjod pa ste/ /dman dang rab dman dman pa can/ /gnod sbyin lha min grub pa po/ /klu dang byol song gsang ba pa/ /lto 'phye dang ni mi 'am ci/ /mi dang yi dgas mkha' 'gro ma/ /dmyal bar 'tshed pa'i sems can

dang / /byol song gzugs su brjod pa ste/ /phra mo sgo nga gzung mi nus/ /chu dang me dang rlung dang ni/ /de bzhin du ni sa yi khams/ /brtan pa de nyid thams cad dang / /rtsa dang 'dab ma phra ba dang / /bong ba rdo dang brag la sogs/ /

thams cad ye shes byin gyis brlabs/ /ye shes med na skye mi 'gyur/ /ye shes thams cad kun rig pa'o/ /ye shes thar par gang gis ni/ /ye shes thun mong byin brlabs pa/ /bye brag gzhan ni ji lta bu/ /lha las
rol mo nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nyi shu rtsa gsum lha yi gnas/ /gong nas gong du gnyis 'gyur te/ /'dod pa lnga yi ye shes dag /gong ma'i ye shes ye shes 'phel/ /
gsang ba'i ye shes reg pa ste/ /lha min ye shes khro bo'o/ /yi dgas ye shes zhen pa ste/ /dmyal ba'i ye shes 'jigs shing ngu / /byol song ye shes glen pa ste/ /brtan pa rnams ni sems med pa'o/ /mi

rnams ye shes rnam pa lnga/ /bye brag du ni shes par bya/ /glen pas sgribs dang lkugs pa dang / /bud med ye shes slu brid do/ /byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can/ /ye shes de nyid bye brag dag /rnal 'byor bstan bcos

kyis sbyangs pa/ /skye ba bye ba stong phrag du/ /sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bskul yin/ /rnal 'byor bstan bcos rjes 'brangs nas/ /'bad de dad pa bskyed par bya/ /sgra sgrogs phyi rol bstan bcos ni/ /gar gyi gnas

dang mtshungs pa ste/ /blo ldan rnal 'byor bstan bcos kyis/ /spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras bu thob/ /snying po snying po bstan bcos te/ /rnal 'byor gsang ba'i rim yin no/ /sbyor ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim
par phye ba dang po'o// // 'khor los sgrub pa'i khyad par dag /de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang rnams dang / /bsrung dang mngon par spyod pa dang / /re mig dgu sogs
'khor lo ni/ /phyi rol mu khyud bskor bar bya/ /'khor lo las kyi kha dog gis/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /oM tA re tut+t+wa re tu re swA hA/ sa bon de dag thams cad ni/ /phyag
'tshal tha ma dbus su bya/ /dbus su ming dang bsrung ba yis/ /tshig kyang de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /mnyam nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin chus/ /bdag gi las ni bkru bar bya/ /mnyam
nyid thams cad rig pas gnas/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor los bsrung bar bya/ /ye shes can gyis bsrung bsgoms na/ /'jigs pa kun las ring bar 'gyur/ /sems can dngos po med pa ru/ /sbyor ba'i dngos pos

'jigs pa la/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /pad ma'i gdan ni bsam par bya/ /sgrol ma'i rgyud du bsgoms pa yis/ /bdag gi las ni rnam par sprul/ /oM tA re swA hA/ mgo la'o/ /oM tut+t+wa re swA hA/ mig la'o/ /oM tu re swA hA/ sna la'o/ /

oM tu swA hA/ rna ba la'o/ /oM re swA hA/ lce la'o/ /oM tA re ni swA hA/ snying gar ro/ /yan lag drug du rtag tu dgod/ /'phags ma sgrol ma bsam bya ba/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung bcas/ /rgyan rnams

thams cad kyis ni klubs/ /kun tu mi 'jigs sbyin pa dang / /gzhan gyi rna drung ut+pal bsnams/ /thams cad 'od zer rnam bsgoms nas/ /khyad par du ni sngags bzlas bya/ /thams cad yon tan can du bsgom/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/

bsrung ba'i las thams cad kyi sngags so/ /rgyal po'i btson ra dgra phyogs dang / /nyam nga'i lam du 'gro ba dang / /yan lag sna tshogs rim dang ni/ /chu dang dug gis 'chi la sogs/ /gang dang gang du 'jigs pa'i gnas/ /de dang der ni bsam

par bya/ /shes rab zhan dang le lo sogs/ /'khor lo bris nas bcang bar bya/ /bsrung ba bzang po 'di yis ni/ /'jigs pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /bsrung ba 'di dag thams cad ni/ /de nyid sbyor bas bsgrub par bya/ /'khor lo

'dab ma brgyad pa la/ /phyi rol mu khyud bskor nas su/ /dbus su thog ma tha ma ste/ /bzlas pa thams cad gzhag par bya/ /mu khyud dbyangs kyi bskor nas su/ /'khor lo dkar po bsam par bya/ /yan lag thams cad phye ba yis/ /

mnyam nyid stong par bsams nas su/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid ldan pa yis/ /sngar bstan bzhin du sbyar bar bya/ /'khor lo 'di ltar bsgom pa yis/ /las 'dis shes rab 'bar bar 'gyur/ /oM pradz+nye pradz+nye ma hA pradz+nye hU~M swA hA/
'od zer sna tshogs 'bar bas su/ /dngos po bsgom pas bsgom par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /shes rab bdag nyid bsgoms nas su/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil dkrung bcas/ /rgyan rnams kun

gyis rnam par klubs/ /kha dog dkar po shin tu 'bar/ /shes rab dngos po bsgoms nas su/ /sa bon 'di ni bzlas byas nas/ /shes rab myur du 'phel bar 'gyur/ /glen dang snyoms las blun po yang / /sbyor ba 'di yis

shes rab 'phel/ /snying po re'u mig dgu ru bya/ /de bzhin bar ma bcu gnyis te/ /phyi rol re'u mig bcu drug go/ /mthar thug mu khyud de bzhin te/ /phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mthar sbyar ba'i/ /dbus su bdag gi sems gzhag la/ /

sgra dang thig le ldan pa yis/ /yi ge brgyad po snying por dgod/ /bcu gnyis po la dbyangs sa bon/ /ma ning spangs pa bri bar bya/ /sde tshan gsum gyi yi ge rnams/ /yi ge lhag ma gcig dang bcas/ /sgra dang thig ler ldan pa dag /bcu

drug gnas su bzhag par bya/ /gsod pa'i yi ge mu khyud la/ /thams cad rig pas kun tu bskor/ /dang po dkar por bsam bya ste/ /gnyis pa ser por bsgom par bya/ /gsum pa dag ni dmar po ste/ /de bzhin bzhi pa sngon po'o/ /sngon

bzhin mtshan nyid ldan pa yis/ /mnyam nyid stong par yang dag gnas/ /mnyam nyid lta ba skyed nas su/ /'khor lo 'di ni bsgom par bya/ /mnyam gzhag dngos po bsgoms pa yis/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /kun nas

thams cad 'bar ba ste/ /me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od kyis ni/ /bdud rnams thams cad bsreg par byed/ /ye shes 'khor lo bsgoms pa yis/ /kun nas nyon mongs g.yogs pa yang / /sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /mnyam nyid

ye shes bskyed nas su/ /bdag nyid nam mkha' bsgom byas la/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yis/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus su sa bon ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni gzung bya ste/ /sde tshan dang po gang yin pa'i/ /

yi ge dang po bzung nas su/ /lcags kyu yis ni gzir bya ba/ /rtsa bar re pha sbyar bya ba/ /bdud rtsi'i thig le steng du dgod/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba ni/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa

bsgom/ /rgyal po rgyal po'i pho brang dang / /yid can gyis ni bsam par bya/ /yi ge nyis 'gyur thigs pa dang / /rtsa bar sgra ni sbyar bar bya/ /bdud rtsi'i mtha' zhes bya ba ste/ /'bum phrag gcig gis dbang du sdud/ /bu mo rnams

kyis gang bsams pa/ /ming dang bcas nas bsgrubs nas ni/ /bsam pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /ngas bstan pa la the tshom med/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid thams cad ni/ /sngar bzhin du ni stong pa nyid/ /thams cad bdag

nyid bsams nas su/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /bdud rtsi kun rig phyi mor bcas/ /'od zer sna tshogs rnam par 'phro/ /'od zer ser po shin du mdzes/ /gzugs sdug 'od zer 'phro bar bsam/ /rin chen la sogs

gang 'dod pa/ /thams cad rang gi dbugs kyi dgug /sgrub pa po'i lus la ni/ /de yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rlung gi sa bon gyis bskor ba'i/ /lcags kyu'i yi ge bsgom par bya/ /kha dog la sogs dmar bsams zhing / /

gzugs kyang kha dog dmar por bsgom/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro bsgom par bya/ /gzugs mdzes shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs/ /g.yon pa lcags kyu'i

tshul gyis ni/ /yid ni 'gugs pa bsgom par bya/ /lcags kyu'i yi ge bsgoms pa yis/ /mdzub mo lcags kyu bskyod par bya/ /yi ge nyis 'gyur thigs pa dang / /rtsa bar sgra ni sbyar bar bya/ /bdud rtsi'i mtha' zhes bya ba ste/ /
'bum phrag gcig gis dbang du 'grub/ /de ltar bsgom zhing bzlas nas su/ /sor mo yang ni bskyod byas na/ /bsgrub bya'i yid ni bskyod 'gyur bar/ /'bum phrag gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /'khor lo

'dab ma med pa la/ /mu khyud kyi ni bskor bar bya/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad kyis/ /mu khyud mkhas pas bskor bar bya/ /sde tshan lnga pa gang yin pa/ /yi ge gsum pa bzung nas su/ /i dang re pha sbyar
nas su/ /'bad pas dbus su bzhag nas kyang / /ye shes can gyi sa bon 'di/ /sgra yi bdun pa dang sbyar la/ /'dab ma rnams la'ang de nyid bya/ /'dab mar 'di nyid gzhag par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma yi grub
'dod pas/ /'od zer sna tshogs rab 'bar bas/ /gser gyi mdog du bsgom par bya/ /sngon bzhin mtshan nyid ldan pa ru/ /sngar bstan bzhin du mkhas pas bsgom/ /de 'og lha mo nor rgyun gyi/ /gzugs su bdag
nyid bskyed par bya/ /gzugs mdzes shin tu yongs su rdzogs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyi rnam par klubs/ /thams cad lag g.yas mi 'jigs sbyin/ /g.yon pa 'bras kyi snye ma bsnams/ /dbus su bstan
pa'i sa bon ni/ /phyag 'tshal bsreg pa'i mtha' sbyar te/ /de ltar bsgom zhing bzlas pa yis/ /rgyas pa'i sbyor ba 'grub par 'gyur/ /lha mo nor ldan rnal 'byor gyis/ /rgyas pa ru ni grags pa yin/ /
bdag nyid bye brag gzhan dag tu/ /rnam gzhag thams cad de bzhin no/ /bdag nyid sngon gyi mtshan nyid kyis/ /stong pa'i de nyid bsgoms nas su/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sa yi dkyil
'khor bsgom par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ye shes rnam shes dngos po bsgom/ /'dab ma brgyad pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /dbus su sa bon bsgoms nas su/ /
phyi rol 'khor lo'i mu khyud la/ /dbyangs kyi sa bon bskor bar bya/ /phyogs kyi 'dab mar bdud rtsi bzhi/ /gug skyed kun dang sbyar bar bya/ /mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi la yang / /sangs
rgyas lnga yis mngon par brgyan/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ni/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba can/ /rin chen bdun gyis mdzes pa ste/ /rang gi
lus la bsgom par bya/ /gang 'dod yid ni rtog bya'i phyir/ /de'i 'od zer sbyar bar bya/ /'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med pas/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ /
rmugs dang glen dang snyoms las dang / /shes rab zhan cing lta ngan rnams/ /rnal 'byor pa yi skad cig la/ /snyom las la sogs ring du spong / /mnyam gzhag cung zad bltas nas su/ /rdul phran

dkar po spro bar bya/ /phyogs bcur song ste khyab nas ni/ /thams cad rim pas kun snang bya/ /ye shes sems la bltas nas ni/ /rnal 'byor pha rol sems shes 'gyur/ /sems ni mnyam par bcings nas su/ /mnyam

gzhag 'khor lor lta bar bya/ /mnyam nyid ye shes mthong ba yis/ /'khor ba'i pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ye shes sa bon gyis sprul te/ /pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa yis/ /

kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung bcas/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa ste/ /phyag gnyis phyag rgya che bcings nas/ /snying ga'i phyogs su 'tshar bar mdzad/ /kha dog dkar po mdzes pa

yi/ /'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad gtso/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni rnam par spro/ /spro ba sna tshogs mi zad pas/ /sems can khams ni sgrol bar mdzad/ /shes rab rdo rjes 'gro sgrol ba/ /dbyangs yig dang po mchog sa bon/ /

mtha' ru tsheg drag sbyar bar bya/ /phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' dang ldan/ /sa bon 'di ni bsgoms nas su/ /mnyam gzhag dngos por bzlas nas ni/ /byang chub rim pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /sbyor ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las

rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o// // byin brlabs sbyor ba'i ngo bo dag /gang gis sems can rnams la bstan/ /byin brlabs rim pa ji lta bu/ /lha las gzigs mo nyan par 'tshal/ /sems can rmongs pa gso ba'i phyir/ /byin gyis

rlob pa'i chos bstan pa/ /yang dag 'khor ba sgrol ba yi/ /de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /snying gar zla ba bsams nas su/ /hU~M gi sa bon dbus su bsam/ /'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gsal/ /nyi ma'i dbus su gzhag
par bya/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams su/ /me yi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /gnas rnams thams cad 'bar ba yis/ /kun nas thams cad bsregs nas su/ /sngon bzhin mtshan nyid bstan pa yi/ /dang

po stong pa nyid du bya/ /me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni bsam par bya/ /dbyug pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon/ /gya gyu phyag na rdo rje ste/ /lus ni 'jam pa'i mchog yin no/ /mgo dang bum pa

byams pa ste/ /steng du 'bar ba'i ma yig ni/ /'khor ba thams cad sgrol ba po/ /'jig rten gsum gyi grub 'dod na/ /sa bon de ni bsgom par bya/ /pad ma'i stan la gnas pa yi/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom nas

su/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro'i rang bzhin du/ /bdag nyid ye shes kyis bsrung ba/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung bcas/ /kha dog dmar po shin tu mdzes/ /steng gi rdo rje cod pan la/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis

rnam par brgyan/ /kha T+wA~M ga dang rnal 'byor snod/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba ru/ /dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya/ /sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i/ /rdo rje dbyug pa
gug bskyed bcas/ /lu gu rgyud la sogs pas dkri/ /phyag 'tshal bsreg pa'i mtha' dang ldan/ /'bum phrag gsum ni bzlas nas su/ /gnyis med gtor ma'i las kyis ni/ /de yi 'og tu las rnams bya/ /bdud

rtsi lnga dang ldan pa la/ /brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya/ /cho gar ldan pas sbyin par bya/ /de yi mod la 'bab par 'gyur/ /'babs nas rnal 'byor pa yis ni/ /rdo rje'i glu ni blang bar bya/ /rol cig rol cig rdo rje khyod/ /

zhan dang drag po sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad kun nas khyod kyis gsol/ /skad cig 'khor las bdag mnyam bsgral/ /glu 'di yis ni gar byed de/ /rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /oM tiSh+Tha yo ge ma hA kro d+ha hU~M hU~M hU~M swA hA/
'di ni tshim bya thams cad bya/ /rnal 'byor ma kun bstan par bya/ /dman dang bar dang mchog rnams la/ /de yi 'og tu chos bstan bya/ /oM yo ga A be sha ya/ shin du mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas/ /

'di yis sngon du bsnyen par bya/ /gnyis med gtor ma ldan pa yis/ /rnal 'byor pa yis yungs kar dang / /hU~M gi sgra ni 'jigs pa yis/ /sgrub pa po yis 'dis gdab bya/ /sngar gyi smos pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /

bdag nyid ji ltar 'dod bzhin byed/ /oM ma na g+hu ru g+hu ru/ d+h+ri sti tsi li tsi li hU~M hU~M phaT/ rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas na/ /bltas pas 'bebs pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /mchod cing gang la bltas pa yi/ /mthong bar byas te gar

byed do/ /oM ma la ma li hU~M phaT/ 'bum phrag gsum gyis 'grub 'gyur te/ /'gro ba thams cad 'bebs par 'gyur/ /oM ma hA tsi li tsi li hU~M hU~M phru~M phaT/ 'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas pa yis/ /skyes sogs ring po nas kyang

'bebs/ /oM ba ta li ba ta li hU~M phaT/ rnal 'byor 'bum phrag gsum du ni/ /bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa bya/ /yi dgas 'byung po gsang ba sogs/ /lha rnams thams cad 'bebs par byed/ /oM pa ta na pa ta ni hU~M phaT/ rnal

'byor pa yis 'bum phrag gcig /bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa bya/ /chu dang bong ba rdo dang ni/ /shing rnams kun la 'bebs par byed/ /dkyil 'khor sngon du slob dpon gyis/ /sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas ni/ /shin tu dul zhing

brtags pa yis/ /de 'og dkyil 'khor de nyid bsam/ /lha ni mnyes par ma byas na/ /bdag nyid la ni co 'dri yin/ /oM be ta li rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M hU~M hU~M g+h+ra~M phuHphaT/ thal bar lan bdun bar du ni/ /mngon par bzlas te ro la gtor/ /

nyin zhag bdun du bzhag na yang / /cis kyang za bar mi 'gyur ro/ /oM phu ru phu ru/ maM tre dzaHhU~M phuHphaT/ skud pa dmar la brgyad brgya ru/ /yongs su bzlas dang ldan pa yi/ /gang gi mgrin par bcings gyur na/ /lce spyang bzhin

shin tu 'khyam par 'gyur/ /skud pa dang ni bral gyur na/ /bdag nyid 'dod pa bzhin du byed/ /byin brlabs rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom zhing bzlas/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsam bya/ /

rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ /'od zer sna tshogs shin tu 'bar/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /mngon du bsgrub pa bya bar bsam/ /rkang mthil gnyis su rlung gi ni/ /sa bon stan du bsgom par bya/ /sgra dang thig ler ldan pa ni/ /

rlung gi sa bon dbus gnas par/ /rlung gis bskor ba snying gar bzhag /thams cad kha dog sngon por bsam/ /rang gi dbugs kyi rtse mo yi/ /rlung gi brda ru sbyar bar bya/ /oM yu~M pre ta bA yu a mo ka s+ya yu~M phaT/ rnal 'byor pa yi gsang sngags 'di/ /

brgyad brgyar bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur/ /'gro ba la sogs bzung nas su/ /dug dang khrag gis bri bar bya/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni bzung nas su/ /thams cad gnas nas bri bar bya/ /brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas pa yis/ /skud pa dmar pos

dkris nas ni/ /shing gi rtse mor gdags par bya/ /rlung gis spur bar bsgom pa ste/ /gang du rlung ni gzhol 'gyur ba/ /de yi phyogs su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bskrad pa ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /

zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsams te/ /bdag gi lus ni bsgoms nas su/ /blo dang ldan pas sngags bzlas na/ /gnyis med gang ba'i gtor ma ni/ /de yi dbus su sbyar bar bya/ /oM badzra DA

ki nI de sha mA kaR+Sha ya oM hrIHhU~M pheM phrung phuHphaT/ maN+Dal dmar por byugs nas ni/ /seng ldeng phur bu brgyad kyis gdab/ /dbus su ming ni bris nas su/ /gtor ma yongs su gang bar ldan/ /skud pa dmar la bzlas nas kyang / /lan

bdun bskor bas drang bar bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyus drangs nas su/ /gsang sngags 'dis ni bzlas byas na/ /dpag tshad brgya yi phyi rol nas/ /las 'dis bzlogs nas 'gugs par 'gyur/ /maN+Dal gyi ni dbus dag tu/ /las
'dis 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /mkha' 'gro drag mor bsam bya ba/ /rang gi lus ni rnal 'byor mar/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms nas su/ /nya mo gcig ni bzung nas su/ /

mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin gyis brlab/ /sngags dang bcas pa'i ming bris la/ /nya yi kha ru bcug nas ni/ /rkang pas mgo ni rab mnan la/ /brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya/ /oM phru~M phru~M/ a mu ka s+ya mu kha~M ban d+ha ban d+ha/ hrI hrI hrI/ pu~M

phaT/ de ni bzlas pa tsam gyis ni/ /bya ba thams cad bcing bar 'gyur/ /thams cad chu la bya ba ste/ /las gzhan cho ga bshad par bya/ /sngags 'di rab tu sbyar nas ni/ /bag zan gyis ni dril bar bya/ /gang du nya ni gnas pa yi/ /nya yi

kha ru gzhug par bya/ /mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin brlabs te/ /ril bu brgyad brgya byas nas ni/ /lan re bzlas te zar bcug na/ /bya ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /bdag nyid tsaN+Da li yi
gzugs/ /gzugs rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing / /me ltar 'bar ba bsams nas su/ /gnyis med gtor ma'i las rnams ni/ /de yi dbus su rab tu bya/ /lci bas pad+ma'i gzugs byas pa/ /ming dang sngags kyis

gzhag par bya/ /oM stam b+ha ya stam b+ha ya hU~M/ b+ha gra~M gA~M mu trA~M phru phru~M phaT/ gsang sngags 'di dang ming dag ni/ /rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas su/ /lan grangs brgyad brgyar bzlas nas su/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /chung ma

shin tu g.yon can rnams/ /las 'di yis ni gdul bar bya/ /mthar ni chu dang 'o ma yis/ /bkrus na bcings pa las grol 'gyur/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /lha mo rdo rje ma ru bsgom/ /kha dog sngon po shin tu
mdzes/ /'od zer me dang mtshungs par 'bar/ /yongs su rdzogs shing mdzes par ldan/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa ste/ /yi dgas kyi ni gdan la bzhugs/ /ha har bzhad pas 'jigs su rung / /gnyis med gang

ba'i gtor ma yi/ /las ni de ru byas nas kyang / /'bras phye la sogs khyad par las/ /pad ma'i dbyibs ni byas nas su/ /khyi yi spu yis dgang bar bya/ /ming dang sngags su sbyar nas su/ /gnyis med gtor ma'i las rnams

ni/ /las der byin gyis brlab par bya/ /oM kro d+he shwa ri phu phru~M phaT/ brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas nas su/ /rdo rje gsang bar gzhug par bya/ /las 'di sbyar zhing gzir ba yis/ /b+ha ga dag ni bzlog par 'gyur/ /las 'dis shin tu 'grub

pa ste/ /phyung na de las thar bar 'gyur/ /chung ma shin tu gdul dka' la/ /las ni de ltar sbyar bar bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /lte bar bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsgom/ /rtsa rnams kun las drangs nas su/ /bdud

rtsi'i chu ni 'dzag par bya/ ban du'i me tog rgyas pa yi/ /dbus su lcags kyu'i yi ge ste/ /kha dog dmar po shin tu 'bar/ /gsang zhing gsang pas bsgom par bya/ /khro bo'i sor mo rtse mo ru/ /bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsams nas ni/ /

sor mo 'di yis bskyod par bya/ /sbyor ba gsum ni bsams pa yis/ /de yi dbus kyi gnas rnams su/ /bdud rtsi'i chu ni 'dzag par bya/ /chung ma shin tu gdul dka' la/ /'di yis b+ha ga brtag par bya/ /'od zer can dang bla mar

bya/ /smyo byed yan lag lnga dang bcas/ /gu gul chen po'i cha dang bsre/ /mar nag chen pos bskor bar bya/ /sngags pas bdud rtsi'i chu dang ni/ /lce yi dbang pos myang bar bya/ /'dir ni smyo 'gyur the tshom med/ /mar zos pas

ni grol bar 'gyur/ /yi dgas gos ni ma lhung bas/ /mar me yi ni sdung bu bya/ /klu dbang gi ni gong du gzung / /rkang gi mar gyis sbar bar bya/ /gtor ma yi ni gnas dag tu/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi snying sngags kyis/ /du ba

dag ni dbab par bya/ /dur khrod du ni gtor byin la/ /brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas nas su/ /lam gyi bzhi mdor shing gcig drung / /gang la du ba byugs pa des/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun mthong bar 'gyur/ /lhag ma'i snod ni gnyis

gzung la/ /dur khrod kyi ni sol ba yis/ /tsha ba'i rdzas la sbyar nas ni/ /bya rog sgro rtsas bri bar bya/ /oM ki ri ki ri kro d+he a mu ska~M phruHphru~M phaT/ snod ni gnyis la so so ru/ /gzugs gnyis ming dang bcas

bris la/ /gnyis med gtor ma byin nas ni/ /khro bos bkang ste drud par bya/ /oM ka li bar ta li bar ta li kro d+ha mu khe a mu ka s+ya hi li hi li badzra tiSh+Tha mu khi phru~M phroM phroM phaT/ brgya phrag gcig tu bzlas nas ni/ /myur tu 'thab

rtsod 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gnyis med gtor mar ldan pa yi/ /dbang bskur na ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /sbyor ba'i gdan gyi rab tu dbye ba las rim par phye ba gsum pa'o// // gnyis med sbyor ba'i snying po ste/ /gnyis med

ming gis brjod pa yin/ /sbyor ba ji ltar brtsam bgyi ba/ /rol mo dag ni nyan par 'tshal/ /gnyis med sbyor ba de nyid kyi/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag /so sor gzung ba'i de kho na/ /yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /

de nyid ji bzhin bdag nyid dang / /chos kyi dril bu lha mo'o/ /kha sbyor sbyor ba phyag rgya ste/ /thabs ni de ru thim pa'o/ /dang por re shig rnal 'byor pas/ /rdo rje thal mo dam bcings nas/ /sems can kun la rjes brtse

bas/ /dag pa rnam gsum brjod par bya/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud d+haHsarba d+harma swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM badzra shud d+haH sarba d+harmA badzra shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM yo ga shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol bas/ /sbyin

pa'i ra bas sbyin par bya/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /thams cad rtsa bzhin blta bar bya/ /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /'gro rnams brtse bar mi bya sogs/ /sems can don ni dgag mi bya/ /steng du tshul

khrims dra ba'o/ /gzhan la gnod pa 'gog la sogs/ /bzod ma 'phur bu 'og tu gdab/ /phur bu ra ba dra ba yis/ /sdang ba'i bdud dang dgra rnams bskrad/ /bdud ni bdud du 'char mi 'gyur/ /rang gi sems kyis bsdams

pa'o/ /rang gis rang sems btul ba na/ /bdud kyis 'tshe bar ga la 'gyur/ /mnyam nyid sems kyi dri yis ni/ /gru bzhi pa ru byug par bya/ /lus la ste 'jog tsan dan 'jug /sems ni mnyam par gzhag pa ste/ /bzod pa'i me tog

rnal 'byor pas/ /'bad dang ldan pas dgram par bya/ /mnyam nyid bsgoms pa'i bdug pa yis/ /rang bzhin dag pas bdug par bya/ /shes rab mar me'i snang ba ste/ /khams gsum gyi ni mun pa rnams/ /mar me 'di yis bcom

nas su/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin snang bar bya/ /sems kyis mi 'jigs sbyin pa yis/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung bya/ /mchod pa'i dus dang khyad par du/ /gtor ma'i dus su rab tu sbyar/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/ /bde

ba'i stan la 'dug nas su/ /bdag nyid rdo rjer bskyed nas ni/ /shes rab dril bu zhes byar sprul/ /bar du khru gang bzhag nas su/ /mnyam nyid lta bas blta bar bya/ /snying gar hU~M ni bsgom byas la/ /thams cad rig pas kun stong

bya/ /khams gsum zad par byas nas ni/ /thams cad nam mkha' yang dag gnas/ /sngon bzhin mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/ /mnyam nyid stong par bsams nas su/ /pho brang yangs par ci 'dod pa/ /ri rab rtse mor bsam par bya/ /

lha ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad ldan/ /rdo rje sngon du bstan pa bzhin/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /hU~M gi thig le las byung ba/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /mi g.yo rdo rje bsgoms nas su/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin du/ /bdag

gi lus ni sprul par bya/ /yi ge'i dgod pas bkod nas su/ /mkhas pas go cha byas nas hU~M/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan pa ste/ /gangs dang kun da zla ba'i mdog /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung bcas/ /rgyan rnams kun

gyis klubs pa ste/ /phyag rgya chen po snying por bcas/ /go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba la/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni rnam par 'phro/ /dngos po bsgom pa bsgom nas su/ /hU~M gi sgra yis dgang bar bya/ /

rang nyid ji ltar 'dod sems kyis/ /ye shes sa bon bzlas par bya/ /btso ma'i gser ltar shin tu 'bar/ /sems can kun gyi don la chags/ /de nas stong pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /sngar gyi mtshan nyid bdag nyid can/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor

dbus gnas par/ /sngar gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas/ /nyi shu rtsa gsum lha rnams kyis/ /dril bu'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba las/ /sangs rgyas 'od ni rnam par spro/ /de ltar bskyed pa'i lus rnams ni/ /

shes rab pha rol phyin mas bskyed/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung bcas/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs/ /kha dog cung zad 'dres pa'i sku/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par brgyan/ /yi ge brgyad kyi sngags rnams ni/ /

yan lag brgyad du dgod par bya/ /phyag gnyis phyag rgya chen po ste/ /go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /A li kA li las byung ba'i/ /de yi sa bon bzlas par bya/ /'dod chags sems kyi stobs kyis ni/ /btso ma gser gyi 'od dang

bcas/ /sems can bsgral phyir kun tu 'khyud/ /nu ma 'khyud cing zhal gnyis 'jib/ /rdo rje sor mo'i rtse mor ni/ /bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsams nas ni/ /lha mo'i g.yon gyi cha ru ni/ /bstan pa'i rtse mor gzung bar bya/ /bcu dang

brgyad kyi gnas rnams ni/ /kun nas bdud rtsi gang gnas pa/ /mdzub mo 'di yis bskyod pa yis/ /bdud rtsi'i chu ni 'dzag par 'gyur/ /gnyis kyi kun sprod btang nas su/ /shar gyi phyogs su blta zhing bskyod/ /rol pa'i

stabs kyis lha mo ni/ /rdo rje rkang pa'i stobs kyis mnan/ /dril bu g.yon gyi rlung gnon pa/ /nu ma lag pa gnyis kyis gzir/ /sgeg cing bzhad pa'i bzhin can te/ /'og ma gnon pos btsir bar bya/ /dril bu lag gnyis

gsang bar sbyor/ /de bzhin sa bon gnyis med bzlas/ /shar phyogs su ni bskyod pa yis/ /sems can pha rol sgrol ba yis/ /lha mo g.yon pa bskyod nas su/ /lho ru kha ni blta bar bya/ /rdo rje yang ni bskyod nas su/ /rkang

mthil gnyis ni de bzhin btsir/ /dril bu'i lag pa gnyis kyis ni/ /rked pa bsdams te btsir bar bya/ /rdo rje g.yas kyi nu ma dang / /de bzhin gsang bar rtse bar bya/ /rdo rje dril bu'i lus dag ni/ /yang dang yang du sprad par bya/ /sa bon gnyis ni

bzlas pa yis/ /lho phyogs sems can sgrol bar 'gyur/ /nub phyogs snying po'i rkang stabs kyis/ /lha mo nub tu blta bar bya/ /rdo rje yi ni phyogs gcig gis/ /g.yas kyi brla ni mnan par bya/ /'grin pa'i rgyab nas gnyis 'khyud de/ /dril

bu'i lce ni bskyod nas su/ /rdo rje lce la reg par bya/ /de bzhin sbyar nas gnyi ga bzlas/ /rdo rje mnyam pa'i dbus su ni/ /lag pa gnyis kyis bsdam pa'o/ /dril bu'i lag pa gnyis kyis kyang / /rna ba'i drung bar gzugs par bya/ /gnyis

ka'i mchu ni kun sbyar nas/ /de yi bdud rtsi btung bar bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yis sngags bzlas nas/ /rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /sems can thams cad bde gyur cig /kun kyang 'tshe ba med par shog /gang gi lam nas 'gro ba

yis/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub gyur cig /skad cig tshul gyis rnal 'byor dang / /skad cig tshul gyis phyag rgya can/ /kun nas kun tu skad cig ste/ /skad cig gis ni gsang sngags 'don/ /dril bu lha ru sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas

pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /yi ge brgyad kyi sngags dag ni/ /gnas rnams kun gyi lha nyid de/ /rang nyid lha mor bsam par bya/ /slar yang 'di nyid rab tu bya/ /rang gi rjes su chags pa'i sems/ /de nas rdo rje kun tu 'khyud/ /de nas

bdag nyid rdo rje ru/ /ka ra nar bcas bsam par bya/ /rdo rje yi ni nga rgyal gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag ces brjod/ /chu las byung ba'i me tog ni/ /gsang ba'i nang gi mtshan nyid las/ /rtsa ba myu gu me tog ste/ /ban du ka ni

rgyas pa 'dra/ /thong ka gnyis kyi sa bon rnams/ /sa dang rlung dag nyid yin no/ /'og tu chu yi rang bzhin la/ /myu gu me yi sa bon no/ /sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i/ /yi ge gsum pa bzung nas su/ /dbyug pa
phyi mo rdo rje can/ /lcags kyu la sogs pa yi dkri/ /lha mo'i gzugs su bsams nas su/ /sa yi nang du thim par bya/ /dus me'i yi dgas mer sbyor cing / /yi dgas me dang dus me sbyor/ /lag pa gnyis

kyis kha sbyar ba/ /mtheb chung mthe bos mnan nas su/ /gsum po dag ni rtse mor sbyor/ /phyag rgya gnyis kyis mgor btsugs nas/ /bdud rtsi bza' ba'i bsam pa yis/ /gnon pos 'og ma btsir bar bya/ /bcu dang

brgyad kyi lam dag nas/ /dril bu'i bdud rtsi bskul bar bya/ /g.yon gyi cha na ban du ka /chu 'dzag pa yi cha byad can/ /chu 'dzag bya mchu'i dbyibs lta bu/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi tshul dag la/ /der ni phyag rgyas

bskul bar bya/ /rdo rje g.yas kyi chu dag ni/ /rang bzhin mnyam pa'i tshul du bya/ /thong ga la sogs gnas kun tu/ /de nas sor mo gdab par bya/ /de nas rdo rje'i rtse mo ni/ /phyag rgya glo ru sbyar nas bya/ /gnyis ka kun tu

sbyar nas ni/ /rdo rje pad mo bsgul bar bya/ /hU~M gi sgra yis bkang nas su/ /lha mo thams cad tshim par bya/ /dril bu yi ni dngos po yis/ /A li sa bon kun tu sbyin/ /ye shes sa bon rdo rje rtse/ /bdag gi lha ni mnyes par

bya/ /rdo rje dril bu lus yin te/ /phyag rgya kha sbyor sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang / /de kho na yis so sor gzung / /rdo rje de kho nas bskyod la/ /dril bu rang dgar dkrol bar bya/ /rdo rje dril bu rab sbyor te/ /

phyag rgya'i de nyid sbyor ba yin/ /lus ni gnyis ka mnyes pa yis/ /sems can pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur/ /gnyi ga yi ni bdag nyid sems/ /chu de byin gyis brlab par bya/ /sgeg cing bsgyod par gnas pa ste/ /bde

ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /rdo rje rol pa'i rkang pa ste/ /dril bu g.yon gyi brla yis rol/ /lag g.yon 'khyud cing nu ma gzung / /g.yas kyi rdo rje gsor bar bya/ /bzhad cing khro dang sgeg pa yis/ /yang dang yang du spro
bar bya/ /dril bu bskyod pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /brla yi stan la 'dug nas su/ /rkang pa g.yas pas dkris nas ni/ /dku yi gnas su gzhag par bya/ /mgrin par gcig gis 'khyud nas ni/ /g.yon pas dril bu gsil

bar bya/ /ngo tshar bcas bzhad sgeg pa yis/ /yang dang yang du sprad par bya/ /de nas rdo rje glu blang zhing / /sna tshogs hU~M zhes bya bar 'dod/ /bdud rtsi'i chu ni bzung nas su/ /slar yang glu ni blang bar bya/ /'khor lo stong pa

snying po med pa ni/ /snying po dag ni shin tu bsags pa ste/ /rnam par thar pas rab tu bsgral ba ste/ /dngos las rnam par grol ba rab tu 'grub/ /phan tshun kun tu 'khyud pa'i sbyor byas pa/ /de yis don ni yang dag

byed par 'gyur/ /'khor ba'i snying po dag ni med pa la/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dbus su snying po bsgrub/ /rdo rje dril bu'i sgrar bcas pas/ /de nas de ltar glu blang bya/ /mnyam bzhag sgom zhing bzlas pa yis/ /'grub

'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /las ni gang zhig bsams pa rnams/ /de yis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /sman la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams/ /bskyod pa'i sbyor bar ldan par bya/ /gur kum dang ni gi wang dang / /

ka ra sbrang rtsi pa la sha /yung ba ru rta cha mnyam pa/ /sbyor ba'i gnas su gzung bar bya/ /rdzas de dag ni bsgoms nas su/ /rtag tu thig le byas gyur na/ /rgyal po blon po pho brang bcas/ /thams cad du ni dga' bar

'gyur/ /dbang po lag dang ru rta dang / /rmongs byed ma dang rengs byed ma/ /bdag gi lnga dang yan lag lnga/ /lnga po thams cad cha mnyams la/ /bza' dang btung dang so rtsi dang / /zhib tu btags te sbyar la sbyin/ /
thams cad du ni dbang 'gyur te/ /'chi ba na yang stong mi 'gyur/ /khrag ni gtor ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /dbang la sogs pa'i las rnams 'grub/ /sngags ni 'bum du bzlas pa yis/ /'gro ba thams cad rmongs
par 'gyur/ /bdag gi lus la gshegs gsol ba/ /bdag nyid ji ltar dga' bar bya/ /sems can don phyir blo ldan pas/ /thams cad dbang du 'du bar 'gyur/ /brtul zhugs bram ze'i nye du mos/ /zhi ba'i

las ni skye bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po bla ma gsang ba mos/ /rgyas pa'i las ni sbyar bar bya/ /rje rigs dmangs mo thams cad kyis/ /dbang gi las ni bsgrub par bya/ /lham mkhan shan pa nya pa mos/ /mngon spyod du ni rab tu

grags/ /kla klo gdol pa tshon mkhan mas/ /sbyor ba'i dngos grub bshad pa yin/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /rnal 'byor bstan bcos gzung bar bya/ /gzhan yang rkang stabs bcing bar bya/ /sems can bsgral

ba'i gnas yin te/ /gnyis ni kun tu 'dus nas bskyod/ /de nyid phyag rgya zhes bya bcing / /mnyam pa'i rkang stabs dang / dbye ba'i stabs dang / zlum po'i stabs dang / gsum gnon po'i stabs dang / rus sbal gyi stabs

dang / g.yas brkyang dang / g.yon brkyang dang / gnas gcig pa dang / 'dug pa dang / bung ba'i tshogs dang / rgya mtsho rlob pa dang / ri bo dpung pa dang / rkang pa'i 'phen pa dang / mchod sdong gi tshul dang / pus mo btsir ba

dang / bsdu ba'i tshul dang / mnyam du gnas pa dang / dus kyi me dang snying po dang / dga' bas gnas pa dang / gcig tu bsdu ba'o/ /rkang stabs bskyod pa bcwa brgyad ni/ /mchod pa'i dus su sbyar bar bya/ /yon tan thams cad

'byung ba'i gnas/ /rnal 'byor pa yis mtshon par bya/ /snying gar btsir ba dang / rkang pa sbyar ba dang / phreng ba'i tshul dang / nu ma'i tshul dang / gnyi ga sbyar te bza' ba dang / phyed kyis 'khyud pa dang / lag pa gnyis sbyar

ba dang / gsang bar reg pa dang / lus bsnye ba dang / kos ko la reg pa'o/ /lag pa'i thabs nyid bcu dang ni/ /zhal ni bzhad cing sgeg pa dang / /mtshan nyid sna tshogs ldan pa yis/ /de yis las rnams 'grub par bya/ /rdo rje

dril bu'i phyag rgya dag /de kho na yis so sor bzung / /gsang ba'i rdo rje dang bral na/ /dril bus ji ltar 'bras bu 'grub/ /rdo rje'ang dril bu dang bral na/ /rdo rje sgrub pa'ang ring bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag /dmigs

na pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur/ /mtshan mo zla ba med pa dang / /nyin mo zla bas ci zhig nus/ /de bas rdo rje dril bu dag /mnyam pa de nyid gsal bar byed/ /A li kA li mnyam bsgoms nas/ /rnal 'byor chen po bsgrub pa
pos/ /A li rdo rje zhes byar brjod/ /kA li de bzhin gshegs ma yin/ /A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas/ /dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed/ /sems can don rnams ma lus pa/ /lha yi gzugs kyis bri bar bya/ /phyi

rol shes rab thabs rnams kyis/ /ji ltar 'khor ba sgrol bar 'gyur/ /rmongs pa phyi rol sems ldan pas/ /de yi dam tshig bstan pa yin/ /gsang ba'i gsang ba gsang ba che/ /rtag tu gab cing gsang ba yin/ /gang zhig

lung ni shes gyur pa/ /de yi rnal 'byor pa ru grags/ /shel ltar dag pa'i sems la ni/ /de yi chos ni bstan par bya/ /gal te sems ni the tshom na/ /skad cig gis ni dmyal bar ltung / /'dod la dga' ba ma yin cing / /

longs spyod phyir ni bsten mi bya/ /sems can don bya'i phyir du ni/ /rab tu 'bad pa'i de nyid dmigs/ /gal te 'dod dga'i rnal 'byor pa/ /thabs kyi mtshan nyid gcig yin te/ /rang dgar skad cig yang dag 'byung / /rdo rje

dril bu sbyor ba'o/ /skad cig tshul gyis bskyed nas ni/ /bdag gi rnal 'byor bdag ces brjod/ /gsang ba'i nang gi dbus gnas par/ /A li'i sa bon gzung bar bya/ /bdag nyid skad cig rnal 'byor ni/ /hU~M zhes bya ba

'bad de bzla/ /gang yang cung zad lus dang ngag /lha yi sbyor bar thim par bya/ /thal sbyor phyogs ni thams cad du/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma dbang gson/ /dgyes shing thugs ni tshim pa yis/ /'gro ba thar pa de ring

thob/ /e ma'o chos kyi mchog gi lam/ /e ma'o 'khor ba gcod pa po/ /e ma'o rnal 'byor grol ba'i gnas/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar rnal 'byor lam/ /tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med/ /smyung ba med par bstan pa

ste/ /'di ni bde ba'i sgrub par brjod/ /bde bas 'khor lo gcod par byed/ /las kyi 'khor lor cho ga rnams/ /sgrub pa po yi sna tshogs 'dod/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /drag mo'i gzugs su sprul par bya/ /de yi gzugs

su bsams nas ni/ /sngon bzhin de nyid sgom par bya/ /sngags pas sum 'bum bzlas nas su/ /phyi nas las ni bsgrub par bya/ /yi ge gnyis 'gyur thig le dang / /rtsa ba'i sgra ni sbyang bar bya/ /phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mthar bzhag pa/ /

rnal 'byor pa yis sum 'bum du/ /bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen nas ni/ /de nyid las rnams 'bad de sgrub/ /yi dgas gos la sogs bzung la/ /lha mo ser mo tshon rtsi bris/ /phyag gnyis rol pa'i rkang stabs can/ /dkar dang ser la

'bar ba'i lus/ /ha har bzhad cing gtsigs pa ste/ /skra ni lhug pas rnam par brgyan/ /yi dgas kyi ni stan la bzhugs/ /skyes bu'i lpags pa'i na bza' mnabs/ /don yod grub pa'i dbu rgyan can/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par

klubs/ /glang po'i lpags pa'i sham thabs can/ /kha T+wA~M mchog gis brgyan pa ste/ /g.yon pa chang gi thod pa bsnams/ /hU~M gi sgra yis 'jigs par mdzad/ /'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gsol/ /lha mo seng ge bsgom par

bya/ /sa yi dbus sogs sbyor bar bya/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid ldan pa yis/ /gnyis med gtor mas dgang bar bya/ /gal te 'byor na yi dgas mo/ /tha mal me 'bar dbus su ni/ /yam

shing thang shing las byas pa'am/ /zho can lnga yi shing las bya/ /mchod pa sna tshogs rgya chen dang / /sha chen la sogs bsreg par bya/ /sbrang rtsi khrag la spags pa dag /brgyad brgya ru ni sbyin srig bya/ /de ltar bsag pa

tsam gyis ni/ /des ni mtshan ma ston par 'gyur/ /oM smra~M phru~M phuHphaT/ sbyin sreg gi rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /thams cad sngar bstan bzhin du bya/ /dang po sa ni 'gul 'gyur te/ /gnyis pa la ni bri gzugs 'gul/ /

gsum pa la ni dri chen 'byung / /bzhi par seng ge sgra sgrogs te/ /lnga par bsgrub pa'i grogs por ni/ /seng ge'i tshul du babs nas su/ /drag po'i gzugs can rnam par gtsigs/ /'jigs pa'i sgra ni sgrog par byed/ /dam

tshig phyag rgya sogs phyin nas/ /gtor ma'i mchod pas mnyes par bya/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin gnas rnams dang / /bstan ni bdag gis mdzad du gsol/ /de nas lha mo'i dngos bstan nas/ /bdag gis bu yi ci zhig bsgrub/ /

'bad de dam tshig byin nas su/ /de la phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /dpa' bos de ltar byin nas su/ /da ltar bdag gi 'di mdzod cig /bdag nyid la ni lha mo 'grub/ /oM tiSh+Tha ma ma ku ru hU~M hU~M hU~M dza dza dza swA hA/ spyi bor lag pa

bzhag nas ni/ /gsang sngags 'dir ni brjod par bya/ /sha dang khrag dang sran chan bcas/ /gnyis med gtor ma de la sbyin/ /yi dgas bgrod par gnas nas su/ /rtag pa'i dus su byin gyis brlab/ /lha min klu mo

gnod sbyin mo/ /dri za ma 'am ci dang ni/ /yi dgas mi mo gang 'dod pa/ /bka' bzhin skad cig gis 'gugs na/ /phran tshegs mi mo smos ci dgos/ /bka' ni bsgo ba tsam gyis su/ /lha min klu'i gnas nas kyang / /

gang zhig don du gnyer ba rnams/ /myur du khrid nas 'ong bar 'gyur/ /gang yang dgra rnams gsang ba dang / /bka' bzhin du ni skrod par 'gyur/ /las rnams kun byed lha mo ste/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /stag mo

lce spyang 'ug pa mo/ /las de nyid kyis bsgrub bya sta/ /dngos grub de ltar shes byas la/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni/ /de bzhin nyid kyis so sor bzung / /rdo rje de nyid kyis sbyar zhing / /

dril bu chos kyi lha mo'o/ /phyag rgya gnyis su ldan pa yin/ /kun rig pas ni thams cad sgrub/ /sbyor ba'i gdan zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o// // rnal 'byor phyag rgya sogs mtshan pa'i/ /slob dpon dag ni

gzung bya ba/ /sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor sogs ldan/ /'khor ba las sgrol mnyam nyid kyi/ /ji bzhin lam gyis 'khor ba las/ /sgrol ba'i mtshan nyid rdo rje nyon/ /slob dpon yon tan ji 'dra zhing / /bla ma zhes bgyi ji ltar

lags/ /slob dpon ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi/ /bcom ldan ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ /thams cad byang chub mtshan nyid kyi/ /de nyid phyag na rdo rjes nyon/ /byang chub rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / /lus ni sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi/ /cha shas byang chub yan lag gnas/ /dbu rgyan rigs ni lnga nyid de/ /ba spu rnams ni dgra bcom mo/ /'jig rten pa ni zhabs kyi gdan/ /'od zer gnod sbyin gsang la sogs/ /de ltar yon tan ldan pa'i

skur/ /rnal 'byor can ni rtag tu blta/ /ye shes can ni shes bya ba/ /mtshan nyid gang yin bstan par bya/ /shin tu dul zhing zhi ba'i gzugs/ /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba

mkhas/ /rnal 'byor bzo dang bstan bcos rig /thams cad du ni snyan par smra/ /sems can kun la bu bzhin lta/ /sbyin pa la sogs rtag tu dga'/ /rnal 'byor bsam gtan mngon par brtson/ /snying rje phan pa'i

sems kyis ni/ /bden par smra zhing 'tshe mi byed/ /mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed pas na/ /sems can rnams kyi mgon skyob yin/ /de nyid bcu ni yongs shes pa/ /'di ni slob dpon zhes byar brjod/ /gzhan yang slob mas spyod

pa yi/ /de nyid mtshan nyid mnyam par gyis/ /rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor ba lta/ /dam tshig spyod pa dang lta nyid/ /gtor ma gsang ba las sogs ldan/ /slob dpon gsang ba smad mi bya/ /smad na myur du mnar med 'gro/ /kun tu dam

tshig med pa dang / /stan dang mal dang lham sogs dang / /gdugs dang na bza' nyer spyod rnams/ /grib ma 'gom zhing brdzi mi bya/ /bzlog dang gzir ba'i tshig brjod min/ /'das na de ni dus kun tu/ /gdon gyis 'tshe bar 'gyur ba

dang / /nor nyams dpal las ring du 'gyur/ /bdud dang sdang bas 'joms par byed/ /de yi grib ma 'gom gyur na/ /mchod rten bshig pa'i sdig 'drar brjod/ /slob dpon smod par gang byed pa/ /rmi lam na yang dngos grub med/ /

slob dpon yon tan gzung bya yi/ /skyon rnams nam yang gzung bya min/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor la sogs/ /de yi lam gyis 'grub phyir ro/ /bslab pa sbyin pa sngon 'gro bas/ /de nas maN+Dal la sogs bya/ /sngar bstan yi ge

gcig pa yis/ /sangs rgyas lnga ru bstan par bya/ /de yi rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/ /las rnams 'dod bzhin 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngags kyi dbang bskur ldan pa yis/ /yi ge brgyad po bsgom bar bya/ /gnyis med gtor sbyin dbang

bskur ba'i/ /de yis chos ni shes par bya/ /sbyor ba'i dbang bskur ldan pa la/ /ye shes rnam shes bstan par bya/ /slob dpon dbang ni bskur nas su/ /thams cad gsang ba la sogs bstan/ /dang por slob mas bya ba ni/ /bla gos phrag par

gzar nas su/ /pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga dag /sa la legs par btsugs nas ni/ /thal mo snying gar sbyar bar bya/ /bla ma stan la 'dug nas ni/ /rang gi lha ru rab bsgoms la/ /lag pas lag pa bzung nas ni/ /mkhas pas bslab pa

sbyin par bya/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /theg pa gsum po thams cad dang / /rnal 'byor gsang sogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo dbang lha mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/ /khyad

par du yang slob dpon la/ /rtag tu skyabs su mchi bar bgyi/ /rnam snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa/ /rin chen mchog dang 'jig rten dbang / /don yod grub pa la sogs pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun/ /thams cad bdag la

dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni/ /dus tshod 'di nas bzung nas su/ /byang chub snying por mchis bar du/ /ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bgyi zhing / /ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/ /de ltar rjes su brtse ba'i phyir/ /

bdag gis chos khrims 'di bgyi'o/ /de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du/ /mnyam nyid brtan pa'i sems ldan brjod/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud d+hAHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM badzra shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA badzra shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM yo ga shud d+hAH

sarba d+harmA yo ga shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang / /ngag gi las ni rnam pa bzhi/ /yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni/ /lus bsdams pas ni dam tshig bsrung / /sems ni mnyam nyid shes nas su/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i chos

bshad bya/ /de nas ras kyis mig bkab nas/ /gtor ma'i gnas su gzhug par bya/ /lag pas lag pa bzung nas su/ /slar yang bslab pa bstan par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi/ /

dpa' bo dpa' mo 'khor lo yi/ /sbyor ba'i gdan la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /don dam rtogs mchog seng ge slob ma rnams shes nas/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas sgribs g.yogs rnams su dral ba'i phyir/ /srid pa'i nyes dmigs bskyed

pa'i nyon mongs bcom nas su/ /rnal 'byor don dam grub byed de nyid rgyal por 'gyur/ /AHni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /gsung gi rdo rjer byin gyis brlab/ /hU~M ni nyon mongs bsreg pa ste/ /thugs kyi rdo rjer byin gyis brlab/ /

oM ni ye shes 'gugs pa ste/ /sku yi rdo rjer byin gyis brlab/ /de nas mig phye mthong ma thag /kun la yan lag lngas btud nas/ /bdag gi rang bzhin lus 'di nyid/ /sbyor ba'i gdan du gding bar bya/ /de nas mtshan

nyid ci 'dra bar/ /lus ni ji ltar bstan pa bzhin/ /mkhas pa yis ni sbyin par bya/ /ji ltar bstan bzhin mtshon byas la/ /de nas bslab sogs yang bya ste/ /ji ltar bstan pa'i yid kyis brtag /bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan

pa yis/ /dam tshig chu ni de nas sbyin/ /ha zhes pa yis kha dog 'phrog /ho yis dri ni 'joms par byed/ /hrIHyis nus pa gzhom bya ste/ /la lar sngags ni bzlas par bya/ /bla ma'i zhabs kyi drung du ni/ /mgo bos btud de

dbul bar bya/ /oM pany+dza DA ki nI pU dzo pas+thA nA ya At+mA na~M nir+yA ta yA mi/ oM A tsAr+ya pu dzo pas+thA nA ya At+mA na~M ni ta yA mi/ oM sarba satwa pa ri trA Na ar+thA ya At+mA na~M nir+yA ta yA mi/ nga rgyal dang ni khro ba dang / /brlang dang tshig

rtsub spang bar bya/ /sdig pa'i grogs po spang bya ste/ /srog gcod brku ba de bzhin no/ /longs spyod kun la mi chags shing / /bdag nyid nges par chog shes bya/ /gar gyi gnas dang tshul 'dra ba'i/ /phyi rol bstan bcos

zhen mi bya/ /sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ sa ma ya hoH a A a~M aHhU~M dza / rdo rje phyag rgya ldan pa yis/ /yan lag drug gi sa bon gzung / /gzhan yang chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim par bstan/ /de nas

slob ma 'byor ldan pas/ /rtag tu bla ma yon dbul bya/ /rang gi bu dang chung ma dang / /gnyen 'dun bran khol bcas pa dang / /glang chen rta dang ba glang khyu/ /rin chen khyim dang zhing yul bcas/ /gser dang dngul dang zangs

dang ni/ /gos dang 'bru la sogs pa'i nor/ /stan dang mal cha lham la sogs/ /gdugs sogs nye ba'i longs spyod dbul/ /mthar ni rang gi lus nyid kyang / /bla ma'i yon du phul nas su/ /chos rnams rang bzhin

dag pa nyid/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin med pa ru/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim par bstan/ /sngon du bzod pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /sems can rnams la gzir mi bya/ /gzhan la tshig rtsub smra mi bya/ /thams cad mi dgar bya ba

min/ /tshul khrims sdom pa bsrung ba dang / /skye bo rnams la gnod mi bya/ /srog chags gsad par mi bya ste/ /de bas shi bar 'gyur kyang bla/ /rab tu 'bar me mtshungs pas na/ /gzhan gyi nor la reg mi bya/ /dngos

la srid pa'i blun po rnams/ /bdag nyid srid pa mi bzad ltung / /rags dang phra mo tsam la yang / /rnal 'byor pa yis brdzun bsrung ngo / /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i/ /de la brdzun smra yod pa min/ /spyod pa
legs par bsdams pa dang / /bza' bca' sogs la'ang legs par bsdam/ /dga' dang rtse la'ang legs par bsdam/ /gtor ma'i dus su'ang legs par bsdam/ /rnal 'byor dngos grub 'dod pa rnams/ /sems can dga'

bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang zhig kun shes slob ma la/ /sems can spro ba bstan par bya/ /mnyam nyid ye shes bskyed nas ni/ /thams cad mnyam par blta bar bya/ /rtag tu mnyam par spyod par bya/ /rnal 'byor bsam

gtan 'bad par bya/ /sems can dman pa sred pa'i gzhis/ /tshong byed myu gu 'phel 'gyur te/ /de yi myu gu ljon shing gis/ /'gro ba'i 'bras lam 'gog par byed/ /mtho ris longs spyod 'dod pa yis/ /lus can rnams ni

byams pas na/ /dga' zhing rtse ba'i chos spyod kyis/ /bdag nyid srid par ltung bar 'gyur/ /mchod rten las ni mi bya zhing / /glegs bam bklag par mi bya'o/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing zhing / /sngags kyi yi ges bzla mi bya/ /

bstan bcos dag ni snyed sla ste/ /de yi sbyor ba snyed par dka'/ /slob dpon dag gi lung gis ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni blta bar bya/ /bdag gi lha dang gzhan las ni/ /bdag gi lha ni lha yi mchog /bdag gi gzugs su mi nus

pas/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs bri bar bya/ /gsang ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba dang po'o// // der ni sbyor ba rnyed dka' ba/ /nyon cig rdo rje rgyal po gtso/ /de nyid med pa'i sngags pa rnams/ /srid pa 'phel

byed 'og tu ltung / /lus po ngo mtshar skyes gyur pas/ /de nyid chos ni bstan du gsol/ /rnal 'byor kyi ni tshad ma ci/ /sngags dang phyag rgya ji lta bu/ /chu dang me dang rlung rnams kyis/ /lus kyi tshad ni ji ltar lags/ /rnal 'byor pa

yi gtor ma'i las/ /rab tu sbyar ba'i tshad ma gang / /gang gis 'gro ba bsgrub pa yi/ /mtshan nyid tshad ma ji ltar lags/ /mtshon cha'i lus dang sems kyi tshad/ /ji bzhin de nyid rdo rjes nyon/ /bdag gi khams ni mi brtan

pas/ /gtor ma'i las dang bzlas pa dang / /dkyil 'khor me dang chu yi las/ /phyag rgya gdugs sogs mchod pa yi/ /'bras bu thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa'ang / /srid pa'i rgya mtshor ltung bar 'gyur/ /phyag na rdo rjes yang

gsol pa/ /srid pa so sor 'byung ba rnams/ /gang gis de yi tshad ma ste/ /sems ni ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ /yid ni the tshom skyes par gyur/ /'khor ba khyod kyis dris pa nyon/ /sems ni yid kyis bkrus nas su/ /
rang dga' ye shes dngos med pa/ /mkha' 'gro rlung gis bcings pa yis/ /sems ni gzugs dang gzugs med par/ /bsam gtan dmigs pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /'dod lha la sogs 'dod can rnams/ /rtag tu

'dod yon spyod pa ste/ /de ltar 'khor ba'i mi rnams ni/ /rang 'dod sa la sogs pa 'grub/ /de las sgrol ba'i dngos po rnams/ /de yi don ni gang yin pa/ /nga yis legs par bshad par bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyis mdor bsdus

nyon/ /rnal 'byor can gyi rnam shes dang / /lhan cig 'gro bas 'gro bar 'gyur/ /rnam shes rnam par shes pa yis/ /phyogs kun gyis ni gsal bar 'grub/ /sems kyi ngo bo the tshom pas/ /bcom ldan de yang bshad du

gsol/ /shes rab rnam shes dngos rang bzhin/ /mi shes ye shes ji ltar lags/ /rnam shes ye shes mtshan nyid kyis/ /the tshom gyur pa nyan par 'tshal/ /shel dang mtshungs pa dag pa'i sems/ /sems la skyon dang

yon tan med/ /yul rnams dang ni sprad pa yin/ /srid pa'i skyon gyis gos pa yin/ /gang gis 'di yi srid pa'i dngos/ /yul gnas pa yi zhi gyur nas/ /ji ltar gnas bzhin rab sbyor ba/ /bu ga'i sgo ru gzir bar bya/ /de

yi dbus su shes bya ba/ /rtag tu rnam shes nam mkha' 'dra/ /kha dog med cing thams cad mtshon/ /mi ldan lus can ldan pa ste/ /gzugs med pa ni kun gyi gzugs/ /de bzhin thung ngu ring po min/ /sems kyi de kho na

nyid kyis/ /dngos med rdzu 'phrul 'grub par 'gyur/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /mtshan nyid thams cad ster ba'o/ /dngos po med par bsgom pa yis/ /bsgom pa dag ni mtshon par bya/ /gzugs dang stong pa'i dbus su ni/ /

sems ni mkhas pas shes bya ste/ /thams cad kun nas dmigs pa yis/ /rnal 'byor lus ni skyon med pa'o/ /gsang las gsang ba gsang chen po/ /rnam shes ye shes gsang ba dag /bstan bcos klog la sogs sbas shing / /

yul gyis mtshan nyid las kyang ring / /mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid de nyid ni/ /bla ma'i lam gyis mthong bar 'gyur/ /sems dang lus su bcas mnyam zhing / /sems kyang gdung bar mi bya'o/ /lus ni gdung bar mi bya'o/ /yid

du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /bde ba'i stan la gnas nas ni/ /sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung bcas nas ni/ /lag gnyis gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag /mig ni sna rtser bltas nas su/ /dbugs

ni lte ba'i rtsa bar bzung / /thong ka kun tu spangs pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor lta bur sbyar bar bya/ /'bad de mnyam nyid sems kyis ni/ /de nyid rang bzhin dag byas la/ /yid kyi dri yis byug pa dang / /yid kyi me tog mchod

par bya/ /rang bzhin dri yis byugs nas su/ /shes rab sgron mas snang bar bya/ /bdud rtsi'i gtor mas tshim pa'i lus/ /kun nas drangs te bza' bar bya/ /kha dog ser po 'bar ba'i 'od/ /ka sha gnyis 'gyur yi ge ste/ /drag

mor ldan pa'i sa bon nyid/ /tshangs pa'i sgo ru shin tu bsrung / /thams cad gzugs kyi 'jig byed pa/ /dril bu chu yi yi ge ste/ /stong par ldan pa'i sa bon ni/ /sna dang rna ba dag la dgod/ /bdud rtsi'i chu yi sa bon ni/ /lce dbang

rtse mor gzung bar bya/ /seng ge'i sa bon brtsegs pa yis/ /rgyas pa'i sgo ni bsrung bar bya/ /stag mo'i sa bon brtsegs pa yis/ /thong ka kun du gzung bar bya/ /lce spyang sa bon brtsegs pa ni/ /snying ga'i gnas su gzhag

par bya/ /lte ba'i tshigs ni gdan gyi sgor/ /phyugs kyi sa bon gyis bsrung ngo / /lha mo brgyad du sbyar nas ni/ /sa bon brgyad po gzung bar bya/ /de yi mdog ni dkar mo ste/ /lus kun du ni shin tu 'bar/ /steng gi mche

ba gnyis las ni/ /dngul chu'i rgyun dang 'dra bar dbab/ /'o ma'i chu zhes bya ba yin/ /'jug pas brlabs pa'i mdog lta bu/ /steng gi mche ba gnyis kyi ni/ /lce yis bsten pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu/ /lce chung gsang ba'i nang du

dbab/ /dpral ba'i sde dang sna dang ni/ /rna ba gnyis kyi rgyab dag tu/ /kha zas lta bu'i dngos po ni/ /kun nas drangs te gzhag par bya/ /mchod rten sgo ru sa bon ni/ /hU~M zhes bya ba dbang phyug mchog /bdud rtsi'i chu

yis bkrus nas su/ /lhag ma 'og tu thim par bya/ /'og tu rlung gi sa bon gyis/ /'khrul 'khor lta bur kun nas drangs/ /chu ni mdzub do rtsibs logs dang / /de bzhin mtshan khung gnyis dang ni/ /dus dang yi
dgas me rkang pa/ /tshigs rnams kun dang snying ga nas/ /bdud rtsi btung ba gang yin pa/ /ba lang rmig par thim nas ni/ /sgo gcig nas ni sgo dgur gzhag /lus kun la ni gnas pa yi/ /bdud rtsi gang gis

shes pa dag /lus rnams thams cad skye 'gyur bas/ /de yi rnal 'byor brtags pa yin/ /snying dbus zla ba bsam bya ba/ /mdangs ldan shin tu mdzes shing gsal/ /gangs dang kun da zla ba 'dra/ /zla ba de dbus 'o ma'i

rgyun/ /bdud rtsi'i kun rig gug skyed bcas/ /bdud rtsi'i 'od ni shin tu bsil/ /ma ning rnams ni spangs pa yis/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad kyis/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dngos rnams kyi/ /gnas rnams kun tu bskor

bar bya/ /ba lang rmig pa'i steng du ni/ /rtag tu bdud rtsi bzhag nas su/ /gzugs dang kha dog mdzes pa yi/ /ye shes lus su bsgom par bya/ /mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru/ /dngos po dngos po bsgom byas la/ /'o

ma'i zla ba sa bon dag /phyag 'tshal bsreg pa'i mtha' ldan pa/ /mnyam bzhag dngos pos bzlas byas nas/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /dbang po rnams kyi sred pa dang / /bkras skom la sogs med par

'gyur/ /lo ni brgya phrag du mar 'tsho/ /gzugs dang gzi brjid na tshod ldan/ /rims dang dug la sogs pa dang / /grang dang tsha sogs gnod pa rnams/ /ye shes can gyi ye shes lus/ /yan lag kun la gnas mi 'gyur/ /

bdud rtsi'i rtsa ba dmigs pa yis/ /myu gu skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de dang de ni 'phel 'gyur bas/ /gzugs dang ye shes bdag nyid che/ /de yi rnal 'byor gnas rnams ni/ /stong pa'i brag la sogs par brten/ /bdud rtsi gang gis

shes pa yis/ /bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar bdag nyid kyi ni sems/ /ye shes can gyis de kho nas/ /dag bya 'khor ba'i pha rol mtshan/ /ye shes dbang las nyan par 'tshal/ /gnyis med sngon gyi sems kyis ni/ /'dod

chags nyon mongs rgya mtsho yi/ /rang gi lus ni bkru bya ba/ /ye shes sems dpa' mnyan par gyis/ /rgya mtsho zab mo lta bu yi/ /stong nyid ye shes de nyid kyis/ /phyi nang dri ma bkrus pas na/ /lus ni shel dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /shel dang

'dra ba'i lus kyi dngos/ /dri med dung dang kun da 'dra/ /ye shes dbang po sna tshogs kyi/ /chos kyi tshon gyis btso bar bya/ /rang bzhin gyis ni rnal 'byor pa/ /nyes byas legs byas las byung ba/ /gang gis rang bzhin las rgyal ba/ /ye shes kyis

ni snang bar bya/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid stong pa yis/ /'gro ba'i dngos kun zad par bya/ /mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed pa yis/ /gzugs sogs thams cad zad pa na/ /de gnyis dbus su bsam bya ba/ /zla 'od 'o ma'i sa bon te/ /A li kA

li rab sbyor bas/ /de yi dbus su btu bar bya/ /de yi sa bon de nyid kyis/ /'od zer phreng ba bsam par bya/ /sa bon de nyid gang gis ni/ /myur du ye shes snang bar 'gyur/ /gzugs mdzes yongs su mdzes pa yis/ /ye shes sku ru de nas bsgom/ /

phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams su ni/ /sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro bar bya/ /phyag 'tshal bsreg pa'i mtha' ldan pa'i/ /sa bon gang zhig bzla ba ni/ /sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i/ /yi ge gsum pa gzung bar bya/ /dbyug pa spyi bo rdo rje

dang / /sku bo che la sogs pas dkri/ /sems ni mnyam nyid bsgoms nas su/ /rnal 'byor can gyis bzlas par bya/ /mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom byas la/ /rnal 'byor bsam gtan la 'bad pas/ /'og min

la sogs snang bar bya/ /'od zer 'phro ba spros pa yis/ /sa 'og rim pa bdun yang bsam/ /rnal 'byor snang bar 'dod pa yis/ /rtag tu sems kyis bsgom par bya/ /snying ga'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /hU~M zhes bya ba dbang phyug mchog /

sngon gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas/ /thams cad kun nas zad par bya/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /ye shes sa bon de dbus bsam/ /de las byung ba'i ye shes

lus/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro'i bdag nyid de/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /pad ma'i stan la bzhugs pa ste/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas/ /yan lag rdzogs pa'i skur bsgoms la/ /snying gi dkyil 'khor dbus

gnas par/ /zla ba 'o ma'i sa bon bsam/ /kun nas mnyam pa'i sems kyis ni/ /rtag tu de nyid bsgom par bya/ /kha dog dkar po 'od 'bar las/ /kun tu rdul phran dkar pos dgang / /pha rol dngos po dmar po ru/ /zla ba'i dkyil

'khor dbus gnas par/ /pad ma'i stan la bzhugs pa yi/ /rdo rje sems dpar bsams nas su/ /gang gi snying gi dbus su ni/ /de yi rnam shes bzung bar bya/ /hU~M zhes bya ba'i phyogs brgyad du/ /kha dog dmar po bsams nas ni/ /
rtag tu mnyam nyid lta ba yis/ /blo ldan pha rol sems shes bya/ /kun nas dpag tshad phyi rol du/ /rnal 'byor pas ni gang bsams na/ /de yi bsam pa thams cad ni/ /yi ge de yis ston par 'gyur/ /gal te

pha rol cha yis ni/ /sems kyi mtshan nyid shes 'dod pas/ /gzhan gyi sems ni rig pa yis/ /kun nas thams cad shes byas la/ /dpa' bo sems can kun don phyir/ /rnal 'byor 'di yis sbyar bar bya/ /de nas me yi las kyi bdag /

sbyor ba ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ /ye shes me yi bdag nyid la/ /sbyin sreg mtshan nyid ji ltar lags/ /thams cad sems kyis byin brlabs pas/ /skye bo'i lus can ye shes me/ /thams cad ye shes byin brlabs pa/ /me yi de nyid

mnyam par gyis/ /bdag nyid sems kyis bsregs pas ni/ /rnal 'byor can gyis sbyin sreg bya/ /mdud pa'i lte ba'i dbus nyid kyi/ /dngos su sor ni bdun pa ste/ /me yi thab kyi gnas yin la/ /klu dbang 'khyil ba'i bskor ba yin/ /yi

ge thams cad 'bar bar bya/ /de dbus pad ma rig pa yis/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ye shes lus ni 'bar bar gzung / /mdud pa'i me la dkar po ru/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro thim par bya/ /g.yas kyi cha yi logs su ni/ /

drag po thim bya me dang 'dra/ /lte ba dmar po 'bar ba la/ /lha mo'i rtse mo ro langs ma/ /g.yon phyogs cha ni sngon po la/ /drag tu 'bar ba gtum mo ste/ /me lnga yi ni bdag nyid rnams/ /gzugs mdzes mthe bo'i tshad du blta/ /chu dang

me dang rlung dang ni/ /sa dang ye shes rnams pa lnga/ /lha mo lnga yi bdag nyid la/ /sbyin sreg cho ga'i mchog yin no/ /bcu dang brgyad kyi rtsa rnams nas/ /dus su bdud rtsi dmigs par bya/ /ba lang rmig pa'i dbus su ni/ /'dzag pa

der ni thim par bya/ /me yi dbus su bsreg pa'i gzhi/ /dbyangs yig dang po sogs sa bon/ /'di ltar de kho na bsgoms nas/ /bdag nyid rgyas phyir bsreg par bya/ /cung zad bza' dang btung la sogs/ /rung bar byas nas
