bza' bar bya/ /'di ltar spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /bu lon du yang mi 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o// // spre'u 'dra bar mi gnas pa/ /mnyam nyid gang gis sbyar bar bgyi/ /lus

kyi sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid rnams/ /lha la rol mo nyan par 'tshal/ /'byung ba yi ni khyad par dang / /gsang ba rdo rje chen pos nyon/ /sems ni mnyam par gnas pa ste/ /nye bar zhi nas ka lir 'jug /lus las spu rnams skye ba ni/ /kun tu

chu yi tshad ma ste/ /chu la lus ni me yin te/ /lus la chu yi tshad ma yin/ /lus kun las ni khyab pas na/ /blo ldan chu ni tshad ma'o/ /lus ni rdo rje lha mo yin/ /lus kyi yan lag thams cad la/ /me 'bar lta bur dro ba ste/ /kha zas smin

pa'i tshad ma yis/ /me ni tshad mar rab tu grags/ /yan lag thams cad khyab pa yi/ /me ni kun rig dmar yin pas/ /lus ni drag mor bstan pa ste/ /bdag nyid tshad mar rab tu grags/ /bu gar zla ba 'dra gnas pas/ /rlung

gis lus kun khyab pa ste/ /dbugs rgyu ba yi tshad ma yis/ /mkhas pas sems ni tshad mar grags/ /lus la brten pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dbugs ni gang gis shes nas su/ /thams cad lha mo ro langs mar/ /mkhas pa

yis ni shes par bya/ /sa ni kun gyi gnas yin te/ /gzugs sogs dbang po yon tan ldan/ /gzugs la sogs pa snang ba na/ /sa ni tshad ma'i gnas yin no/ /mdzes ma zhes bya rab tu grags/ /de ni lha mo gtum mo ste/ /

kun gyi gtso mor rab tu grags/ /yid ni the tshom gcod pa ste/ /byed po sdud po za po'ang yin/ /dbang po kun gyi sems rnams kyi/ /mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /dbang rgyal nyer sbyor longs spyod pa/ /yul la sogs

pa nyer spyod kyi/ /rnal 'byor tshad ma mkhas pa yis/ /lus la ye shes bsten par bya/ /sems las chu ni byung bas na/ /rnam shes chu ru gyur pa ste/ /gal te chu ni gzhan yin na/ /ci phyir zhe na chu mi 'byung / /lus la

nges par drod yod na/ /chu yi nang du bying mi 'gyur/ /lus la tshad ma lnga yod pas/ /lnga po gcig gi bdag nyid 'gyur/ /mtshan nyid gcig tu shes byas nas/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'gro ba brtag /de yi mtshan

nyid shes bya'i phyir/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten par bya/ /de nyid rnal 'byor grogs kyis ni/ /'khor ba'i pha rol rgal bar 'gyur/ /yul dang dbang po'i ye shes ni/ /gzir dang bcas pas sdom par 'gyur/ /sgong

skyes khyim gyi gnas su ni/ /dbus su gnas pa bcing bar bya/ /'byung dang 'byung min sems kyi ni/ /g.yo ba'i dngos po bskor bar bya/ /bcing ba'i gnas dang stan dag 'di/ /rnam shes pad ma'i stan la'o/ /rnal 'byor

pa yis de yi phyir/ /rnam shes rang bzhin mtshon par bya/ /gzugs shes bya ba'i dngos po yis/ /rnal 'byor grub par bya ba'i phyir/ /rang bzhin zhes bya'i dngos por 'gyur/ /lte bar chu shing me tog ni/ /snying

gar yang ni 'greng ste gnas/ /rtag tu stong pa'i sgo yin te/ /mkhas pas rtag tu bzlog par bya/ /ge sar dang ni ldan pa yi/ /rtag tu 'dab ma brgyad du 'gyur/ /de dbus rtag tu gsungs pa ni/ /ye shes rnam shes

sbyor ba ste/ /sbyor ba yi ni shar phyogs char/ /de dang 'thun pa'i sor drug pa'o/ /mdud pa yi ni nub phyogs char/ /'og tu sor ni lnga pa'o/ /zhing de la ni sa bon dang / /'od zer tshogs kyi myu gur 'gyur/ /sa bon de yi 'od

zer gyis/ /chu shing lta bur bskor bar bya/ /rgyas pa lnga yi sa bon la/ /lto yi 'og nas dgas bar bya/ /pad mo mdzes pa bkas pa yis/ /'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ /pad mo de yi stan la ni/ /sgong skyes
ye shes gnas dag la/ /dbus su shel ltar dag pa yis/ /ye shes rnam shes dbu ma nyid/ /mkha' 'gro ma bzhi'i sa bon rnams/ /phyogs kyi 'dab mar gnas pa ste/ /dbyangs yig dang po sogs sa bon/ /

mtshams su sen mo la sogs pa'i/ /ma ning yi ge sngar bstan bzhin/ /snying gar dngos bo dngos bo yis/ /snying kar yi ge blta bar bya/ /ba lang rmig pa'i steng du ni/ /sgo dgu pa yi bdud rtsi yis/ /rnal 'byor can

gyis rtag tu bkru/ /yi ge dkar po brgyad po rnams/ /bdud rtsi yi ge dkar po yi/ /'od 'bar ba spu'i khung nas spro/ /rnal 'byor can gyis thams cad du/ /'gro dang 'chag dang 'dug pa dang / /nyal ba la sogs dus

kun tu/ /ye shes rnam shes sa bon bzlas/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag sems kyis ni/ /rnal 'byor can gyis bsgom bzlas na/ /ye shes las byung rnal 'byor pa/ /'khor ba'i pha rol rgal bar 'gyur/ /g.yo ba med cing

'tshe med par/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ /gong du 'pho ba'i sbyor mtshan nyid/ /ji bzhin rdo rjes mnyan par gyis/ /lam bzang po yi rnal 'byor pa/ /'gro ba mdzes pa blta bar bya/ /sgo dgu po ni ji lta bu/ /ye

shes sgo yi bye brag gis/ /yon tan skyon rnams ji lta bu/ /ye shes dbang las nyan par 'tshal/ /'chi ba'i dus kyi tshad ma rnams/ /yang dag rab sbyor mnyan par gyis/ /lam bzang po yis mdzes pa'i gnas/ /lam

ngan srid pa'i skyon gyis gos/ /thig le lte ba spyi gtsug dang / /mig dang sna dang rna srid sgo/ /chu dang chu min sgo yin te/ /sgo dgu yi ni mtshan nyid yin/ /lte ba 'dod can mtho ris te/ /thig les gzugs khams kyi lus can/ /

steng nas steng du gnas de ru/ /mi gdung la sogs de ru 'gro/ /sna nas gnod sbyin gnas su ste/ /rna ba dag gis grub pa'i lha/ /gal te mig las ye shes 'gro/ /mi rnams kyi ni bdag por 'gro/ /srid pa'i sgo yis yi dgas te/ /

de bzhin gci bas dud 'gro'o/ /chu min rnam shes myur ba ru/ /dmyal ba brgyad du shes par bya'o/ /sgo rnams kyi ni bye brag gis/ /'khor ba'i bye brag 'byung ba yin/ /de bas sgo yi bye brag las/ /sgrub pos lam ni bzang po ste/ /

'chi ba'i mtshan ma ston pa dang / /'chi ba'i dus la 'bab pa na/ /rims la sogs pas ma phog par/ /gong du 'pho ba sbyor ba'i mchog /sngon du bum pa brtsams pa yis/ /sgo rnams thams cad bcing bar bya/ /rgyas

pa lnga yi mchod rten gyis/ /sgo ni dgag pa bsgom bya ste/ /de la 'og gi sgo ru ni/ /chu yi sa bon dkar po bsam/ /chu dang chu min sgo la ni/ /me yi sa bon 'bar ba ste/ /de la shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/ /dbugs ni bum

pa can du bsgom/ /lus ni rlung gi mdog du ste/ /sems ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la/ /rtsa ba rlung gi sa bon no/ /rlung gi mtha' ni rtsa ba can/ /thig le sgra dang ldan pa yi/ /rtsa ba'i sa bon drang bar bya/ /rdo rje'i sa bon drag mo yis/ /lcags

kyu la sogs sbyar bar bya/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig dbugs rnams kyis/ /gnas nas drag tu drang bar bya/ /gnas dang gnas nas steng du dbye/ /tshigs dgu las ni steng du bya/ /steng du smin pa'i sa bon dang / /yi ge phyed dang

gnyis kyis sbyang / /drag mo'i nga ro brjod bya ste/ /brgyad kyi mtha' yi sa bon la/ /sde tshan dang po'i dbang po ni/ /yi ge phyed du sbyar bar bya/ /'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis/ /sgra yi dbye bas bskul bar bya/ /rlung gi sa bon

ldan pa yi/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig gnas rnams nas/ /gong nas de bzhin steng gnas su/ /rnal 'byor pa yis smin byas la/ /steng gi rtsa la bzla bar bya/ /tshigs dgu las ni steng

gzhan gyis/ /mod la 'pho bar shes bya ste/ /nyin re bram ze gsod pa dang / /mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang / /rku 'phrog 'dod la spyod pa dag /lam 'di yis ni dag 'gyur te/ /sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur zhing / /srid

pa'i skyon las ring du 'gro/ /ji ltar 'dam nas skyes pa yi/ /pad ma dri med yid 'ong ba/ /de bzhin lus kyi 'dam las ni/ /ye shes sku ni 'dod bzhin 'gro/ /dus la bab na 'pho bya ste/ /dus min lha rnams gsod par

'gyur/ /de bas lus la mtshan ma rnams/ /mthong nas mkhas pas sbyor ba brtsam/ /rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i khyad par gyi/ /de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /sngar gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas/ /mnyam nyid sems ni
bsgom par bya/ /snying ga'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi sa bon bsam/ /de 'od nyi mar 'bar ba yis/ /gzugs rnams zad par bsams nas ni/ /sngon bzhin mtshan nyid ldan pa yis/ /
sngar bstan stong nyid bsam par bya/ /gzugs sogs thams cad bcom nas ni/ /hU~M zhes bya ba gnas par bsam/ /sa bon gyis ni bskyed bya ba/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /pad ma'i stan la bzhugs

pa yi/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro'i bdag nyid ni/ /zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste/ /spyan gsum cod pan gyis brgyan zhing / /bzhad dang khro dang sgeg pa ste/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa yi/ /kun da zla ba ltar
dkar zhing / /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' mnabs/ /sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung gnas nas ni/ /sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro ba mdzad/ /g.yas kyi dang po mda' yin te/ /gnyis pa yis ni lcags kyu bsnams/ /gsum
pa na ni rdo rje nyid/ /g.yon pa khro bo'i sdigs mdzub ste/ /gnyis pa 'jigs pa'i zhags pa thogs/ /go cha'i gzhu ni steng na bsnams/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba ru/ /dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya/ /
yan lag brgyad du rab 'bad nas/ /sa bon brgyad kyi yi ge dgod/ /A li kA li rab sbyor bas/ /sa bon ji bzhin btu bar bya/ /'od zer ldan pa'i sa bon rnams/ /kun tu kha dog dkar por bya/ /chu shing me

tog pad mo la/ /snying gar sgong skyes bzhag par bya/ /de yi dbus su rnam shes dang / /ye shes lhan cig ldan par ni/ /mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ /de nas phyi rol sbyor ba ni/ /
mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya/ /gnas gnyis dag ni bsams pa ni/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus su me yin te/ /me yi dbus su nyi ma la/ /A li kA lir ldan pa yi/ /de yi sa bon

dmar por dgod/ /rnal 'byor pa yis khyad par du/ /'byung dang 'jug pas bzlas par bya/ /'byung ba ye shes sa bon gyis/ /dbus su snun dang ldan par bya/ /'jug pas snying gi rnam shes la/ /me tog lta bur bsnun

par bya/ /'byung ba 'jug min bzlas bya zhing / /'jug pa 'jug pa min la bzla/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'byung 'jug dang / /bdag nyid dang ni phyi rol bya/ /'byung ba'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa dang / /'jug pa yis ni
mtshon byas la/ /rnal 'byor pa yi 'byung 'jug dag /de kho na nyid mnyam par bsgom/ /mnyam gzhag dngos po bsgoms nas ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /de nas phyi rol lus la ni/ /sgrub pa po
yis rnam par sprul/ /pha rol sems dang rjes 'thun par/ /mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya/ /bsgom dang bzlas pa'i khyad par gyi/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag ste bsam/ /gang gis lam nas bsams
nas ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /gsang ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba gsum pa'o// // gsang ba'i gdan gyi gsang ba nyid/ /sems dang ye shes 'dres pa yi/ /rdzogs
pa'i byang chub rim ci 'dra/ /ye shes dbang las nyan par 'tshal/ /gsang ba'i gsang ba chos kyi don/ /byang chub rim pa rdo rje nyon/ /'dod chags la sogs rim spangs nas/ /mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed

par bya/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/ /bde ba'i stan la gnas nas ni/ /khams dang sems ni bde ba yis/ /snying rjes phan pa bsam par bya/ /yang dag bstan bcos de nyid thos/ /slob dpon lung gi rjes 'gro

zhing / /gsang chen de nyid don sgom pa/ /gcig nas gcig brgyud de nyid can/ /thams cad sngon bzhin mtshon byas nas/ /thams cad stong pa nyid du bya/ /dri ma bkrus pa'i lus la ni/ /byang chub rim pas btso bar bya/ /zla
ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro bsam byas te/ /zla ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba yi/ /kun da zla ba ltar dkar mdog /zhabs gnyis sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung bcas/ /pad ma yi ni stan la

bzhugs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan pa ste/ /phyag gnyis phyag rgya che bcings nas/ /nyid kyi thugs kar 'tshir bar mdzad/ /gzugs mdzes shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ /ye shes

sems dpa' bdag ces brjod/ /chu shing me tog lte ba nas/ /snying gi bar du 'greng ste gnas/ /sngar gyi mtshan nyid kyis bzlog nas/ /sngon bzhin pad ma rgyas par bya/ /ge sar dang ni lte bar bcas/ /'dab brgyad
shin tu mdzes pa ste/ /dbus kyi sgong skyes la gnas par/ /yi ge'i dgod pa dgod par bya/ /kha dog dkar po dag cing gsal/ /dbus su bsgom bya zhu ba'i gtso/ /de yi dbus su rnam shes dang / /ye shes dag

ni sbyar bar bya/ /shar du byams par ldan pa yis/ /mi bskyod pa yi sa bon bsam/ /lho yi sgo ru snying rje ste/ /rin chen sa bon de nyid do/ /nub kyi sgo yi 'dab ma la/ /'od dpag med kyi sa bon dgod/ /byang
gi cha yi 'dab ma la/ /don yod gtso bo bsam par bya/ /dbyangs yig thog ma sogs sa bon/ /thig le dbyugs par ldan rim bzhin/ /'od zer dkar pos brgyan pa ste/ /yi ge bzhi ni dgod par bya/ /phyogs
mtshams dag ni bzhi po ru/ /sngon du bstan pa'i ma ning dgod/ /de yi dbus su de yi sems/ /yi ge ru ni mtshon par bya/ /stong pa mtshan nyid med pa las/ /ji ltar yi ge sbyar bar bgyi/ /sems ni ya

mtshan skyes par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan bdag la bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /stong pa'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa las/ /chu shing snyi ma'i bdud rtsi bzhin/ /snying po med pa'i snying por

gyur/ /de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /dbus na gnas pa ye shes te/ /ye shes rang bzhin gzugs med cing / /mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /dri ma med pa'i ye shes sku/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol/ /yi ge gzugs

ni yi ge med/ /gzugs dang stong pa'i dbus su ni/ /rnal 'byor can gyis de nyid gzugs/ /gang gi mtshan nyid shes byas nas/ /mnyam nyid ye shes shes pa dang / /de yis rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam/ /myur ba nyid du mthong bar 'gyur/ /

bla ma nyid kyi lam gyis ni/ /ye shes rnam shes rang bzhin nyid/ /bstan bcos la ni mtshan nyid bstan/ /de kho na nyid dpa' bos bshad/ /'od zer dkar pos rgyas pa ru/ /'di ni kun tu bsgom par bya/ /rgyas pa lnga yi mchod rten

te/ /bdud rtsi'i sa bon bsams nas ni/ /'od zer dkar po gsal ba'i mdangs/ /bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'dzag pas bkru/ /thigs pa'i dbus su sa bon ni/ /mthe bo tsam gyi zlum por bya/ /de yi dbus kyi sa bon ni/ /A li kA li

dag las btu/ /kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes/ /zla ba'i 'od zer kun tu 'phro/ /de yi dbus kyi sa bon ni/ /thig le bsam par rab tu grags/ /skra yi rtse mo brgya yi cha/ /rdul phran gzugs su kun du bsam/ /rnam par shes

pa'i dngos po yi/ /mtshan nyid mtshon pa'i ye shes can/ /sems kyi mtshan nyid mi shes pas/ /thig le gnas kyi go 'phang lta/ /snying dang tshangs pa'i sgo nga ni/ /thigs pa'i lam gyi sgo dag tu/ /bla ma'i lung la gus pa yis/ /rnam

shes ye shes gzung bar bya/ /phyi rol gyi ni lam dag dang / /bstan bcos las kyang ring ba yin/ /bstan bcos dag ni rnyed sla ste/ /de yi sbyor ba rnyed par dka'/ /bla ma'i bsnyen bkur la gus pa'i/ /thabs dang ldan pa sgrub pa po/ /

bla ma'i lung gi lam gyis ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni blta bar bya/ /mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru/ /mnyam par gzhag pas dngos po bsgom/ /chos kyi sngon 'gro yid yin te/ /yid kyis 'jug cing yid kyis 'dug /de bas thams cad

yid rang bzhin/ /blo ldan yid las 'byung zhes bya/ /gal te bzlas 'dod rnal 'byor pas/ /snying gi sdom pa bsam par bya/ /sa bon gyi ni rgyur gyur pa/ /de kho nar ni gzugs min no/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sa bon ni/ /de kho na nyid

mthong ba min/ /gzugs sogs srid pa'i longs spyod la/ /sa bon dmigs shing bzlas par bya/ /kun nas kun tu 'jug pa dang / /'og min 'og min yang dag gnas/ /rtsa bar rtag tu gzer bar bya/ /ye shes rnam shes sa bon ni/ /

thig le sgra dang yang dag ldan/ /srid pa'i longs spyod 'dod pa yis/ /phyi rol ngag ni spangs nas su/ /yid kyis bzlas dang ldan par bya/ /rtag pa chos kyi dbyings nyid kyis/ /mi g.yo go 'phang rgyun tu gnas/ /rtag tu phra zhing gos med

pas/ /ye shes la ni rnam shes thim/ /rnam shes ye shes nyid gyur nas/ /byang chub rim pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /mar me lta bu thams cad du/ /snang 'gyur mtshan ma dang po ste/ /srin bu me khyer lta bu'i rdul/ /mthong ba mtshan ma

gnyis pa yin/ /gsum pa la ni rnal 'byor pas/ /nyon mongs 'joms pa'i mtshan ma ste/ /rdul phran dkar po'i tshul gyis ni/ /de bzhin phyogs bcur mthong bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa lha yis longs spyod rnams/ /sems kyis

mthong ba bzhi pa ste/ /mtho ris gzugs kyi lha rnams ni/ /sems kyis mthong ba lnga pa yin/ /gzugs med longs spyod drug pa ste/ /bdun pa chos kyi sa la'o/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu brgyad pa ste/ /rnal 'byor pa ni rang

dgar spyod/ /mchod rten gzugs kyi khyad par las/ /dbyibs kyi gzugs ni ji lta bu/ /lha yi rnam dag bsgoms pa rnams/ /bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /lus can rnams la yang dag blta/ /yang dag de nyid

shes nas su/ /de nyid sbyor ba brtsam pa yi/ /rab sbyor rdo rje mnyan par gyis/ /snying gar zla ba bsams nas su/ /dbus su hU~M ni bsgom par bya/ /me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od zer gsal/ /spyi gtsug dkar por yang dag

ldan/ /me lce 'bar bas bcom nas ni/ /thams cad kun nas zad par bya/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid de kho nas/ /de nyid stong pa nyid du bya'i/ /de nas zla bar sa bon ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsams nas su/ /mchod rten pho brang

gnas nyid ni/ /de la sems kyis bskyed par bya/ /gya gyu sa zhes brjod pa ste/ /phyogs brgyad dag ni khams yin na/ /dril bu nam mkha'i dbus gnas pa/ /lhun po'i lha yi gnas nyid do/ /'dod na spyod pa'i lus can
rnams/ /bre ru nges par brtag par bya/ /'og dang steng dang dbus nyid kyi/ /dbus su gnas pa bdag med chos/ /gzugs khams zhes bya'i mtho ris rnams/ /'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /gzugs can

bcu dang brgyad po ni/ /go rim ji bzhin rnam par gnas/ /gzugs med srid pa'i sems can ni/ /chos kyi srog shing nyid du thim/ /lha rnams kun gyi pho brang ni/ /gzugs su mchod rten bskyed par bya/ /steng gi sgong
skyes gnas su ni/ /bdag gi sems ni mnyam bya ste/ /sems dang ye shes 'dres pas na/ /gnyis med mnyam pa'i khyad par gyis/ /gzugs dang stong pa'i mtha' dang ni/ /de bzhin dngos dang dngos med nyid/ /

gzung dang 'dzin pa la sogs gzhan/ /legs byas dang ni bzlog pa rnams/ /mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid ston pa'o/ /de yi dbus su bsgom par bya/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod sogs pa'i/ /rdzas 'di yis ni mchod nas

su/ /mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ /mnyam bzhag dngos po bsgoms nas ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi/ /de nyid bstan bcos lung la

sogs/ /rnal 'byor dmigs pa goms byas pa'i/ /slob ma chen po'i lus can rnams/ /gdan bzhi pa yi de kho na/ /bla ma'i man ngag ldan pa yis/ /rim gyis rang dgar longs spyod de/ /bdag med blta zhing myang bar bya/ /

bdud rtsi myong ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /ye shes sku ni myur tu 'thob/ /ye shes sku yi rnal 'byor pas/ /bdag dang gzhan don mchog du 'gyur/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa yi/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rnal 'byor ro/ /gsang chen

sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid kyi/ /de nyid de nyid mchog de nyid/ /gang gis byang chub lam gyur pa/ /bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dang por re shig rnal 'byor pas/ /bdag nyid

rang dgar byed pa yi/ /rta rgod lta bu'i sems de nyid/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsdam par bya/ /ji ltar bung ba me tog bsnyung ba yi/ /chang gis myos shing sems ni brtan 'gyur te/ /longs spyod zhugs shing sdug bsngal rmongs

dang bral/ /de bzhin bsgom pa'i lam gyis yid bcing bya/ /yid bsdams pa ni 'grub 'gyur bas/ /dang por yid ni bsdam par bya/ /yid kyis bsgrub pa'i bye brag gis/ /byang chub ye shes mtshon par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil

'khor dbus gnas par/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro sprul bya ste/ /phyag rgya chen po snying gar bcing / /sngon gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas/ /yi ge brgyad kyi sa bon rnams/ /yi ge'i gnas su dgod par bya/ /rgyal ba

lnga yi mchod rten gyi/ /sgo ni dgag par bsam bya ste/ /bdud rtsi'i sngags kyi yi ge yis/ /rgyas pa'i sgo ni bsrung bar bya/ /me yi yi ge 'bar ba yis/ /chu dang chu min de bzhin bsrung / /chu shing me tog pad ma ni/ /mdzes

shing 'khyil pa rgyas par dbye/ /de yi dbus kyi sgong ngar ni/ /dung dang zla ba ltar dkar ba/ /phyogs phyogs gnas su sa bon de/ /phyogs bzhir khams ni bzhi po yi/ /phyogs mtshams sa bon brtsegs pa bzhi/ /
shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom/ /'od zer kun nas dkar zhing dag /lha mo'i yi ge bsgom par bya/ /ye shes rnam shes ngo bo'o/ /de nyid dbus su dmigs nas ni/ /sems ni rang dgar bsgoms pa
yis/ /phyi nas gzugs ni gzhom par bya/ /phyogs dang phyogs kyi mtshams dag tu/ /phyogs phyogs gnas su bzhag nas su/ /rang bzhin thams cad bcom pa yi/ /lhag ma rnam shes ye shes nyid/ /shar gyi phyogs

su chu yin te/ /kha dog dkar po kun da'i 'od/ /me ni ser po 'od 'bar bar/ /rtag tu byang du bsam par bya/ /rlung gi sa bon dmar po ni/ /nub kyi phyogs su brtag par bya/ /sa yi sa bon ljang khu ni/ /lho yi phyogs

su bsam par bya/ /phyogs mtshams 'dres pa'i kha dog gis/ /grwa bzhi dag tu sbyar bar bya/ /lhag ma dbus kyi ye shes te/ /sgong skyes bcas pa gzhom par bya/ /de yi mtshan nyid mtshon par bya/ /mtshon bya

mtshan nyid dngos med pa'o/ /sems kyi dngos po stong ba bas/ /rang bzhin gnas rnams zad par bya/ /rnam rtog stong pa'i dbus dag tu/ /rdul phran tsa na lta bu'i gzugs/ /A li kA li sa bon ni/ /rdul phran

zhes bya dbus su ste/ /rnam pa med cing brjod du med/ /thams cad rdul zhes bya ba la/ /stong nyid du 'ang mi dmigs te/ /gzugs la sogs par mi blta'o/ /rdul ni sa bon ma yin la/ /rang bzhin med cing mtshan
nyid med/ /rlung dang nam mkha' ma yin te/ /mnyam nyid dbu mar mtshon par bya/ /gzugs dang stong pa de bzhin dbus/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor can gyis gzung / /bla ma'i lung gis rtogs bya ste/ /lung gi dam
pa dag dang ni/ /bstan bcos mtshan nyid dpyad nas su/ /lung dang bcas pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /mi g.yo 'ang 'tshe ba med pa ru/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ /mnyam gzhag dngos pos

dpyad nas ni/ /byang chub rim pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /ye shes thim pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /sems can don byed mchog tu brtson/ /kun rtog lus dang sems kyi ni/ /gang tshe yul 'khor bsrung 'dod na/ /ye shes dbang po'i

longs spyod can/ /rang 'dod lus kyi dngos grub kyis/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras 'dod cing / /khams gsum ye shes kyis blta dang / /rang 'dod yid kyi gnas dang ni/ /nam mkhar rgyu ba'i lus can dang / /sems can kun

gyi gzhan don gnyer/ /mchog ni myur du ster bar 'gyur/ /lus dang dbang po don gnyer bas/ /bdag med pa yis rang dgar bya/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi/ /sbyor bas 'khor ba sgrol bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas 'dren

pa rnams kyi yang / /sbyor ba gzhan ni don gnyer 'gyur/ /sgrub po 'du 'dzi med pa dang / /sgra sgrogs skye bos dben pa yi/ /tshal dang ri sul brag phug tu/ /gnas nas de ru bsgom par bya/ /na ga mu la pa la sha /ru rta cha ni gsum

po dag /ma ga d+ha ni srang gcig ste/ /cha bsnyams phye mar byas nas ni/ /ba yi 'o mar yang dag bcas/ /phye ma bzhi char bsres nas su/ /'di ni nyin re rnal 'byor pa/ /mkhas pa yis ni bza' bar bya/ /rnal 'byor can gyi lo brgya

ru/ /brag phug stong sogs gnas nas ni/ /nges par shin tu smin pa yis/ /grang dang bkres skom la sogs grol/ /sman 'di dag ni ldan pa ru/ /brag phug stong sogs gnas nas ni/ /'dul ba bsrung ba'i rnal 'byor pa/ /lus

ni rtag tu bsungs par 'gyur/ /ji ltar bud med byis gtam rjes yi rang / /gnyis sprod gtam du smra zhing ston pa ste/ /de ltar lam bshad 'chi ba yod ma yin/ /rnal 'byor lam ngan de ltar bstan pa min/ /rig byed chu dang de bzhin
dur ba rnams/ /bram zes spyir bzhag sangs rgyas pas gzung min/ /dbang bskur sngags sogs nyams kyis 'jigs pas na/ /gnas ngan lha tshogs rigs la phyag mi bya/ /de nas rnal 'byor pa dang / rnal 'byor ma

dang / mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun bye ba phrag brgyad bcu du ma'i 'khor rnams sems tshim nas/ thams cad kyis ye shes thob par gyur te/ phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i

byang chub sems dpa' dang / sems can rnams kyis thal mo sbyar te glu blangs pa/ rang dgar sems can sgrol ba yi/ /rgyu med dngos la 'dud par bgyi/ /te na hU~M te na hU~M te na te te hU~M/ ston ka'i zla ltar zhal mdzes shing / /

dung ltar dkar ba'i sku 'dzin pa/ /te na hU~M te na hU~M te na te te hU~M/ rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya can/ /gnyis su sbyar ba 'dzin pa po/ /te na hU~M te na hU~M te na te te hU~M/ sgyu ma'i lus su thim pa yi/ /'gro ba mdzes pa rgyu med dngos/ /te na

hU~M te na hU~M te na te te hU~M/ srid pa gsum 'bar sku ni rjes chags 'dul bar ldan/ /'od zer rnon po stong phrag nyi ma stong 'drar ldan/ /rnam mang sku dang cha byad rjes chags sems dpar ldan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug mchog

dang rol gar mdzad ces bya ba ste/ bkra shis sgra yis bkang nas su/ /thams cad kun nas glur blangs so/ /ji bzhin lam ni rdo rjes nyon/ /bstan bcos shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/ /gang zhig su yang rung ba las/ /yi ge

'am tshig tsam nyan byed na/ /mtho ris longs spyod thob 'gyur te/ /yang na 'khor los sgyur bar ro/ /'dri 'am 'drir 'jug klog pa dang / /shin tu dad ldan sngags zlos pa'i/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams 'pho ba'i tshe/ /srid pa'i
gzugs kun bsams bzhin 'grub/ /rnal 'byor bsam gtan byed pa rnams/ /myur du byang chub rim pa thob/ /ces bdag nyid kyis bka' stsal pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rnal 'byor pa dang / /rnal

'byor ma 'dus pa de dag dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan
pa'i 'khor gyis dga' zhing mgu nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /dpal gdan bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin

pas 'bum phrag bcwa brgyad pa las snying po lta bur gsungs pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po gA ya d+ha ra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba 'gos khug pa lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te

gtan la phab pa/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsa tuHpI Tha khyA ta tan+t+ra rA dzo man+t+ra aM sa nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gdan bzhi pa'i bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po sngags kyi cha zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal

rnal 'byor nam mkha' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig la spyod pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro

dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud kyi ni/ /gsum pa yi ni dang po'o/ /de yi sbyor ba rnyed nas ni/ /sngags kyi de bzhin khyad par nyid/ /snying po yi ni snying po'i chos/ /rab

sbyor gsang zhing gsung ba yi/ /de nyid de nyid de las mchog /snying po'i de nyid bsdus pa'o/ /bla ma'i ma ning gnyis bzung la/ /rtsa bar bskor zhing mnan par bya/ /spyi bor 'od dang zla ba'o/ /sa bon bskyed pa'i rim pa bzhin/ /

zla ba dkar dang kun da'i mdog /gtso bo'i sngon du sbyar bar bya/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa rdzogs bya zhing / /dbyangs yig mngon par mthong ba ni/ /las rnams gsum gyi sngon du ni/ /bla ma'i yi ge sngon du'o/ /dkar dang ser dang

dmar po'o/ /bzhi pa dag pa ru ni brjod/ /myu gu'i gnas ni gtso bo nyid/ /srid pa mchog tu sgrol ba'o/ /dbyangs yig dbyangs kyi bsgom pa ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis mtshon par bya/ /don grub 'dod pas bzlas pa yi/ /

ban du ka yi me tog 'dra/ /rdo rje dbyug pa la rtag tu/ /de nyid du na rnam par thim/ /dkar po zla bas mnan pa yi/ /gnyis ka bsgoms pas bkru bar bya/ /pad ma rdo rje zla ba dang / /bdud rtsi yis ni bkru bar ldan/ /

dang po'i sa bon gtso bo yis/ /dbyangs yig kun la khyab pa'o/ /dkar zhing dag la mnyam pa'i 'od/ /gsum pa'i las kyi sa bon ni/ /bzhi par nam yang ma yin no/ /ji ltar dang po mthar gnas pa'i/ /khyad par dbyangs

yig sa bon nyid/ /mtha' yi sngon du sa bon nyid/ /de bzhin sngon du nyis 'gyur ro/ /bzhi po mnyam pa'i cha ru ni/ /mnyam pa'i gnas su sbyar bar bya/ /bzhi pa gsum pa'i sa bon ni/ /mgo smos go ba'i lus nyid

do/ /yi ge gsum gyi lus nyid ni/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dbyangs yig dngos/ /lus dang lus sogs yi ge ni/ /lcags kyu yis ni mnan par bya/ /dmar dang gnag sogs sa bon ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi khyad par du/ /lnga

pa drug pa'i sa bon ni/ /thams cad sgra yi yi ge'o/ /dkar dang ser la lci bar bshad/ /dmar dang sngon po de bzhin yang / /zhi rgyas dbang la sogs pa ni/ /kun kyang sgra yi dbye ba'o/ /thams cad las la sgra
yis ni/ /kha dog bzhi ru rab tu grags/ /bdun pa brgyad pa'i sa bon gyis/ /skyes bu rang 'dod pa yi las/ /nges par lus ni sdom pa dang / /gnyis pa'i sa bon gyis mnan pa'o/ /yang bas dmar dang gnag

la sbyar/ /rnal 'byor pa yi khyad par du/ /mtshams ni bcad cing mnan pa'i las/ /gnyis pa lcags kyu'i yi ge ni/ /rang bzhin yi ge ming gi ni/ /de nyid las rnams 'gugs pa dang / /sa bon 'di ni dbye ba'o/ /

kha dog dmar po mchog gi 'od/ /thams cad 'dres pa'i sa bon ni/ /dbyangs yig bskyed pa'i sa bon ni/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa'o/ /ma ning gis bskyed sa bon ni/ /brtan zhing rtag pa'i sa bon no/ /bud

med dang ni skyes pa 'am/ /'di nyid kun nas rab tu sbyar/ /sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa ni/ /tha ma bzhi ni rnam spangs pa/ /dkar dang kun da zla ba'i mdog /nyi ma'i yi ge rnam par shes/ /tha ma bzhi ni lnga pa dang / /sde tshan

drug pa yang dag ldan/ /kun nas mtshan mo'i stong par ni/ /khyad par du ni shes par bya/ /bdud rtsi chu yi sa bon ni/ /dkar zhing shel ltar mnyam pa'i 'od/ /de nyid kun gyi de nyid ni/ /kun nas bdud rtsi grub pa'o/ /lha min

grub pas 'gugs pa dang / /lha dang mi dang gnod sbyin dang / /thams cad las rnams grub pa ni/ /sa bon 'di ni khyad par nyid/ /sbom po ma ning gnyis kyis la/ /lcags sgrog bzhin du kha sprad pa/ /rtsa bar yang ba nyis

'gyur ro/ /spyi bor bdud rtsi rnam par dgod/ /steng du thig le 'bar ba'i mchog /sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin sku/ /sa bon lnga yi ngo bo nyid/ /rnam bzhir phye zhing phye ba yis/ /lce rtsa lce rtsar gsungs pa ni/ /kha dog dmar po

mnyam pa'i 'od/ /zhi dang chu yi bye brag la/ /hU~M gi rnam pa rkan la sbyar/ /rtsa bar sgra dang 'od bral ba/ /bar ma yi ni dbyangs su gsungs/ /gal te 'dod na lha yi lus/ /khyad par du ni zhi ba'i las/ /snying ka'i rtsa bar gsungs

pa ni/ /kha dog ser po'i 'od mnyam pa/ /sbom po'i sgra dang thig le dang / /rgyas pa dang ni me yi las/ /lte bar sgra dang 'joms pa ni/ /kha dog dmar po 'od mnyam pa/ /sbom po'i sgra dang ldan pa'i 'od/ /dbang gi las

la rab tu sbyar/ /rna rtser sbrid pa gsum pa ni/ /kha dog sngon po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /yang ba'i sgra yi 'od du ni/ /ldan par blo dang ldan par bskul/ /bskrad dang gsad dang bcing ba dang / /mnan dang gdug sogs bskrad

pa dang / /gtor ma la sogs nag po'i las/ /hU~M gi rnam pa sbrid par sbyar/ /de nyid de nyid bzhi par ni/ /hU~M gi rnam pa nye bar mtshon/ /sa bon thams cad 'byin mdzad pa/ /hU~M gi rnam pa dbang phyug mchog /thams cad 'byin pa'i

ngo bo bas/ /hU~M gi yi ge mchog gi lha/ /stong nyid yi ge'i hU~M gyur pas/ /hU~M gi rnam pa phyag 'tshal bstod/ /stong pa'i gzugs dang rab ldan pa/ /dngos dang dngos med 'byin mdzad pa/ /btso ma gser dang 'dra ba'i mdog /

sgra dang thig le yang dag ldan/ /ri rab rgya mtsho ri ni grags/ /dang po'i sde tshan bzhi ba la/ /rtsa bar re pha sgra dang ni/ /spyi bo'i steng du 'bar ba'o/ /kha dog dmar po mnyam ba'i 'od/ /bzhi pa'i las ni rnam spangs pa/ /las

rnams kun gyi sdom du'o/ /rmongs shing lus kun rmongs byed pas/ /rmongs pa'i sa bon du ni grags/ /sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa dang / /gnyis pa'i sa bon blangs byas nas/ /mtha' ru stong pa gnyis kyis so/ /kha dog dkar po

mnyam ba'i 'od/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba sogs/ /rang gi 'dod pa'i gnas su gzhag /bzhag pa las la rnal 'byor pas/ /blo ldan yi ge 'di yis bzhag /stong pa'i sde tshan la spyad la/ /de yi bzhi pa gzung bar bya//

rtsa bar ma ning sbom po dang / /brtan pa dang ni g.yo bar lngan/ /lha dang lha min grub pa dang / /mi dang gnod sbyin rnal 'byor pa/ /lha rnams kun nas g.yo ba ni/ /gsungs pa'i sa bon gyis 'gugs byed/ /sde tshan dang po'i sa bon

ni/ /rtsa bar re pha mnan pa dang / /lcags kyus mgor ni rnam par dgod/ /steng du zla ba'i 'od dang bcas/ /kha dog dmar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /lcags kyu yis ni snying po bsgrub/ /lcags kyu yi ge sa bon bzhin/ /lcags kyu yis

ni kun 'gugs pa'o/ /stong par rlung gi sa bon ni/ /sde tshan brgyad kyi dang po la/ /rtsa bar sgra yis dkri bar bya/ /spyi bor zla tshes thig le dang / /rlung gi kha dog drag po yis/ /lus can kun ni bskul bar bya/ /bskul ba'i

las kyi sa bon gyis/ /sa bon de nyid kun tu sbyar/ /lnga pa sde tshan gnyis pa yi/ /gsum pa'i yi ge gzung byas la/ /yig ge gsum pas mnan par bya/ /re pha rtsa bar sbyar ba dang / /steng du bdud rtsi'i thigs pa'o/ /kha

dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /dgyes pa la sogs sa bon gyis/ /lha tshogs kun nas mnyes par byed/ /sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni/ /gsang ba'i sgra ni rtsa bar ro/ /steng du bdud rtsi'i thig le dang / /dkar zhing

yid 'ong shin du 'bar/ /mchod pa'i sngags kyi dus dang ni/ /gtor ma sbyin sreg phyag rgya sogs/ /rgyas pa'i las ni thams cad la/ /rgyas pa'i sa bon du ni grags/ /dang po'i sde tshan bzhi pa la/ /rtsa bar re pha sgra dang ni/ /

spyi bo'i steng du 'bar ba'o/ /kha dog dmar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /zhi ba'i las ni rnam spangs pa/ /las rnams kun gyi sngon du'o/ /rmongs shing lus kun rmongs byed pas/ /rmongs pa'i sa bon du ni grags/ /sde tshan lnga pa'i

gsum pa dang / /gnyis pa'i sa bon blang byas pa/ /mtha' ru stong pa gnyis kyis so/ /kha dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba sogs/ /rang gi 'dod pa'i gnas su gzhag /bzhag pa'i las la

rnal 'byor pas/ /blo ldan yi ge 'di yis gzhag /stong pa'i sde tshan la spyad la/ /de yi bzhi pa gzung bar bya/ /rtsa bar ma ning sbom po dang / /steng du bdud rtsi'i thig le'o/ /'jigs pa bsrung ba'i las nyid la/ /

kha dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /rnal 'byor de nyid 'dod pa yi/ /sa bon 'di nyid kyis bsrung ngo / /bsreg pa'i yi ge sngags nyid ni/ /dbye ba rnam pa gsum du bshad/ /dkar dang ser dang dmar sogs kyi/ /
las gsum gyi ni mtha' ru'o/ /bdun pa yi ni mtha' bzung la/ /brgyad pa gnyis pa yi ni gdan/ /bdud rtsi yi ni gdan du chu/ /kha dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /ma ning sde tshan gyis bskyed pa'i/ /me ltar
dmar ba mnyam pa'i 'od/ /logs su dbyangs yig dbyug pa'o/ /zhi ba la ni bsreg pa'i mthar/ /bdud rtsi'i sa bon kha dog ser/ /chu yi sa bon dkar ba'i gdan/ /logs su dbyangs yig dbyug pa'o/ /brgyad kyi
mtha' ma kun nas 'bar/ /rdo rje 'od bzhin 'bar ba'i me/ /sa bon 'od bzhin 'bar bcas pa/ /dbyangs yig dbyug pa'i bsreg pa'o/ /rgyas pa'i bsreg pa'i mtha' mar ro/ /de yi bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i ni/ /brgyad

mtha'i logs su dbyug pa'o/ /kun nas dmar dang dmar ba yi/ /mthar ni dbyug pa lcags kyu'o/ /dbu mar drang ba'i sems kyis ni/ /dbyug pa'i dbugs kyis bzla bar bya/ /chags pa'i las la rnal 'byor pas/ /bsreg pa'i

yig ge rnam pa gsum/ /rnam pa bzhi las don gnyer bas/ /'joms pa'i yig ge gnyis su shes/ /bskrad dang bsad dang dbye ba dang / /mnan dang nye bar bzlog pa la/ /stong pa'i sde tshan gnyis pa ni/ /dbyug pa glo ru rnam par

sbyar/ /nyi ma'i sde tshan gsum pa las/ /dang po gnyis pa'i glo ru'o/ /kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po/ /'od zer me bzhin kun nas ldan/ /rdo rje sa bon mnyam 'bar las/ /lus kyi dbus su dbug bar bya/ /bsad dang gdug pa

bskrad la sogs/ /drag po'i las ni thams cad la/ /dngos grub 'dod pa rnal 'byor pas/ /'joms pa'i yi ge mtha' mar ro/ /de yi sa bon ldan pa ni/ /sngon gyi dbyug tshogs rnam par spangs/ /dang po dbu yi steng rnams su/ /kha

dog sngon po rab rno bas/ /gsad dang dbye dang gdug pa ni/ /khro bo'i lha yis bskrad par bya/ /'joms pa'i yi ge'i mtha' mar ni/ /sa bon 'di yis sbyar bar bya/ /dkar po'i sde dang sde tshan gyi/ /dang po'i dang po blang byas la/ /kun nas rdo rje'i

sa bon gyis/ /sa bon yig ge phyed dang gnyis/ /'pho bar sbyor ba'i sngon dus su/ /rnam shes gong du bskul ba'o/ /lte bar rtsa ba'i phyogs nas ni/ /yig ge phyed dang gnyis kyis drang / /brgyad pa'i mtha' ni sngon du'o/ /ma la ta yi sbyor

dus su/ /'pho bar sbyor bas sngon du'o/ /'pho ba'i dus kyi sngon du ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu spyad/ /ud pa li ta sa bon/ /sbyang bya'i yi ge phyed dang gnyis/ /dngos dang dngos med sa bon las/ /sgra dang thig le rnam par sbyar/ /rlung gi

rtsa ba'i gnas su ni/ /sgra dang sgra yis bstan pa'o/ /chu shing me tog lte bar gnas/ /sa bon 'di yis bsgyur bar bya/ /sngon du sbyor ba'i bsam gtan dang / /mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis bcing / /bdun pa'i mtha' yi sa bon ni/ /

bdud rtsi'i sa bon sa bon gyis/ /bzlog byas rgyas pa'i gnas su ni/ /chu shing me tog lta bur gyis/ /ji ltar sde tshan gsum pa ni/ /yi ge gsum pa gzung byas la/ /dbyug par phyi ma'i sa bon dang / /'od dpag gis ni sngon dkris pa/ /de

nyid de nyid kun dang ni/ /sa bon sa bon mchog gi gtso/ /theg pa rnam gsum dag byed pa/ /A li'i sa bon rab tu grags/ /sde tshan brgyad pa'i gnyis pa la/ /lcags kyu yis ni spyi bor mnan/ /spyi bor zla tshes thig le dang / /kha dog

dmar po mchog gi 'od/ /sems can kun nas rmongs byed pa/ /yid dbye ba la kun nas sbyar/ /kun tu rmongs ni sa bon no/ /rmongs pa'i las la rab tu sbyar/ /brgyad pa'i mtha' yi sa bon ni/ /spyi bor lcags kyu 'dren pa dang / /rtsa bar re

pha'i sa bon no/ /kha dog sngon po 'bar ba yi/ /dri dang me tog ro sogs ming / /las kyes kun nas 'phrog par byed/ /'phrog byed ming gi sa bon gyis/ /'phrog pa'i las la kun tu sbyar/ /bdun pa dkar po'i sa bon ni/ /dung dang kun tu

mnyam pa'i 'od/ /bdud rtsi chu yi sa bon no/ /chu yi yi ge ming can no/ /shar ldan pa'i sa bon ni/ /kha dog ser po 'od mnyam pa/ /me bzhin 'bar zhing 'bar ba yi/ /me yi yi ger rnam par grags/ /sde tshan brgyad kyi dang por ni/ /de

nyid stong pa'i dngos po dang / /rlung gi sa bon dmar po ni/ /rlung gi sa bon du ni grags/ /brgyad pa'i mtha' yi sa bon ni/ /kha dog sngon po'i 'od mnyam pa/ /snying gar sa yi sa bon ni/ /de nyid pa yi sa bon no/ /'di rnams sa bon sa bon

la/ /thig le'i yi ge rtsa bar ro/ /rtsa bar nyis 'gyur re pha dang / /rlung gi sa bon gsum par ro/ /rtsa bar sgra ni bzhi pa'o/ /steng du thig le sbyar ba dang / /de nyid bzhi pa'i sa bon ni/ /bzhi pa'i yi ge drug pa'o/ /rmongs pa chu yi sa bon ni/ /

g.yo ba'i rlung gi sa bon dang / /sa ni nyon mongs par 'gyur ro/ /phyugs ni me la kun tu sbyar/ /yi ge brgyad pa'i sa bon ni/ /rnal 'byor ma brgyad sems dang bcas/ /bdag nyid de nyid gtso bo yi/ /'khor ba thams cad

gcod mdzad pa/ /thams cad kun nas spyi bo dang / /yig ge kun nas gnas pa'o/ /sa bon 'di ni kun nas bzung / /ye shes sa bon zhes bya'i ming / /rtag pa'i rtsa bar mnan pa dang / /sgra dang thig ler sbyar bar bya/ /dkar po kun da zla

ba'i mchog /ye shes rnam shes sa bon nyid/ /rgyu ba'i gzugs kyi sa bon ni/ /sa bon sa bon de bas mchog /ye shes rnam shes bya ba'i ming / /las kun la ni rab sbyar bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba ni/ /zhi ba'i gzugs can rdzu

'phrul che/ /mthar ni swA hA ring por ldan/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'i sngags pa yis/ /gnyi ga lus la bsgoms nas ni/ /'di yis lha mo sbyar bar bya/ /sngags pas bsreg pa'i sngags la ni/ /sngon du dbyug pa med pa'o/ /lha mo'am

yang na lha mo la/ /khro bo'i gzugs 'joms la sogs pa'i/ /'joms pa'i yi ge mthar bzhag ste/ /bzlas shing bsnyen pa la sogs bya/ /gzugs dang gzugs can dngos po yis/ /khro bo khro mo khyad par nyid/ /bsreg

dang 'joms pa'i sa bon ni/ /khyad par dang ni khyad par can/ /de nyid de nyid kun gyis ni/ /rab tu spyad cing blta bar bya/ /de nyid med pa'i sngags pa ni/ /dngos grub ring du bstan pa yin/ /bsgrub pa'i dus su lha nyid kyi/ /sa

bon mtha' ru bzlas pa bya/ /mchog tu zhi ba'i de nyid la/ /dang po dbyangs yig mtha' ru'o/ /khro bo khro mo'i lha la ni/ /rdo rje'i sa bon mtha' mar ro/ /lha mo kun gyi de nyid la/ /bdud rtsi'i yi ge mtha' mar ro/ /dang po sngags kyi

sa bon ni/ /phyag 'tshal gcig ni rnam spangs nas/ /bdag nyid ming gi sa bon dang / /gnyi ga yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu/ /stong dang stong pa'i sa bon ni/ /bar ma bsgrub pa'i lha nyid do/ /nyin mo'i yi ge dang po ru/ /sgrub bya bsgrub

pa'i ming nyid ni/ /de yi bsgrub pa'i las rnams ni/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rnam par mtshon/ /sngags pas sngon gyi dus su ni/ /rab tu lta zhing spyad par bya'o/ /nyin mo stong pa'i bsgrub pa ni/ /'chi bar yang ni the tshom med/ /nyin mo nyin mo nyin

mo bsgrub/ /stong pa stong pa bar ma'o/ /go bzlog pa'i sa bon ni/ /lhag pa'i yi ge brtsi bar byed/ /nyin par bsgrub bya lhag ma ni/ /bsgrub pa po la bu lon ni/ /bsgrub bya stong pa lhag pa ni/ /dgra nyid pas na 'bras bu med/ /rab tu blta zhing

spyad pa yis/ /sngags kyi bsgrub pa shes pa yin/ /sngon du ma ning sa bon dang / /de bzhin bsgrub bya'i ma ning nyid/ /dbus su ma ning yi ge ni/ /dngos grub stong par bshad pa yin/ /de nyid 'di yi sa bon gyis/ /rang 'dod lha nyid bsgrub par

bya/ /thog ma tha ma khyad par du/ /dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming nyid do/ /mtho dang dma' dang bar ma dang / /khyad nyid kyang ni khyad par ro/ /zhi dang rgyas pa la sogs la/ /khyad par sa bon ldan pa nyid/ /stong pa'i sde tshan gnyis pa la/ /rtsa bar

re pha sgra nyid dang / /steng du zla tshes thig le dang / /kha dog ser po kun 'od la/ /lha mo rnal 'byor ma kun gyis/ /snying po yi ni snying po mchog /gong du phyag 'tshal yi ge dang / /'don bzhin ming ni dbus su'o/ /mtha' dang mtha' ni bsreg

sogs nyid/ /thams cad du ni kun nas ldan/ /stong pa'i sde tshan gnyis pa la/ /spyi bor e yi rnam pas mtshan/ /rtsa bar nA da thig ler bcas/ /kha dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /dga' byed las kyi sa bon gyis/ /rnal 'byor ma kun

dga' bar byed/ /de nyid kun gyi sa bon ni/ /rnal 'byor ma kun gyis rab spyad/ /de nas sman sogs rim pa ni/ /khyad par nyid du sbyar bar bya/ /bla bre bla bre nyid dang ni/ /spos dang bdug pa dri la sogs/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i cho ga yis/ /mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin brlabs pa/ /sngon du gnyis med

gtor mar ldan/ /dri yi maN+Dal gru bzhi pa/ /dbus su rnal 'byor pas bri ba/ /gur gum shin tu dri zhim ldan/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/ /blo dang ldan pas gru bzhi bri/ /dbang po la sogs re'u mig nas/ /blo dang ldan pas yi ge dgod/ /

dngos dang dngos med ldan pa yis/ /de yi sa bon pam dbus so/ /nyin mo'i yig ge thams cad nyid/ /lhag ma'i sde tshan brgyad pa yi/ /sa bon mnyam par gzhag pa dgod/ /sgra dang thig ler yang dag ldan/ /kha dog dmar po 'od

mnyam pa'o/ /gu gul dbang po'i lag pa dang / /rmongs byed rengs byed de bzhin sgra/ /sad ta si hA tsam pa ka /ku tu ru dang ko li ki/ /son rtsi ka dang ba bla dang / /gu gul ru rta dur ba kar/ /me dang dri dang gur gum dang / /tsan dan gi wang yang

dag ldan/ /sha kha ra dang li shi dang / /pri yang ku dang ge sar dang / /chu srin sder mo nub phyogs cha/ /re'u mig kun dang gnas kun tu/ /dbang po la sogs sman rim bzhin/ /rdzas ni re re re re dang / /cha la sa bon bzlas par bya/ /phyag

'tshal dang po bsreg pa mtha'/ /brgyad dang brgyad du bzlas pa bya/ /cha dang ldan sogs sa bon ni/ /sman dang ldan na de bas mchog /bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /gu gul la sogs sbyar byas nas/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo rgyal dbang la/ /

mkhas pas byin pas dbang du byed/ /bdag nyid lnga yi lnga dang ni/ /sha da wa sogs sbyar byas nas/ /re pha'i rdzas la bsgoms byas na/ /ji ltar sngon dang sngon bzhin nyid/ /rje rigs bram ze dmangs rigs dang / /skyes pa'am yang na bud med

la/ /bza' ba'i dngos po byin pa yis/ /dbang du 'gyur bar yongs su grags/ /smyo byed la sogs rnam pa lnga/ /son rtsi ka yi cha dang sbyar/ /brtul zhugs dman pa'i rigs rnams ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni dbang du byed/ /me da la sogs

sman rims dang / /mi yi mar khu yang dag ldan/ /mkhas pas dpyad cing brtags pa yis/ /mnyam pa'i cha dang cha ru bya/ /thig le ru ni sbyin byas na/ /rgyal po'i rigs la 'gro ba dang / /tha snyad las ni rnam par rgyal/ /'gro ba

yang dag rmongs par byed/ /dang po sha kha ra sogs dang / /tsan dan dang ni rnam par sbyar/ /sde tshan gcig gi cha dang ni/ /tsan dan gyi ni cha nyid dang / /byams pa'i gnas su rnal 'byor pa/ /yan lag nying lag byug byas nas/ /dri ni sna la

mnams tsam gyis/ /nges par dbang du byed pa'o/ /'tshams dang 'tshams kyis sha kha ra/ /sbrang rtsi'i cha dang sbyar nas ni/ /mchog tu bsgoms shing bdug pa yis/ /kun nas nges par dbang du byed/ /'tshams kyi nang gi kun bzung

nas/ /sha kha ra yi cha dang bsre/ /bdug pas bdug cing bdug byas nas/ /mi ni kun nas rmongs par byed/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro sprul nas ni/ /sa bon so so'i sa bon nyid/ /kun nas brgya phrag gcig

tu'o/ /de bzhin du ni dmar po'i las/ /de yi rjes ni kun bzung la/ /bdag nyid ye shes lha ru'o/ /nyi ma'i lag pa'i rdzas rnams ni/ /kha dog dmar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ de nyid sa bon bzlas pa yis/ /g.yo ba dang ni ltung bar byed/ /snying

ga'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni/ /de yi dbus su sa bon ni/ /skyed par re pha thig le can/ /khri phrag gcig tu bzlas pa yis/ /gnyis kyis ltung ba'am g.yo bar byed/ /phyi nas

gtor ma'i las kyis ni/ /g.yo dang mi g.yo grub par byed/ /gu gul la sogs srin bu lngas/ /rtsa ba brgyad dang sbyar byas nas/ /phra ba'i sgo nga tsam zos pas/ /mod la myur du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sha ta tsa sogs srin bu ni/ /'o ma

bdun par sbyar byas pa'i/ /zhag bdun las lhag par zos na/ /'chi ba 'di la the tshom med/ /son rtsi kar sogs srin bu lnga/ /sbrang rtsi smyo byed lnga pa ni/ /bza' dang btung ba sbyin byas nas/ /smyo byed myos par 'gyur ba'o/ /me da la

sogs srin bu lnga/ /sbrul gyi sgo ngar bzlas byas nas/ /thig le tsam zhig zos pas ni/ /skad cig de la mdze yis 'dzin/ /kha ri'i sde tshan srin bu ni/ /mgo la sgo nga dang ldan par/ /de yi phye ma zos pa yis/ /mi ni

dbyangs dang bral bar 'gyur/ /'tshams kyi kha ra kun bzang la/ /sbrang rtsi mar gyi cha dang sbyar/ /de yi phye ma bza' byas na/ /de yi mod la gzir bas 'dzin/ /'tshams kyi nang gi yang dag gzung / /sbrang rtsi ldan cig bsgo

byas pa'i/ /phra rab tsam zhig zos pa yi/ /mod la rims kyis gdung bar byed/ /de nyid rab sbyor snying po ni/ /gsang zhing gsang ba'i lung gi don/ /ye shes ldan zhing blo ldan pa'i/ /lus kyi rim pa rnam par blta/ /dkon
mchog gsum la gnod pa dang / /slob dpon dang ni gsang smod pa/ /sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur te/ /rnal 'byor ma ni kun gyis gsungs/ /lnga pa'am lnga pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba bstan pa rdzogs s+ho// //

de nas gzhan gyi rim pa ni/ /sman rnams kyi ni khyad par nyid/ /de nyid kun gyi mchog 'gyur ba/ /mchog gi snying po snying po nyid/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas/ /cho ga rim bzhin sman dang sngags/ /de nyid gtor ma'i

las dang ni/ /dri yi re'u mig dgod par bya/ /bcu dgu dang ni sum bcu yi/ /gru bzhi pa yi re'u mig dgod/ /nyin mo stong pa'i sa bon dang / /sde tshan tha ma dgod par bya/ /dbang po la sogs gnas rnams su/ /dang

por dbyangs yig rims ji bzhin/ /re'u mig kun gyi sa bon ni/ /sman sogs bzhin du gzhag par bya/ /na ki b+ha la bi ling ga /ru rta bu ram b+ha sa ka /ka sa la sogs bdun pa ni/ /dbang ldan la sogs gnas su dgod/ /

dbang po'i lag pa shu dag dang / /rmongs byed dang ni tsan dan dang / /tsan dan dang ni gur gum nyid/ /bdun pa'i gnas su gzhag par bya/ /cha mnyam pa ni gnyis pa'o/ /ga bur sa li shu dag dang / /gur gum rkun

mo gi'u wang dang / /sbrang rtsi bdun pa yi ni cha/ /gsum pa'i ro mchog sde tshan no/ /sa rdzar gu gul ru rta dang / /g+han d+hi kha ra kun du ru/ /me tog phreng ba bdun pa ni/ /bzhi pa'i re'u mig gnas su'o/ /ka ko la dang sha ta

dang / /ge sar so rtsi rgya skyegs dang / /pa tra bdun pa'i cha nyid ni/ /lnga pa'i las su yongs su grags/ /dri dang bcud len k+Sha ra dang / /yung ba dang ni kha ra tra/ /k+Shau dra pa si ling gi cha/ /drug pa'i re'u mig mig yin no/ /dan ta dan

ta ku su ma/ /rams dang gar sma be te ki/ /sa ra rnams ni bdun pa'i cha/ /bdun pa'i sman gyi rim pa'o/ /brgya phyed gcig gis ma tshang bar/ /re'u mig kun sogs sman nyid do/ /re re la yang sngags 'di ni/ /brgya phrag mngon

par rab sngags te/ /dang po chu srin sde tshan sogs/ /bdag nyid bdun gyi bdun pa ni/ /mthar ni phye ma sbyar byas te/ /shin tu zhib mor mkhas pas brtag /'dus pa rgyal po rgyal dbang gi/ bza' dang btung dang ldan par

sbyin/ /thams cad bdag nyid 'dod pa bzhin/ /ku nas thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /dang po la sogs sde tshan ni/ /phra zhing zhib par rab tu bya/ /phye ma kun nas blangs nas ni/ /bdag nyid mchil mas de bzhin bdun/ /bza' dang

ston mor cho ga bzhin/ /rab tu mnyam par bzhag pas bya/ /skyes pa 'am ni bud med dam/ /thams cad kun nas 'ong 'gyur ro/ /dang por shel gyi sde tshan ni/ /mnyam por cha de phyed mar bya/ /mi yi snum dang kun tu sbyar/ /grib ma

dang ni grib mar bskams/ /cho lor 'jug cing dga' ba dang / /snga dro thig le sbyin byas na/ /rgyal po'i rigs la nyer 'gro ba/ /skye bo skal can myur du 'gyur/ /sardza sngon sogs dbang por sbyar/ /phye ma zhib tu byas nas ni/ /sbrang

rtsi kha ra'i cha nyid dang / /rang 'dod spos chu rab sbyar nas/ /mi dga' ba kun dga' ba dang / /ngag gi 'dren pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de yi bdug pas bdugs pa'i lus/ /'gro ba kun tu rmongs par 'gyur/ /ka ko la sogs dang ldan pas/ /phye

ma mnyam por char byas te/ /tsan dan dang po thams cad kun/ /cha gsum du ni bya bar bya/ /mi byams sman zhing bkur ba ni/ /skal ldan mdzes par 'dod 'gyur na/ /de yi yan lag la byugs la/ /'gro ba rnam par rmongs byed yin/ /

dri yi sde tshan bdun par ni/ /ka ko la sogs dang ldan par/ /mar dang 'o ma dang bsres nas/ /kun gyi cha dang sbyar byas nas/ /grib ma'i grib mar skam par bya/ /rigs dman kla klo la sogs kun/ /yid mi 'ong ba byams par 'gyur/ /

'di yi sbyor ba sbyin byas nas/ /rang gi 'dod bzhin byed pa'o/ /tan ti mnyam pa'i cha nyid dang / /rgya skyegs la sogs kun gyi cha/ /me la bsro bar rab tu sbyar/ /ka ran dza yi rdog ma tsam/ /yid du mi 'ong ba

yi gnas/ /khar bcug kun tu de yi ngag /tshigs gsum tshig tu brjod pa yis/ /bdag 'dod pa bzhin dbang du byed/ /mtshams kyi tan ti la sogs pa/ /smyo byed chu ni lnga pa dang / /bdag nyid bcings par sngon ldan pas/ /

mchog tu bsgoms na 'dug par bya/ /bdug pa 'di yis bdug byas na/ /sgrub pos sna la mnams tsam gyis/ /de yi rang 'dod su la ti/ /dbang du gyur par yongs su grags/ /'tshams kyi sa ra la sogs blang / /phye ma zhib

mor byas na ni/ /bdag nyid dri ma lnga dang ni/ /kun nas cha ni mnyam byas la/ /phye ma zhib mo yang dag ldan/ /'di yi sman dang ldan pa yis/ /bsgrub bya'i lus la reg byas na/ /nges par dbang du byed pa'o/ /cha dang cha yi bye brag ni/ /

mkhas shing bzo bar sbyar bar bya/ /khyad par sman gyi las 'di ni/ /cho ga bzhin du rnam par blta/ /rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba ni/ /pad ma'i gdan gyi gdan la bzhugs/ /kun nas yongs su rdzogs pa yi/ /btso ma gser dang 'dra

ba'i 'od/ /snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /a ni thig le yang dag ldan/ /'bar zhing rab tu 'bar ba yis/ /bsgrub bya'i sems ni 'gugs par byed/ /mi 'gyur yi ge'i thig le dang / /rtsa bar sgra yis rab tu sbyar/ /mthar

ni bdud rtsi'i yi ge'i ming / /'bum phrag gcig gis rab tu bsgrub/ /sman gyi sbyor bar ldan pa ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil du kun nas bya/ /gtor ma de nyid byin brlabs nas/ /'bum dang 'bum du bsnyen pa bya/ /sngon du dan ti'i yan

lag dang / /thig le brgya par kun nas ldan/ /bza' ba'i dngos pos sbyin byas na/ /mi yi skad cig rnam par sbangs/ /dan de la sogs srin bu dang / /ra yi 'o mar bsres byas na/ /gang gis zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /zhag bdun na

ni nges par 'chi/ /sku gsum srin bu bdun dang ni/ /smyo byed chu ni rnam pa lnga/ /bza' bar zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /smyo zhing smyo bar 'gyur ba'o/ /rams gyi lam sogs sde tshan dang / /dkar por srin bu sbyar nas ni/ /bza' ba'i dngos

por sbyin byas na/ /thams cad kun nas 'thab par 'gyur/ /ka mi srin bu'i sde tshan dang / /mi yi mar khu dang sbyar nas/ /phye mas yan lag la reg na/ /skal ngan mi byams pa dag ni/ /tsi te sde tshan bdun pa ni/ /nor bur

sgo nga ldan bzlas nas/ /thig le tsam zhig zos pa yis/ /mod la tshor ba mi bzad 'byung / /sa la la sogs sde tshan dang / /nyi shur ra yi chu yis sbangs/ /cung zhig tsam zhig zos pa yis/ /nyi ma nyi shu na de 'chi/ /shan ti 'tshams

kyi srin bu dang / /mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar nas ni/ /bza' dang btung ba zos nas ni/ /mdze nad kyi ni yan lag gzir/ /mtshams sogs thang chu'i srin bu ni/ /bza' dang btung bar rab byin na/ /rnam par rmongs cing dran pa nyams/ /

de nyid med cing mnyam gzhag med/ /rab sbyor snying po bsdus pa nyid/ /gsang zhing gsang bar byas pa yi/ /rmongs shing blun pa'i sems can sogs/ /sbyor ba 'di yis longs spyod ldan/ /dkon mchog gsum la brnyas
pa dang / /slob dpon dang ni gsang smod dang / /sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ba/ /rnal 'byor ma ni kun gyis gsungs/ /nyon mongs rmongs sogs bag chags dang / /shes rab zhan cing yid mi gzhungs/ /sngags

kyi snod min snying rje med/ /sman gyi bya ba la 'jug pa'o/ /gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud kyis ni/ /gsum pa yi ni gsum pa'o/ /de yi sbyor ba mthong nas ni/ /brda yi skad kyis bsdus pa'o/ /le'u bzhi pa zhes bya ba

rdzogs s+ho// // de yi rtsa ba'i snying po'i don/ /sngags kyi sbyor ba'i rim pa yi/ /de nyid bsdus pa'i 'grub pa'o/ /de nyid sman pas lus nyon mongs/ /shes rab thabs ni rgyur gyur pas/ /rang 'dod las ni bsgrub
par bya/ /shes rab ye shes snang ba'o/ /thabs ni rigs pa'i tshul nyid do/ /rnal 'byor shes rab rtsa ba 'di/ /thabs ni de yi grogs nyid do/ /gang zhig thabs dang shes rab ldan/ /nyon mongs lus las

rnam par rgyal/ /srid pa'i nyes skyon du ma yang / /srid pa dang ni rmongs pa gzhi/ /dngos po'i gnas ni yongs brtag pas/ /de phyir shes rab yongs su spangs/ /dngos med dngos po yang ma yin/ /skye ba dang ni 'gag pa med/ /dngos

po yongs su gnas pa med/ /'jigs pa yi ni rnam pa med/ /dngos dang dngos med la sogs mtha'/ /dag dang ma dag dbus su ni/ /de yi mtshan nyid sngon shes nas/ /mnyam pa'i lta ba ldan par gzung / /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam grol

ba'i/ /dngos po'i 'du shes rnam par spangs/ /sangs rgyas kyis rtogs bstan bcos las/ /yongs su brtags nas snying po blang / /dngos med dngos por gzung bar bya/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin rnam par spangs/ /dngos dang dngos

med mnyam byas pas/ /'o ma bsrubs pa las ni mar/ /mchog gi snying po yang dag blang / /mnyam par lta ba 'ba' zhig go/ /bstan bcos bstan zhing yongs shes na/ /de yi mtshan nyid dngos po med/ /yang dag lam la dmigs

pa yis/ /dngos po mchog dang mchog tu 'grub/ /ji bzhin gnas kyi rim pa brten/ /ye shes mchog tu gong nas gong / /gzhan gyi gnas las 'phangs pa yi/ /mda' yis mda' ni bsnun par bya/ /gong nas gong la sogs

par blta/ /rang 'dod dngos por yang dag blang / /bdun pa'i sgra las rnam par rgyal/ /'khor ba'i dgra yi g.yul nyid ni/ /gang zhig thabs dang shes rab ldan/ /dgra ni dngos po gang du gnas/ /le lo gnyid dang 'dod pa dang / /khro

dang rmongs pa sred pa dang / /khro ba yis ni yan lag gzir/ /thabs kyis bdud ni rnam par spangs/ /le lo nyes skyon kun gyi gnas/ /gnyid kyis dge ba rnam par 'joms/ /khro ba yis ni srid pa 'dren/ /'dod pas dran pa

rnam par nyams/ /rmongs pa yis ni gnyid kyis non/ /sred pa yis ni 'khor bar 'jug /bkres par sman zhing sdang ba yi/ /bdud bdun po ni yongs su spangs/ /kun nas bdud kyis 'bigs pa yi/ /lus ni nyon mongs sdug

bsngal gnas/ /rang 'dod pa yi sems kyis ni/ /dul bar bsrubs shing mnan par bya/ /gang dang gang gi lam du ni/ /rang 'dod sems kyi 'bad pa yis/ /thams cad snying po bsdus nas ni/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni brtsam par

bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings nas/ /smon lam bla med rgyu yi ni/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ yo ga shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ badzra shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmA badzra shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ smon lam kun mchog don du ni/ /

lha nyid dmigs par bya ba yis/ /rnam shes rang 'dod par byas pas/ /sred dang rmongs pa rnam par spangs/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /bdag nyid lus ni rnam par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/ /dung

dang kun da mnyam pa'i 'od/ /bdag nyid sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung / /phyag na rdo rje dril bu dang / /sku la rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan/ /rdo rje me 'od rab 'phro ba/ /'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med par/ /dngos po dngos por

bsgom par bya/ /A li kA li rab sbyor bas/ /sa bon sa bon byung ba yi/ /phyag 'tshal bsreg pa mthar bzhag pa/ /rang 'dod pa yi sems kyis bzla/ /rims bzhin 'gags pa'i phyi nas ni/ /bdag med shin tu mnyam par

gzhag /gzugs kun rnam par dbug nas ni/ /khams gsum du ni mi rtog go/ /zla ba la sogs bdag nyid med/ /kun nas thams cad stong par rig /stong nyid stong pa stong chen dang / /dngos med dngos por bsgoms pa yis/ /

bsgoms nas lhag ma'i mtha' ru ni/ /rnam shes sgron ma lta bur 'bar/ /de yi 'od zer snang ba yis/ /khams gsum mun pa bsal nas ni/ /'bar zhing rab tu phra ba'o/ /rnam shes ye shes snang ba nyid/ /dngos dang dngos po med
pa'i dbus/ /gzugs dang gzugs med dbus nyid dang / /'du shes 'du shes med par ldan/ /yud tsam lta bar rig pa'o/ /gzugs dang stong pa la sogs dbus/ /'di yi mtshan nyid mtshon pa nyid/ /'gog pa'i sbyor

ba'i rim pa ni/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /yan lag gzir ba med pa dang / /sems kyi skyo ba med pa yis/ /rim dang rim pa tsam byas nas/ /'khor ba gcod cing gcod pa'o/ /rtag tu nyid kyi sems kyis ni/ /

yang dag byang chub rim pa bstan/ /shin tu bcad cing bltas nas ni/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni blang bar bya/ /oM b+ha ta li b+ha ta li be ta mu khi hU~M phaT swA hA/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor gyis/ /brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya/ /gzugs kun

rdzogs shing mdzes pa yi/ /btso ma'i gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ /pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs nas ni/ /rdo rje 'od zer kun nas 'phro/ /ye shes sbyor ba'i sems kyis ni/ /sngags pas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na/ /'dod dang grol

ba rgya chen po'i/ /phyis ni las rnams brtsam par bya/ /dur khrod thal ba sogs blangs la/ /snod la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de yi sol ba'i phye ma yis/ /gang du dkyil 'khor sprul pa yis/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs

bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /de yi dbus su pad ma bri/ /thod pa brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ /dri dang bdug pa mar me dang / /gtor ma'i de nyid de nyid dang / /kun nas nya phyis dngos po yi/ /sna tshogs mchod pa rgya chen po/ /ye

shes mkha' 'gro dgug pa ni/ /pho nya bzhi dang kun tu ldan/ /seng ge stag mo lce spyang dang / /'ug pa mo ni phyogs bzhir ro/ /thams cad kun nas kun tu ni/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi sems kyis mchod/ /de yi shar gyi gnas su ni/ /

me yi las ni rab tu bya/ /dur khrod shing gi lhag ma dang / /de yi shing gi ba dan gsum/ /de 'am 'on te rdol ba'i mes/ /'bad pas me ni rab tu sbar/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rgya chen po/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi bsre byas pas/ /

mchog gi sngags ni bzla bya zhing / /bsregs pas lha mo tshim par 'gyur/ /thams cad gnas dang phyogs nas ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni 'jigs pa dang / /mi bzad ku co rab sgrogs na/ /'jigs par mi bya 'joms par 'gyur/ /

dpung gi tshogs ni yan lag bzhi/ /rgyal po myur du 'ong 'gyur na/ /de la tsham ngam sbyin par bya/ /ri rab ri la sogs pa dang / /sa gzhi 'ur 'ur 'gul ba dang / /sna tshogs mi bzad dri dang ni/ /'dren pa'i sems ni 'jig mi bya/ /

sems can chen po'i rnal 'byor pas/ /khri phrag gcig tu bsreg byas na/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bdun nyid ni/ /'grub par 'di la the tshom med/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i bya ba dang / /gtor ma'i las dang las nyid dang / /lus la

ltos pa med pa yis/ /'grub par 'di la the tshom med/ /phyi nas ye shes lha mo ni/ /me yi dbus su ston par byed/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yis/ /gtor ma dang ni ar+g+ha dbul/ /zab cing rgya cher sgrogs pa yi/ /de

la lha mo tshig tu brjod/ /sems can chen po ci zhig 'grub/ /gang 'dod dngos grub rab tu smros/ /de la sgrub pos smras pa ni/ /dngos grub chen po 'grub ldan pa'i/ /gal te mchog gi dngos grub 'dod/ /grub pa brgyad ni
gsol ba gdab/ /bdun dang nyon mongs gza' sogs kyis/ /gal te yid gnyis skyes nas ni/ /til mar chen po dang ldan pa'i/ /lcags kyu chen po sbyin sreg bya/ /rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin/ /'grub par

'di la the tshom med/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i/ /mchog gi lha mo bsgrub pa ni/ /lus dang srog la mi ltos par/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /de nas ye shes de nyid mchog /shin tu phra la
rab zhi ba/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /'byung ba kun la 'dis khyab pa/ /'dod kyi bdag nyid gnas pa'i mi/ /ma rig nyon mongs gcod byed pa/ /srid pa la sogs nyon mongs rnams/ /gang du gnas
kyi rnam pa 'byung / /lus la sems shing sems pa dang / /bcu gnyis dus kyi gnas su yang / /gzugs med sems kyi longs spyod pa'o/ /rmongs pa'i gnas dang gnas su ni/ /srid pa'i ngo bo nyid du mchod/ /
rmongs pa gcod sogs rnal 'byor pa/ /srid pa'i 'dam sogs rgal dka' ba/ /dag pa'i chos kyi sgron ma yis/ /sgrib pa'i mtshan ma 'joms pa yi/ /chos dag pa yi thabs kyis ni/ /dag pa'i lus ni skyon
med pa'o/ /dngos dang dngos med ldan pa yis/ /legs byas nyes byas 'du shes can/ /'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs dag /rgya mtsho lta bur gting dpag dka'/ /bcu gnyis lus kyi bdag nyid
can/ /rmongs pa ye shes rnam par gnas/ /dag pa'i chos kyi chu yis ni/ /lhan cig gnas pa'i dri ma 'khru/ /rang bzhin pad ma'i dbye ba yis/ /nyon mongs la sogs gdung ba gcod/ /rnam rtog 'jigs pa
chen po ni/ /srid pa'i rgyu ste me bzhin no/ /de phyir rnam rtog ring du spang / /rnal 'byor pa yi 'gro ba rtogs/ /mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed byas nas/ /kun nas thams cad mnyam par blta/ /rab tu mi
gnas ming can la/ /las dang las kyi mtshan nyid med/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin yang / /bdud rtsis lus ni tshim par bya/ /rtag tu bdud rtsis mchod pa'o/ /dngos su med na rnam par brtag /lcags
kyu rnam pa lnga drangs nas/ /thams cad kun nas rim pas mchod/ /sbyor bas mkha' 'gro la sogs ni/ /bdag nyid dbang du myur du 'gyur/ /rtag tu de nyid kyis bza' zhing / /med na gzhan las rnam par
brtag /gsher ba'i bdud rtsi kun nas bsam/ /bza' ba yang na sha nyid du/ /rtag tu dga' ba'i ngo bo yis/ /rtag dang rnam rtog rnam par spangs/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i dpa' bo ni/ /dag pa'i lus su gdon mi

za/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor pa spangs pa/ /bgrod dang bgrod min rnam par spangs/ /lo ma'i dang ni 'dab ma'i rgyu/ /snod la thams cad myu gu'o/ /de yi pad ma rgyas byed pa/ /dag pa'i mtshan ma dang po'o/ /kha dog ngan

zhing dri mi zhim/ /btung ba dro ba rnam par spangs/ /dag pa'i ngo bo gcod byed pa/ /gnyis pa'i mtshan mar bstan pa'o/ /kun la dga' zhing byams pa dang / /gnod pa nam yang mi byed cing / /sems can kun la snying

brtse ba/ /gsum pa'i mtshan ma nyid du bstan/ /rtag tu stong pa'i blo ldan pas/ /zab cing rgya che'i sems kyis ni/ /thams cad rtsa bzhin du ni stong / /bzhi pa'i mtshan ma nyid du bstan/ /dag cing brtan pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /lus

gcig la ni rab ltos pa/ /rtag tu gsang sogs za ba ni/ /lnga pa'i mtshan ma ru ni gsungs/ /brtson 'grus kun nas ldan pa dang / /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /bsam gtan mchog tu brtan byed pa/ /

drug pa'i mtshan ma ru ni brtag /bzo dang rgyu rtsal nyan pa dang / /rtag tu mnyam pa'i sems dang ni/ /rtag tu sems can don la brtson/ /bdun pa yi ni mtshan mar bstan/ /mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi/ /sems can

kun gyi blo rtogs byed/ /srid pa yang dag byang chub lam/ /mtshan ma brgyad pa ru ni bstan/ /'ga' yang nam du mi smod cing / /rdzas dang rdzas min rnam rtog bcas/ /gdug pa'i bdud dang bgegs sogs dang / /rnam

par rtog pas srid par ltung / /dka' thub sdug bsngal mi bzad pas/ /bsnyen pa 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ /lus ni dka' bar spyod pa yis/ /'khor zhing srid pa'i mtha' ru'o/ /rnam rtog med pas mnyam par bya/ /dngos

po mtshan ma'i sems dang bcas/ /sbyor ba grub pa'i don du ni/ /rnam par mi rtog sems kyis bza'/ /bsgrubs pa rang 'dod snying po ni/ /g.yo dang mi g.yo dngos grub rgyu/ /chos kyi snying po snying po nyid/ /sems ni ye shes rang

bzhin ldan/ /sbyor ba'i bstan bcos cha nyid ni/ /de nyid de nyid khyad par ro/ /sbyar dang bsam gtan byas pa yis/ /rtag tu sems ni sbyar bar bya/ /rnal 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor dang / /rnal 'byor las 'das

gnas chen po/ /las bzhi dang ni rab ldan pa'i/ /ye shes kyis ni 'khor ba sgrol/ /dang por bskyed rims spyod pa dang / /dbugs kyi sbyor ba rim sogs dang / /las la sems shing sems pa dang / /dang po'i sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid

do/ /me bzhin du ni za ba dang / /mnyam pa'i nyi ma bzhin du blta/ /rna dbang rlung gi rang bzhin du/ /rna ba sgra yi mchod par ldan/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin ni/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs mchod pa'o/ /gtor mas ji skad gsungs

pa bzhin/ /gnyis pa shin tu sbyor ba'o/ /dngos dang dngos med mnyam byas nas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yang dag sbyar/ /phyag rgya chen po yi ni thabs/ /sbyor ba las 'das 'di nyid do/ /rang bzhin gyis ni legs spyad na/ /thams

cad bdag med pa las byung / /lus sogs stong par rtogs pa ni/ /bzhi pa rnal 'byor chen po'o/ /'di rnams mtshan nyid ldan pa ni/ /chen po'i sems kyi sdom pa'o/ /rtag tu bya ba der 'jug pas/ /'byung zhing 'khor bar sgrol

ba'o/ /spyan ni pad ma ltar yangs shing / /bzhin ni me tog rgyas pa 'dra/ /'dod pa lnga po nye bar bsten/ /bde bar spyod cing bde bar reg /'dod pa kun dang nyer ldan pa/ /bde ba'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya/ /rnam par rtog pa'i

rnal 'byor pas/ /srid par 'khor zhing 'jug pa'o/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /rang bzhin ldan pa'i las kyis ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /zla ba nyi ma kha sbyar nas/ /sor mo

'brel bar byas nas ni/ /dri med gsum dang dud pas sbrel/ /sems ma rdo rje rab tu grags/ /tsham ngam phur bu ra ba dang / /dra ba thams cad las nyid do/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od/ /'di'i phyag rgyar bstan par bya/ /

kha ga'i phyogs gzhan nyid dang ni/ /rtsa bar rlung dbang gnon pa dang / /spyi bor 'bar ba'i re pha dang / /mtshan ma'i mnga' bdag gis brgyan cing / /rtag tu zhi zhing mchog gi gnas/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od/ /'di

ltar sa bon mdor byas pa/ /thams cad las ni bsgrub pa'o/ /lus la sgra yis kun tu dgang / /gzugs la sogs pa zad par byed/ /sa bon lus kyi bdag nyid ni/ /sa bon lhag ma bsam par bya/ /go cha'i bsrung ba dang

bral zhing / /thams cad yan lag drug gi las/ /stong pa'i de nyid snying po ni/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/ /dmad pa dang ni bstod pa'ang med/ /ci 'byor dag pa'i bza' ba dang / /dbang po yul dang longs spyod ni/ /mnyam

pa nyid du sems kyi bya/ /sngon du rig pas smon lam rnams/ /bsgrub bya bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu rtogs/ /gang zhig yid la 'dod spyod pa/ /de yi thabs ni rdo rje'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /rked pa'i phyogs

su bzung nas ni/ /hU~M gi dbyangs kyis kun bkang zhing / /grub pa'i glu yis mnyam par bya/ /dza dza dza dza/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub bzhugs pa'i bdag po khyod/ /ha ha ha ha/ hU~M yig mgon po dam tshig bdag po

bdag phyag 'tshal/ /ba ba ba ba/ rdo rje sgrog gi gsang ba las byung sku 'dzin pa/ /a a a a/ a ho mgu ba'i rdo rje A li gcig tu thim par hU~M/ /'di ltar gsang ba'i glu chen po/ /rnal 'byor ma kun tshim byed pa/ /
rtse gcig rnal 'byor sems bcas pas/ /khu byug skad ltar snyan pa'i sgras/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa/ /khams gsum snying po'i dbus su ni/ /rlung gi nam mkha' ltar dag pas/ /sems
nyid rlung bzhin nam mkhar brjod/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /de yi dbus su rab mdzes pa'i/ /a li sa bon 'od dang bcas/ /las kyis
bon mdog tu ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas sgom par bya/ /'byin dang sdud cing gcod mdzad ma/ /A li'i sa bon rab tu grags/ /ji ltar sde tshan gsum pa yi/ /yi ge gsum pa bzung
byas te/ /glo ru dbyug pa rdo rje dang / /'og dpag gis ni dkri bar bya/ /'di ltar rnal 'byor mchog bsgom pa/ /'khor ba thams cad gcod par byed/ /phyi nas bdag nyid lus po ni/ /sems dpa' chen po
rdo rje 'dzin/ /kun nas chu yis gang bar ni/ /phyogs brgyad du ni mnyam par ro/ /de yi dbus su rab mdzes pa'i/ /pad ma dkar po yid 'ong ba'i/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /'o ma

zla ba'i sa bon 'dzin/ /phyogs brgyang du ni mnyam par ro/ de yi dbus su rab mdzes pa'i/ /pad ma dkar po yid 'ong ba'i/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /'o ma zla ba'i sa bon 'dzin/ /gdugs dkar po yis mngon par bkab/ /'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang po/ /de yi sa bon las skyes pa/ /

rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid ni/ /kun da dkar dang zla ba'i mdog /phyag gnyis pa la mdzes pa'i brang / /dbu rgyan sangs rgyas lnga yi dngos/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung gis bzhugs/ /rdo rje snying gar mtha' 'dzin cing / /g.yon
pa dril bu dku ru bstan/ /sgeg cing spro ba'i rang bzhin dang / /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang po/ /dngos po'i tshon gyis btso bar bya/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis
rab rgyas pa'i/ /rdo rje rnon po'i 'od 'phro ba/ /'jigs pa med cing gnod med par/ /dngos por dngos po bsgom par bya/ /bzlas 'dod pa yi rnal 'byor pas/ /spro ba'i sems kyis
mnyam par bsgom/ /dbus su mchog gi sa bon dang / /phyag 'tshal a lir mthar bzhag pa/ /yi ge drug pa'i sngags chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'o/ /zlos dang
bsam gtan rnal 'byor pas/ /rang 'dod las ni mngon par 'grub/ /'bum phrag gsum du bsnyen pa yis/ /de nas de yi mngon du 'grub/ /de nas kun gyi snying po ni/ /skye dang 'jig dang
rnam bral ba/ /gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor pas/ /'dod bzhin ye shes gnas rnyed pa'o/ /rdo rje dril bu de nyid dang / /ye shes sku ni gnyis kyi gzugs/ /rdo rje g.yas brkyang gnas nas
ni/ /dril bu mnan pa'i rkang pas gnon/ /pad ma rdo rje sbyar byas nas/ /phyag rgya 'ching bar mchog tu brtson/ /dril bu lag gnyis kyis mgrin par/ /rdo rje gcig gis nu mar reg /g.yon
pas gzhung tshigs mtha' ru'o/ /tshems kyis ma mchu btsir mdzad cing / /gnyis kyis sems kyi mchog brtson par/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ /steng dang 'og dang dbus gnyis

dang / /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par/ /thams cad stong pa'i de nyid ni/ /sems kyis rab tu spyad par bya/ /mthar ni sgron ma'i rnam pa'o/ /dbus su A li'i sa bon ni/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba rab tu 'phro/ /
khams gsum kun gyi cha dang bcas/ /phyis ni gzugs nyid yongs rdzogs pa/ /gnyis ka yid 'ong gzugs mdzes pa'o/ /dbyig pa rdo rje 'jam pa'i mgon/ /'od dpag shes rab kyi ni gzhi/ /
rdo rje dril bu rab sbyor bas/ /mchog gi go 'phang bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje gsang bas mtshan nas ni/ /gnyis ka mkhyud nas bzlas par bya/ /phyag 'tshal bsreg pa mthar bzhag nas/ /dbus su A li'i

sa bon ni/ /rtag pa mchog tu phra ba nyid/ /bde ba'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya/ /yid kyi mchod pa'i cho ga yis/ /kun nas yid kyis bsgrub par bya/ /shes rab rdo rje yang dag par sbyor ba'i le'u rdzogs s+ho// //

de nas thams cad snying po ni/ /mchog gi gtso bo bsdus pa'o/ /sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /gus pa yis ni gzung bar bya/ /shel gyi rnam pa'i sems kyis ni/ /dag pa'i dngos por bza' bar bya/ /sngon gyi

mtshan nyid dang ldan pa/ /dag pa'i ngo bor bsgom pa nyid/ /de nas rtog pa mi rtog pa/ /bza' dang bza' min mnyam pa nyid/ /btung dang mi btung rang 'dod du'o/ /'khor ba'i pha rol rgal 'dod pas/ /sngon du dbang bskur dpa' bo rnams/ /'bad pas

brtul zhugs bzung bar bya/ /rim pa bzhin du zla ba dang / /nyi ma 'am ni lo dus su/ /brtul zhugs mtshan nyid bzhi pa'o/ /yon tan de yi yongs su bza'/ /bcwa lnga dang ni bcu bzhi dang / /khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la'o/ /brtul zhugs rim pa 'di

nyid ni/ /nan tan gyis ni gtor ma sbyin/ /de yi las rnams thams cad ni/ /ye shes de nyid 'bras bu sogs/ /de ltar bden pa'i sngags kun gyis/ /'grub par 'di la the tshom med/ /bza' sogs ston mo'i rnal 'byor pas/ /zla ba tha ma'i nyi ma gzung / /

rang 'dod chos ni rab brtags na/ /thams cad sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /brtul zhugs ldan pa nyin re 'am/ /gal te ma 'byor pa na yang / /dbyar zla 'bring po'i tha ma ni/ /lo yi nyi ma gzung bar bya/ /mtshan nyid ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin/ /skyon med sngags

kyis sbyin byas nas/ /de yis dus rnams thams cad du/ /dpal dang phun tshogs mdun na gnas/ /rnal 'byor chos sogs la dga' bas/ /gnyis med grogs mchog rab ldan pas/ /de yis chos la brten nas ni/ /mchog gi go 'phang bsgrub par bya/ /

stong nyid kyis ni gzugs 'jig cing / /blangs pa'i chos rnams zad par byed/ /thams cad sdom pa nam mkha' ni/ /shin du mnyam par gzhag pas bsam/ /thams cad nam mkha'i gnas su ni/ /'o ma zla ba'i sa bon bsam/ /'od zer 'bar

ba mang po ni/ /dkar dang kun da zla ba'i mdog /A li'i sa bon mchog gtso bo/ /dbugs mi g.yo bas bsgom par bya/ /skad cig rnam par sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro bdag nyid ni/ /zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa nyid/ /kha dog sngon po mnyam

pa'i 'od/ /sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung gis bzhugs/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ /steng du rdo rje cod pan dang / /sangs rgyas lnga yis dbu la brgyan/ /rgod dang khro dang sgeg pa dang / /spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /smad

g.yogs glang chen lpags pa dang / /mi yi lpags pa rab tu gsol/ /mi yi yan lag lnga rus pa'i/ /rgyan kun gyis ni rab tu brgyan/ /skra yi rtse mo rab 'jam zhing / /me 'bar ba dang mnyam pa'i 'od/ /dang po'i phyag na kha T+wA~M ga /gnyis pa na ni dgra

sta bsnams/ /gsum pa na ni rdo rje'o/ /g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub zhags pa dang / /gnyis pa thod pa khrag gis bkang / /ral gri'i phyag ni steng du'o/ /rdo rje 'od zer dri ma med/ /sangs rgyas sprin ltar rab 'phro ba/ /sa yi dbus su rnam rol bar/ /

dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ /'ug pa lce spyang seng ge dang / /stag mo phyogs su rnam par bsgom/ /bya rog lce spyang bya rgod dang / /tsa li ka yi mtshams su dgod/ /'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs mche ba gtsigs/ /ha hU~M rnam par 'jigs par byed/ /'di ltar

mkha' 'gro rgyal dbang ma/ /bdag nyid sems kyis bsgom par bya/ /rang gi dbugs las phyung nas ni/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs dgod par bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yi bris sku sogs/ /de yi gnas su kun tu bsam/ /'dod dang grol ba'i go 'phang

gnas/ /gnyis med gtor ma'i lha nyid yin/ /sbyor ba'i sgo nas bsgrub pa pos/ /'di yi mchod pa'i cho ga bshad/ /bza' dang ston mo de nyid dang / /gsang ba'i mchod pas rab tu mchod/ /snying ga'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sems

kyis hU~M gi sa bon las/ /de yi gzugs la sogs bskyed pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid dgod/ /bza' ba la sogs khyad par nyid/ /dag pa'i dngos por bsgoms nas ni/ /bsgrub pa shin du mnyam gzhag pas/ /yud tsam gyis ni sbyor ba

yis/ /oM ha ho hrI swA hA/ oM gyis 'bar bar bsam pa dang / /ha yi rnam pas so sor rtogs/ /sa bon ho yis snang bar byas/ /hrI yi rnam pas dri ma sbyong / /lus kyi lha nyid tshim pa'i phyir/ /a'i rnam par rtogs par bya/ /sa bon lnga yis lha nyid

ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga nyid mngon par thim/ /oM dza~M g+h+ra~M trA~M hU~M a swA hA/ bza' ba la sogs khyad par nyid/ /sngags 'di yis ni gzung bar bya/ /oM gyis rnam pas lus dang ni/ /dza~M gyis rnam pas gzung ba dang / /g+h+ra~M gyis rnam par lto ba

dang / /trA~M gis rnam par dri med lus/ /hU~M gis rnam pas spyad par bya/ /sems kyis snying gar yi ge A/ /de nyid rtag tu mchod byas na/ /rnal 'byor pa yis sdig sbyang bya/ /dri dang mar me me tog dang / /lha bshos dang ni gtor ma yis/ /glu'i dus su dbyangs snyan

dang / /pi wang gling bu la sogs sbyar/ /rtag tu de dag gis mchod cing / /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid brjod/ /'gro dang nyal dang 'dug pa dang / /'chag dang thams cad dus nyid du/ /rtag tu sems shing sems pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsam par bya/ /

oM a mu hU~M swA hA/ ye shes gzugs brnyan sbyor ba yis/ /sa bon 'di ni bzlas byas na/ /sdig pa thams cad thag bsrings shing / /rang 'dod las ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /'byung ba lnga las gyur pa'i sdig /gang gis gsang ba dbye byas pa'ang / /rtag

tu bsgom zhing bzlas byas na/ /sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /oM ka ra ka ra pradz+nyA ma hA tIk+Sh+Na pany+tsa oM bud d+he ha/ oM kro d+ha hU~M hU~M hU~M/ a a a mu mu mu swA hA/ sngags chen po yi sa bon 'di/ /sangs rgyas sems ni mdor bsdus pa'o/ /skyon med sbyor

ba'i sgrub pa pos/ /thams cad ldan pa'i sa bon ni/ /mtshan mo yi ni mtha' nyid dang / /dang por ro hi ta dus la/ /nya phyis snod du chu dang ni/ /ma g+ha d+ha ni srang gnyis nyid/ /kun nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /bdud rtsi'i dbus su yang dag ldan/ /

bdud rtsi bsam pa'i thabs kyis ni/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas/ /las kun mngon par bsngags byas pa'i/ /de yi chu ni btung byas na/ /sdig pa thams cad 'jig pa dang / /ye shes bdud rtsi ye shes sku/ /yid gzhungs shes rab

rno ba dang / /rlung dang gzi brjid dpal 'phel zhing / /kun nas skal ldan dag dang ni/ /thos dang shes rab nor dang ni/ /rlung mkhris dug dang bad kan dang / /'dus dang glo sogs kyi gzer dang / /mig dang yan lag gzer ba ni/ /chu 'di yis

ni nad kun 'phrog /oM ra ta a bar ta ni/ sarba pA pa~M ha ran tu ma~M hU~M/ bi tra ti gro d+ha hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'di yi sngags ni sngags chen po/ /bsrung ba kun gyi bla na med/ /sngon gyi dus su gzhag byas nas/ /rnal 'byor lus ni bsrung ba'o/ /lan bdun mngon

par bsngags byas la/ /gnas lnga ru ni lan gsum mo/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni mngon bsam nas/ /spyi bo'i steng du bskur byas nas/ /rgyal po seng ge dgra sogs dang / /rkun mo dang ni me dang chu/ /rlung dang mkhris pa la sogs nad/ /'jigs byed 'jigs

pa 'joms par byed/ /oM bi mo ha ni sa~M mo ha ni/ sarba pri ye ti hU~M hU~M hU~M swA hA/ /'di yi sngags ni sngags chen pos/ /'gro kun rmongs par byed pa gsungs/ /mi byams byams pa skye byed cing / /kun nas mdza' bar gyur pa'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa yi ni

chus/ /snga dro'i dus su kha bkrus na/ /rnal 'byor pa ni grub 'dod pa/ /dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas sbyor ba mchog tu bshad/ /snying po las ni snying po mchog /rdo rje la sogs bsgom par bya/ /gnyis su med par mnyam

par 'dres/ /yan lag 'di yis tha dad bsgom/ /dug med pa yang dug gis bsnun/ /shin tu mi bzad rmongs pa yis/ /rmongs pa rnal 'byor bdag nyid 'jigs/ /'bad pas chos kyi thabs kyis ni/ /dag pa'i lus ni rnam dag byed/ /

dag pa'i sgron ma bltas pa yis/ /nyon mongs la sogs mun pa 'joms/ /nam mkha' rdo rje rdo rje la/ /sems dang sems ni rnam par thim/ /gcig sogs dngos po bsgom pa ni/ /'di yi rnal 'byor mtshan nyid do/ /me yi lhag ma sogs lhags

pa/ /dbus dang dbus su rnam par 'tsher/ /de yi 'od kyis nam mkha'i khams/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas blta/ /sa bon 'di yi myu gu las/ /A li kA li rnam par 'byung / /sa bon sa bon rab 'phro ba/ /nam mkha'i khams

su yang dag gnas/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/ /ro langs ma'i dbus su bsam/ /pad ma'i gdan la rnam par bzhugs/ /gdugs dkar po yis mngon par g.yogs/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung / /kha dog

dmar po 'od mnyam pa/ /lcags kyu zhags pa bsdigs mdzub dang / /spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /sgeg pa'i nyams kyis blta ba dang / /na bza' dmar po mngon par g.yogs/ /mchog gi sems dang sems pa la/ /

bdud rtsi'i yi ge rnam par bsam/ /lcags kyu'i rtse mor yi ge k+Shu~M/ /bzlas shing 'di yis drang bar bya/ /gzugs brnyan gyis ni yid bskyod cing / /rang gi dbugs kyis dgang bar bya/ /oM rA ga ta rA ga ta b+ha ti hU~M k+Shu~M swA hA/ lcags

kyu'i sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'dod bzhin drang / /rmongs chen shin du rmongs pa ni/ /mnyam par gzhag nas rab tu bsgrub/ /gdan bzhi pa'i rgyud kyi ni/ /sbyor ba'i gdan gyi gsum pa las/ /grub pa'i snying po

bsdus pa ni/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bsdus pa'o/ /de nas ye shes lus la ni/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas/ /bza' dang bza' ba'i bsam pa yis/ /sbyang dang rtogs par spyad par bya/ /dngos por smad pa ma

yin zhing / /gang yang brtag par mi bya'o/ /mtho dang dma' ba'i rigs la sogs/ /mnyam nyid lha ni lnga pa'o/ /gang zhig skye ba po sogs pa/ /sems kyis gnod par mi bya'o/ /gal te gnod pa byed sems na/ /rnal 'byor sdom

pa ring bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig che dang phra ba yi/ /gzhan rdzas rang gir byed pa yis/ /rku ba'i sems ni mi bya'o/ /rnal 'byor sdom pa ring ba nyid/ /brdzun dang tshig rtsub phra ma dang / /'khyal pa'i ngag ni ring du spang / /gzhan gyi sems la

gnod byas pas/ /rnal 'byor sdom pa ring ba nyid/ /don dang ling ga rab sbyor bas/ /sbyor ba'i chos kyi snying po nyid/ /rmongs pas log dkris ngag sogs kyis/ /de yi rab sbyar smad pa nyid/ /legs par byas pa'i las kyis ni/ /bde ba bskyed

pa'i lus kyis ni/ /sems can bde ba lhur len pas/ /theg pa che la legs par bslabs/ /gal te sems can gnod sogs pa'i/ /mi dga' ba yi tshig mi smra/ /sdig pa'i las ni mi bya zhing / /rnal 'byor gtsug lag mi smad do/ /

rnal 'byor 'dod dga' ma yin zhing / /rmongs pas rgyags par mi bya'o/ /phyag rgya 'ching bar rab sbyor bas/ /rang 'dod kyis ni bsten par bya/ /bsten cing bsten pa'i rab sbyor bas/ /lha nyid tshim zhing bsgrub par bya/ /sems can don gyi ngo bo yis/ /

sems can bde bas phan 'dogs byed/ /theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu che/ /'di yis lam gyis bsten par bya/ /gang dang gang du rab sbyor bas/ /de dang der ni phan pas bde/ /sems can sdom pa la sogs pas/ /de yi sems ni gnod mi bya/ /'khor

bar skyes pa'i dus na ni/ /thabs dang shes rab yang dag ldan/ /dngos po dngos med byed pa dang / /sems can don ni A lir sgyur/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa'i rgya/ /gsang ba'i gsang ba bcings pa yis/ /de yi dbus su bdud rtsi ni/ /skye zhing myu gu

'byung ba'o/ /'dab ma gsum dang kun ldan pa'i/ /A li mchog ni mtha' med do/ /gzhan yang bdud rtsi mchog nyid ni/ /phyi rol kun gyi snying po nyid/ /bdud rtsi yid 'ong skal ldan zhing / /sems can la ni snyan par ston/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi kun

gyi lus/ /btso ma gser ltar 'bar ba'o/ /cod pan bcings shing 'phyar ba dang / /phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras/ /rgod dang sgeg ba'i nyams dang ni/ /rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /steng du rdo rje lcags kyu dang / /gnyis pa rdo rje zhags pa'o/ /

g.yon pa rdo rje dril bu dang / /gsum pa lcags sgrog 'ching ba yi/ /phyag bzhi po yi phyag rgya ni/ /gsang ba gsang sogs 'ching ba dang / /lus dang kha dog 'bar ba ru/ /snang ba mtha' yas mnyam par gzhag /ha yi rnam pa'i sa bon ni/ /yi ge

mchog gi dga' bar byed/ /ho yi rnam pas lus dang lus/ /rnam snang mnga' bdag lha nyid do/ /sems dang sems pa bsgoms pas ni/ /lha nyid du ni yongs su grags/ /thams cad lus dang lus can gyi/ /srog dang sems ni 'phrog pa'o/ /

hri yi rnam pa'i sa bon ni/ /phyag na rdo rje stobs po che/ /oM gyi rnam pa gsal bar 'phro/ /kun nas sems ni rtogs mdzad pa'o/ /a yi rnam pa des tshim byed/ /blo dang ldan pas yongs su bsten/ /bdud rtsi chu yi lha mo ni/ /de yi shes bya

rtogs pa'o/ /bdud rtsi gang gis myangs pa yis/ /bdud rtsi yi ni 'bras bu thob/ /de bzhin gshegs dgyes lha mo ni/ /gzugs mdzes mchog tu yid 'ong ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam pa yis/ /phyag rgya bzhi pa bcing bar

bya/ /rnal 'byor pa ni bsgrub 'dod na/ /gnyis ni gnyis su med par bsgom/ /gnyis ni dngos po dngos med pas/ /ye shes ldan pas yongs su gsal/ /nga rgyal chen pos bcings pa ni/ /spros pa'i sems dang ldan pas bcings/ /sgeg dang khro

ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /lha mo'i snying po nyid du thim/ /nyi ma'i lag pa'i gdan la ni/ /zla ba'i lag pas reg byas la/ /de yis 'khyud cing 'khyud nas ni/ /lha mo'i ye shes nyid du thim/ /lto ba'i ye shes me yi lha/ /de yi gnas su tshim par bya/ /

shes rab thabs la thim pa yis/ /gnyis med sbyor bas tshim pa nyid/ /oM ha ho hri a/ sa bon chen po'i sa bon ni/ /'di yis sa bon bsam par bya/ /rim pa 'di yis mchod pa ni/ /sman gyi rgyur ni ma yin no/ /lha mo bkres dang sdug bsngal

'phrog /sgeg cing snyan par smra ba dang / /nga rgyal med pa'i nga rgyal byed/ /brtson med pa yi brtson 'grus bcas/ /kun nas skal ldan lha mos ni/ /rmongs byed 'jigs dang 'gugs par byed/ /yid mi gzhungs dang ngo tsha 'jigs/ /lha mo snyan
