mas 'joms par byed/ /de ltar yon tan lha mo ldan/ /yid 'ong bdud rtsi snyan pa mo/ /'dod dang thar pa'i go 'phang gnas/ /gang zhig lha mo 'di yi lam/ /chu skyar ne tso gtam dang ni/ /sgeg dang gar ni lnga ldan pa'o/ /lha min brtson 'grus bdun

pa ste/ /dran pa nyams byed brgyad pa'o/ /lha mo pho nya brgyad kyi las/ /myur du sems ni 'phrog pa'o/ /rnal 'byor pa yi bdag nyid sems/ /'dod pa'i sems kyi rnam par byed/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ /'bad pas thang ka

sna tshogs dgram/ /pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan par/ /kun nas pho nya brgyad pa ni/ /bud med gzugs su de yi tshul/ /phyogs kyi mdog dang mdog tu'o/ /gzugs mdzes yon tan ldan pa

yi/ /dung chen la sogs lag pa na/ /gnas dang gnas la bdud rtsi'i chu/ /sha lnga yi ni snod la sogs/ /bza' dang ston mos nye bar mdzes/ /de yi gzugs brnyan mdun du ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /me tog spos dang

dri la sogs/ /gnyis med gtor mar yang dag ldan/ /dang por re zhig dam tshig gi/ /phyag rgya la sogs bcing bar bya/ /zla ba'i lag pa rab brkyang nas/ /rnam shes byed par kun tu ldan/ /oM hi li hi li hU~M phaT/ dam tshig sngags dang

phyag rgya yis/ /mchod pa'i las la rab tu sbyar/ /oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha ho hrI a swA hA/ nye bar spyod pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /nyi ma'i lag pa'i gdan la ni/ /zla ba'i lag pa kun sbyar la/ /snying po'i snying dang phyag rgya yis/ /rang 'dod

las ni rab tu byed/ /'bum phrag gcig zlos rnal 'byor pas/ /sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya/ /phyis ni me la sogs pa'i las/ /gnyis med gtor ma'i las kyis so/ /me thab kha ran gsum par ni/ /snang byed shing ni rab sbar la/ /lha

mi'i me tog rgyas pa ni/ /sbrang rtsis bsku zhing sbyar byas la/ /bdud rtsi'i chu dang kun nas bsre/ /gang gi ming nas yang dag bzung / /brgyad brgya ru ni bsreg byas na/ /nges par dbang du 'gyur ba'o/ /me yi lha sogs thal ba dang / /bdag nyid khu ba lan lnga ru/ /

bdud rtsi dbus su sbyin byas na/ /bdag nyid 'dod bzhin dbang du byed/ /smyo byed sbrul ni lnga pa dang / /u dza'i shing ni cha mnyam pa/ /bdud rtsir ldan par byin byas na/ /myur du smyo bar 'gyur ba'o/ /nim pa la sogs rtse mo la/ /mkhas pa yis ni

bsgrub par bya/ /me tog bdug pa dri sogs dang / /gnyis med gtor ma'i las kyis ni/ /arga dkar po'i rtsa ba las/ /'bad pas me ni rab tu sbar/ /pad mo zhib mo phye ma ni/ /'o ma dang ni bdud rtsis bsku/ /brgyad brgya ru bsreg byas pa yi/ /lhag ma

ma'i thal ba bsgos pa'o/ /tsi tra ka'i rtsa ba'i chus/ /lan bdun bsgos la grib mar bskam/ /mchod pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pas/ /de yi thal ba bdud rtsi chus/ /myur ba nyid du bsgos pa ni/ /kha ba kun da 'o ma ru/ /lus ni rmongs pa'i gzugs dang

ni/ /shin tu rmongs shing rmongs pa'i dri/ /pho nya brgyad kyi lha mo ni/ /stobs dang gzi brjid don med pa'o/ /rnam rtog rmongs pa'i sems can la/ /'di yis las kyis rab tu sbyar/ /rmongs pa spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /

'gro ba myur du rtogs par 'gyur/ /'di yis phye ma blangs byas la/ /dzA ti mar khu lan gsum sbang / /bdud rtsi mchod pa'i dus su ni/ /thal ba lhan cig bsres byas nas/ /thig le lce yis myangs pa yis/ /pho nya brgyad kyis 'dzin par

'gyur/ /pho nya'i mtshan ma yongs rdzogs pa/ /smyo zhing rgyags shing rgyags pa'o/ /smyo byed shing ni yang dag blang / /'bad pas me ni rab sbar la/ /me tog sbrang rtsi bdud rtsir ldan/ /brgya brgya ru ni bsreg par bya/ /de yi thal ba blangs nas

ni/ /rab tu sbyor ba la sogs bya/ /bdud rtsi bskyed pa'i gnas su ni/ /thal ba de yis byugs byas na/ /chu yis mdog ni gzhan du dang / /de yi ro ni gzhan du 'gyur/ /sbrang rtsi 'o mar ldan pa yis/ /de gzugs snga ma bzhin du 'gyur/ /de yi thal ba blangs byas la/ /sku

gsum pa yi cha dang bsre/ /bdud rtsi yi ni cha bdun dang / /ma ru tse yi cha brgyad nyid/ /mchod pa'i dus su chang la ni/ /de yi thal ba blugs byas na/ /gang la byin pa tsam gyis ni/ /bdud rtsi kun nas rang 'dod rig /gang dang gang gis lam

gyis ni/ /de dang de yi rmongs pa rnams/ /sems can don du rmongs bsal phyir/ /rtag tu lam ni bstan par bya/ /gzhan gyi don la brtson par bya/ /rang gi 'dod 'di bsdus pa'o/ /sman dang sngags kyi sbyor ba yang / /shes rab dman la

sogs pas dman/ /gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud kyi ni/ /gsum pa gtor ma'i las kyi ni/ /dngos grub snying po btus pa ni/ /de yi dngos po bsdus pa'o/ /sngags sgrub pa yi don du ni/ /gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyar bar bya/ /mchog gi gzugs

brnyan rab sbyar bas/ /byin gyis brlabs kyis rim pas bsgrub/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni/ /gsad dang bskrad dang dbye ba ni/ /gzugs brnyan gyis ni thams cad 'grub/ /gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid ldan par bya/ /sngon du ras kyi mtshan

nyid dang / /gnyis pa ta la'i mtshan nyid dang / /gsum pa kha dog rim pa dang / /bzhi pa gtor ma sbyin sreg nyid/ /gleng bzhi rang 'dod bskyed nas ni/ /ma nyams kha tshar yang dag ldan/ /steng 'og la sogs rab rgyas pa/ /ras la zhi ba'i ri mo

bri/ /ma lhung ba yi yi dgas gos/ /ma nyams kha tshar bgo bar bya/ /tshon gyis ma phog cha la ni/ /rgyas pa yi ni mtshan nyid do/ /yi dgas mo yi dmar po'i ris/ /ma lhung bar ni rab tu spyad/ /tshon gyis ma phog rab sbyar ba/ /dbang nyid du ni

yongs su grags/ /ra nag po yi lpags pa dang / /ba lang rta sogs gzhan dag la/ /gnag cing drag sogs pa yi las/ /mngon spyod las kyi mtshan nyid do/ /de yi mnan pa'i gnas su ni/ /thig gi mtshan nyid gdab par bya/ /cha gsum du ni

rab tu bsgo/ /gcig ni 'og tu dor bar bya/ /cha gnyis lnga pa'i steng du'o/ /gsum pa gsungs pa'i thig nyid ni/ /tshangs pa'i ri mo dbyug pa ni/ /cha lnga pa ni bdun du'o/ /lus ni cha gsum nyid du 'dod/ /zhi dang yan lag mnyam

pa'o/ /zhal ni bcu gnyis cha nyid do/ /mgrin pa la ni sor bzhi'o/ /mgo dang skra la'ang de nyid do/ /rna ba nyid kyang de yi tshad/ /zhal gyi cha ni gsum pa nyid/ /dpral ba lkog ma sna nyid do/ /smin ma'i mtha' ni rna ba'i ltag /mig ni sor gnyis

pa yi tshad/ /bug pa sor mo bzhi pa'o/ /de ni mig gi mtshan nyid do/ /mgrin pa'i mtha' yi dbus su ni/ /brang gi cha ni gnyis kyis mnan/ /snying ga'i gnas dang lte bar ni/ /mnan cing kun tu mnan pa'o/ /nu ma'i mthar ni mnan

bcas pa/ /brang du nu ma gnyis mnan la/ /lag pa gnyis kas mnan pa ni/ /lag gnyis kun tu gnon pa'o/ /sor bzhi pa dang ldan pa ni/ /brla dang rje ngar kun tu ldan/ /pus mo gnyis la sor bzhi'o/ /rkang pa'i tshad kyang de

bzhin no/ /bcu gnyis ta la'i tshad kyi ni/ /lha yi gzugs ni ri mor bri/ /lhag pa'i sor mo bzhi po ni/ /lha brgyad kyi ni gdan du'o/ /dgu pa yi ni gdan nyid ni/ /sor mo gnyis su bshad pa'o/ /dbus kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /kun nas

na bza'i 'od zer sogs/ /rab zab rdo rje'i lha nyid ni/ /ta la bcu gnyis kyi ni tshad/ /'og ma'i cha dang cha sogs dang / /nye bar mdzes sogs ri mo bri/ /steng gi lhag pa'i cha la ni/ /rigs ni lnga pa bstan pa'o/ /las kyi

mdog sogs mdog tu ni/ /'dod bzhin lha nyid bsgrub par bya/ /gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor ba ni/ /bcu gnyis ta la'i rnam pa'o/ /de yi ta la'i tshad la ni/ /phyag gnyis kun nas bkug pa ni/ /sor mo gnyis ni rab dor la/ /zhi ba'i lha

yi rnam pa'o/ /de yi ta las zhal bzhin bya/ /gsus khyim che zhing che ba nyid/ /kun nas tshigs dang tshigs nyid ni/ /sor mo gnyis ni dor bar bya/ /khro bo khro mo dbang phyug ma/ /bran pho bran mo mngag gzhug ni/ /drag po 'jigs su

rung ba'i gzugs/ /ta la bcur ni bri ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor bsgrub par 'dod pa yis/ /mchod pa'i lha mo mngon par ldan/ /ras kyi brgyad kyi cha nyid ni/ /ta la'i steng du dor bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor lha mo'i rim pa ni/ /rim dang rim

bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /dbus su mnga' bdag rdo rje'i lha/ /gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bri/ /mgrin pa kos kos zhabs nyid ni/ /de gsum ring na nyes skyon no/ /sngags pa nges par bdag nyid ni/ /skrod dang gnas ni brlag pa'o/ /

shangs dang snyan dang sor mo ni/ /de gsum thung ba'i nyes pa ni/ /nges par dngos grub brlag pa dang / /de yi dpal yang ring ba nyid/ /rje ngar zhabs dang khur tshos ni/ /de gsum sbom pa nyes pa che/ /nges par sgrub po'i bdag nyid ni/ /

bdud dang bgegs dang dpal ring ngo / /'gram pa brang dang rtsibs logs ni/ /de gsum dma' na skyon che'o/ /yun mi ring ba myur du ni/ /nor ni brlag par 'gyur ba'o/ /nu ma rna ba dpral ba ni/ /de gsum yo na skyon che'o/ /

'thab mo dang ni dgras 'tshe bar/ /myur du sgrub po 'gyur ba'o/ /brang dang lus dang brla gnyis ni/ /de gsum dma' na skyon che'o/ /dgras ni 'jigs par 'gyur ba dang / /'chi bar yang ni the tshom med/ /sna zhom mig ni yo

ba dang / /rna ba mchu dang dpral ba ni/ /bgegs dang bdud dang mes 'jigs shing / /dngos grub ring bar 'gyur ba nyid/ /gyen du lta ba'i dbu dang ni/ /gdan ni yo zhing tha dad pa/ /brang dang mgrin pa yan lag ni/ /nyes skyon grangs ni

med par grags/ /'od zer yo zhing tha dad dang / /phyag rgya phyag mtshan nor bas ni/ /mya ngan gdung bas sdug bsngal bar/ /sgrub po'i gzugs brnyan nyes skyon no/ /rgyab yol gdugs dang ba dan ni/ /rnam gsum dog pa'i nyes pa ni/ /

'chi zhing dpal nyams brlag pa dang / /mi mdza' mdza' ba 'joms pa'o/ /de ltar nyes skyon skyon chen pos/ /dul zhing dul la bzod pa dang / /sems ni shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/ /rnam par brtag cing rab tu dpyod/ /mtshan

nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs shing / /mdzes pa'i tshul gyis mchod par bstan/ /sngags grub rgyu yi don dang ni/ /dbang dang dgug pa yi ni lha/ /zhi ba la ni zhi ba'i tshul/ /drag la drag cing 'jigs su rung / /dpa' zhing dpa' ba'i

nga rgyal gyis/ /rgod cing khro dang sgeg pa dang / /khro ba'i gzugs kyi tshul dang ni/ /bran dang bran mo'i rnam par sprul/ /las kyi gnas dang gnas nyid du/ /bdag nyid kyi ni kha dog bsgyur/ /de ltar mtshan nyid mtshon pa yi/ /dngos grub

myur du rdzogs pa dang / /rnal 'byor pa yi 'dod pa las/ /sngags pas thang ka'i ri mo bri/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nA~M/ sa~M b+ho ta ni/ bi shud+d+ha/ na maHsarba b+hi ga ha re nan+tu/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ sngags pa yis ni sngags
'di yis/ /ras dang skud pa bkru ba'o/ /thams cad las kyis sngags kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi byin gyis brlabs/ /gzugs brnyan so sor rab sbyor bas/ /sgrub pos thang ka bsgrub par bya/ /gzugs brnyan

'grub pa'i rgyu ru ni/ /sbyin sreg phyag rgya sngags bya'o/ /yi dgas kyis ni gos blangs la/ /gtor ma la sogs ldan pa yi/ /nan tan gyis ni thang ka brgyang / /thig skud kyis ni ri mo bya/ /pad ma'i gdan

la bzhugs pa ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung gis bzhugs/ /phyag gnyis pa la thang ka mdzes/ /rdo rje cod pan mthon ka'i rtse/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis

brgyan pa'i sku/ /dar gyis dkri zhing rnam par 'phyang / /rdo rje phyag gis gsor mdzad cing / /snying gar gnon pa mchog tu brtson/ /g.yon par dril bu mngon ldan pas/ /rked pa'i mtshams su rnam par gnon/ /btso ma gser gyi kha dog dang / /sgeg cing

shin du bzhad pa'i zhal/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor la bsten par/ /khro bo'i 'od zer rnam par spro/ /dkar dang zla ba kun da'i mdog /lha mo gsang ba'i snod mdzad cing / /rkang pas 'khyud pas thal mo sbyar/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni mgrin par 'khyud/ /

tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni/ /myos pas khro bo mchog gi ste/ /rgyan rnams kyis ni brgyan pa'i sku/ /chags pa'i gos dkar mnabs pa nyid/ /ba spu nas ni rdo rje 'phro/ /gdugs dkar po yis mngon g.yogs pa'i/ /'di ltar rdo rje dbang

phyug rgyal/ /pad ma'i lus can rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje shar gyi cha ru ni/ /mo gzugs ri mor bris pa ni/ /gzugs kun la sogs rab rgyas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin mo ni rgyal dbang 'di/ /rin chen gdan la bzhugs pa ni/ /rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par

brgyan/ /phyag na gtor ma'i snod sogs pa/ /phyogs kyi mdog tu gtso bar bya/ /dngos grub kun ster lha mo ni/ /lus ngan gyi ni sring mo'o/ /phyag 'tshal tshul gyis 'dud pa ni/ /lha mo bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /rdo rje byang gi cha la ni/ /lha mo

snyan par smra ba ni/ /de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug rgyal/ /pad ma'i lus can ye shes 'dzin/ /snyan pa'i gser btso ma yi mdog /bzang po'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /gnyis kyi phyag na bdud rtsi'i snod/ /sgeg

pa'i nyams kyi lta ba ru/ /mkhas pa yis ni bri bar bya/ /ye shes nub kyi cha la ni/ /lha mo snyan pa'i dbang phyug ma/ /btso ma gser gyi mdog dang ni/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /thams cad mtshan nyid yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /lha mo

gzhon nu grub pa ni/ /lcags kyu lnga sogs snod kyis ni/ /gnyis pa'i phyag ni rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje lho yi cha ru ni/ /'byung mo'i ming ni ska rags can/ /sku mdog sngon mo gzugs mdzes pa'i/ /rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /bdud rtsi'i bum

pa phyag gnyis na/ /gzhan gyi sgeg pa'i yan lag dang / /gshin rje yi ni sring mo nyid/ /dngos grub kun ster lha mo ni/ /thams cad kun la gzugs mdzes par/ /rnam par brtags te ri mo bri/ /rdo rje dril sogs rim par yang / /dbang ldan la

sogs rim par sbyar/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung / /phyag ni phyag rgya mtshan ma sogs/ /de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug rgyal/ /rol pa'i 'khor lo bsam par bya/ /lha rnams dmigs pa dang bcas pa/ /sngags dang phyag rgya gtor mas mchod/ /

oM sarba sid+d+hi ku ru hU~M/ nye bar spyod pa'i sngags so/ /oM badzra hU~M phaT/ nyi ma'i lag pa rab brkyang nas/ /ye shes kyi ni pad ma mnan/ /dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /de yi sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /yan lag drug tu bsrung bar bya/ /ye shes

khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /dkar po dang ni sa gdugs bsgreng / /mkhyil par sa gdugs 'khyud byas la/ /dkar po'i lcags kyus spyan drang ngo / /oM badzra a ku sha dzaH phyag rgya de gnyis brtan bcings la/ /dkar po dang ni gi wang

sbrel/ /zhags pa'i dam tshig phyag rgya yis/ /kun nas lha mo bzhugs par ldan/ /oM badzra pA sha hU~M/ phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings nas/ /rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/ /gsang zhing gsang ba'i lcags sgrog gis/ /lha rnams kun nas mnyes par

bya/ /khu tshur de nyid dam bcings nas/ /rgyab dang rgyab tu yang dag ldan/ /sa gdugs pad ma sbrel byas la/ /kun nas lha nyid tshim byed pa'o/ /spos kyi phyag gnyis rab ldan pas/ /sor mo gnyis ka bsgreng byas la/ /zla ba nyi mar bzhugs byas

la/ /snying rje chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM su ra ta badzra hU~M dza/ khu tshur gnyis ni bcings byas la/ /nyi ma'i steng du kha sbyar la/ /shar gyi phyogs kyi lha mo ni/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /oM shri ya ba ti hU~M phu swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings te/ /ye shes dang

ni rnam shes bsgreng / /oM su kri ye hU~M phu swA hA/ byang gi phyogs kyi lha mo ni/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings nas/ /dkar po dang ni gi wang bsgreng / /oM su ru su ru ma du re hU~M phu swA hA/ nub kyi

phyogs kyi lha mo ni/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings nas/ /sa gdugs pad ma'i kha sbyin bya/ /oM pri ya~M me khA la hU~M phu swA hA/ lho phyogs lha mo rgyal dbang gis/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /

gnyis med cho ga'i sngags kyis ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/ /bdug pa me tog sogs glu dang / /mkhas pas mchod pa nyi shus mchod/ /'dod dang thar pa dge ba'i gnas/ /las rnams thams cad grub byed pa/ /

rdo rje chos kyi bde spro ba/ /rnal 'byor sngags kyis bsgrub par byed/ /de nas kun gyi snying po ni/ /khro bo gnod byed khro mo ni/ /dbye ba rnam gsum sku rang bzhin/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yan lag bzhi/ /khros pa'i khro bo'i mchog tu spro/ /

'jigs pa theg pa rnam pa gsum/ /lha mo'i lte bas 'jigs par byed/ /bdud dang 'byung po gcod byed cing / /bdud dang gdug pa skems pa dang / /gnon cing yul nas skrod pa dang / /'dod dang thar pa'i go 'phang bsgrub/ /tshangs pa mnan

cing nyed pa dang / /tsa mun ti ni drag pos 'gugs/ /'jigs byed kun nas bsgrubs pa yang / /mkhas pa yi ni bsgrub par bya/ /re shig dang po bris pa'i sku/ /mtshan nyid ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin/ /bye ba bcu bzhi'i tshogs dang ni/ /

sna tshogs gzugs can bzhin ngan pa/ /lha mo dka' bzlog gdan du ni/ /rgyab tu kun nas rnam par mnan/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnam par sprul/ /zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa nyid/ /
'od zer sngon po 'bar ba'i zhal/ /rol pas 'phen pa'i gdan la ni/ /tshangs pa'i mgo ni zhabs kyis mnan/ /spyan gsum khro la nga rgyal can/ /dmar zhing dmar ba'i spyan dang ldan/ /'khyil zhing rnam

par gyes pa yi/ /dbu skra dmar pos rnam par brgyan/ /rus pa'i thod pa'i phreng ba yis/ /sangs rgyas mi bzad cod pan no/ /bgegs kyi mgo bo bsam pa yis/ /klu gnyis kyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /shin tu rgod cing mche ba gtsigs/ /

zhal gsum kha dog gsum pa'o/ /glang chen lpags pa bsnams pa'o/ /mi yi lpags pa rab tu gsol/ /rgyan brgyad kyi ni gnas nyid du/ /dkar zhing rab 'bar rus pa'o/ /sangs rgyas mgo bo'i phreng ba dang / /mche ba rno zhing

sor mo 'bar/ /steng gi phyogs su mda' dang ni/ /gnyis pa la ni kha T+wA~M ga /gsum pas rdo rje gsor ba'o/ /g.yas pa bsdigs mdzub zhags pa dang / /gnyis pa la ni thod pa'o/ /gsum pa gzhu dang kun nas ldan/ /rgan byad

drag mo 'jigs su rung / /zhags pas bcings shing rnam par brgyan/ /drag mo mnan cing mche ba gtsigs/ /khrag 'dzag pa dang brgyal ba ni/ /so sor dbus su brgyan pa yi/ /so so'i pho nya rab tu bsgrub/ /tshon bdun gyis ni gos pa yi/ /rgyun mi 'chad

par rtag tu spro/ /khro bo mche ba gtsigs pa'i lus/ /'bar ba'i 'od zer rdo rje can/ /mi yi keng rus keng rus dang / /gdugs dkar po yis mngon par g.yogs/ /ye shes khro bo dbang phyug bdag /drag cing shin tu drag pa 'dul/ /
bdud rnams thams cad gnon mdzad pa/ /shin tu gdug pa'i sems can rnams/ /zhi bas 'dul bar mi 'gyur pas/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis/ /khro bo'i gzugs la sogs pa bstan/ /khwA dang 'ug pa bya rgod

dang / /lce spyang srin po khyi la sogs/ /'jigs pa'i ku cho rab sgrogs dang / /mi yi keng rus kyis bkang ba'i/ /de ltar gzugs brnyan rab sbyor bas/ /'dod dang thar pa don gnyer dang / /thams cad khro bo 'jigs mdzad pa'i/ /

sngags pas gzugs brnyan bsgrub par bya/ /oM ta hU~M ma tha ma tha duSh+Tan g+hA ta ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ ba dan gsum sogs phyag rgya yis/ /las rnams kun nas rab tu byed/ /spos dang bdug pa la sogs dri/ /rgyas pa'i mchod pa kun
ldan pas/ /dpa' bo mchod sogs yang dag ldan/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga mthong ba yis/ /cho ga'i yan lag sbyin sreg las/ /gtor ma'i las ni khyad par nyid/ /ma brtags pa yi sha dang ni/ /khrag gis

kyang ni de nyid las/ /gang gang dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /de yi rnam pas tshim par bya/ /oM bi tring ti nA ma ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ zla ba nyi ma brkyang nas ni/ /rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/ /dkar po gi wang sbrel byas nas/ /

sa yi gdugs dang pad ma sbrel/ /de nyid snying po phyag rgya dang / /sngags de nyid ni rnam par sbyar/ /phur bu ra ba tsham ngam dang / /dra ba go cha mtshon cha rnams/ /las kyi gnas su dgod pa ni/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rab tu grags/ /phyag

rgya 'di nyid snying gar bcing / /ye shes dang ni rnam shes sbyar/ /oM kro d+ha ni hU~M a/ snying po mchog gi sa bon dang / /phyag rgya de nyid rnam par bya/ /lus dang srog la ltos med par/ /chen po'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya/ /

drag cing rno ba'i lha mo ni/ /rno ba'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya/ /cung zad zhi ba'i lha mo ni/ /thabs cig gis ni mtshan nyid do/ /chu yi 'gram gyi sa phyogs su/ /sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya/ /'bum phrag lnga ni bzlas pa

dang / /phyis ni 'bum phrag gcig gis so/ /zhi ba'i mchod pa phul nas ni/ /me yi las la sogs pa bya/ /nag po ra yi sha dang ni/ /khrag dang rnam par bsres nas ni/ /bris sku la sogs gzugs brnyan mdun/ /rdzogs

pa'i cho gas sbyin sreg bya/ /gtor ma sbyin sreg gis tshim bya/ /thams cad las ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang drag dang / /mngon par spyod pa la sogs 'grub/ /dri zhim chu yis bkang ba yis/ /bum pa
rgya cher mchod pa yis/ /nad kyi yan lag gzir ba la/ /sngon du dbang bskur byin byas nas/ /nad kun dang ni bral ba dang / /de bzhin gza' yis gnod pa nyid/ /skal ba dman dang mi byams pas/ /thams cad

zhi ba thob par 'gyur/ /ser po'i tshon dang spra tshil las/ /log 'dren lha yi gzugs brnyan nyid/ /mnyam pa'i gdan la thal mo sbyar/ /phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras/ /mche ba gtsigs pa yan lag rgyas/ /pad

ma'i snod la gnas pa ni/ /rtse gsum dang ni bza' ba'i snod/ /dgra sta la phug phyag na'o/ /sor mo bzhi yi tshad du ni/ /rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /bris sku'i gzugs brnyan mdun du ni/ /'khrul 'khor 'di ni bri bar

bya/ /gro ga 'am ni shing shun la/ /gi wang dang ni gur gum gyis/ /sgrub pa po'i gzugs brnyan bri/ /gzugs dang rnam pa kun ldan pa/ /snying gar ming ni bri bar bya/ /g.yo dang lhung dang srog 'dren pa/ /lcags kyu kun nas
ldan pa dang / /dpral bar drangs nas gzhag par bya/ /bgegs kyi dbang po yi ni gdan/ /snying gar mnan nas gzhag par bya/ /me tog bdug pa sogs pas mchod/ /nan tan gyis ni gtor ma'i las/ /don 'dod

'bras bu don gnyer ba'i/ /rnal 'byor pas ni sngags yig bzlas/ /oM tra~M tha tha tha hU~M dza swA hA/ me tog dkar po la bzlas shing / /re re zhing ni brdeg par bya/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs rdzogs na/ /'grub par 'di

la the tshom med/ /sngags 'di yis ni sbyor ba yis/ /bsgrub pa po yi yid g.yo zhing / /myur du 'gugs shing lon pa'o/ /rgyal po'i dbang po dbang phyug sogs/ /rgyal po dang ni rgyal tshab dang / /phyug po'i byis pa la

sogs dang / /shin tu mdzes pa'i bdag nyid lus/ /sha tsi dang ni brgya byin sogs/ /gal te kun nas 'dod tsam gyis/ /bsgrub pa po yi dbang du 'gyur/ /ji srid lus ni 'tsho ba'i bar/ /dus rtag tu ni rnam par
'dud/ /nga rgyal yan lag gtso bo bas/ /nga rgyal gyis ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /khro bo'i lus ni bstan pa yis/ /las dang las ni myur du 'grub/ /khro bo'i lus rnam par bstan pa zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// //
spyod pa'i chos can kun bsdus pa/ /brtul zhugs mtshan nyid bstan pa'o/ /ye shes longs spyod 'bras 'dod pas/ /spyod pa'i mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /mi bzad 'khor ba 'jigs pa ni/ /chags pas srid par

ltung ba'o/ /chags pa spangs pa'i lus kyi ni/ /rgyun tu brtul zhugs yang bzung ngo / /dben par shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/ /dngos po thams cad mdor bsdus pa'o/ /chags pas srid par ltung ba dang / /zhen pas 'khor

bar 'jug par byed/ /rmongs pa'i bdag nyid ring du spangs/ /sems can don du chos bstan phyir/ /sems can don byed gyur pas kyang / /brtul zhugs dka' thub mi bzad pas/ /dben par sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /chags pa'i

nyes pa rgya mtshor 'khor/ /bdag nyid nyon mongs las rgyal phyir/ /sems can don blo 'ba' zhig go/ /sems can don 'gyur dus su ni/ /spyod dang sdom pa'i sngon bzhin no/ /'du 'dzi dang bral dben pa ni/ /dga' ba ru ni lus bsrung ngo / /

dang po re shig rnal 'byor pas/ /bstan bcos tshigs rnams blangs byas nas/ /sdom pa thams cad yang dag ldan/ /rab tu rno bas chos spyad do/ /gnas dang gnas la'ang mi gnas pa'i/ /nam du yang ni mi gzung ngo / /bza' dang

bza' min bar rtogs pa'i/ /dman sogs nges par mi bya'o/ /'bad pas rtag tu dga' ba yis/ /lham mkhan nya pa shan pa dang / /bram ze dmangs rigs rgyal rigs rnams/ /mnyam pa'i sems kyi lam gyis ni/ /rtag tu slongs mo

bslang bar bya/ /gal te gong du spyod pa'i tshe/ /gang zhig bza' ston zos pa dang / /mal cha ras dang mchil lham yang / /longs spyod longs spyod yid 'ong ba'i/ /brtul zhugs la gnas tsam gyis ni/ /rnal 'byor sdom pa ring ba

nyid/ /spyod pa spyod dgur rnal 'byor pas/ /bsod nams lag tu blangs bar bya/ /thams cad bslangs kyang nyes med de/ /dngos po yang ni mi gzung ngo / /sems ni rnam par dag pa yis/ /thams cad bza' zhing bza' ba nyid/ /

dag cing gus bcas nga rgyal gyis/ /de yi gnas ni yongs su spangs/ /dad pas dkyil 'khor 'bri ba dang / /yang na gtor ma'i las la ni/ /bsags pa'i rdzas kyi dngos po ni/ /de yi gnas su dbul bar bya/ /chos gos gsum gyi

lhag ma ni/ /slar yang gus pa yi ni gzung / /spyi bor ngur smrig mtshan ma dang / /sangs rgyas byang chub yan lag dang / /rnying pa'i tshem ber chos gos gsum/ /steng du rdo rje dbyug pa dang / /lhung bzed mchan khung chu tshags bcas/ /

de ltar 'dzin pa'i lus la ni/ /glegs bam la sogs gzhan yang med/ /grog mo la sogs bsal ba'i phyir/ /rnga ma'i chun po bsngags pa yin/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yan lag dang / /chos don rtsa ba snying rje nyid/ /de nas bslab

par bya ba ni/ /bla ma'i tshig gi sdom pa'o/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rdzu 'phrul che/ /mchog la skyabs dang skyabs su mchi/ /rdo rje dbang phyug mchog gi lus/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag phyag 'tshal/ /lha mo shes rab sbyor rang bzhin/ /mkha'

'gro lnga la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mu ka sa ma yo ha ma ya/ a mu ka sa ma yo/ oM a mu ka sa ma yo/ ha~M sa ma ya/ oM badzra badzra/ ma hA badzra badzra/ ka ya su ba ra/ hi hi hi/ ho ho ho/ hU~M na ni ba ta da~M/ 'di yis slob ma rab tu gzung / /

brtul zhugs rdo rje rdo rje can/ /gnyis pa'i las kyis bsgrub par bya/ /sbyor dang gsang ba'i sngags rig pas/ /thams cad dus dang dus nyid du/ /tshigs bcad gnyis ni brjod par bya/ /gang zhig pha dang gang zhig ma/ /gang zhig mdza'

ba 'ang mi rtag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas lus ni sgyu ma nyid/ /rtag tu chos kyis yongs su skyob/ /kye ma stong pa nyid kyi mthus/ /dngos kun rnam par mnan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu rab ster ba'i/ /mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya/ /

rmongs pa bcad pa'i don du ni/ /dus gsum du ni tshigs bcad brjod/ /'chag dang nyal dang 'gro ba dang / /'dug dang 'gro ba thams cad du/ /sngags kyi sbyor ba brtan byas nas/ /sems dang sems kyis nyal bar bya/ /

skye dang skye bar brgyud pa yi/ /'byung ba lnga yi lus kyi sdig /nyin mtshan gnyis kyi spyod pa yis/ /lus kyi dri ma dag pa nyid/ /zla ba drug tu spyad byas pas/ /rang 'dod lha ni 'grub pa'o/ /brtul zhugs spyad pa'i

rnal 'byor pas/ /mi shes pas kyang ye shes 'thob/ /de ltar yon tan rang bzhin zhing / /brtul zhugs spyod pa yi ni rgyu/ /brtul zhugs sbyor ba sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad rmongs pa rnam par spangs/ /thabs kyi mtshan nyid

mtshon pa yis/ /mnyam nyid lta ba rdzogs byas nas/ /rnam dag lta ba 'ba' zhig go/ /kun nas stong pa mnyam pa'i ros/ /dngos po kun gyi mtshan nyid med/ /kun nas stong pa nyid kyi mthar/ /rnam par rtog pa ji lta bur/ /rmongs

pas brtags shing rnam brtags pa'i/ /dag pa'i sems dang sems par bcas/ /rmongs pa nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i lus/ /'dod pa khro bo'i gzhi de ni/ /rno ba'i sems kyis rmongs pa ni/ /ye shes ldan pa'i lus kyi dbye/ /
snum pa'i bza' dang 'jam pa'i gos/ /sna tshogs dbang pos reg pa yis/ /gti mug chags pas go bzlog pas/ /srid par ltung ba'i las su 'gyur/ /las ni bya ba'i dbang por 'gyur/ /rmongs pa ye shes mi rtag

pa'o/ /'dod dang khro dang nga rgyal 'joms/ /srid par 'ching ba'i bza' ba'o/ /'byung po 'byung la brtse ba dang / /kun nas sdig pa mi brtag go/ /mgon med sdug bsngal phongs pa la/ /nor pas mnar med gyur pa
bzhin/ /'jig rten 'dir ni rma 'bebs dang / /mtshang 'bru ba ni mchog tu gtso/ /theg pa che la legs bslabs pas/ /ngan 'gro'i dngos por yang ma yin/ /kun nas bza' dang legs bza' bas/ /yang dag

dga' bas lus bsrung ngo / /rnyings pa'i bza' ston ngan pa yis/ /nges par bdag nyid dga' bar bya/ /sngon gyi bslab sogs bslab pa dang / /sngon du thams cad bsdam pa nyid/ /brtul zhugs spyod pa mnyam gzhag
pas/ /mnar med dmigs pa med pa'o/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid mtshon pa yis/ /sngon du bslab sogs bslab par bya/ /brtul zhugs spyod pa mnyam gzhag pas/ /bslab pa gus pas bslab par bya/ /bud med 'jigs

gzugs drag ma nyid/ /skra ni 'dzings shing khyil pa dang / /ngur smrig dmar po 'jam pa nyid/ /phra mo'i rdul gyis 'jam pa bgo/ /mi yi rus pas byas pa yang / /bud med rgyan du rnam par brgyan/ /rnyings pa'i tshem ber

dmar po ni/ /mi yi lpags pas g.yog par bya/ /snod chen po ni gnyis pa ru/ /bzung la dbang po lnga ni gzung / /steng du rdo rje'i dbyug pa ni/ /mi yi yan lag rus pas brgyan/ /ba dan dril bu phreng ba ni/ /dbyug pa
lag pa g.yon pas gzung / /de ltar bsdus pa'i lus kyis ni/ /'bad pas brtul zhugs spyod par bya/ /'di ltar rdzas sogs dngos po ni/ /me bzhin 'bar bas reg mi bya/ /bza' dang btung ba la sogs gzhan/ /

dang po bsdu bar yang mi bya/ /snying rjer phan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /kun nas dga' zhing bza' bar bya/ /thams cad gnod pa don med pas/ /dngos po kun nas yongs su spang / /lus ni bsrungs ba tsam gyis ni/ /

slongs mo'i bza' ba bslang bar bya/ /stong pa'i khyim dang dur khrod dang / /bas mtha' dang ni dgon par gnas/ /mtshan mo kun nas bgrod par ni/ /bzlas dang bsam gtan mchog tu brtson/ /'chag dang nyal dang
'dug pa 'am/ /shel gyi rnam pa'i sems dang ni/ /rang bzhin yongs su dag pa nyid/ /bzlas dang bsam gtan 'ba' zhig go/ /de yis thams cad 'grub 'gyur bar/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa nyid/ /sdig

spangs rnam par spyod pa yis/ /'khor ba ru ni mi gnas pa'o/ /thams cad dngos po dngos med par/ /rtag tu sems kyis blta ba nyid/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas rgyu ru ni/ /de nas tshigs bcad gnyis ni brjod/ /sbyin pa
chos kyis bsrung ba ni/ /tshigs bcad gcig gis gnang bar bya/ /e ma'o rmongs pa yi ni mthus/ /lus can kun nas dbang du byas/ /'dod sogs chos sogs mi bzad pas/ /mkhas pa yis ni
yongs su spangs/ /dngos med dngos po yang ma yin/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa mi rtogs pas/ /srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal zhing / /dmigs pa med pa'i bde ba 'thob/ /gzhan gyis brtags pa'i longs spyod sogs/ /
nyal dang 'chag par dus gsum du/ /rnal 'byor tshigs bcad gcig gis ni/ /rnal 'byor rmongs pa gcod byed pa'o/ /sems chen po yi sems kyi ni/ /rnyings pa'i ras ni bsags pa yis/ /de yi gos su rab tu

bgos/ /keng rus kyi ni yan lag kun/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i dbyug pa bzung / /pa ta ha yi chos kyis brdung / /rdo rje'i glu ni blang ba nyid/ /sems can sgrol ba'i rgyu ru ni/ /grong nas grong du kun tu rgyu/ /dmigs pa
med pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /brtul zhugs spyod pas mnyam par gzhag / dag pa'i sems ni mi dmigs pas/ /dga' ba yis ni bsrung bar bya/ /spyod pa yis ni rgyur gyur pas/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa don gyi rgyu/ /

sdig pa thams cad rnam bsal zhing / /nyes pa kun nas rnam spangs la/ /brtul zhugs zla drug spyad pa yi/ /rang 'dod ye shes 'grub par 'gyur/ /brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa rnam par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// //

sto// / //de nas thams cad snying po ni/ /de nyid kun gyi don bsdus pa/ /'khor bar brtan dang g.yo bcas pa'i/ /kun gyi snying por rab sbyor ba'o/ /dang por re shig rnal 'byor pas/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa

phyogs su/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya/ /rdo rje'am shes rab rnal 'byor gyis/ /'bum phrag gsum du bzlas byas nas/ /phyis ni rang 'dod pa yi las/ /'grub par 'di la the

tshom med/ /spra tshil las ni gzugs brnyan bya/ /tsha ba'i mar khus byugs byas la/ /snying gar ming ni bzhag pa dang / /tshigs dang tshigs su tsher mas dgang / /skyur po tshwa dang ma ru tser/ /gzugs brnyan dang ni yang
dag ldan/ /snod du bsres la yang dag gzhag /ye shes lus la lus kyi ni/ /rkang pa g.yas pas mnan par bya/ /rno ba'i sems kyis bzlas byas pas/ /mtshan mo gcig gi mtha' ru ni/ /'grub par 'di la the

tshom med/ /smin pa'i me la gzhag byas na/ /rgyal po myur du gdung bar 'gyur/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa la/ /las 'di yis ni sbyar bar bya/ /hrI a mo g+ha si si gra da gr-ih+Na hU~M hri phaT/ /snga dro nyi ma shar dus la/ /

me tog dkar po'i maN Dal dang / /spos dang mar me'i cho ga yis/ /zhi ba'i las ni rnam par bya/ /chu dang 'o ma bsres pa'i/ /der ni gtor ma sbyar nas ni/ /sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas/ /rgyal po nad dang bral bar 'gyur/ /
oM a mr-i ta b+ha re hU~M hU~M hU~M/ a a a/ thams cad las ni bsdus byas la/ /chu bo chen po'i rgyun la bskur/ /rims nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u rdzogs s+ho// //

de nas rab sbyor snying po 'di/ /sngags pas rab tu rnam par spyad/ /yungs kar las ni gzugs brnyan bya/ /snying gar ming ni rnam par sbyar/ /rdo dang tsher ma lte bar ro/ /rkang pas mnan cing bzlas par bya/ bu tig

sna shul hU~M dza phaT hri/ me la bsro zhing gdung ba dang / /lhag par bzlas shing gzhag par bya/ /'di ltar mtshon pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ /mod la gzer bas yang 'dzin to/ /zhi ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga las/ /'o ma

dang ni sbrang rtsis bkru/ /chu bo'i rgyun la bskur byas na/ /gzer zhing gzer ba'i nad dang bral/ /oM sarba ka ri hU~M dza swA hA/ gzer ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so/ /de nas thams cad snying po yis/ /gzhan gyi

las kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /sngon du bsnyen sogs bsten byas pas/ /las kun 'grub par 'gyur ba'o/ /nag po'i mtha' dang tha ma la/ /ba skam gyi ni lci ba las/ /bsgrub bya yi ni ming dang gzugs/ /dmar po'i tsan

dan gyis ni bsku/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni kun nas gzhag /seng ldeng phur pas mig 'bras la/ /g.yon pa'i rkang pas mnan nas ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas shing / /me la bdug cing bdugs pa yis/ /mig ni gzer bas 'dzin

par 'gyur/ /oM tsak+Shu ma li ni hU~M phaT/ 'di yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni/ /'grub par 'di la the tshom med/ /zhi ba'i mchod pas mchod byas nas/ /oM badzra tik+Sha Na ya hU~M swA hA/ lan bdun mngon par sngags byas nas/ /de yi

'o rgyun la bkrus nas/ /bsgrub bya'i nad dang gnod pa sel/ /mig 'bras rno zhing gsal bar 'gyur/ /mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga'o/ /lhang tsher las ni bsgrub par bya/ /mkhas pas khrag gis bri ba'o/ /dug dang

dur khrod sol ba yis/ /mig gi 'bras bu byugs byas la/ /rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa'o/ /oM kr-iSh+NA ping ga li hU~M kh+h+ra~M phaT/ 'di yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni/ /bdag nyid lci bas bran par bya/ /de

ltar mtshan nyid kun ldan pas/ /bsgrub bya myur du long bar 'gyur/ /sbrang rtsi mar gyis bsku byas nas/ /bsgrub bya'i nad dang gnod pa sel/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bzlas/ /oM a mr-i ta lo tsa ne a swA hA/ long ba

rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so/ /gzhan yang bsgrub bya sgrub pa pos/ /las ni shin tu rnam par spyad/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa/ /sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /bag zan las ni pad ma'i dbyibs/ /

bsgrub bya'i ming ni dbus nyid do/ /khyi'i spu yis bug pa dgang / /tsha ba'i mar khus bskus byas la/ /g.yon pa'i rkang pas mnan nas ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya/ /oM badzra ba ke hU~M phu phaT/ me la bsro zhing bsros pa

yis/ /b+ha ga myur du bzlog par bya/ /shin tu gdug pa'i chung ma ni/ /'di yi las kyis rab tu sbyar/ /lan bdun du ni mngon sngags nas/ /sbrang rtsi 'o ma'i rgyun gyis bkru/ /oM su ko b+ha bi hU~M he swA hA/ zhi bar byed pa'i sngags

so/ /'jim pa'i snod ni blangs byas la/ /pad ma'i dbyibs kyi rnam par bya/ /rno ba'i til mar yungs kar gyis/ /bug pa dgang zhing sbyar bar bya/ /rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni/ /seng ldeng phur pas brdung bya zhing / /sngags

ni brgyad brgya rab bzlas na/ /b+ha ga gzir zhing gzir bar 'gyur/ /hri bi la ta hU~M phaT/ 'di yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni/ /b+ha ga gzir ba'i las nyid do/ /chu dang 'o mar bkru bya zhing / /sngags kyang mngon du sbyar bar bya/ /oM sarba

sho d+ha ni swA hA/ 'di yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni/ /b+ha ga gzir sogs las grol lo/ /gzhan yang las kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /shin tu rnal 'byor pas spyad do/ /rgyal po lam gyi sa rdul blang / /yang na bzhi mdo'i sa rdul las/ /

pad ma'i mtshan nyid mtshan nyid ni/ /b+ha ga'i snying po khrag dang ni/ /yi dgas phyag rgya phyag rgya yis/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bzlas/ /hri phri phaT/ 'di yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni/ /pad ma sdom pa'i las su 'gyur/ /

oM a mr-i ta wa ti swA hA/ dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa dang / /bla ma dang ni slob dpon smod/ /dam tshig spyod la 'phya ba ni/ /sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te rmongs shing khro ba ni/ /las kyi rtag tu byas nas ni/ /
'dis ni nges par ltung ba ru/ /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs the tshom med/ /las kyi rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba'i le'u rdzogs s+ho// // gsang zhing gsang ba'i de nyid don/ /snying po'i mchog ni mdor bsdus
pa/ /rol mo bstan bcos sogs glu yi/ /de nyid thar pa go 'phang gnas/ /gnyis med dngos po ngo bo las/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa ji ltar 'gyur/ /gnyis kyi dngos po bdag min pas/ /gnyis dngos dngos po med
pa'o/ /dngos po dngos min dngos med la/ /mnyam nyid lta ba'i sems kyis su/ /rnam par brten dang brten bya med/ /rtog cing rnam rtog 'khrul ba dang / /gzugs dang gzugs can zad par byed/ /
rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /sems kyi brtan pa'i gnas su ni/ /bsam gtan bsam bya bsam par bya/ /dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /thams cad dbyibs su 'jig par byed/ /stong
nyid stong las sogs stong pa'i/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' can nyid/ /dag cing phra la phra ba'i don/ /sems dang sems pa dang bcas pa/ /kun tu dngos po dngos med pas/ /thams cad nam mkha'
bsdams pa'o/ /rtag cing rtag la rtag pa'i don/ nam mkha'i khams ltar brtan sems pas/ /me stag rdul phran yan lag 'phro/ /chu skyar bzhin du brtags pa yi/ /rnam shes ye shes lhag
ma ni/ /nam mkha' 'phro zhing snang ba'o/ /nyon mongs de bzhin mun pa ni/ /ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas su/ /rnam par shes pa lhan cig 'bar/ /ye shes snang ba sogs thob 'gyur/ /sems dang sems byung
sems pa yis/ /rnam par blta zhing rab tu spyad/ /'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med par/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ /thams cad kun tu snang byed cing / /thams cad 'od zer kun bsdus pa/ /

snying po'i sa bon sa bon ni/ /dkar dang kun da zla ba'i mdog /A li kA li rab sbyar bas/ /phyung ba yi ni sa bon mchog /sbyor ba 'grub pa'i rgyu ru ni/ /mnyam nyid rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom/ /sa bon nam mkhar spros

pa yis/ /'jig rten gsum po snang bar byas/ /ma lus sprin ltar spro ba nyid/ /skad cig gis ni spro zhing bsdu/ /phyis ni rang 'dod dmigs med cing / /yi ge med pas yang bsam mo/ /gzugs ni stong par brtags
pa yi/ /mnyam nyid sems dang sems kyis ni/ /ma lus rnam par bltas pa yis/ /khams gsum snang bar byed pa'o/ /de ltar sems kyis bsams pa yis/ /byang chub rim pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /skad cig gzugs dang

gzugs nyid dang / /skad cig phung po'i rnam pa dang / /skad cig thams cad dbyibs rnams ni/ /de phyir mi rtag pa yi gnas/ /legs byas nyes byas ming can ni/ /nyes pas smad par mi bya'o/ /gzugs dang stong pa la
sogs dbus/ /sems dang sems byung rnam par mtshon/ /dngos po'i lhag ma dngos med pas/ /de yi lhag ma gzugs med pa'o/ /ye shes ri mo 'bar ba yi/ /'od zer mnyam par gnas pa nyid/ /de yi mtshan nyid

mtshon pa nyid/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu spyad/ /rtag tu zhi zhing mchog gi las/ /yang dag byang chub rtag pa'o/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /sngon du bsnyen pa rab brtsams nas/ /las

dang don kun rab grub pa'o/ /ri rab rtse mor kun bsams pa/ /rang 'dod rgyal chen gzhal yas khang / /sna tshogs rin chen rang bzhin mchog /dril bu dra bas mngon par brgyan/ /gdugs dkar po dang ba dan dang / /sna tshogs

mchod pas mngon par brgyan/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid ni/ /dkar dang kun da zla ba'i 'od/ /de ni rgyan kun gyis brgyan cing / /sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par chas/ /rab tu mdzes pa'i gos mnabs shing / /phyag

gnyis na ni rdo rje dril/ /'od zer 'phro ba rnam mang po/ /kun nas rdo rje'i 'od zer 'phro/ /khams gsum po yi rnam pa ni/ /sems dang sems kyis bsgom pa'o/ /snying gar dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /dmar po'i

hU~M ni rab 'bar ba/ /spyi bor thig le me ri'o/ /ba spu'i bu ga nas 'phro ba'o/ /shar du rdo rje gzhag pa dang / /lho ru mda' ni rnam par dgod/ /nub tu ral gri mtshon pa dang / /byang du gzhu ni yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje'i zhags
pa las sogs bzhi/ /mtshams dang mtshams su gzhag par bya/ /'di ltar mtshan nyid mngon ldan pas/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom/ /A li'i sa bon gtso mo ni/ /de nyid ldan pas yang sngags

bzlas/ /phyag 'tshal bsreg pas mthar bzhag pa/ /'bum phrag gsum du rab bsnyen pas/ /rdo rje'i lus dang lus nyid du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur/ /sbas pa'i snying po snying po dang / /rdo rje chos dang chos mchog go/ /

rdo rje sems ni rjes mchod pa'i/ /hU~M gi glu yi rnam pas bya/ /bkra shis sgra ni snyan pa yis/ /mnyam par gzhag pas blang bar bya/ /tri b+hu ba na dzA li ta mUrti a nu ra ya na wa ti/ rash+mi sa ha sra tIk+Sha d+ha sa su pa ra sra wa ti/ ba hu bi

da ru ba pe sha a nu ra ya na ta ta ta wa ti/ na ta i badzra sa pa ra be sa ra lI la wa ti/ gdan bzhi'i rgyud ni rgya chen las/ /stong phrag bcu gnyis mdor bsdus pa/ /de yi dngos po mdor bsdus las/ /snying po mdor ni bsdus pa'o/ /

sdeb sbyor sgra dang rtog sogs med/ /don dang don ni yang dag bsdus/ /rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i don ni sbas pa nyid/ /brda yi skad kyis bshad pa'o/ /gdan bzhi pa las yang dag par btus pa sngags kyi phyi'i rgyud bshad pa

sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// //bshad pa'i rgyud man+t+ra ang sa shes bya ba le'u bdun pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba 'gos khug pa lhas btsas gyis

bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsa tur+pI Tha bi khyA ta tan tra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gdan bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/

bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor nam mkha' dang / rdo rje rnal 'byor dang / rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs ga~M gA klung gi bye ma snyed kyi grangs dang mnyam pa thams cad la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor dbang phyug nyid/ /de bzhin

rnal 'byor mchog nyid dang / /drang srong rnams kyi ye shes dbang / /rnal 'byor ma yi dra mchog bde/ /gnas gtsang ma na bzhugs nas su/ /thams cad mkhyen pas 'di skad gsungs/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad

bcu'i dbus nas phyag na rdo rjes thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gsang ba sbyor ba'i khyad par dang / /bdag ni de nyid ji ltar lha/ /chu dang me ni ji ltar lags/ /ji ltar rab mdzes nam mkha'

dang / /ye shes ji ltar 'tshal bgyi ba/ /ye shes dbang la nyan par 'tshal/ /'khor ba las bsgral mtshan nyid dag /nyon cig dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /dang por dbang gi mtshan nyid dang / /gnyis par yi ge gcig dang

ni/ /gsum par sa bon brgyad pa dang / /bzhi par rtsa yi lha nyid do/ /bdag nyid lus kyi ye shes me/ /blo ldan rnal 'byor pas shes bya/ /lto ba me yi thab khung du/ /de yi me la sbyin sreg bya/ /steng dang 'og dang dbus su

ni/ /rnam shes rtsa ni bsdam par bya/ /thog mar bdag nyid lto ba ru/ /rtsa yi lha ni rnam par bsgom/ /lto ba'i me ni 'bar ba la/ /khyad par kha dog bsgom pa ni/ /lte ba'i me ni dkar po'o/ /g.yon pa'i me ni de bzhin ser/ /

lho ni sngon po'i ming can te/ /lhag ma 'di ni dmar por sbyang / /de dbus kha dog sngo bsangs su/ /me yi du bar rab tu grags/ /me yi dbus su pad ma nyid/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ /de yi dbus su ye shes lha/ /

'khor ba kun las grol bar mdzad/ /phyag gnyis sbyor ba'i gdan la ni/ /rdo rje dril bus rnam par brgyan/ /g.yas kyi lag na rdo rje dang / /rgyan rnams mthon ka'i rtse mo can/ /bzhad dang khro bas hU~M sgrogs shing / /

'di yi ye shes dbang phyug lha/ /de yi dbus su rab tu grags/ /shar du lha mo sgrol ma dang / /byang du de bzhin gos dkar mo/ /nub tu lha mo mA ma kI/ /sangs rgyas spyan ni lho ru'o/ /gzugs ni mthe bo'i

tshad tsam du/ /bdag nyid lha yi lha nyid do/ /lce la mchu ni sbyar bar bya/ /nam mkha' rna ba sna dag la'o/ /mig la sa 'di rnam par shes/ /de bzhin tshangs par 'bar ba'i me/ /mgrin par rmongs pa'i sa nyid dang / /g.yo

ba snying la gnas pa nyid/ /thams cad nyon mongs brang dang ni/ /phyugs gnyis lte ba'i rtsa bar ro/ /yan lag brgyad du bkod nas ni/ /'di nyid lha ni shes par bya/ /rnam shes rtsa nas drangs pa yi/ /de bzhin du ni bdud rtsi

dgu/ /steng gi mche ba gnyis pa'i rtsa/ /kun tu tshwa bzhin zhu ltar babs/ /ji bzhin chu ni 'o ma'i ming / /lce yi steng du bsten pa yi/ /nyi ma thig le 'bar ba yis/ /'khor lo phra rab rdul bzhin no/ /steng gi nam
mkha' nam mkha' ni/ /bsreg pa'i bdag nyid du ni thim/ /g.yon pa'i dbugs ni bud med nyid/ /g.yas pa de bzhin skyes bu'o/ /'og dang steng ni 'di yi rtsa/ /'og ni sngon du rab tu grags/ /dbugs dang

dri ni mnyam drangs nas/ /rgyas pa'i lnga yi steng du ni/ /rnam shes gnyis kyi rtsa nas drang / /bdud rtsi de la rnam par thim/ /ye shes dbang phyug de'i steng du/ /de la bdud rtsis bkru bar bya/ /de ltar kun tu bzhin rngubs nas/ /

dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya/ /lag mthil zla ba nyi ma bsgom/ /ye shes yi ges de dbus so/ /ri dgas mgo bo'i phyag rgya yis/ /khams lnga'i bdag nyid bsreg pa'o/ /sngon du sa bon hU~M byas nas/ /gnyis

par de bzhin gsum dang ni/ /gsum par bzod pas bza' ba'o/ /de bzhin rlung min bzhi ba dang / /lnga par ngang pa'i sa bon gyis/ /mkhas pas khams lnga'i sbyin sreg bya/ /bdag gi de nyid me la ni/ /bdag nyid

sbyor bas bsregs pa nyid/ /ji ltar ye shes me de ni/ /bsreg pa'i bdag nyid rab tu grags/ /sbyin sreg byas pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba dang po rdzogs s+ho// // stong pa'i bdag nyid dge ba yis/ /skye ba'i dra ba rnam 'jig

pas/ /'khor ba ru ni mi gnas pa/ /bcom ldan 'das la mnyan par 'tshal/ /stong pa'i de nyid rang bzhin gyis/ /nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / /gling gzhan de bzhin ri rab dang / /sa ni nam mkhar kun tu bsam/ /rgya mtsho chu yi dbyibs dang ni/ /

yid 'ong pad ma 'byung bar ldan/ /stong pa'i mtshan nyid sngon 'gro bas/ /me yi bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /shar du lha mo sgrol ma 'di/ /de bzhin byang du gos dkar mo/ /mA ma kI ni nub phyogs su/ /lhor ni lha mo sangs rgyas spyan/ /chu ni

sgrol mar kun tu thim/ /me ni gos dkar ma la thim/ /mA ma kI ni nub nas sa/ /rlung ni sangs rgyas spyan la thim/ /chu shing me tog pad ma 'di/ /sgong skyes ye shes kyi ni gdan/ /de yi ye shes rgyal dbang mo/ /sgong skyes 'og tu 'byed pa can/ /

gzugs med srid pa'i dbyibs can ni/ /ye shes rgyal po nyid du thim/ /de ltar bdag nyid stong pa nyid/ /de nyid de nyid stong pa nyid/ /'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med par/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ /ji ltar stong nyid de bsgoms

la/ /lus kyi dri ma rab tu bkru/ /phyis ni chu yi gzugs su bsgom/ /dmar po 'dab ma brgyad dang ni/ /ge sar lte bar bcas pa yis/ /dbus su pad mas rnam par brgyan/ /'dab brgyad la ni lha mo yi/ /sa bon brgyad kyis rnam

par brgyan/ /shar du si ka zhes bya dang / /byang du bzod pa'i sa bon bzhin/ /nub tu rlung gi sa bon gsungs/ /lho ru hU~M gi dbang phyug go/ /dbang ldan du ni dbang po'i dbyangs/ /me phyogs sgra dang rnam shes so/ /bden bral dbyangs

yig brgyad pa dang / /rlung du dbyangs yig lnga pa'o/ /dbus su ye shes rgyal po 'di/ /sgong skyes ye shes dbang phyug ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis dkris pa/ /bdud rtsi sa bon 'bar ba'o/ /kha dog bdun pa'i me 'di ni/ /go 'phang

mchog gis bsgom par bya/ /dbugs mi g.yo ba'i sems dpa' yis/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom byas nas/ /phyis ni rtsa nyid lha yi gdan/ /mig la sa yi sa bon dang / /nam mkha' sna dang rna ba la'o/ /lce la bdud rtsi'i

sa bon 'di/ /snying gar hU~M zhes bya ba'i ming / /yan lag drug 'dzin sa bon gyis/ /rnal 'byor lus ni rnam par bsrung / /ye shes lus 'di shes byas pas/ /ci yi phyir na skye bo'i ming / /gzugs med ye shes gzugs can dang / /kha dog

med cing mtshon kun dngos/ /gnas med gnas kyi dbyibs can dang / /mi rigs de bzhin rigs pa nyid/ /stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho// // bdag nyid lnga yi bye brag nyid/ /bcom ldan 'das la mnyan

par 'tshal/ /nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / /gnyis dang gnyis med la brten nas/ /bskal pa bzang po brgya yi sngon/ /dag pa'i gnas la kun tu gnas/ /ri rab lha mo sangs rgyas spyan/ /mA ma kI ni lho phyogs gnas/ /lha mo

sgrol ma nub kyi gling / /de bzhin byang du gos dkar mo/ /shar du lha mo snyan ma 'di/ /lha mo rnam pa lnga yi gnas/ /de ltar snying ga ri rab dang / /de bzhin mgo bo mA ma kI/ /sgrol ma lho yi gnas dang ni/ /g.yon pa de bzhin gos dkar mo/ /

snyan pa mo 'di bdag gis gnas/ /lha mo lnga yis byin gyis brlab/ /pad ma'i dbus su rdo rje dang / /rdo rje'i dbus su pad ma can/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi kun thim pa/ /lus po kun nas dkris pa'o/ /yan lag brgyad kyi rtsa nyid du/ /

bdud rtsi'i chu ni rnam par thim/ /lha yi gnas ni nam mkha' nyid/ /rdo rje'i sa bon du rab shes/ /bdag nyid lus la bsgoms pa ni/ /rdo rje'i rtsa zhes rab tu grags/ /de yi lus kyi khrag dang ni/ /lus dang lhan cig bcas par gnas/ /

khrag dang chu ni kun sbyor bas/ /blo ldan yan lag brgyad nas 'dzag /ji ltar bdag gis sa bon lnga/ /de ltar pad ma yi yang bsgom/ /ji ltar bdag nyid lus 'di ni/ /nam mkha' rdo rje 'jib byed do/ /rkang pas rkang pa dkri bya

zhing / /mchu yis mchu ni btsir byas la/ /gnyi ga'i lag pa phyag rgya ni/ /rtse mo gsum pa'i rdo rje brtag /rang bzhin gyis ni so sra dang / /snying ga'i rnam shes bsgom pa yi/ /ye shes rgyal po'i lus can 'di/ /skyes bus khros

pas hU~M byas nas/ /de ltar rdo rje pad ma 'di/ /rnal 'byor bsdus pas bskyod par bya/ /gnyi ga dga' zhing tshim pa yis/ /lha rnams thams cad mchod par bya/ /khrag dang khu ba las byung ba'i/ /sa bon myu gus 'gro ba

la/ /lha rnams lus ni yang dag 'byung / /'dod la dga' nyid ma yin te/ /longs spyod phyir yang gnas mi bya/ /sems can don phyir 'dod pa'i phyir/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i yid 'ong sku/ /gnyis med sbyor ba la

gnas par/ /gtor ma sngon du sbyin par bya/ /sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba gsum pa rdzogs s+ho// // nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / /de nyid bcu yi bye brag nyid/ /yi ge bcu ru sngon sbyar bya/ /lnga yi bdag nyid

du rtogs bya/ /lnga pa lnga yi bdag nyid kyi/ /lnga yis lus ni yongs su bsrungs/ /yi ge bcu ni ji ltar lags/ /ji ltar sbyang zhing bsgom pa dang / /ji ltar sa bon myu gu ste/ /ji ltar thar pa la gnas nyid/ /ngo mtshar lha la nyan

par 'tshal/ /gsang ba gsang ba zhes bya ba/ /rgyal po ji bzhin de nyid nyon/ /thog mar stong pa de kho na/ /stong par chu ni bsam par bya/ /kha dog bdun gyi pad ma ni/ /ge sar dang bcas yid 'ong ba/ /stong phrag brgya yi khyon tsam gyis/ /

pad ma'i gzugs ni snying por bcas/ /pad ma rgya cher rab mdzes pa/ /rin chen bdun gyis mngon par spras/ /dril bu dra ba'i phreng ba dang / /dar dang na bza' mngon par 'phyang / /seng ge'i gdan ni mngon par bsam/ /de steng

nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /pad ma rdo rje'i ngo bo 'di/ /'od zer nyi ma bye ba yi/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi sa bon gyis/ /rdo rje'i rtse mo rnam par bsam/ /dbus su rnam par snang mdzad dgyes/ /shar du de bzhin mi skyod pa/ /rin chen sa

bon lho nyid du/ /de bzhin nub tu 'od dpag med/ /byang phyogs su ni don yod grub/ /sa bon lnga ni rnam par bsgom/ /pad ma byang chub yan lag brgyad/ /ji bzhin sa la rab tu brtag /dbus su snying po sgong nga

la/ /rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid thim/ /pad ma brgyad pa'i rtse mor ni/ /mnga' bdag de bzhin rnam snang mdzad/ /shar du lha mo sgrol ma 'di/ /byang du lha mo sangs rgyas spyan/ /nub tu bsam pa gos dkar mo/ /de bzhin

lho ru mA ma kI/ /'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang por/ /'jigs pa med par bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje las ni lha yi lus/ /bzhugs pa ru ni rnam par bsam/ /spyan gsum phyag ni drug pa'o/ /kha dog sngon po rab tu mdzes/ /

rdo rje yi ni cod pan can/ /dar gyis bcings shing rnam par 'phyang / /rgod cing khro dang sgeg pa dang / /sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung gis bzhugs/ /steng du ral gri 'phyar ba dang / /gnyis pa la ni de bzhin gzhu/ /gsum par

rdo rje gdengs pa gsor/ /g.yon pa'i steng du kha T+wA~M dang / /gnyis pas lha mo'i nu ma 'tshir/ /gsum pas dril bu'i sgra sgrogs shing / /rab tu mdzes pa'i na bza' mnabs/ /stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can/ /rgyan kun

phun sum tshogs pa dang / /me tog phreng bas rab tu brgyan/ /g.yon du lha mo sgrol ma ni/ /phyag gcig gis ni 'khyud pa dang / /gcig gi phyag na thod pa ni/ /bdud rtsi'i chu dang yang dag ldan/ /mA ma kI yang de bzhin du/ /gcig

gi phyag gis mngon par 'khyud/ /gcig gi phyag gi thod pa na/ /khrag dang sha yis gang ba'o/ /spyan ma rgyab tu kun nas bsam/ /phreng bas phyag ni brgyan pa dang / /gtor ma sbyangs pa'i phyag gnyis pa/ /mdun du snod la rnam

par blta/ /de ltar bdag nyid lnga yi lus/ /lus la kun nas yang dag gnas/ /shar du lha mo me tog ma/ /lho ru spos dang yang dag ldan/ /nub tu mar me'i lag pa ma/ /byang du dri yi lha mo'o/ /dbang ldan du ni sgeg mo

nyid/ /de bzhin me phyogs phreng ba ma/ /bden bral phyogs su dbyangs ma dang / /rlung du gar ma brgyad pa'o/ /nyi ma bye ba brgya stong gi/ 'od zer rnam pa mang po'i mdog /sangs rgyas sprin ltar 'phro ba ni/ /sems can sgrol
la mchog tu brtson/ /bdag nyid lha dang lha gzhan ni/ /bdag nyid lha ni mchog yin no/ /bdag nyid gzugs su mi nus pas/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs bsgom par bya/ /phyis ni de yi mdun nyid du/ /mkhas pa yis

ni mchod par bya/ /de nyid pad ma bsam pa dang / /de nyid gzhal yas khang pa bsam/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i gdan la ni/ /der ni nyi mas mngon par g.yogs/ /sna tshogs rin chen mchod pa dang / /sna tshogs dang ni

mngon par dpyangs/ /lag gnyis thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /pad ma'i tshul du kha phye la/ /oM ka ma la ud b+ha ba shrI swA hA/ pad ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /rang gi dbugs las phyung nas ni/ /rdo rje mdun du rnam par

bsgom/ /lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs nas ni/ /bsdigs mdzub g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung dkri/ /lcags kyu yi ni rnam pa'o/ /oM badzra a~M ku sha dzaH rdo rje lcags kyu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /lag gnyis rdo rje khu

tshur byas/ /sdigs mdzub gnyis ni dkri byas pa/ /zhags pa yi ni rnam pa'o/ /oM badzra pA sha hU~M/ zhags pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /ji ltar bdag nyid gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /de ltar mdun du'ang rab bsam

bya/ /lha mo brgyad ni kun rdzogs pa/ /khro bo'i rgyal po bzhi par ro/ /shar du gshin rje mthar byed dngos/ /lho ru de bzhin bgegs mthar byed/ /nub tu pad ma mthar byed pa/ /byang du khro ba skyong ba'o/ /lag gnyis rdo

rje khu tshur bcings/ /rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/ /oM badzra s+pho Ta ba~M/ rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ni sbyar bar bya/ /oM badzra g+haN+Da hoH rdo rje

dril bu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa lcags sgrog phyag rgya las/ /sor mo dbus ma brkyang byas la/ /na mo rad na tra yA ya/ oM bai ro tsa na sa mA d+hi/ bi sha ye g+hu ya pa dza b+hi Shai swA hA/ hUM hU~M hU~M/ ho ho ho ho

ho ho/ hri hri hri hri swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor nam mkha'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /oM tA re tut+tA re sa ta k+Shi ta hU~M swA hA/ lha mo sgrol ma'i sngags so/ /oM hi li hi li pa li swA hA/ gos dkar mo'i sngags so/ /

oM ta ra sarba ta na hU~M phaT/ mA ma kI'i sngags so/ /oM bud d+ha bi bud d+ha ya hU~M/ sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags so/ /sdigs mdzub gnyis dang gung mo ni/ /dbus dang dbus su sbyar bar bya/ /mthe bong ngos su sbyar ba ni/ /lha mo

bzhi yi phyag rgya'o/ /ma ning yi ge bzhi pa ni/ /me tog ma la sogs pa dang / /sgeg mo yi ni sngags nyid yin/ /g.yas brkyang rkang pas yang dag gnas/ /sdigs mdzub snying gar sbyin byas nas/ /dpung pa mdun nas

brkyang byas nas/ /se gol hU~M gi rnam pa dang / /lhan cig du ni sbyar byas pa/ /'di ni khro bo'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM A yuHpA la pra ti rak+Sha duk+Sha ban d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ shar phyogs kyi sgor zhi ba yi'o/ /oM A kar Sha ya sata d+ha du nA~M

kroM swA hA/ byang du rgyas pa yi'o/ /oM mo ha ya mo ha ya/ sarba sa twA nA~M shrI swA hA/ nub tu dbang gi'o/ /oM shak+Sha sarba duSh+Ta gA ta ya hri phaT/ lho ru mngon par spyod pa yi'o/ /oM su gan d+ha hU~M ha~M swA hA/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang

ba dri'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM su so bid puSh+pe b+h+yaHswA hA/ sdigs mdzub dang 'theb mo sbyar ba ni me tog gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /oM d+hU pa mA la ku le swA hA/ sor mo dbus ma bsgreng ba ni/ /bdug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /

oM tIk+Sha dI pe pra ti gr-ih+Na swA hA/ khu tshur bcangs nas mthe bo bsgreng ba ni/ mar me'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /oM ku ru ku ru be dza ye swA hA/ lag pa gnyis brkyang nas dbus su sbyar ba ni/ gtor ma'i sngags dang

phyag rgya'o/ /ji ltar sngon du sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/ /hU~M gi glu yi rnam pa yis/ /sangs rgyas kun nas mnyes par bya/ /lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur byas/ /rked pa'i phyogs su bzung byas la/ /

pi bang tshul gyis bsgreng ba dang / /gling bu'i tshul gyis 'bud pa dang / /sil snyan tshul gyis dkrol ba dang / /brdab pa'i tshul gyis rdegs pa dang / /gar gyi tshul gyis bskyod pa dang / /rlung g.yab tshul gyis g.yob

pa dang / /rgyal mtshan tshul gyis bsgreng ba dang / /bla re'i tshul gyis bre ba dang / /ba dan tshul gyis 'phyar ba dang / /gdugs kyi tshul gyis dgab pa dang / /cang te'u'i tshul gyis 'khrol ba dang / /khar rnga'i tshul gyis brdung

ba dang / /bzhad pa'i tshul gyis 'dzum pa dang / /khro bo'i stangs stabs yan lag bskyod/ /de ltar de nyid rnal 'byor pas/ /glu yi mchod pa'i khyad par nyid/ /hU~M hU~M hU~M/ bdag med rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis/ /'byin pa'i sa bon

gzung byas pa/ /spyi yi rnal 'byor ston pa'o/ /dbang po mchog gi mchod pa che/ /thar ba chen po gnas chen po/ /gsang zhing de nyid gsang ba yi/ /gsang ba'i bdag po dga' chen po/ /rnam snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /

lus kyi rtsa ni lnga nyid las/ /lha dang lha min mngon par sprul/ /bde ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba/ /sbyor ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /glu dang bstod pas nyer mchod nas/ /ji ltar las la mngon bde bar/ /rang gi sngags kyi yi ge yis/ /phreng

ba la ni bzlas par bya/ /ji ltar nus pas mchod byas la/ /slar yang gshegs su gsol ba'o/ /dbugs kyis bdag nyid lus bkang ste/ /lhan cig thim par bsam par bya/ /ji ltar rnal 'byor nam mkha' nyid/ /de ltar

rnam par snang mdzad bdag /ji ltar rnam par snang mdzad lha/ /de bzhin rgyab kyi rtsa nyid do/ /ji ltar sngon gyi rtsa nyid las/ /de bzhin ye shes skye ba 'di/ /chu ni sgrol ma zhes su bshad/ /me la gos dkar yang dag ldan/ /rlung la lha mo sangs rgyas 'di/ /de bzhin rab

mdzes mA ma kI/ /dkar po chu yi rtsa dang ni/ /dud pa yang ni me yi gnas/ /dung gi rtsa 'di rlung gi'o/ /de bzhin du ni pad ma dang / /ye shes 'byin pa yi ni rtsa/ /lnga yi bdag nyid khyad par ni/ /gdan bzhi nyan par mi nus pa/ /

gzhung nyung ba ni bstan pa yin/ /gzugs brnyan gyi rab tu sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho// // rdo rje'i chu ni ji ltar lags/ /bdud rtsi'i chu ni ji ltar skye/ /gang gi dbye ba ji ltar myang / /gang gis ji ltar

'tshal bar bgyi/ /'di yi rab tu dgos pa'ang ci/ /ngo mtshar lha la mnyan par 'tshal/ /nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / /gnyis dang gnyis med spangs pa yi/ /gsang zhing gsang ba rab sbas pa'i/ /'gro ba'i 'bras bu de de nyid/ /

bskal pa bye ba stong phrag tu/ /sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bskul ba/ /sangs rgyas lam ni mthong ba'o/ /ye shes snang ba de bdun nyid/ /ji ltar me yis mnyam par bsregs pa'i spyod pa dang / /nyi ma ji ltar mnyam par lta bar ston pa

dang / /ji ltar rlung ni mnyam pa nyid du len pa ltar/ /rnam rtog rmongs pa'i rgya mtsho bsrings pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /pad ma'i dbang phyug sku ni gser gyi mdog /dri chu'i ngo bo shin tu snang mdzad dang / /ro ni rdo rje dbang phyug rdo rje phyag /

lha gsum dag gi cho ga shes par bya/ /ha zhes pa yis kha dog 'phrog /ho zhes pa yis dri med cing / /dpa' bo hrIHyis bcom pa yi/ /de dag rim bzhin shes par bya/ /pad ma'i gdan ni rtag tu mnyam pa nyid du bsgom/ /mthe bo

rdo rje srin lag gnyis su kun ldan pas/ /sngags gsum yi ge gsum gyis cho ga bsrung bar bya/ /gang zhes ro 'di myang ba blo ldan rnal 'byor ma'o/ /rdo rje chu yi khyad par ni/ /nyon cig dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /'dzag pa yi ni

lus kyi chu/ /bdag nyid lnga yis byin gyis brlabs/ /dro ba'i rang bzhin me ru mthong / /zhi ba chu ru rab tu brtag /rlung dang rlung ni du ba'o/ /sa ni gzugs su snang ba'o/ /gang zhig de nyid kyis myangs na/ /dri ma can lus dri med 'gyur/ /

rin chen bzang dga' rnal 'byor pa/ /sbyangs pa'i rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi/ /gtsang dang mi gtsang de bzhin rdzas/ /dang po rnal 'byor mtshan nyid do/ /nyon mongs de bzhin mun pa de/ /rnam shes lhan cig snang ba'o/ /ye shes rdo

rjes bcom nas ni/ /rnal 'byor pa ni de la snang / /bdud rtsi bsten 'dod lus can gyis/ /gnyis med kha sbyar sbyar bar bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i bsgrub pa po/ /sngon du A li kA li bsam/ /A li zhes bya bung bar gsungs/ /kA li

de bzhin gshegs ma nyid/ /sbyor ba'i ye shes sgra yis ni/ /gnyi gas 'khyud par bsam par bya/ /ji ltar sde tshan gsum pa yi/ /yi ge gsum pa gzung byas te/ /rdo rje ra ba rtsam zhig gis/ /'od dpag med ni dkri bar bya/ /

lha mo gsum pa nyid kyis ni/ /dbyug pa tsam zhig rdo rje 'dzin/ /dbus su dam tshig bzhags pa yis/ /kun da mgo la mchog tu brtson/ /de ltar sngags zlos rnal 'byor pa/ /pad ma rdo rje can gyis bskyod/ /rang bzhin

gyis ni sa sgra dang / /bdud rtsi chu dang 'dres pa yi/ /de nyid 'di yis myang byas pa/ /rnal 'byor chos la rab tu shis/ /bden pa'i chos ni mchog tu bden/ /rnal 'byor chos ni rab tu bstod/ /de nyid dman pa'i rnam rtog yid/ /

sbyor ba ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur/ /bye ba brgyad bcu'i rnal 'byor ma/ /gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud 'di nyid/ /mkhas pa yis ni rnam bltas la/ /sbyor ba brgyad bcu'i rnal 'byor ma/ /sbyor ba'i chos kyis gtor ma sbyin/ /bdud rtsi lnga

mdor bsdus le'u zhes bya ba lnga pa rdzogs s+ho// // 'byung ba'i dbugs kyi the tshom ni/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'dri/ /'chi ltas ji ltar 'tshal bgyi zhing / /gang gis shes nas rab tu sbyar/ /bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ /'gro ba lus can sems can don/ /'chi bdag kun nas bslu ba ni/ /nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje bdag /gang zhig rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /'chi bdag lus ni gnas pa nyid/ /dang por snga dro'i dus nyid

la/ /dbugs ni rnam par dgod bshad pa/ /lus can zla drug nas 'chi bar/ /ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med/ /gal te dus la bab gyur na/ /dbugs ni chad cing 'chad par 'gyur/ /de bzhin 'jigs pa chung mthong na/ /

'gram pa'i tshigs ni yo bar 'gyur/ /lus kyi mtshan ma shes byas la/ /rnal 'byor pa yis zhi bar bya/ /rna ba'i u da rnam chad na/ /chu tshod lnga las mi thub bo/ /mig gi am pa ra yi tsa/ /tro ta de bzhin nyi ma lnga/ /sna yi ma si

ka chad na/ /nyi ma bdun gyis gdon mi za/ /steng 'og so ni 'thams gyur na/ /nyi ma gsum gyis the tshom med/ /'di yi lce la thig nag na/ /zhag gnyis kyis 'chi lus can rnams/ /mgrin pa'i glo yi phyi rol rtsa/ /zla phyed las

ni mi thub bo/ /brang gi lhe'u 'og zhom gyur na/ /zla phyed sman pas gso spyad yod/ /sen mo khrag ni med pa na/ /chu tshod lnga las mi thub bo/ /pho nya brgyad kyi 'chi ltas ni/ /'chi ba'i rma sogs rnam par spangs/ /rna ba'i u da'i bdag

nyid ni/ /rnal 'byor dbye bas bsten par bya/ /mig gi am pa ra chad na/ /mkhas pas dkar po'i sa bon bzla/ /sna yi ma si ka la ni/ /dbugs bsdams me yi dud pa'o/ /so dang so 'thams rtsa la ni/ /dung gi sa bon bzlas pas

'phrog /lce yi thig nag 'di la ni/ /bdag nyid sbyor bas mnan par bya/ /mgrin pa glo yi phyi rol rtsa/ /pad ma'i sa bon gyis rtse bya/ /brang gi lhe'u zhom pa la/ /sgong skyes ye shes bsgom pa'o/ /sen mo khrag ni med pa la/ /lag

pa bsdus la bzlas par bya/ /bug pa dgu yi sgo ru ni/ /sa bon dgu yis rtse bar bya/ /rtsa dgu la ni sa bon dgu/ /sgo dgu sa bon dgu yis bsdam/ /de ltar bsdams pa tsam gyis ni/ /rnam par shes pa mi 'gro'o/ /ma bsregs

snod ni gnyis gzung ste/ /gur gum dang ni gi'u wang gis/ /bcu gnyis tshad ni yang dag bri/ /sa bon dbyangs yig bskor bar bya/ /lha mo brgyad kyi sa bon 'di/ /mtshams su ma ning sa bon dang / /dbus su ye shes sa bon

ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni bskor bar bya/ /de bzhin ming ni dbus su bri/ /hU~M gi dbus su gnas pa nyid/ /gnyi ga dang yang sbyar byas nas/ /skud pa dmar pos dkri bar bya/ /mA ma kI ni 'dab mar bsam/ /steng du de bzhin rdo rje'i bdag /gnyis

med gtor mar ldan pa yis/ /nus pa yi ni mngon par mchod/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /rtse dang rtse ni sprad par bya/ /rnam shes ye shes sa bon ni/ /brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas pa yis/ /rnam shes bsdams pa'i dngos po dang / /rnal 'byor bsrung

ba'i khyad par gyis/ /yi dgas srin po 'byung po dang / /dus ma yin par 'chi ba nyid/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bsrungs tsam gyis/ /grol bar 'di la the tshom med/ /tshe zad pa'i yi lus can ni/ /zla ba drug tu gnas par 'gyur/ /'chi
ba'i mtshan ma yongs su brtag pa'i le'u zhes bya ba drug pa rdzogs s+ho// // rnal 'byor bstan bcos cho ga'i rim/ /de nas ye shes dbang gis gsungs/ /'khrig pa'i dngos po bsten pa las/ /khrag dang khu

ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ye shes ngo bos 'byung ba yi/ /'byin pa'i rtsa ni mngon par sems/ /bdun par khu bar gyur pa yis/ /dkar po'i rtsa ni rab tu bskyed/ khrag gis mtshan mo brgyad na ni/ /du ba'i rtsa ni mngon du gso/ /mtshan

mo phyed dang bzhir bsnyen pas/ /dung gi rtsa ni byin gyis brlab/ /gong du mtshan mo bcu gnyis kyis/ /pad ma'i rtsa ni rab tu sbyar/ /nyi ma drug bcu'i grangs 'di yis/ /mkhas pas gi wang gi ni rtsa/ /mkhrang 'gyur dgu zhes bshad

pa ni/ /dri med gsum gyi rtsa ni bskyed/ /mtshan mo bcu dang drug gi ro/ /'byed pa'i rtsa ni rab tu bskyed/ /sa gdugs ye shes rnam shes ni/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i lus can no/ /sa bdugs bcu dang brgyad nyid kyis/ /mkhas 'a pa

zla dgur kun tu gnas/ /skye ba skra pru la sogs ldan/ /sen mo khog pa rus pa dang / /zhag dang srin bu gci ba dang / /bshang ba bad kan mchi ma sogs/ /brgyad ni mngal na nga rgyal ba/ /rtsa yi brgyad pa zhes bya la/ /lhag par lha dgu gnas

pa nyid/ /bdag nyid lha dang pha rol mchog /bdag nyid lha ni mchog yin no/ /dkar po lha mo sgrol ma 'di/ /dud pa la ni gos dkar gnas/ /lha mo sangs rgyas du nyid la/ /mA ma kI ni pad mar gnas/ /lha mo

snyan ma gi wang la/ /rdo rje sgeg mo dri med la/ /'byed par rin chen yid 'ong ba/ /sa yi gdugs la pad ma'i rtsa/ /'di ltar spros pa'i ye shes rtsa/ /thams cad 'byin cing sdud pa yi/ /ji ltar rgyal po rnam snang mdzad/ /

de ltar rgyab tu rab tu grags/ /mnyam pa'i cha ru de byas pas/ /mnyam pa'i gzugs ni 'od dang bcas/ /stong phrag dgu yi grangs nyid ni/ /re re las ni gyes pa'o/ /stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis ni/ /lus po yi ni rtsa nyid do/ /

dgu pa yis ni 'byin cing sdud/ /dgu yi rtsa ni rtag pa'i sa/ /dgu dang lnga yis dga' bar bcas/ /lnga po'i lha 'di 'gro ba'o/ /gcig gis 'byin cing sdud pa dang / /gcig gis lha ni ye shes can/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang

bzhin te/ /gcig gi lus dang lus can dang / /gzugs med ye shes gzugs can dang / /mi stong ba dang stong pa nyid/ /ring min thung min gzhan ma yin/ /dngos med dngos po tsam ma yin/ /kha dog med la tshon kun dngos/ /

ye shes lus can rnal 'byor pas/ /lam gnyis pa ni srid pa'i skyon/ /lam gcig pa yi rnal 'byor pas/ /rnam par rtog pa kun spangs la/ /gcig gi lam nyid shes par bya/ /shel ltar dag pa'i lus kyi ni/ /dag pa'i

lam du yang dag bgrod/ /rtsa bskyed pa'i le'u zhes bya ba bdun pa rdzogs s+ho// // sbyor ba'i mdo ru bsdus pa nyid/ /bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /phyag na rdo rje khyod nyon cig /sbyor ba'i bstan
bcos bsgrub pa pos/ /gdan bzhi pa las btus pa yis/ /stong phrag bcu gnyis yang dag ldan/ /de yi don ni mdor bsdus pa'o/ /gzhung mangs pa yis 'jigs pa yis/ /de nyid mdor bsdus pa yi tshig /sbyor ba'i

rnams la nye bar gsungs/ /rnal 'byor pa la rab dgos pa'i/ /de nas zhi ba yang dag bshad/ /thog mar bya ba stong pa nyid/ /stong pa'i dbus su pad ma ni/ /pad ma sa bon myu gu can/ /kha dog bdun pa rgya chen po/ /sde tshan
bzhi pa'i tshig la ni/ /steng du ma ning thig ler bcas/ /de yi sa bon mnyam bsgoms nas/ /de bzhin khro gnyer can ma bskyed/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas la ni/ /gdugs dkar po yis mngon par g.yogs/ /

dag pa'i sku dang spyan gsum pa/ /phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras/ /mchog sbyin dang ni dbyug pa dang / /bgrang phreng ril ba spyi blugs bsnams/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ /rab tu mdzes pa'i na bza'
mnabs/ /bzlas dang bsgom pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas pa mchog gi yi ge gcig /khro gnyer mchog gi yi ge ni/ /'bum phrag gcig zlos sngags pa yis/ /rnal 'byor pa yis brtsams tsam gyis/ /tshe ni 'phel

bar rab tu grags/ /lha nyid dmigs par bya ba yis/ /de nas rgyas pa'i las 'di nyon/ /ti se gangs kyi rtse mo dang / /gser gyi ri bo'i ngos dang ni/ /rin chen bdun rang bzhin gnas su/ /gzhal yas khang pa nyer mdzes

pa'i/ /seng ge'i gdan la gnas pa ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa/ /gdugs dkar po dang bla re dang / /dril bu dra bas mngon par mdzes/ /bdun pa yi ni mtha' bzung ste/ /gsum pa yis ni sbyar bar bya/ /

sde tshan mtha' yis steng du'o/ /ye shes can gyis sa bon gcig /dbugs mi g.yo zhing 'od zer bcas/ /ser po'i mdog tu rnam par bsgom/ /phyis ni nor rgyun zhes bya ba'i/ /lha mo'i gzugs su rnam par bsam/ /

phyag drug sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung / /rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /kha dog 'bar bar bsgom par bya/ /rin chen shing dang za ma tog /gnyis pa na ni rab tu 'phel/ /gsum pas mchod sbyin lag pa dang / /

steng du shes rab phyag dang ni/ /gnyis pa la ni bgrang phreng dang / /gsum pa ril ba spyi blugs so/ /bsgom dang bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dbugs ni 'dren pa'i khams nyid do/ /rgyas pa'i le'u zhes bya ba brgyad

pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dmar po'i las kyi khyad par ni/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/ /stong pa'i mtshan nyid dmigs nas ni/ /stong par pad ma yang dag bshad/ /nyi ma'i dkyil

'khor la brten cing / /gdugs dkar po yis mngon par brgyan/ /dbyangs yig dang po'i yi ge gcig /steng du sde tshan tha ma dang / /mnyam par bzhag pas sa bon dmar/ /'od zer dmar po 'bar ba 'di/ /sems can

'gug par byed pa'i dngos/ /lha mo'i gzugs brnyan 'di bsams la/ /btso ma gser gyi mdog lta bur/ /mA ma kI bsam yang dag 'byung / /phyag gnyis rgyan gyis rnam par mdzes/ /gcig gis lcags kyu yang dag 'dzin/ /

g.yon pas dril bu mngon sgrogs pa/ /thams cad rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/ /bsgom zhing bzlas pa tsam gyis ni/ /sems can dbang du 'ong bar 'gyur/ /de nas nag po'i las 'di ni/ /

rlung gi dkyil 'khor la brten cing / /rlung gi dbus su rlung gi ni/ /rlung gi sa bon bsam par bya/ /du ba du ba rab 'bar ba/ /sgra dang thig les rnam par brgyan/ /nag po drag po yi ni gdan/ /yi dgas gdan la kun gnas pa/ /bsam

pa ral gcig ma yi gzugs/ /kha dog sngon po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /dbu skra gyen brdzes lha mo che/ /drag par rgod pas 'jigs par mdzad/ /spyan gsum zhal ni gcig pa la/ /phyag bzhi yi ni rnam par spras/ /gcig ni phyag

na ral gri dang / /gnyis pa na ni rdo rje gsor/ /g.yas na mdung ni 'dzin mdzad cing / /gnyis par de bzhin sdigs mdzub bo/ /'phen pa'i rol pas rnam par bzhugs/ /me 'bar ba dang mnyam pa'i 'od/ /zhags pa 'phen

pas 'ching mdzad cing / /hU~M sgra'i rnam par 'jigs par byed/ /sa bon dbus su ming dang ni/ /phaT kyi rnam pa de bzhin mthar/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa dang / /rnal 'byor bstan pa 'jig byed pa/ /lha mo ral pa gcig ma 'dis/ /

nus pas brlag par byed par gsungs/ /sngags dang rgyud ni mnyam bzung la/ /lha mo 'od zer can sa bon/ /dug dang khrag tu bsres pa yis/ /rdo rje phag mo kun nas bri/ /de yi mchu la ming dang yang / /mgo la yi ge'i

sa bon dang / /steng du me yi yi ge dang / /kha la rlung gnyis de bzhin no/ /'dis ni skrod par byed par gsungs/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u zhes bya ba dgu pa rdzogs s+ho// // sems can kun la phan mdzad pa/ /ye shes

dbang gis de nas gsungs/ /nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /'khor ba'i lam nas grol ba yi/ /mtha' yas sbyor ba mngon phyogs bas/ /mtha' yas sgo zhes bya ba'i ming / /stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid lus/ /ji ltar stong pa de nyid

'dis/ /phyi dang nang du bcas pa ni/ /de bzhin nam mkha'i khams su ni/ /rgya mtsho'i chu yi dbyibs dang ni/ /de yi dbus su rab gang ba'i/ /kun nas ji ltar 'dod bzhin du/ /gzhal yas khang pa rnam par bsam/ /seng ge'i

gdan la bzhugs pa ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan cing / /sna tshogs dar ni rnam par 'phyang / /yi ge gcig gis sa bon ni/ /'od zer 'bar ba tshon gyi dngos/ /dang po'i dbyangs yig kun bzung la/ /steng du bdud rtsi

thig le can/ /lha mo bdag nyid lhan cig dang / /phyi nas gzugs ni mnyam par bsam/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung / /sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par brgyan/ /rgyan kun gyis ni brgyan pa'i sku/ /rab tu mdzes

pa'i na bza' gsol/ /gcig gi phyag gis rdo rje 'dzin/ /g.yon pa dril bu mngon par sgrogs/ /yi ge brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid/ /spyod bcas mi spyod gsang ba dang / /chu dang me dang de bzhin rlung / /sa ni mig gi yi ge'o/ /sgo bzhi

dang ni phung po bzhi/ /sgong skyes rdzi lir gnas pa nyid/ /bzhi pa nyon mongs ma dang ni/ /yi ge bzhi pa de bzhin du/ /rmongs pa sa dang nyon mongs dang / /sngon du phyugs ni mnyam pa dang / /chu shing me tog pad ma ni/ /

'di yi sgong skyes stan nyid do/ /ba lang rmig pa'i steng du ni/ /bdud rtsi brgyad kyis rnam par dbye/ /shel bzhin du ni dag pa yi/ /snying po yi ni snying po'i mchog /lce la chu ni 'di nyid dang / /nam mkha' rna ba sna dag la'o/ /sa ni

mig la sbyar byas te/ /tshangs par me ni de bzhin 'bar/ /rmongs pa'i sa ni 'grin par ro/ /g.yo ba snying la gnas pa dang / /nyon mongs sems can brang dang ni/ /phyugs ni lte ba'i rtsa bar ro/ /yan lag brgyad la dgod pa

yis/ /lce la chu ni 'di nyid dang / /nam mkha' rna ba sna dag la'o/ /'di yis lha nyid yang dag shes/ /yi ge brgyad kyi sngags 'di ni/ /phyag rgya brgyad du rab tu grags/ /dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /gnag cing 'bar ba'i

las 'di ni/ /las rnams bzhi yi lha mo ni/ /mkhas pas 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas/ /ye shes las byung snying po nyid/ /mchog tu rtag cing zhi ba dang / /phra zhing rags pa'i 'gro ba kun/ /las dang las kyi khyad par nyid/ /

thams cad chu yi dbyibs dang ni/ /mnyam par 'jigs byed me dang yang / /ji ltar rtag pa rlung dag dang / /dad pa'i don dang sa dbang po/ /lhag ma brtsegs pa las byung ba/ /bzhi pa yi ge drug pa'o/ /'gro ba'i don phyir yi

ge brgyad/ /lha brgyad du ni yongs su grags/ /mnyam bzhag bzlas shing bsgoms pa yis/ /'grub par 'di la the tshom med/ /ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /sngon du reg cing reg pa nyid/ /'jig rten 'dir ni bde ba

dang / /rtag tu mchod pa rnyed par 'gyur/ /'chi ba'i dus su ye shes ni/ /gzugs med srid par rab tu gnas/ /bdag gi de nyid dman pa yis/ /ji ltar sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /de phyir nan tan thams cad kyis/ /

sbyor ba'i bstan bcos rtogs par bya/ /dri zhim rab grags me tog kun nas gnas pa dang / /nag po'i a ka ru dang gu gul mar me dang / /gnyis med gtor ma gcig gis yang dag yid ldan gyis/ /lha mo ma mo gzhan rnams

kun nas rab tu mchod/ /steng du rnam par snang mdzad bsam/ /mchu la phyag na rdo rje'o/ /yid kyis nam mkha'i snying po ni/ /rna ba gnyis la rab tu sbyar/ /lce la 'jig rten mgon po dang / /mgrin par 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi

sras/ /byang du byams pa yang dag sbyar/ /snying gar kun tu bzang po gnas/ /lte bar khro bo'i rgyal po ni/ /gshin rje mthar byed rab tu grags/ /de nyid rnam pa'i bye brag nyid/ /lha mo'i gdan nyid du ni bsgom/ /snying gar sems

dang ye shes ni/ /mkhas pa yi ni bsam par bya/ /'od zer bye ba rnam mang po/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni rab tu 'phro/ /mnyam par bzhag cing bsgoms pa yis/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /mtha' yas pa'i sgo'i lha
mo'i gzungs kyi le'u zhes bya ba bcu pa rdzogs s+ho// // rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs/ /srin mo dang ni ro langs mo/ /mi med gnas su bsgrub pa pos/ /

oM b+hi tsam ba ta hU~M phaT swA hA/ nye bar spyod pa'i sngags s+ho// / /sdigs mdzub snying gar sbyin byas la/ /g.yas pa rdo rje khu tshur byas/ /rked pa'i phyogs su gzung byas pa/ /'di ni tsham ngam mchog gi rgya/ /ra nag po

yi lpags pa la/ /dur khrod ras kyi skud pa yis/ /zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa nyid/ /kha dog sngon po spyan gsum pa/ /dmar po'i skra yis rnam par 'dzings/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa nyid/ /rgod cing
mche ba gtsigs pa dang / /'bar ba'i me yis rnam par brgyan/ /dang por mdung gi lag pa dang / /gnyis par de bzhin mi mgo'o/ /gsum pa la ni rdo rje gsor/ /g.yon pa steng du sdigs mdzub dang / /
gnyis pa'i lag na thod pa'o/ /gsum par dril bu'i sgra sgrogs shing / /sham thabs stag gi lpags pa dang / /glang chen lpags pa rab tu mnabs/ /rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa ni/ /yi dgas gdan la rab tu

bzhugs/ /'bar ba dmar po'i rang bzhin lus/ /gdugs dkar po ni rnam par 'phyang / /ral pa gcig pa'i srin mo ni/ /rdo rje pho nya mngon par bri/ /sen mos khrag ni mngon par blang / /lha mo'i lte ba bya bar gsungs/ /de yi sha yis

sbyin sreg bya/ /de bzhin dur khrod kyis ni bskor/ /mgo bor oM/ mig tu hU~M/ sna la ha/ rna bar hri/ lce la hra/ snying gar hriH/ rdo rje khu tshur mnyam byas te/ /dbu ma gnyis ni rab tu brkyang / /yan lag drug gi sngags dang

phyag rgya'o/ /snying gar sdigs mdzub sbyin byas la/ /dpung pa g.yas pa rab tu brkyang / /hU~M gi rnam pas se gol dang / /lhan cig nyid du sbyar byas la/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi rkang pas mnan/ /oM ma tha ma tha duSh+Ta hU~M phaT/

'di ni lha mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /ra sha 'o mar bsres pa yis/ /dur khrod gnas pa'i lha mo la/ /brgyad brgya ru ni dbul bya zhing / /sna tshogs mchod pas tshim byas la/ /phyis ni las rnams brtsam par bya/ /sa lu'i

'bras la gzugs brnyan bya/ /ming gi dbus su gzhag byas la/ /seng ldeng phur bu sor brgyad pas/ /lhan cig dngos pos brdung bar bya/ /rdo rje'ang de ru gzhag byas na/ /gcin ni mchog tu sdom par 'gyur/ /ba lci las ni

gzugs brnyan bya/ /khyi yi spu yis dgang byas la/ /ming ni hU~M gi rnam par sbyar/ /brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas bya zhing / /rdo rje pad mas brdung byas la/ /gdug pa ji bzhin 'tshe bar 'gyur/ /lha dgra las ni pad ma bya/ /ming gi sa bon

gzhug byas nas/ /gang zhig bsams pa'i bud med rnams/ /de bzhin nges par dbang du 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas slar yang gsungs/ /gzhan yang las kyi khyad par nyid/ /phyag na rdo rje

nyid nyon cig /srog chags kyis brkos sa las ni/ /blo dang ldan pas gzugs brnyan bya/ /lha mo'i sa bon yi ges bskor/ /snying gar ming gi rnam par bya/ /rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni/ /blo dang ldan pas brgyad brgyar bzlas/ /

sbrul gyi lpags pas bkang byas na/ /sbrul gyis rab tu gang bar 'gyur/ /sbal pa'i 'dab mas bkang byas na/ /sbal pas rab tu gang bar 'gyur/ /til mar nag pos bkang byas na/ /sbrang bus rab tu gang bar 'gyur/ /sen

mo yis ni bkang byas na/ /srin bus mngon par gang bar 'gyur/ /sha yis kun nas bkang byas na/ /mod la gzer bas yongs su 'dzin/ /sbyor bas 'jig par byed pa dang / /slob dpon dang ni gsang dmod pa'i/ /shin tu

gdug pa'i sems can rnams/ /'di yi lam gyis sbyar bar bya/ /sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /lha mo pho nya rdo rje 'chang / /sbyor ba bsrung ba'i don du gsungs/ /las 'di yi ni khyad par nyid/ /nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / /

gdan bzhi pa dang mnyam ldan pas/ /yid mi gzhungs pas rtogs bya'i phyir/ /mdor bsdus sbyor ba byed pa'o/ /slob mas shes pas don dam smra ba'i seng ge yis/ /rnal 'byor cho gas nyon mongs g.yos pas gcad pa'i phyir/ /
nyon mongs sred pa'i nyes pa skye rtsa 'joms mdzad pa/ /rnal 'byor don dam rgyal po nyid du 'grub gyur cig /sbyor ba'i tshig gi le'u zhes bya ba bcu gcig pa rdzogs s+ho// //

dpal ldan shes rab dbang po sbas pa yis/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'jig rten khams su snang bar mdzad/ /dngos po du ma'i khyad par bsags pa'i rab rib gang gi mthu yis 'jig mdzad pa/ /rtag tu kun nas rngubs pa'i nga

rgyal mi mthun dgra yi dus dang dus su g.yul 'gyed pa'i/ /chags pa med pa'i ye shes ri bo mnyam nyid mnyam pa'i sa bon chen po gcig gis mdzad/ /'khor bar thim par gsungs pa yi/ /rtsa ba'i 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal/ /

gsang ba'i ngo bo mnyam shes phyir/ /gsang ba bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /hU~M gi rnam pa 'byin byed dngos/ /hU~M gi rnam pa mchog gi lha/ /hU~M gi rnam pa stong gyur pa/ /yi ge hU~M la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sngon du rtsa ni kun sbyar la/ /

phyis ni sa bon rnam par 'phrul/ /lte bar phyugs kyi zhags pa ni/ /phyugs kyis grol shing shin tu grol/ /shar gyi phyogs su gzhu rgyal ni/ /pad ma yi ni dkyil 'khor nyid/ /gsher ba yang ni nub kyi phyogs/ /rnam par shes pa'ang lhan

cig 'byin/ /nam mkha'i dbus su bdag nyid bya/ /bdag nyid dbus su nam mkha'o/ /gnyi ga'i dbu ma shes byas la/ /grol ba nyid du the tshom med/ /stong pa'i dbus su bdag gi ni/ /bdag nyid rtags ni mtshon pa'o/ /rtags kyi bdag

nyid 'byin pa ni/ /bsgoms pas sa yi 'byin pa'o/ /gzhu las rgyal zhing gsher ba nyid/ /skam po pad ma 'byin pa las/ /bdun bcu rtsa gnyis mnyam 'byin pa/ /rtsa dgu yi ni ming 'di nyid/ /rtsa dgu'i sa ni rtag gyur pa/ /gsum po

'byin cing yang dag sdud/ /gsher dang skam po zhes bya ba/ /rtsa ba gzhu las rgyal ba nyid/ /dngos po yi ni mtshan nyid pa'i/ /'di yis 'byin cing yang dag sdud/ /pad ma dgur ni mnyam bshad pa/ /rnam par shes pa lhan cig

gnas/ /steng 'og phyogs kyang stong pa nyid/ /dbu ma stong pa nyid du ni/ /rtag tu stong pa gsum bsgom pa/ /gang gis de shes mkhas pa'o/ /g.yon gyi glo ru ser skya dang / /g.yas par nag po chen po gnas/ /rtsa lnga las ni mnyam 'byin pa/ /

lnga nyid du ni sbyar bar bya/ /chu dang me dang nam mkha' dang / /sa nyid bzhi ste mnyam pa'i gdan/ /chu shing me tog lta bu ni/ /lte ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas/ /rtag tu kha ni rab zum pa/ /mkhas pa yis ni rgyas par bya/ /'dab ma brgyad

par rtag tu gyur/ /gsungs pa'i ge sar dang ldan par/ /de yi dbus su bshad pa ni/ /rnam shes lhan cig bsgom pa ni/ /phra rab rdul gyi rnam pa ltar/ /rnam par shes pa mtshon par bya/ /skra yi rtse mo brgya yi char/ /'od zer g.yo

ba med par gnas/ /kun nas sbyor ba gsum pas dkri/ /dkris pa'i mtshan nyid 'khor lo 'dra/ /rdza mkhan 'khor lo lta bur 'khor/ /gnas su bzlog pa ye shes so/ /rang bzhin brgyad pa'i dbye ba yis/ /skyes bu dbus su sbyar

ba'i don/ /dbus mas 'byin cing yang dag sdud/ /thams cad lta ba 'joms par byed/ /rtsa brgyad mngon par kun nas ldan/ /dkar po dud pa pad ma dung / /gi wang dri med 'byed pa dang / /sa gdugs brgyad pa'i dbye ba'o/ /bdag

med chos dang yang dag sbyor/ /bdag med pas ni rnam par dkris/ /khams gsum skyes pa zad byed nas/ /ye shes nus pa yis ni 'joms/ /dang por dkar por yang dag bsgom/ /gnyis par ser por bsgom pa dang / /gsum

par kun nas dmar por bsgom/ /bzhi pa la ni nag po nyid/ /rtsa'i 'khor lo bsgom pa ste le'u dang po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /dkyil 'khor sa bon bsgom pa ni/ /sa bon nges

par de bzhin gshegs/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge'i mtshan nyid do/ /rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ste/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol 'gro/ /dag pa'i lus kyi ngo bo yis/ /ye shes lus ni dag pa'i dngos/ /dag cing dag pa de bzhin dngos/ /

dang po'i rnal 'byor mtshan nyid do/ /de bzhin nyon mongs mun pa ni/ /rnam shes lhan cig snang ba'o/ /ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas ni/ /snang ba la sogs thob par 'gyur/ /dag pa'i lus dang sems kyis ni/ /blo ldan dkyil 'khor mtshon
